
-----title
樟树（清江） (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e3a39d836ee74f97b04e97b950edaa5e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e3a39d836ee74f97b04e97b950edaa5e");'><span id='e3a39d836ee74f97b04e97b950edaa5e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1021&endYear=1021')">1021年</a>，出生</div><div id='e3a39d836ee74f97b04e97b950edaa5e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1021&endYear=1021')">1021年11月13日</a>　此日，出生于临江军清江县，父益时判临江军。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1021&endYear=1021')">1021年</a>　兄安仁七岁。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
新干（新淦）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='cc122112a3004e8991cfaf06a0a2822c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cc122112a3004e8991cfaf06a0a2822c");'><span id='cc122112a3004e8991cfaf06a0a2822c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1022&endYear=1022')">1022年</a>，2岁</div><div id='cc122112a3004e8991cfaf06a0a2822c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1022&endYear=1022')">1022年</a>　父益判临江军，为治严明，诸豪大姓及屬吏惮之；出领新淦县，县以治闻。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
吉安（庐陵）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='762b62654f3b40c4a820073d5188dfd5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("762b62654f3b40c4a820073d5188dfd5");'><span id='762b62654f3b40c4a820073d5188dfd5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1023&endYear=1024')">1023-1024年</a>，3-4岁</div><div id='762b62654f3b40c4a820073d5188dfd5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1023&endYear=1023')">1023年</a>　父益改大理寺丞，知庐陵县，县大治。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　父益知庐陵县。<br /></div>

-----title
郫都（新繁）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='26eeffa07c9d41389cdd3ee87de15d49_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("26eeffa07c9d41389cdd3ee87de15d49");'><span id='26eeffa07c9d41389cdd3ee87de15d49_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1028')">1025-1028年</a>，5-8岁</div><div id='26eeffa07c9d41389cdd3ee87de15d49' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年</a>　父益移知新繁县，改殿中丞；惩宿奸数人，其余以恩信治之，历岁不笞一人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年</a>　大妹文淑生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年</a>　妻吴氏生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年</a>　父益知新繁县，以恩信治民。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1027')">1027年</a>　父益知新繁县，作《新繁县东湖瑞莲歌》，与梅挚屡有唱酬。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年</a>　父益知新繁县，岁时思亲，哭殊悲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年</a>　叔祖贯之卒于兴元府。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
韶关
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f53313f8ae5041c6846940b3a53014e5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f53313f8ae5041c6846940b3a53014e5");'><span id='f53313f8ae5041c6846940b3a53014e5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1032')">1030-1032年</a>，10-12岁</div><div id='f53313f8ae5041c6846940b3a53014e5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　随父至韶州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　父益以殿中丞知韶州，束黠吏，制强宗，治绩卓著。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　与乐昌神童谭必相识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　父益知韶州，增秩转屯田员外郎，移风易俗，事入《政范》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　父益教属县翁源捕虎，平屯兵之叛，完营驿仓库，建坊道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　弟安国生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　父益知韶州，新修州衙成，请余靖撰文记之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　初识字，从谭昉学，同学者有谭掞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　读书为文，过目不忘。<br /></div>
-----end

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　还自舅家，有诗书所感。作品：《还自舅家书所感》<div id='poem_69948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>还自舅家书所感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69948")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69948'>行行过舅居，归路指亲庐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69948'>日苦树无赖，天空云自如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69948'>黄焦下泽稻，绿碎短樊蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69948'>沮溺非吾意，悯嗟聊驻车。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　谒曾巩，指疵攻瑕，相聚甚欢，为巩道及孙侔；巩赋诗酬《还自舅家书所感》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　识抚州司法参军张彦博，日与之接。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　日者金华山人相过，撰文以谂之。作品：《汴说》<div id='poem_1176655' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176655' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176655?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176655")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176655_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176655'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176655'>古者卜筮有常官，所诹有常事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176655_comment'></div>若考步人生辰星宿所次，訾相人仪状色理，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176655", 1176655, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>逆斥</span>人祸福，考信于圣人无有也，不知从何许人传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176655_comment'></div>宗其说者，澶漫四出，抵今为尤蕃，举天下而籍之，以是自名者，盖数万不啻，而汴不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176655_comment'></div>举汴而籍之，盖亦以万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176655_comment'></div>予尝视汴之术士，善挟奇而以动人者，大抵宫庐服舆食饮之华，封君不如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176655_comment'></div>其出也，或召焉，问之，某人也，朝贵人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176655_comment'></div>其归也，或赐焉，问之，某人也，朝贵人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176655_comment'></div>坐其庐旁，历其人之往来，肩相切，踵相籍，穷一朝暮，则已错不可计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176655_comment'></div>窃异之，且窃叹曰：吾侪治先圣人之言而脩其术，张之能为天子营太平，歛之犹足以禔身正家，顾未尝有公卿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176655", 1176655, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>彻官</span>若是其即之勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176655_comment'></div>或曰：「子知乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176655_comment'></div>渴者期于浆，疾者期于医，治然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176655_comment'></div>子诚能为天子营太平，禔身正家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176655_comment'></div>彼所存势与位尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176655_comment'></div>势不盈，位不充，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176655", 1176655, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>热中</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176655", 1176655, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>热中</span>则惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176655_comment'></div>势盈位充矣，则病失之，病失之则忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176655_comment'></div>惑且忧，则思决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176655_comment'></div>以彼为能决，子亦能乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176655_comment'></div>不能，则无异其即彼疏此也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176655_comment'></div>因寤不复异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176655_comment'></div>久之，补吏淮南，省亲江南，有金华山人者，率然相过，自言能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176655", 1176655, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>逆斥</span>祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176655_comment'></div>噫，今之世子之术奚适而不遇哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176655_comment'></div>因以《汴说》谂之。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176655'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176655_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　上书淮南、江、浙、荆湖制置发运使徐的。作品：《上徐兵部书》<div id='poem_1176377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上徐兵部书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176377")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176377'>向蒙执事畀之严符，开以归路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176377_comment'></div>暮春三月，登舟而南，浮江绝湖，绵二千里，风波劲悍，雨潦湍猛，穷两月乃至家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176377_comment'></div>展先人之墓，宁祖母于堂，十年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176377", 1176377, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>萦郁</span>，一旦释去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176377_comment'></div>戴执事之赐，此时惟重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176377_comment'></div>还职不时，以惧以惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176377_comment'></div>然去父母之道，古人所为迟迟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176377_comment'></div>不识执事谪之贳之，宜将何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176377_comment'></div>区区之怀，无以自处矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176377_comment'></div>恭惟执事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176377", 1176377, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>宽通</span>精明，暴著有年，宜留本朝，辅助风教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176377_comment'></div>利权之柄，国家诚重，荐绅之论，犹为嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176377_comment'></div>宠灵降集，可拱以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176377_comment'></div>伏惟为国自寿，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176377", 1176377, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>迓迎</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176377", 1176377, "Clauses/34/Comments/1")'>休福</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176377_comment'></div>某此月治行，承序于左右，在旦暮矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176377_comment'></div>下情无任依归颂愿之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　作诗思还扬州。作品：《黄花》<div id='poem_69630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69630")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69630'>四月扬州芍药多，先时为别苦风波。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69630'>还家忽忽惊秋色，独见黄花出短莎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69630'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69630_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年8月</a>　八月，在临川撰文，抨击杨亿、刘筠以文词染当世，致学者迷其端原。作品：《张刑部诗序》<div id='poem_1176583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张刑部诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176583")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176583'>刑部张君诗若干篇，明而不华，喜讽道而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176583", 1176583, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>刻切</span>，其唐人善诗者之徒欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176583_comment'></div>君并杨、刘，杨、刘以其文词染当世，学者迷其端原，靡靡然穷日力以摹之，粉墨青朱，颠错丛庬，无文章黼黻之序，其属情藉事，不可考据也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176583_comment'></div>方此时，自守不污者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176583_comment'></div>君诗独不然，其自守不污者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176583_comment'></div>子夏曰：「诗者，志之所之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176583_comment'></div>观君之志，然则其行亦自守不污者邪，岂唯其言而已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176583_comment'></div>畀予诗而请序者，君之子彦博也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176583_comment'></div>彦博字文叔，为抚州司法，还自扬州识之，日与之接云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176583_comment'></div>庆历三年八月序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176583_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='6a4738480b9a4dc58b94ec2128c5865d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6a4738480b9a4dc58b94ec2128c5865d");'><span id='6a4738480b9a4dc58b94ec2128c5865d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>，25岁</div><div id='6a4738480b9a4dc58b94ec2128c5865d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>归临川，撰外祖母黄夫人墓表。作品：《外祖母黄夫人墓表》<div id='poem_1176738' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176738' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176738?labeling=true' target='_blank'>外祖母黄夫人墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176738")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176738_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176738'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176738'>外祖夫人黄氏，生二十二年归吴氏，归五十年而卒，卒三月而葬，康定二年十二月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176738_comment'></div>夫人渊静<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176738", 1176738, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>裕和</span>，不彊而安，事舅、姑、夫，抚子，皆顺适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176738_comment'></div>吴氏内外族甚大，朝夕相与居，岁时以辞币酒食相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176738", 1176738, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>缀接</span>，卒夫人之世，戚疏愚良，一无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176738_comment'></div>又喜书史，晓大致，往往引以辅导处士，信厚闻于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176738_comment'></div>子为士，无亏行，繄夫人之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176738_comment'></div>夫人资寡言笑，声若不能出，虽族人亦不知其晓书史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176738_comment'></div>某，外孙也，故得之详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176738_comment'></div>明道中，过舅家，夫人春秋高矣，视其礼，犹若女妇然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176738_comment'></div>视其色，不知其有喜愠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176738_comment'></div>病且革，以薄葬命子亿，其可谓以正始终也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176738_comment'></div>舅藩既志其葬四年，某还自扬州，复其墓，复表曰：圣人之教必繇闺门始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176738_comment'></div>后世志于教者，亦未之勤而已，天下相重以戾，相荡以侈，疣然斁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176738_comment'></div>自公卿大夫无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176738", 1176738, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>完德</span>，岂或女妇然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176738_comment'></div>或者女妇居不识厅屏，笑言不闻邻里，是识然也，置则悖矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176738_comment'></div>然其死也，闻人传焉以美之，是亦教之熄也，人人之不能然也，传焉以美之，宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176738_comment'></div>矧如夫人者，有不可表耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176738_comment'></div>于戏！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176738_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>岁末，离临川赴京。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='1144747190b445279acbcfc1ff8d13dd_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　归临川，作诗。作品：《到家》<div id='poem_69957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年5月</a>　五月，应邓表之请，撰文。作品：《抚州祥符观三清殿记》<div id='poem_1176701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>抚州祥符观三清殿记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176701")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176701'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176701'>临川之州城横溪上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176701_comment'></div>西出，出城之上，有宫岿然，溪之沄沄流过其下，东南之山皆在其门户窗牖之间者，曰祥符观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176701_comment'></div>观之中有屋四注，深五十五尺，广七十二尺，升之高，居深十八分之一，楹二十有四，门两夹窗，中象三，旁象二十有六者，曰三清殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176701_comment'></div>用其师之说以动人，而能有此者，曰道士黎自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176701_comment'></div>出其力以归于道士之说，而卒成此者，曰里之人邓佺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176701_comment'></div>佺之子表，故尝与予游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176701_comment'></div>予之归，表语其父之事，而乞予文，予不能拒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176701_comment'></div>夫用其师之说以动人者道士也，予力顾出道士下，复何云哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176701_comment'></div>皇祐二年五月二十五日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176701_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　杜杞卒，作文祭之。作品：《祭杜庆州杞文》<div id='poem_1176865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭杜庆州杞文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1176865_comment'></div>材能称于天下，言行信于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176865_comment'></div>孰多其予，而不足以龄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176865_comment'></div>不肖之身，始佐公扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176865_comment'></div>公后来东，有赐于明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176865_comment'></div>昔饮同堂，今奠于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176865_comment'></div>酒肴则薄，丰者维诚。<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1176771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临川吴子善墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176771")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176771'>临川吴氏有子兴宗，字子善，年二十丧母，而其父以生事付之，则先日出以作，后日入以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176771_comment'></div>日午矣，家一人未饭，其夫妇必尚空腹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176771_comment'></div>天寒矣，家一人未纩，其夫妇必尚单衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176771_comment'></div>盖如此者二十年而父终，三十年而己死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176771_comment'></div>凡嫁五妹，办数丧，又以其筋力之馀，及于乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176771_comment'></div>茍有故，必我劳人佚，先往后归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176771_comment'></div>而尤笃于友爱，见弟有过，则颜色愈温，须饮酒欢极之间，乃微示以意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176771_comment'></div>既而即泣下曰：「吾亲属我以汝，吾所以不避艰险者，保汝而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176771_comment'></div>其弟终感悟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176771", 1176771, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>悔改</span>为善士，以文学名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176771_comment'></div>此待其弟乃尔，若于他人，则绝口不涉其非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176771_comment'></div>然里中少年闻其謦欬之音，往往逃匿，若匿不及，则俯首恐愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176771_comment'></div>而尝有所絓，一至讼庭，及著械，同絓数十人为之皆哭，掌狱者惊起白守，守立免焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176771_comment'></div>其见畏爱多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176771_comment'></div>某谓其父为诸舅，甚知其所为，故于其弟子经、孝宗之求志以葬也，为道而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176771_comment'></div>子善尝应进士举，后专于耕养，遂不复应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176771_comment'></div>其死以治平四年八月九日，而十二月十二日与其母黄氏共葬于灵源村父墓之域中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176771_comment'></div>父讳偃，亦有行义，用疾弗仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176771_comment'></div>祖讳表微，尚书屯田员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176771_comment'></div>曾祖讳英，殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176771_comment'></div>初妻姓王氏，一男良弼，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176771_comment'></div>再娶杨氏，生荛、适、枉，荛始九岁，而四女，幼者一岁云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　妻弟吴显道追送至抚州，因其请，与子雱同赋诗。作品：《试茗泉》《躍马泉》<div id='poem_70556' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70556' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70556?labeling=true' target='_blank'>试茗泉<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本注：得月字。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70556")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70556_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70556'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70556'>此泉地何偏，陆羽曾未阅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70556'>坻沙光散射，窦乳甘潜泄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70556'>灵山不可见，嘉草何由啜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70556'>但有梦中人，相随掬明月。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70556'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70556_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跃马泉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70713")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70713'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70713'>古水缩蛟螭，憎山欲隳突。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70713'>山祇来伐之，半岭跳齧膝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70713'>玉珂鸣塞<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作寒）</span>空，组练光照日。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70713'>崩腾赴不测，一陷常万匹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70713'>神战异人间，千秋为倏忽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70713'>泉旁往来客，夜寄幽人室。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70713'>但听鸣萧萧，何由见神物。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70713'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_70713_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
金溪
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='827a83f93e0c468488899b2d515f08dc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("827a83f93e0c468488899b2d515f08dc");'><span id='827a83f93e0c468488899b2d515f08dc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>，13岁</div><div id='827a83f93e0c468488899b2d515f08dc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　时至金谿吴氏舅家。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='05ba73395ebf469e96100f372ab7b7ad_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("05ba73395ebf469e96100f372ab7b7ad");'><span id='05ba73395ebf469e96100f372ab7b7ad_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年</a>，15岁</div><div id='05ba73395ebf469e96100f372ab7b7ad' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与舅家诸外弟颇多交往，少壮自负，弄笔为文。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>识神童方仲永。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='e79d068d88174a91a6b64c4b36604050_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e79d068d88174a91a6b64c4b36604050");'><span id='e79d068d88174a91a6b64c4b36604050_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，23岁</div><div id='e79d068d88174a91a6b64c4b36604050' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>还家后，至金谿吴氏舅家，与诸外弟相聚。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>娶妻吴氏。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>于舅家又见神童方仲永，已泯然众人。作品：《伤仲永》<div id='poem_1176656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176656?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤仲永</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176656")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176656_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176656'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176656'>金溪民方仲永，世隶耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176656_comment'></div>仲永生五年，未尝试<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>书具</span>，忽啼求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176656_comment'></div>父异焉，借旁近与之，即书诗四句，并自为其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176656_comment'></div>其诗以养父母、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>收族</span>为意，传一乡秀才观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176656_comment'></div>自是指物作诗，立就，其文理皆有可观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176656_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>邑人</span>奇之，稍稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>宾客</span>其父，或以钱币乞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176656_comment'></div>父利其然也，日扳仲永<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>环谒</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>邑人</span>，不使学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176656_comment'></div>予闻之也久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176656_comment'></div>明道中，从先人还家，于舅家见之，十二三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176656_comment'></div>令作诗，不能称前时之闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176656_comment'></div>又七年，还自扬州，复到舅家，问焉，曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/32/Comments/2")'>泯然</span>众人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176656_comment'></div>王子曰：仲永之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>通悟</span>，受之天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176656_comment'></div>其受之天也，贤于材人远矣，卒之为众人，则其受于人者不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176656_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176656", 1176656, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>彼其</span>受之天也，如此其贤也，不受之人，且为众人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176656_comment'></div>今夫不受之天，固众人，又不受之人，得为众人而已邪？</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176656_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

开封

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年</a>　父益服除，赴京师，随之。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9ad5d9dfeb1e44eba627ee497d674b30_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9ad5d9dfeb1e44eba627ee497d674b30");'><span id='9ad5d9dfeb1e44eba627ee497d674b30_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1042')">1041-1042年</a>，21-22岁</div><div id='9ad5d9dfeb1e44eba627ee497d674b30' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　抵京，病。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　曾巩本年入太学，与曾巩定交。<br /><a id='poem_1176532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176532?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢及第启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176532")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176532_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176532'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176532_comment'></div>一介之技，猥尘华选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176532_comment'></div>冒荣之辱，抚己而惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176532_comment'></div>窃以国家揽八县之广，具万官之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176532_comment'></div>一化所染，人有善行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176532_comment'></div>数路之举，野无滞材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176532_comment'></div>取士如此之详，得人于斯为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176532_comment'></div>然犹谦不自足，乐于旁求，比诏郡邑，详延岩穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176532_comment'></div>向非蔚有声采，著在观听，何以酬上勤伫，塞人烦言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176532_comment'></div>如某者族敝而贱，材顽且疏，逢世治文，追师乡道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176532_comment'></div>员冠方屦，有贱儒之名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176532_comment'></div>高文大册，无作者之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176532_comment'></div>昊乾不吊，先子夙丧，侨家异土，归扫穷阎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176532_comment'></div>上不能执轩冕以取高，下不能力稼穑而为养，俛首干进，蕲荣逮亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176532_comment'></div>适会诏之兴氓，遂负书而应令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176532_comment'></div>乡老署其行，荐之明朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176532_comment'></div>春官訾其材，置以异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176532_comment'></div>率趋法座，辈试殊庭，仅成骫骳之谈，复玷高华之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176532_comment'></div>夫何抵此，厥有繇然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176532_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官德厚兼容，风华博照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176532_comment'></div>斟酌元气，洪纤溥被其仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176532_comment'></div>彫刻众形，妍恶曲成其汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176532_comment'></div>乘云洒润，秉律嘘枯，使是寒士，阶于荣路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176532_comment'></div>敢不审图大方，惇率常宪，取所承学，著之行事，唯仁之守，唯谊之循，不以邪曲回精忠之操，不以宠利污廉洁之尚，庶期尽齿，无负大赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176532_comment'></div>易此而他，未知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　及第后拜谒晏殊，颇见器重。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年4月23日</a>　此日，授校书郎，签书淮南节度判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　曾巩下第归抚州，与之别。<br href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　与叔父会于京师，撰文。作品：《大中祥符观新修九曜阁记》<div id='poem_1176698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大中祥符观新修九曜阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176698")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176698'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176698'>某自扬州归，与叔父会京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176698_comment'></div>叔父曰：「大中祥符观所谓九曜者，道士丁用平募民钱为堂庖庑已，又为阁置九曜像其下，从吾乞汝文，记其年时，汝为之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176698_comment'></div>临川之城中，东有大丘，左溪水，水南出而北并于江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176698_comment'></div>城之东，以溪为隍，吾庐当丘上，北折而东百步，为祥符观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176698_comment'></div>观岸溪水，东南之山不奄乎人家者，可望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176698_comment'></div>某少时固尝从长者游而乐之，以为溪山之佳，虽异州，乐也，况吾父母之州，而又去吾庐为之近者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176698_comment'></div>虽其身去为吏，独其心不须臾去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176698_comment'></div>今道士又新其居，以壮观游，阁焉，使游者得以穷登望之胜，使可望者不唯东南而已，岂不重可乐邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176698_comment'></div>道士之所为，几吾之所乐，而命吾文，又叔父也，即欲已，得邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176698_comment'></div>惜乎，安得与州之君子者游焉，以忘吾忧而慰吾思邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176698_comment'></div>阁成之日，某年月日也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176698_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在京复遇陈世昌，相好加焉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　是年，上张太博书，呈文十篇。张回赐所作，再上书谢。作品：《上张太博书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　是年，撰曾巩祖母墓志铭。作品：《曾公夫人万年太君黄氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曾公夫人万年太君黄氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176818")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176818'>夫人江宁黄氏，兼侍御史、知永安场讳某之子，南丰曾氏赠尚书水部员外郎讳某之妇，赠谏议大夫讳某之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176818_comment'></div>凡受县君封者四：萧山、江夏、遂昌、雒阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176818_comment'></div>受县太君封者二：会稽、万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176818_comment'></div>男子四，女子三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176818_comment'></div>以庆历四年某月日卒于抚州，寿九十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176818_comment'></div>明年某月，葬于南丰之某地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176818_comment'></div>夫人十四岁无母，事永安府君至孝，修家事有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176818_comment'></div>二十三岁归曾氏，不及舅水部府君之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176818_comment'></div>以事永安之孝，事姑陈留县君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176818_comment'></div>以治父母之家，治夫家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176818_comment'></div>事姑之党，称其所以事姑之礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176818_comment'></div>事夫与夫之党，若严上然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176818_comment'></div>视子慈，视子之党若子然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176818_comment'></div>每自戒不处白人善否，有问之，曰：「顺为正，妇道也，吾勤此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176818_comment'></div>处白人善否，靡靡然为聪明，非妇人宜也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176818_comment'></div>以此为女与妇，其传而至于没，与为女妇时弗差也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176818_comment'></div>故内外亲无老幼疏近，无智不能，尊者皆爱，辈者皆附，卑者皆慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176818_comment'></div>为女妇在其前者，多自叹不及，后来者皆曰：「可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176818", 1176818, "Clauses/49/Comments/2")'>矜法</span>也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176818_comment'></div>其言色在视听则皆得所欲，其离别则涕洟不能舍，有疾皆忧，及丧来吊哭，皆哀有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176818_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176818_comment'></div>夫人之德如是，是宜有铭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176818_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176818'>女子之德，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176818", 1176818, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>煦愿</span>愉愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176818_comment'></div>教隳弗行，妇妾乘夫，趋为亢厉，励之颛愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176818_comment'></div>猗嗟夫人，惟德之经！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176818_comment'></div>媚于族姻，柔色淑声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176818_comment'></div>其究女初，不倾不盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176818_comment'></div>谁疑不信，来监于铭！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1176818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在京撰文答陈柅书，论老、庄与圣人之别。作品：《答陈柅书》<div id='poem_1176402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176402?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答陈柅书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176402")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176402'>某启：伏蒙不遗不肖，而身辱先之，示之文章，使得窥究其所蕴，又取某所以应见问者，序而存之，以宠其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176402_comment'></div>足下之赐过矣，不敢当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176402_comment'></div>某懦陋浅薄，学未成而仕，其言行往往背戾于圣人之道，摈而后复者，非一事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176402_comment'></div>自度尚不足与庸人为师，况如足下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176402", 1176402, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>材良</span>俊明，安能一有所补邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176402_comment'></div>虽然，足下过听，所序而存者，或非某所闻于师友之本指也，则义不得默而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176402_comment'></div>庄生之书，其通性命之分，而不以死生祸福累其心，此其近圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176402_comment'></div>自非明智不能及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176402_comment'></div>明智矣，读圣人之说，亦足以及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176402_comment'></div>不足以及此，而陷溺于周之说，则其为乱大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176402_comment'></div>墨翟非亢然诋圣人而立其说于世，盖学圣人之道而失之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176402_comment'></div>虽周亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176402_comment'></div>韩氏作《读墨》，而又谓子夏之后，流而为庄周，则庄、墨皆学圣人而失其源者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176402_comment'></div>老、庄之书具在，其说未尝及神仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176402_comment'></div>唯葛洪为二人作传以为仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176402_comment'></div>而足下谓老、庄潜心于神仙，疑非老、庄之实，故尝为足下道此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176402_comment'></div>老、庄虽不及神仙，而其说亦不皆合于经，盖有志于道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176402_comment'></div>圣人之说，博大而闳深，要当不遗馀力以求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176402_comment'></div>是二书虽欲读，抑有所不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176402_comment'></div>某之所闻如此，其离合于道，惟足下自择之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176402_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　孙适从学，称之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　弟安国再赋滕王阁诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年1月14日</a>　此日，充点检试卷官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　与权同知贡举张方平论事不合。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在京识江朴，善之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　例当进所业求试馆职，独不进，特召试，亦固辞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　从弟沆登贾黯榜进士第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　以胡叔才下第归乡，作序送之，勉其以道德为荣。作品：《送胡叔才序》<div id='poem_1176570' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176570' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176570?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送胡叔才序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176570")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176570_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176570'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176570'>叔才，铜陵大宗，世以赀名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176570_comment'></div>子弟豪者，驰骋渔弋为己事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176570_comment'></div>谨者，务多辟田以殖其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176570_comment'></div>先时，邑之豪子弟有命儒者，耗其千金之产，卒无就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176570_comment'></div>邑豪以为谚，莫肯命儒者，遇儒冠者，皆指目远去，若将浼己然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176570_comment'></div>虽胡氏亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176570_comment'></div>独叔才之父母不然，于叔才之幼，捐重币，逆良先生教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176570_comment'></div>既壮可以游，资而遣之无所靳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176570_comment'></div>居数年，朋试于有司，不合而归，邑人之訾者半，窃笑者半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176570_comment'></div>其父母愈笃不悔，复资而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176570_comment'></div>叔才纯孝人也，悱然感父母所以教己之笃，追四方才贤，学作文章，思显其身以及其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176570_comment'></div>不数年，遂能褎然为材进士，复朋试于有司，不幸复诎于不己知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176570_comment'></div>不予愚而从之游，尝谓予言父母之思，而惭其邑人，不能归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176570_comment'></div>予曰：「归也，夫禄与位，庸者所待以为荣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176570_comment'></div>彼贤者道弸于中，而襮之以艺，虽无禄与位，其荣者固在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176570_comment'></div>子之亲，矫群庸而置子于圣贤之途，可谓不贤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176570_comment'></div>或訾或笑而终不悔，不贤者能之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176570_comment'></div>今而舍道德而荣禄与位，殆不其然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176570_comment'></div>然则子之所以荣亲而释惭者，亦多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176570_comment'></div>昔之訾者窃笑者，固庸者尔，岂子所宜惭哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176570_comment'></div>姑持予言以归，为父母寿，其亦喜无量，于子何如」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176570_comment'></div>因释然寤，治装而归，予即书其所以为父母寿者送之云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176570_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在京与王回、王向兄弟为友。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　与曾巩书，荐王回兄弟，并寄示其文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年5月</a>　五月，京师雨雹地震，作诗。作品：《丙戌五月京师作二首》<div id='poem_70330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丙戌五日<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作月）</span>京师作二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70330")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70330'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70330'>北风阁雨去不下，惊沙苍茫乱昏晓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70330'>传闻城外八九里，雹大如拳死飞鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70330'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70330_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70329?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年5月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70329'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70329'>浮云离披久不合，太阳独行乾万物。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70329'>谁令昨夜雨霶沱，北风萧萧寒到骨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70329'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　以陈世昌之官泉州晋江主簿，作序送之。作品：《送陈兴之序》<div id='poem_1176566' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176566' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176566?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈兴之序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176566")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176566_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176566'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176566'>先人为临江军判官，实佐今驾部员外郎陈公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176566_comment'></div>其后二十五年，公之子兴之主泰之如皋簿，某为判官淮南，以事出如皋，遇之，相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176566_comment'></div>其后二年归京师，兴之亦以进士得嘉庆院解，复遇之，相好加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176566_comment'></div>兴之试礼部有日，今宰相其世父也，奏前试罢之以避嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176566_comment'></div>兴之当远官，踰数月，乃得泉之晋江主簿去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176566_comment'></div>陈公世大家，仕宦四十年，连坐谪流落，不得所欲，其意不能毋望兴之贵富世其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176566_comment'></div>兴之亦诚博学能文辞，有气节，吾意其为进士宜有得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176566_comment'></div>今失所欲，又为所谓主簿者，远其亲三千里不啻，是其心独能毋介然者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176566_comment'></div>夫大公之道行，上之人子弟茍贤者，任而进之无嫌也，下之人固亦不以嫌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176566_comment'></div>今兴之去，知者皆怜其才之可以进焉而不得，无以慰其亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176566_comment'></div>吾于兴之又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176566", 1176566, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>世故</span>，故又为之思所以慰其亲，豁其心之介然者，不得其说，而独以悲大公之道不行焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176566_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　秋，东出京师，见中州大旱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　沈兼卒。作文祭之。作品：《祭沈中舍文》<div id='poem_1176870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176870?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭沈中舍文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176870")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176870'>惟公之生，于朝搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176870_comment'></div>夫人嫔之，以作封君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176870_comment'></div>皆以寿终，而世有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176870_comment'></div>昔我先子，公伦之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176870_comment'></div>施于不肖，遂为世友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176870_comment'></div>不腆之文，既藏于丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176870_comment'></div>惟是区区，以赞醪羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176870_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　沈兼卒。又为撰墓志铭。作品：《太子中舍沈君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太子中舍沈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176750")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176750'>沈氏世家吴兴，其后有陵者仕吴越王，卒官明州，家之，五世而生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176750_comment'></div>公讳兼，字子逵，以五举进士得同学究出身，再补尉，有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176750_comment'></div>用举者迁卫尉寺丞，知湖之归安县，移知邵武之归化，又有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176750_comment'></div>迁太子中舍，通判苏州，其以能闻愈甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176750_comment'></div>公好刚，遇事果急不顾计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176750_comment'></div>为通判日，与守争可否，不为之小屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176750_comment'></div>重犯转运使，使、守相与害公，入之法，除名，天子薄其罪，免所居官而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176750_comment'></div>公归怡怡，间为五字诗自戏娱，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176750", 1176750, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>躁戚</span>言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176750_comment'></div>卒于家，年七十三，庆历六年七月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176750_comment'></div>子男一人，起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176750_comment'></div>女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176750_comment'></div>起好学，通政事，能守节法，为进士，与某同时得科名者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176750_comment'></div>公之坐狱，为判官滁门，立弃官从公，世以为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176750_comment'></div>将以某年某月葬公某处，以夫人柳氏祔，先三月来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176750_comment'></div>与铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1176750'>生也不得，其须而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176750_comment'></div>死也何有，有嘉者子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176750_comment'></div>呜呼，已矣夫！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　为浮屠慧礼撰文，抨击儒者不能行孔子之道。作品：《扬州龙兴讲院记》<div id='poem_1176692' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176692' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176692?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州龙兴讲院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176692")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176692_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176692'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176692'>予少时客游金陵，浮屠慧礼者从予游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176692_comment'></div>予既吏淮南，而慧礼得龙兴佛舍，与其徒日讲其师之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176692_comment'></div>尝出而过焉，庳屋数十椽，上破而旁穿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176692_comment'></div>侧出而视后，则榛棘出人，不见垣端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176692_comment'></div>指以语予曰：「吾将除此而宫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176692_comment'></div>虽然，其成也，不以私吾后，必求时之能行吾道者付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176692_comment'></div>愿记以示后之人，使不得私焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176692_comment'></div>当是时，礼方丐食饮以卒日，视其居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176692", 1176692, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>枵然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176692_comment'></div>余特戏曰：「姑成之，吾记无难者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176692_comment'></div>后四年来，曰：「昔之所欲为，凡百二十楹，赖州人蒋氏之力，既皆成，盍有述焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176692_comment'></div>噫，何其能也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176692_comment'></div>盖慧礼者，予知之，其行谨洁，学博而才敏，而又卒之以不私，宜成此不难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176692_comment'></div>世既言佛能以祸福语倾天下，故其隆尚之如此，非徒然也，盖其学者之材，亦多有以动世耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176692_comment'></div>今夫衣冠而学者，必曰自孔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176692_comment'></div>孔氏之道易行也，非有苦身窘形，离性禁欲，若彼之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176692_comment'></div>而士之行可一乡、才足一官者常少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176692_comment'></div>而浮屠之寺庙被四海，则彼其所谓材者，宁独礼耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176692_comment'></div>以彼之材，由此之道，去至难而就甚易，宜其能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176692_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176692_comment'></div>失之此而彼得焉，其有以也夫！</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176692_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　陈执古卒，为撰墓志铭。作品：《比部员外郎陈君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176772' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176772?labeling=true' target='_blank'>比部员外郎陈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176772")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176772_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176772'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176772'>陈晋公有子五人，其一人今宰相是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176772_comment'></div>公，晋公之中子，而今宰相弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176772_comment'></div>晋公讳某，事始卒在史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176772_comment'></div>公讳某，字某，九岁，用晋公恩守秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176772_comment'></div>晋公薨，恩改太常寺奉礼郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176772_comment'></div>服除，久之，会封禅恩，改大理评事，监凤翔府酒税，又会祀汾阴，改卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176772_comment'></div>归，以最升知邵武之邵武县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176772_comment'></div>献文章，得试学士院，宰相才之，议与科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176772_comment'></div>公固辞，亲在，愿得进官职也，不愿得科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176772_comment'></div>从之，通判秀州，改大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176772_comment'></div>归，又献文章，表乞治剧郡，得淮阳军，改太子中舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176772_comment'></div>今上即位，恩改殿中丞，是岁，赐绯衣银鱼，知临江军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176772_comment'></div>还，得睦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176772_comment'></div>荐者数人，天子以公名属审官，又徙知遂州，以齐国太夫人疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176772_comment'></div>还，改虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176772_comment'></div>上便宜数事，得引对，因自赞，天子欲稍进用之，而遭齐国太夫人之丧以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176772_comment'></div>居无何，睦州人王稷上书斥公赦前数事，服除，犹坐是监虔州税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176772_comment'></div>明道元年，恩改比部员外郎，通判建州，改驾部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176772_comment'></div>用举者徙知吉州，坐法免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176772_comment'></div>起为比部，监泗州粮料，又坐法免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176772_comment'></div>起为虞部，监饶州钱监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176772_comment'></div>复得比部，归，羁居京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176772_comment'></div>久之，乃出监江阴军酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176772_comment'></div>道疾病，上书自言：「先臣恕得幸先皇帝，至大臣，臣阶先臣以得仕，屡进所学，蒙记识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176772_comment'></div>方壮少时，颇汲汲欲自奋，收一日之效，以卒事陛下，而孤行单立，无党友之助，又薄命不幸，数遭小人，以见困蹶，负先臣馀教，辱陛下器使之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176772_comment'></div>今老矣，念终无以报盛德，深自愧耻，夙夜忧畏，以故得疾病且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176772_comment'></div>无田园以归，无强有力子弟以养，唯男一人世昌去年为进士，得嘉庆院解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176772_comment'></div>臣兄在中书，奏不得试礼部，今当为远官，去臣旁远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176772_comment'></div>陛下怜之，幸听臣分司，改世昌苏、常间一官，以卒养臣，天地之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176772_comment'></div>臣诚穷，即不自言，谁当为臣言者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176772_comment'></div>书入未报，竟卒于江宁，得年若干，时某年月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176772_comment'></div>夫人某氏，子男两人：世昌，泉之晋江主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176772_comment'></div>次世长，前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176772_comment'></div>女两人，皆已嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176772_comment'></div>主簿将以某年月日葬公某处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176772_comment'></div>葬有日，使来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176772_comment'></div>初，公为临江军，先君为之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176772_comment'></div>其后二十五年，某得主簿于淮南，而兄事之，仍世有好，义不可以辞无铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176772_comment'></div>公名臣子，少壮得美仕，间以文艺自进，意自以为且贵富世其家，而遭平世，概以文法持臣下，故其材不得有所肆，而卒以龃龉穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176772_comment'></div>其感激怨怼，往往见于文辞，主簿离其稿为二十卷，读之，知其心之所存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176772_comment'></div>而其求分司语尤悲，因掇其大概而存之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176772_comment'></div>噫，其亦可悲也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176772_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1176772'>于此有木焉，一本而中分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176772_comment'></div>其材均，树之时又均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176772_comment'></div>或断而焚，而剖以为牺尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176772_comment'></div>谁令然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176772_comment'></div>其偶然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176772_comment'></div>吾又何嗟！</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1176772_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　与祖无择书，论治教政令乃圣人之所谓文；并呈书、序、原、说若干篇。作品：《与祖择之书》<div id='poem_1176389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与祖择之书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176389")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176389'>治教政令，圣人之所谓文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176389_comment'></div>书之策，引而被之天下之民，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176389_comment'></div>圣人之于道也，盖心得之，作而为治教政令也，则有本末先后，权势制义，而一之于极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176389_comment'></div>其书之策也，则道其然而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176389_comment'></div>彼陋者不然，一适焉，一否焉，非流焉则泥，非过焉则不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176389_comment'></div>甚者置其本，求之末，当后者反先之，无一焉不悖于极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176389_comment'></div>彼其于道也，非心得之也，其书之策也，独能不悖耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176389_comment'></div>故书之策而善，引而被之天下之民反不善焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176389_comment'></div>无矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176389_comment'></div>二帝三王引而被之天下之民而善者也，孔子、孟子书之策而善者也，皆圣人也，易地则皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176389_comment'></div>某生十二年而学，学十四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176389_comment'></div>圣人之所谓文者，私有意焉，书之策则未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176389_comment'></div>间或悱然动于事而出于词，以警戒其躬，若施于友朋，褊迫陋庳，非敢谓之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176389_comment'></div>乃者，执事欲收而教之使献焉，虽自知明，敢自盖邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176389_comment'></div>谨书所为书、序、原、说若干篇，因叙所闻与所志献左右，惟赐览观焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　上人书，再论治教政令即所谓文。作品：《上人书》<div id='poem_1176387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176387")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176387'>尝谓文者，礼教治政云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176387_comment'></div>其书诸策而传之人，大体归然而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176387_comment'></div>而曰「言之不文，行之不远」云者，徒谓辞之不可以已也，非圣人作文之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176387_comment'></div>自孔子之死久，韩子作，望圣人于百千年中，卓然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176387_comment'></div>独子厚名与韩并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176387_comment'></div>子厚非韩比也，然其文卒配韩以传，亦豪杰可畏者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176387_comment'></div>韩子尝语人以文矣，曰云云，子厚亦曰云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176387_comment'></div>疑二子者，徒语人以其辞耳，作文之本意，不如是其已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176387_comment'></div>孟子曰：「君子欲其自得之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176387_comment'></div>自得之，则居之安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176387_comment'></div>居之安，则资之深；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176387_comment'></div>资之深，则取诸左右逢其原」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176387_comment'></div>孟子之云尔，非直施于文而已，然亦可托以为作文之本意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176387_comment'></div>且所谓文者，务为有补于世而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176387_comment'></div>所谓辞者，犹器之有刻镂绘画也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176387_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176387", 1176387, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>诚使</span>巧且华，不必适用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176387_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1176387", 1176387, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>诚使</span>适用，亦不必巧且华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176387_comment'></div>要之以适用为本，以刻镂绘画为之容而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176387_comment'></div>不适用，非所以为器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176387_comment'></div>不为之容，其亦若是乎否也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176387_comment'></div>然容亦未可已也，勿先之，其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176387_comment'></div>某学文久，数挟此说以自治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176387_comment'></div>始欲书之策而传之人，其试于事者，则有待矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176387_comment'></div>其为是非邪，未能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1176387", 1176387, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>自定</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176387_comment'></div>执事正人也，不阿其所好者，书杂文十篇献左右，愿赐之教，使之是非有定焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　孙长倩来访，作诗相送。作品：《孙长倩归辉州》<div id='poem_70627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70627?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孙长倩归辉州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70627")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70627'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70627'>溪涧得雨潦，奔溢<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作逸）</span>不可航。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70627'>江海收百川，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70627", 70627, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>浩浩</span>谁能量。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70627'>溪涧之日短，江海之日长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70627_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　孙长倩来访，别后作书答之。作品：《答孙长倩书》<div id='poem_1176374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答孙长倩书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176374")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176374'>孙君足下：比过江宁，家兄道足下虽稚年，有奇意，欲务古人事于今世，发为词章，尤感切今世事，荦荦有可畏爱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176374_comment'></div>语未究，足下来门，见示以文，见责以教诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176374_comment'></div>观足下所为文，探足下志，信然，独责教诲为失其所焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176374_comment'></div>古之道废踣久矣，大贤间起废踣之中，率常位庳泽狭，万不救一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176374_comment'></div>天下日更薄恶，宦学者不谋道，主禄利而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176374_comment'></div>尝记一人焉，甚贵且有名，自言少时迷，喜学古文，后乃大寤，弃不学，学治今时文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176374_comment'></div>夫古文何伤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176374_comment'></div>直与世少合耳，尚不肯学，而谓学者迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176374_comment'></div>若行古之道于今世，则往往困矣，其又肯行邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176374_comment'></div>甚贵且有名者云尔，况其下碌碌者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176374_comment'></div>反于是，其亦几何矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176374_comment'></div>足下何觉之早邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176374_comment'></div>其亦谋道而不主利禄者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176374_comment'></div>《语》曰：「涂之人皆可以为禹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176374_comment'></div>盖人人有善性，而未必善自充也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176374_comment'></div>若足下者，充之不已，不惑以变，其又可量邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176374_comment'></div>走将企警嗟慕之不遑，于教诲乎何敢？</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　葛源致书，有启回谢。作品：《谢葛源郎中启》<div id='poem_1176508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176508' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
