ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在京作诗送苏安世赴任广西转运使。作品：《送苏屯田广西转运》<div id='poem_70085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送苏屯田广西转运</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70085")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70085'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70085'>置将从来欲善师，百城蹉跌起毫釐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70085'>驱除久费兵符出，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70085", 70085, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>按抚</span>纷烦使节移。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70085'>恩泽易行穷苦后，功名常见急难时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70085'>孺文此日风流在，直笔他年岂愧辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70085'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70085_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在京作诗送王逵知荆南。作品：《送王龙图》<div id='poem_70623' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70623' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70623?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王龙图守荆南</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70623")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70623_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70623'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70623'>壮志高才偃一藩，更嗟贤路此时难。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70623'>长幡欲动何妨屈，老骥能行岂易闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70623'>沙市放船寒月白，渚宫留御古苔斑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70623'>知公未厌还随诏，归看功名重太山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70623_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70623'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70623_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　撰萧化基墓志铭。作品：《县主簿萧君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176785' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176785' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176785?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赣县主簿萧君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176785")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176785_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176785'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176785'>君讳化基，字子固，实萧氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176785_comment'></div>其先有自长沙避地庐陵者，曰霁，方李氏有江南，为洪之武宁令，于君为曾大父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176785_comment'></div>其后再世曰焕，曰良辅，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176785_comment'></div>至君之兄侍御史定基，始以材起为名家，而追赠其皇考尚书工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176785_comment'></div>君于工部为少子，少谨厚，能自力，业其世以善富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176785_comment'></div>既御史贵，得任子弟，君犹私其能，不愿治民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176785_comment'></div>然御史竟官君为明之奉化尉，主簿于虔之赣县，监真州酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176785_comment'></div>恬慎祗修，在势者任之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176785_comment'></div>春秋六十二，至和元年四月癸酉以官卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176785_comment'></div>其子汝霖、汝能、汝为、汝正护其柩归，以十一月壬午葬其县之儒行乡白沙原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176785_comment'></div>夫人杨氏前葬矣，今不祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176785_comment'></div>先人于御史以弟交，君予丈人行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176785_comment'></div>二父皆有子知名南方，交于予，以故请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176785_comment'></div>铭者，所以名前人而燕孝子之心也，于是为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176785_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1176785'>韡矣萧宗，楚产之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176785_comment'></div>绳绳主簿，有善其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176785_comment'></div>我脩不茍，曰攸为康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176785_comment'></div>图铭圹石，维后之藏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176785_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　撰李余庆墓志铭。作品：《朝奉郎守国子博士知常州李公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎守国子博士知常州李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176765")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176765'>公李氏，讳馀庆，字昌宗，年四十四，官止国子博士，知常州以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176765_comment'></div>然公之威名气略闻天下，自其卒至今久矣，天下尚多谈公之为有过于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176765_comment'></div>余尝过常州，州之长老道公卒时就葬于横山，州人填道瞻送叹息，为之出泪，又为之画像，寘之浮屠以祭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176765_comment'></div>于是又知公之有惠爱于常人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176765_comment'></div>已而与公之子处厚游，则得公之所为甚具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176765_comment'></div>盖公之为政，精明强果，事至能立断而得，久奸宿恶辄取之不贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176765_comment'></div>至其化服，则抚循养息，悉有其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176765_comment'></div>所以威震远近，而蒙其德者，亦思之无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176765_comment'></div>当明肃太后时，尝欲用公矣，公再上书论事，其言甚直，以故不果用而出常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176765_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176765_comment'></div>公之自任，岂止于一州而已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176765_comment'></div>此有志者所以为之惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176765_comment'></div>始，公以叔父任，起家应天府法曹参军，遇事辄争之，留守者不能夺也，卒荐公改太常寺太祝，知湖州归安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176765_comment'></div>其后通判秀州，州近监，公作华亭、海盐二监，以业盗贩之民，岁入缗钱八十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176765_comment'></div>又为石堤，自平望至吴江五十里，以除水患，人至今赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176765_comment'></div>其所至处，利害多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176765_comment'></div>然非公大志所欲以就名成功者，故不悉著，著其利于民尤大而能以久者云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176765_comment'></div>公平生慷慨，好议当世事，其所趣舍，必欲如己意，虽强有势，终不为挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176765_comment'></div>尝考前世治乱之迹，与其君臣之间议论，编为七十卷，藏于家，此盖其大志所存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176765_comment'></div>公之先，为开封之陈留人，五代祖为梁使闽，因避地，家于福之涟江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176765_comment'></div>曾大父周，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176765_comment'></div>大父郁，赠尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176765_comment'></div>考慕玢，秘书省著作佐郎，赠尚书工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176765_comment'></div>夫人龚氏，永安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176765_comment'></div>男五人：处常，忠武军节度推官，与谊、諴皆已卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176765_comment'></div>处厚，大理寺丞，与处道皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176765_comment'></div>既葬之二十三年，至和元年，余铭其墓曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1176765'>公闽于家，来自陈留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176765_comment'></div>维时方屯，闭蓄函收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176765_comment'></div>其孰有源，而久于幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176765_comment'></div>自公之考，乃施乃流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176765_comment'></div>其流至公，孰敢泳游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176765_comment'></div>茫洋演迤，小大毕浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176765_comment'></div>曷蹇于行，使止一州？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176765_comment'></div>庶其涣发，在后之修。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1176765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　张铸致仕，作诗赠之。作品：《送张卿致仕》<div id='poem_70071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张卿致仕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70071")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70071'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70071'>子房筹策汉时功，身退超然慕赤松。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70071'>馀烈尚能开后世，高材今复继前踪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70071'>执鞭始负平生愿，操几何知此地逢。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70071'>窃食一官惭未艾，绪言方赖赐从容。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70071'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　寄家舟中，舟为火所燔，家人亦多病，作书与孙侔书道之。作品：《与孙侔书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　本年，识郭祥正，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：《尚书度支员外郎郭公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书度支员外郎郭公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176775")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176775'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176775'>公讳维，字仲逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176775_comment'></div>少好学，有大志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176775_comment'></div>年二十五，起为泰州司理，调泰、真二州判官，以能闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176775_comment'></div>监真州之酒税，丁母忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176775_comment'></div>服除，改著作佐郎，知南丰县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176775_comment'></div>俗喜讼，令始至，豪猾辄搆事入县，察令能否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176775_comment'></div>公至，即得其妄，穷而徙之，由此无敢犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176775_comment'></div>改新都县，又以治称，既去，民思之，相与绘公像祠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176775_comment'></div>使者荐其材，就知雅州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176775_comment'></div>王蒙正姻连明肃太后家，侵民田几至百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176775_comment'></div>有诉者，更数狱，无敢直其事，诏公治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176775_comment'></div>其行也，人为公惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176775_comment'></div>公至则拔根擿节，不漏毫末，以田归民，蒙正坐除名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176775_comment'></div>既归，天子目之，赐之朱衣，得尚书屯田员外郎、知常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176775_comment'></div>至州，索宿奸数人流之，州以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176775_comment'></div>移提点淮南刑狱，吏不治，道闻公至，往往豫以事求解，部中肃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176775_comment'></div>迁度支以卒，庆历二年正月也，凡仕二十七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176775_comment'></div>公刚毅能断，当事勇，不自恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176775_comment'></div>繇景德、祥符之间，四海平治，宽文法待吏，而吏乃相习为遨嬉浮沉者，或按一吏，则交议群诋，以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176775", 1176775, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>暴刻</span>生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176775_comment'></div>日浸月积，而民敝于下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176775_comment'></div>至公始按吏，而独急于权倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176775_comment'></div>有大臣出镇扬，不治，曲以礼事公，公奏斥，不报，既代，犹斥之，以是被按，一无憾言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176775_comment'></div>以声威闻，而所至即有惠爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176775_comment'></div>某赏羁游过常，里中民有以亵语相骂者，其长者怒曰：「尔欲忘郭屯田邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176775_comment'></div>盖公在常以此治其民，时卒已九年矣，犹不忘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176775_comment'></div>惜乎朝廷方欲显用，而公已不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176775_comment'></div>其出于治者，犹未足以尽其志，故不悉书，特掇其一二而存之，此足以见公之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176775_comment'></div>祖某，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176775_comment'></div>父某，赠殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176775_comment'></div>母刘氏，仙源县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176775_comment'></div>妻张氏，南阳县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176775_comment'></div>子男三人：先正，乌江县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176775_comment'></div>聪正，举进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176775_comment'></div>祥正，星子主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176775_comment'></div>女六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176775_comment'></div>以某年月日葬公于某处，公之里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176775_comment'></div>将葬，先正等以今司封员外郎赵諴书来乞铭，先人与公祥符八年以进士起，而公子且与某游，有好也，铭不敢让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176775_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1176775'>翼翼汾阳，子仪始王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176775_comment'></div>德完遗粹，功盖于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176775_comment'></div>宜享世泽，流如海长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176775_comment'></div>原原南寓，孰嗣而昌？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176775_comment'></div>公生而明，刚简自徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176775_comment'></div>拔身贫羁，谊不辱进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176775_comment'></div>苏穷斥奸，惠立威振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176775_comment'></div>而年不长，志不时尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176775_comment'></div>既奋既材，天奚弗憖？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176775_comment'></div>刻铭在幽，来者之感<span class='inlineComment2'>（《临川先生文集》卷九五。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176775_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1176775'>镇：原脱，据龙舒本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1176775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　作诗寄张瑰。作品：《寄张襄州》<div id='poem_70171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄张襄州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70171")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70171'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70171'>襄阳州望古来雄，耆旧相传有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70171", 70171, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>素风</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70171'>四叶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70171", 70171, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>表闾</span>唐尹氏，一门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70171", 70171, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>逃世</span>汉庞公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70171'>故家遗俗应多在，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70171", 70171, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>美景良辰</span>定不空。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70171'>遥忆习池寒夜月，几人谈笑伴诗翁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70171'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　以杨忱致书，答之。作品：《答杨忱书》<div id='poem_1176401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答杨忱书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176401")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176401'>承赐书，屈欲交之，不知其为惧与愧也，已又喜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176401_comment'></div>闻君子者，仁义塞其中，泽于面，浃于背，谋于四体而出于言，唯志仁义者察而识之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176401_comment'></div>然尚有其貌济其言匮、其言济其实匮者，非天下之至察何与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176401_comment'></div>某尝穷观古之君子所以自为者，顾而自忖其中则欿然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176401_comment'></div>又思昔者得见于足下，俯数刻尔，就使其中有绝于众人者，亦未尝得与足下言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176401_comment'></div>足下何爱而欲交之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176401_comment'></div>或者焯然察其有似邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176401_comment'></div>夫顾而自忖其中则欿然，其为貌言也，乃有以召君子之爱，宜乎不知其为惧与愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176401_comment'></div>然而足下自许不妄交，则其交之也，固宜相切以义，以就其人之材而后已尔，则某也甚有赖，其为言也可以已邪？</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　又作文以赠杨忱。作品：《进说》<div id='poem_1176645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176645")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176645'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176645'>古之时，士之在下者无求于上，上之人日汲汲惟恐一士之失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176645_comment'></div>古者士之进，有以德，有以才，有以言，有以曲艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176645_comment'></div>今徒不然，自茂才等而下之至于明法，其进退之皆有法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176645_comment'></div>古之所谓德者、才者，无以为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176645_comment'></div>古之所谓言者，又未必应今之法度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176645_comment'></div>诚有豪杰不世出之士，不自进乎此，上之人弗举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176645_comment'></div>诚进乎此，而不应今之法度，有司弗取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176645_comment'></div>夫自进乎此，皆所谓枉己者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176645_comment'></div>孟子曰：「未有枉己能正人者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176645_comment'></div>然而今之士，不自进乎此者未见也，岂皆不如古之士自重以有耻乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176645_comment'></div>古者井天下之地而授之氓，士之未命也，则授一廛而为氓，其父母妻子裕如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176645_comment'></div>自家达国，有塾，有序，有庠，有学，观游止处，师师友友，弦歌尧舜之道自乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176645_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176645", 1176645, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>磨砻镌切</span>，沉浸灌养，行完而才备，则曰：「上之人其舍我哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176645_comment'></div>上之人其亦莫之能舍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176645_comment'></div>今也地不井，国不学，党不庠，遂不序，家不塾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176645_comment'></div>士之未命也，则或无以裕父母妻子，无以处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176645_comment'></div>行完而才备，上之人亦莫之举也，士安得而不自进？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176645_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176645_comment'></div>使今之士不若古，非人则然，势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176645_comment'></div>势之异，圣贤之所以不得同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176645_comment'></div>孟子不见王公，而孔子为季氏吏，夫不以势乎哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176645_comment'></div>士之进退，不惟其德与才，而惟今之法度，而有司之好恶，未必今之法度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176645_comment'></div>是士之进，不惟今之法度，而几在有司之好恶耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176645_comment'></div>今之有司，非昔之有司也，后之有司，又非今之有司也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176645_comment'></div>有司之好恶岂常哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176645_comment'></div>是士之进退，果卒无所必而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176645_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176645_comment'></div>以言取人，未免之失也，取焉而又不得其所谓言，是失之失也，况又重以有司好恶之不可常哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176645_comment'></div>古之道，其卒不可以见乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176645_comment'></div>士也有得已之势，其得不已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176645_comment'></div>得已而不已，未见其为有道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176645_comment'></div>杨叔明之兄弟，以父任皆京官，其势非吾所谓无以处、无以裕父母妻子，而有不得已焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176645_comment'></div>自枉而为进士，而又枉于有司，而又若不释然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176645_comment'></div>二君固常自任以道，而且朋友我矣，惧其犹未寤也，为《进说》与之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1176645_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年1月22日</a>　此日，晏殊卒。有诗挽之。作品：《晏元献挽词三首》<div id='poem_69745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_69745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69745'>文章晋康乐，经术汉公孙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69745'>旧秩疑丞贵，前功保傅尊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69745_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_4_69743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年2月</a>　二月，作诗送韩维赴辟并州。作品：《韩持国从富并州辟》<div id='poem_70758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩持国从富并州辟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年2月）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70758'>官虽众俊后，名字久<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70758", 70758, id='poem_sentence_18_70758'>淮湖江海上，惯食虾蟹蛤。<div id='poem_sentence_18_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_70758'>西南穷岷嶓，东北尽济漯。<div id='poem_sentence_19_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_70758'>身虽未尝历，魂梦已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_70758", 70758, id='poem_sentence_21_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_70758'>溪果点丹漆，溪花团并罨。<div id='poem_sentence_22_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_70758'>扁舟信所过，行不废<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_70758", 70758, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>樽榼</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_70758'>一从舍之去，霜雪行满颌。<div id='poem_sentence_24_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_70758'>思之不能寐，蹙若虻<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作蚊）</span>蚋噆。<div id='poem_sentence_25_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_70758'>方将筑其滨，毕景谢噂𠴲。<div id='poem_sentence_26_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_70758'>安能孤此意，颠倒就衰飒。<div id='poem_sentence_27_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_70758'>唯子余所向，嗜好比<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_70758", 70758, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>鹣鲽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_70758'>何时归相过，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_70758", 70758, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>游屐</span>尚可蜡。<div id='poem_sentence_29_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_70758'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_70758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70758_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　作诗。作品：《幽谷引》<div id='poem_70568' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70568' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70568?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幽谷引</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70568")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70568_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70568'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70568'>云翳翳兮谷之幽，天将雨我<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本无我字）</span>兮田者之稠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70568'>有绳于防兮有畚于沟，我公不出兮谁省吾忧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70568'>日晖晖兮山之下，岁则熟兮收者舞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70568'>吾收满车兮弃者满筥，谁吾与乐兮我公燕语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70568'>山有木兮谷有泉，公与客兮醉其间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70568'>芳可搴兮甘可漱，无壮无稚兮环公以笑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70568'>公归而醉<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作醉而归）</span>兮人则喜，公好我州兮殆其肯止。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70568'>公归不醉兮我之忧，岂其不怿兮将舍吾州。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70568'>公一朝兮去我，我岁岁兮来游。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70568'>完公亭兮使勿毁，以慰吾<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本吾下有民字）</span>兮岁岁之愁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70568_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70568'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_70568_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年3月21日</a>　此日，招特授集贤校理，固辞不拜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年3月22日</a>　此日，中书差人赍到集贤校理敕牒，上状固辞不拜。作品：《辞集贤校理状》其一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　为钱公辅之母撰墓志铭。作品：《永安县太君蒋氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永安县太君蒋氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176821")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176821'>毗陵钱公餗、公谨、公辅、公仪、公佐，以皇祐六年三月戊子葬其母永安县太君蒋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176821_comment'></div>方是时，太君年七十矣，公谨为郑州新郑尉，公辅为太常丞、集贤校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176821_comment'></div>五子者，卜明年之三月壬午，祔于皇考府君屯田员外郎、赠兵部员外郎讳冶之墓，而具书使图所以昭后世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176821_comment'></div>叙曰：蒋氏，常之宜兴人，世以财杰其乡，而其族人有以进士至大官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176821_comment'></div>太君年二十一，归于钱氏，与兵部君致其孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176821_comment'></div>兵部君没，太君进诸子于学，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176821", 1176821, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>恶衣恶食</span>，御之不愠，均亲嫡庶，有鸤鸠之德，终不以贫故，使诸子者趋于利以适己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176821_comment'></div>既其子官于朝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176821", 1176821, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>丰显</span>矣，里巷之士以为太君荣，而家人卒亦不见其喜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176821_comment'></div>自其嫁至于老，中馈之事亲之惟谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176821_comment'></div>自其老至于没，纫缝之劳犹不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176821_comment'></div>子妇尝谏止之，曰：「吾为妇，此固其职也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176821_comment'></div>子妇化服，循其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176821_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176821_comment'></div>不流于时俗，而乐尽其行己之道，穷通荣辱之接乎身，而不失其常心，今学士大夫之所难，而以女子能之，是尤难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176821_comment'></div>女六人，皆有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176821_comment'></div>孙七人皆幼云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176821_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1176821'>《诗》始《关雎》，士莫不知，孰能其家，内外无违？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176821_comment'></div>闻岂在多，善成于好，于惟夫人，孰辅而告？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176821_comment'></div>妇功之修，母道之行，宜休而劝，不耄以明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176821_comment'></div>绍良配淑，式谷尔后，勖哉其兴，以克有庙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176821_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　钱公辅欲增损其母墓志铭，拒之。作品：《答钱公辅学士书》<div id='poem_1176341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答钱公辅学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176341")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176341'>比蒙以铭文见属，足下于世为闻人，力足以得显者铭父母，以属于不腆之文，似其意非茍然，故辄为之而不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176341_comment'></div>不图乃犹未副所欲，欲有所增损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176341_comment'></div>鄙文自有意义，不可改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176341_comment'></div>宜以见还，而求能如足下意者为之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176341_comment'></div>家庙以今法准之，恐足下未得立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176341_comment'></div>足下虽多闻，要与识者讲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176341_comment'></div>如得甲科为通判，通判之署，有池台竹林之胜，此何足以为太夫人之荣，而必欲书之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176341_comment'></div>贵为天子，富有天下，茍不能行道，适足以为父母之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176341_comment'></div>况一甲科通判，茍粗知为辞赋，虽市井小人，皆可以得之，何足道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176341_comment'></div>何足道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176341_comment'></div>故铭以谓闾巷之士，以为太夫人荣，明天下有识者不以置悲欢荣辱于其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176341_comment'></div>太夫人能异于闾巷之士，而与天下有识同，此其所以为贤而宜铭者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176341_comment'></div>至于诸孙，亦不足列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176341_comment'></div>孰有五子而无七孙者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176341_comment'></div>七孙业之有可道，固不宜略；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176341_comment'></div>若皆儿童，贤不肖未可知，列之于义何当也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176341_comment'></div>诸不具道，计足下当与有识者讲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176341_comment'></div>南去愈远，君子惟顺爱自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年4月5日</a>　此日，中书再差人赍到集贤校理敕牒，遂二上状辞免。作品：《辞集贤校理状》其二。<br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　由殿中丞转太常博士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　屡辞馆职，人或以为矫，曾巩辨之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　余靖作桂州新城，来启请撰记。有启答之。作品：《答桂帅余侍郎启安道》<div id='poem_1176484' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176484' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176484?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答桂帅余侍郎启<span class='inlineComment2'>（安道）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176484")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176484_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176484'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176484'>受才无状，驰义有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176484_comment'></div>矧以先人，是为雅故，夫何竿牍之问，乃后门阑之厮！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176484_comment'></div>诚以贤否之分殊，而又卑尊之势隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176484_comment'></div>恭惟某官以挺生辅世，以简僚帅边，戒滑夏之近忧，兴保民之长利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176484_comment'></div>有纪之政，当谨后世之传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176484_comment'></div>无能之词，敢虚远人之属！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176484_comment'></div>过蒙收引，先赐拊循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176484_comment'></div>丹青甚微，本累玉莹之粹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176484_comment'></div>土木至陋，猥承涕绣之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176484_comment'></div>莫副推扬，徒知感服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176484_comment'></div>念当拜赐，宜在至前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176484_comment'></div>冀归节于本朝，得望尘于末路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176484_comment'></div>私怀未果，善祷良深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176484_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　与刘攽、吴充、韩维、冯京、沈遘燕集，作诗。作品：《和贡父燕集之作》<div id='poem_70525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和刘贡甫燕集之作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70525")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70525'>刘侯羽翰秋欲击，吴侯葩萼春争披。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70525'>沈侯玉雪照人洁，萧洒已见江湖姿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70525'>唯予貌丑骇公等，自镜亦正如蒙倛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70525'>忘形论交喜有得，杯酒邂逅今良时。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70525'>心亲不复异新旧，便脱巾屦相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70525", 70525, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>谐嬉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70525'>空堂无尘小雨定，浓绿翳水浮秋曦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年8月30日</a>　此日，高若讷卒，有文祭之。作品：《祭高枢密文》<div id='poem_1176850' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176850'>越初生民，降讫于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176850_comment'></div>废兴乱治，成败安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176850_comment'></div>猷为之君，辩论之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176850_comment'></div>章书传记，箴赋铭诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176850_comment'></div>乖离诡駮，有万其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176850_comment'></div>公于其间，靡所不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176850_comment'></div>江含海畜，其富无訾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176850_comment'></div>孰穷其源？孰究其涯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176850_comment'></div>作时宗工，出长群司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176850_comment'></div>洋洋厥闻，可以敷施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176850_comment'></div>谓且永年，左右诹咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176850_comment'></div>曷云其凶，弗耄弗期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176850_comment'></div>凡我常僚，曷已其思！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176850_comment'></div>为此薄物，以将我悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176850_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176850_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年9月</a>　九月，在京作诗。作品：《河势》<div id='poem_70007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河势</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70007")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70007'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70007'>河势浩难测，禹功传所闻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70007'>今观一川破，复以二渠分。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70007'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70007", 70007, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>国论</span>终将塞，民嗟亦已勤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70007'>无灾等难必，从众在吾君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70007'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70007_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年9月</a>　九月，为余靖撰记。作品：《桂州新城记》<div id='poem_1176680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂州新城记</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176680")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176680'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176680'>侬智高反南方，出入十有二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176680_comment'></div>十有二州之守吏，或死或不死，而无一人能守其州者，岂其材皆不足欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176680_comment'></div>盖夫城郭之不设，甲兵之不戒，虽有智勇，犹不能以胜一日之变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176680_comment'></div>唯天子亦以为任其罪者不独守吏，故特推恩褒广死节，而一切贷其失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176680_comment'></div>于是遂推选士大夫所论以为能者，付之经略，而今尚书户部侍郎余公靖当广西焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176680_comment'></div>寇平之明年，蛮越接和，乃大城桂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176680_comment'></div>其方六里，其木甓瓦石之材，以枚数之，至四百万有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176680_comment'></div>用人之力，以工数之，至一十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176680_comment'></div>凡所以守之具，无一求而有不给者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176680_comment'></div>以至和元年八月始作，而以二年之六月成，夫其为役亦大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176680_comment'></div>盖公之信于民也久，而费之欲以卫其材，劳之欲以休其力，以故为是有大费与大劳，而人莫或以为勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176680_comment'></div>古者君臣、父子、夫妇、兄弟、朋友之礼失，则夷狄横而窥中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176680_comment'></div>方是时，中国非无城郭也，卒于陵夷、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176680", 1176680, "Clauses/40/Comments/2")'>毁顿</span>、陷灭而不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176680_comment'></div>然则城郭者，先王有之，而非所以恃而为存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176680_comment'></div>及至喟然觉寤，兴起旧政，则城郭之修也，又尝不敢以为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176680_comment'></div>盖有其患而图之无其具，有其具而守之非其人，有其人而治之无其法，能以久存而无败者，皆未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176680_comment'></div>故文王之兴也，有四夷之难，则城于朔方，而以南仲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176680_comment'></div>宣王之起也，有诸侯之患，则城于东方，而以仲山甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176680_comment'></div>此二臣之德，协于其君，于为国之本末与其所先后，可谓知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176680_comment'></div>虑之以悄悄之劳，而发赫赫之名，承之以翼翼之勤，而续明明之功，卒所以攘戎夷，而中国以全安者，盖其君臣如此，而守卫之有其具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176680_comment'></div>今余公亦以文武之材，当明天子承平日久，欲补弊立废之时，镇抚一方，修捍其民，其勤于今，与周之有南仲、仲山甫盖等矣，是宜有纪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176680_comment'></div>故其将吏相与谋而来取文，将刻之城隅，而以告后之人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176680_comment'></div>至和二年九月丙辰，群牧判官太常博士王某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　有诗送朱从道赴成都。作品：《送复之屯田赴成都》<div id='poem_70095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年10月25日</a>　此日，高若讷葬于开封府开封县，作文祭之。作品：《群牧司祭高公文》<div id='poem_1176851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176851' class='poemTitle href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　作诗送乔执中自太学归高邮。作品：《送乔秀才归高邮县》<div id='poem_70625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送乔执中秀才归高邮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70625")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70625'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70625'>薄饭午不羹，空炉夜无炭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70625'>寥寥日避席，烈烈风欺幔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70625'>谓予勿恶此，何为向子叹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70625'>长年客尘沙，无妇助亲爨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70625'>寒暄慰白首，我弟才将冠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70625'>邅回岁又晚，想见淮湖漫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70625'>古人一日养，不以三公换。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70625'>田园在戮力，且欲归锄灌。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70625'>行矣子诚然，光阴未宜玩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70625'>负米力有馀，能无读书伴。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70625_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70625'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_70625_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年12月</a>　与吕公著因欧阳修称扬，名闻契丹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　是年，以王德用乞罢枢密使，代为撰表。作品：《代王鲁公德用乞罢枢密使表》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　是年，撰王回之父墓碣铭。作品：《尚书都官员外郎侍御史王公墓碣铭》<div id='poem_1176801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书都官员外郎侍御史王公墓碣铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176801")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176801'>庆历五年，天子以尚书都官员外郎、通判荆南府王公为侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176801_comment'></div>居一年，以入三司为户部判官，又一年，还之，为言事御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176801_comment'></div>顷之，奏事殿中，疾作，归，翌日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176801_comment'></div>其家以不起闻，天子悼闵，走中人赙之金帛，又官其一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176801_comment'></div>先是，御史有物故者不赙，由公故，乃敕有司并赙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176801_comment'></div>盖天子之所以录其忠如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176801_comment'></div>自公举进士时，已能力学自立，以经术游于江、淮之南，为学者所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176801_comment'></div>至为许州司理参军，则以其职与强贵人抗曲直，狱疑当死赖以活者至数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176801_comment'></div>再主簿于杭之临安、开封之扶沟，遂选开封府法曹参军，令皆不能出其治，尹亦不敢侵其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176801_comment'></div>而荐者以十数，岁当迁，府推官恶不顺己，持其奏不肯书，欲诎公请己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176801_comment'></div>公故不诎，推官度终无可奈何，乃卒任公迁秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176801_comment'></div>已而覃恩迁秘书丞，乃出知洪州分宁县，入为审刑详议官，数以疑似辨上前，辄释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176801_comment'></div>及佐荆南，能以义惮其守，错诸不法事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176801_comment'></div>尝上书，论南方用师讨徭蛮，不如抚而降之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176801_comment'></div>先是，公在京师，天子以灾异诏百官言事，公所言有以儆世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176801_comment'></div>其后，御史府恶老者在，事不能自已，以言趣之去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176801_comment'></div>公以谓：「于老者薄，非所以广仁孝于天下，且养之非其道，使至于无耻，而专以法格之，滋所以使人薄也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176801_comment'></div>乃推三代礼意，为《养老颂》以讽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176801_comment'></div>凡公之行己治民及所以论于上者，皆出于宽厚诚恕，而其言易直以明，故其召而为御史也，未至，而好公者已信其能称职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176801_comment'></div>同时御史，闻一事皆争言塞职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176801_comment'></div>其已尝言，公未尝继以言，曰：「可悟上意足矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176801_comment'></div>然排党幸为独切，其言多同时御史所不能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176801_comment'></div>每承上间言：「人不能无过，若以古绳墨治之，世殆无全人，为国家用者，要之忠信而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176801_comment'></div>忠信虽有过，尚足用也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176801_comment'></div>其大指所存如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176801_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176801_comment'></div>古所谓淑人君子者，公于是可以当之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176801_comment'></div>公既行内修其大者，为世所称，至其施于小，亦皆敏而尽力，顾余不得尽载也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176801_comment'></div>然读余之所载，则亦概足以知公矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176801_comment'></div>公讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176801_comment'></div>其先为汉雁门太守者曰泽，泽后十八世雄为唐东都留守，封望太原，族墓在河南，而世宦学不绝，为闻姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176801_comment'></div>至唐之将亡，雄诸孙颇陵夷，始自缺，其谱亡，不知几传而至护，始居福之侯官，曰本河南人，雄之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176801_comment'></div>护生伸，伸生廷简，当闽王审知时被署为安远使，有劳烈于其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176801_comment'></div>审知死，遂置其官，以老安远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176801_comment'></div>二子，其季居政，娶邑里姚氏女，生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176801_comment'></div>自护四世至公，始以文行发名，追官皇考至秘书丞，而以昭德县太君封其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176801_comment'></div>夫人曾氏，赠尚书兵部侍郎会之女，封金华县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176801_comment'></div>妇顺母严，公所以纪其家，盖有助焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176801_comment'></div>生五男子：回、向、固、同、囧，皆为士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176801_comment'></div>其文学行义，有过绝人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176801_comment'></div>故人莫不知公后世之将大显以蕃，而以公之仕不充其志，为无憾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176801_comment'></div>公年六十三，以既卒之三年，葬颍州之某乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176801_comment'></div>初，公尝过游颍之乐，故诸孤御其母家焉，而以公于葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176801_comment'></div>至是，回之友临川王某追铭墓上，实至和二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176801_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1176801'>显姓维王，出不一宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176801_comment'></div>公先河南，实祖于雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176801_comment'></div>来闽四世，乃挺以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176801_comment'></div>其来则否，其去而亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176801_comment'></div>归忠于君，播惠在氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176801_comment'></div>配时前人，骏发以升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176801_comment'></div>世不载德，孰为荣名？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176801_comment'></div>谓公有后，其岂公卿！</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1176801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　是年，孙适卒，作诗挽之。作品：《孙适挽词》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　是年，王令寄诗，以孟子、杨雄相许。作诗答之。作品：《寄王逢原》<div id='poem_70678' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70678' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70678?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄王逢原</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70678")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70678_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70678'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70678'>北风吹云埋九垓，草木零落空池台。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70678'>六龙避逃不敢出，地上独有寒崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70678'>披衣起行愁不惬，归坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70678", 70678, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>把卷</span>阖且开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70678'>永怀古人今已矣，感此近世何为哉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70678'>申<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作庄）</span>韩百家爇火<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作天）</span>起，孔子大道寒于灰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70678'>力排异端谁助我，忆见夫子真奇材。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70678'>楩楠豫章概白日，秖要匠石聊穿裁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70678'>我方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_70678", 70678, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>官拘</span>不得往，子有闲<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作馀）</span>暇宜能来。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70678'>晤言相与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_70678", 70678, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>入圣</span>处，一取<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作洗）</span>万古光芒回。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70678'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_70678_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　求守江阴未得，与朱明之有诗唱酬。作品：《予求守江阴未得酬昌叔忆江阴见及之作》<div id='poem_69737' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69737' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69737?labeling=true' target='_blank'>予求守江阴未得酬昌叔忆江阴见及之作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69737")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69737_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69737'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69737'>黄田港北水如天，万里风樯看贾船。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69737'>海外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69737", 69737, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>珠犀</span>常入市，人间鱼蟹不论钱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69737'>高亭笑语如昨日，末路尘沙非少年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69737'>强乞一官终未得，祇君同病肯相怜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69737'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69737_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　作文答王回书,论“大人”之义，当“先自治而后治人”。作品：《答王深甫书》<div id='poem_1176306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176306' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再答龚深父论语孟子书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176306")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176306'>某启：僶俛从学，不能无劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176306_comment'></div>略尝奉书，想已得达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176306_comment'></div>承手笔，知与十二娘子侍奉万福，欣慰可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176306_comment'></div>所论及异论具晓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176306_comment'></div>道德性命，其宗一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176306_comment'></div>道有君子有小人，德有吉有凶，则命有顺有逆、性有善有恶，固其理，又何足以疑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176306_comment'></div>伊尹曰：「兹乃不义，习与性成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176306_comment'></div>去善就恶，谓之性亡，不可谓之性成，则伊尹之言何谓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176306_comment'></div>召公曰「惟不恭厥德，乃早坠厥命」者，所谓命凶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176306_comment'></div>命凶者，固自取，然犹谓之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176306_comment'></div>若小人之自取，或幸而免，不可谓之命，则召公之言何谓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176306_comment'></div>夫古之人以无君子道为无道，以无吉德为无德，则去善就恶谓之性亡，非不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176306_comment'></div>虽然，可以谓之无道，而不可谓之道无小人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176306_comment'></div>可谓之无德，而不可以谓德无凶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176306_comment'></div>可以谓之性亡，而不可以谓之性无恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176306_comment'></div>孔子曰：「性相近也，习相远也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176306_comment'></div>言相近之性以习而相远，则习不可以不慎，非谓天下之性皆相近而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176306_comment'></div>孔子见南子为有礼，则孔子不可告子路曰「是礼也」，而曰「天厌之」乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176306_comment'></div>孟子曰：「男女授受不亲，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176306_comment'></div>嫂溺援之以手者，权也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176306_comment'></div>若有礼而无权，则何以为孔子？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176306_comment'></div>天下之理，固不可以一言尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176306_comment'></div>君子有时而用礼，故孟子不见诸侯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176306_comment'></div>有时而用权，故孔子可见南子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176306_comment'></div>孔子与蒲人盟而适卫者，将以行法也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176306_comment'></div>不如是，则要盟者得志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176306_comment'></div>具有制于人而不得行，则圣人之无所奈何，孔子适卫，非蒲之所能制，则孔子何为而不适卫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176306_comment'></div>盖适卫然后足以明义，此孔子所以适卫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176306_comment'></div>凡此，皆略为深甫道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176306_comment'></div>以深甫之明，何难于答是，而千里以书见及，此固深甫之好问嗜学之无已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176306_comment'></div>久废笔墨，言不逮意，幸察！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176306_comment'></div>知罢官遂见过，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176306_comment'></div>然某疲病，恐不能久堪州事，不知还得相见于此否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176306_comment'></div>向秋，自爱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176306_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1176306'>本文龙舒本题作「同前」，即《答王深甫书》。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1176306_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176306'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_1176306_0'>⑴ 《临川先生文集》卷七二。又见《宋元学案补遗》卷九八。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1176306_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　撰文。作品：《大人论》《夫子贤于尧舜》<div id='poem_1176616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大人论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176616")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176616'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176616'>孟子曰：「充实而有光辉之谓大，大而化之之谓圣，圣而不可知之之谓神」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176616_comment'></div>夫此三者皆圣人之名，而所以称之之不同者，所指异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176616_comment'></div>由其道而言谓之神，由其德而言谓之圣，由其事业而言谓之大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176616_comment'></div>古之圣人，其道未尝不入于神，而其所称止乎圣人者，以其道存乎虚无寂寞不可见之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176616_comment'></div>茍存乎人，则所谓德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176616_comment'></div>是以人之道虽神，而不得以神自名，名乎其德而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176616_comment'></div>夫神虽至矣，不圣则不显，圣虽显矣，不大则不形，故曰此三者皆圣人之名，而所以称之之不同者，所指异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176616_comment'></div>《易》曰：「蓍之德圆而神，卦之德方以智」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176616_comment'></div>夫《易》之为书，圣人之道于是乎尽矣，而称卦以智不称以神者，以其存乎爻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176616_comment'></div>存乎爻，则道之用见于器，而刚柔有所定之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176616_comment'></div>刚柔有所定之，则非其所谓化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176616_comment'></div>且《易》之道于《乾》为至，而《乾》之盛莫盛于二、五，而二、五之辞皆称「利见大人」，言二爻之相求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176616_comment'></div>夫二爻之道，岂不至于神矣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176616_comment'></div>而止称大人者，则所谓见于器而刚柔有所定尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176616_comment'></div>盖刚柔有所定，则圣人之事业也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176616_comment'></div>称其事业以大人，则其道之为神、德之为圣可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176616_comment'></div>孔子曰：「显诸仁，藏诸用，鼓万物而不与圣人同忧，盛德大业至矣哉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176616_comment'></div>此言神之所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176616_comment'></div>神之所为，虽至而无所见于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176616_comment'></div>仁而后著，用而后功，圣人以此洗心，退藏于密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176616_comment'></div>及其仁济万物而不穷，用通万世而不倦也，则所谓圣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176616_comment'></div>故神之所为，当在于盛德大业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176616_comment'></div>德则所谓圣，业则所谓大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176616_comment'></div>世盖有自为之道而未尝知此者，以为德业之卑不足以为道，道之至在于神耳，于是弃德业而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176616_comment'></div>夫为君子者皆弃德业而不为，则万物何以得其生乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176616_comment'></div>故孔子称神而卒之以德业之至，以明其不可弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176616_comment'></div>盖神之用在乎德业之间，则德业之至可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176616_comment'></div>故曰神非圣则不显，圣非大则不形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176616_comment'></div>此天地之全，古人之大体也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176616_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫子贤于尧舜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176620")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176620'>孟子曰：「可欲之谓善，有诸己之谓信，充实之谓美，充实而有光辉之谓大，大而化之之谓圣，圣而不可知之谓神」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176620_comment'></div>圣之为称，德之极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176620_comment'></div>神之为名，道之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176620_comment'></div>故凡古之所谓圣人者，于道德无所不尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176620_comment'></div>于道德无所不尽，则若明之于日月，尊之于上帝，莫之或加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176620_comment'></div>《易》曰：「大人者与天地合其德，与日月合其明，与四时合其序，与鬼神合其吉凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176620_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176620_comment'></div>由此观之，则自传记以来，凡所谓圣人者，宜无以相尚，而其所知宜同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176620_comment'></div>宰我曰：「以予观于夫子，贤于尧舜远矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176620_comment'></div>而世之解者必曰：「是为门人之私言，而非天下公共之论也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176620_comment'></div>而孟子亦曰：「生民以来，未有如夫子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176620_comment'></div>是岂亦门人之私言，而非天下公共之论哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176620_comment'></div>为是言者，盖亦未之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176620_comment'></div>夫所谓圣贤之言者，无一辞之茍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176620_comment'></div>其发也，必有指焉，其指也，学者之所不可不思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176620_comment'></div>夫圣者，至乎道德之妙而后世莫之增焉者之称也，茍有能加焉者，则岂圣也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176620_comment'></div>然孟子、宰我之所以为是说者，盖亦言其时而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176620_comment'></div>昔者道发乎伏羲，而成乎尧舜，继而大之于禹、汤、文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176620_comment'></div>此数人者，皆居天子之位，而使天下之道寖明寖备者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176620_comment'></div>而又有在下而继之者焉，伊尹、伯夷、柳下惠、孔子是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176620_comment'></div>夫伏羲既发之也，而其法未成，至于尧而后成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176620_comment'></div>尧虽能成圣人之法，未若孔子之备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176620_comment'></div>夫以圣人之盛，用一人之知，足以备天下之法，而必待至于孔子者何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176620_comment'></div>盖圣人之心不求有为于天下，待天下之变至焉，然后吾因其变而制之法耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176620_comment'></div>至孔子之时，天下之变备矣，故圣人之法亦自是而后备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176620_comment'></div>《易》曰「通其变，使民不倦」，此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176620_comment'></div>故其所以能备者，岂特孔子一人之力哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176620_comment'></div>盖所谓圣人者，莫不预有力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176620_comment'></div>孟子曰「孔子集大成者」，盖言集诸圣人之事，而大成万世之法耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176620_comment'></div>此其所以贤于尧舜也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1176620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　与吴充、韩维游，作诗唱和。作品：《和沖卿雪并示持国》<div id='poem_70524' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70524' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70524?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和冲卿雪诗并示持国</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70524")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70524_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70524'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70524'>地卷江海浮，天吹河汉涌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70524'>北风散作花，巧丽世无种。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70524'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70524", 70524, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>霾昏</span>得照曜，尘滓归掩拥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70524'>荒林无空枝，幽瓦有高陇。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70524'>分才一毛细<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作轻）</span>，聚或千钧重。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70524'>飞飏窥已眩，摧压听还凶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70524'>渔舟平系舷，樵屩没归踵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70524'>空令物象莹，岂免川涂壅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70524'>争光姮娥妒，失色羲和恐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70524'>赖逢阳气蒸，转作水波溶。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70524'>舞庭称贺严，扫路传呼宠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70524'>冲游谢壮少<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作少壮）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_70524", 70524, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>避卧</span>甘闲冗。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70524'>吴侯绝俗唱，韩子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_70524", 70524, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>当敌</span>勇。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70524'>胜负观两豪，吾衰但<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_70524", 70524, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>阴拱</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70524'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_70524_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　撰叔父王师锡墓志铭。作品：《叔父临川王君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叔父临川王君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176757")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176757'>孔子论天子、诸侯、卿大夫、士、庶人之孝，固有等矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176757_comment'></div>至其以事亲为始而能竭吾才，则自圣人至于士，其可以无憾焉一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176757_comment'></div>余叔父讳师锡，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176757_comment'></div>少孤，则致孝于其母，忧悲愉乐不主己，以其母而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176757_comment'></div>学于他州，凡被服、食饮、玩好之物，苟可以惬吾母而力能有之者，皆聚以归，虽甚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176757", 1176757, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>劳窘</span>，终不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176757_comment'></div>丰其母以及其昆弟、姑姊妹，不敢爱其力之所能得；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176757_comment'></div>约其身以及其妻子，不敢歉其意之所欲为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176757_comment'></div>其外行，则自乡党邻里及其尝所与游之人，莫不得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176757_comment'></div>其不幸而早死也，则莫不为之悲伤叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176757_comment'></div>夫其所以事亲能如此，虽有不至，其亦可以无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176757_comment'></div>自庠序聘举之法坏，而国论不及乎闺门之隐，士之务本者，常诎于浮华浅薄之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176757_comment'></div>故余叔父之卒，年三十七，数以进士试于有司，而犹不得禄赐以宽一日之养焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176757_comment'></div>而世之论士也，以茍难为贤，而余叔父之孝，又未有以过古之中制也，以故世之称其行者亦少焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176757_comment'></div>盖以叔父自为，则由外至者，吾无意于其间可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176757_comment'></div>自君子之在势者观之，使为善者不得职而无以成名，则中材何以勉焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176757_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176757_comment'></div>叔父娶朱氏，子男一人，某，女子一人，皆尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176757_comment'></div>其葬也，以至和四年祔于真州某县某乡铜山之原皇考谏议公之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176757_comment'></div>为铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1176757'>夭孰为之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176757_comment'></div>穷孰为之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176757_comment'></div>为吾能为，已矣无悲！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　与杨蟠书。作品：《与杨蟠推官书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　答张几书。作品：《答张几书》<div id='poem_1176400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答张几书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176400")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176400'>张君足下：某常以今之仕进为皆诎道而信身者，顾有不得已焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176400_comment'></div>舍为仕进，则无以自生，舍为仕进而求其所以自生，其诎道有甚焉，此固某之亦不得已焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176400_comment'></div>独尝为《进说》以劝得已之士焉，得已而已焉者，未见其人也，不图今此而得足下焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176400_comment'></div>足下耻为进士，贵其身而以自娱于文，而贫无以自存，此尤所以为难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176400_comment'></div>凡今于此，不可毋进谒也，况如某少知义道之所存乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176400_comment'></div>今者足下乃先贬损而存之，赐之书，词盛指过，不敢受而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176400_comment'></div>惟是不敏之罪，不知所以辞，敢布左右，惟幸察之而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　吕希哲从学。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='153c31b963864d2d9cf0a8caa84d86b7_label'><a href='javascript: class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70221'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70221'>蛮荆长往地，湖海独归时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70221'>旅榇蛟龙护，铭旌雁鹜随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70221'>此生要有尽，何物告无期。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70221'>一片幽堂石，公知我不欺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70221'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70221_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年10月24日</a>　此日，葛源葬。为之撰墓志铭。作品：《度支郎中葛公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>度支郎中葛公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐元年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176792")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176792'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176792'>葛，公姓也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176792_comment'></div>源，名也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176792_comment'></div>宗圣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176792_comment'></div>字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176792_comment'></div>处州之丽水，公所生也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176792_comment'></div>明州之鄞，后所迁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176792_comment'></div>贯，曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176792", 1176792, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>大考</span>也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176792_comment'></div>遇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176792", 1176792, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>大考</span>也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176792_comment'></div>旺，累赠都官郎中，考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176792_comment'></div>进士，公所起也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176792_comment'></div>洪州左司理参军、吉州太和县主簿，江州德化县令，监兴国茶场，威武军节度推官，知广州四会县，著作佐郎、知开封县府雍丘县，秘书丞、知泉州同安县，太常博士、通判建州，屯田员外郎、知庆成军，都官员外郎、知南剑州，司封员外郎、祠部郎中、江浙荆湖福建广南提点银铜坑冶铸钱，度支郎中、荆湖北提点刑狱，此公之所阅官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176792_comment'></div>州将之甥，与异母兄殴人，而甥杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176792_comment'></div>州将胁公曰：「两人者皆吾甥，而杀人者乃其兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176792_comment'></div>我知之，彼大姓也，无为有司所误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176792_comment'></div>不然，此狱也将必覆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176792_comment'></div>公劾不为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为司理参军也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176792_comment'></div>州符徙吉水，行令事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176792_comment'></div>他日，令始至，大猾吏辄诱民数百讼庭下，设变诈以动令，如此数日，令厌事，则事常在吏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176792_comment'></div>公至，立讼者两庑下，取其状，视有如吏所为者，使自书所诉，不能书者，吏授之，往往不能如状，穷，辄曰：「我不知为此，乃某吏教我所为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176792_comment'></div>悉捕劾，致之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176792_comment'></div>讼以故少，吏亦终不得其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176792_comment'></div>毛氏寡妇告其子，以恩义说之不得，即使人微捕，得之与閒语者，验其对，乃书寡妇告者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176792_comment'></div>穷治，具服为私谋诬其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176792_comment'></div>距州溪水恶，而岁租几千万硕，舟善败，民以输为愁，公始议县置仓以受输，则官漕之亦便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176792_comment'></div>州不听，公论之不已，仓成，至今赖其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为主簿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176792_comment'></div>中贵人击驿吏取所给，过家以言府，府不敢劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176792_comment'></div>公曰：「中贵人何惮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176792_comment'></div>为吾民而有陵之者，吾亦耻之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176792_comment'></div>上书论其事，中贵人坐绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为县于雍丘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176792_comment'></div>属吏常有隙于公，同进者因谗之，公察其旨，不听，以为举首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为州于南剑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176792_comment'></div>铸钱岁十六万，其所施置，后以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1176792", 1176792, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>法程</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为银铜坑冶铸钱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176792_comment'></div>鄂州崇阳大姓与人妻谋而杀其夫，州受赇，出之，公使再劾，劾者又受赇，狱如初，而公终以为不直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176792_comment'></div>其弟诉之转运使，虽他在事者亦莫不以为冤，复置之狱，卒得其奸赇状，论如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176792_comment'></div>此公之为提点刑狱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176792_comment'></div>甲子四百三十五，公所享年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176792_comment'></div>至和元年六月乙未，卒之年月日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176792_comment'></div>润州之丹徒县长乐乡显阳村，公所葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176792_comment'></div>嘉祐元年十月壬申，葬之年月日也，乡邑孙氏，今祔以葬者，公元配也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176792_comment'></div>万年县君范阳卢氏，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1176792", 1176792, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>继配</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176792_comment'></div>良肱、良佐、良嗣，公子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176792_comment'></div>妻太常博士黄知良，曰金华县君，公女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176792_comment'></div>起进士，为越州馀姚县尉，主公之丧而请铭以葬者，良嗣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176792_comment'></div>论次其所得于良嗣，而为之铭者，临川王某也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176792_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1176792'>士窾以养交兮，弛官之不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176792_comment'></div>维公之所至兮，乐职嗜事，彼能显闻兮，公则不晰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176792_comment'></div>不铭示后兮，孰劝为瘁？</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1176792_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　苏舜元葬，作诗以祭。作品：《苏才翁挽辞二首》<div id='poem_69945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答熊本推官金陵寄酒</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_70376'>强走十五年，朱颜已非昨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70376'>低回大梁下，屡叹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70376", 70376, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>风沙</span>恶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70376'>追攀风月久，貌简非心略。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70376'>尚怜得经过，未比参辰各。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70376'>别离宽后悲，笑语尽今乐。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
