id='poem_sentence_12_70376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　上书执政，乞东南一郡。作品：《上执政书》<div id='poem_1176333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上执政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176333")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176333'>窃以方今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>仁圣</span>在上，四海九州冠带之属，望其施为以福天下者，皆聚于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176333_comment'></div>而某得以此时备使畿内，交游亲戚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>知能</span>才识之士，莫不为某愿，此亦区区者思自竭之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176333_comment'></div>事顾有不然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176333_comment'></div>某无适时才用，其始仕也，茍以得禄养亲为事耳，日月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>推徙</span>，遂非其据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176333_comment'></div>今亲闱老矣，日夜惟诸子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>壮大</span>未能以有室家，而某之兄嫂尚皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>客殡</span>而不葬也，其心有不乐于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176333_comment'></div>及今愈思自置江湖之上，以便昆弟亲戚往还之势，而成婚姻葬送之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176333_comment'></div>故某在廷二年，所求郡以十数，非独为食贫而口众也，亦其所怀如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176333_comment'></div>非独以此也，某又不幸，今兹天被之疾，好学而苦眩，稍加以忧思，则往往昏瞆不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176333_comment'></div>以京师千里之县，吏兵之众，民物之稠，所当悉心力耳目以称上之恩施者，盖不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176333_comment'></div>以某之不肖，虽平居无他，尚惧不给，又况所以乱其心如此，而又为疾病所侵乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176333_comment'></div>归印有司，自请于天子，以待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>放绌</span>而归田里，此人臣之明义，而某之所当守也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176333_comment'></div>顾亲老矣，而无所养，势不能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176333_comment'></div>偷假岁月，饕禄赐以徼一日之幸，而不忖事之可否，又义之所不敢为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176333_comment'></div>窃自恕而求其犹可以冒者，自非哀怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176333_comment'></div>东南宽閒之区，幽僻之滨，与之一官，使得因吏事之力，少施其所学，以庚禄赐之入，则进无所逃其罪，退无所托其身，不惟亲之欲有之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176333_comment'></div>盖闻古者致治之世，自瞽矇、昏瞆、侏儒、籧篨、戚施之人，上所以使之，皆各得尽其才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176333_comment'></div>鸟兽、鱼鳖、昆虫、草木，下所以养之，皆各得尽其性而不失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176333_comment'></div>于是《裳裳者华》、《鱼藻》之诗作于时，而曰：「左之左之，君子宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176333_comment'></div>右之右之，君子有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176333_comment'></div>惟其有之，是以似之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176333_comment'></div>言古之君子，于士之宜左者左之，宜右者右之，各因其才而有之，是以人人得似其先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176333_comment'></div>又曰：「鱼在在藻，依于其蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176333_comment'></div>王在在镐，有那其居」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176333_comment'></div>鱼者潜逃深渺之物，皆得其所安而乐，王是以能那其居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176333_comment'></div>方今宽裕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>广大</span>，有古之道，大臣之在内，有不便于京而求出，小臣之在外，有不便于身而求归，朝廷未尝不可，而士亦未有以此非之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176333_comment'></div>至于所以赐某者，亦可谓周矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176333_comment'></div>为其贫也，使之有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>屋庐</span>而多禄廪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176333_comment'></div>为其求在外而欲其内也，置之京师，而如其在外之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176333_comment'></div>顾某之私，不得尽闻于上，是以所怀龃龉而有不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176333_comment'></div>今敢尽以闻于朝廷，而又私布于执事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176333_comment'></div>伏惟执事察其身之疾，而从之尽其才，怜其亲之欲，而养之尽其性，以完朝廷宽裕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176333", 1176333, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>广大</span>之政，而无使《裳裳者华》、《鱼藻》之诗作于时，则非独于某为幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1176333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_70511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70511'>欲收禾黍善，先去蒿莱恶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70511_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70512?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70512'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70512'>锻<span class='inlineComment2'>（原缺，据张本补）</span>金以为曲，揉木以为直。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70512'>直曲相后先，心手始两得。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70512'>秦人望屋食，以此当金革。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70512'>君勿易耰锄，耰锄胜锋镝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70512'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70512_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70513?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十三 </span>袯襫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70513'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70513'>采采霜露下，披披烟雨中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70513'>蒲茅<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作茅蒲）</span>以为友，短褐相与同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70513'>勿妒市门人，绮纨被奴僮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70513'>当惭边城戍<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作戊，据张本改）</span>，擐甲徂春冬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70513'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70513_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70515' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70515' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70515?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十四 </span>台笠<span class='inlineComment2'>（《史记索隐》谓蓬累立也）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70515_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70515'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70515'>耕有春雨濡，耘有秋阳暴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70515'>二物应时须，九州同我服。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70515'>欲<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作孰）</span>为生少慕，得此自云足。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70515'>君思周伯阳，所愿岂华毂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70515'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70515_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70514?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十五 </span>耘鼓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70514_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70514'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70514'>逢逢戏场声，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70514", 70514, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>壤壤</span>战时伍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70514'>日落未云休，田家亦良苦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70514'>问儿今垄上，听此何莽卤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70514'>昨日应官繇，州前看歌舞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70514'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70514_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年2月16日</a>　此日，王德用卒。为撰行状。作品：《鲁国公赠太尉中书令王公行状》<div id='poem_1176719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鲁国公赠太尉中书令王公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176719")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176719'>公讳德用，字元辅，其先真定人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176719_comment'></div>世以财雄北边，而蒋公邢公皆倜傥喜赴人急，岁饥所活以千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176719_comment'></div>武康公当太宗时，贵宠任事，以殿前都指挥使受遗诏辅真宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176719_comment'></div>葬其先公河南密县，县后分属郑州管城，故今为管城人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176719_comment'></div>公先丧其母韩国夫人朱氏，事继母鲁国太夫人张氏，以孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176719_comment'></div>至道二年，太宗五路出师，以讨李继迁之叛，而武康公出夏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176719_comment'></div>当是时，公为西头供奉官，而在武康之侧，年十七，自护兵当前，所俘斩及得马羊，功为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176719_comment'></div>及归，公又请殿，将至隘，公以为归之至隘而争先，必乱，乱而继迁薄我，必败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176719_comment'></div>于是又请以所护兵，驰前至隘而阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176719_comment'></div>武康为公令于军曰：「至阵而乱行者，斩」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176719_comment'></div>公亦令曰：「至吾阵而乱行者，吾亦如公令」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176719_comment'></div>至阵，士卒帖然以此行，而武康公亦为之按辔，继迁兵相随属，左右望公莫敢近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176719_comment'></div>于是武康公叹曰：「王氏有儿矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176719_comment'></div>及论功，武康公曰：「吾为大将，不可使子弟与诸将分功」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176719_comment'></div>绌公不列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176719_comment'></div>三年，迁东头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176719_comment'></div>咸平二年，迁内殿崇班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176719_comment'></div>三年，换御前忠佐马军副都头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176719_comment'></div>景德二年，为马军都头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176719_comment'></div>大中祥符元年，为邢、洺、磁、相巡检，提举捉贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176719_comment'></div>男子张鸿霸聚党界中为盗，朝廷以名捕，久之不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176719_comment'></div>公以毡车载壮士，伪服为妇人，诱之于野，于是鸿霸与其党三十二人皆得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176719_comment'></div>朝廷以为能，移陜西东路提举捉贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176719_comment'></div>自陜以东为盗者，闻公擒鸿霸事，皆惴恐逃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176719_comment'></div>五年，为环庆路指挥使，奏事上前忤旨，责授郓州马步军都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176719_comment'></div>是岁武康公薨，天子命公乘驿护丧归京师，已而还其旧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176719_comment'></div>七年，迁散虞候、散都头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176719_comment'></div>八年，迁散员内殿直、都虞候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176719_comment'></div>天禧四年，为殿前左班都虞候、柳州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176719_comment'></div>乾兴元年，为捧日左厢都指挥使、英州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176719_comment'></div>天圣三年，改博州团练使，知康信军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176719_comment'></div>城坏，公使禁军为筑，筑者久之，而无敢窃言望公使己以非其事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176719_comment'></div>城成，天子赐书奖谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176719_comment'></div>五年，移冀州，兼马步军都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176719_comment'></div>是岁，除康州防御使、龙神卫四厢都指挥使，又除捧日四厢都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176719_comment'></div>六年，除侍卫亲军步军都虞候，归就职，又除环庆路副都部署，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176719_comment'></div>八年，除并、代州马步军副都部署，又除殿前都虞候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176719_comment'></div>十年，除桂州观察使、侍卫亲军步军副都指挥使、权马军都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176719_comment'></div>诸将皆迁，与士之请马者，皆不求有司而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176719_comment'></div>故事，取粪钱于军以给公使，自公始罢之，使各置库，以待其军用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176719_comment'></div>明道元年，除福州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176719_comment'></div>军人挟内诏，求为军吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176719_comment'></div>公争曰：「军人敢挟诏以干军制，后不可复治，且军吏不可使求而得，得则军人必大受其侵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176719_comment'></div>明肃太后固使与之，公固不奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176719_comment'></div>已而太后亦寤，卒听公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176719_comment'></div>及太后崩，有司请卫士皆坐甲，公又不奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176719_comment'></div>曰：「故事，无为太后丧坐甲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176719_comment'></div>于是天子心贤公，以为可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176719_comment'></div>及阅太后宫得争军吏事，遂以公检校太保签署枢密院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176719_comment'></div>公固辞武人不学，不足以当大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176719_comment'></div>天子使中贵人趣公入院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176719_comment'></div>公于朝廷临义慷慨，言无所顾计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176719_comment'></div>至于亲戚故旧，待之亦皆当理而有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176719_comment'></div>故人为人求官于公，公问其得谢几何，故人辞穷以实对，公亦不拒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176719_comment'></div>归而使家人以银与之，曰：「尔所求者在此矣，官非吾有，不可得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176719_comment'></div>居顷之，除枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176719_comment'></div>三年，除明州奉国军节度观察留后，同知枢密院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176719_comment'></div>四年，除安德军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176719_comment'></div>五年，检校太尉，充宣徽南院使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176719_comment'></div>宝元元年，李元昊叛，公尝请将以捍边，天子不许，曰：「吾以公谋，可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176719_comment'></div>卒所以镇抚捍治者，亦多公计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176719_comment'></div>始人或以公威名闻天下，而状貌奇伟，疑非人臣之相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176719_comment'></div>御史中丞孔道辅因以为人言如此，公不宜典机密，在上左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176719_comment'></div>天子不得已，以公为武宁军节度使、徐州大都督府长史，赴本镇，赐手诏慰遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176719_comment'></div>而言者皆尚论公未止也，又以公为右千牛卫上将军，知随州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176719_comment'></div>人为公惧，恬然，唯不接宾客而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176719_comment'></div>移曹州，或闻孔道辅死，以告曰：「是尝害公者，今死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176719_comment'></div>公愀然曰：「孔中丞岂害某者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176719_comment'></div>彼其心所以事君，当如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176719_comment'></div>惜乎，朝廷无一忠臣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176719_comment'></div>言者服公以谓有德，而终身自愧其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176719_comment'></div>曹人喜斗，多盗，佗日狱未尝空也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176719_comment'></div>公在曹，尝无一人囚者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176719_comment'></div>庆历二年，除检校司空、保静军节度使，天子以手诏赐公曰：「赐卿重地，勉视事，毋以人言为忧，有伤卿者，朕不听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176719_comment'></div>契丹使刘六符过澶州，喜曰：「六符闻公久矣，遇于此，岂非幸也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176719_comment'></div>今此州岁大熟，岂非公仁政之效也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176719_comment'></div>公谢曰：「明天子在上，固常多丰年，此岂吾力也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176719_comment'></div>今朝廷多贤士大夫可畏者，吾老矣，备位于此，不足以累公称数」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176719_comment'></div>是岁，移真定府等路驻泊马步军都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176719_comment'></div>求奏事京师，天子使中贵人谕公入觐，除宣徽南院使，判成德军，固辞不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176719_comment'></div>未行，以契丹使使求周世宗所取三关故地，聚兵幽、蓟，为若侵边者，乃移公判定州，兼三路都部署，听以便宜从事，而以杨崇勋知成德军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176719_comment'></div>崇勋使客问公所以战，公曰：「吾患不仁，不患不威；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176719_comment'></div>患不知，不患无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176719_comment'></div>盖见敌而后胜可制，吾所战，岂可以豫言也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176719_comment'></div>公至定州，则明赏罚以教战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176719_comment'></div>契丹使人来觇，或以告，劝公执杀，公置之不问，曰：「吾视士卒皆乐战，可用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176719_comment'></div>使彼得归以告其主，是伏人之兵以不战也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176719_comment'></div>明日，大阅于郊，公提桴鼓誓师，进退坐作，终日不戮一人而毕，乃下令「具糗粮，听鼓于中军，将尽以汝行，唯吾其所乡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176719_comment'></div>契丹闻之震恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176719_comment'></div>已而，天子密诏问公方略，公上书论近世用兵之失与今所以料敌制胜之方甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176719_comment'></div>会兵罢，徙公知陈州，过都，天子使中贵人劳赐问公欲见否，公辞谢备边无功，幸蒙上恩赦诛，徙内郡，非有公事当对者，不敢见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176719_comment'></div>三年，移孟州，召还，署宣徽院事，已而出判相州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176719_comment'></div>六年，除同中书门下平章事，判澶州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176719_comment'></div>七年，移郑州，封祁国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176719_comment'></div>八年，还，除会灵观使，又除检校太师，判郑州，过都，天子召见慰劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176719_comment'></div>皇祐二年，除集庆军节度使，进封冀国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176719_comment'></div>三年，以年老求致仕，诏以太子太师致仕，大朝会缀中书门下班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176719_comment'></div>公威名，虽老矣尚为四夷所惮，而天子亦贤公，以为可属大事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176719_comment'></div>四年，复强起公以为河阳三城节度使、同中书门下平章事、判郑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176719_comment'></div>六年，遂以为枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176719_comment'></div>契丹使至，公伴射，使曰：「南朝以公使枢密而相富公，可谓得人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176719_comment'></div>天子闻之，赐公御弓一、矢五十，以宠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176719_comment'></div>嘉祐九年，进封鲁国公，以年老求去位，至六七，天子为之不得已，犹以为忠武军节度使、景灵宫使，又以为同群牧制置使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176719_comment'></div>有诏五日一会朝，给扶者以一子若孙一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176719_comment'></div>是岁，公年七十八矣，明年二月辛未，公以疾薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176719_comment'></div>天子至其第，为之罢朝一日，又为之素服发哀苑中，而以太尉、中书令告其第，又赐以黄金、水银、龙脑等物，出内人抚其诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176719_comment'></div>公忠实乐易，与人不疑，不诘小过，望之毅然有不可犯之色，及就之，温如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176719_comment'></div>平生少玩好，不以名位骄人，而所得禄赐，多施之亲党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176719_comment'></div>善治军旅，宽仁爱士卒，士卒乐为之尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176719_comment'></div>与士大夫游，士大夫亦多服其度，以为莫能窥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176719_comment'></div>夫人宋氏，武胜军节度使延渥之女也，累封安定郡夫人，先公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1176719_comment'></div>后以子追封荣国夫人，孝慈恭俭，有助于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1176719_comment'></div>男子咸熙，东头供奉官，早卒，以子故累赠至右千牛卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1176719_comment'></div>次咸融，西京左藏库使、果州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1176719_comment'></div>次咸庶，内殿崇班，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1176719_comment'></div>次咸英，供备库副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1176719_comment'></div>次咸康，内殿承制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1176719_comment'></div>女四人：长嫁尚书驾部郎中张叔詹，其次嫁太常博士程嗣恭、国子博士寇諲，皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1176719_comment'></div>孙八人：泽、渊，皆内殿崇班、閤门祗候；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1176719_comment'></div>淑，左侍禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1176719_comment'></div>淇，左班殿直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1176719_comment'></div>潭，右班殿直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1176719_comment'></div>沅、瀛，左待禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1176719_comment'></div>温，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1176719_comment'></div>淑、淇，皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1176719_comment'></div>曾孙二人：任，左侍禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1176719_comment'></div>价，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1176719_comment'></div>公子卜以五月甲申葬管城之先茔而国夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1176719_comment'></div>谨具公历官行事状，请牒考功、太常议谥并史馆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1176719_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　作诗怀弟安上。作品：《春从沙碛底》<div id='poem_70575' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70575' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70575?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春从沙碛底</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70575")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70575_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70575'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70575'>春从沙碛底，转上青天际。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70575'>霭霭桑柘墟，浮云变姿媚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70575'>游人出暄暖，鸟语辞阴翳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70575'>心知归有日，我亦无愁思。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70575'>所嗟独季子，尚客江湖澨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70575'>万里卜凤凰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70575", 70575, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>飘飘</span>何时至。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70575_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70575'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_70575_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　清明，作诗怀金陵。作品：《清明辇下怀金陵》<div id='poem_70199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清明辇下怀金陵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70199")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70199'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70199'>春阴天气草如烟，时有飞花舞道边。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70199_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70199'>院落日长人寂寂，池塘风慢鸟翩翩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70199_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70199'>故园回首三千里，新火伤心六七年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70199_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70199'>青盖皂衫无复禁，可能乘兴酒家眠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70199_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70199'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　有诗送吕璹知潮州。作品：《送潮州吕使君》<div id='poem_70656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70656?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送潮州吕使君</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70656")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70656_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70656'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70656'>韩君揭阳居，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70656", 70656, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>戚嗟</span>与死邻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70656'>吕使揭阳去，笑谈面生春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70656'>当复进赵子，诗书相讨论。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70656'>不必移鳄鱼，诡怪以疑民。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70656'>有若大颠者，高材<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作材高）</span>能动人。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70656'>亦勿与为礼，听之汩彝伦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70656'>同朝叙朋友，异姓接婚姻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70656'>恩义乃独厚，怀哉余所陈。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70656'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_70656_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年4月</a>　四月，罢提点开封府界诸县镇公事，知常州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　与吴充燕集赋诗。作品：《沖卿席上得行字》<div id='poem_69797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冲卿席上得行字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69797")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69797'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69797'>二年相值喜同声，并辔尘沙眼亦明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69797'>新诏各从天上得，残樽同向月边倾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69797'>已嗟后会欢难必，更想前官责尚轻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　与长妹文淑相别，作诗示之，文淑和。作品：《示长安君》<div id='poem_69789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>示长安君</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69789", 69789, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>怆情</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69789'>草草杯盘供笑语，昏昏灯火话平生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69789'>自怜湖海三年隔，又作尘沙万里行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69789'>欲问后期何日是，寄书应见雁南征。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年5月</a>　离京赴知常州，欧阳修、梅尧臣等为其饯行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　有诗酬吴充见别。作品：《酬沖卿见别》<div id='poem_70234' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70234' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70234?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬冲卿见别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70234")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70234_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70234'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70234'>同官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70234", 70234, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>同齿</span>复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70234", 70234, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>同科</span>，朋友婚姻分最多。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70234_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70234'>两地尘沙今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70234", 70234, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>龃龉</span>，二年风月共婆娑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70234_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70234'>朝伦孰与君材似，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70234", 70234, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>使指</span>将如我病何。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70234_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70234'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70234", 70234, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>升黜</span>会应从此异，愿偷闲暇数经过。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70234_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　离京时，吕公著赠言“庄重靖密”。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='230ea960ff494a9eb9bd030504a116dd_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>，39岁</div><div id='230ea960ff494a9eb9bd030504a116dd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　上仁宗万言书，极陈当世之务。作品：《上仁宗皇帝言事书》<div id='poem_1176174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上仁宗皇帝言事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176174")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176174'>臣愚不肖，蒙恩备使一路，今又蒙恩召还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>阙廷</span>，有所任属，而当以使事归报陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176174_comment'></div>不自知其无以称职，而敢缘使事之所及，冒言天下之事，伏惟陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>详思</span>而择其中，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176174_comment'></div>臣窃观陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿智之才，夙兴夜寐，无一日之懈，声色狗马观游玩好之事，无纤介之蔽，而仁民爱物之意，孚于天下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176174_comment'></div>而又公选天下之所愿以为辅相者，属之以事，而不贰于谗邪倾巧之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176174_comment'></div>此虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>二帝、三王</span>之用心，不过如此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176174_comment'></div>宜其家给人足，天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>大治</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176174_comment'></div>而效不至于此，顾内则不能无以社稷为忧，外则不能无惧于夷狄，天下之财力日以困穷，而风俗日以衰坏，四方有志之士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>諰諰</span>然常恐天下之久不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176174_comment'></div>此其故何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176174_comment'></div>患在不知法度故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176174_comment'></div>今朝廷法严令具，无所不有，而臣以谓无法度者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176174_comment'></div>方今之法度，多不合乎先王之政故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176174_comment'></div>孟子曰：「有仁心仁闻，而泽不加于百姓者，为政不法于先王之道故也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176174_comment'></div>以孟子之说，观方今之失，正在于此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176174_comment'></div>夫以今之世，去先王之世远，所遭之变、所遇之势不一，而欲一二修先王之政，虽甚愚者，犹知其难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176174_comment'></div>然臣以谓今之失，患在不法先王之政者，以谓当法其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176174_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>二帝、三王</span>，相去盖千有馀载，一治一乱，其盛衰之时具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176174_comment'></div>其所遭之变，所遇之势，亦各不同，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>施设</span>之方亦皆殊，而其为天下国家之意，本末先后未尝不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176174_comment'></div>臣故曰：当法其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176174_comment'></div>法其意，则吾所改易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>更革</span>，不至乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>倾骇</span>天下之耳目，嚣天下之口，而固已合乎先王之政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176174_comment'></div>虽然，以方今之势揆之，陛下虽欲改易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>更革</span>天下之事，合于先王之意，其势必不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176174_comment'></div>陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿智之才，有仁民爱物之意，诚加之意，则何为而不成，何欲而不得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176174_comment'></div>然而臣顾以谓陛下虽欲改易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>更革</span>天下之事，合于先王之意，其势必不能者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176174_comment'></div>以方今天下之人才不足故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176174_comment'></div>臣尝试窃观天下在位之人，未有乏于此时者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176174_comment'></div>夫人才乏于上，则有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>沈废</span>伏匿在下，而不为当时所知者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176174_comment'></div>臣又求之于闾巷草野之间，而亦未见其多焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176174_comment'></div>岂非陶冶而成之者非其道而然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176174_comment'></div>臣以谓方今在位之人才不足者，以臣使事之所及，则可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176174_comment'></div>今以一路数千里之间，能推行朝廷之法令，知其所缓急，而一切能使民以修其职事者甚少，而不才茍简<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>贪鄙</span>之人，至不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176174_comment'></div>其能讲先王之意以合当时之变者，盖阖郡之间，往往而绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176174_comment'></div>朝廷每一令下，其意虽善，在位者犹不能推行，使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>膏泽</span>加于民，而吏辄缘之为奸，以扰百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176174_comment'></div>臣故曰：在位之人才不足，而草野闾巷之间，亦未见其多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176174_comment'></div>夫人才不足，则陛下虽欲改易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>更革</span>天下之事，以合先王之意，大臣虽有能当陛下之意而欲领此者，九州之大，四海之远，孰能称陛下之指，以一二推行此，而人人蒙其施者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176174_comment'></div>臣故曰：其势必未能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176174_comment'></div>孟子曰「徒法不能以自行」，非此之谓乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176174_comment'></div>然则方今之急，在于人才而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176174_comment'></div>诚能使天下之才众多，然后在位之才可以择其人而取足焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176174_comment'></div>在位者得其才矣，然后稍视时势之可否，而因人情之患苦，变更天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>弊法</span>，以趋先王之意，甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176174_comment'></div>今之天下，亦先王之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176174_comment'></div>先王之时，人才尝众矣，何至于今而独不足乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176174_comment'></div>故曰：陶冶而成之者非其道故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176174_comment'></div>商之时，天下尝大乱矣，在位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>贪毒</span>祸败，皆非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176174_comment'></div>及文王之起，而天下之才尝少矣，当是时，文王能陶冶天下之士，而使之皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>士君子</span>之才，然后随其才之所有而官使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176174_comment'></div>《诗》曰「岂弟君子，遐不作人」，此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176174_comment'></div>及其成也，微贱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>兔罝</span>之人，犹莫不好德，《<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/165/Comments/2")'>兔罝</span>》之诗是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176174_comment'></div>又况于在位之人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176174_comment'></div>夫文王惟能如此，故以征则服，以守则治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176174_comment'></div>《诗》曰「奉璋峨峨，髦士攸宜」，又曰「周王于迈，六师及之」，言文王所用，文武各得其才，而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>废事</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176174_comment'></div>及至夷、厉之乱，天下之才又尝少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176174_comment'></div>至宣王之起，所与图天下之事者，仲山甫而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176174_comment'></div>故诗人叹之曰：「德輶如毛，维仲山甫举之，爱莫助之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176174_comment'></div>盖闵人士之少，而山甫之无助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176174_comment'></div>宣王能用仲山甫，推其类以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>新美</span>天下之士，而后人才复众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176174_comment'></div>于是内脩政事，外讨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>不庭</span>，而复有文、武之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/193/Comments/1")'>境土</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176174_comment'></div>故诗人美之曰：「薄言采芑，于彼新田，于此菑亩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176174_comment'></div>言宣王能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>新美</span>天下之士，使之有可用之才，如农夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>新美</span>其田，而使之有可采之芑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176174_comment'></div>由此观之，人之才，未尝不自人主陶冶而成之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176174_comment'></div>所谓陶冶而成之者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176174_comment'></div>亦教之、养之、取之、任之有其道而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176174_comment'></div>所谓教之之道，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176174_comment'></div>古者天子诸侯，自国至于乡党皆有学，博置教导之官而严其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176174_comment'></div>朝廷礼乐刑政之事，皆在于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176174_comment'></div>士所观而习者，皆先王之法言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/216/Comments/0")'>德行</span>治天下之意，其材亦可以为天下国家之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176174_comment'></div>茍不可以为天下国家之用，则不教也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176174_comment'></div>茍可以为天下国家之用者，则无不在于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176174_comment'></div>此教之之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176174_comment'></div>所谓养之之道，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176174_comment'></div>饶之以财，约之以礼，裁之以法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176174_comment'></div>何谓饶之以财？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176174_comment'></div>人之情，不足于财，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/231/Comments/0")'>贪鄙</span>茍得，无所不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176174_comment'></div>先王知其如此，故其制禄，自庶人之在官者，其禄已足以代其耕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176174_comment'></div>由此等而上之，每有加焉，使其足以养廉耻而离于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/239/Comments/0")'>贪鄙</span>之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176174_comment'></div>犹以为未也，又推其禄以及其子孙，谓之世禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176174_comment'></div>使其生也，既于父子、兄弟、妻子之养，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/245/Comments/1")'>婚姻</span>、朋友之接，皆无憾矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176174_comment'></div>其死也，又于子孙无不足之忧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176174_comment'></div>何谓约之以礼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176174_comment'></div>人情足于财而无礼以节之，则又放僻邪侈，无所不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176174_comment'></div>先王知其如此，故为之制度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176174_comment'></div>婚丧、祭养、燕享之事，服食、器用之物，皆以命数为之节，而齐之以律度量衡之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176174_comment'></div>其命可以为之，而财不足以具，则弗具也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176174_comment'></div>其财可以具，而命不得为之者，不使有铢两分寸之加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176174_comment'></div>何谓裁之以法？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176174_comment'></div>先王于天下之士，教之以道艺矣，不帅教则待之以屏弃远方、终身不齿之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176174_comment'></div>约之以礼矣，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/270/Comments/1")'>循礼</span>则待之以流、杀之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176174_comment'></div>《王制》曰：「变衣服者，其君流」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176174_comment'></div>《酒诰》曰：「厥或诰曰：『<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/276/Comments/1")'>群饮</span>，汝勿佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176174_comment'></div>尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/278/Comments/0")'>执拘</span>以归于周，予其杀』」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176174_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/280/Comments/1")'>群饮</span>、变衣服，小罪也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176174_comment'></div>流、杀，大刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176174_comment'></div>加小罪以大刑，先王所以忍而不疑者，以为不如是，不足以一天下之俗而成吾治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176174_comment'></div>夫约之以礼，裁之以法，天下所以服从无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/290/Comments/0")'>抵冒</span>者，又非独其禁严而治察之所能致也，盖亦以吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/292/Comments/0")'>至诚</span>恳恻之心，力行而为之倡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176174_comment'></div>凡在左右通贵之人，皆顺上之欲而服行之，有一不帅者，法之加必自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176174_comment'></div>夫上以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/298/Comments/0")'>至诚</span>行之，而贵者知避上之所恶矣，则天下之不罚而止者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176174_comment'></div>故曰：此养之之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176174_comment'></div>所谓取之之道者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176174_comment'></div>先王之取人也，必于乡党，必于庠序，使众人推其所谓贤能，书之以告于上而察之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176174_comment'></div>诚贤能也，然后随其德之大小、才之高下而官使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176174_comment'></div>所谓察之者，非专用耳目之聪明而听私于一人之口也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176174_comment'></div>欲审知其德，问以行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176174_comment'></div>欲审知其才，问以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176174_comment'></div>得其言行，则试之以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176174_comment'></div>所谓察之者，试之以事是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176174_comment'></div>虽尧之用舜，亦不过如此而已，又况其下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176174_comment'></div>若夫九州之大，四海之远，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/327/Comments/0")'>万官</span>亿丑之贱，所须士大夫之才则众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176174_comment'></div>有天下者，又不可以一二自察之也，又不可以偏属于一人，而使之于一日二日之间考试其行能而进退之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176174_comment'></div>盖吾已能察其才行之大者，以为大官矣，因使之取其类以持久试之，而考其能者以告于上，而后以爵命、禄秩予之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176174_comment'></div>此取之之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176174_comment'></div>所谓任之之道者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176174_comment'></div>人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/341/Comments/0")'>才德</span>，高下厚薄不同，其所任有宜有不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176174_comment'></div>先王知其如此，故知农者以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/345/Comments/0")'>后稷</span>，知工者以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/346/Comments/0")'>共工</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176174_comment'></div>其德厚而才高者以为之长，德薄而才下者以为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/348/Comments/0")'>佐属</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1176174_comment'></div>又以久于其职，则上狃习而知其事，下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/351/Comments/0")'>服驯</span>而安其教，贤者则其功可以至于成，不肖者则其罪可以至于著，故久其任而待之以考绩之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1176174_comment'></div>夫如此，故智能才力之士，则得尽其智以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/357/Comments/0")'>赴功</span>，而不患其事之不终、其功之不就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1176174_comment'></div>偷惰茍且之人，虽欲取容于一时，而顾僇辱在其后，安敢不勉乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1176174_comment'></div>若夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/363/Comments/0")'>无能</span>之人，固知辞避而去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1176174_comment'></div>居职任事之日久，不胜任之罪，不可以幸而免故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1176174_comment'></div>彼且不敢冒而知辞避矣，尚何有比周、谗谄、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/369/Comments/2")'>争进</span>之人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1176174_comment'></div>取之既已详，使之既已当，处之既已久，至其任之也又专焉，而不一二以法束缚之，而使之得行其意，尧舜之所以理百官而熙众工者，以此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1176174_comment'></div>《书》曰：「三载考绩，三考，黜陟幽明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1176174_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1176174_comment'></div>然尧舜之时，其所黜者则闻之矣，盖四凶是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1176174_comment'></div>其所陟者，则皋陶、稷、契，皆终身一官而不徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1176174_comment'></div>盖其所谓陟者，特加之爵命、禄赐而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1176174_comment'></div>此任之之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1176174_comment'></div>夫教之、养之、取之、任之之道如此，而当时人君又能与其大臣悉其耳目心力，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_124_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/394/Comments/0")'>至诚</span>恻怛，思念而行之，此其人臣之所以无疑，而于天下国家之事，无所欲为而不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1176174_comment'></div>方今州县虽有学，取墙壁具而已，非有教导之官、长育人才之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1176174_comment'></div>唯太学有教导之官，而亦未尝严其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1176174_comment'></div>朝廷礼乐刑政之事，未尝在于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1176174_comment'></div>学者亦漠然自以礼乐刑政为有司之事，而非己所当知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1176174_comment'></div>学者之所教，讲说章句而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1176174_comment'></div>讲说章句，固非古者教人之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1176174_comment'></div>近岁乃始教之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/412/Comments/0")'>课试</span>之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1176174_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/413/Comments/0")'>课试</span>之文章，非博诵强学、穷日之力则不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1176174_comment'></div>及其能工也，大则不足以用天下国家，小则不足以为天下国家之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1176174_comment'></div>故虽白首于庠序，穷日之力以帅上之教，及使之从政，则茫然不知其方者，皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1176174_comment'></div>盖今之教者，非特不能成人之才而已，又从而困苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/425/Comments/0")'>毁坏</span>之，使不得成才者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1176174_comment'></div>夫人之才，成于专而毁于杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1176174_comment'></div>故先王之处民才，处工于官府，处农于畎亩，处商贾于肆，而处士于庠序，使各专其业而不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/435/Comments/0")'>异物</span>，惧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/436/Comments/0")'>异物</span>之足以害其业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1176174_comment'></div>所谓士者，又非特使之不得见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/438/Comments/0")'>异物</span>而已，一示之以先王之道，而百家诸子之异说，皆屏之而莫敢习者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1176174_comment'></div>今士之所宜学者，天下国家之用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1176174_comment'></div>今悉使置之不教，而教之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_140_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/445/Comments/0")'>课试</span>之文章，使其耗精疲神，穷日之力以从事于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1176174_comment'></div>及其任之以官也，则又悉使置之，而责之以天下国家之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1176174_comment'></div>夫古之人，以朝夕专其业于天下国家之事，而犹才有能有不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1176174_comment'></div>今乃移其精神，夺其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_143_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/455/Comments/0")'>日力</span>，以朝夕从事于无补之学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1176174_comment'></div>及其任之以事，然后卒然责之以为天下国家之用，宜其才之足以有为者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1176174_comment'></div>臣故曰：非特不能成人之才，又从而困苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_145_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/462/Comments/0")'>毁坏</span>之，使不得成才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1176174_comment'></div>又有甚害者，先王之时，士之所学者，文武之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1176174_comment'></div>士之才，有可以为公卿大夫，有可以为士，其才之大小，宜不宜则有矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1176174_comment'></div>至于武事，则随其才之大小，未有不学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1176174_comment'></div>故其大者，居则为六官之卿，出则为六军之将也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1176174_comment'></div>其次则比、闾、族、党之师，亦皆卒、两、师、旅之帅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1176174_comment'></div>故边疆、宿卫，皆得士大夫为之，而小人不得奸其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1176174_comment'></div>今之学者，以为文武<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_152_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/485/Comments/0")'>异事</span>，吾知治文事而已，至于边疆、宿卫之任，则推而属之于卒伍，往往天下奸悍无赖之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1176174_comment'></div>茍其才行足自托于乡里者，亦未有肯去亲戚而从召募者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1176174_comment'></div>边疆、宿卫，此乃天下之重任，而人主之所当慎重者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1176174_comment'></div>故古者教士以射御为急，其他技能，则视其人才之所宜而后教之，其才之所不能，则不强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1176174_comment'></div>至于射，则为男子之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1176174_comment'></div>人之生，有疾则已，茍无疾，未有去射而不学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1176174_comment'></div>在庠序之间，固当从事于射也，有宾客之事则以射，有祭祀之事则以射，别士之行同能偶则以射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1176174_comment'></div>于礼乐之事，未尝不寓以射，而射亦未尝不在于礼乐、祭祀之间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1176174_comment'></div>《易》曰：「弧矢之利，以威天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1176174_comment'></div>先王岂以射为可以习揖让之仪而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1176174_comment'></div>固以为射者武事之尤大，而威天下、守国家之具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1176174_comment'></div>居则以是习礼乐，出则以是从战伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1176174_comment'></div>士既朝夕从事于此而能者众，则边疆、宿卫之任，皆可以择而取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1176174_comment'></div>夫士尝学先王之道，其行义尝见推于乡党矣，然后因其才而托之以边疆、宿卫之事，此古之人君所以推干戈以属之人，而无内外之虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1176174_comment'></div>今乃以夫天下之重任，人主所当至慎之选，推而属之奸悍无赖、才行不足自托于乡里之人，此方今所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_166_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/533/Comments/0")'>諰諰</span>然常抱边疆之忧，而虞宿卫之不足恃以为安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1176174_comment'></div>今孰不知边疆、宿卫之士不足恃以为安哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1176174_comment'></div>顾以为天下学士以执兵为耻，而亦未有能骑射、行阵之事者，则非召募之卒伍，孰能任其事者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1176174_comment'></div>夫不严其教，高其选，则士之以执兵为耻，而未尝有能骑射、行阵之事，固其理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1176174_comment'></div>凡此皆教之非其道故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1176174_comment'></div>方今制禄，大抵皆薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1176174_comment'></div>自非朝廷侍从之列，食口稍众，未有不兼农商之利而能充其养者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1176174_comment'></div>其下州县之吏，一月所得，多者钱八九千，少者四五千，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_173_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/555/Comments/2")'>守选</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_173_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/555/Comments/3")'>待除</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_173_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/555/Comments/4")'>守阙</span>通之，盖六七年而后得三年之禄，计一月所得，乃实不能四五千，少者乃实不能及三四千而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1176174_comment'></div>虽厮养之给，不窘于此矣，而其养生、丧死、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_174_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/562/Comments/3")'>婚姻</span>、葬送之事，皆当出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1176174_comment'></div>夫出中人之上者，虽穷而不失为君子，出中人之下者，虽泰而不失为小人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1176174_comment'></div>唯中人不然，穷则为小人，泰则为君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1176174_comment'></div>计天下之士，出中人之上下者，千百而无十一，穷而为小人，泰而为君子者，则天下皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1176174_comment'></div>先王以为众不可以力胜也，故制行不以己，而以中人为制，所以因其欲而利道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1176174_comment'></div>以为中人之所能守，则其志可以行乎天下而推之后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1176174_comment'></div>以今之制禄，而欲士之无毁廉耻，盖中人之所不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1176174_comment'></div>故今官大者，往往交赂遗、营赀产，以负贪污之毁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1176174_comment'></div>官小者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/590/Comments/0")'>贩鬻</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_182_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/590/Comments/1")'>乞丐</span>，无所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1176174_comment'></div>夫士已尝毁廉耻以负累于世矣，则其偷惰取容之意起，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_183_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/594/Comments/0")'>矜奋</span>自强之心息，则职业安得而不弛，治道何从而兴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1176174_comment'></div>又况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_184_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/597/Comments/0")'>委法</span>受赂，侵牟百姓者，往往而是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1176174_comment'></div>此所谓不能饶之以财也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1176174_comment'></div>婚丧、奉养、服食、器用之物，皆无制度以为之节，而天下以奢为荣，以俭为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1176174_comment'></div>茍其财之可以具，则无所为而不得，有司既不禁，而人又以此为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1176174_comment'></div>茍其财不足，而不能自称于流俗，则其婚丧之际，往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_188_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/612/Comments/0")'>得罪</span>于族人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_188_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/612/Comments/1")'>亲姻</span>，而人以为耻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1176174_comment'></div>故富者贪而不知止，贫者则强勉其不足以追之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1176174_comment'></div>此士之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_190_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/616/Comments/0")'>重困</span>，而廉耻之心毁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1176174_comment'></div>凡此所谓不能约之以礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1176174_comment'></div>方今陛下躬行俭约，以率天下，此左右通贵之臣所亲见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1176174_comment'></div>然而其闺门之内，奢靡无节，犯上之所恶，以伤天下之教者，有已甚者矣，未闻朝廷有所放绌，以示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1176174_comment'></div>昔周之人，拘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_194_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/630/Comments/0")'>群饮</span>而被之以杀刑者，以为酒之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_194_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/631/Comments/0")'>末流</span>生害，有至于死者众矣，故重禁其祸之所自生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1176174_comment'></div>重禁祸之所自生，故其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_195_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/635/Comments/0")'>施刑</span>极省，而人之抵于祸败者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1176174_comment'></div>今朝廷之法所尤重者，独贪吏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1176174_comment'></div>重禁贪吏，而轻奢靡之法，此所谓禁其末而弛其本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1176174_comment'></div>然而世之识者，以为方今官冗，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_198_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/644/Comments/0")'>县官</span>财用已不足以供之，其亦蔽于理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1176174_comment'></div>今之入官诚冗矣，然而前世置员盖甚少，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_199_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/648/Comments/0")'>赋禄</span>又如此之薄，则财用之所不足，盖亦有说矣，吏禄岂足计哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1176174_comment'></div>臣于财利，固未尝学，然窃观前世治财之大略矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1176174_comment'></div>盖因天下之力，以生天下之财，取天下之财，以供天下之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1176174_comment'></div>自古治世，未尝以不足为天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_202_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/660/Comments/0")'>公患</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1176174_comment'></div>患在治财无其道耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1176174_comment'></div>今天下不见兵革之具，而元元<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_204_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/663/Comments/0")'>安土乐业</span>，人致己力，以生天下之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1176174_comment'></div>然而公私常以困穷为患者，殆以理财未得其道，而有司不能度世之宜而通其变耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1176174_comment'></div>诚能理财以其道而通其变，臣虽愚，固知增吏禄不足以伤经费也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1176174_comment'></div>方今法严令具，所以罗天下之士，可谓密矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1176174_comment'></div>然而亦尝教之以道艺，而有不帅教之刑以待之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1176174_comment'></div>亦尝约之以制度，而有不循理之刑以待之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1176174_comment'></div>亦尝任之以职事，而有不任事之刑以待之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1176174_comment'></div>夫不先教之以道艺，诚不可以诛其不帅教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1176174_comment'></div>不先约之以制度，诚不可以诛其不循理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1176174_comment'></div>不先任之以职事，诚不可以诛其不任事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1176174_comment'></div>此三者，先王之法所尤急也，今皆不可得诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1176174_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_215_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/690/Comments/0")'>薄物细故</span>，非害治之急者，为之法禁，月异而岁不同，为吏者至于不可胜记，又况能一二避之而无犯者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1176174_comment'></div>此法令所以玩而不行，小人有幸而免者，君子有不幸而及者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1176174_comment'></div>此所谓不能裁之以刑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1176174_comment'></div>凡此皆治之非其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1176174_comment'></div>方今取士，强记博诵而略通于文辞，谓之茂才异等、贤良方正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1176174_comment'></div>茂才异等、贤良方正者，公卿之选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1176174_comment'></div>记不必强，诵不必博，略通于文辞，而又尝学诗赋，则谓之进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1176174_comment'></div>进士之高者，亦公卿之选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1176174_comment'></div>夫此二科所得之技能，不足以为公卿，不待论而后可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1176174_comment'></div>而世之议者，乃以为吾常以此取天下之士，而才之可以为公卿者，常出于此，不必法古之取人而后得士也，其亦蔽于理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1176174_comment'></div>先王之时，尽所以取人之道，犹惧贤者之难进，而不肖者之杂于其间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1176174_comment'></div>今悉废先王所以取士之道，而驱天下之才士，悉使为贤良、进士，则士之才可以为公卿者，固宜为贤良、进士，而贤良、进士亦固宜有时而得才之可以为公卿者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1176174_comment'></div>然而不肖者，茍能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_227_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/733/Comments/0")'>雕虫篆刻</span>之学，以此进至乎公卿，才之可以为公卿者，困于无补之学，而以此绌死于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_227_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/737/Comments/0")'>岩野</span>，盖十八九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1176174_comment'></div>夫古之人有天下者，其所以慎择者，公卿而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1176174_comment'></div>公卿既得其人，因使推其类以聚于朝廷，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_229_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/744/Comments/0")'>百司</span>庶物，无不得其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1176174_comment'></div>今使不肖之人，幸而至乎公卿，因得推其类聚之朝廷，此朝廷所以多不肖之人，而虽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_230_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/750/Comments/0")'>贤智</span>，往往困于无助，不得行其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1176174_comment'></div>且公卿之不肖，既推其类以聚于朝廷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1176174_comment'></div>朝廷之不肖，又推其类以备四方之任使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1176174_comment'></div>四方之任使者，又各推其不肖以布于州郡，则虽有同罪举官之科，岂足恃哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1176174_comment'></div>适足以为不肖者之资而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1176174_comment'></div>其次九经、五经、学究、明法之科，朝廷固已尝患其无用于世，而稍责之以大义矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1176174_comment'></div>然大义之所得，未有以贤于故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1176174_comment'></div>今朝廷又开明经之选，以进经术之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1176174_comment'></div>然明经之所取，亦记诵而略通于文辞者，则得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1176174_comment'></div>彼通先王之意，而可以施于天下国家之用者，顾未必得与于此选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1176174_comment'></div>其次则恩泽子弟，庠序不教之以道艺，官司不考问其才能，父兄不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_240_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/778/Comments/0")'>保任</span>其行义，而朝廷辄以官予之，而任之以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1176174_comment'></div>武王数纣之罪，则曰：「官人以世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1176174_comment'></div>夫官人以世，而不计其才行，此乃纣之所以乱亡之道，而治世之所无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1176174_comment'></div>又其次曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_243_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/788/Comments/0")'>流外</span>，朝廷固已挤之于廉耻之外，而限其进取之路矣，顾属之以州县之事，使之临士民之上，岂所谓以贤治不肖者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1176174_comment'></div>以臣使事之所及，一路数千里之间，州县之吏，出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_244_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/797/Comments/0")'>流外</span>者，往往而有，可属任以事者，殆无二三，而当防闲其奸者，皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1176174_comment'></div>盖古者有贤不肖之分，而无流品之别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1176174_comment'></div>故孔子之圣，而尝为季氏吏，盖虽为吏，而亦不害其为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1176174_comment'></div>及后世有流品之别，则凡在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_247_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/810/Comments/0")'>流外</span>者，其所成立，固尝自置于廉耻之外，而无高人之意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1176174_comment'></div>夫以近世风俗之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_248_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/814/Comments/0")'>流靡</span>，自虽士大夫之才，势足以进取，而朝廷尝奖之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_248_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/817/Comments/0")'>礼义</span>者，晚节末路，往往怵而为奸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1176174_comment'></div>况又其素所成立，无高人之意，而朝廷固已挤之于廉耻之外，限其进取者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1176174_comment'></div>其临人亲职，放僻邪侈，固其理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1176174_comment'></div>至于边疆、宿卫之选，则臣固已言其失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1176174_comment'></div>凡此皆取之非其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1176174_comment'></div>方今取之既不以其道，至于任之，又不问其德之所宜，而问其出身之后先，不论其才之称否，而论其历任之多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1176174_comment'></div>以文学进者，且使之治财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1176174_comment'></div>已使之治财矣，又转而使之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_255_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/839/Comments/0")'>典狱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1176174_comment'></div>已使之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_256_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/840/Comments/0")'>典狱</span>矣，又转而使之治礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1176174_comment'></div>是则一人之身，而责之以百官之所能备，宜其人才之难为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1176174_comment'></div>夫责人以其所难为，则人之能为者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1176174_comment'></div>人之能为者少，则相率而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1176174_comment'></div>故使之典礼，未尝以不知礼为忧，以今之典礼者，未尝学礼故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1176174_comment'></div>使之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_261_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/853/Comments/0")'>典狱</span>，未尝以不知狱为耻，以今之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_261_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/855/Comments/0")'>典狱</span>者，未尝学狱故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1176174_comment'></div>天下之人，亦已渐渍于失教，被服于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_262_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/859/Comments/0")'>成俗</span>，见朝廷有所任使，非其资序，则相议而讪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1176174_comment'></div>至于任使之不当其才，未尝有非之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1176174_comment'></div>且在位者数徙，则不得久于其官，故上不能狃习而知其事，下不肯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_264_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/868/Comments/0")'>服驯</span>而安其教，贤者则其功不可以及于成，不肖者则其罪不可以至于著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1176174_comment'></div>若夫迎新将故之劳，缘绝簿书之弊，固其害之小者，不足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_265_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/874/Comments/0")'>悉数</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1176174_comment'></div>设官大抵皆当久于其任，而至于所部者远，所任者重，则尤宜久于其官，而后可以责其有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1176174_comment'></div>而方今尤不得久于其官，往往数日辄迁之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1176174_comment'></div>取之既已不详，使之既已不当，处之既已不久，至于任之则又不专，而又一二以法束缚之，使不得行其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1176174_comment'></div>臣故知当今在位多非其人，稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_269_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/889/Comments/0")'>假借</span>之权，而不一二以法束缚之，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_269_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/891/Comments/0")'>放恣</span>而无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1176174_comment'></div>虽然，在位非其人，而恃法以为治，自古及今，未有能治者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1176174_comment'></div>即使在位皆得其人矣，而一二以法束缚之，不使之得行其意，亦自古及今，未有能治者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1176174_comment'></div>夫取之既已不详，使之既已不当，处之既已不久，任之又不专，而一二之以法束缚之，故虽贤者在位，能者在职，与不肖而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_272_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/909/Comments/0")'>无能</span>者，殆无以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1176174_comment'></div>夫如此，故朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_273_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/912/Comments/0")'>明知</span>其贤能足以任事，茍非其资序，则不以任事而辄进之，虽进之，士犹不服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1176174_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_274_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/917/Comments/0")'>明知</span>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_274_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/917/Comments/1")'>无能</span>而不肖，茍非有罪，为在事者所劾，不敢以其不胜任而辄退之，虽退之，士犹不服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1176174_comment'></div>彼诚不肖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_275_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/923/Comments/0")'>无能</span>，然而士不服者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1176174_comment'></div>以所谓贤能者任其事，与不肖而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_276_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/926/Comments/0")'>无能</span>者，亦无以异故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1176174_comment'></div>臣前以谓不能任人以职事，而无不任事之刑以待之者，盖谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1176174_comment'></div>夫教之、养之、取之、任之，有一非其道，则足以败天下之人才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1176174_comment'></div>又况兼此四者而有之，则在位不才、茍简、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_279_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/935/Comments/2")'>贪鄙</span>之人，至于不可胜数，而草野闾巷之间，亦少可任之才，固不足怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1176174_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「国虽靡止，或圣或否，民虽靡膴，或哲或谋，或肃或艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1176174_comment'></div>如彼泉流，无沦胥以败」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1176174_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1176174_comment'></div>夫在位之人才不足矣，而闾巷草野之间，亦少可用之才，则岂特行先王之政而不得也，社稷之托，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_283_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/954/Comments/0")'>封疆</span>之守，陛下其能久以天幸为常，而无一旦之忧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1176174_comment'></div>盖汉之张角，三十六方同日而起，所在郡国，莫能发其谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1176174_comment'></div>唐之黄巢，横行天下，而所至将吏，无敢与之抗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1176174_comment'></div>汉、唐之所以亡，祸自此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1176174_comment'></div>唐既亡矣，陵夷以至五代，而武夫用事，贤者伏匿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_287_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/970/Comments/0")'>消沮</span>而不见，在位无复有知君臣之义、上下之礼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1176174_comment'></div>当是之时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_288_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/973/Comments/0")'>变置</span>社稷，盖甚于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_288_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/974/Comments/0")'>弈棋</span>之易，而元元肝脑涂地，幸而不转死于沟壑者无几耳！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1176174_comment'></div>夫人才不足，其患盖如此，而方今公卿大夫，莫肯为陛下长虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_289_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/980/Comments/0")'>后顾</span>，为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_289_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/981/Comments/0")'>宗庙</span>万世计，臣窃惑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1176174_comment'></div>昔晋武帝趣过目前，而不为子孙长远之谋，当时在位亦皆偷合茍容，而风俗荡然，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_290_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/987/Comments/0")'>礼义</span>，捐法制，上下同失，莫以为非，有识固知其将必乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1176174_comment'></div>而其后果海内大扰，中国列于夷狄者二百馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1176174_comment'></div>伏惟三庙祖宗神灵所以付属陛下，固将为万世血食，而大庇元元于无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1176174_comment'></div>臣愿陛下鉴汉、唐、五代之所以乱亡，惩晋武茍且因循之祸，明诏大臣，思所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_293_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1000/Comments/0")'>陶成</span>天下之才，虑之以谋，计之以数，为之以渐，期为合于当世之变，而无负于先王之意，则天下之人才不胜用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1176174_comment'></div>人才不胜用，则陛下何求而不得，何欲而不成哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1176174_comment'></div>夫虑之以谋，计之以数，为之以渐，则成天下之才甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1176174_comment'></div>臣始读《孟子》，见孟子言王政之易行，心则以为诚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1176174_comment'></div>及见与慎子论齐、鲁之地，以为先王之制国，大抵不过百里者，以为今有王者起，则凡诸侯之地，或千里，或五百里，皆将损之至于数十百里而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1176174_comment'></div>于是疑孟子虽贤，其仁智足以一天下，亦安能毋劫之以兵革，而使数百千里之强国，一旦肯损其地之十八九，比于先王之诸侯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1176174_comment'></div>至其后，观汉武帝用主父偃之策，令诸侯王地悉得推恩封其子弟，而汉亲临定其号名，辄别属汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1176174_comment'></div>于是诸侯王之子弟，各有分土，而势强地大者，卒以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_300_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1039/Comments/0")'>分析</span>弱小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1176174_comment'></div>然后知虑之以谋，计之以数，为之以渐，则大者固可使小，强者固可使弱，而不至乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_301_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1045/Comments/0")'>倾骇</span>变乱败伤之衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1176174_comment'></div>孟子之言不为过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1176174_comment'></div>又况今欲改易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_303_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1047/Comments/0")'>更革</span>，其势非若孟子所为之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1176174_comment'></div>臣故曰：虑之以谋，计之以数，为之以渐，则其为甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1176174_comment'></div>然先王之为天下，不患人之不为，而患人之不能，不患人之不能，而患己之不勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1176174_comment'></div>何谓不患人之不为，而患人之不能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1176174_comment'></div>人之情所愿得者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_307_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1062/Comments/3")'>善行</span>、美名、尊爵、厚利也，而先王能操之以临天下之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1176174_comment'></div>天下之士，有能遵之以治者，则悉以其所愿得者以与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1176174_comment'></div>士不能则已矣，茍能，则孰肯舍其所愿得，而不自勉以为才？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1176174_comment'></div>故曰：不患人之不为，患人之不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1176174_comment'></div>何谓不患人之不能，而患己之不勉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1176174_comment'></div>先王之法，所以待人者尽矣，自非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_312_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1078/Comments/0")'>下愚</span>不可移之才，未有不能赴者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1176174_comment'></div>然而不谋之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_313_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1080/Comments/0")'>至诚</span>恻怛之心力行而先之，未有能以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_313_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1081/Comments/0")'>至诚</span>恻怛之心力行而应之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1176174_comment'></div>故曰：不患人之不能，而患己之不勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1176174_comment'></div>陛下诚有意乎成天下之才，则臣愿陛下勉之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1176174_comment'></div>臣又观朝廷异时欲有所施为变革，其始计利害未尝熟也，顾一有流俗侥倖之人不悦而非之，则遂止而不敢为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1176174_comment'></div>夫法度立，则人无独蒙其幸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1176174_comment'></div>故先王之政，虽足以利天下，而当其承弊坏之后，侥倖之时，其创法立制，未尝不艰难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1176174_comment'></div>以其创法立制，而天下侥倖之人亦顺说以趋之，无有龃龉，则先王之法，至今存而不废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1176174_comment'></div>惟其创法立制之艰难，而侥倖之人不肯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_320_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1105/Comments/0")'>顺悦</span>而趋之，故古之人欲有所为，未尝不先之以征诛，而后得其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1176174_comment'></div>《诗》曰「是伐是肆，是绝是忽，四方以无拂」，此言文王先征诛而后得意于天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1176174_comment'></div>夫先王欲立法度，以变衰坏之俗而成人之才，虽有征诛之难，犹忍而为之，以为不若是，不可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1176174_comment'></div>及至孔子，以匹夫游诸侯，所至则使其君臣捐所习，逆所顺，强所劣，憧憧如也，卒困于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_323_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1125/Comments/0")'>排逐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1176174_comment'></div>然孔子亦终不为之变，以为不如是，不可以有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1176174_comment'></div>此其所守，盖与文王同意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1176174_comment'></div>夫在上之圣人，莫如文王，在下之圣人，莫如孔子，而欲有所施为变革，则其事盖如此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1176174_comment'></div>今有天下之势，居先王之位，创立法制，非有征诛之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1176174_comment'></div>虽有侥倖之人不悦而非之，固不胜天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_328_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1142/Comments/0")'>顺悦</span>之人众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1176174_comment'></div>然而一有流俗侥倖不悦之言，则遂止而不敢为者，惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1176174_comment'></div>陛下诚有意乎成天下之才，则臣又愿断之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1176174_comment'></div>夫虑之以谋，计之以数，为之以渐，而又勉之以成，断之以果，然而犹不能成天下之才，则以臣所闻，盖未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1176174_comment'></div>然臣之所称，流俗之所不讲，而今之议者以谓迂阔而熟烂者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1176174_comment'></div>窃观近世士大夫所欲悉心力耳目以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_333_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1159/Comments/0")'>补助</span>朝廷者有矣，彼其意，非一切利害，则以为当世所不能行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1176174_comment'></div>士大夫既以此希世，而朝廷所取于天下之士，亦不过如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1176174_comment'></div>至于大伦大法、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_335_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1166/Comments/1")'>礼义</span>之际，先王之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_335_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1167/Comments/0")'>力学</span>而守者，盖不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1176174_comment'></div>一有及此，则群聚而笑之，以为迂阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1176174_comment'></div>今朝廷悉心于一切之利害，有司法令于刀笔之间，非一日也，然其效可观矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1176174_comment'></div>则夫所谓迂阔而熟烂者，惟陛下亦可以少留神而察之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1176174_comment'></div>昔唐太宗贞观之初，人人异论，如封德彝之徒，皆以为非杂用秦汉之政，不足以为天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1176174_comment'></div>能思先王之事开太宗者，魏文贞公一人尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1176174_comment'></div>其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_341_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1185/Comments/0")'>施设</span>，虽未能尽当先王之意，抑其大略，可谓合矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1176174_comment'></div>故能以数年之间，而天下几致刑措，中国安宁，蛮夷顺服，自三王以来，未有如此盛时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1176174_comment'></div>唐太宗之初，天下之俗，犹今之世也，魏文贞公之言，固当时所谓迂阔而熟烂者也，然其效如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1176174_comment'></div>贾谊曰：「今或言德教之不如法令，胡不引商、周、秦、汉以观之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1176174_comment'></div>然则唐太宗之事亦足以观矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1176174_comment'></div>臣幸以职事归报陛下，不自知其驽下无以称职，而敢及国家之大体者，以臣蒙陛下任使，而当归报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1176174_comment'></div>窃谓在位之人才不足，而无以称朝廷任使之意，而朝廷所以任使天下之士者，或非其理，而士不得尽其才，此亦臣使事之所及，而陛下之所宜先闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1176174_comment'></div>释此一言，而毛举利害之一二，以污陛下之聪明，而终无补于世，则非臣所以事陛下惓惓之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1176174_comment'></div>伏惟陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_349_1176174", 1176174, "Clauses/1222/Comments/0")'>详思</span>而择其中，天下幸甚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1176174_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_350_1176174'>使：原无，据龙舒本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_350_1176174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176174'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_349_1176174_0'>⑴ 《临川先生文集》卷三九。又见《圣宋文选》卷一一，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷六九，《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷五二，《续资治通鉴长编》卷一八八，《历代名贤确论》卷一○、四三，《宋史》卷三二七《王安石传》，《历代名臣奏议》卷三三。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1176174_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　有诗挽陈动之。作品：《陈动之秘丞挽词二首》<div id='poem_69952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈动之秘丞挽辞二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69952")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69952'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69952'>年高汉贾谊，官过楚荀卿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69952'>望古君无憾，论今我未平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69952'>有风吹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69952", 69952, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>画翣</span>，无日照佳城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69952'>空复文章在，流传世上名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69952'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69952_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_69951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69951'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69951'>人间三十六，追逐孔鸾飞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69951'>似欲来为瑞，如何去不归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　作诗送陈靖归武陵。作品：《送陈靖中舍归武陵》<div id='poem_69521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　以梅尧臣为狄仁杰后裔作诗，邀同作，遂以诗和之。作品：《圣俞为狄梁公孙作诗要予同作》<div id='poem_70346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70346' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_3_70346_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70346'>时恩沦九泉，褒取异代忠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70346_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
