ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年6月2日</a>　此日，王令卒。痛悼之，特为之作墓志铭，托吴特起携至常州。作品：《王逢原墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王逢原墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐四年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176793")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176793'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176793_comment'></div>道之不明邪，岂特教之不至也，士亦有罪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176793_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176793_comment'></div>道之不行邪，岂特化之不至也，士亦有罪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176793_comment'></div>盖无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176793", 1176793, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>常产</span>而有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176793", 1176793, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>常心</span>者，古之所谓士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176793_comment'></div>士诚有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176793", 1176793, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>常心</span>以操圣人之说而力行之，则道虽不明乎天下，必明于己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176793_comment'></div>道虽不行于天下，必行于妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176793_comment'></div>内有以明于己，外有以行于妻子，则其言行必不孤立于天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176793_comment'></div>此孔子、孟子、伯夷、柳下惠、扬雄之徒所以有功于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176793_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176793_comment'></div>以予之昏弱不肖，固亦士之有罪者，而得友焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176793_comment'></div>余友字逢原，讳令，姓王氏，广陵人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176793_comment'></div>始予爱其文章，而得其所以言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176793_comment'></div>中予爱其节行，而得其所以行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176793_comment'></div>卒予得其所以言，浩浩乎其将沿而不穷也，得其所以行，超超乎其将追而不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176793_comment'></div>于是慨然叹，以为可以任世之重而有功于天下者，将在于此，余将友之而不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176793_comment'></div>呜呼，今弃予而死矣，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176793_comment'></div>逢原，左武卫大将军讳奉諲之曾孙，大理评事讳珙之孙，而郑州管城县主簿讳世伦之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176793_comment'></div>五岁而孤，二十八而卒，卒之九十三日，嘉祐四年九月丙申，葬于常州武进县南乡薛村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176793_comment'></div>夫人吴氏，亦有贤行，于是方娠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176793_comment'></div>未知其子之男女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176793_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176793'>寿胡不多？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176793_comment'></div>天实尔啬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176793_comment'></div>曰天不相，胡厚尔德？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176793_comment'></div>厚也培之，啬也推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176793_comment'></div>乐以不罢，不怨以疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176793_comment'></div>呜呼天民，将在于兹！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1176793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　次韵欧阳修《石枕蕲竹簟》。作品：《次韵欧阳永叔端溪石枕蕲竹簟以次韵》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　刘敞作诗贺直集贤院。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f16527a86c7641e7b9cf2104e30c9e6d_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　荐孙觉编校昭文馆书籍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年8月</a>　八月，作诗送陈舜俞东归。作品：《送陈舜俞制科东归》<div id='poem_70086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈舜俞制科东归</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70086")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70086'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70086'>诸贤发策未央宫，独得菑<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作淄）</span>川一老翁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70086'>曲学暮年终汉相<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作相汉）</span>，高谈平日漫周公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70086'>君今<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作能）</span>壮岁收科第，我欲它时看事功。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70086'>闻说慨然真有意，赠行聊似<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作以）</span>古人风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70086'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70086_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年9月4日</a>　此日，王令葬常州武进县。作诗挽之。作品：《王逢原挽词》<div id='poem_69757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王逢原挽辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年9月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69757")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69757'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69757'>蒿里竟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>何在，死生从此分。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69757'>谩传仙掌籍，谁见鬼修文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69757'>蔡琰能传业，侯芭为起坟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69757'>伤心北风路，吹泪湿江云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69757'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_69757'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_69757_0'>⑴ 原作竞，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_69757_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年9月14日</a>　此日，有诏武臣供奉官以下遇丧仍旧制，原行服者听。撰文释其意，以为当务之急乃仿先王之政，瞻天下之财，使百官禄赐足以事亲养家。作品：《对疑》<div id='poem_1176610' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176610' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176610?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对疑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年9月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176610")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176610_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176610'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176610'>己亥敕书：「自今内殿崇班以上，大丧致其事，供奉官以下则勿致，如其故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176610_comment'></div>于是有疑者，以为供奉官以下亦士大夫也，而朝廷独遇之如此，顾而问曰：「今子以谓如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176610_comment'></div>尝窃原朝廷之意以对曰：先王之制丧礼，不饮酒，不食肉，不御于内，以致其哀戚者，所谓礼之实，而其行之在我者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176610_comment'></div>不论其人之贵贱，不视其世之可否，而使之同者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176610_comment'></div>然而有疾，则虽贱者，亦使之饮酒而食肉，此所谓以权制者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176610_comment'></div>或不言而事行，或言而后事行，或身执事而后行者，所谓礼之文，而其行之在物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176610_comment'></div>论其人之贵贱，视其世之可否而为之节者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176610_comment'></div>视其世之可否而为之节，故金革之事，则虽贵者亦有时乎而无辟，此所谓以权制者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176610_comment'></div>今欲使三班趋走给使之吏，大丧则皆无以身执事，而从古者卿士大夫之礼，此固盛世之所宜急，而先王以孝理天下之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176610_comment'></div>然而事又有先于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176610_comment'></div>古之时，卿大夫之丧，所以听身不执事者，为其可以不身执事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176610_comment'></div>其可以不身执事者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176610_comment'></div>古之人君于其卿士大夫之丧，所以存问养恤者，盖不诎于其在事之时，其有大丧而得不以身执事者，以其臣属足使而禄赐足以事养故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176610_comment'></div>今三班趋走给使之吏，其素所以富养之，非备厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176610_comment'></div>一日使去位而治丧，则朝廷视遇与庶人之在野者无以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176610_comment'></div>庶人之在野者，所以葬祭其先人，畜养其妻子，有常产矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176610_comment'></div>三班趋走给使之吏，去位而治丧，则其使令非有臣属，事养非有禄赐，一日无常产，则其穷乃有欲比于庶人而不得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176610_comment'></div>若用事者不为之忧此，而曰汝必无以身执事，则亦有饿而死者耳！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176610_comment'></div>然而世之议者方曰：「今之小吏去位而治丧者众矣，吾未见有饿而死者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176610_comment'></div>夫今之去位而治丧，自非多积馀藏有以活身，则孰能无以身执事者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176610_comment'></div>今欲使之去位而治丧者，故欲使其致丧之实而无以身执事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176610_comment'></div>茍不能使之无以身执事，而徒使之去位，则岂盛世之所急，而先王以孝理天下之意也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176610_comment'></div>愚故曰事又有先于此者，谓所以存问恤养士大夫如古之时者，今之所先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176610_comment'></div>夫明吾政以赡天下之财，而存问恤养士大夫如古之时，此吾之所易为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176610_comment'></div>仰无以葬祭其先人，俯无以畜养其妻子，然且去位而治丧，无以身执事，以致古者士大夫之礼，此人所难行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176610_comment'></div>舍吾之所易为而忽不谋，曰，是皆先王之事，非吾今日之所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176610_comment'></div>操人之所难行而诛之不释，曰，古之士大夫皆然，尔奚事而不为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176610_comment'></div>朝廷或者以为此非先王以权制丧、内恕及人之道，故止而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176610_comment'></div>虽然，愚亦有疑焉，欲内恕以及人，而不为吾之所易为者，何也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176610_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年11月</a>　十一月，作诗挽吴育。作品：《正肃吴公挽词三首》<div id='poem_69780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正肃吴公挽辞三首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 公尝举贤良，终河南守，葬郑。予举进士时，公知举</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69780'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69780'>从容边塞议，慷慨庙堂争。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69780'>搢绅<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作朝廷）</span>终倚赖，赠<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作赙）</span>襚极哀荣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69780_comment'></div></div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176839")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176839'>右侍禁、知循州兴宁县事海陵周君讳彦先之夫人王氏，我叔祖尚书主客郎中、赠右谏议大夫讳贯之之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176839_comment'></div>年二十三嫁周氏，嫁六年，生一子澥而周君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176839_comment'></div>后十八年，子涛为秘书省著作佐郎、知汝州梁县事，而夫人年四十八，以疾弃世于梁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176839_comment'></div>子涛等护其丧归，以嘉祐四年十一月二十九日庚申，葬海陵城北之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176839_comment'></div>夫人心庄而行厉，气和而色婉，抚接内外亲疏皆有恩意，而于人终身不校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176839_comment'></div>呜呼，其贤如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176839_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1176839'>于嗟夫人少悯忧，祗专静嘉好众仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176839_comment'></div>克协妇子祠春秋，方胥有家裕厥羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176839_comment'></div>不永于享其何尤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176839_comment'></div>序哀以铭款诸幽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　有诗怀王令。作品：《思王逢原》<div id='poem_70570' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70570' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_70766'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70766'>吾闻人之初，好恶尚无朕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70766'>帝与凿耳目，贤愚遂殊品。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70766'>尔来百千年，转化薄愈甚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70766'>父翁相贩卖，浮诈谁能审。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70766'>睢盱猴缨冠，狼籍鼠穴寝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70766'>沧海恐值到，谁论鱼鳖淰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70766'>鸮声虽云恶，革去在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_70766", 70766, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>食葚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70766'>嗟谁职教化，独使此风稔。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70766'>恬观不知救，坐费太官廪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70766'>予生少而戆，好古乃天禀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70766'>念此俗衰坏，何尝敢安枕。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70766'>有时不能平，悲吒失食饮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70766'>唯子同我病，亦或涕沾衽。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70766'>谓予<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>可告语，密以诗来谂。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70766'>烂然辞满纸，秋水濯新锦。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70766'>穷观何拳拳，静念复凛凛。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70766'>贱贫欲救世，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_70766", 70766, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>无宁</span>犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_70766", 70766, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>拾沈</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_70766'>说穷且版筑，尹屈唯烹饪。<div id='poem_sentence_17_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_70766'>逢时岂遽废，避俗聊须噤。<div id='poem_sentence_18_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_70766'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_70766", 70766, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>徂年</span>幸未暮，此意可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_70766", 70766, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>勤恁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_70766'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_70766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70766'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_70766_0'>⑴ 原作子，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70766_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　是年，次韵张瑰。作品：《次韵张唐公马上》<div id='poem_69835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵张唐公马上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69835")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69835'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69835'>揭<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作竭）</span>节初悲力不任<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作胜）</span>，赐身<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作环）</span>终愧谬恩临。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69835'>病来气弱归宜早，偷取官多责恐深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69835'>膏泽未施空<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69835", 69835, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>谤怨</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作怒）</span>，疮痍犹在岂讴吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69835'>黄昏信马江城路，欲访何人话此心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69835'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　外姻朱介之来请铭，为其岳父郑诒撰墓表。作品：《太常博士郑君墓表》<div id='poem_1176733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常博士郑君墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176733")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176733'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176733'>德安郑湜书其父太常博士讳诒字正臣之行治、伐阅、世次，因其妹婿广陵朱介之以来请曰：「郑氏故家荥阳，有善果者，卒于唐江州刺史，而子孙为德安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176733_comment'></div>自善果至胵七世，生裔，为乐清县令，君之大父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176733_comment'></div>裔生柬，君之父也，以诗书教授乡里而终不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176733_comment'></div>君以景祐四年进士为洪州都昌县主簿，于是令老矣，事皆决于君，而都昌至今称以为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176733_comment'></div>又为庐州合淝县尉，盗发辄得，故其后无敢为盗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176733_comment'></div>又为同州朝邑县令，当陕西兵事起，案簿书，度民力所堪以均赋役，而人不困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176733_comment'></div>又掌集庆军书记，岁旱，转运使不欲除民租，以属其守，而使君出视，君以实除民租如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176733_comment'></div>又迁秘书省著作佐郎，知南康军南康县，移知梧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176733_comment'></div>方是时，侬智高为乱，吏多避匿即不往，君独亟往，治城堑，集吏民以守，而州无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176733_comment'></div>经略使举君以知宾州，再迁至太常博士而归为陵台令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176733_comment'></div>召见，言事称旨，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176733_comment'></div>未赴，以嘉祐三年三月二十四日卒，年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176733_comment'></div>君前夫人张氏，后夫人吴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176733_comment'></div>子男三人：其长则湜也，次沿，次深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176733_comment'></div>女四人，其三人已嫁矣，董振、何贽、朱介之，其婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176733_comment'></div>君为人孝友谅直，得人一善若己出，能振穷急，而自养尤俭约，自宾州归，所赍无南方一物，其平生所为如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176733_comment'></div>今既以某年某月某日，葬君德安之永泰乡谷步里，而未有以碣诸墓也，敢因介之以告」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176733_comment'></div>介之于余为外姻，而其妻能道君之实，将惧泯没而无闻，数涕泣属其夫，求得余之一言以表之墓上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176733_comment'></div>盖余尝奉使江东，溯九江，上庐山，爱其山川，而问其州人士大夫之贤而可与游者，莫能言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176733_comment'></div>今湜能言其父之贤如此，问其州人之游仕于此者，乃以为良然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176733_comment'></div>嗟乎，郑君诚如此，岂特一乡之善士欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176733_comment'></div>而其子男与女子又能如此，故为序次其说，使表之墓上。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　是年，陆长倩来求铭，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：《京东提点刑狱陆君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>京东提点刑狱陆君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176748")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176748'>提点京东诸州军刑狱公事兼本路劝农事、朝奉郎、尚书司封员外郎，充集贤校理、上轻车都尉，赐绯鱼袋借紫陆君，讳广，宇彦博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176748_comment'></div>其先吴郡人也，至君之高祖始迁福州之侯官，以避唐末之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176748_comment'></div>曾祖讳景迁，仕吴越为骁骑上将军，官检校太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176748_comment'></div>祖讳崇扆，以威武军观察推官从其王归京师，官至殿中丞，历知泸、道、潮、贵四州以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176748_comment'></div>考讳中和，不仕，以君故，赠官至尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176748_comment'></div>君以天圣二年进士起，至皇祐四年某月，以使走齐州，某甲子卒于郓之平阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176748_comment'></div>君子长倩等以嘉祐四年某月某甲子，葬君杭州之钱塘某所之原，而书君系世、官职、行能、劳烈、卒葬之地与时以来求志墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176748_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1176748'>于惟陆氏，吴郡其始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176748_comment'></div>福之侯官，近自唐徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176748_comment'></div>君曾大考，太傅将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176748_comment'></div>实仕吴越，为皇陪臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176748_comment'></div>太傅有子，始来皇朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176748_comment'></div>丞于殿中，历将四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176748_comment'></div>卒葬侯官，实生处士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176748_comment'></div>赠官职方，君实其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176748_comment'></div>维君讳广，彦博其字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176748_comment'></div>文辞甲科，四府从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176748_comment'></div>起家邵武，再选徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176748_comment'></div>遂监税酒，满岁陈留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176748_comment'></div>许昌之招，宁海之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176748_comment'></div>乃令乌程，乃丞开封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176748_comment'></div>始佐著作，去为尉氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176748_comment'></div>咏歌仁明，无有壮稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176748_comment'></div>移邛大邑，告母高年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176748_comment'></div>免蜀就养，税商于泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176748_comment'></div>又移导江，斗谷千钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176748_comment'></div>君命振之，以我公田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176748_comment'></div>盗屠民家，尉以囚来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176748_comment'></div>囚言实盗，君曰释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176748_comment'></div>尉方力争，众亦莫寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176748_comment'></div>后得真盗，果如君虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176748_comment'></div>离堆之江，豪右擅焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176748_comment'></div>君修堰渠，始诎其专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176748_comment'></div>灌田为顷，万有七千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176748_comment'></div>镌约示后，后无凶年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176748_comment'></div>郑文肃公，来治杭剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176748_comment'></div>君以通判，往从其辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176748_comment'></div>州人僦屋，吏代之输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176748_comment'></div>君为创法，遂无逋租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176748_comment'></div>中书选君，御史推直，有言朝廷，今以为敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176748_comment'></div>冬狩于郊，大讲戎兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176748_comment'></div>作箴以献，逆戒荒萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176748_comment'></div>召寘集贤，以为校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176748_comment'></div>当时名氏，简在天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176748_comment'></div>出知婺州，恶吏先锄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176748_comment'></div>募能拯溺，民以不渔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176748_comment'></div>婺之明年，改命治泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176748_comment'></div>泉人习君，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1176748", 1176748, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>谣语</span>欢然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176748_comment'></div>为桥南江，济者免覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176748_comment'></div>置廪州学，士怀我育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176748_comment'></div>有告众叛，当君燕时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176748_comment'></div>命捕立得，坐人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176748_comment'></div>苏饥息穷，去害除弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176748_comment'></div>使臣以闻，守政尤异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176748_comment'></div>智高螫边，吏不时搏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176748_comment'></div>君书驿上，焯有方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176748_comment'></div>归佐三司，廷论南师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176748_comment'></div>帝曰可哉，汝言予施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176748_comment'></div>河京以东，再执刑柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176748_comment'></div>诹囚于齐，至郓而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176748_comment'></div>弃世平阴，寿五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176748_comment'></div>有子四人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1176748", 1176748, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>扶丧</span>而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176748_comment'></div>长倩惟伯，仲惟长绪，长恕惟叔，季惟长愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176748_comment'></div>倩掾秀州，敏有辞章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176748_comment'></div>绪由君恩，郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176748_comment'></div>又女六人，皆出陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176748_comment'></div>维陈淑慎，善相君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176748_comment'></div>四男有立，女亦有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176748_comment'></div>受封长安，即养无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176748_comment'></div>爰以嘉祐，四年正月，归君钱塘，范村之穴，惟君静深，不茍笑嘻，隆亲笃友，遇物爱慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176748_comment'></div>读书慨然，慕古奇伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176748_comment'></div>顾谓诸子，仕当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176748_comment'></div>官止外郎，尚书司封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176748_comment'></div>又不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1176748", 1176748, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>得年</span>，以既厥庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176748_comment'></div>有文藏家，后世之诒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176748_comment'></div>于君所得，可以此窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176748_comment'></div>有幽斯竁，掩石在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176748_comment'></div>撰君初终，以告来者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_77_1176748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　是年，作诗咏残菊。作品：《残菊》<div id='poem_69495' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69495' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69495?labeling=true' target='_blank'>残菊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69495")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69495_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69495'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69495'>黄昏风雨打园林，残菊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69495", 69495, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>飘零</span>满地金。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69495_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69495'>擸<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作折）</span>得一枝犹<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作还）</span>好在，可怜公子惜花心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69495_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69495'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69495_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　抚州通判施邈建见山阁，致书请记。数辞不得，为撰记。作品：《抚州通判厅见山阁记》<div id='poem_1176695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176695' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176695?labeling=true' target='_blank'>抚州通判厅见山阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176695")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176695_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176695'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176695'>通判抚州、太常博士施侯，为阁于其舍之西偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176695_comment'></div>既成，与客升以饮，而为之名曰「见山」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176695_comment'></div>且言曰：「吾人脱于兵火，洗沐仁圣之膏泽，以休其父子者馀百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176695_comment'></div>于今天子恭俭，陂池、苑囿、台榭之观，有堙毁而无改作，其不欲有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176695", 1176695, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>骚动</span>，而思称祖宗所以悯仁元元之意殊甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176695_comment'></div>故人得私其智力，以逐于利而穷其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176695_comment'></div>自虽蛮夷湖海山谷之聚，大农富工<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176695", 1176695, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>豪贾</span>之家，往往能广其宫室，高其楼观，以与通邑大都之有力者争无穷之侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176695_comment'></div>夫民之富溢矣，吏独不当因其有馀力，有以自娱乐，称上施耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176695_comment'></div>又况抚之为州，山耕而水莳，牧牛马，田虎豹，为地千里，而民之男女以万数者五六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176695_comment'></div>地大人众如此，而通判与之为之父母，则其人奚可不贤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176695_comment'></div>虽贤岂能无劳于为治？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176695_comment'></div>独无观游食飨之地，以休其暇日，殆非先王使小人以力养君子之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176695_comment'></div>吾所以乐为之就此而忘劳者，非以为吾之不肖能长有此，顾不如是不足以待后之贤者尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176695_comment'></div>且夫人之慕于贤者，为其所乐与天下之志同而不失，然后能有馀以与民而使皆得其所愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176695_comment'></div>而世之说者曰：『召公为政于周，方春舍于蔽芾之棠，听男女之讼焉，而不敢自休息于宫，恐民之从我者勤，而害其田作之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176695_comment'></div>盖其隐约穷苦而以自媚于民如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176695_comment'></div>故其民爱思而咏歌之，至于不忍伐其所舍之棠，今《甘棠》之诗是也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176695_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176695_comment'></div>此殆非召公之实事、诗人之本指，特墨子之馀言赘行，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176695", 1176695, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>吝细</span>褊迫者之所好，而吾之所不能为」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176695_comment'></div>于是酒酣，客皆欢，相与从容誉施侯所为，而称其言之善，又美大其阁而嘉其所以名之者，曰：「阁之上，流目而环之，则邑屋、草木、川原、阪隰之无蔽障者皆见，施侯独有见于山，而以为之名，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176695_comment'></div>岂以山之在吾左右前后，若蟠若踞，若伏若骛，为独能适吾目之所观邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176695_comment'></div>其亦吾心有得于是而乐之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176695_comment'></div>施侯以客为知言，而以书抵予曰：「吾所以为阁而名之者如此，子其为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176695_comment'></div>数辞不得止，则又因吾叔父之命以取焉，遂为之记，以示后之贤者，使知夫施侯之所以为阁而名之者，其言如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176695_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　作诗送张颉知奉新。作品：《送张颉仲举知奉新》<div id='poem_70073' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70073' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70073?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张颉仲举知奉新</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70073")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70073_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>繇赋</span>宽赊狱讼平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70073'>老吏闭门无重糈，荒山开陇有新粳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70073'>方挥玉麈日边坐，又结铜章天外行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70073_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　以夏噩来访，作启谢之。作品：《谢夏噩察推启》<div id='poem_1176481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176481?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢夏噩察推启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176481")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176481'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176481'>伏审某官策足盛时，收名异等，以财自称，为议所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176481_comment'></div>时惟私幸之多，代有同升之义，惟当造请，势未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176481", 1176481, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>暇遑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176481_comment'></div>敢图高明，不自重贵，亲存敝馆，申贶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176481", 1176481, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>华笺</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176481_comment'></div>窥观以思，惧恐且愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176481_comment'></div>《咸池》无赖于海鸟，章甫不加乎越人，夫何谦辞，乃尔虚辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176481_comment'></div>方且<span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　与刘敞辨性、情之旨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年1月</a>　正月，撰赵师旦墓志铭。作品：《赠光禄少卿赵君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176764' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176764' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176764?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠光禄少卿赵君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176764")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176764_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176764'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176764'>侬智高反广南，攻破诸州，州将之以义死者二人，而康州赵君，余尝知其为贤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176764_comment'></div>君用叔祖荫试将作监主簿，选许州阳翟县主簿、潭州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176764_comment'></div>数以公事抗转运使，连劾奏君，而州将为君讼于朝，以故得无坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176764_comment'></div>用举者为温州乐清县令，又用举者就除宁海军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176764_comment'></div>知衢州江山县，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176764", 1176764, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>断治</span>出己，当于民心，而吏不能得民一钱，弃物道上，人无敢取者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176764_comment'></div>余尝至衢州，而君之去江山盖已久矣，衢人尚思君之所为而称说之不容口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176764_comment'></div>又用举者改大理寺丞，知徐州彭城县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176764_comment'></div>祀明堂恩，改太子右赞善大夫，移知康州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176764_comment'></div>至二月，而侬智高来攻，君悉其卒三百以战，智高为之少却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176764_comment'></div>至夜，君顾夫人取州印佩之，使负其子以匿，曰：「明日贼必大至，吾知不敌，然不可以去，汝留死无为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176764_comment'></div>明日，战不胜，遂抗贼以死，于是君年四十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176764_comment'></div>兵马监押马贵者，与卒三百人亦皆死，而无一人亡者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176764_comment'></div>初，君战时，马贵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176764", 1176764, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>惶扰</span>，至不能食饮，君独饱如平时，至夜，贵卧不能著寝，君即大鼾，比明而后寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176764_comment'></div>夫死生之故亦大矣，而君所以处之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176764_comment'></div>呜呼，其于义与命可谓能安之矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176764_comment'></div>君死之后二日，而州司理谭必始为之棺歛，又百日，而君弟至，遂护其丧归葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176764_comment'></div>至江山，江山之人老幼相携扶祭哭，其迎君丧有数百里者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176764_comment'></div>而康州之人，亦请于安抚使，而为君置屋以祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176764_comment'></div>安抚使以君之事闻天子，赠君光禄少卿，官其一子觐右侍禁，官其弟子试将作监主簿，又以其弟润州录事参军师陟为大理寺丞，签书泰州军事判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176764_comment'></div>君讳师旦，字潜叔，其先单州之成武人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176764_comment'></div>曾祖讳晟，赠太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176764_comment'></div>祖讳和，尚书比部郎中，赠光禄少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176764_comment'></div>考讳应言，太常博士，赠尚书屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176764_comment'></div>自君之祖，始去成武而葬楚州之山阳，故今为山阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176764_comment'></div>而君弟以嘉祐五年正月十六日，葬君山阳上乡仁和之原，于是夫人王氏亦卒矣，遂举其丧以祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176764_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1176764'>可以无祸，有功于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176764_comment'></div>玩君安荣，相顾莫为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176764_comment'></div>谁其视死，高蹈不疑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176764_comment'></div>呜呼康州，铭以昭之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176764_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　得书知弟安国等附陈洙舟入京，作诗。作品：《得书知二弟附陈师道舟上汴》<div id='poem_70190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_70190'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70190'>儿童闻太丘，邂逅两心投。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' DetailSwitch("2df1e52b87f74df68f7bfd20cf374cb9");'><span id='2df1e52b87f74df68f7bfd20cf374cb9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年2月</a>　二月中旬，使还，録使北诗，赠诸亲友。作品：《伴送北朝人使诗序》<div id='poem_1176580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176580?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伴送北朝人使诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176580")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176580_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176580'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176580'>某被敕送北客至塞上，语言之不通，而与之并辔十有八日，亦默默无所用吾意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176580_comment'></div>时窃咏歌，以娱愁思，当笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176580_comment'></div>鞍马之劳，其言有不足取者，然比诸戏谑之善，尚宜为君子所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176580_comment'></div>故悉录以归示诸亲友。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1176580_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　撰劄子，重申当法先王之意，改易更革天下之事。作品：《拟上殿劄子》<div id='poem_1176206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟上殿劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176206")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176206'>臣蒙恩奉使，归报陛下，敢因边事之所及，冒言天下之事，伏惟陛下详思而择其中，天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176206_comment'></div>臣窃见陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿智之才，有仁民爱物之意，顾内不能无以社稷为忧，外则不能无患于夷狄，天下之财力日以穷困，而风俗日以衰坏，四方有志之士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176206", 1176206, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>愢愢</span>然常恐天下之不久安，此其故何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176206_comment'></div>患在无法度故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176206_comment'></div>今朝廷法严令具，无所不有，而臣以谓无法度者，方今之法度多不合于先王之法度故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176206_comment'></div>孟子曰：「有仁心仁闻而人不被其泽者，为政不法先王之道故也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176206_comment'></div>非此之谓乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176206_comment'></div>以今之时方先王之时，远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176206_comment'></div>所遭之时、所遇之变不同，而欲一二修先王之政，虽甚愚者，犹知其难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176206_comment'></div>而臣以谓当今之失，患在不法先王之政者，以谓当法其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176206_comment'></div>夫五帝、三王相去盖千有馀岁，一治一乱，盛衰之时具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176206_comment'></div>其所遭之变、所遇之势不同，其施设之方亦皆殊，而其为国家之意，本末先后，未尝不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176206_comment'></div>臣故曰，当法其意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176206_comment'></div>法其意，则吾所改易更革，不至乎倾骇天下之耳目，嚣天下之口，而固已合乎先王之政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176206_comment'></div>虽然，以方今之势揆之，陛下虽欲改易更革天下之事，合于先王之意，其势未必能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176206_comment'></div>陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿知之才，有仁民爱物之意，则何为而不成，何欲而不得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176206_comment'></div>而臣固以谓虽欲改易更革天下之事，合于先王之意，其势未必能者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176206_comment'></div>方今天下之吏才少故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176206_comment'></div>朝廷之人才，固尝简在陛下之聪明，以臣使事之所及，则一路数千里之间，能推行朝廷之法，知其所缓急，而一切能修其职事者甚少，而不才茍简贪鄙之人至不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176206_comment'></div>其能讲先王之意以合当世之变者，盖阖郡之间，往往而绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176206_comment'></div>夫人才不足，则陛下虽欲改易更革天下之事，以合先王之意，大臣虽有能当陛下之意而领此者，九州之大，四海之远，万官之众，孰能一二推行之，使人人蒙其施者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176206_comment'></div>臣故曰，其势未必能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176206_comment'></div>然则方今之急，在乎人才而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176206_comment'></div>今之天下亦先王之天下，先王之时，人材尝众矣，盖其所以陶冶而成之者有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176206_comment'></div>所谓陶冶以成之者，《诗》、《书》、传记之所载，其大略可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176206_comment'></div>陛下尝试详延大臣左右及天下智能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176206", 1176206, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>才谞</span>之士，使其论先王所以成天下之才者，其设施之方如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176206_comment'></div>今之所以异于先王而人才不足者，其咎安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176206_comment'></div>其欲变而通之以合于先王之意而成天下之才，宜何施为而可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176206_comment'></div>陛下因择其言之近于理者，使之相与上下反覆为论焉，因取其宜于时者施焉，则人才宜众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176206_comment'></div>夫成人之才甚不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176206_comment'></div>人所愿得者尊爵厚禄，而所荣者善行，所耻者恶名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176206_comment'></div>今操<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176206", 1176206, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>利势</span>以临天下之士，劝之以其所荣，而予之以其所愿，则孰肯背而不为者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176206_comment'></div>特患不能尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176206_comment'></div>而吾所以责之者，又中人之所能为，则不能者又少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176206_comment'></div>夫成人之才甚不难，而自古往往不能成人之才，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176206_comment'></div>以人主之才不足故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176206_comment'></div>盖人主无恭俭之德，无聪明睿智之才，无仁民爱物之意，则嬖倖谄谀、奸罔蔽欺、残贼放恣之人，皆得志于时，而推其类以乱天下，虽有良法，不能成天下之才矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176206_comment'></div>今陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿智之才，有仁民爱物之意，而又因天下之所愿以为辅相者，公听并观，以进退天下之士，则所以成天下之才，特患无良法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176206_comment'></div>而陛下推至诚恻怛之心以行之，则臣虽愚，固知人之才不难成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176206_comment'></div>人才既众，则陛下何为而不成？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176206_comment'></div>何欲而不得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176206_comment'></div>夫然后改易更革天下之事，以合乎先王之意甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176206_comment'></div>陛下不能如此，茍于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1176206", 1176206, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>积敝</span>之末流，因不足任之才，而修不足为之法，臣恐在军者日以劳，而士民愈以穷困<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1176206", 1176206, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>污滥</span>，而于天下国家愈其无补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176206_comment'></div>臣幸以使事归报，徒举利害之一二，而无补于世，非臣之所以事陛下惓惓之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176206_comment'></div>辄不自知其驽下，而敢言国家之大体，伏惟陛下详择其中，天下幸甚也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1176206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　作诗寄韩维。作品：《欲往浄因寄泾州韩持国》<div id='poem_70197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70197?labeling=true' target='_blank'>欲往净因寄泾州韩持国</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70197")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70197'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70197'>紫荆山下物华新，只与都城共一春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70197'>令节想君携绿酒，故情怜我踏黄尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70197'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70197", 70197, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>泔鱼</span>已悔他年事，搏虎方收末路身。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70197'>欲寄微言书不尽，试寻僧阁望西人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70197'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年3月25日</a>　此日，刘敞、欧阳修上疏改茶法不便。撰文驳之，力主罢东南榷茶。作品：《议茶法》《茶商十二说》<div id='poem_1176271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议茶法</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年3月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176271")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176271'>国家罢搉茶之法，而使民得自贩，于方今实为便，于古义实为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176271_comment'></div>而有非之者，盖聚歛之臣将尽财利于毫末之间，而不知「与之为取」之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176271_comment'></div>夫茶之为民用，等于米盐，不可一日以无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176271_comment'></div>而今官场所出皆粗恶不可食，故民之所食大率皆私贩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176271_comment'></div>夫夺民之所甘，而使不得食，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176271", 1176271, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>严刑峻法</span>有不能止者，故鞭扑流徒之罪未常少弛，而私贩、私市者亦未尝绝于道路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176271_comment'></div>既罢搉之之法，则凡此之为患，皆可以无矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176271_comment'></div>然则虽尽充岁入之利，亦为国者之所当务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176271_comment'></div>况关市之入，自足侔昔日之利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176271_comment'></div>昔桑弘羊兴榷酤之议，当时以为财用待此而给，万世不可易者，然至霍光不学无术之人，遂能屈其论而罢其法，盖义之胜利久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176271_comment'></div>今朝廷之治方欲刬百代之弊，而复尧舜之功，而其为法度，乃欲出于霍光之所羞为者，则可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176271_comment'></div>以今之势，虽未能尽罢搉货，而能缓其一，亦所以示上之人恤民之深而兴治之渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176271_comment'></div>彼区区聚歛之臣，务以求利为功，而不知与之为取，上之人亦当断以义，岂可以人人合其私说然后行哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176271_comment'></div>扬雄曰：「为人父而搉其子，纵利，如子何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176271_comment'></div>以雄之聪明，其讲天下之利害宜可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176271_comment'></div>然则今虽国用甚不足，亦不可以复易已行之法矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176271_comment'></div>是以国家之势，茍修其法度，以使本盛而末衰，则天下之财不胜用，庸讵而必区区于此哉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176271_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>茶商十二说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年3月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176272")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176272'>臣窃以须仰巨商有十二之损，为害甚广，请试陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176272_comment'></div>须仰巨商，巨商数少，相率既易，邀贱遂繁，故有场饶明减闇减，累累不已，岁数百万，是饶减之损，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，巨商稀少，积压等候，陈损既多，或弃或焚，或充杂用，此税既陷，正税又饶，是陷税之损，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，饶丰价薄，园民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176272", 1176272, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>困耗</span>，逋欠岁程，至如石桥一场，祖额一百七万，而近岁买纳才得十万，而亏及累年，便乞减额，是退额之损，三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，须凭力禁，是以搜捉之旅所在屯布，掩缉之众弥占川落，官员请俸，卒旅衣粮，扰民费财，总计不细，是力禁之损，四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，须置搉务，诸郡津置或数千里，所载纲运率自省破，船材兵费，风波盗窃，每岁之计不为不甚，是远萃之损，五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，必先多备，茶体轻怯，难掌易损，架阁利燥，封角利密，而官数浩瀚，堆积<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176272", 1176272, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>敖廪</span>，风枯雨湿，气味失夺，俟售待给，已反陈损，是堆积之损，六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176272_comment'></div>又失物分轻则得众，得众则易竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176272_comment'></div>今仰巨商，本不及数千缗则不能行，是分重而不得众也，故难竭而成积滞，分重之损，七也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176272_comment'></div>又凡货利己则精心，精心则货善，货善则易售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176272_comment'></div>今仰巨商，非己甚众，始从小户，次输主人，方纳官场，复支商旅，是以小户偷窃，主人殽杂，奸吏容庇，皆以非己而致货不善也，是非己之损，八也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，遂为二等，新好者支算商旅，低陈者留卖南中，食用不堪，遂皆私易，故一县大率每岁以茶被刑者往往百数，是烦刑之损，九也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176272_comment'></div>又既仰巨商，茶多积坏，坏不堪卖，遂转蚕茶，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176272", 1176272, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>俵给</span>户民，悉不堪食，虚纳所直，诸郡甚多，是剜本之损，十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176272_comment'></div>又巨商悉系通商南方，尽从官卖，官卖既不堪食，多配寺院、茶坊，茶多弃损，钱实虚歛，是削民之损，十一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176272_comment'></div>既仰巨商，货终难尽，诸般折给，从是生焉，虽依元价折钱变卖，杂收什一，请实虚损，官亦虚损，是刻士之损，十二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176272_comment'></div>其为害广也如此，不可不去也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　弟安国入京。作品：《平甫归饮》<div id='poem_70348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平甫归饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70348")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70348'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70348'>无田士相吊，亦以废燕乐。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年7月</a>　七月，作诗，颂赵尚宽唐州之政。作品：《新田诗》<div id='poem_70802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　和王陶《烘虱》，司马光同和。作品：《和王乐道烘虱》<div id='poem_70499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王乐道烘虱</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_70499'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70499'>秋暑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>汗流如炙輠，敝衣湿蒸尘垢涴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70499'>施施众虱当此时，择肉甘于虎狼饿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70499'>咀啮侵肤未云已，爬搔次骨终无那。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70499'>时时对客辄自扪，千<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作十）</span>百所除才几个。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70499'>皮毛得气强复活，爪甲流丹真暂破。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70499'>未能汤沐取一空，且以火攻令少挫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70499'>踞炉炽炭已不暇，对灶张衣诚未过。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70499'>飘零乍若蛾赴灯，惊扰端如蚁旋磨。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>然脐</span>郿坞患溢世，焚宝鹿台身易货。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70499'>冢中燎入化秦尸，池上焮随迁莽坐。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70499'>彼皆势极就烟埃，况汝命轻侔涕唾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70499'>逃藏坏<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作败）</span>絮尚欲索，埋没死灰谁复课<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一本无此八句）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70499'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_70499", 70499, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>熏心</span>得祸尔莫悔，烂额收功吾可贺。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70499'>犹残众虮恨未除，自计宁能久安卧。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70499'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_70499_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70499'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_70499_0'>⑴ 原作水，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70499_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年8月6日</a>　此日，与赵抃、郑獬、滕甫等考试开封府举人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　作诗，不满科场以诗赋取士。作品：《试院五绝》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　与滕甫同为试官考校，不睦。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年8月24日</a>　此日，以度支判官、祠部员外郎、直集贤院为契丹正旦使，辞行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　与吴奎等上疏言马政之弊，荐薛向。作品：《相度牧马所举薛向劄子》<div id='poem_1176214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相度牧马所举薛向劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176214")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176214'>臣等窃观自古国马盛衰，皆以所任得人失人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176214_comment'></div>汧、渭之间，未尝无牧，而非子独能蕃息于周；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176214_comment'></div>河、陇之间，未尝无牧，而张万岁独能蕃息于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176214_comment'></div>此前世得人之明效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176214_comment'></div>使得人而不久其官，久其官而不使得专其事，使得专其事而不临之以赏罚，亦不可以成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176214_comment'></div>今臣等相度陕西一路买马监牧利害大纲，已具奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176214_comment'></div>伏见权陕西转运副使薛向，精力强果，达于政事，河北便籴，陕西榷盐，皆有已试之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176214_comment'></div>今来相度陕西马事尤为详悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176214_comment'></div>臣等前奏已乞就委薛向提举陕西买马及监牧公事，今欲乞降指挥，许令久任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176214_comment'></div>缘今来马价多出于解池盐利，三司所支银、䌷、绢等，又许令于陕西转运司兑换见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176214_comment'></div>今薛向既掌解盐，又领陕西财赋，则通融变转，于事为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176214_comment'></div>兼臣等访问得薛向，陕西系官空地可以兴置监牧处甚多，若将来稍成次第，即可以渐兴置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176214_comment'></div>盖得西戎之马，牧之于西方，不失其土性，一利也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176214_comment'></div>因未尝耕垦之地，无伤于民，二利也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176214_comment'></div>因向之材，而就令经始，三利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176214_comment'></div>又河北有河防塘泊之患，而土多舄卤不毛，戎马所屯，地利不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176214_comment'></div>诸监牧多在此路，所占草地多是肥饶，而马又不堪，未尝大段孳息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176214_comment'></div>若陕西兴置监牧，渐成次第，即河北诸监有可存者，悉以陕西良马易其恶种；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176214_comment'></div>有可废者，悉以肥饶之地赋民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176214_comment'></div>于地不足而马所不宜之处，以肥饶之地赋民，而收其课租，以助戎马之费；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176214_comment'></div>于地有馀而马所宜之处，以未尝耕垦之地牧马，而无伤于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176214_comment'></div>此又利之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176214_comment'></div>如允臣等所奏，即乞薛向所奏举官员及论改旧弊，朝廷一切应副，成功则无爱赏，败事则无惮罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176214_comment'></div>如此则臣等保任薛向必能上副朝廷改法之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176214_comment'></div>如将来败事，臣等各甘同罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176214_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　题吴奎新得颜真卿坏碑，弟安国和。作品：《吴长文新得颜公坏碑》<div id='poem_70454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴长文新得颜公坏碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70454")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70454'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70454'>鲁公之书既绝伦，岁久更为时所珍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70454'>荒坛坏冢朽崖屋，剥落风雨埋煨尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70454'>断碑数尺谁所得，点画入纸完如新。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70454'>六书篆籀数变改，训诂后世多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70454", 70454, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>失真</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70454'>谁初妄凿妍与丑，坐使学士劳骸筋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70272'>高歌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70272", 70272, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>业已</span>传都市，逸兴何当叩隐扉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70272'>颇欲携樽邀使骑，几忘温席荐亲闱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70272'>公今早晚班春去，强劝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_70272", 70272, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>涝田</span>补岁饥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70272'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_70272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　是年，撰文，以理财为政务之急，当善法而择吏，理天下之财。作品：《度支副使厅壁题名记》<div id='poem_1176679' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176679' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176679?labeling=true' target='_blank'>度支副使厅壁题名记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176679")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176679_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176679'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176679'>三司副使，不书前人名姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176679_comment'></div>嘉祐五年，尚书户部员外郎吕君冲之始稽之众史，而自李纮已上至查道，得其名，自杨偕已上，得其官，自郭劝已下，又得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176679", 1176679, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>在事</span>之岁时，于是书石而镵之东壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176679_comment'></div>夫合天下之众者财，理天下之财者法，守天下之法者吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176679_comment'></div>吏不良，则有法而莫守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176679_comment'></div>法不善，则有财而莫理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176679_comment'></div>有财而莫理，则阡陌闾巷之贱人，皆能私取予之势，擅万物之利，以与人主争黔首，而放其无穷之欲，非必贵强桀大而后能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176679_comment'></div>如是而天子犹为不失其民者，盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176679", 1176679, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>特号</span>而已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176679_comment'></div>虽欲食蔬衣敝，憔悴其身，愁思其心，以幸天下之给足，而安吾政，吾知其犹不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176679_comment'></div>然则善吾法，而择吏以守之，以理天下之财，虽上古尧、舜犹不能毋以此为先急，而况于后世之纷纷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176679_comment'></div>三司副使，方今之大吏，朝廷所以尊宠之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176679", 1176679, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>甚备</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176679_comment'></div>盖今理财之法，有不善者，其势皆得以议于上而改为之，非特当守成法，吝出入，以从有司之事而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176679_comment'></div>其职事如此，则其人之贤不肖，利害施于天下如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176679_comment'></div>观其人，以其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176679", 1176679, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>在事</span>之岁时，以求其政事之见于今者，而考其所以佐上理财之方，则其人之贤不肖，与世之治否，吾可以坐而得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176679_comment'></div>此盖吕君之志也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176679_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　居春明坊，与宋敏求相邻，受其嘱托，编《百家诗选》，作序。作品：《唐百家诗选序》<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　作书以答吴孝宗论《先志》。作品：《答吴孝宗论<先志>书》<div id='poem_1176340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答吴孝宗论先志书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176340")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176340'>某辱书，又示以《先志》，而怪某尚有欲为吾弟道者，责以一言尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176340_comment'></div>吾弟所为书博矣，所欲为吾弟道者，非可以一言尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176340_comment'></div>然吾弟自以为才不及子贡，而所言皆子贡所欲闻于夫子而不得者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176340_comment'></div>则某有欲为吾弟道者，可勿怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176340_comment'></div>积忧久病，废学疲懒，书不能逮意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176340_comment'></div>知已就试国学，隆暑，自爱！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176340_comment'></div>他俟试罢见过面尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176340_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　作书再答吴孝宗，论文辞不足以明圣人之道。作品：《答吴孝宗书》<div id='poem_1176339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答吴孝宗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176339")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176339'>比得周良才所示书，即欲奉报，以多病多事，未能如志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176339_comment'></div>重承手问，尤以感愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176339_comment'></div>知生事弥困，为之奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176339_comment'></div>某亦以姻事见迫，又田入不足，故私计亦未能不以经心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176339_comment'></div>然劳佚有命，当顺以听之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176339_comment'></div>前书所示，大抵不出《先志》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176339_comment'></div>若子经欲以文辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176339", 1176339, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>高世</span>，则世之名能文辞者，已无过矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176339_comment'></div>若欲以明道，则离圣人之经，皆不足以有明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176339_comment'></div>自秦、汉已来，儒者唯扬雄为知言，然尚恨有所未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176339_comment'></div>今学士大夫，往往不足以知雄，则其于圣人之经，宜其有所未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176339_comment'></div>子经诚欲以文辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176339", 1176339, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>高世</span>，则无为见问矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176339_comment'></div>诚欲以明道，则所欲为子经道者，非可以一言而尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176339_comment'></div>子经所谓斜凿以矫矢，背柄以矫舟，此天下之所同，而舟矢已来，未之改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176339_comment'></div>《先志》所论，有非天下之所同，而特出子经之新意者，则与矫舟矢之意为不类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176339_comment'></div>又子经以为《诗》、《礼》不可以相解，乃如某之学，则惟《诗》、《礼》足以相解，以其理同故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176339_comment'></div>子经以谓如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176339_comment'></div>两家各多难，无由会合，许明年见过，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176339_comment'></div>未尔，自爱！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176339_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　以杨安国致仕，致贺启。作品：《贺致政杨侍读启》<div id='poem_1176483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺致政杨侍读启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176483")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176483'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176483'>伏审得谢中楹，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176483", 1176483, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>戒归</span>下国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176483_comment'></div>孔戣致仕，议臣虽愿其留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176483_comment'></div>疏广乞身，观者固荣其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176483_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176483", 1176483, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>丁时</span>翕赩，取道阻长，击盛德之可师，宜明神之实相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176483_comment'></div>茂惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176483", 1176483, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>兴止</span>，休有福祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176483_comment'></div>伏惟某官逢辰清明，取位通显，义勇不挫，忠精无疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176483_comment'></div>登备谏工，尝已告嘉猷于后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176483_comment'></div>奉将使节，则以下膏泽于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176483_comment'></div>仪仪会朝，凛凛侍从，功名之美既耀于将来，智略之闳犹嗟于不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176483_comment'></div>引年去位，循礼得中，唯其养恬，有以镇薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176483_comment'></div>某望尘非数，见器则深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176483_comment'></div>窃冒上官之大知，唯所不欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176483_comment'></div>推扬后进之美意，云何敢忘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176483_comment'></div>备位于兹，仰高无止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176483_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　次韵宋敏求《忆太平州宅早梅》。作品：《次韵次道忆太平州宅早梅》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　与吕惠卿论经义多合，遂定交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年3月</a>　三月，为御试进士详定官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年3月</a>　三月，于崇政殿详定进士试卷。以初、复考所定第一人皆未允，遂与杨畋各以己意进禀状首。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　作诗次韵杨畋送花。作品：《次韵乐道送花》<div id='poem_69819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年6月</a>　六月，召试知制诰，撰制词。作品：《节度使加宣徽使制》《翰林学士除三司使制》《诫劝诸道转运使经画财利宽恤民力制》<div id='poem_1175524' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175524' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175524?labeling=true' target='_blank'>节度使加宣徽使制<span class='inlineComment2'>（召试）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175524")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175524_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175524'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175524'>门下：推毂授师，拥旄乘塞，擅生杀之柄于外，系安危之体于中，厥有显庸，宜膺宠数，诞扬孚号，明示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1175524", 1175524, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>庶工</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175524_comment'></div>具官某，学足以通大方，谋足以断众事，有经天之业，有捍城之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175524_comment'></div>比以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1175524", 1175524, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>明扬</span>，屡更烦使，遂跻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1175524", 1175524, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>膴仕</span>，良副吁谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175524_comment'></div>维塞路之要藩，实兵防之重寄，职尔镇抚，纾予顾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175524_comment'></div>盖爵赏之加，不遗于近小，岂藩维之任，顾可以弭忘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175524_comment'></div>用是畴其展寀之劳，宠以宣猷之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175524_comment'></div>繄人谋之众允，匪朕志之汝私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175524_comment'></div>夫任重者其忧不可以不深，位高者其责不可以不厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175524_comment'></div>号名之美，礼秩之崇，非期假宠以擅荣，兹用论功而取称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175524_comment'></div>矧夫守国之圉，谋王之师，联辅相之籍于殿中，居士民之瞻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1175524_comment'></div>其思祗慎，以副<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1175524", 1175524, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>褒优</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1175524_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1175524_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士除三司使制<span class='inlineComment2'>（召试）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175525")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175525'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175525'>敕：三司使，天下之盛选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175525_comment'></div>自尚书六官名存实去，而三司之职事所总居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175525_comment'></div>则非夫仁明肃艾足以辅世济物者，奚宜任此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175525_comment'></div>具官某，有疏通之才，有直亮之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175525_comment'></div>闳言崇议，足以经纶王家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175525_comment'></div>高文典策，足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1175525", 1175525, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>鼓动</span>当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175525_comment'></div>遂以人望，扬于禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175525_comment'></div>若夫施政之后先，生财之本末，盖尝深思而熟讲，殚见而洽闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175525_comment'></div>则居天下之盛选，主朝廷之大计，询考在位，孰如汝宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175525_comment'></div>夫聚天下之众者莫如财，理天下之财者莫如法，守天下之法者莫如吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1175525_comment'></div>维予任汝，其听勿疑！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1175525_comment'></div>法之不善者汝得以议而更，吏之不良者汝得以察而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1175525_comment'></div>则夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1175525", 1175525, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>调度</span>之不时，费出之无常，邦用之不给，元元困于征求而愁怨于下者，直汝之耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1175525_comment'></div>夫行己有耻而后可以为士，矧吾左右信任，询谋所同，而观听之所在者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1175525_comment'></div>往祗厥官，其亡以宠利而为士耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1175525_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1175525_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175526' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诫励诸道转运使经画财利宽恤民力制<span class='inlineComment2'>（召试）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175526")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175526_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175526'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175526'>夫闵仁百姓而无夺其时，无侵其财，无耗其力，使其无憾于衣食，而有以养生丧死，此礼义廉耻之所兴，而二帝三王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1175526", 1175526, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>诫敕</span>百工诸侯之所先，后世不可以忽者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175526_comment'></div>朕夙兴夜寐，听治不怠，囿游宫室之观无所增饰，而躬以节俭先天下之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175526_comment'></div>然而不忍人之政，考诸先王，未有以及之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175526_comment'></div>凶年饥岁，民之父子夫妇，犹有不得保其家室而放乎沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175526_comment'></div>意者吏或不良，不知所以赈救省忧之方，而使之至此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175526_comment'></div>今吾别诸道置使者，使得察吏之良否而视民之疾苦，辄具以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175526_comment'></div>而任事者或不惟朕志之所急，而以侵牟之为故，甚非所以遣使者慰安元元之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175526_comment'></div>夫转输天下之财，以给有司之费，皆有常数，而无横求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175526_comment'></div>诚能御轻重歛散之权，而禁因缘之奸，则何患乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1175526", 1175526, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>经入</span>之不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175526_comment'></div>彼前世良吏，能纾其民而官事亦不耗废者，岂有他哉，亦在乎勉之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1175526_comment'></div>若乃操聚敛之赢以为功，而不知百姓与足之义，非惟逆于朕志，而有司考绩之法，亦将不汝容焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1175526_comment'></div>朕言维服，其听毋怠！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1175526_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1175526_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年6月27日</a>　此日，以知制诰纠察在京刑狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　举吕公著自代，作状。作品：《举吕公著自代状》<div id='poem_1176200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176200?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举吕公著自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176200")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176200'>具某官吕公著，冲深而能谋，宽博而有制，其器可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176200", 1176200, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>大受</span>，而退然似不能言，故众人知之有所不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176200_comment'></div>如蒙选用，得试其才，必有绩效，不孤圣世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176200_comment'></div>臣实不如，今举自代。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年7月</a>　七月，上知制诰谢表。作品：《谢知制诰表》<div id='poem_1176469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176469?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176469")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176469_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176469'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176469'>据非其称，惭甚于荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176469_comment'></div>窃以通会朝之籍于禁中，出诰命之书于天下，自昔必求乎良士，方今尤谓之美官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176469_comment'></div>非夫能道先王之言，及通当世之务，文章足以润色，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176469", 1176469, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>知术</span>足以讨论，一有误居，必乖众论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176469_comment'></div>某素出贫贱，偶遭盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176469_comment'></div>读书虽勤，未免是古之累；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176469_comment'></div>更事虽久，终无适时之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176469_comment'></div>制作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176469", 1176469, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>淹迟</span>而不工，思虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176469", 1176469, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>短浅</span>而不敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176469_comment'></div>有此一物，自足穷于多士之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176469_comment'></div>兼是四端，岂宜辱于迩臣之列？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176469_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官，以忠纯翼戴，以宽大甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176469_comment'></div>谓其引分而无求，傥或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176469", 1176469, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>负能</span>而有待，因加奖借，使得超逾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176469_comment'></div>盖大公之赐所加，唯至诚之报为称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176469_comment'></div>敢不内尽致身之德，庶以上同许国之心！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176469_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　作启谢执政及同列。作品：《谢知制诰启》<div id='poem_1176469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1176469'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176469'>据非其称，惭甚于荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176469_comment'></div>窃以通会朝之籍于禁中，出诰命之书于天下，自昔必求乎良士，方今尤谓之美官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176469_comment'></div>非夫能道先王之言，及通当世之务，文章足以润色，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176469", 1176469, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>知术</span>足以讨论，一有误居，必乖众论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176469_comment'></div>某素出贫贱，偶遭盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176469_comment'></div>读书虽勤，未免是古之累；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176469_comment'></div>更事虽久，终无适时之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176469_comment'></div>制作<span
