ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　母吴氏可封郡太君，不言，故不及封。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　上疏论时政，以为非大明法度、众建贤才，不足以维持天下。作品：《上时政疏》<div id='poem_1176175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上时政疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176175")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176175'>年月日，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>具位</span>臣某昧死再拜上疏尊号皇帝陛下：臣窃观自古人主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>享国</span>日久，无至诚恻怛忧天下之心，虽无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>暴政</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>虐刑</span>加于百姓，而天下未尝不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176175_comment'></div>自秦已下，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>享国</span>日久者，有晋之武帝、梁之武帝、唐之明皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176175_comment'></div>此三帝者，皆聪明智略有功之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176175_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>享国</span>日久，内外无患，因循茍且，无至诚恻怛忧天下之心，趋过目前，而不为久远之计，自以祸灾可以无及其身，往往身遇灾祸，而悔无所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176175_comment'></div>虽或仅得身免，而宗庙固已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>毁辱</span>，而妻子固以困穷，天下之民固以膏血涂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>草野</span>，而生者不能自脱于困饿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>劫束</span>之患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176175_comment'></div>夫为人子孙，使其宗庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>毁辱</span>，为人父母，使其比屋死亡，此岂仁孝之主所宜忍者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176175_comment'></div>然而晋、梁、唐之三帝，以晏然致此者，自以为其祸灾可以不至于此，而不自知忽然已至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176175_comment'></div>盖夫天下至大器也，非大明法度，不足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>维持</span>，非众建贤才，不足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>保守</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176175_comment'></div>茍无至诚恻怛忧天下之心，则不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>询考</span>贤才，讲求法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176175_comment'></div>贤才不用，法度不脩，偷假岁月，则幸或可以无他，旷日持久，则未尝不终于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>大乱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176175_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下有恭俭之德，有聪明睿智之才，有仁民爱物之意，然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>享国</span>日久矣，此诚当恻怛忧天下，而以晋、梁、唐三帝为戒之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176175_comment'></div>以臣所见，方今朝廷之位，未可谓能得贤才，政事所施，未可谓能合法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176175_comment'></div>官乱于上，民贫于下，风俗日以薄，财力日以困穷，而陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>高居深拱</span>，未尝有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>询考</span>讲求之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176175_comment'></div>此臣所以窃为陛下计而不能无慨然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176175_comment'></div>夫因循茍且，逸豫而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>无为</span>，可以徼倖一时，而不可以旷日持久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176175_comment'></div>晋、梁、唐三帝者，不知虑此，故灾稔祸变，生于一时，则虽欲复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>询考</span>讲求以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/74/Comments/1")'>自救</span>，而已无所及矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176175_comment'></div>以古准今，则天下安危治乱，尚可以有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176175_comment'></div>有为之时，莫急于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176175_comment'></div>过今日，则臣恐亦有无所及之悔矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176175_comment'></div>然则以至诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>询考</span>而众建贤才，以至诚讲求而大明法度，陛下今日其可以不汲汲乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176175_comment'></div>《书》曰：「若药不瞑眩，厥疾弗瘳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176175_comment'></div>臣愿陛下以终身之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176175", 1176175, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>狼疾</span>为忧，而不以一日之瞑眩为苦。<div "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>尽规</span>之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176175_comment'></div>伏惟陛下深思臣言，以自警戒，则天下幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70063_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70063'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70063'>射策曾称蜀郡雄，朝廷重得汉司空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70063'>应留赐席丹涂地，误责飞刍紫塞功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70063'>三径欲归无旧业，百城先至有清风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70063'>潞山直与天为党，回首孙高想见公。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70063'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70063_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/69501?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省中沈文通厅事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>角门</span>常闭吏人稀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69501'>萧萧一榻卷书坐，直到日斜骑马归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69501'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69501_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年10月13日</a>　此日，宗实起复泰州防御使、知宗正寺。撰制词。作品：《皇姪右卫大将军岳州团练使宗实可起复旧官泰州防御使知宗正寺制》<div id='poem_1175527' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175527' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175527?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇侄右卫大将军岳州团练使宗实可起复旧官泰州防御使知宗正寺制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年10月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175527")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175527_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175527'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175527'>敕：先王纠合宗族而分职以治之，所以严宗庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175527_comment'></div>宗庙严，则礼俗成而天下治，其事岂可以轻哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175527_comment'></div>今朕选于近属，以修宗正之官，亦先王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1175527", 1175527, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>治亲</span>之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175527_comment'></div>以尔具官某，惠仁孝恭，忠信纯笃，故迁厥位，以称御侮之实，而使任事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175527_comment'></div>夫士之欲施于政，未有不学而能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175527_comment'></div>学所以修身也，身修则无不治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175527_comment'></div>朕言维服，尔往懋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175527_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1175527_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　熊本等迁著作佐郎，撰制词。作品：《熊本高旦孙思恭并著作佐郎制三道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　弟平甫离京，与沈遘同行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年11月</a>　十一月，撰李兴神道碑。作品：《故赠左屯卫大将军李公神道碑铭并序》<div id='poem_1176727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故赠左屯卫大将军李公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176727")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176727'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176727'>宋故赠左屯卫大将军李公墓，在河中府河东县陶邑乡仙观里紫金山北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176727_comment'></div>初，咸平二年，公以东班殿侍随彰国军节度使康保裔部军于高阳关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176727_comment'></div>契丹内侵，真宗狩于魏，大将恃城，千里闭逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176727_comment'></div>保裔以其属出，公提少卒，所战辄破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176727_comment'></div>寇搏我疾，孤坚弗支，举军陷焉，乃以义死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176727_comment'></div>当是时，十二月五日也，公年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176727_comment'></div>有诏赙恤，录公子枢以为西班殿侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176727_comment'></div>盖六十九年而枢以行治劳烈，积官至皇城使、贺州团练使，而尝一再辞赏，以求追荣其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176727_comment'></div>天子亦数推恩以及朝士大夫之亲，而公九赠官，自太子左清道率府副率，至左监门卫大将军，逮今上即位，则再至三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176727_comment'></div>而公夫人朱氏亦封钱塘、仙游、永安县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176727_comment'></div>太君有美志纯行，年六十三，以天圣七年六月六日卒于其子之官舍，而以嘉祐六年十一月十一日与公合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176727_comment'></div>公幼而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176727", 1176727, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>愿恭</span>，长而敏武，涉书喜谋，将有以为，而卒不克，盖知者伤焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176727_comment'></div>唯忠壮不屈，以诒禄于其后世，而团练君实能力承以大厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176727_comment'></div>噫，其可铭也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176727_comment'></div>李氏世家郑之原武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176727_comment'></div>公讳兴，字仲举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176727_comment'></div>曾祖讳颙，祖讳光，父讳元超，皆弗仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176727_comment'></div>公生一男二女，二女皆早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176727_comment'></div>孙六人，其二人早死，棻今为尚书都官郎中，馀皆以父荫仕，昌龄终三班差使，蕖今为右班殿直，𦾵今为左班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176727_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176727'>李姓之始，聃周隐史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176727_comment'></div>厥家郑邦，代晦其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176727_comment'></div>公奋自田，启迹班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176727_comment'></div>匪熊匪罴，彼万其旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176727_comment'></div>帝徂伐之，孰致予武？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176727_comment'></div>操戈以先，所遇毙逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176727_comment'></div>曰敌可尽，其来滔滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176727_comment'></div>终沉于戎，唯义之济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176727_comment'></div>闵有传禄，追荣以暨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176727_comment'></div>谁无孙子，锡命在幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176727_comment'></div>我以吾功，克称无羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176727_comment'></div>铭诗后观，有石道周。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1176727_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　是年，为司马光伯父撰墓表。作品：《宋故赠尚书都官郎中司马君墓表》<div id='poem_1176845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋故赠尚书都官郎中司马君墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176845")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176845'>君姓司马氏，讳沂，陕州夏县涑水乡高堠里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176845_comment'></div>其先出于晋安平献王孚，至征东大将军阳，始葬于河东安邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176845_comment'></div>后魏分安邑为夏县，遂为夏县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176845_comment'></div>自唐以来，降在畎亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176845_comment'></div>而君之曾祖林、祖政、父炳，皆不仕，然累世未尝异居，故家之食口甚众，而贫无以赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176845_comment'></div>君幼孝谨，父兄悉以家事付之，能俭勤以成其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176845_comment'></div>当是时，田不加广，又未尝为商贾奇邪之业，而司马氏更富，父兄皆醉饱安逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176845_comment'></div>而时有馀力，则及其乡人，然君遂以恶衣疏食终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176845_comment'></div>其卒也，以景德三年十二月丙子，年三十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176845_comment'></div>以祥符六年□□□□葬涑水之南原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176845_comment'></div>夫人同邑李氏女，年二十八，生男咏、里及一女子而寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176845_comment'></div>顷之，咏及女皆卒，于是父母欲夺其志而舅姑亦遣焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176845_comment'></div>夫人自誓不嫁，躬执勤苦，使里之四方就学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176845_comment'></div>姑李氏老且病，常卧一榻，扶然后起，哺然后食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176845_comment'></div>夫人左右视养，未尝少失其志，如是累年，以至其没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176845_comment'></div>既而里以□□□仕，奉夫人之官，夫人始别其母，而思慕成疾，久之乃愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176845_comment'></div>里积迁至尚书都官郎中，历将数州，□□□而封君尚书都官郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176845_comment'></div>夫人封永寿县太君，年八十三，以嘉祐五年九月甲寅终于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176845_comment'></div>其年十一月壬寅，合葬于君之墓，而君之从父弟子起居舍人光序其事如此，以来请曰：愿有述也，以表之墓上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176845_comment'></div>呜呼，君所谓谨身节用以养父母而道行于妻子者欤，以此而学，则岂与夫操浮说而无其质者比哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176845_comment'></div>夫人之德，可谓协矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176845_comment'></div>虽非其家人所欲论著，吾固乐为道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176845_comment'></div>又况以起居之贤，尝为吾僚而有请也，于是书以遗之去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176845_comment'></div>朝奉郎、尚书屯田员外郎、知国子监书学、权同判吏部南曹、上骑都尉，赐绯鱼袋杨南仲篆额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176845_comment'></div>布衣曹知白模刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　缴还邵雍除试将作监主簿不理选限辞头。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　作诗送李宣叔通判漳州。作品：《送李宣叔倅漳州》<div id='poem_70642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70642?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李宣叔倅漳州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70642")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70642_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70642'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70642'>闽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>山到漳穷，地与南越错。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70642'>山川郁雾毒，瘴疠春冬作。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70642'>荒茅篁竹閒，蔽亏有城郭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70642'>居人特<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70642", 70642, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>鲜少</span>，市井宜萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70642'>野花开无时，蛮酒持可酌。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70642'>穷年不值<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>客，谁与分杯杓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70642'>朝廷尚贤俊，磊砢充<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_70642", 70642, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>台阁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70642'>君能喜节行，文艺又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_70642", 70642, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>该博</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70642'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_70642", 70642, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>超然</span>万里去，识者为不乐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70642'>予闻君子居，自可救民瘼。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70642'>苟能御外物，得地无美恶。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70642'>似闻最南方，北客今勿药。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70642'>林麓换风气，兽蛇凋毒蠚。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70642'>如漳犹近州，气冷又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_70642", 70642, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>销铄</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70642'>珍足海物味，其厚不为薄。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70642'>章举马甲柱，固已轻羊酪。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70642'>蕉黄荔子丹，又胜楂梨酢。<div id='poem_sentence_16_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_70642'>逢衣比多士，往往在丘壑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_70642'>从容与笑语，岂不慰寂寞。<div id='poem_sentence_18_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_70642'>太守好觞咏，嘉宾应在幕。<div id='poem_sentence_19_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_70642'>想即有新诗，流传至京洛。<div id='poem_sentence_20_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_70642'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_70642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70642'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_70642_0'>⑴ 原作关，据张本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_70642_0'>⑵ 原作用，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70642_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　撰记。以为佛与老、庄，皆有见于无思无为退藏于密寂然不动者，亦得圣人大体之一。作品：《涟水军淳化院经藏记》<div id='poem_1176697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>涟水军淳化院经藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176697")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176697'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176697'>道之不一久矣，人善其所见，以为教于天下，而传之后世，后世学者或徇乎身之所然，或诱乎世之所趋，或得乎心之所好，于是圣人之大体，分裂而为八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176697_comment'></div>博闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176697", 1176697, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>该见</span>有志之士，补苴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176697", 1176697, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>调胹</span>，冀以就完而力不足，又无可为之地，故终不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176697_comment'></div>盖有见于无思无为，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176697", 1176697, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>退藏于密</span>，寂然不动者，中国之老、庄，西域之佛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176697_comment'></div>既以此为教于天下而传后世，故为其徒者，多宽平而不忮，质静而无求，不忮似仁，无求似义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176697_comment'></div>当士之夸漫盗夺，有己而无物者多于世，则超然高蹈，其为有似乎吾之仁义者，岂非所谓贤于彼而可与言者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176697_comment'></div>若通之瑞新，闽之怀琏，皆今之为佛而超然，吾所谓贤而与之游者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176697_comment'></div>此二人者，既以其所学自脱于世之淫浊，而又皆有聪明辩智之才，故吾乐以其所得者间语焉，与之游，忘日月之多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176697_comment'></div>琏尝谓余曰：「吾徒有善因者，得屋于涟水之城中，而得吾所谓经者五千四十八卷于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176697_comment'></div>归市匦而藏诸屋，将求能文者为之书其经藏者之岁时，而以子之爱我也，故使其徒来属，能为我强记之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176697_comment'></div>善因者，盖常为屋于涟水之城中，而因瑞新以求予记其岁时，予辞而不许者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176697_comment'></div>于是问其藏经之日，某年月日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176697_comment'></div>夫以二人者与余游，而善因属我之勤，岂有它哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176697_comment'></div>其不可以终辞，乃为之书，而并告之所以书之意，使镵诸石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176697_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　撰许平墓志铭。作品：《泰州海陵县主簿许君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泰州海陵县主簿许君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176778")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176778'>君讳平，字秉之，姓许氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176778_comment'></div>余尝谱其世家，所谓今泰州海陵县主簿者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176778_comment'></div>君既与兄元相友爱称天下，而自少卓荦不羁，善辨说，与其兄俱以智略为当世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176778", 1176778, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>大人</span>所器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176778_comment'></div>宝元时，朝廷开方略之选，以招天下异能之士，而陕西大帅范文正公、郑文肃公争以君所为书以荐，于是得召试为太庙斋郎，已而选泰州海陵县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176778_comment'></div>贵人多荐君有大才，可试以事，不宜弃之州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176778_comment'></div>君亦常慨然自许，欲有所为，然终不得一用其智能以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176778_comment'></div>噫，其可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176778_comment'></div>士固有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176778", 1176778, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>离世异俗</span>，独行其意，骂讥笑侮，困辱而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176778_comment'></div>彼皆无众人之求，而有所待于后世者也，其龃龉固宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176778_comment'></div>若夫智谋功名之士，窥时俯仰，以赴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176778", 1176778, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>势物</span>之会，而辄不遇者，乃亦不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176778_comment'></div>辩足以移万物而穷于用说之时，谋足以夺三军而辱于右武之国，此又何说哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176778_comment'></div>嗟乎，彼有所待而不悔者，其知之矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176778_comment'></div>君年五十九，以嘉祐某年某月某甲子葬真州之扬子县甘露乡某所之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176778_comment'></div>夫人李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176778_comment'></div>子男瑰，不仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176778_comment'></div>璋，真州司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176778_comment'></div>琦，太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176778_comment'></div>琳，进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176778_comment'></div>女子五人，已嫁二人，进士周奉先、泰州泰兴县令陶舜元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176778_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176778'>有拔而起之，莫挤而止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176778_comment'></div>呜呼许君，而已于斯，谁或使之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　撰文阐述性命之理。作品：《扬孟》《对难》<div id='poem_1176607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬孟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176607")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176607'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176607'>贤之所以贤，不肖之所以不肖，莫非性也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176607_comment'></div>贤而尊荣寿考，不肖而厄穷死丧，莫非命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176607_comment'></div>论者曰：「人之性善，不肖之所以不肖者，岂性也哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176607_comment'></div>此学乎孟子之言性，而不知孟子之指也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176607_comment'></div>又曰：「人为不为命也，不肖而厄穷死丧，岂命也哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176607_comment'></div>此学乎扬子之言命，而不知扬子之指也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176607_comment'></div>孟子之言性，曰「性善」，扬子之言性，曰「善恶混」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176607_comment'></div>孟子之言命，曰「莫非命也」，扬子之言命，曰「人为不为命也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176607_comment'></div>孟、扬之道未尝不同，二子之说非有异也，此孔子所谓言岂一端而已，各有所当者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176607_comment'></div>孟子之所谓性者，正性也，扬子之所谓性者，兼性之不正者言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176607_comment'></div>扬子之所谓命者，正命也，孟子之所谓命者，兼命之不正者言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176607_comment'></div>夫人之生，莫不有羞恶之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176607_comment'></div>有人于此，羞善行之不修，恶善名之不立，尽力乎善，以充其羞恶之性，则其为贤也孰御哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176607_comment'></div>此得乎性之正者，而孟子之所谓性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176607_comment'></div>有人于此，羞利之不厚，恶利之不多，尽力乎利，以充羞恶之性，则其为不肖也孰御哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176607_comment'></div>此得乎性之不正，而扬子之兼所谓性者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176607_comment'></div>有人于此，才可以贱而贱，罪可以死而死，是人之所自为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176607_comment'></div>此得乎命之不正者，而孟子之兼所谓命者也，有人于此，才可以贵而贱，德可以生而死，是非人之所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176607_comment'></div>此得乎命之正者，而扬子之所谓命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176607_comment'></div>今夫羞利之不厚，恶利之不多，尽力乎利而至乎不肖，则扬子岂以谓人之性而不以罪其人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176607_comment'></div>亦必恶其失性之正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176607_comment'></div>才可以贱而贱，罪可以死而死，则孟子岂以谓人之命而不以罪其人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176607_comment'></div>亦必恶其失命之正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176607_comment'></div>孟子曰：「口之于味也，目之于色也，耳之于声也，鼻之于臭也，四支之于安逸也，性也，有命焉，君子不谓性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176607_comment'></div>仁之于父子也，义之于君臣也，礼之于宾主也，知之于贤者也，圣人之于天道也，命也，有性焉，君子不谓命也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176607_comment'></div>然则孟、扬之说果何异乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176607_comment'></div>今学者是孟子则非扬子，是扬子则非孟子，盖知读其文而不知求其指耳，而曰我知性命之理，诬哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1176607_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对难</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176640")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176640'>予为《扬孟论》以辨言性命者之失，而有难予者曰：「子之言性则诚然矣，至于言命则予以为未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176640_comment'></div>今有人于此，其才当处于天下之至贱，而反处于天下之至贵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176640_comment'></div>其行当得天下之大祸，而反得天下之大福；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176640_comment'></div>其才当处于天下之至贵，而反处于天下之至贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176640_comment'></div>其行当得天下之至福，而反得天下之至祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176640_comment'></div>此则悖于人之所取，而非人力之所及者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176640_comment'></div>于是君子曰，为之者天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176640_comment'></div>所谓命者，盖以谓命之于天云耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176640_comment'></div>昔舜之王天下也，进九官，诛四凶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176640_comment'></div>成王之王天下也，尊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>二伯</span>，诛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>二叔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176640_comment'></div>若九官之进也，以其皆圣贤也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176640_comment'></div>四凶之诛者，以其皆不肖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176640_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>二伯</span>之尊者，亦以其皆圣贤也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176640_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>二叔</span>之诛者，亦以其皆不肖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176640_comment'></div>是则人之所为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176640_comment'></div>使舜为不明，进四凶而诛九官，成王为不明，尊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>二叔</span>而诛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>二伯</span>，则所谓非人力之所及而天之所命者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176640_comment'></div>彼人之所为，可强以为之命哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176640_comment'></div>曰：「圣贤之所以尊进，命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176640_comment'></div>不肖之所以诛，命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176640_comment'></div>昔孔子怀九官、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>二伯</span>之德，困于乱世，脱身于干戈者屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176640_comment'></div>遑遑于天下之诸侯，求有所用，而卒死于旅人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176640_comment'></div>然则九官、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>二伯</span>虽曰圣贤，其尊进者，亦命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176640_comment'></div>盗蹠之罪浮于四凶、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>二叔</span>，竟以寿死，然则四凶、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1176640", 1176640, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>二叔</span>虽曰不肖，其诛者，亦命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176640_comment'></div>是以圣人不言命，教人以尽乎人事而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176640_comment'></div>呜呼，又岂唯贵贱祸福哉，凡人之圣贤不肖，莫非命矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176640_comment'></div>曰：「贵贱祸福皆自外至者，子以谓圣贤之贵而福，不肖之贱而祸，皆有命，则吾既闻之矣，若夫圣贤不肖之所以为圣贤不肖，则在我者也，何以谓之命哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176640_comment'></div>曰：「是诚君子志也，古之好学者之言，未有不若此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176640_comment'></div>然孟子曰：『仁之于父子也、义之于君臣也、礼之于宾主也、知之于贤者也、圣人之于天道也，命也，有性焉，君子不谓命也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176640_comment'></div>由此而言之，则圣贤之所以为圣贤，君子虽不谓之命，而孟子固曰命也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176640_comment'></div>不肖之所以为不肖，何以异于此哉」？</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1176640_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　撰文。作品：《谏官论》<div id='poem_1176602' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176602' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176602?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏官论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176602")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176602_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176602'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176602'>以贤治不肖，以贵治贱，古之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176602_comment'></div>所谓贵者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176602_comment'></div>公、卿、大夫是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176602_comment'></div>所谓贱者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176602_comment'></div>士、庶人是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176602_comment'></div>同是人也，或为公卿，或为士，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176602_comment'></div>为其不能公卿也，故使之为士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176602_comment'></div>为其贤于士也，故使之为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176602_comment'></div>此所谓以贤治不肖，以贵治贱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176602_comment'></div>今之谏官者，天子之所谓士也，其贵则天子之三公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176602_comment'></div>惟三公于安危治乱存亡之故，无所不任其责，至于一官之废，一事之不得，无所不当言，故其位在卿大夫之上，所以贵之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176602_comment'></div>其道德必称其位，所谓以贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176602_comment'></div>至士则不然，修一官而百官之废不可以预也，守一事而百事之失可以毋言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176602_comment'></div>称其德，副其材，而命之以位也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176602_comment'></div>循其名，傃其分，以事其上而不敢过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176602_comment'></div>此君臣之分也，上下之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176602_comment'></div>今命之以士，而责之以三公，士之位而受三公之责，非古之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176602_comment'></div>孔子曰：「必也正名乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176602_comment'></div>正名也者，所以正分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176602_comment'></div>然且为之，非所谓正名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176602_comment'></div>身不能正名，而可以正天下之名者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176602_comment'></div>蚳蛙为士师，孟子曰：「似也，为其可以言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176602_comment'></div>蛙谏于王而不用，致为臣而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176602_comment'></div>孟子曰：「有言责者不得其言则去，有官守者不得其职则去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176602_comment'></div>然则有官守者莫不有言责，有言责者莫不有官守，士师之谏于王是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176602_comment'></div>其谏也，盖以其官而已矣，是古之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176602_comment'></div>古者官师相规，工执艺事以谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176602_comment'></div>其或不能谏，谓之不恭，则有常刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176602_comment'></div>盖自公卿至于百工，各以其职谏，则君孰与为不善？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176602_comment'></div>自公卿至于百工，皆失其职，以阿上之所好，则谏官者，乃天子之所谓士耳，吾未见其能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176602_comment'></div>待之以轻，而要之以重，非所以使臣之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176602_comment'></div>其待己也轻，而取重任焉，非所以事君之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176602_comment'></div>不得已，若唐之太宗庶乎其或可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176602_comment'></div>虽然，有道而知命者，果以为可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176602_comment'></div>未之能处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176602_comment'></div>唐太宗之时，所谓谏官者，与丞弼俱进于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176602_comment'></div>故一言之谬，一事之失，可救之于将然，不使其命已布于天下，然后从而争之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176602_comment'></div>君不失其所以为君，臣不失其所以为臣，其亦庶乎其近古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176602_comment'></div>今也上之所欲为，丞弼所以言于上，皆不得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176602_comment'></div>及其命之已出，然后从而争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176602_comment'></div>上听之而改，则是士制命而君听也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176602_comment'></div>不听而遂行，则是臣不得其言而君耻过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176602_comment'></div>臣不得其言，士制命而君听，二者上下所以相悖而否乱之势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176602_comment'></div>然且为之，其亦不知其道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176602_comment'></div>及其谆谆而不用，然后知道之不行，其亦辨之晚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176602_comment'></div>或曰：「《周官》之师氏、保氏，司徒之属而大夫之秩也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176602_comment'></div>曰：尝闻周公为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176602_comment'></div>而召公为保矣，《周官》则未之学也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1176602_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年1月14日</a>　此日，从仁宗宣德门观灯。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　因张瑰自契丹归，有诗次韵弟安国《喜唐公自契丹归》。作品：《次韵王安国喜唐公自契丹归》<div id='poem_69822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵平甫喜唐公自契丹归<span class='inlineComment2'>（予辞北使而唐公代往）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69822")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69822'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69822'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69822", 69822, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>留犁挠酒</span>得戎心，并袷通欢岁月深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69822'>奉使由来须陆贾，离亲何必强曾参。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69822'>燕人候望空瓯脱，胡马追随出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69822", 69822, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>蹛林</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69822'>万里春风归正好，亦逢佳客想挥金。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69822'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　议南郊三圣并侑颇违经礼，撰劄子。作品：《议南郊三圣并侑劄子》<div id='poem_1176221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议南郊三圣并侑劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176221")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176221'>臣等闻推尊尊以享帝，义之至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176221_comment'></div>推亲亲以享亲，仁之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176221_comment'></div>尊尊不可以渎，故郊无二主；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176221_comment'></div>亲亲不可以僭，故庙止其先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176221_comment'></div>今三后并配，欲以致孝也，而适所以渎乎享帝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176221_comment'></div>后宫有庙，欲以广恩也，而适所以僭乎享亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176221_comment'></div>推存事亡，则非所以宁亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176221_comment'></div>臣等今详议，欲乞各如礼官所议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176221_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年3月</a>　三月，作诗抒故园之思。作品：《季春上旬苑中即事》<div id='poem_69991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69991?labeling=true' target='_blank'>季春上旬苑中即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69991")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69991'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69991'>辇路行看斗柄东，帘垂殿阁转春风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69991'>树林隐翳灯含雾，河汉攲斜月坠空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69991'>新蕊漫知红簌簌，旧山常梦直丛丛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69991'>赏心乐事须年少，老去应无日再中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69991'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69991_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年4月1日</a>　此日，司马光由起居舍人、知制诰兼侍讲改命为天章阁待制。撰制词。作品：《起居舍人直秘阁同修起居注司马光知制诰制》《起居舍人直秘阁同修起居注司马光改天章阁待制制》<div id='poem_1175529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175529?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起居舍人直秘阁同修起居注司马光知制诰制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175529")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175529_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175529'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175529'>敕：先王诰命之文，何其雅驯而奥美！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175529_comment'></div>虽出命非有司之事，而讨论润色，盖有助焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175529_comment'></div>以尔具官某，操行修洁，博知经术，庶乎能以所学施于训辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175529_comment'></div>俾掌赞书，往谐朕志！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175529_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175529_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起居舍人直秘阁同修起居注司马光改天章阁待制制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175530")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175530'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175530'>敕：扬雄曰：「周之士也贵，秦之士也贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175530_comment'></div>周之士也肆，秦之士也拘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175530_comment'></div>盖先王以礼让为国，士之有为有守，得伸其志，而在上不敢以势加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175530_comment'></div>朕率是道，以君多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175530_comment'></div>以尔具官某，文学行治，有称于时，故明试以言，使司告命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175530_comment'></div>而乃固执辞让，至于八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175530_comment'></div>改序厥职，以伸尔志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175530_comment'></div>是亦高选，往其懋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175530_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1175530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年4月26日</a>　此日，杨畋卒。为其文集作序。作品：《新秦集序》<div id='poem_1176577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新秦集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年4月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176577")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176577'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176577'>《新秦集》者，故龙图阁直学士、尚书礼部郎中、知谏院虢略杨公之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176577_comment'></div>公以嘉祐七年四月某日甲子卒官，而外姻开封府推官、尚书度支员外郎中山李寿朋廷老，治其藁为二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176577_comment'></div>公讳畋，字乐道，世家新秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176577_comment'></div>其先人以忠力智谋为将帅，名闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176577_comment'></div>至公，始折节读书，用进士起家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176577_comment'></div>尝提点荆湖北路刑狱，数自击叛蛮有功，得士卒心，故侬智高反时，自丧服中特起之往击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176577_comment'></div>其后为三司副使、天章阁待制、侍读、知制诰，数以言事有直名，故迁龙图阁直学士、知谏院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176577_comment'></div>又数言事，无所顾望，所言有人所不能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176577_comment'></div>故其卒，天子录其忠，赙赐之加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176577_comment'></div>而士大夫知公者，为朝廷惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176577_comment'></div>公所为文，庄厉谨洁，类其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176577_comment'></div>而尤好为诗，其词平易不迫，而能自道其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176577_comment'></div>读其书，咏其诗，视其平生之大节如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176577_comment'></div>嗟乎，盖所谓善人之好学而能言者也！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176577_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年5月</a>　作诗送程师孟出知洪州。作品：《送程公闢之豫章》<div id='poem_70650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70650?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送程公辟守洪州<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作之豫章）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70650")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70650'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70650'>画船插帜摇秋光，鸣铙传<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作伐）</span>鼓水洋洋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70650'>豫章太守吴郡郎，行指斗牛先过乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70650'>怪君三年寓<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作滞）</span>瞿塘，又驱<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_8_70650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70650'>鄙州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_70650", 70650, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　奉诏置局经度国计，寻罢。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年7月19日</a>　此日，赵抃为礼部员外郎兼侍御史知杂事，撰制词。作品：《右司谏赵抃礼部员外郎兼侍御史知杂制》<div id='poem_1175533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175533' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175533'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175533'>敕某：朕置御史以为耳目，非更事久而能自称职，则不以知杂事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175533_comment'></div>以尔尝任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1175533", 1175533, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>言责</span>，有猷有为，行义之修，士人所誉，故迁郎位，使在此官。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追官人著作佐郎沈士龙秘书丞制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175945'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175945'>敕某：尔尝弃其官守而坐废于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175945_comment'></div>今宗祀之恩，吏之免者多复用矣，况如尔之得罪，特以有志于善乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175945_comment'></div>其就故官，以须器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175945_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　纠察在京刑狱，驳开封府当斗鹑少年偿死，而审刑院、大理寺皆以开封府断为是；诏放罪诣合门谢，不肯。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　撰孔道辅墓志铭。作品：《给事中赠尚书工部侍郎孔公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>给事中赠尚书工部侍郎孔公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176741")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176741'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176741'>宋故朝请大夫，给事中、知郓州军州事兼管内河堤劝农、同群牧使、上护军、鲁郡开国侯、食邑一千六百户、食实封二百户，赐紫金鱼袋孔公者，尚书工部侍郎、赠尚书吏部侍郎讳勖之子，兖州曲阜县令、袭封文宣公、赠兵部尚书讳仁玉之孙，兖州泗水县主簿讳光嗣之曾孙，而孔子之四十五世孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176741_comment'></div>其仕当今天子天圣、宝元之间，以刚毅谅直名闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176741_comment'></div>尝知谏院矣，上书请明肃太后归政天子，而廷奏枢密使曹利用、尚御药罗崇勋罪状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176741_comment'></div>当是时，崇勋操权利，与士大夫为市，而利用悍彊不逊，内外惮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176741_comment'></div>尝为御史中丞矣，皇后郭氏废，引谏官、御史伏閤以争，又求见上，皆不许，而固争之，得罪然后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176741_comment'></div>盖公事君之大节如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176741_comment'></div>此其所以名闻天下，而士大夫多以公不终于大位为天下惜者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176741_comment'></div>公讳道辅，字原鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176741_comment'></div>初以进士释褐，补宁州军事推官，年少耳，然断狱议事，已能使老吏惮惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176741_comment'></div>遂迁大理寺丞，知兖州仙源县事，又有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176741_comment'></div>其后尝直史馆，待制龙图阁，判三司理欠凭由司、登闻检院、吏部流内铨，纠察在京刑狱，知许、徐、兖、郓、泰五州，留守南京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176741_comment'></div>而兖、郓、御史中丞皆再至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176741_comment'></div>所至官治，数以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176741", 1176741, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>争职</span>不阿，或绌或迁，而公持一节以终身，盖未尝自诎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176741_comment'></div>其在兖州也，近臣有献诗百篇者，执政请除龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176741_comment'></div>上曰：「是诗虽多，不如孔道辅一言」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176741_comment'></div>乃以公为龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176741_comment'></div>于是人度公为上所思，且不久于外矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176741_comment'></div>未几，果复召，以为中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176741_comment'></div>而宰相使人说公稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176741", 1176741, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>折节</span>以待迁，公乃告以不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176741_comment'></div>于是人又度公且不得久居中，而公果出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176741_comment'></div>初，开封府吏冯士元坐狱，语连大臣数人，故移其狱御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176741_comment'></div>御史劾士元罪止于杖，又多更赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176741_comment'></div>公见上，上固怪士元以小吏与大臣交私，污朝廷，而所坐如此，而执政又以谓公为大臣道地，故出知郓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176741_comment'></div>公以宝元二年如郓，道得疾，以十二月壬申卒于滑州之韦城驿，享年五十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176741_comment'></div>其后诏追复郭皇后位号，而近臣有为上言公明肃太后时事者，上亦记公平生所为，故特赠公尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176741_comment'></div>公夫人金城郡君尚氏，尚书都官员外郎讳宾之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176741_comment'></div>生二男子：曰淘，今为尚书屯田员外郎，曰宗翰，今为太常博士，皆有行治，世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176741_comment'></div>累赠公金紫光禄大夫、尚书兵部侍郎，而以嘉祐七年十月壬寅葬公孔子墓之西南百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176741_comment'></div>公廉于财，乐振施，遇故人子恩厚尤笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176741_comment'></div>而尤不好鬼神<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176741", 1176741, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>禨祥</span>事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176741_comment'></div>在宁州，道士治真武像，有蛇穿其前，数出近人，人传以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176741_comment'></div>州将欲视验以闻，故率其属往拜之，而蛇果出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176741_comment'></div>公即举笏击蛇杀之，自州将以下皆大惊，已而又皆大服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176741_comment'></div>公由此始知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176741_comment'></div>然余观公数处朝廷大议，视祸福无所择，其智勇有过人者，胜一蛇之妖，何足道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176741_comment'></div>世多以此称公者，故余亦不得而略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176741_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1176741'>展也孔公，维志之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176741_comment'></div>行有险夷，不改其辀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176741_comment'></div>权彊所忌，谗谄所雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176741_comment'></div>考终厥位，宠禄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176741", 1176741, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>优优</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176741_comment'></div>维皇好直，是锡公休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176741_comment'></div>序行纳铭，为识诸幽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1176741_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　撰马知节神道碑。作品：《检校太尉赠侍中正惠马公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>检校太尉赠侍中正惠马公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176721")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176721'>推忠保顺同德翊戴功臣、彰德军节度观察留后、特进、检校太尉、使持节相州刺史、兼御史大夫，上柱国，扶风郡开国公，食邑六千六百户，食实封二千二百户，谥曰正惠马公，以天禧三年十月戊戌，葬开封祥符县某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176721_comment'></div>至嘉祐七年，公孙庆崇始来请铭，以作公碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176721_comment'></div>序曰：马氏故扶风人，至公高祖而徙处云中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176721_comment'></div>赠太师讳某者，于公为曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176721_comment'></div>赠太师、中书令讳某者，于公为祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176721_comment'></div>龙捷左厢都指挥使、江州防御使、赠太师、中书令、尚书令蔡公，讳某者，于公为父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176721_comment'></div>蔡公从太祖定天下，力战有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176721_comment'></div>当是时，云中已为契丹所得，故马氏又徙处浚仪，今开封府祥符也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176721_comment'></div>公讳某，字子元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176721_comment'></div>蔡公之终也，年七岁，太祖召见禁中，有司言例当补殿直，诏特授西头供奉官，而赐以名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176721_comment'></div>开宝五年，年十八，监彭州兵马，以严饬见惮如老将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176721_comment'></div>太平兴国三年，领兵戍秦州清水，奸人李飞雄乘驿称诏捕公及秦陇巡检刘文裕等，将系之秦州，因盗库兵以反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176721_comment'></div>公辨其诈，与文裕执飞雄治杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176721_comment'></div>五年，监潭州兵马，改东头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176721_comment'></div>雍熙二年，又监博州兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176721_comment'></div>刘延让败于君子驿，而契丹归矣，公方料丁壮，集刍粮，缮城治械如寇至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176721_comment'></div>吏民初不悦其生事也，已而契丹果至，度不可攻，乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176721_comment'></div>四年，改西京作坊副使，将屯于冀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176721_comment'></div>端拱元年，移知定远军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176721_comment'></div>时议发河南十三州之民转饟河北，公告转运使樊知古，此军聚兵少而积粟多，簸其腐尚可得十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176721_comment'></div>知古用此得粟五十万斛，以罢河南之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176721_comment'></div>事闻朝廷，太宗嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176721_comment'></div>二年，深州新蹂于契丹，城郭庐舍多坏而流民众，乃移公知深州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176721_comment'></div>公至数月，则坏者完，流者复，举州忘其寇戎之故而以公为能抚我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176721_comment'></div>会保州不治，移往代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176721_comment'></div>淳化二年，又移知庆州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176721_comment'></div>羌万人以怨程德元来寇，公诱其渠帅，谕以威信，即皆引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176721_comment'></div>四年，迁西京作坊使知梓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176721_comment'></div>五年，李顺为乱于蜀之西川，以公往讨，又以为先锋，平剑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176721_comment'></div>召还，至三泉，而复以公与王继恩讨贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176721_comment'></div>继恩怒公抗直，使守彭州，尽收其军，而与之羸卒三百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176721_comment'></div>贼率其众至，号十万，公力战一日，亡其卒大半，乃夜独出，招救兵复入，贼终不能得城而以败去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176721_comment'></div>除成都府兵马钤辖，迁洛苑使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176721_comment'></div>五年，除蜀、汉九州都巡检使，已而又兼成都府兵马钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176721_comment'></div>真宗即位，改内苑使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176721_comment'></div>蜀卒刘旰聚党数千人为乱，所攻数州，至辄取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176721_comment'></div>公以卒三百，追至蜀州，与战，旰走邛州，而招安使上官正召公归成都计事，公为正画曰：「贼破邛州，必乘胜劫掠，度江薄我，既息而战，我军虽倍，未易敌也，不如迎其弊急击，破之必矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176721_comment'></div>遂行，次方井，与正合，杀旰等无噍类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176721_comment'></div>真宗赐书奖谕，赏以锦袍金带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176721_comment'></div>咸平元年，加澄州刺史，知秦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176721_comment'></div>诸羌质子，有三十年不释者，公悉归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176721_comment'></div>诸羌德公，讫公去，无一人犯塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176721_comment'></div>小泉银坑久不发，掌吏尽产以偿岁课，而责之不已，公奏得释，而归其产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176721_comment'></div>四年，就除西上閤门使，知成都府，兼本州兵马钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176721_comment'></div>有告龙骑士谋为变者，所引以千数，公捕杀其首七人，而置其馀无所问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176721_comment'></div>自乾德后，岁漕蜀物，以富人为送吏，多坐漂失籍其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176721_comment'></div>公奏择三班使臣及三司军大将代之，而课其漕事为赏罚，至今便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176721_comment'></div>六年，移鄜延路驻泊兵马都总管，兼知延州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176721_comment'></div>蜀人于公去，皆环以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176721_comment'></div>公至延州，羌方以兵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1176721", 1176721, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>觑边</span>，会上元，开门张灯，视以无为，而羌卒不能为寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176721_comment'></div>又移知镇州，兼本州兵马都总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176721_comment'></div>景德元年，契丹入边，民入保城，公与之约：「盗一钱者死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176721_comment'></div>有盗钱二百者，公即杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176721_comment'></div>于是，自澶以北，城郭皆昼闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176721_comment'></div>诏使过，公辄留之，而募人间行送诏，皆得其报以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176721_comment'></div>又以便宜使所至受诸漕挽给边之物，故契丹欲虏掠，无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176721_comment'></div>车驾次澶州，大将王超提卒数十万，逗留不赴，公屡辄之不为动，移书谯让，乃始出师，犹辞以中渡无桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176721_comment'></div>则公先已度材，一夕而桥就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176721_comment'></div>上闻，手诏褒之，且知公果可以属大事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176721_comment'></div>二年，移知定州，又除东上閤门使，枢密院都承旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176721_comment'></div>三年，遂以检校太保签书枢密院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176721_comment'></div>祥符元年，东封泰山，以为行宫都总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176721_comment'></div>自此行幸必以公为都总管，而皆许之专杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176721_comment'></div>公部分明，约束审，出入肃然，而未尝辄戮一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176721_comment'></div>于是边将言契丹近塞，大臣议皆请发兵以备，公独议使边将移书问状，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176721_comment'></div>契丹解去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176721_comment'></div>迁检校太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176721_comment'></div>四年，加宣徽北院使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176721_comment'></div>五年，除枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176721_comment'></div>当是时，契丹已盟，中国无为，大臣方言符瑞，而公每不然之，独常从容极言天下虽安不可忘战去兵之意，及它争议甚众，真宗多以公言为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176721_comment'></div>七年，除颍州防御使，知潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176721_comment'></div>州之税赋，常移以输边，公为论其害，自是所输不过邻州而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176721_comment'></div>天禧元年，移知大名府，兼驻泊兵马都总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176721_comment'></div>使中贵人劳问，赐白金二千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176721_comment'></div>居顷之，遂以为宣徽南院使、知枢密院事、检校太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176721_comment'></div>有足疾，时诏内朝别为一班，免其蹈舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176721_comment'></div>二年，疾病赐告，求去位，真宗不许，而数使中贵人劳问，又幸其第，赐白金三千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176721_comment'></div>已而度公实病，不可强以事，乃罢以为彰德军节度观察留后，而公固求外镇，终不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176721_comment'></div>居久之，稍间入谒，真宗辄使閤门祗候二人伺公，至即扶以入，因掖其拜起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176721_comment'></div>数屏左右问事，常听用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176721_comment'></div>三年，又求外镇，乃以公知贝州，兼本州兵马都总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176721_comment'></div>将行矣，召见，又将付以政，固辞谢，久之乃已，而更以公为本镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176721_comment'></div>至五月，公疾作，诏使公子洵美将太医往视，而魏、潞二镇之人，亦皆奔走来问，为公请祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176721_comment'></div>已而公疾革，真宗又使公弟之子成美驰驿召公归京师，而公以八月壬寅不起矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176721_comment'></div>享年六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176721_comment'></div>真宗为之震悼，罢朝，诏赠侍中，录其子孙，赙赐皆加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176721_comment'></div>公前夫人丁氏，某郡君，后夫人沈氏，某郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176721_comment'></div>子男二人，洵美终西京作坊使、英州刺史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176721_comment'></div>之美终内殿承制、閤门祗候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176721_comment'></div>孙十六人，其十四人皆已卒，而庆宗今为右班殿直，庆崇今为文思院、知恩州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176721_comment'></div>公少忼慨，以武力智谋自喜，又能好书，宾友儒者，所与善必一时豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176721_comment'></div>有集二十卷，其文长于议论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176721_comment'></div>自始仕以至登用，遇事謇謇，未尝有所顾惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176721_comment'></div>王冀公、丁晋公用事，每廷议，得其不直，辄面诋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176721_comment'></div>真宗初或甚忤，然终以此知公，而天下至今称其正直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176721_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_1176721'>在浚西南，谁封谁树？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176721_comment'></div>有宋正惠，马公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176721_comment'></div>公当太宗、真宗之时，暨暨谔谔，谋行计施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176721_comment'></div>以羸击强，以少捕众，以贱抗贵，维公之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176721_comment'></div>虽贵虽众，虽强必克，维公之敏，亦维公直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176721_comment'></div>帝曰：「直哉，汝予良弼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176721_comment'></div>见国而已，不知家室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176721_comment'></div>内朝十年，典掌机密，暨予一心，纲纪庶物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176721_comment'></div>元功宗谋，莫汝敢匹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176721_comment'></div>公曰：「孤臣，绝旷于荣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176721_comment'></div>谗说不用，是维帝明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176721_comment'></div>士或困穷，莫知其有，既荣以位，正或见丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176721_comment'></div>公于可愿，两得其尤，不讫大耄，天为不谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176721_comment'></div>德歉于年，孰云耇老？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176721_comment'></div>有赉后世，公为寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176721_comment'></div>刻趺篆首，作此铭诗，陈之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1176721", 1176721, "Clauses/379/Comments/0")'>隧道</span>，永矣其诒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1176721_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年10月24日</a>　此日，徙同勾当三班院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年11月26日</a>　此日，李玮改安州观察使。撰制词。作品：《建州管内观察使李玮安州管内观察使制》<div id='poem_1175953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建州管内观察使李玮安州管内观察使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年11月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175953")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175953'>敕：釐事既成，庆流宇内，简于朕志，当有异恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175953_comment'></div>具官某，以元舅之家，膺下嫁之选，饬身厉行，休显有称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175953_comment'></div>尝坐谴何，外更藩屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175953_comment'></div>付之旧节，使得造朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175953_comment'></div>往服宠荣，愈其慎毖！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175953_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1175953_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　作诗送元绛出知福州。作品：《送元厚之待制知福州》<div id='poem_70621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元厚之待制知福州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70621")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70621_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70621'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70621'>海隅山谷閒，人物最多处。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70621'>平旦息相吹，连城黕如雾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70621'>闽王旧宫室，丹漆美无度。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70621'>今为大帅府，千里来赴愬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70621'>元侯文章翁，更以吏能著。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70621'>峨峨中天阁，鸣玉新改步。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70621'>衔诏出梨岭，方为远人慕。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70621'>旌旗满流水，冠盖东门驻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70621'>四坐共咨嗟，疑侯不当去。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70621'>张仲称孝友，樊侯正求助。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70621'>名城虽云乐，行矣未宜遽。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70621'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_70621_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月</a>　十二月，为陈世范之父撰神道碑。作品：《司农卿分司南京陈公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司农卿分司南京陈公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176724")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176724'>司农卿分司南京陈公，既以嘉祐七年九月某甲子葬开封府之祥符县西韩村皇考魏公之茔，至十二月，公子世范等乃来求铭，以作公碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176724_comment'></div>盖公昆弟皆从先人游，而某又尝得识公父子，故为序其实而系以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176724_comment'></div>序曰：公讳某，字良器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176724_comment'></div>以赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、卫国公讳嵩者为曾祖，以赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、燕国公讳光嗣者为祖，而尚书左丞、集贤院学士讳恕之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176724_comment'></div>左丞当真宗时参知政事，后以其子岐公之贵，而赠至太师、尚书令兼中书令、魏国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176724_comment'></div>公，岐公之弟也，而于魏公为少子，年六十八，以嘉祐七年六月得疾分司，而以乙巳弃世于陈州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176724_comment'></div>阶至朝散大夫，勋至上柱国，爵至颍川郡开国子，食邑至六百户，赐紫金鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176724_comment'></div>官终于司农卿，而所更者：秘书省正字，太常寺太祝，大理评事，光禄、大理寺丞，太子中舍，殿中丞，国子博士，尚书虞部比部驾部员外郎、郎中，司农、光禄少卿，少府监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176724_comment'></div>任终于知陈州，而所历者：监楚州、衡州酒税，知衢州江山县，知南恩州，通判江、扬、洪、庐、潭州，知衡州，监江宁府粮料院，知兴化军，知均州，判登闻鼓院，知曹州，判殿中省，知郢州、郑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176724_comment'></div>其通判扬州、庐州，皆有所避不赴，知郢州则未赴而徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176724_comment'></div>凡仕四十三年，盖其行事可记者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176724_comment'></div>而公子所能记者，在江州，人大饥且疫，公为具饘粥医药，不足则取庐山诸佛寺馀财以续之，所活以万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176724_comment'></div>有盗刈人之禾而伤其主者，当死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176724_comment'></div>公曰：「古之荒政所以恤人者尽矣，然尚缓刑，况今哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176724_comment'></div>即奏贷其死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176724_comment'></div>洪州大水，城之不灭者十五，水得城窦以入，举城惶扰，不知所为，公豫具薪稿，不终日以塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176724_comment'></div>州人德之曰：「无陈公，吾属如何矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176724_comment'></div>衡州之南，山广袤百馀里，与夷接境，大木蒙密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176724_comment'></div>中国人逋逃其中，冒称夷人，数出寇常宁诸邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176724_comment'></div>其酋有挟左道者，人传以为能致风雨，官军尤惮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176724_comment'></div>公诱以恩信，则率众数百来自占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176724_comment'></div>已而与其甥亡去，又将为寇，州人皆恐，公设方略，以一日捕得杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176724_comment'></div>天子赐诏书奖谕，公因图上山川形势攻取之策，以为「贼今不除，党附日众，夷人谓中国无能为，必出助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176724_comment'></div>可须农隙发千人，使操斧斤，随以强弩，斩木除道，则贼失所恃，不攻而自穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176724_comment'></div>又出其材，可以佐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176724", 1176724, "Clauses/112/Comments/1")'>经用</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176724_comment'></div>奏未报，转运使害其事，劾公擅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1176724", 1176724, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>击断</span>，不听用佐吏，又尝称病，不自祭炎帝，公坐此罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176724_comment'></div>州人乞留不得，而贼果侵寻不制，朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176724", 1176724, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>出使</span>，发兵击之，数年然后定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176724_comment'></div>兴化多进士，就乡举者常八九百人，而学舍弊小无文籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176724_comment'></div>公至则新而大之，为之购书，而国子之所有者皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176724_comment'></div>均州汉上舟子，数溺商旅取货财，而以险为解，公捕案置法，因取近滩数家除其徭，使表水险，涉者因此得不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176724_comment'></div>曹州多盗，亡命之尤凶强者七十馀人，公集重购，得之几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176724_comment'></div>又修律令五家为保之法，故盗往往逃去之它境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176724_comment'></div>盖公施于政者能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176724_comment'></div>公尝为书十二篇上之，曰《国政要事》，其说多听用，而中书欲迁职事以奖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176724_comment'></div>公乃自言：「外祖王氏葬扬州，无主后，愿除淮南所当得之一官，以往视其丘墓而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176724_comment'></div>岐公之葬也，天子自曹州召公归襄事，特诏许公升殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176724_comment'></div>公谢岐公遭遇始终恩礼之厚，因乞御篆岐公之碑首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176724_comment'></div>上为动容，赐其首曰「褒忠之碑」，而公终无一言自及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176724_comment'></div>既分司，无田园，僦官屋以居，自为棺歛葬埋之制，趣于俭而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176724_comment'></div>少长好书，以至于老，于篆籀尤善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176724_comment'></div>有集二十卷，其文能世其家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176724_comment'></div>夫人冯氏，江南李氏时宰相延己之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176724_comment'></div>子男五人：世范，前商州洛南县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176724_comment'></div>世安，前广州新会县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176724_comment'></div>世修，大理寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176724_comment'></div>世永，将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176724_comment'></div>世弈，太常寺太祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176724_comment'></div>女四人：长适大理评事柳安期，次适右班殿直王允懿，次尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176724_comment'></div>陈氏，汉太丘长讳寔之后，故其望在颍川，而世居洪州之南昌县，当唐末五代之乱无仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176724_comment'></div>魏公布衣起闾巷，明敏谅直称天下，仍父子执国柄，而至岐公尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176724_comment'></div>公于仕尝龃龉，然尚至九卿，以荣禄自终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176724_comment'></div>盖太丘之仁，隐阨于一时，而纪、谌、群、泰贵显者数世，岂魏公之先，遭世不治，亦有潜德晦行如太丘者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176724_comment'></div>不然，何其后世之兴如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176724_comment'></div>是故不可以无铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176724_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1176724'>虞宾夏商，其后为陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176724_comment'></div>屡绝复封，以承圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176724_comment'></div>至汉太丘，弃时就德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176724_comment'></div>诒禄魏、晋，子孙世食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176724_comment'></div>既又困穷，乃生魏公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176724_comment'></div>魏公之出，魁名硕实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176724_comment'></div>有公有卿，馈祀其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176724_comment'></div>公则盛矣，天子所思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176724_comment'></div>绳绳维卿，亦显于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176724_comment'></div>治官牧民，入出具宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176724_comment'></div>胡公之虚，太丘之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176724_comment'></div>两有州国，绍荣本始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176724_comment'></div>归葬浚郊，皇考在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176724_comment'></div>峙此铭诗，为告新阡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1176724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　撰章友直墓志铭。作品：《建安章君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建安章君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176744")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176744'>君讳友直，姓章氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176744_comment'></div>少则卓越，自放不羁，不肯求选举，然有高节大度过人之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176744_comment'></div>其族人郇公为宰相，欲奏而官之，非其好，不就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176744_comment'></div>自江淮之上、海岭之间以至京师，无不游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176744_comment'></div>将相大人豪杰之士，以至闾巷庸人小子，皆与之交际，未尝有所忤，亦莫不得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176744_comment'></div>卒然以是非利害加之，而莫能知其喜愠，视其心若不知富贵贫贱之可以择而取也，颓然而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176744_comment'></div>昔列御寇、庄周当文、武末世，哀天下之士沈于得丧，陷于毁誉，离性命之情，而自托于人伪，以争须臾之欲，故其所称述，多所谓天之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176744_comment'></div>若君者，似之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176744_comment'></div>君读书通大指，尤善于相人，然讳其术，不多为人道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176744_comment'></div>知音乐、书画、弈棋，皆以知名于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176744_comment'></div>皇祐中，近臣言君文章善篆，有旨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176744", 1176744, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>召试</span>，君辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176744_comment'></div>于是太学篆石经，又言君善篆，与李斯、阳冰相上下，又召君，君即往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176744_comment'></div>经成，除试将作监主簿，不就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176744_comment'></div>嘉祐七年十一月甲子，以疾卒于京师，年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176744_comment'></div>娶辛氏，生二男，存、孺，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176744_comment'></div>五女子，其长嫁常州晋陵县主簿侍其璹，早卒，又娶其中女，次适歙州祁门县令黄元，二人未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176744_comment'></div>君家建安者五世矣，其先则豫章人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176744_comment'></div>君曾祖考讳某，仕江南李氏，为建州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176744_comment'></div>祖考讳某，皇著作佐郎，赠工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176744_comment'></div>考讳某，京兆府节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176744_comment'></div>君以某年某月某甲子葬润州丹阳县金山之东园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176744_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176744'>弗缋弗彫，弗跂以为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176744_comment'></div>俯以狎于野，仰以游于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176744_comment'></div>中则有实，视铭其昭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176744_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月23日</a>　此日，赴天章阁观御书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月27日</a>　此日，于天章阁观瑞物，复入宴群玉殿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　契嵩游京师，与之游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　是年，辞制诰润笔不受。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　官浸显，俸禄入门，任诸弟取去，尽不问。吴夫人为買妾，拒之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　与司马光、韩维、吕公著友善，常相过从，时人目为“嘉祐四友”。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　是年，与开封府推官张洞唱酬。作品：《次韵酬府推仲通学士雪中见寄》《次韵张仲通水轩》<div id='poem_69895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵酬府推仲通学士雪中见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69895")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69895'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69895'>朝来看雪咏君诗，想见朱衣在赤墀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69895'>为问火城将策试，何如云屋听窗知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69895'>曲墙稍觉吹来密，穷巷终怜扫去迟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69895'>欲访故人非兴尽，自缘无路得传卮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69895'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69895_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_69284_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　是年，与吴中复唱酬。作品：《和仲庶池州齐山画图》《酬吴仲庶小园之句》<div id='poem_69840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和吴仲庶池州齐山画图<span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69840'>省中何忽有崔嵬，六幅生绡坐上开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69840'>指点便知岩石<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作穴）</span>处，登临新作使君来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69840'>雅怀重向丹青得，胜势兼随翰墨回。<div id='poem_content_70235'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70235'>旧年台榭扫流尘，职闭朱门岁又新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70235'>花影隙中看袅袅，车音墙外去<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作听）</span>辚辚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70235'>相逢岂少<span
