id='poem_sentence_3_70235'>祇向东风邀载酒，定知无奈帝城春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70235'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70235_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　与韩缜比邻而居，两家子弟唱和相属。作品：《始与韩玉汝相近居遂相与游今日复相近而两家子唱和诗相属因有此作》<div id='poem_69989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>始与韩玉汝相近居遂相与游今居复相近而两家子唱和诗相属因有此作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69989")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69989'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69989'>羁旅儿童得近邻，相知邂逅即情亲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69989'>当时岂意两家子，此地更为同社人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69989'>勋业弹冠知白首，文章投笔让青春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69989'>万金虽愧君多产，比我渊明亦未贫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69989'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69989_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　是年，作诗挽王向。作品：《王子直挽辞》<div id='poem_69753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王子直挽辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_69753'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69753'>多才自合至公卿，岂料青衫困一生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69753'>太史有书能叙事，子云于世不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69753", 69753, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>徼名</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69753'>丘坟惨淡箕山绿，门巷萧条颍水清。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69753'>握手笑言如昨日，白头东望一伤情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69753'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　作诗以送刘攽之官秦州清水。作品：《送刘贡父赴秦州清水》<div id='poem_70058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70058' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘贡父赴秦州清水</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70058")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70058_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70058'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70058'>刘郎高论坐嘘枯，幕府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70058", 70058, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>调胹</span>用绪馀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70058'>笔下能当万人敌，腹中尝记五车书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70058'>闻多望士登天禄，知有名臣荐子虚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70058'>且复弦歌穷塞上，祇应非晚召相如。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70058'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　识林積，誌其能。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　撰孔旼墓志铭。作品：《孔处士墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孔处士墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176802")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176802_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176802'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176802'>先生讳旼，字宁极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176802_comment'></div>睦州桐庐县尉讳询之曾孙，赠国子博士讳延滔之孙，尚书都官员外郎讳昭亮之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176802_comment'></div>自都官而上，至孔子四十五世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176802_comment'></div>先生尝欲举进士，已而悔曰：「吾岂有不得已于此邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176802_comment'></div>遂居于汝州之龙兴山，而上葬其亲于汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176802_comment'></div>汝人争讼之不可平者，不听有司而听先生之一言，不羞犯有司之刑，而以不得于先生为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176802_comment'></div>庆历七年，诏求天下行义之士，而守臣以先生应诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176802_comment'></div>于是朝廷赐之米帛，又敕州县除其杂赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176802_comment'></div>嘉祐三年，近臣多言先生有道德可用，而执政度以为不肯屈，除守秘书省校书郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176802_comment'></div>四年，近臣又多以为言，乃召以为国子监直讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176802_comment'></div>先生辞，乃除守光禄寺丞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176802_comment'></div>五年，大臣有请先生为其属县者，于是天子以知汝州龙兴县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176802_comment'></div>先生又辞，辞未听，而六月某日，先生终于家，年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176802_comment'></div>大臣有为之请命者，乃特赠太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176802_comment'></div>至七年月日，弟㬙葬先生于尧山都官之兆，而以夫人李氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176802_comment'></div>李氏故大理评事昌符之女，生一女，嫁为士人妻，而先物故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176802_comment'></div>先生事父母至孝，居丧如礼，遇人恂恂，虽仆奴不忍以辞气加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176802_comment'></div>衣食与田桑有馀，辄以赒其乡里，贷而后不能偿者，未尝问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176802_comment'></div>未尝疑人，人亦以故不忍欺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176802_comment'></div>而世之传先生者多异，学士大夫有知而能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176802_comment'></div>盖先生孝弟忠信，无求于世，足以使其乡人畏服之如此，而先生未尝为异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176802_comment'></div>先生博学，尤喜《易》，未尝著书，独《大衍》一篇传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176802_comment'></div>考其行治，非有得于内，其孰能致此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176802_comment'></div>当汉之东徙，高守节之士，而亦以故成俗，故当世处士之闻，独多于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176802_comment'></div>乃至于今，知名为贤而处者，盖亦无有几人，岂世之所不尚，遂湮没而无闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176802_comment'></div>抑士之趋操，亦有待于世邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176802_comment'></div>若先生，固不为有待于世，而卓然自见于时，岂非所谓豪杰之士者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176802_comment'></div>其可铭也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176802_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1176802'>有入而不出，以身易物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176802_comment'></div>有往而不反，以私其佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176802_comment'></div>呜呼先生，好絜而无尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176802_comment'></div>匪佚之为私，维志之求。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1176802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　王伯起至京从学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　撰文。作品：《读孟尝君传》<div id='poem_1176587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176587?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读孟尝君传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176587")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176587_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176587'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176587'>世皆称孟尝君能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176587", 1176587, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>得士</span>，士以故归之，而卒赖其力以脱于虎豹之秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176587_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176587_comment'></div>孟尝君特鸡鸣狗盗之雄耳，岂足以言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176587", 1176587, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>得士</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176587_comment'></div>不然，擅齐之强，得一士焉，宜可以南面而制秦，尚何取鸡鸣狗盗之力哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176587_comment'></div>夫鸡鸣狗盗之出其门，此士之所以不至也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176587'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷七一。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷一三○，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷一九七，《历代名贤确论》卷二九，《崇古文诀》卷二○，《古文真宝》后集卷七，《事文类聚翰墨大全》甲集卷一，《文章轨范》卷五，《文章类选》卷三八，《名世文宗》卷二三，《文翰类选大成》卷一六一，《文编》卷四○，嘉靖《青州府志》卷一八等。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176587_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年1月7日</a>　此日，与范缜、司马光同知贡举。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年2月</a>　二月，撰程琳妻墓志铭。作品：《楚国太夫人陈氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚国太夫人陈氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176824")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176824'>夫人陈氏，故镇安军节度使、检校太师、同中书门下平章事、赠太师、中书令兼尚书令、定国文简程公讳琳之妻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176824_comment'></div>陈氏世家寿春，其先颍川人，汉太丘长寔之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176824_comment'></div>夫人曾皇考讳，左班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176824_comment'></div>皇祖考讳诲，皇考讳京，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176824_comment'></div>而皇考爱贤夫人，不欲以妻乡邑，乃徙居京师，择所居，得定公以嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176824_comment'></div>当是，夫人年十九，定公尚为进士，其后公至将相，终于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176824_comment'></div>夫人用公自临颍县君九封而为卫国夫人，用公子加号陈国夫人，再封而得楚国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176824_comment'></div>庄而仁，俭而礼，上承下御，无不得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176824_comment'></div>故在父母家为淑女，既嫁为令妻，其卒有子为贤母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176824_comment'></div>公薨六年，当嘉祐七年，夫人年七十一，以十一月戊午薨于开封武成坊之第室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176824_comment'></div>至明年二月甲申，而公子以夫人祔于河南伊阙县神阴乡定公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176824_comment'></div>于是，公子四人，嗣隆为尚书屯田员外郎，嗣弼为国子博士，嗣恭为尚书屯田员外郎，嗣先为大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176824_comment'></div>女子五人，公婿荣諲为尚书刑部郎中，韩缜为侍御史，晁仲绰为尚书屯田郎中，潘士龙为殿中丞，王称为试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176824_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1176824'>程公克壮，万夫所向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176824_comment'></div>奋功发名，乃取将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176824_comment'></div>云谁公配，妫姓氏陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176824_comment'></div>文武自出，太姬之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176824_comment'></div>归佐休显，自公初屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176824_comment'></div>序历爵邑，为君夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176824_comment'></div>公既树纛，以相为伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176824_comment'></div>帝曰哿矣，夫人好德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176824_comment'></div>能劝其夫，使有嘉绩，往以朕命，赐封大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176824_comment'></div>出书五色，玳首金葩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176824_comment'></div>褒之重锦，来告于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176824_comment'></div>有豫不怠，有盈不侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176824_comment'></div>致好内外，具宜福履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176824_comment'></div>侔仁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176824", 1176824, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>鸤鸠</span>，以母诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176824_comment'></div>岁时振振，为寿在廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176824_comment'></div>手笏腰章，亦有公甥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176824_comment'></div>维子之才，而甥又献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176824_comment'></div>维贵维富，而兼寿善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176824_comment'></div>嗟此婉娩，考终得愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176824_comment'></div>作诗并藏，为识新竁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1176824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年2月13日</a>　此日，田況卒。草制。作品：《太子少傅致仕田況遗表男守秘校至安太常寺太祝制》<div id='poem_1175753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太子少傅致仕田况遗表男守秘校至安太常寺太祝制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年2月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175753")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175753'>敕某：俊哲之辅，有劳于时，福禄既成，而尔嗣厥后，于其将死，以尔为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175753_comment'></div>膺此宠章，宜知勉矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175753_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1175753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年2月13日</a>　此日，田況卒。为撰墓志铭。作品：《太子太傅致仕田公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太子太傅致仕田公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176740")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176740'>田氏故京兆人，后迁信都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176740_comment'></div>晋乱，公皇祖太傅入于契丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176740_comment'></div>景德初，契丹寇澶州，略得数百人，以属皇考太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176740_comment'></div>太师哀怜之，悉纵去，因自脱归中国，天子以为廷臣，积官至太子率府率以终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176740_comment'></div>为人沉悍笃实，不茍为笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176740_comment'></div>生八男子，多知名，而公为长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176740_comment'></div>公少卓荦有大志，好读书，书未尝去手，无所不读，盖亦无所不记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176740_comment'></div>其为文章，得纸笔立成，而闳博<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>辨丽</span>称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176740_comment'></div>初举进士，赐同学究出身，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176740_comment'></div>后数年，遂中甲科，补江宁府观察推官，以母英国太夫人丧，罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176740_comment'></div>除丧，补楚州团练判官，用举者监转般仓，迁秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176740_comment'></div>又对贤良方正策为第一，迁太常丞，通判江宁府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176740_comment'></div>数上书言事，召还，将以为谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176740_comment'></div>方是时，赵元昊反，夏英公、范文正公经略陕西，言：「臣等才力薄，使事恐不能独办，请得田某自佐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176740_comment'></div>以公为其判官，直集贤院，参都总管军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176740_comment'></div>自真宗弭兵，至是且四十年，诸老将尽死，为吏者不知兵法，师数陷败，士民震恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176740_comment'></div>二公随事镇抚，其为世所善，多公计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176740_comment'></div>大将有欲悉数路兵出击贼者，朝廷许之矣，公极言其不可，乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176740_comment'></div>又言所以治边者十四事，多听用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176740_comment'></div>还为右正言，判三司理欠、凭由司，权修起居注，遂知制诰，判国子监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176740_comment'></div>于是陕西用兵未已，人大困，以公副今宰相、枢密副使韩公宣抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176740_comment'></div>自宣抚归，判三班院，而河北告兵食阙，又以公往视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176740_comment'></div>而保州兵士杀通判，闭城为乱，又以公为龙图阁直学士、知成德军、真定府、定州安抚使，往执杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176740_comment'></div>论功迁起居舍人，又移秦凤路都总管、经略安抚使，知秦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176740_comment'></div>遭太师丧，辞起复者久之，上使中贵人手敕趣公，公不得已，则乞归葬然后起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176740_comment'></div>既葬，托边事求见上，曰：「陛下以孝治天下，方边鄙无事，朝廷不为无人，而区区犬马之心，尚不得自从，臣即死知不暝矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176740_comment'></div>因泫然泣数行下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176740_comment'></div>上视其貌甚瘠，又闻其言，悲之，乃听终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176740_comment'></div>盖帅臣得终丧，自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176740_comment'></div>服除，以枢密直学士为泾原路兵马都总管、经略安抚使，知渭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176740_comment'></div>遂自尚书礼部郎中迁右谏议大夫，知成都府，充蜀、梓、利、夔路兵马钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176740_comment'></div>西南夷侵边，公严兵惮之，而诱以恩信，即皆稽颡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176740_comment'></div>蜀自王均、李顺再乱，遂号为易动，往者得便宜决事，而多擅杀以为威，至虽小罪，犹并妻子迁出之蜀，流离颠顿，有以故死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176740_comment'></div>公拊循教诲，儿女子畜其人，至有甚恶，然后绳以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176740_comment'></div>蜀人爱公，以继张忠定，而谓公所断治为未尝有误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176740_comment'></div>岁大凶，宽赋减徭，发廪以救之，而无饿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176740_comment'></div>事闻，赐书奖谕，迁给事中，以守御史中丞充理检使召焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176740_comment'></div>未至，以为枢密直学士、权三司使，既而又以为龙图阁学士、翰林学士，又迁尚书礼部侍郎，正其使号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176740_comment'></div>自景德会计，至公始复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>钩考</span>财赋，尽知其出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176740_comment'></div>于是入多景德矣，岁所出乃或多于入，公以谓：「厚敛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/153/Comments/1")'>疾费</span>如此，不可以持久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176740_comment'></div>然欲有所扫除变更，兴起法度，使百姓得完其蓄积而县官亦以有馀，在上与执政所为，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/159/Comments/1")'>主计</span>者不能独任也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176740_comment'></div>故为《皇祐会计录》上之，论其故，冀以寤上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176740_comment'></div>上固恃公，欲以为大臣，居顷之，遂以为枢密副使，又以检校太傅充枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176740_comment'></div>公自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>常选</span>，数年遂任事于时，及在枢密为之使，又超其正，天下皆以为宜，顾尚有恨公得之晚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176740_comment'></div>公行内修，于诸弟尤笃，为人宽厚长者，与人语款款若恐不得当其意，至其有所守，人亦不能移也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176740_comment'></div>自江宁归，宰相私使人招之，公谢不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176740_comment'></div>及为谏官，于小事近功有所不言，独常从容为上言为治大方而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176740_comment'></div>范文正公等皆士大夫所望以为公卿，而其位未副，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/188/Comments/0")'>得间</span>，辄为上言之，故文正公等未几皆见用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176740_comment'></div>当是时，上数以天下事责大臣，慨然欲有所为，盖其志多自公发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176740_comment'></div>公所设施，事趣可，功期成，因能任善，不必己出，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>独行</span>异言，以峙声名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176740_comment'></div>故功利之在人者多，而事迹可记者止于如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176740_comment'></div>嘉祐三年十二月，暴得疾，不能兴，上闻悼骇，敕中贵人、太医问视，疾加损辄以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176740_comment'></div>公即辞谢，求去位，奏至十四五，犹不许，而公求之不已，乃以为尚书右丞、观文殿学士、翰林侍读学士、提举景灵宫事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176740_comment'></div>而公求去位终不已，于是遂以太子少傅致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176740_comment'></div>致仕凡五年，疾遂笃，以八年二月乙酉薨于第，享年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176740_comment'></div>号推诚保德功臣，阶特进，勋上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176740_comment'></div>爵开国京兆郡公，食邑三千五百户，实封八百户，诏赠太子太傅，而赙赐之甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176740_comment'></div>公讳况，字元均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176740_comment'></div>皇曾祖讳祐，赠太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176740_comment'></div>皇祖讳行周，赠太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176740_comment'></div>皇考讳延昭，赠太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176740_comment'></div>妻富氏，封永嘉郡夫人，今宰相河南公之女弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176740_comment'></div>无男子，以弟之子至安为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/242/Comments/0")'>主后</span>，女子一人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176740_comment'></div>田氏自太师始占其家开封，而葬阳翟，故今以公从太师葬阳翟之三封乡西吴里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176740_comment'></div>于是公弟右赞善大夫洵来曰：「卜葬公利四月甲午，请所以志其圹者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176740_comment'></div>盖公自佐江宁以至守蜀，在所辄兴学，数亲临之，以进诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176740_comment'></div>某少也与公弟游，而公所进以为可教者也，知公为审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176740_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1176740'>田室于姜，卒如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/260/Comments/0")'>龟祥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176740_comment'></div>后其孙子，旷不世史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176740_comment'></div>于宋继显，自公攸始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176740_comment'></div>奋其华蕤，配实之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176740_comment'></div>乃发帝业，深宏卓炜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176740_comment'></div>乃兴佐时，宰饪调聏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176740_comment'></div>文驯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1176740", 1176740, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>武克</span>，内外随施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176740_comment'></div>亦有厚仕，孰无众毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176740_comment'></div>公独使彼，若荣豫己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176740_comment'></div>维昔皇考，敢于活人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176740_comment'></div>传祉在公，不集其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176740_comment'></div>公又多誉，公宜难老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176740_comment'></div>胡此殆疾，不终寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176740_comment'></div>掩诗于幽，为告永久。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1176740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　葛蕴呈《巫山高》。爱其飘逸，因作两篇，并属司马光和之。作品：《葛蕴作巫山高爱其飘逸因亦作两篇》<div id='poem_70749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葛蕴作巫山高爱其飘逸因亦作两篇<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70749")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70749'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70749'>巫山高，十二峰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70749'>上有往来飘忽之猿猱，下有出没瀺灂之蛟龙，中有倚薄缥缈之神宫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70749'>神人处子冰雪容，吸风饮露虚无中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70749'>千岁寂寞无人逢，邂逅乃与襄王通。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70749'>丹崖碧嶂深重重，白月如日明房栊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70749'>象床玉几来自从，锦屏翠幔金芙蓉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70749'>阳台美人多楚语，秖有纤腰能楚舞，争吹凤管鸣鼍鼓。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70749'>那知襄王梦时事，但见朝朝暮暮长云雨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_70749_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70750?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_4_70750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70750'>以云为衣月为褚，乘光服暗无留阻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　与范镇、司马光试院唱酬。作品：《夜读试卷呈君实待制景仁内翰》<div id='poem_69985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69985' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69985")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69985_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69985'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69985'>篝灯时见语惊人，更觉挥毫捷有神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69985'>学问比来多可喜，文章非特巧争新。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69985'>蕉中得鹿初疑梦，牖下窥龙稍眩真。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年3月6日</a>　此日，宠籍卒。撰制词。作品：《故赠司空兼侍中宠籍遗表男太常博士元英可屯田员外郎制》<div id='poem_1175749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故赠司空兼侍中庞籍遗表男太常博士元英可屯田员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年3月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175749")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175749'>敕某等：尔考有庸先朝，致位将相，归安第室，而以寿终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175749_comment'></div>尔等服采于时，实能嗣训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175749_comment'></div>并膺恩典，其往勉哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175749_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　为陈见素夫人撰墓志铭。作品：《宁国县太君乐氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宁国县太君乐氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176825")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176825'>尚书屯田员外郎、通判河南府、西京留守司事陈君讳见素之夫人乐氏，太常博士讳黄裳之子，尚书职方员外郎、直史馆、赠尚书兵部侍郎讳史之孙，而赠尚书刑部郎中讳璋之曾孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176825_comment'></div>其先自京兆迁江南为临川人，至李氏国除，而史馆君归仕于皇朝，子孙多显者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176825_comment'></div>于是又迁其家为河南人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176825_comment'></div>夫人以祥符八年归嫔陈氏，封万年县君，又以其子封宁国县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176825_comment'></div>年七十五，以嘉祐八年二月辛巳卒于京师，卜以三月丙寅祔葬河南唐兴乡屯田君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176825_comment'></div>于是夫人之子男三人：其一人为太常博士、集贤校理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176825_comment'></div>其一人为秘书丞、集贤校理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176825_comment'></div>其一人为秘书省著作佐郎、开封府户曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176825_comment'></div>女子六人，存者三人，皆已嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176825_comment'></div>诸孙男女十九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176825_comment'></div>曾孙一人，尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176825_comment'></div>夫人少知读书，能略识其大指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176825_comment'></div>微谏数当，故博士君特爱而贤之，欲有所为，多与之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176825_comment'></div>及归陈氏，不逮养皇姑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176825_comment'></div>屯田君二弟皆尚幼也，夫人鞠视如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176825_comment'></div>出奁中物，以助施族人游士之贫者，盖其家萧然也，而无愠色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176825_comment'></div>治诸子有节法，诲厉教督，造次必于文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176825_comment'></div>故诸子皆以艺自奋，名称一时，以至诸孙亦多有为善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176825_comment'></div>先人与屯田君皆祥符八年进士，昆弟又与夫人子为同年友，故其葬，来属以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176825_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176825'>夫人既严兮，又顺以祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176825_comment'></div>来配君子兮，是生三良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176825_comment'></div>以才自致兮，名声之扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176825_comment'></div>庆暨诸孙兮，学问文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176825_comment'></div>象服命书兮，宠禄方将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176825_comment'></div>气魂天游兮，体魂在床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176825_comment'></div>往营新宫兮，嶷洛之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176825_comment'></div>作诗幽石兮，示后无疆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1176825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年3月20日</a>　此日，皇城使、巴州刺史宋安道等降官。撰制词。作品：《皇城使巴州刺史宋安道落巴州刺史制》<div id='poem_1175957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175957' class='poemTitle ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176759")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176759'>君讳逢，字会之，姓王氏，太平州当涂县人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176759_comment'></div>尝举进士，不中，去以所学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176759_comment'></div>于是苏州士人从转运使乞君主其学，学者常致数千百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176759_comment'></div>君所奖养成就者多矣，乃始以进士起家，权南雄州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176759_comment'></div>归，试判超等，补袁州军事判官，留为国子监直讲，兼陇西郡王宅教授，李某行内修谨，君盖有力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176759_comment'></div>岐国公主既嫁，为君求迁，有命矣，君辞焉，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176759_comment'></div>君少以文学知名，于书无所不观，而尤喜《易》，作《易传》十卷，《乾德指说》一卷，《复书》七卷，名士大夫多善其书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176759_comment'></div>于是枢密使张公举君可试馆职，而宰相无知君者，故不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176759_comment'></div>通判徐州，以疾不赴，求监苏州酒，以嘉祐八年正月六日不起，年五十九，至太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176759_comment'></div>君为人乐易，笃于朋友故旧，于势利无所茍，能爱人以得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176759_comment'></div>君皇祖考延嗣，祖、考皆不仕，而皇考以君故，赠大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176759_comment'></div>前夫人苏氏，后夫人陈氏，皆无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176759_comment'></div>陈氏名家子，亦有贤行，以嘉祐八年四月二日，葬君苏州吴县三玄乡陆公原，以前夫人苏氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176759_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1176759'>宜寿也，五十而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176759_comment'></div>宜贵也，止于博士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176759_comment'></div>谓卒有后也，而终无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176759_comment'></div>呜呼夫子！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176759_comment'></div>命不可与谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176759_comment'></div>其归其安，永矣兹丘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　撰杨忱墓志铭。作品：《大理寺丞杨君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大理寺丞杨君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176761")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176761'>君讳忱，字明叔，华阴杨氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176761_comment'></div>少卓荦，以文章称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176761_comment'></div>治《春秋》，不守先儒传注，资他经以佐其说，其说超厉踔越，世儒莫能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176761_comment'></div>及其为吏，披奸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176761", 1176761, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>发伏</span>，振擿利害，大人之以声名权势骄士者，常逆为君自诎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176761_comment'></div>盖君有以过人如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176761_comment'></div>然恃其能，奋其气，不治<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176761", 1176761, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>防畛</span>以取通于世，故终于无所就以穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176761_comment'></div>初，君以父荫守将作监主簿，数举进士不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176761_comment'></div>数上书言事，其言有众人所不敢言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176761_comment'></div>丁文简公且死，为君求职，君辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176761_comment'></div>后用大臣荐，召试学士院，又久之不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176761_comment'></div>积官至朝奉郎、行大理寺丞、通判河中府事、飞骑尉，而坐小法绌监蕲州酒税，未赴，而以嘉祐七年四月辛巳，卒于河南，享年三十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176761_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176761", 1176761, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>顾言</span>曰：「焚吾所为书，无留也，以柩从先人葬」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176761_comment'></div>八年四月辛卯，从其父葬河南府洛阳县平乐乡张封村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176761_comment'></div>君曾祖讳津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176761_comment'></div>祖讳守庆，坊州司马，赠尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176761_comment'></div>父讳偕，翰林侍读学士，以尚书工部侍郎致仕，特赠尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176761_comment'></div>娶丁氏，清河县君，尚书右丞度之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176761_comment'></div>男两人：景略，守太常寺太祝，好书，学能自立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176761_comment'></div>景彦，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176761_comment'></div>君有文集十卷，又别为《春秋正论》十卷，《微言》十卷，《通例》二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176761_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1176761'>芒乎其孰始，以有厥美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176761_comment'></div>昧乎其孰止，以终于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176761_comment'></div>纳铭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1176761", 1176761, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>幽宫</span>，以慰其子。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1176761'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176761_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　有诗送杨骥下第归鄱阳。作品：《送杨骥秀才归鄱阳》<div id='poem_70080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70080' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_70080'>荆山和氏方三献，太学何生且一归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70080'>旷野已寒谙独宿，长年多难惜分违。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月1日</a>　此日，英宗即位。撰百官覃恩转官制词。作品：《翰林学士知制诰贾黯转官加勋邑制》《翰林学士知制诰权三司使蔡襄转官加食邑制》《翰林学士兼侍读学士知制诰充史官修撰王珪转官加食邑制》《翰林学士知制诰充史官修撰范镇转官加勋邑制》《翰林学士知制诰权知开封府冯京转官加勋邑制》《集贤院学士余靖转官加勋邑制》《英宗即位覃恩转官龙图阁学士至龙图阁直学士制》《发运转运提刑判官等制》《卿监馆职制》《京官馆职制》《分司致仕正郎以下京官等制》《诸司使副至崇班内常侍带遥郡不带遥郡制》<div id='poem_1175553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175553?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士知制诰贾黯转官加勋邑制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175553'>敕：朕初即位，奉行先帝故事，不敢有废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175553_comment'></div>具官某，刚毅笃实，闳深博敏，先帝所遗以论思左右者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175553_comment'></div>其迁阙位，加赐恩典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175553_comment'></div>其往钦哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175553_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175553_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175554' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175554' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175554?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士知制诰权三司使蔡襄转官加食邑制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175554'>敕：朕祗若先帝之初，大赉以劳天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175554_comment'></div>职亲地禁之臣，皆先帝所遗以助朕者也，其可以后而忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175554_comment'></div>具官某，率德秉义，以绥宠禄，主国大计，功昭于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175554_comment'></div>班命有章，往钦无斁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175554_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175554_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175555' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175555' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175555?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士兼侍读学士知制诰充史馆修撰王圭转官加食邑制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175555")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175555_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175555'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175555'>先帝投天下之艰以属朕身，永惟所与济此者，岂非左右之良哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175555_comment'></div>具官某，秉哲迪义，士民所望，论思润色，有补于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175555_comment'></div>大赉之恩，外通四海，况于亲近，岂可以忘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175556_comment'></div>具官某，敦大闳博，清明敏达，职亲地密，为国信臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175556_comment'></div>迁序位等，申之恩典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175556_comment'></div>惟慎厥服，往膺显荣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175556_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175556_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175557' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175557' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175557?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士知制诰权知开封府冯京转官加勋邑制</a><span id='poem_sentence_4_1175557_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175558' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175558' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175558?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175721'>先帝享国四十馀年，内外晏然，克终天禄，岂非献臣才士佽助之力哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175721_comment'></div>不及班命以劳功，而朕承厥志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175721_comment'></div>尔奉将使指，久以才称，膺此宠章，往其思励！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175721_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175721_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175722' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1175722_comment'></div>其施及于疏远，而可以忘于近者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175722_comment'></div>具官某，序于书林，伐阅多矣，率德迪义，有称于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175722_comment'></div>膺践宠荣，往其思毖！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175722_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175722_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175844'>敕：惠术尚均，而自亲贵始，古今一体也，其可以忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175844_comment'></div>皇太后祖某，明德大功，简于帝室，配食宗庙，始终哀荣，庆流于孙，母育四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175844_comment'></div>追褒有典，庶或知歆！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175844_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175844_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175845?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>祖母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175845'>敕：邦有大赉，夫人待于下流，岂外戚之尊，所当褒而可以忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175845_comment'></div>皇太后祖母高氏，承庆淑人，来嫔巨室，蓄德之厚，垂休无穷，协兆涂山，世滋以大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175845_comment'></div>追锡爵命，冀能歆嘉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175845_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175845_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175846?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>祖母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175846'>敕：佐佑先帝，顾复朕躬，追诵寒泉之诗，永惟欲报之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175846_comment'></div>当有爵命，以上副显亲之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175846_comment'></div>皇太后祖母刘氏，柔良靓专，被服华问，宠禄光大，集于后昆，启佑硕人，比贤文母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175846_comment'></div>追褒大国，其尚知荣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175846_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175846_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175847?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>祖母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175847'>先帝褒厚母党，致仁尽孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175847_comment'></div>朕虽在疚，而奉承故事，不敢愆忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175847_comment'></div>皇太后祖母刘氏，内顺外严，罄无不淑，德祚流衍，远而弥兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175847_comment'></div>追命有章，尚慰窀穸！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175847_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175847_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175848?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>祖母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175848_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175848'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175848'>敕：朕以薄德，奉承大统，永惟先帝故事，不敢有忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175848_comment'></div>皇太后祖母高氏，温柔靓深，有妇之道，相协君子，卓为臣宗，垂延后昆，福禄滋大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175848_comment'></div>膺此休命，尚知荣歆！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175848_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175848_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175849?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>父</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175849'>先帝奄忽弃捐万邦，不及推恩以劳幽显，予末小子，敢忘遗训？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175849_comment'></div>皇太后父某，循德秉义，闻于当世，发祥流祉，燕及后人，笃生圣女，母育天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175849_comment'></div>褒封有数，尚慰于幽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175849_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175849_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175850?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年5月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175850'>敕：朕眇然之躬，当奉匕鬯以承宗庙，大赉及于幽显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175850_comment'></div>永惟母党之重，可以后而忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175850_comment'></div>皇太后母，志顺德严，克配君子，光大之福，集于圣女，有辅佐之功于先帝，而施及在后之侗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175850_comment'></div>命书追崇，尚慰营魄！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175850_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175850_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　撰宰臣封赠三代制词。作品：《宰相富弼三代制六道》《参知政事欧阳修三代制六道》《枢密使张昇封赠三代制八道》《枢密副使胡宿封赠三代制六道》《枢密副使吴奎封赠制二道》<div id='poem_1175866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宰相富弼三代制<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>亡母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175866")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175866'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175866'>敕：朕初纂服，登用旧臣，褒厚其亲，率循故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175866_comment'></div>具官某母某氏，显相吉士，笃生硕人，寿善康宁，考终福禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175866_comment'></div>追荣新竁，申命大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175866_comment'></div>尚其淑灵，膺此休宠！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175866_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175866_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175867?labeling=true' target='_blank'>参知政事欧阳修三代制<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>曾祖郴赠太子少保可赠太子太保</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175867")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175867'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175867'>敕：君子善善之义，下及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175867_comment'></div>况推而上之至其祖考，所以褒美崇宠，岂顾可以不称哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175867_comment'></div>故先王宗庙之制，视其爵位之高下，以为世数之远近，而本朝追命之礼，亦从其子孙名数之卑尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175867_comment'></div>具官某曾祖某，潜于丘园，躬有善行，畜积之庆，施于曾孙，为时宗工，名重天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175867_comment'></div>图任以登于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1175867", 1175867, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>右府</span>，褒嘉当及其前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175867_comment'></div>东宫之孤，位已显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175867_comment'></div>进秩一品，尚其享哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175867_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1175867_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175868?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>曾祖母追封延安郡太夫人刘氏可追封荣国太夫人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175868'>敕：尊之欲其贵，亲之欲其富，岂特人主有是心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175868_comment'></div>推是心以施于人，此人主所以与天下同忧乐之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175868_comment'></div>禄有厚薄，故礼有隆杀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175868_comment'></div>位有高下，故施有远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175868_comment'></div>古之道也，其可忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175868_comment'></div>具官某曾祖母某氏，含德在躬，作嫔令族，积善之庆，覃其后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175868_comment'></div>惟时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1175868", 1175868, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>闻孙</span>，实朕良弼，登与政事，人无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175868_comment'></div>其疏大邦之封，以报流泽之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175868_comment'></div>宠灵之极，尚克享哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175868_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1175868_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175869?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>祖赠某官</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175869'>敕：朕惟有天下者得推其祖考上配于天，盖孝子慈孙所以极其尊崇之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175869_comment'></div>推是心以及夫在位，则其宠禄之厚者，岂不欲以及其所谓尊亲者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175869_comment'></div>此朕所以褒宠大臣之先以尊爵贵官，而有至乎三世者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175869_comment'></div>具官某祖某，积德累善，施于后嗣，为予辅弼，始大厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175869_comment'></div>东宫之孤，既以命汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175869_comment'></div>增荣一品，尚克享哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175869_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1175869_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175870?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>祖母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175870'>敕：朕疏郡县以君诸臣之母，欲以慰慈孙孝子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175870_comment'></div>至于政事之臣，则封国及其王母，所以望其功者厚矣，则慰其心者顾可以薄哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175870_comment'></div>具官某祖母某氏，来嫔名家，克配君子，积善之福，覃于其孙，左右朕躬，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1175870", 1175870, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>豫图</span>政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175870_comment'></div>嘉而有后，锡以大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175870_comment'></div>维灵在幽，尚克膺此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175870_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1175870_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175871?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>父</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175871'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175871'>敕：大臣得爵命其先人至乎公师，非古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175871_comment'></div>然礼者人情而已矣，当于人情而义足以劝士，则何必古之有哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175871_comment'></div>具官某父某，蓄其德善，不显于世，克生贤佐，为朕股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175871_comment'></div>东宫一品，人臣高位，追以命汝，用嘉有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175871_comment'></div>尚其享此，以称馈祀之盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175871_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1175871_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175872?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175872'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175872'>敕：古者子为诸侯大夫而父为士，则其祭以诸侯大夫之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175872_comment'></div>朕以谓得享其礼而位号不称，则不足以尽孝子之心，故今有列于朝廷，皆得追崇其考妣，又况于为吾左右辅弼之臣哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175872_comment'></div>具官某母某氏，妇顺母严，称于天下，能教其子，为时名臣，协于询谋，进断国论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175872_comment'></div>虽禄养不及，而馈享有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175872_comment'></div>启封大邦，于礼为称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175872_comment'></div>尚其幽穸，知享此荣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175872_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1175872_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>枢密副使胡宿封赠三代制<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175886")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175886_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175886'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175886'>先帝有大赉，必及群臣之父母，朕初嗣位，不敢有废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175886_comment'></div>具官某母某氏，以顺为妇而能正，以严为母而能慈，肆有福禄，集其后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175886_comment'></div>徙封大国，以显厥魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175886_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175886_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>枢密副使吴奎封赠制<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>母</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175888")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175888'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175888'>敕：永惟政事之臣，天下国家所恃以安且治者也，所以褒厚及其父母，岂可忘哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175888_comment'></div>具官某母某氏，驯德淑行，来宁巨室，母有贤子，为时宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175888_comment'></div>班命于朝，既疏名郡，徙封之宠，其往钦承！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175888_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年6月</a>　六月，为李宽之父李虚舟撰神道碑。作品：《虞部郎中赠卫尉卿李公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞部郎中赠卫尉卿李公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176725")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176725'>嘉祐八年六月某甲子，制曰：「朕初即位，大赉群臣升朝者及其父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176725_comment'></div>具官某父具官某，率德蹈义，不躬荣禄，能教厥子，并为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176725", 1176725, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>才臣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176725_comment'></div>加赐名命，序诸卿位，所以劝天下之为人父者，岂特以慰孝子之心哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176725_comment'></div>可特赠卫尉卿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176725_comment'></div>翌日某甲子，中书下其书告第，又副其书赐宽等，以待墓焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176725_comment'></div>宽等受书，焚其副墓上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176725_comment'></div>乃撰次卫尉官世行治始卒，来请曰：「先人赖天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176725", 1176725, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>庆施</span>，赐之官三品矣，而墓碑未刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176725_comment'></div>惟德善可以有辞于后世者，夫子实闻知」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176725_comment'></div>某曰：「然，卫尉公墓隧，宜得铭久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176725_comment'></div>于是为序而铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176725_comment'></div>序曰：公姓李氏，故陇西人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176725_comment'></div>七世祖讳某，始迁于光山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176725_comment'></div>五世祖讳某，以其郡人王闽，从之，始为建安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176725_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，祖讳某，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176725_comment'></div>考讳某，尝仕江南李氏，稍显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176725_comment'></div>江南国除，又举进士中等，以殿中丞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176725_comment'></div>有学行，名能知人，赠其父大理评事，而己亦以子贵，赠至吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176725_comment'></div>游豫章，乐其湖山，曰：「吾必终于此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176725_comment'></div>于是又始为豫章人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176725_comment'></div>尚书之子，伯曰虚己，官至尚书工部侍郎，以才能闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176725_comment'></div>其季则公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176725_comment'></div>公讳某，字公济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176725_comment'></div>少笃学，读书兼昼夜不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176725_comment'></div>一以进士举，不中，即以兄荫为郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176725_comment'></div>再选福州闽清、洪州靖安县尉，有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176725_comment'></div>迁饶州馀干县令，至则毁淫祠，取其材以为孔子庙，率县人之秀者兴于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176725_comment'></div>豪宗大姓，歛手不敢犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176725_comment'></div>州将、部使者奏乞与京官，移之剧县，不报，而坐不觉狱卒杀人以免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176725_comment'></div>当是时，侍郎方以分司就第，公曰：「吾兄老矣，我得朝夕从之游，以洒扫先人庐冢，尚何求而仕」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176725_comment'></div>遂止，不复言仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176725_comment'></div>侍郎之卒也，天子以公试秘书省校书郎，知江州德安县事，辞不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176725_comment'></div>后尝一至京师，大臣交口劝说，欲官之，终以其不可强也，而晏元献公为公请，乃除太子洗马致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176725_comment'></div>初，尚书未老，弃其官以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176725_comment'></div>至侍郎及公之退也，亦皆未老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176725_comment'></div>自尚书至公，再世皆有子，而皆以严治其家如吏治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176725_comment'></div>江西士大夫慕其世德，称其家法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176725_comment'></div>盖近世士多外自藩饰为声名，而内实罕能治其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176725_comment'></div>及老，往往顾利冒耻，不知休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176725_comment'></div>公独父子兄弟能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176725_comment'></div>呜呼，其可谓贤于人也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176725_comment'></div>公事亲孝，比遭大丧，庐墓六年然后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176725_comment'></div>事兄与其寡姊，衣食药物，必躬亲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176725_comment'></div>及公老矣，二子就养，如公之为子弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176725_comment'></div>宽尝为江、浙等路提点铸钱坑冶，又尝提点江南西路刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176725_comment'></div>定亦再为洪州官，不去左右者十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176725_comment'></div>皆以才能，为世闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176725_comment'></div>以恩迁公官至尚书虞部郎中，阶至朝奉郎，勋至护军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176725_comment'></div>以嘉祐四年七月某甲子，卒于豫章之第室，年八十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176725_comment'></div>夫人长寿县君赵氏，先公卒八年，既葬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176725_comment'></div>五年某月某甲子，以公葬于夫人之墓左，曰雷冈，在新建县之桃花乡新里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176725_comment'></div>夫人故衢州人，某官湘之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176725_comment'></div>湘有文行，尚书与为友，故为公娶其女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176725_comment'></div>子三人：宽、定、寔，寔守秘书省正字，早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176725_comment'></div>于公之葬也，宽为尚书司勋员外郎，定为尚书库部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176725_comment'></div>女子二人，已嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176725_comment'></div>孙二十有一人，曾孙十有五人，皆率公教无违者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176725_comment'></div>公既葬，而二子以恩赠公卫尉卿云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176725_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_1176725'>李世大家，陇西其先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176725_comment'></div>于唐之季，再世光山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176725_comment'></div>移遁于闽，岭海之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176725_comment'></div>乃生尚书，节行有伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176725_comment'></div>始来江南，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1176725", 1176725, "Clauses/178/Comments/0")'>考室</span>章水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176725_comment'></div>绳绳二子，隐显兼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176725_comment'></div>孰多后禄，其季维卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176725_comment'></div>幼壮躬孝，唯君之践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176725_comment'></div>能不尽用，止于一县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176725_comment'></div>退以德义，釐身于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176725_comment'></div>外内肃雍，人不疵嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176725_comment'></div>亦有二子，维天子使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176725_comment'></div>父曰往矣，致而臣身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176725_comment'></div>子曰归哉，以宁吾亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176725_comment'></div>以率其妇，左右恂恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176725_comment'></div>以官就侍，天子之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176725_comment'></div>既具祉福，考终大耄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176725_comment'></div>追荣于幽，乃赐卿号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176725_comment'></div>伐石西山，作为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1176725", 1176725, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>螭龟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176725_comment'></div>营之墓上，勒此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1176725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　奉祠西太一宫，有诗题壁。作品：《题西太一宫壁二首》<div id='poem_70807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题西太一宫壁二首<span class='inlineComment2'>（六言）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70807")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70807'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70807'>草色浮云漠漠，树阴落日潭潭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70807'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70807", 70807, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>三十六陂</span>流<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>水，白头想见江南。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70807'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_70806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70806?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_0_70806'>三十年前此路<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作地）</span>，父兄持我东西。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70806_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70806'>今日重来白首，欲寻陈迹都迷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70806_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70806'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　奉祠西太一宫，作诗。作品：《西太一宫楼》<div id='poem_70804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西太一宫楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70804")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70804'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70804'>草际芙蕖零落，水边杨柳攲斜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70804'>日暮炊烟孤起，不知鱼网谁家<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《临川先生文集》卷二六）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70804'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　以孙觉等迁著作佐郎，撰制词。作品：《奏举人编校昭文馆书籍孙觉著作佐郎制》<div id='poem_1175680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏举人编校昭文馆书籍孙觉著作佐郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175680")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175680'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175680'>先帝置校雠之官，所取皆天下望士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175680_comment'></div>尔惇行力学，为时俊杰，治民有纪，称者众多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175680_comment'></div>会课进迁，往共厥服！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175680_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　弟安国举茂才异等，献所著《序言》，有司考校第一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年8月12日</a>　此日，母吴氏卒于京师，享年六十六岁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　士大夫皆来吊母丧，《辨奸论》之讼肇焉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年8月</a>　丁母忧，解官归江宁。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='a8c86a1ea42b42e88952c2e400ecd37d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a8c86a1ea42b42e88952c2e400ecd37d");'><span id='a8c86a1ea42b42e88952c2e400ecd37d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>，48岁</div><div id='a8c86a1ea42b42e88952c2e400ecd37d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年4月4日</a>　此日，越次入对，言为治以择术为先，勉神宗当法尧、舜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　以神宗问本朝享国百年天下无事之故，退而奏上劄子，勉神宗大有为。作品：《本朝百年无事劄子》<div id='poem_1176213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>本朝百年无事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176213")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176213'>臣前蒙陛下问及本朝所以享国百年，天下无事之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176213_comment'></div>臣以浅陋，误承圣问，迫于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>日晷</span>，不敢久留，语不及悉，遂辞而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176213_comment'></div>窃惟念圣问及此，天下之福，而臣遂无一言之献，非近臣所以事君之义，故敢昧冒而粗有所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176213_comment'></div>伏惟太祖躬上智独见之明，而周知人物之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>情伪</span>，指挥付托必尽其材，变置施设必当其务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176213_comment'></div>故能驾驭将帅，训齐士卒，外以捍夷狄，内以平中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176213_comment'></div>于是除苛赋，止虐刑，废强横之藩镇，诛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>贪残</span>之官吏，躬以简俭为天下先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176213_comment'></div>其于出政发令之间，一以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>安利</span>元元为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176213_comment'></div>太宗承之以聪武，真宗守之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>谦仁</span>，以至仁宗、英宗，无有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>逸德</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176213_comment'></div>此所以享国百年而天下无事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176213_comment'></div>仁宗在位，历年最久，臣于时实备从官，施为本末，臣所亲见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176213_comment'></div>尝试为陛下陈其一二，而陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>详择</span>其可，亦足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>申鉴</span>于方今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176213_comment'></div>伏惟仁宗之为君也，仰畏天，俯畏人，宽仁恭俭，出于自然，而忠恕诚悫，终始如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176213_comment'></div>未尝妄兴一役，未尝妄杀一人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>断狱</span>务在生之，而特恶吏之残扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176213_comment'></div>宁屈己弃财于夷狄，而终不忍加兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176213_comment'></div>刑平而公，赏重而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176213_comment'></div>纳用谏官、御史，公听并观，而不蔽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>偏至</span>之谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176213_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>因任</span>众人耳目，拔举疏远，而随之以相坐之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176213_comment'></div>盖监司之吏，以至州县，无敢暴虐残酷，擅有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>调发</span>，以伤百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176213_comment'></div>自夏人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>顺服</span>，蛮夷遂无大变，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>边人</span>父子夫妇，得免于兵死，而中国之人安逸蕃息，以至今日者，未尝妄兴一役，未尝妄杀一人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>断狱</span>务在生之，而特恶吏之残扰，宁屈己弃财于夷狄，而不忍加兵之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176213_comment'></div>大臣贵戚、左右近习莫敢强横犯法，其自重慎，或甚于闾巷之人，此刑平而公之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176213_comment'></div>募天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>骁雄</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/83/Comments/1")'>横猾</span>以为兵，几至百万，非有良将以御之，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>谋变</span>者辄败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176213_comment'></div>聚天下财物，虽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>文籍</span>，委之府史，非有能吏以钩考，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>断盗</span>者辄发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176213_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>凶年饥岁</span>，流者填道，死者相枕，而寇攘者辄得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176213_comment'></div>此赏重而信之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176213_comment'></div>大臣贵戚、左右近习莫能大擅威福，广私货赂，一有奸慝，随辄上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176213_comment'></div>贪邪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>横猾</span>，虽间或见用，未尝得久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176213_comment'></div>此纳用谏官、御史，公听并观，而不蔽于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>偏至</span>之谗之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176213_comment'></div>自县令京官以至监司台阁，升擢之任，虽不皆得人，然一时之所谓才士，亦罕蔽塞而不见收举者，此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>因任</span>众人之耳目，拔举疏远，而随之以相坐之法之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176213_comment'></div>升遐之日，天下号恸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>如丧考妣</span>，此宽仁恭俭，出于自然，忠恕诚悫，终始如一之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176213_comment'></div>然本朝累世因循末俗之弊，而无亲友群臣之议，人君朝夕与处，不过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>宦官</span>女子，出而视事，又不过有司之细故，未尝如古大有为之君，与学士大夫讨论先王之法，以措之天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176213_comment'></div>一切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>因任</span>自然之理势，而精神之运有所不加，名实之间有所不察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176213_comment'></div>君子非不见贵，然小人亦得厕其间，正论非不见容，然邪说亦有时而用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176213_comment'></div>以诗赋记诵求天下之士，而无学校<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>养成</span>之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176213_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>科名</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/140/Comments/1")'>资历</span>叙朝廷之位，而无官司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>课试</span>之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176213_comment'></div>监司无检察之人，守将非选择之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176213_comment'></div>转徙之亟，既难于考绩，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>游谈</span>之众，因得以乱真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176213_comment'></div>交私养望者多得显官，独立营职者或见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>排沮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176213_comment'></div>故上下偷惰取容而已，虽有能者在职，亦无以异于庸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176213_comment'></div>农民坏于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>繇役</span>，而未尝特见救恤，又不为之设官，以修其水土之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176213_comment'></div>兵士杂于疲老，而未尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>申敕</span>训练，又不为之择将，而久其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>疆埸</span>之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176213_comment'></div>宿卫则聚卒伍无赖之人，而未有以变五代姑息羁縻之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176213_comment'></div>宗室则无教训选举之实，而未有以合先王亲疏隆杀之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176213_comment'></div>其于理财，大抵无法，故虽俭约而民不富，虽忧勤而国不强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176213_comment'></div>赖非夷狄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>昌炽</span>之时，又无尧汤水旱之变，故天下无事，过于百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176213_comment'></div>虽曰人事，亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>天助</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176213_comment'></div>盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>累圣</span>相继，仰畏天，俯畏人，宽仁恭俭，忠恕诚悫，此其所以获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>天助</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176213_comment'></div>伏惟陛下躬上圣之质，承无穷之绪，知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>天助</span>之不可常恃，知人事之不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1176213", 1176213, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>怠终</span>，则大有为之时，正在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176213_comment'></div>臣不敢辄废将明之义，而茍逃讳忌之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176213_comment'></div>伏惟陛下幸赦而留神，则天下之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176213_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1176213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176213'><span id='poem_sentence_1_1176028_comment'></div>隆恩所逮，朽质知荣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176028_comment'></div>窃念臣弱力浅闻，久忧积疢，中与从官之选，外分守将之权，仅免谴何，更蒙收召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176028_comment'></div>论思润色，曾莫效于微劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176028_comment'></div>衣被服乘，乃前叨于异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176028_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下醲于庆赏，详在招延，因示眷怀，使知奋励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176028_comment'></div>誓竭愚忠之报，冀无虚授之嫌。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年4月10日</a>　此日，赴锡庆院御筵，上谢表。作品：《敕设谢表》<div id='poem_1176029' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176029' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1176029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176029'>职与论思，恩加稿饫，礼虽有旧，宠实难当<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176029_comment'></div>伏念臣本乏才称，中缘疾废，适从孤远，获侍清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176029_comment'></div>已污禁林之庐，重叨太官之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176029_comment'></div>盖饮食有文王之雅，实始忧勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176029_comment'></div>顾来归无吉甫之劳，徒多燕喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176029_comment'></div>敢忘自竭，粗称所蒙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176029_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年4月18日</a>　此日，入学士院后，翰林学士郑獬乞令立班其上，固辞不获。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年4月19日</a>　此日，与吕公著请复讲官坐讲，神宗诏太常礼院详定以闻，议不同，事遂已。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　曾巩撰《讲官议》以讽。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　与吴充同差修《英宗宝録》上劄乞免，不允。作品：《乞免修宝録劄子》<div id='poem_1176217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞免修实录劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176217")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176217'>臣准閤门报敕，差臣与吴充同修英宗皇帝实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176217_comment'></div>窃缘臣于吴充为正亲家，虑有共事之嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176217_comment'></div>今来实录院止阙吕公著一人，臣于讨论缀缉，不如吴充精密，若止差吴充一人，以代公著，自足办事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176217_comment'></div>伏望圣恩详酌指挥，所有敕牒，臣未敢受。<div
