id='poem_title_69529_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69529'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69529'>柘冈西路白云深，想子东归得重寻。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　有诗和弟安国《金山会宿》。作品：《次韵平甫金山会宿寄亲友》<div id='poem_69821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_4_69821'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69821_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　以神宗问郊祀、宗祀之别，撰议缴进。作品：《郊宗议（伏奉圣问撰议缴进）》<div id='poem_1176267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176267?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郊宗议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176267")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176267_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176267'>问：郊祀后稷以配天，宗祀文王于明堂以配上帝，二者皆配天也，或于郊之圆丘，或于国之明堂，或以冬之日至，或以季秋之月，或以祖，或以祢，或曰配天，或曰配上帝，其义何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176267_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176267'>对曰：天道升降于四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176267_comment'></div>其降也，与人道交；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176267_comment'></div>其升也，与人道辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176267_comment'></div>冬日，上天与人道辨之时也，先王于是乎以天道事之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176267_comment'></div>秋则犹未辨乎人也，先王于是乎以人道事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176267_comment'></div>以天道事之，则宜远人，宜以自然，故于郊、于圆丘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176267_comment'></div>以人道事之，则宜近人，宜以人为，故于国、于明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176267_comment'></div>始而生之者，天道也，成而终之者，人道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176267_comment'></div>冬之日至，始而生之之时也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176267_comment'></div>季秋之月，成而终之之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176267_comment'></div>故以天道事之，则以冬之日至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176267_comment'></div>然人道事之，则以季秋之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176267_comment'></div>远而尊者，天道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176267_comment'></div>迩而亲者，人道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176267_comment'></div>祖远而尊，故以天道事之，则配以祖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176267_comment'></div>祢迩而亲，故以人道事之，则配以祢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176267_comment'></div>郊天，祀之大者也，遍于天之群神，故曰以配天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176267_comment'></div>明堂则弗遍也，故曰以配上帝而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176267_comment'></div>夫天与人异道也，天神以人事之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176267_comment'></div>曰：所谓天者，果异于人邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176267_comment'></div>所谓人者，果异于天邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176267_comment'></div>故先王之于人鬼也，或以天道事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176267_comment'></div>萧合稷黍，臭阳达于墙屋者，以天道事之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176267_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176267_comment'></div>天人之不相异，非知神之所为，其孰能与于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176267_comment'></div>此礼也尚矣，孔子何以独称周公？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176267_comment'></div>曰：严父配天者，以得天为盛，天自民视听者也，所谓得天，得民而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176267_comment'></div>自生民以来，能继父之志，能述父之事而得四海之欢心以事其父，未有盛于周公者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176267_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年6月6日</a>　此日，撰表。作品：《天贶节皇帝谢内中露香表》<div id='poem_1176890' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年7月7日</a>　此日，弟安国赐进士及第、注初等职官，上谢表。作品：《赐弟安国及第谢表》<div id='poem_1176018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐弟安国及第谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年7月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a id='poem_sentence_0_1176018_comment'></div>俊乂之求，外覃草野；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176018_comment'></div>龙光之施，首逮门庭<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176018_comment'></div>窃以躬国论听断之烦，而察知孤远之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176018_comment'></div>略门资贡举之法，而拔取滞淹之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176018_comment'></div>山林之所诵说而难遭，闾巷之所惊嗟而罕见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176018_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下协德穹昊，比明羲皇，博临四方，洞照万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176018_comment'></div>如臣同产，为世畸人，少遭闵凶，自奋寒苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176018_comment'></div>虽强学力行，粗有时名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176018_comment'></div>而少偶寡徒，几绝荣望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176018_comment'></div>岂期圣听，俯及幽潜，遂使穷途，坐阶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176018", 1176018, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>华宠</span>，奖以诏书而试艺，赐之科第而命官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176018_comment'></div>禄不逮亲，既永乖于养志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176018_comment'></div>仕非为己，当共誓于捐躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176018_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　琦恳诉之，复草诏。作品：《赐韩琦依所乞诏》《赐允韩琦乞相州诏三道》<div id='poem_1175432' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　撰文。作品：《景灵宫修盖英宗皇帝神御殿上梁文》<div id='poem_1176984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176984_comment'></div>天垂嘉种已丰年，地产珍符方极化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176984_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1176984'>伏愿上梁之后，圣躬乐豫，宝命灵长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176984_comment'></div>松茂献两宫之寿，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1176984", 1176984, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>椒繁</span>占六寝之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176984_comment'></div>宗室蕃维之彦，朝廷表干之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176984_comment'></div>家传庆誉，代袭龙光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176984_comment'></div>有一心而显相，保馈祀之无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176984_comment'></div>皇帝万岁！</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1176984_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　上劄子论孙觉但令吏人书写章疏，不当加以谴怒。作品：《论孙觉令吏人写章疏劄子》<div id='poem_1176276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论孙觉令吏人写章疏劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176276")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176276'>臣今日蒙宣谕召，以孙觉令吏人写论列大臣章疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176276_comment'></div>臣初亦怪其不能谨密，但疑此朋友所当诲责，非人主所当谴怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176276_comment'></div>继又反复思惟，陛下以觉为可听信，故擢在谏官，进贤退不肖，自其职分，所当论列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176276_comment'></div>虽扬言于朝，以迪上心，于义未为失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176276_comment'></div>但令吏人书写章疏，诚不足加以谴怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176276_comment'></div>凡人臣当谨密者，以君子小人消长之势未分，言有漏泄，或能致祸，如其不密，则害于其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176276_comment'></div>若遭值明主，危言正论，无所忌惮，亦何谨密之有乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176276_comment'></div>惟有奸邪小人，以枉为直，惧为公论之所不容，则惟恐其言之不密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176276_comment'></div>若得此辈在位，陛下何所利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176276_comment'></div>若陛下疑觉有交党之私、招权之奸，则恐盛德之世，不宜如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176276_comment'></div>魏郑公以为上下各存形迹，则国之废兴，或未可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176276_comment'></div>若陛下不考察邪正是非，而每事如此猜防，则恐善人君子，各顾形迹，不敢尽其忠谠之言，而奸邪小人，得伺人主之疑，行谗慝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176276_comment'></div>若陛下恐陈升之闻此，或不自安，臣亦以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176276_comment'></div>汉高祖，雄猜之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176276_comment'></div>然鄂千秋论相国萧何功次，而高祖不疑，乃更加赏，亦不闻萧何以此为嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176276_comment'></div>陛下圣明高远，自汉以来，令德之祖，皆未有能企及陛下者，每事当以尧舜三代为法，奈何心存末世褊吝之事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176276_comment'></div>《书》曰：「任贤勿贰，去邪勿疑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176276_comment'></div>不明知其贤，而任之以为贤，不明见其邪，而疑之以为邪，非尧舜三代之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176276_comment'></div>陛下以臣为可信，故圣问及之，臣敢不尽愚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176276_comment'></div>今日口对，未能详悉，故谨具劄子以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月1日</a>　此日，撰表。作品：《八月一日永昭陵旦表》<div id='poem_1176896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176896?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八月一日永昭陵旦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176896")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176896_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176896'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176896'>伏以暑往御时，宵中应律，载班秋朔，申荐庙尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176896_comment'></div>伏惟尊谥皇帝体道成乾，施仁应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176896_comment'></div>率土方涵于圣化，宾天遽怆于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176896", 1176896, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>神游</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176896_comment'></div>追龙驾于空衢，莫知所税；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176896_comment'></div>瞻鸟耘之新陇，但有至怀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176896_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　撰梅询神道碑。作品：《翰林侍读学士知许州军州事梅公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林侍读学士知许州军州事梅公神道碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176723")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176723'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176723'>宋翰林侍读学士、正奉大夫、行给事中、知许州军州事、兼管内堤堰桥道劝农事、上柱国、南昌郡开国公、食邑二千三百户、食实封六百户、赐紫金鱼袋梅公之墓，在宣州宣城县长安乡西山里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176723_comment'></div>公有五子：鼎臣、德臣、宝臣、辅臣、清臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176723_comment'></div>清臣今独在，为尚书司门郎中，以公行状及乐安欧阳公之铭，来请文以刻墓碑，时熙宁元年八月四日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176723_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176723'>先公梅伯，后氏其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176723_comment'></div>弥周涉秦，不见史策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176723_comment'></div>有鋗有福，著汉名籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176723_comment'></div>公福之孙，询字昌言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176723_comment'></div>三世弗仕，陵阳之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176723_comment'></div>公第廷中，判官利丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176723_comment'></div>再岁而擢，以丞将作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176723_comment'></div>以宰仁和，人誉用多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176723_comment'></div>主推御史，侍考进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176723_comment'></div>一见天子，以为知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176723_comment'></div>诏曰试哉，遂试中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176723_comment'></div>馆之集贤，赐服绯鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176723_comment'></div>于时继迁，兵我西鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176723_comment'></div>老弱馈守，丁彊多死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176723_comment'></div>灵州告危，帝视不怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176723_comment'></div>公请择人，使潘罗支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176723_comment'></div>兵法所谓，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176723", 1176723, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>以夷攻夷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176723_comment'></div>帝曰：「谁可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176723_comment'></div>「无如臣者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176723_comment'></div>曰「予汝嘉，闭陷奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176723_comment'></div>公拜且跪，飏言而起：「茍纾西师，臣不爱死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176723_comment'></div>出书授之，「往讫尔谋」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176723_comment'></div>至疆敕还，会弃灵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176723_comment'></div>帝察公艺，可书帝制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176723_comment'></div>相或止之，留佐三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176723_comment'></div>其后罗支，果窘西贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176723_comment'></div>论将料敌，皆如所策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176723_comment'></div>或从或违，或挤或推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176723_comment'></div>梧合阻夷，神者公尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176723_comment'></div>黜之倅州，用狱一眚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176723_comment'></div>去杭而苏，列国东屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176723_comment'></div>漕输浙河，就付将领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176723_comment'></div>三年告功，仅得故省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176723_comment'></div>又以谴投，守彼淮州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176723_comment'></div>有僚许公，相得于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176723_comment'></div>与之欣然，乐以忘徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176723_comment'></div>使于湖北，迁自濠梁，又夺一官，往裨于襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176723_comment'></div>坐发驿马，给奔丧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176723_comment'></div>于鄂于苏，剖将之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176723_comment'></div>握节关中，使总其输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176723_comment'></div>煌煌金章，厥赐特殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176723_comment'></div>谋复灵武，度兵葫芦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176723_comment'></div>秦有将玮，诺公与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176723_comment'></div>会玮召还，公复沦胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176723_comment'></div>有反咸阳，能名氏朱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176723_comment'></div>始虽弗察，后捕而诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176723_comment'></div>自怀徂池，再副戎车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176723_comment'></div>真宗新陟，罪垢皆涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176723_comment'></div>为郎度支，以将广德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176723_comment'></div>外更四州，楚、寿、陕、荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176723_comment'></div>乃还待制，中纠狱刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176723_comment'></div>有岿龙图，其唐殖殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176723_comment'></div>就以学士，专其阁直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176723_comment'></div>辍之铨衡，乘传临并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176723_comment'></div>超迁郎秩，进直枢密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176723_comment'></div>趣归封驳，考国中失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176723_comment'></div>申命选事，得权进绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176723_comment'></div>加职侍读，改司群牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176723_comment'></div>移之审官，审是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1176723", 1176723, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>在服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176723_comment'></div>伐阅积迁，给事于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176723_comment'></div>告疾出许，鼓歌从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176723_comment'></div>方公少壮，志立人上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176723_comment'></div>谈辞慨然，帝悦而向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176723_comment'></div>及后晚出，皆为将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176723_comment'></div>公则老矣，将归田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176723_comment'></div>康定辛巳，六月十日，公七十八，以其官卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176723_comment'></div>公开南昌，勋爵第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176723_comment'></div>夫人曰刘，不及郡封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176723_comment'></div>封君彭城，其卒先公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176723_comment'></div>公卒明年，季秋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1176723", 1176723, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>挟日</span>，于州山西，卜祔而吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176723_comment'></div>公有四子，伯为进士，丞于殿中，与仲前死，仲赐科名，叔也皆丞，将作、殿中，或废或兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176723_comment'></div>有显惟季，时丞卫尉，今为郎中，论序初终，实来求诗，刻示无穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1176723_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月9日</a>　此日，以欧阳修辞知青州，草诏不允。作品：《赐观文殿学士兵部尚书欧阳修辞知青州不允诏二道》其一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月13日</a>　此日，与司马光于延和殿辩宰臣辞郊赉事，草诏。作品：《赐宰臣曾公亮已下辞南郊赐赉不允诏》<div id='poem_1175446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐宰相曾公亮已下辞南郊赐赉不允诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175446")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175446'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175446'>敕公亮等：朕初嗣服，于祖宗之制，未有所改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175446_comment'></div>卿等选于黎献，位冠百工，或受或辞，人用观政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175446_comment'></div>朝廷予夺，所以驭臣，贵贱有差，势如堂陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175446_comment'></div>惟先王之制国用，视时民数之多寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175446_comment'></div>方今生齿既蕃，而赋入又为不少，理财之义，殆有可思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175446_comment'></div>此之不图，而姑务自损，祇伤国体，未协朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175446_comment'></div>方与勋贤虑其大者，区区一赐，何足以言？</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1175446_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月14日</a>　此日，迩英阁侍讲毕独留。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月15日</a>　此日，草诏。作品：《批答宰臣曾公亮已下贺寿星见》《批答枢密使文彦博等贺寿星见》<div id='poem_1175481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175481?labeling=true' target='_blank'>批答宰臣曾公亮已下贺寿星见</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175481")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175481'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175481'>省表具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175481_comment'></div>乾象粲然，官占以告，寿祺之应，于传有稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175481_comment'></div>卿等<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1175481", 1175481, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>寅亮</span>帝工，阜成邦采，摛文告庆，归福朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175481_comment'></div>书瑞史篇，已循故事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175481_comment'></div>星隆晷德，尚赖交修。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1175481_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1175482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>批答枢密使文彦博等贺寿星见</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175482")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175482'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175482'>省表具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175482_comment'></div>穹旻见象，以告寿昌，嘉与臣民，并膺兹福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175482_comment'></div>卿等进繇德选，登翊事枢，敷奏兆祥，请书史策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175482_comment'></div>忠嘉之意，朕所不忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月20日</a>　此日，贾昌朝葬。作诗。作品：《贾魏公挽词二首》<div id='poem_69752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文元贾<span class='inlineComment2'>（三字张本作贾魏）</span>公挽辞二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69752")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69752'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69752'>功名烜赫在三朝，经术从容辅汉条。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69752'>儒服早纡丞相绂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69752", 69752, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>戎冠</span>再插侍中貂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69752'>开仓六塔流人<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作民）</span>复，出甲甘陵叛党销。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69752'>东第祇今空画像，当时于此识风标。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69752'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69752_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69751?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月20日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69751'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69751'>铭旌萧飒九秋风，薤露悲歌落月中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69751'>华屋几人思谢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>傅，佳城今日闭滕公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69751'>名垂竹帛书勋在，神寄丹青审象同。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69751'>天上貂蝉曾梦赐，归魂应佩<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作侍）</span>紫阳宫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69751'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_69751'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_69751_0'>⑴ 原作贾，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_69751_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月23日</a>　此日，迩英阁侍讲毕，神宗独留并赐坐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月28日</a>　此日，欧阳修再辞免知青州。草诏不允。作品：《赐观文殿学士兵部尚书欧阳修辞知青州不允诏二道》其二。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月</a>　八月，为郑獬母撰墓志铭。作品：《郑公夫人李氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑公夫人李氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176843")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176843'>尚书祠部郎中、赠户部侍郎安陆郑公讳纾之夫人追封汝南郡太君李氏者，尚书驾部郎中、赠卫尉卿文蔚之子也，光州仙居县令、赠工部员外郎讳岵之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176843_comment'></div>以祥符九年嫁，至天圣九年，年三十二，以八月壬辰，卒于其夫为安州应城县主簿之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176843_comment'></div>后三十七年，为熙宁元年八月庚申，祔于其夫安陆太平乡进贤里之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176843_comment'></div>于是夫人两子：狝为秘书丞，知潭州攸县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176843_comment'></div>獬为翰林学士、尚书兵部员外郎、知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176843_comment'></div>一女子，嫁郊社斋郎张蒙山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176843_comment'></div>夫人敏于德，详于礼，事皇姑称孝，内谐外附，上下裕如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176843_comment'></div>郑公大姓，尝以其富主四方之游士，至侍郎则始贫而专于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176843_comment'></div>夫人又故富家，尽其资以助宾祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176843_comment'></div>补纫浣濯，饎爨朝夕，人有不任其劳苦，夫人欢终日，如未尝贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176843_comment'></div>故侍郎亦以自安于困约之时，如未尝富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176843_comment'></div>郑氏盖将日显矣，而夫人不及其显禄，呜呼，良可悲也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176843_comment'></div>于其葬，临川人王某为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176843'>于嗟夫人，归孔昭兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176843_comment'></div>窈其为德，婉有仪兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176843_comment'></div>命云如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176843_comment'></div>壮则萎兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176843_comment'></div>烝烝令子，悲慕思兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176843_comment'></div>有严葬祔，祭配祗兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176843_comment'></div>告哀无穷，铭此诗兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年9月</a>　九月，撰孙锡墓志铭。作品：《宋尚书司封郎中孙公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋尚书司封郎中孙公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176794")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176794'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176794'>公讳锡，字昌龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176794_comment'></div>曾祖钊，祖易从，父再荣，皆弗仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176794_comment'></div>及公仕，赠其父至尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176794_comment'></div>公以天圣二年进士起家和州历阳、无为巢二县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176794_comment'></div>部使者及两制以御札举者十馀人，改镇江军节度推官，知杭州仁和县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176794_comment'></div>籍取凶恶，戒以不改必穷极案治，而治其馀一以仁恕，故县人畏爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176794_comment'></div>以兵部丧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176794_comment'></div>三年，乃用举者以集庆军节度掌书记充国子监直讲，豫校《史记》，前、后《汉书》，《南》、《北史》，修《集韵》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176794_comment'></div>选苏王宫伴读，教导有法，宗室召<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176794", 1176794, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>燕饮</span>，未尝往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176794_comment'></div>居顷之，改著作佐郎，当罢矣，又留为国子监丞，讲读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176794_comment'></div>七年，乃用举者召试集贤校理，同知太常礼院，判吏部南曹、登闻鼓院，为开封府推官，赐绯鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176794_comment'></div>坐考锁厅进士举籍中有不中格者两人，降监和州清酒务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176794_comment'></div>当是时，庞宰相为枢密使，荐宜侍讲禁中，方召，而公以谪去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176794_comment'></div>久之，会明堂恩召还，同判尚书刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176794_comment'></div>先时，主者多持事往决于中书，公独视法如何，不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176794_comment'></div>戎州人向吉等操兵贾贩，恃其众，所过不输物税，州县捕逐，皆散走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176794_comment'></div>成都钤辖司奏请不以南郊赦除其罪，从之，逮捕亲属系狱，至更两赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176794_comment'></div>有诣阙诉者，刑部详覆官以为持敕遇赦不原者，虽数赦，犹论如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176794_comment'></div>公独奏释之，凡释百二十三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176794_comment'></div>公于议法多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176794_comment'></div>复为开封府推官，当随尹奏事，仁宗问大辟几何，且以慎刑爱人为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176794_comment'></div>公因奏《开封敕》有重于《编敕》而当改者数事，仁宗皆以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176794_comment'></div>它日，问尹以公姓名，称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176794_comment'></div>于是贵戚女使有奏谳，上薄其罪，付公监决，曰：「此人平恕，可任也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176794_comment'></div>道士赵清贶出入庞宰相家，受赇，御史以劾庞，府治实清贶自为，庞不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176794_comment'></div>清贶坐杖配沙门岛，行两日死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176794_comment'></div>御史又劾府希宰相指，故杖清贶，杀之灭口，仁宗亦疑，乃悉罢知府、推判官，而以公知太平州，初，清贶事独判官王砺劾决，公不自辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176794_comment'></div>未几，仁宗即寤，罢者皆复，而以公提点淮南路刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176794_comment'></div>在淮南二年，所活大辟十三人，考课为天下第一，所举多善士，未尝听人请属，还为三司户部判官，求知宣州，许之，特诏秩禄视转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176794_comment'></div>至则召五县令，约以州所下书有不便封还，故县得自为政而州无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176794_comment'></div>且满，州人诣转运使、提点刑狱，乞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176794_comment'></div>还，又知舒州，发常平、广惠仓以活陈、许、颍、蔡流人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176794_comment'></div>及归，计口量远近给食遣去，去者率钱买香，焚之府门以祝公，至或感泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176794_comment'></div>初，提点刑狱恐聚流人为盗，又惜常平、广惠仓，数牒止公，不听，申以手书，又不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176794_comment'></div>佐属皆争曰：「不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176794_comment'></div>公行之自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176794_comment'></div>比代去，州人阖城门留之，薄暮，与争门乃得出，遂以告老致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176794_comment'></div>于是官至尚书度支郎中，散官至朝奉郎，勋至上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176794_comment'></div>今上即位，迁司封，赐金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176794_comment'></div>以熙宁元年正月十二日卒，年七十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176794_comment'></div>孙氏世为广陵富姓，兵部兄弟五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176794_comment'></div>其季妇有子寡，欲分财，以义譬解不得，乃悉推田宅与诸兄弟，脱身携公居建安军扬子，故今为真州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176794_comment'></div>诸兄弟后破产，而兵部居扬子，又卒为富姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176794_comment'></div>为公千里迎师，立学舍，市书至六七千卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176794_comment'></div>公感励奋激，诵习忘寝食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176794_comment'></div>年十九举进士开封第二，坐同保匿服罢，而再举又第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176794_comment'></div>当是时，以文学称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176794_comment'></div>及仕，号为忠厚正直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176794_comment'></div>终身未尝言利，老而贫，不以为悔，乡人尤归其长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176794_comment'></div>有文集二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176794_comment'></div>初娶庄氏，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176794_comment'></div>又娶裴氏、刁氏，刁氏封寿安县君，亦前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176794_comment'></div>子湜、澄、泳、渊、淑、湘早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176794_comment'></div>溱，太庙斋郎，后公数月死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176794_comment'></div>澄，楚州宝应主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176794_comment'></div>洙，秘书丞、集贤校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176794_comment'></div>渐，太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176794_comment'></div>女十人：一人嫁，三人未嫁，三人嫁而卒，三人未嫁而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176794_comment'></div>九月十六日，葬公扬子县怀民乡北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176794_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1176794'>于戏孙公！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176794_comment'></div>有直其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176794_comment'></div>为之少时，以济壮老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176794_comment'></div>人信公行，承趋荐保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176794_comment'></div>天顺公德，与公寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176794_comment'></div>维公有子，丧事哀祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176794_comment'></div>慰其考思，用此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1176794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年9月</a>　九月，上劄乞朝仁宗、英宗陵。作品：《乞朝陵劄子》<div id='poem_1176216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞朝陵劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176216")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176216'>臣当仁宗皇帝、英宗皇帝迁坐之时，方以遭丧、疾病在外，今蒙召还，复备从官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176216_comment'></div>伏见朝廷将命官朝拜诸陵，臣欲备使，冀得少纾蝼蚁区区感慕之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176216_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特赐矜许。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176897_comment'></div>岁回薄以将更，物盛多而可享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176897_comment'></div>恭惟尊谥皇帝，德符穹昊，功济黎元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176897_comment'></div>方求大隗之居，遂兆成周之葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176897_comment'></div>光灵在望，感恻交怀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176897_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176898?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十月一日起居永安陵等处诸陵表</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176898'>伏以日星随旋，岁月从迈，物更收捃之候，人积悽怆之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176898_comment'></div>恭惟尊谥皇帝躬睿广之材，抚休明之运，协九皇而高世，追三后之在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176898_comment'></div>方以眇躬，嗣膺神器，想威灵之如在，感气序以增欷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176898_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176899?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十月一日起居永安陵等处诸后陵表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年10月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176899")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176899'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176899'>伏以哀恫在疚，未尽通丧，弦晦如流，载更良月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176899_comment'></div>恭惟尊谥皇后降釐妫汭，播美河洲，著慈范以如存，流徽音而可想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176899_comment'></div>溯陵永望，感节深追。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176899_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176905?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176905'>伏以徂岁如流，甫更良月，遗衣所御，实有经祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176905_comment'></div>方属投艰，仰承锡羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176905_comment'></div>瞻威灵而如在，历时序以增思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176905_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　经筵讲《礼记》“曾子易箦”，为神宗开陈姑息之弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　经筵侍讲，数难《礼记》之非，请罢之，讲《尚书》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年10月3日</a>　此日，讲筵后留坐，勉神宗法尧、舜，辨四凶，去小人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　此日，撰表。作品：《南郊下元节更不于景灵宫朝拜奏告圣祖大帝表》《降圣节皇帝谢内中露香表》<div id='poem_1176908' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176908' class='poemTitle </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176908")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176908_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176908'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176908'>伏以帝系所元，仙游如在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176908_comment'></div>载更令节，当款殊庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176908_comment'></div>以卜禋祠，将陈祼献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176908_comment'></div>惟祭仪之难黩，冀神监之具昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176908_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176908_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>降圣节皇帝谢内中露香表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年10月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176891'>伏以昊天锡命，实佑永图，良月御时，载临嘉节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176891_comment'></div>率循故事，升荐至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176891_comment'></div>仰冀灵明，溥垂庇贶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176891_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　撰李陟神道碑。。作品：《尚书屯田员外郎赠刑部尚书李公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书屯田员外郎赠刑部尚书李公神道碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176730")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176730'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176730'>朝奉郎、尚书屯田员外郎、通判杭州军州兼管内劝农事、上轻车都尉、赐绯鱼袋、赠刑部尚书李公，讳陟，字元升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176730_comment'></div>少以进士举太学，众推才高，不妄交游，独与故相张文节公友善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176730_comment'></div>淳化中，用甲科补河南府渑池县尉，群盗阻殽以略行人，朝廷出中贵人传捕，公率其属捕杀之尽，以故为转运使所奏，留再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176730_comment'></div>方赏，遭父丧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176730_comment'></div>而契丹犯河北，率亡命相聚为寇，所居内黄大扰，令、尉初不自保，公为设方略擒灭，县赖以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176730_comment'></div>改除贝州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176730_comment'></div>州将边公肃知公能，有难辄以属公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176730_comment'></div>逐剧贼，用一日驰百里，悉缚取以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176730_comment'></div>于是州及转运使为论功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176730_comment'></div>驿召见，除大理寺丞、知汉州什邡县，改殿中丞、知秀州嘉兴县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176730_comment'></div>真宗东封，改太常博士，通判通利军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176730_comment'></div>又以祀汾阴，改尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176730_comment'></div>河决，夺一官，监真州盐仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176730_comment'></div>杭州言浙江堤坏不可治，诏江、淮、荆、浙发运使，举可用者，以公通判杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176730_comment'></div>堤成，度用财力甚省，而完且可久，乃复得故官，留再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176730_comment'></div>当是时，吕文靖公提点刑狱，尤知公，极论荐以为材，且召除御史矣，会母夫人死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176730_comment'></div>公行内脩，事母尤以孝闻，所收恤亲属多，贫不能北归，留治丧南京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176730_comment'></div>哀戚毁甚，未及服除而卒，年五十三，天禧三年六月八日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176730_comment'></div>留守王沂公赙助之，乃能具棺殡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176730_comment'></div>凡五娶：贾氏、高氏、张氏、耿氏，最后边氏，封太康县君，今皆赠郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176730_comment'></div>边氏则贝州边公女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176730_comment'></div>边公彊明，少所可，知公而好之，故女以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176730_comment'></div>太康有贤行，盖见于国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176730_comment'></div>公二男四女，男曰中庸，守大理寺丞致仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176730_comment'></div>曰中师，给事中、天章阁待制、西京留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176730_comment'></div>女嫁太子中舍聂复，贝州漳南县令葛初平，尚书比部员外郎张参，其一早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176730_comment'></div>公初以文艺自进，然喜吏事，所至强果辨治，终以爱利为人所思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176730_comment'></div>嘉祐七年十一月二十三日，葬于卫州新乡县贵德乡戒海里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176730_comment'></div>至熙宁元年十月，乃始作铭刻之墓碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176730_comment'></div>李氏故博平人，后徙内黄，曾祖讳祚，弗仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176730_comment'></div>祖讳守澄，开封府襄邑县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176730_comment'></div>考讳珣，殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176730_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1176730'>矫矫李公，升自辞科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176730_comment'></div>启迹渑池，终功浙河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176730_comment'></div>课文曰治，武奏厥多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176730_comment'></div>毁于大丧，曾不及皤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176730_comment'></div>素琴未御，虞殡遂歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176730_comment'></div>垂延在后，宠禄有那。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176730_comment'></div>兆卫西南，彼坟陂陁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176730_comment'></div>追秩荣矣，哀如之何！</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1176730_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月</a>　十一月，奏乞追还陈习，以昭示信令，神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月</a>　冬至，撰表。作品：《冬至节皇帝谢内中露香表》《冬至节上诸陵表》《冬至节上诸皇后陵表》《冬至节上南京鸿庆宫等诸帝表》<div id='poem_1176892' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176892' id='poem_sentence_1_1176900_comment'></div>感时序之变流，想威灵而惨结。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176900_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176901' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176901'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176901'>伏以四时交御，一气潜萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176901_comment'></div>庆虽属于履长，悲岂忘于追慕？<div href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176906")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176906'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176906'>伏以子位杓回，黄宫气应，既兆天正之始，方扶阳律之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176906_comment'></div>恭惟尊号皇帝，体道迈仁，膺时建极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176906_comment'></div>豫游所次，馆御如存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176906_comment'></div>抚时序之变更，仰威神而感恻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1176906_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月</a>　或言郊祀不当入庙，神宗令详议，遂上劄非之，以为神宗尚在谅阴，不宜遽变更、自制礼。作品：《议入庙劄子》<div id='poem_1176208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议入庙劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176208")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176208'>臣今日曾公亮传圣旨，以臣寮上言「郊祀不当入庙」，令臣详议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176208_comment'></div>臣愚以为制天下之事，当令本末终始相称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176208_comment'></div>今既奉先帝遗诏，外行以日易月之礼，又诸所以崇事祖宗，皆循本朝制度，独于入庙则欲变先帝故事，而远从三代之礼，臣恐于事之本末终始不为相称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176208_comment'></div>必欲尽除近世之制度，一以三代为法，则今陛下尚在谅阴之中，非可以制礼之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176208_comment'></div>且言者以为丧三年不祭于庙，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176208_comment'></div>而今乃欲令公卿代告，此何礼也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176208_comment'></div>臣窃以为今之礼不合于三代者多矣，言者不以为非，而专疑不当入庙者，盖于所习见则安，于所罕见则怪，恐不足留圣听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176208_comment'></div>臣学术浅陋，误蒙访逮，敢不尽愚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176208_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月17日</a>　此日，以神宗朝饗太庙，撰文。作品：《朝享圣祖大帝仁宗英宗皇帝册文三道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年11月18日</a>　此日，以神宗祭祀天地与圜丘、大赦，撰文。作品：《郊祀昊天上皇帝地衹太祖皇帝册文三道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　以富弼辞免南郊礼毕支赐，草诏不允。作品：《赐判汝州富弼辞免南郊礼毕支赐诏》<div id='poem_1175445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐判汝州富弼辞免南郊礼毕支赐诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175445")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175445'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175445'>敕富弼：省所奏免南郊支赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175445_comment'></div>受釐于神，赉及蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175445_comment'></div>卿勋德兼茂，中外具瞻，恩典所加，当先群辟，区区一赐，何足以辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175445_comment'></div>当体眷怀，共膺贶施。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1175445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　仲伯达为父求铭，为撰墓志铭。作品：《尚书屯田员外郎仲君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书屯田员外郎仲君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176770")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176770_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176770'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176770'>君仲氏，讳讷，字朴翁，广济军定陶人，曾祖讳环，祖讳祚，皆弗仕，而至君父讳尹，始仕至曹州观察支使，赠右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176770_comment'></div>君景祐元年进士，起家莫州防御推官，年少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176770", 1176770, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>初官</span>，然上下无敢易者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176770_comment'></div>时传契丹且大扰边，朝廷使中贵人来问，知州张崇俊未知所对，公策契丹无他为，具奏论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176770_comment'></div>崇俊喜曰：「朝廷必知非吾能为此，然亦当善我能听用君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176770_comment'></div>又权博州防御判官，以母夫人丧去，去三年，复权明州节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176770_comment'></div>县送海贼数十人，狱具矣，君独疑而辨之，数十人者皆得雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176770_comment'></div>用举者改大理寺丞，知大名府清平、邛州临溪两县，又通判解州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176770_comment'></div>于是三迁为尚书屯田员外郎，而以皇祐五年十二月二十一日卒，年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176770_comment'></div>君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176770", 1176770, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>厚重</span>有大志，不妄言笑，喜读书，为古文章，晚而尤好为诗，诗尤称于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176770_comment'></div>所在有声绩，然直道自信，于权贵人不肯有所屈，故好者少，然亦多知其非常人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176770_comment'></div>其在越、蜀，士多从之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176770_comment'></div>当宝元、康定间，言者喜论兵，其计不过攻守而已，君独推《书》所谓「食哉唯时，柔远能迩，惇德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176770", 1176770, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>允元</span>，而难任人，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176770", 1176770, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>蛮夷</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176770", 1176770, "Clauses/56/Comments/2")'>率服</span>」，为《御戎议》二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176770_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176770_comment'></div>此流俗所羞，以为迂而弗言者也，非明于先王之义，则孰知夫中国安富尊强之为必出于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176770_comment'></div>君知此矣，则其自信不屈，宜以有所负而然，惜乎其未试也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176770_comment'></div>君初娶王氏，尚书驾部郎中兰之女，又娶李氏，尚书虞部员外郎宋卿之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176770_comment'></div>三男子：伯达为太常博士，次伯适、伯同，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176770_comment'></div>三女子：嫁殿中丞任庾、并州交城县尉崔绛、兴元府户曹参军任膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176770_comment'></div>博士以熙宁元年十一月二十一日葬君于定陶之闵丘乡，而以余之闻君也，来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176770_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176770'>于戏朴翁，天偶人觭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176770_comment'></div>翔其德音，而踬于时。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年12月</a>　十二月，乞令张师温参选注官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年12月21日</a>　此日，草诏趣富弼赴阙。作品：《赐判汝州富弼赴阙诏二道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　甚得神宗宠信，欲用为参知政事，而唐介以泥古迂阔、必多变更而非之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　是年，经筵侍讲，神宗问周公用天子礼乐事，答之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　神宗问《尚书·益稷》君臣赓歌事，答之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　是年，撰张裪墓志铭。作品：《朝奉郎尚书司封员外郎张君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎尚书司封员外郎张君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176804")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176804'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176804'>朝奉郎、尚书司封员外郎、知安州军州兼管内劝农事、骑都尉、赐绯鱼袋，借紫张君，年五十六，以皇祐二年十二月十一日卒，以熙宁元年某月某日葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176804_comment'></div>君讳祹，字圣休，馀杭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176804_comment'></div>曾祖曰浩，祖曰文宝，弗仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176804_comment'></div>考曰延遇，仕至左侍禁，赠官至左骁骑将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176804_comment'></div>君少孤，与其弟祗皆文行知名，以布衣教授宗室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176804_comment'></div>后中进士第，历宣州宣城县主簿，抚州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176804_comment'></div>用举者迁大理寺丞，知雅州名山、洪州奉新两县，监海州榷货务，通判池、广两州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176804_comment'></div>乃自尚书屯田员外郎召拜殿中侍御史，用磨勘，迁侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176804_comment'></div>劾奏殿前都指挥使郭承祐恃恩骄嫚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176804_comment'></div>论宦官虽高，不当坐侍燕，而谪请求者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176804_comment'></div>又论不当禁谏官御史风闻言事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176804_comment'></div>仁宗皆以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176804_comment'></div>君之为吏也，数决疑狱，所至称辨治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176804_comment'></div>及是言事，又能举其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176804_comment'></div>方是时为御史者，援举多不次，君素宽裕静退，耻以弹治人得用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176804_comment'></div>未几，即称疾求出，乃知安州，州大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176804_comment'></div>会卒，人追丧车恸哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176804_comment'></div>初，骁骑府君监湖州兵，遂葬卞山，至是，君从葬，以夫人京兆县君施氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176804_comment'></div>施氏生一子稚恭，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176804_comment'></div>一女，适信州司理参军王汶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176804_comment'></div>孙大正、大成、大亨、大钧，今尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176804_comment'></div>君事母孝，友其弟甚笃，于权势财利能廉，吏治尤可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176804_comment'></div>在广州，奏请城之，未及筑外郛而召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176804_comment'></div>后侬智高反，州人赖君所筑活，以不卒功为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176804_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1176804'>有嘉张君，质静宽徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176804_comment'></div>进非所好，人用称誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176804_comment'></div>视利在前，蹲循弗趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176804_comment'></div>退施一州，用智之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176804_comment'></div>嘻其葬矣，次有铭书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　是年，撰王贽夫人墓志铭。作品：《同安郡君刘氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同安郡君刘氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176836")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176836'>尚书户部侍郎致仕庐陵王公贽之夫人，同县刘氏女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176836_comment'></div>父讳某，祖讳某，曾祖讳某，三世皆弗仕，然常为州大姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176836_comment'></div>方公少时，夫人父知公必贵，故归以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176836_comment'></div>夫人之在父母家，既以孝闻，及嫁，舅姑又称其孝，能相其夫以顺，又能畜其妇子以慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176836_comment'></div>公当仁宗时，以御史见听用，阅天章、龙图、枢密三学士，夫人亦累封为同安郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176836_comment'></div>治平四年十一月七日，终于庐陵宣化坊之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176836_comment'></div>有二子：仪，殿中丞，前死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176836_comment'></div>亿，今为尚书都官员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176836_comment'></div>女一人，嫁抚州军事推官萧迅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176836_comment'></div>公之告老，诏以亿通判本州以养，及是丧夫人，能自致焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176836_comment'></div>明年某月某日，葬某县某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176836_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176836'>于美夫人，明祗顺饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176836_comment'></div>来嫔王宗，时蓺其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176836_comment'></div>公荣在朝，皇命所特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176836_comment'></div>出使入侍，往来赫赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176836_comment'></div>登为大家，自我承翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176836_comment'></div>有田有庐，偕老而息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176836_comment'></div>亦有孝子，媚于朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176836_comment'></div>噫乎终哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176836_comment'></div>兆此幽宅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176836_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　是年，作诗咏学士院燕侍郎山水图。作品：《学士院燕侍郎画屏》<div id='poem_69425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176815'>君讳世仍，字季迁，宣城郡公后审第十子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176815_comment'></div>宣城以越懿王讳德昭为祖，以安定郡公讳惟和为考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176815_comment'></div>君母曰渤海郡夫人吴氏，实山南东道节度使元扆之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176815_comment'></div>娶潘氏，郑王美之孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176815_comment'></div>年二十二，生二男子一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176815_comment'></div>以熙宁元年八月二十三日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176815_comment'></div>于是官至右千牛卫将军，制以右屯卫大将军告其第，用二年二月十九日，葬于河南府永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176815_comment'></div>君授《尚书》，能通章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176815_comment'></div>遇人恭谨有恩，然喜饮酒，以故得疾死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176815_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176815'>有昭其明，有韡其荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176815_comment'></div>维其弗冯，以陨其生。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176815_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176827' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176827' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176827?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右武卫大将军黎州刺史世岳故妻安喜县君李氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176827")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176827'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176827'>安喜县君李氏，连州刺史、赠太师、中书令、尚书令继昌之曾孙，镇国军节度使、驸马都尉、赠太师、中书尚书令、秦国文和公遵勉之孙，供备库使、赠安武军节度使端宪之子，是为皇族右武卫大将军、黎州刺史世岳之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176827_comment'></div>温柔静恭，内外亲称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176827_comment'></div>治平四年，年二十五，以十一月二十四日感疾死，至二年二月十七日葬河南府永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176827_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176827'>懿懿献穆，下归以祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176827_comment'></div>有来肃雍，施及孙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176827_comment'></div>厥嫔皇宗，莫丑具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176827_comment'></div>噫乎终藏，兆此新里。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176827_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右千牛卫将军仲焉故妻永嘉县君武氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176842")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176842'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176842'>皇族右千牛卫将军仲焉之妻、故永嘉县君武氏，内殿崇班掖之子，故左班殿直昭逊之孙，赠尚书工部侍郎崇亮之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176842_comment'></div>年十八，以熙宁元年十二月十四日弃世，以明年二月十七日，葬河南永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176842_comment'></div>县君在襁褓，父母以为婉，及嫁，节俭慈仁，人称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176842_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176842'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176842", 1176842, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>象服</span>之粲兮，容车之睆兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176842_comment'></div>归于陵陂，哀歌以相挽兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176842_comment'></div>摛铭圹石，识幽以告远兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1176842_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右监门卫大将军世耀故妻仁寿县君康氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176840")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176840'>皇族右监门大将军世耀之妻康氏，故内殿崇班、閤门祗候遵度之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176840_comment'></div>祖曰廷翰，皇任磁州防御使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176840_comment'></div>曾祖曰硕，皇赠左千牛卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176840_comment'></div>以嘉祐三年为宗妇，封仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176840_comment'></div>生一子令优，为右千牛卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176840_comment'></div>而以熙宁元年六月九日疾病死，享年二十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176840_comment'></div>自为女子以至于为母，卑尊幼长无所非议，故于其死皆哀怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176840_comment'></div>二年二月十七日，葬河南永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176840_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176840'>芒乎其孰致而来？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176840_comment'></div>奄乎其孰推而往？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176840_comment'></div>为之幽宫，覆以新壤，魂浮气游，变化惚恍，宛其德音，尚可追想。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176840_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋赠保宁军节度观察留后追封东阳郡公宗辩墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176810")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176810'>公讳宗辩，字慎微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176810_comment'></div>祖讳元佐，是为魏恭宪王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176810_comment'></div>考讳允升，太师、平阳郡王，谥曰恭懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176810_comment'></div>公平阳第十三子，生数岁而平阳薨，事母孝，友于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176810_comment'></div>好读书，不舍昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176810_comment'></div>常献所为文，得试学士院，兄弟四人，皆中优等，迁官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176810_comment'></div>而仁宗遇公甚宠，尝亲书「近亲才贤，好文博古」八字赐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176810_comment'></div>公既好书，又嗜医方，所蓄方甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176810_comment'></div>每躬自治药，以振人之疾，其恻隐不倦，盖天性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176810_comment'></div>以熙宁元年七月己卯，终于睦亲北宅，享年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176810_comment'></div>官至右卫大将军、金州防御使，爵天水郡开国公，食邑三千户，食实封五百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176810_comment'></div>赠保宁军节度观察留后，追封东阳郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176810_comment'></div>夫人李氏，封德安郡君，赠尚书、中书令汉琼之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176810_comment'></div>子男十五人：仲富，右内率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176810_comment'></div>仲寻，右羽林军大将军、黎州团练使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176810_comment'></div>仲绾，右武卫大将军、雅州刺史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176810_comment'></div>仲瑝，右武卫大将军、彭州刺史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176810_comment'></div>仲缄，右千牛卫将军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176810_comment'></div>仲汧，右监门率府率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176810_comment'></div>仲琨，右内率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176810_comment'></div>仲富前公卒，馀亦皆蚤死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176810_comment'></div>女子十九人：嫁者四人，未嫁而死者九人，馀尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176810_comment'></div>二年二月十七日，葬河南永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176810_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1176810'>猗欤贤公，蕃此皇国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176810_comment'></div>耀其藻章，以贲明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176810_comment'></div>能不外勚，维家之饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176810_comment'></div>厥承诜诜，馈我无射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176810_comment'></div>如何不怡，遂永窀穸！</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1176810'></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1176810_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠虔州观察使追封南康侯仲行墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176811")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176811'>公讳仲行，字德之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176811_comment'></div>故婺州观察使讳宗迥之子，赠节度使、同中书门下平章事蔡国公讳允言之孙，魏王讳元佐之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176811_comment'></div>母曰齐安郡君梁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176811_comment'></div>庆历四年赐名，除太子右卫率府率、右监门卫大将军，爵天水郡开国侯，食邑一千三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176811_comment'></div>年二十二，以治平四年八月二十九日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176811_comment'></div>赠虔州观察使，追封南康侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176811_comment'></div>夫人张氏，封寿昌县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176811_comment'></div>子男士仡，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176811_comment'></div>士泉，右监门率府率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176811_comment'></div>其季与女皆尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176811_comment'></div>君仁而好学，其卒也宗室皆怜伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176811_comment'></div>其葬也以熙宁二年二月十七日，葬河南府永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176811_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176811'>爵之尊，禄之殖，维年之卑不配德。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176811_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176812' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176812' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176812?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠华州观察使追封华阴侯仲庬墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176812")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176812_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176812'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176812'>公讳仲庬，字子厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176812_comment'></div>濮国公宗朴之子，濮安懿王讳允让之孙，鲁恭靖王讳元份之曾孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176812_comment'></div>母曰萧国夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176812_comment'></div>以皇祐元年赐名，除太子右内率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176812_comment'></div>二年，改太子右监门率府率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176812_comment'></div>嘉祐五年，改右千牛卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176812_comment'></div>八年，改右监门卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176812_comment'></div>治平二年，领嘉州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176812_comment'></div>四年，改右武卫大将军，领雅州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176812_comment'></div>熙宁元年，年二十四，以三月三日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176812_comment'></div>上为不视朝一日，内出司宾祭吊，赠华州观察使，追封华阴侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176812_comment'></div>公生而秀丽，长而聪敏，于宗室为好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176812_comment'></div>上承下抚，无不得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176812_comment'></div>故其卒，哭者皆为尽哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176812_comment'></div>妻马氏，封安平县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176812_comment'></div>女一人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176812_comment'></div>公以熙宁二年二月十七日，葬河南府永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176812_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1176812'>维濮世封，实承安懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176812_comment'></div>公绪厥庆，尚终有嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176812_comment'></div>奄其丧矣，一女之存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176812_comment'></div>归铭幽宫，以慰公魂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176812_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176813' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176813' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176813?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠奉宁军节度使追封祁国公宗述墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176813")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176813_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176813'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176813'>公讳宗述，字子耆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176813_comment'></div>韩恭懿王讳元偓之孙，而东平郡王名允弼之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176813_comment'></div>以天圣元年生，以景祐元年赐名，除右侍禁，历太子右司御率府、右监门卫将军、左屯卫大将军、廉州刺史，隰州团练使，潍州、嘉州防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176813_comment'></div>熙宁元年正月十八日，以不起闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176813_comment'></div>上幸其第奠哭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176813_comment'></div>赠奉宁军节度使，追封祁国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176813_comment'></div>越明年，二月十七日，葬河南永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176813_comment'></div>公重厚，寡笑言，内行治，未尝有谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176813_comment'></div>乐振施，知音乐，善射，尤为东平王所爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176813_comment'></div>妻任氏，乐安郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176813_comment'></div>子男七人：仲璆、仲俶、仲诱、仲尪、仲酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176813_comment'></div>仲璆早卒，两人未名而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176813_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176813'>维德之嘉，维能之多，惟命之不遐，宗室之嗟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176813_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176814' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176814' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176814?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右千牛卫将军仲夔墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176814")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176814_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176814'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176814'>君讳仲夔，字彦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176814_comment'></div>曾祖讳元佐，是为魏恭宪王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176814_comment'></div>祖讳允言，赠安远军节度使、同中书门下平章事，封密国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176814_comment'></div>父宗悦，前左屯卫大将军、池州团练使，祁国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176814_comment'></div>君官至右千牛卫将军，坐法废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176814_comment'></div>熙宁元年，年二十二，以五月二十五日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176814_comment'></div>至某年某月某日，葬河南府永安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176814_comment'></div>妻郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176814_comment'></div>有六男子，死者四人，士㱺今为右监门率府率，一人尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176814_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176814'>托灵皇宗庆之多，终以无禄伤如何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176814_comment'></div>弃此白日营山阿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176814_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年2月3日</a>　此日，自翰林学士、工部侍郎兼侍讲，除右谏议大夫、参知政事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　上表辞免参知政事。作品：《辞免参知政事表》<div id='poem_1176030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免参知政事表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176030")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176030'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176030'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣右谏议大夫、参知政事，馀如故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176030_comment'></div>才薄望轻，恩隆责重，敢缘聪听，冒进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176030", 1176030, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>忱辞</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176030_comment'></div>窃以建用宗工，与图大政，以人贤否，为世盛衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176030_comment'></div>矧休运之有开，须伟材而为辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176030_comment'></div>岂容虚受，以误明扬？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176030_comment'></div>如臣者，承学未优，知方尤晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176030_comment'></div>先朝备位，每怀窃食之惭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176030_comment'></div>故里服丧，重困采薪之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176030_comment'></div>皇帝陛下绍膺皇统，俯记孤忠，付之方面之权，还之禁林之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176030_comment'></div>固已人言之可畏，岂云国论之敢知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176030_comment'></div>忽被宠灵，滋怀愧恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176030_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下考慎所与，烛知不能，许还谬恩，以允公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176030_comment'></div>庶少安于鄙分，无甚累于圣时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176030_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　上两府启辞免参知政事。作品：《免参政上两府启》<div id='poem_1176446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>免参政上两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176446")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176446'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176446'>忽奉明缗，俾参大政，蒙恩则厚，抚己不遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176446_comment'></div>切以圣明之时，尤艰辅弼之任，置人或误，累上非轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176446_comment'></div>内揆拙疏，仰惭优渥，虽已陈情而恳避，犹疑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176446", 1176446, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>涣汗</span>之难回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176446_comment'></div>敢竭吝衷，更烦公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176446_comment'></div>伏惟某官望隆熙世，谋协睿聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176446_comment'></div>傥矜一介之诚，愿借半辞之助，使安常分，无忝盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176446_comment'></div>亦所以正选用之缪恩，不独荷保全之私惠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176446_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　上谢表。作品：《除参知政事谢表》<div id='poem_1176031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除参知政事谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176031")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176031'>丞弼之任，贤智所难，顾惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176031", 1176031, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>缺然</span>，何以堪此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176031_comment'></div>仰膺成命，弗获固辞<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176031_comment'></div>窃以古先哲王，考慎厥辅，皆有一德，用成众功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176031_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下含独见之明，践久安之运，甫终谅闇，将大施为，宜得伟人，与图庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176031_comment'></div>如臣者，徒以承学，粗知义方，本无它长，可备官使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176031_comment'></div>退安私室，自绝荣涂，既负采薪之忧，因逃窃位之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176031_comment'></div>大明继烛，正路宏开，付以蕃宣，还之侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176031_comment'></div>清闲之宴，或赐开筵，浅陋所闻，每蒙知奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176031_comment'></div>以为奉令承教，庶几无尤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176031_comment'></div>至于当轴处中，良非所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176031_comment'></div>宠光曲被，震愧交怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176031_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下德懋旁求，志存远举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176031_comment'></div>隆宽尽下，故忠良有以输心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176031_comment'></div>公听并观，故谗慝不能肆志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176031_comment'></div>矧睿谋之天纵，方圣治之日跻，思称所蒙，敢忘自竭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176031_comment'></div>远猷经国，虽或愧于前修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176031_comment'></div>直道事君，期不隳于素守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176031_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176031_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　封赠三代。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　奏请中书处分宜止令中书出牒，唐介沮之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　数与唐介争论。<br /><a
