ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年4月26日</a>　此日，摄司徒，与吕公弼同持节册命皇后。作品：《册皇后文》<div id='poem_1175418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175418' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175418?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇后册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年4月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175418")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175418'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175418'>维熙宁二年，岁次己酉，四月丁酉朔，二十六日壬戌，皇帝若曰：自昔有天下，必择建厥配，以承宗庙，以御家邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175418_comment'></div>肆朕受命，奉循前烈，考慎典册，以祈协于神民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175418_comment'></div>咨尔向氏，懿柔淑恭，旧有显闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175418_comment'></div>肇功惟祖，弼亮帝室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175418_comment'></div>流德之泽，覃延后嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175418_comment'></div>是产硕媛，比贤姜、任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175418_comment'></div>越朕初载，来嫔藩邸，盥馈在中，率礼无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175418_comment'></div>以至嗣服，祗承内事，斋明夙夜，罔有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1175418", 1175418, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>旷失</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175418_comment'></div>宜崇位号，表正宫庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175418_comment'></div>今遣摄太尉、推忠协谋同德佐理功臣、枢密使、光禄大夫、检校太傅、行尚书刑部侍郎、上柱国、东平郡开国公、食邑五千户、食实封一千户吕公弼，摄司徒、朝散大夫、右谏议大夫、参知政事、护军、太原郡开国侯、食邑一千一百户、赐紫金鱼袋王圭，持节册命尔为皇后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1175418_comment'></div>夫惟兴王，釐厥士女，咸自内始，达于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1175418_comment'></div>朕克勤，人用弗怠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1175418_comment'></div>朕克俭，人用弗奢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1175418_comment'></div>朕克正，人用无敢侧颇僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1175418_comment'></div>尔劢朕相，乃济登兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1175418_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1175418_comment'></div>匪初惟艰，惟慎厥终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1175418_comment'></div>尔忱念兹，朕以永享天禄，尔亦豫有无疆之福，岂不韪哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1175418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1175418'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷四五。又见《宋会要辑稿》礼五之三四（第二册第一五六四页），《皇朝文鉴》卷三二，《渊鉴类函》卷五七，《古今图书集成》宫闱典卷四二、礼仪典卷三二。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1175418_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　王罕出知明州，作诗送之。作品：《送明州王大卿》<div id='poem_70090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　二府合议谋杀刑名，与陈升之、韩绛议略同，与富弼、曾公亮、文彦博等异。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年4月</a>　是月，与神宗、赵抃议修二股河。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　为神宗释《中庸》“诚明”之义。<br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　不以张靖所言薛向制置陕西监马之失为然，力排群议，右分，抵靖于法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月2日</a>　此日，与神宗、富弼等议谋杀自杀，因议及复肉刑。作品：《汉文帝》<div id='poem_70349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月9日</a>　此日，迎奉仁宗、英宗御容赴文德殿，撰祝文。作品：《文德颠告迁御容祝文》<div id='poem_1176962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176962?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文德殿告迁御容祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年5月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176962'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176962'>伏以綅冠即事，丧纪有终；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176962_comment'></div>黼座廞神，哀怀靡极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176962_comment'></div>度新宫而馆御，诹吉日以徂迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176962_comment'></div>式冀灵明，永歆丰洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176962_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176962_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月11日</a>　此日，上疏。作品：《进戒疏》<div id='poem_1176176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进戒疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年5月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176176")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176176'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176176'>熙宁二年五月十一日，朝散大夫、右谏议大夫、参知政事、护军、赐紫金鱼袋臣某昧死再拜上疏皇帝陛下：臣窃以为陛下既终亮阴，考之于经，则群臣进戒之时，而臣待罪近司，职当先事有言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176176_comment'></div>窃闻孔子论为邦，先放郑声，而后曰远佞人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176176_comment'></div>仲虺称汤之德，先不迩声色，不殖货利，而后曰用人惟己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176176_comment'></div>盖以谓不淫耳目于声色玩好之物，然后能精于用志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176176_comment'></div>能精于用志，然后能明于见理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176176_comment'></div>能明于见理，然后能知人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176176_comment'></div>能知人，然后佞人可得而远，忠臣良士与有道之君子类进于时，有以自竭，则法度之行，风俗之成，甚易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176176_comment'></div>若夫人主虽有过人之材，而不能早自戒于耳目之欲，至于过差，以乱其心之所思，则用志不精，用志不精，则见理不明，见理不明，则邪说诐行必窥间乘殆而作，则其至于危乱也岂难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176176_comment'></div>伏惟陛下即位以来，未有声色玩好之过闻于外，然孔子圣人之盛，尚自以为七十而后敢纵心所欲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176176_comment'></div>今陛下以鼎盛之春秋，而享天下之大奉，所以惑移耳目者，为不少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176176_comment'></div>则臣之所豫虑，而陛下之所深戒，宜在于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176176_comment'></div>天之生圣人之材甚吝，而人之值圣人之时甚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176176_comment'></div>天既以圣人之材付陛下，则人亦将望圣人之泽于此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176176_comment'></div>伏惟陛下自爱以成德，而自强以赴功，使后世不失圣人之名，而天下皆蒙陛下之泽，则岂非可愿之事哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176176_comment'></div>臣愚不胜惓惓，唯陛下恕其狂妄而幸赐省察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176176_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　以章辟光请岐王迁居外邸，与神宗议之，以为不宜逐去辟光。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月21日</a>　此日，以吕诲上疏肆诋，乞辞位。神宗封还其奏，令视事如故。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月22日</a>　此日，上谢表，神宗令中使抚谕趣入；以吕诲再上疏，遂再称病乞告，神宗再令中使趣入。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月29日</a>　此日，入见，荐吕公著。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年5月</a>　是月，因苏轼上《议学校贡举状》论不宜轻改贡举法，驳之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　因神宗欲以苏轼编修中书条例，言与轼所学不同，恐故为异论，不宜轻用。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月14日</a>　此日，与神宗议编修中书条例事。劝神宗欲修条例，宜先博见士大夫躬择之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　以宗室世清累上书讼袭封不当，劝神宗欲裁制宗室，须黜世清。神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月</a>　吕诲出知邓州，荐吕公著代之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月</a>　吕陶作《三黜诗》以讽。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月</a>　因刘恕面讽，大怒，与之绝。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月</a>　是月，以薛向为江淮等路发运使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年6月</a>　神宗欲复义仓，劝止之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　言举御史法太密，难于得人。神宗以为然，改之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月17日</a>　数为神宗言均输法。此日，立淮、浙、江、湖六路均输法，以薛向领之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　御史乞罢堂选知州，然之；以为中书所总已多，不能精择，宜归有司。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　因知谏院范纯仁屡论薛向“急进希功，贪狡刻薄”，并乞罢均输法，不乐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　因范纯仁上劄子论奏新法不便，抨击甚峻，又诣中书质责，遂以“经术正以理财为先”答之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　是月，筹画青苗法，召吕惠卿、苏辙等议之。因辙异议，暂置。又与辙议监法、铸钱利害。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　荐王无咎补国子直讲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月1日</a>　坚守谋杀刑名之议，神宗卒从之，此日诏“谋杀人自首及案问欲举。并依今年二月十七日敕施行”。因侍御史知杂事、兼判刑部刘述封还诏书，遂白神宗，诏开封府推官王克臣劾述罪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月4日</a>　此日，以两朝《实录》成，赴宴垂拱殿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月5日</a>　此日，因与司马光议事屡不合，止其相度二股河利害，独遣张茂则。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月9日</a>　刘琦、钱顗、刘述等上疏攻击。此日，贬琦、顗监处州、衢州监务。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　范纯仁再上状抨击。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　素厚范纯仁，欲除其知制诰，而纯仁屡上疏攻击新法，言辞激切，且录索上状申中书；见之大怒，乞加重贬。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　作诗。作品：《商鞅》<div id='poem_69586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>商鞅</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69586")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69586'>自古驱民在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69586", 69586, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>信诚</span>，一言为重百金轻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69586'>今人未可非商鞅，商鞅能令政必行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69586'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69586_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月14日</a>　此日，见苏轼为国子监举人所发策问，不悦。是日，与神宗论三司吏人取贿，以为当厚禄吏人而去其冗，然后方可有为。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　召河北转运司勾当公事王广廉议事，知其尝奏请行春散秋敛之法，与青苗法意合，遂决意推行之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月16日</a>　此日，因制置三司条例司详检文字苏辙抵书论新法不便，大怒，诋辙飞箝捭阖，欲加之罪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　欲以孙立节代苏辙检详制置三司条例司文字，立节辞免。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月18日</a>　此日，请以三司副使苏寀为集贤殿修撰，神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月28日</a>　欲置刘述于狱，司马光争之；欲贬刘述为通判，神宗不许。此日，贬刘述知江州，丁讽通判復州，王师元监安州税。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月</a>　是月，撰满泾妻墓志铭。作品：《扬州进士满夫人杨氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州进士满夫人杨氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176817")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176817'>扬州进士满泾之夫人杨氏者，著作元宾之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176817_comment'></div>年六十有一，以治平四年十月庚戌卒，而以熙宁二年八月庚申葬，其墓在江都县马坊里之南原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176817_comment'></div>有子七人，建中、居中、执中、存中、方中、闳中、求中，皆向学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176817_comment'></div>建中，寿州寿春县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176817_comment'></div>执中，颍州万寿县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176817_comment'></div>居中，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176817_comment'></div>女二人，孙男女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176817_comment'></div>夫人性温恭静约，事当意与否，未尝形于喜愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176817_comment'></div>以止有吾母也，故思其父愈久而犹悲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176817_comment'></div>以不逮吾姑也，故事其舅愈劳而不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176817_comment'></div>承其夫以顺，励其子以善，而汎接于族人也，又能以惠振其贫，以慈抚其贱，以恕掩其过，以笃悛其悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176817_comment'></div>老矣，岁时尚先诸妇以莅祭祀，盖夫人之性行可称者多至如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176817_comment'></div>而其子又恳恳不已，以求余铭，故勉为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176817'>满氏有家，保族衍大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176817_comment'></div>夫人来嫔，德协内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176817_comment'></div>夫喜而谓：「偕我鲐背」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176817_comment'></div>子祈以尽，温凊之爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176817_comment'></div>奚命之畸，使弃弗逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176817_comment'></div>维前之祥，德则弗谖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176817_comment'></div>惟后之祥，有子才贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176817_comment'></div>铭慰诸幽，亦贲新阡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176817_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　勉神宗不恤浮议，勇于救弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月2日</a>　此日，遣御史王子韶使两浙按察前知明州苗振贓汙事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月4日</a>　此日，行青苗法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月5日</a>　以程颢言不可卖祠部度牒作常平本钱，此日，驳其不知王道之权。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月7日</a>　引律奏驳审刑院、大理寺断苏州民张朝狱。此日，神宗诏依。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月8日</a>　此日，以李常等为制置三司条例司检详文字官，李承之为相度利害官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月12日</a>　此日，因神宗问如何节用，与陈升之均言应省兵及裁宗室之费。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月16日</a>　此日，荐吕惠卿、李常编修中书条例。是日，乞以薛向兼都大提举江淮、两浙、荆湖、福建、广南等路银铜铅锡坑治、市舶等，神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年9月29日</a>　此日，荐吕惠卿为崇政殿说书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　吕惠卿欲罢兼条例司，以为兼之无妨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　与富弼不协；弼上疏，出判亳州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　劝神宗先用陈升之为相。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年10月5日</a>　此日，陈升之拜集贤相。因神宗特诏文彦博立班陈上，遂言其非是。是日，与神宗议徙卫兵年四十以上稍不中程者之淮南。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年10月6日</a>　此日，司马光与神宗论诸大臣，以“不晓事”、“执拗”等语相评。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年10月11日</a>　此日，以神宗内批宋守约签书枢密院事，执不可，奏罢之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年10月26日</a>　此日，夏国使者罔育讹来谢封册。因言既册之，宜坚明约束，勿令边将生事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　以神宗欲复宗谔官，劝其待裁处宗室事定迺復。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年10月</a>　是月，撰傅立墓志铭。作品：《山南东道节度推官赠尚书工部郎中傅公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山南东道节度推官赠尚书工部郎中傅公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176774")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176774'>公姓傅氏，讳立，字伯礼，其先大名内黄人，今郓须城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176774_comment'></div>庆历二年，以五举进士得同三礼出身，主郑州管城县簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176774_comment'></div>用举者为滑州灵河县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176774_comment'></div>遭母夫人丧，丧除，以山南东道节度推官知磁州昭德县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176774_comment'></div>嘉祐四年七月六日，卒于官舍，享年六十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176774_comment'></div>公以文行有声于乡，其志气甚大，既久困不遂，因不复有仕意，乡人强之，乃起佐管城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176774_comment'></div>所为问义理如何，不肯有所顾计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176774_comment'></div>贝州妖人为乱，吏坐不察者众，州县惩艾，有以妖告者，辄又致之刑辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176774_comment'></div>或诬浮屠、道人为妖，州捕之急，公辩其无罪，即释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176774_comment'></div>在昭德，县人治河堤，总役者妄怒以立威，诸县畏其纠劾，莫敢校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176774_comment'></div>及笞公县人，公夺之纵去，县人感悦，不督而功自倍，总役者亦不敢复犯公所部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176774_comment'></div>其施于政者多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176774_comment'></div>故其卒，老稚相扶携祭哭，思慕久之不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176774_comment'></div>盖公孝慈忠信，刚毅有守，遇事不为可愧，其仁心尤至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176774_comment'></div>既病亟，呼其季子告曰：「吾尝质田于郓，数十口赖以活者三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176774_comment'></div>今田主往往而在，汝兄仕于朝，所不足者非财，可以券还之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176774_comment'></div>于是长子方官于莫州，及归遭丧，终以田归主如公戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176774_comment'></div>公曾祖讳凝，赠尚书库部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176774_comment'></div>祖讳世隆，尚书户部员外郎、知邛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176774_comment'></div>父讳珏，右班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176774_comment'></div>凡三世皆以经学举，至公始为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176774_comment'></div>而公子亦皆为进士，曰尧俞，尚书兵部员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176774_comment'></div>曰舜俞，郊社斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176774_comment'></div>曰君俞，未仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176774_comment'></div>馀四人皆早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176774_comment'></div>兵部君以才德为世名人，尝为谏官，以言事不合，辞知杂御史不肯就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176774_comment'></div>以熙宁二年十月某日葬公于孟州济源县清廉乡美化里，以夫人长寿县太君王氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176774_comment'></div>于是公赠官至尚书工部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176774_comment'></div>太君有贤行，方兵部除知杂御史也，适北使未返，而亲故皆贺，夫人弗受，冶装为行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176774_comment'></div>及兵部归，而果辞不就以出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176774_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1176774'>惟傅厥先相武丁，告功皇天上比星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176774_comment'></div>公躬服仁世守经，奋发华藻扬芬馨，宜殖福禄引厥龄，摧藏沉淹以濎濙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176774_comment'></div>赍志弗获终冥冥，爰有美子集帝庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176774_comment'></div>忠功孝名神所听，卜茔高原日永宁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1176774_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是月，撰张彦博墓志铭。作品：《尚书司封员外郎张君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书司封员外郎张君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176769")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176769'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176769'>君姓张氏，讳彦博，字文叔，其先家齐州之禹城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176769_comment'></div>曾祖讳玘，赠太子洗马，祖讳制，又徙其家于蔡州，赠尚书吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176769_comment'></div>父讳保雍，仕至尚书刑部郎中、两浙转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176769_comment'></div>君以荫为太庙斋郎，调武昌县尉，能禁抑淫祠，使尽去境内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176769_comment'></div>再调抚州司法，尝摄令临川，始取强悍者一人，痛治以威，而皆喜以畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176769_comment'></div>却使者不急之须，而使者不敢怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176769_comment'></div>徙亳州酂县令，用荐者监蕲州石桥茶场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176769_comment'></div>锁厅应进士举，中其科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176769_comment'></div>寻丁母忧，服除，调兴化军兴化县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176769_comment'></div>僧有连结为奸党者，久至三十馀年，君悉捕以置于法，而废其寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176769_comment'></div>古田县有剧贼，即遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176769_comment'></div>复调黄州黄陂县令，稍筑堤防以利农，告使者更盐利之法，自是役赖以均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176769_comment'></div>改袁州军事判官，以治平四年十月六日卒于官，享年四十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176769_comment'></div>君少力学问，尤知史书，不惮折节以交贤士大夫，而喜趋人之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176769_comment'></div>教兄之孤子至于登第，抚三女悉得所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176769_comment'></div>而其仕也，所为又能不茍，故前后多荐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176769_comment'></div>初娶刘氏，又娶方氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176769_comment'></div>子二人，曰仲伟，曰次贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176769_comment'></div>君昔去石桥，遂留居于蕲，故其葬也，从刘氏于蕲之安仁乡芙蓉山，盖熙宁二年十月六日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176769_comment'></div>君于文章尤喜作歌诗，有集四十卷藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176769_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1176769'>恭惠敏明，交悦以称，不遂其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176769_comment'></div>恢旷坦易，或投以累，终以困踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176769_comment'></div>惟人载德，宜福多锡，得寿亦啬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176769_comment'></div>曷告其悲，铭续风诗，万世之贻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月</a>　因陈升之请免签书条例司事，与之辩，并荐韩绛同制置。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月</a>　因神宗欲用苏轼修起居注，以所学不同而力沮之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月11日</a>　为神宗具道措置宗室之法。此日，有诏裁宗室授官法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　裁损宗室恩数。宗子相率马首陈状，不听。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　曾巩撰《公族议》以讽。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月12日</a>　此日，神宗赐生日礼物。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月</a>　乞移巴蜀物就与陕西封樁，以省蜀人输送，免自京师支拨之费。神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年11月13日</a>　此日，行农田水利法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月8日</a>　此日，遣沈衡等鞫祖无择、苗振狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月9日</a>　此日，以张载为崇文院校书。见之，问以新政，不合。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月16日</a>　此日，差曾布看详衙前条例。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月19日</a>　此日，与神宗、文彦博、吕公弼等议兵制，欲消募兵，以义勇上番。是日，荐制置三司条例司检详文字李承之召见。是日，差官充逐路提举常平、广惠仓，兼管勾农田水利差役。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月22日</a>　此日，遣张载劾苗振。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月</a>　是月，李定谒见，言南方之民皆便青苗法。喜甚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年闰11月</a>　是月，为吕惠卿力辩诸人之诋毁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月3日</a>　此日，乞差官置局编修《三司岁计》、《南郊式》、《三司薄历》，神宗从之；奏以李定等编定。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月4日</a>　此日，上劄子，议建三馆官衹侯。作品：《论官职劄子二》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月13日</a>　此日，与神宗、陈升之、文彦博、吕公弼等议兵制，以为“募兵之法不变，乃实有可忧”；议以义勇入卫，勉神宗详立法制，变数百年募兵之弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月21日</a>　此日，以吕公著上疏论吕惠卿，为惠卿辩解。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月23日</a>　此日，差侯叔献、杨汲于夹河引汴水以溉民田。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月24日</a>　此日，增三京留司御史台、国子监及宫观官，以处卿监、监司知州之老者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月</a>　是月，以苏轼上《谏买浙灯状》及上万言书极论新法不便，深恶之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，看详《杂议》，具条陈奏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，撰文，不传。作品：《兵论》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，题诗于中书南厅壁间。作品：《赐也》<div id='poem_69656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69656?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐也</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69656")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69656_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69656'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69656'>赐也能言未识真，误将心许汉阴人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69656'>桔槔俯仰妨何事，抱瓮区区老此身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69656'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69656_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，欧阳修致书，盛赞《杜子美画像》诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　乡人周衮来书言新法之非。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，书陈琪姓名于便坐，使相度百司利害。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，江朴自象山令代还。以其旧交，欲用之，而论事不合。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　是年，与程颢论道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　得神宗称誉，而程颢非之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　沈辽服除入京来谒。誉之似陶渊明、谢安，子雱亦贻之以诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　撰贾昌朝神道碑。作品：《赠司空兼侍中文元贾魏公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠司空兼侍中文元贾魏公神道碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176720")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176720'>魏公既薨之明年，皇帝篆其墓碑之首，曰「大儒元老之碑」，有诏造文赐公子，使之并刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176720_comment'></div>臣某昧死序列，再拜稽首以闻，曰：公讳昌朝，字子明，姓贾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176720_comment'></div>皇秘书省著作佐郎、赠太师、中书令、尚书令、晋国公讳注之子，皇太子左赞善大夫、赠太师、中书令、尚书令、齐国公讳琏之孙，晋中书舍人、史馆修撰、皇赠太师、中书令、鲁国公讳纬之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176720_comment'></div>其先南皮人，中徙获鹿，今葬开封而为其县人者，自公皇考始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176720_comment'></div>公少则庄重谨密，治经，章解句达，老师宿学誉叹以为贤己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176720_comment'></div>天禧元年，献文章，召试，赐同进士出身，除常州晋陵县主簿、国子监说书，又以江州德化县令兼颍川郡王院伴读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176720_comment'></div>当是时，孙宣公领国子，一见听语，待以公相，数举公学问当在人主左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176720_comment'></div>大臣有以亲嫌者，故久弗用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176720_comment'></div>以知常州宜兴、开封府东明两县，监在京广济、永济两仓，又召置国子监说书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176720_comment'></div>景祐元年，积官至尚书都官员外郎，乃始置崇政殿说书，而以公为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176720_comment'></div>公于传注训诂，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176720", 1176720, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>曲释</span>，至先王治心守身、经理天下之意，指物譬事，析毫解缕，言则感心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176720_comment'></div>自仁宗即位，大臣或操法令断天下事，稽古不至秦、汉以上，以儒术为疏阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176720_comment'></div>然上常独意乡尧、舜三代，得公以经开说，则慨然皆以为善，而公由此显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176720_comment'></div>于是上所质问，多道德之要，公请悉记录，岁终归之太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176720_comment'></div>诏以章献太后故，为彭城郡王讳其名，公言母之讳，礼不得以出于宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176720_comment'></div>太平兴国寺灾，公以《易》、《春秋》进戒，因言近岁屡灾寺观，天意盖有所在，独可勿缮治，以称陛下畏天威、爱人力之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176720_comment'></div>西域僧以佛骨铜像来献，公请加赐遣还，毋以所献示外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176720_comment'></div>上皆从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176720_comment'></div>以直集贤院、天章阁侍讲、史馆修撰，判尚书礼部、判太府寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176720_comment'></div>天章置侍讲自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176720_comment'></div>故事，亲祠郊庙，燕游慢戏之物皆在仪卫，公奏除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176720_comment'></div>无几，遂以知制诰、龙图阁直学士权知通进银台司，兼门下封驳事，权判吏部流内铨，权知开封府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176720_comment'></div>又以右谏议大夫权御史中丞，兼判国子监，而侍讲如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176720_comment'></div>公之为铨也，河北虫旱，以公安抚，公举能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1176720", 1176720, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>诎奸</span>，于利害多所兴除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176720_comment'></div>异时县令奉钱满万二千乃举令，公以为法如此则小县终不得善治，乃请概举令，而与其奉如大县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176720_comment'></div>其在御史，刘平为赵元昊所得，边吏以降敌告，议收其族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176720_comment'></div>公言：「汉杀李陵母妻子，陵不归而汉悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176720_comment'></div>真宗抚王继忠家，后赖其力，且平事固未可知」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176720_comment'></div>乃不果收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176720_comment'></div>侍讲林瑀者言：「天子即位当步其日，占所得卦以知吉凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176720_comment'></div>公奏瑀所言不经，不可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176720_comment'></div>上即为公罢瑀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176720_comment'></div>又奏劾驸马都尉柴恭僖公，夺其州，人以为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176720_comment'></div>初，元昊反，公言：「兵事起，财不赡，宜及今度经费，罢减诸不急」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176720_comment'></div>至是，诏与三司合议，一岁所省，率缗钱百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176720_comment'></div>庆历二年，契丹来求地请婚，公主其使，责以信义，告之利害，客诎服不能发口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176720_comment'></div>执政议使契丹攻元昊，公曰：「契丹许我而有功，则必骄以弱我，而责报无穷已，不且以我市于元昊矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176720_comment'></div>且唐中极衰时，听吐蕃击朱泚，陆贽尚以为不可，后乃知吐蕃阴与泚合，而阳言助国，今独安知契丹计不出此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176720_comment'></div>乃言所以待夷狄者凡六事，上皆行其策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176720_comment'></div>三年，遂以本官参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176720_comment'></div>四年，以尚书工部侍郎、检校太傅为枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176720_comment'></div>五年，以集贤殿大学士、同中书门下平章事兼枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176720_comment'></div>居两月，拜昭文馆大学士，监修国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176720_comment'></div>议祔章惠太后太庙，公言其非礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176720_comment'></div>及祔献、懿二后，密敕迁文武位一等，赐外内诸军<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1176720", 1176720, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>特支</span>优给，公又独奏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176720_comment'></div>既而敕迁两府官，公又不从，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176720_comment'></div>元昊归石元孙，议赐死，公争言自古将帅被执归，多不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176720_comment'></div>元孙以不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176720_comment'></div>七年，上以旱避正殿，贬食自责，公因稽首逊位，章六七入，乃除武胜军节度使、检校太傅、同中书门下平章事、判大名府，兼北京留守、河北安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176720_comment'></div>妖人王则谋举大名，反河南、北，使其党挟书妄言，冀得近公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176720_comment'></div>公疑为奸，考问具服，则惶恐不及会，独婴贝州以反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176720_comment'></div>公即使部将王信、孟元、郝质驰兵操攻具往，且请自出搏贼，不许，终贼所以擒灭，功居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176720_comment'></div>移镇山南东道，检校太师，赐爵安国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176720_comment'></div>公因请宽诸吏民为则所胁者，而捕河南、北妖人治杀之，无所漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176720_comment'></div>河决商胡，方暑，公暴堤上，躬亲指画，出仓廪与被水百姓，舍其流弃，接以医药，所活九十馀万口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176720_comment'></div>契丹诱亡卒，号为南军，以战夏人，而边法，卒亡自归者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176720_comment'></div>公变其法，有归者故拔擢超其伍，于是归者众，因以知契丹国事，契丹亦因拒亡卒，黜南军不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176720_comment'></div>边人以地外质，公请重禁绝，主不时赎，人得赎而有之，地则尽归，边以不争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176720_comment'></div>皇祐元年，徙郑州，从公求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176720_comment'></div>至见，留为祥源观使，既而以尚书右仆射、观文殿大学士判尚书都省，朝会班宰相，视其仪物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176720_comment'></div>岁中又求任外，除山南东道节度使、右仆射、检校太师兼侍中、判郑州，固辞仆射、侍中，乃改同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176720_comment'></div>又欲迁公四子各一官，亦以公辞而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176720_comment'></div>二年，母燕国太夫人薨，命以故官，不起，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1176720", 1176720, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>赐书</span>宠慰，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176720_comment'></div>公事燕国以孝闻，上尝赐银饰肩舆，士大夫以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176720_comment'></div>及薨，自郑归葬，扶舁苍然，肩足皆胝，行路瞻望，悲哀叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176720_comment'></div>四年，除故官侍讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176720_comment'></div>居顷，出治许州，将行矣，仁宗问《易》之《乾》卦，公既讲解，又作书以亢龙为戒，手诏褒答，以公所献藏太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176720_comment'></div>五年又涖大名，安抚河北，中书议塞商胡决，以公异论，故使建言者专其事，公犹争不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176720_comment'></div>河果不可塞，建言者得罪，而澶、魏、滨、棣、德、博多水死，公乃请使抚巡赈救，人用归息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176720_comment'></div>嘉祐元年，进封许国公，又兼侍中，方避未听，而以枢密使召，卒罢侍中，而以同中书门下平章事为枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176720_comment'></div>三年，以镇安军节、右仆射、检校太师、兼侍中，充景灵宫使，又出许州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176720_comment'></div>七年，以保平军节陕州大都督府长史移大名，兼安抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176720_comment'></div>公凡三至魏及许、郑，皆以宽惠为治，人安乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176720_comment'></div>它将相赐公使钱，多使牟利，公度所赐为用，故在所尤不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176720_comment'></div>皇帝即位，改节度凤翔，加左仆射、凤翔尹，进封魏国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176720_comment'></div>治平元年，求还使、侍中守许州，至六七，终不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176720_comment'></div>二年，乃授许州，入见又辞，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176720_comment'></div>使抚谕，须秋乃发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176720_comment'></div>六月告疾，中人、太医问视相属，又力求解将相，乃以左仆射、观文殿大学士，判尚书都省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176720_comment'></div>七月戊寅薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176720_comment'></div>上亲临哭，发涕，为不听朝二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176720_comment'></div>赐龙脑、水银以歛，制服，出司宾祭吊，别赐黄金给葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176720_comment'></div>赠司空兼侍中，谥曰文元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176720_comment'></div>以九月甲申，葬开封汴阳里晋公墓次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176720_comment'></div>公年六十八，散官开府仪同三司，勋上柱国，号推诚保德崇仁守正忠亮佐运翊戴功臣，邑户万五千，实封五千六百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176720_comment'></div>公所著书，有《春秋要论》十卷、《群经音辨》十卷、《通纪》八十卷、《本朝时令》十二卷，又奏议、文集各三十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176720_comment'></div>元配王氏，尚书兵部郎中、集贤殿修撰轸之女，追封莒国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176720_comment'></div>继配陈氏，武信军节度使康肃公尧咨之女，封魏国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176720_comment'></div>六男子：章，太常博士、集贤校理，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176720_comment'></div>圭，尚书比部员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176720_comment'></div>田，尚书驾部员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176720_comment'></div>青，尚书司门员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176720_comment'></div>齐，大理寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176720_comment'></div>炎，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176720_comment'></div>三女子，国子博士程嗣弼、大理寺丞宋惠国、太常博士庞元英，公婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176720_comment'></div>其后天子以炎守将作监丞，又官公内外族亲凡九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176720_comment'></div>贾氏自谊及耽，傅王相帝，皆以儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176720_comment'></div>至公又以经术致将相，出入文武，有谋有功，当中国治安，四夷集附，宠禄光大，始终褒荣，君臣相遭，于是为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176720_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_1176720'>于皇仁宗，时宋之隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176720_comment'></div>奠此中国，四夷来同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176720_comment'></div>孰夹孰承，有宰魏公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176720_comment'></div>帝曰询尔，群公卿士，朕欲考古，以求乱治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176720_comment'></div>有博六艺，使熙朕志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176720_comment'></div>魏公乃来，锡帝之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176720_comment'></div>进于殿中，登阐沈幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176720_comment'></div>乃尹开封，治民不絿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176720_comment'></div>乃丞御史，督制庶尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176720_comment'></div>膏泽在下，熏烝在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176720_comment'></div>参国政事，遂都将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176720_comment'></div>帝巡大涂，公帝之车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176720_comment'></div>帝御广宫，之屏之墉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1176720_comment'></div>文条武鬯，具献肤功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1176720_comment'></div>终徂在天，公则随迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1176720_comment'></div>廷丧元老，隐加问赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1176720_comment'></div>有铭太史，有谥太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1176720_comment'></div>次诗不诬，斲石墓旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1176720_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_116_1176720'>初卜葬公汴阳里，以水故，改卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1176720_comment'></div>熙宁元年八月庚申，葬许州阳翟县三峰乡支流村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1176720_comment'></div>奉敕改乡名曰大儒，村名曰元老里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1176720_comment'></div>朝散大夫、右谏议大夫、参知政事、太原郡开国侯，食邑一千一百户，赐紫金鱼袋臣王某谨记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_119_1176720'></div><div id='poem_sentence_119_1176720_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月22日</a>　李常、孙觉、范镇等奏论诸路抑配青苗钱。此日，下诏禁止强俵，乃以“仍戒沮遏愿请者”加入诏中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月23日</a>　此日，告假，曾公亮、陈升之削去二十二日诏书中“沮遏愿请”等语别行之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月26日</a>　此日，以神宗欲除张方平宣徽使留京师，阻之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　以提点开封府界县事吕景拒散青苗钱，令条例司召提举官戒谕之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　是月，监察御史裹行程颢、右正言李常论奏京东转运使王广渊和买抑配取息。因言王广渊尽力事功，不当罪之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　是月，答曾伉书，解释青苗法二分之息。作品：《答曾公立书》<div id='poem_1176316' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176316' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176316?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答曾公立书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176316")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176316_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176316'>某启：<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176316", 1176316, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>示及</span>青苗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176316_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176316", 1176316, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>治道</span>之兴，邪人不利，一兴异论，群聋和之，意不在于法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176316_comment'></div>孟子所言利者，为利吾国、<span class='inlineComment2'>（如曲防遏籴。）</span>利吾身耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176316_comment'></div>至狗彘食人食则检之，野有饿莩则发之，是所谓政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176316_comment'></div>政事所以理财，理财乃所谓义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176316_comment'></div>一部《周礼》，理财居其半，周公岂为利哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176316_comment'></div>奸人者因名实之近，而欲乱之，以眩上下，其如民心之愿何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176316_comment'></div>始以为不请，而请者不可遏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176316_comment'></div>终以为不纳，而纳者不可却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176316_comment'></div>盖因民之所利而利之，不得不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176316_comment'></div>然二分不及一分，一分不及不利而贷之，贷之不若与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176316_comment'></div>然不与之而必至于二分者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176316_comment'></div>为其来日之不可继也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176316_comment'></div>不可继则是惠而不知为政，非惠而不费之道也，故必贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176316_comment'></div>然而有官吏之俸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176316", 1176316, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>辇运</span>之费，水旱之逋，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176316", 1176316, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>鼠雀</span>之耗，而必欲广之，以待其饥不足而直与之也，则无二分之息可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176316_comment'></div>则二分者，亦常平之中正也，岂可易哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176316_comment'></div>公立更与深于道者论之，则某之所论一字不合于法，而世之譊譊者，不足言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176316_comment'></div>因书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176316", 1176316, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>示及</span>，以为如何？</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176316_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176316'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷七三。又见《古今图书集成》官常典卷八○○、经籍典卷二九一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176316_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　是月，门人陆佃入京来谒，首问新政。因佃云青苗扰民，遣李承之使淮南质究。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月1日</a>　此日，韩琦奏请罢青苗法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月2日</a>　此日，于神宗前力辩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月3日</a>　此日，称疾不出。是日，称疾家居。因司马光所批答语抗章自辩，神宗手诏抚谕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月4日</a>　此日，入见，请罢政事，神宗奖慰，又乞罢。作品：《答手诏封还乞罢政事表劄子》<div id='poem_1176250' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176250' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176250?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答手诏封还乞罢政事表劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年2月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176250")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176250_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176250'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176250'>臣今日具表乞罢政事，方屏营俟命，而吕惠卿至臣第，传圣旨趣臣视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176250_comment'></div>续又奉手诏，还臣所奏，喻以「天下之事，尽力固可成就，以卿所学，不宜中辍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176250_comment'></div>俛听伏读，不胜蝼蚁区区感慨恻怛之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176250_comment'></div>臣蒙拔擢，备数大臣，陛下所以视遇，不为不厚矣，岂敢轻为去就？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176250_comment'></div>诚以陛下初访臣以事，臣即以「变风俗、立法度」为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176250_comment'></div>今待罪期年，而法度未能一有所立，风俗未能一有所变，朝廷内外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176250", 1176250, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诐行</span>邪说乃更多于乡时，此臣不能启迪圣心以信所言之明效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176250_comment'></div>虽无疾疢，尚当自劾，以避贤路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176250_comment'></div>况又昏眩，难以看读文字，即于职事当有废失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176250_comment'></div>虽贪陛下仁圣卓然之资，冀凭日月末光，粗有所成，而自计如此，岂容偷假名位，坐弃时日，以负所学，上孤陛下责任之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176250_comment'></div>伏望陛下哀怜矜察，许臣所乞，毋令臣得要君之嫌，重为流俗小人所毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176250_comment'></div>臣不胜祈天俟圣激切之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176250_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176250_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月5日</a>　此日，以张稚圭知大宗正丞事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月10日</a>　此日，乞分司。王子韶、程颢、李常登殿乞神宗挽留。作品：《乞罢政事表》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月11日</a>　以神宗欲用司马光，沮之，复谒告。此日，诏以司马光为枢密副使。 是日，以王韶提举藩部兼营田、市易。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月18日</a>　此日，上劄子谢手诏抚慰。作品：《谢手诏慰抚劄子》<div id='poem_1176248' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176248' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176248?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢手诏慰抚劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年2月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176248")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176248_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176248'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176248'>臣昨日伏奉手诏，所以慰抚备厚，非臣疵贱之所宜蒙，伏读不任感激屏营之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176248_comment'></div>今日吕惠卿至臣第，具宣圣旨，臣虽糜躯陨首，岂能上酬奖遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176248_comment'></div>臣自江南召还，获侍清光，窃观天锡陛下聪明睿智，诚不难兴尧舜之治，故不量才力之分、时事之宜，敢以不肖之身，任天下怨诽，欲以奉承圣志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176248_comment'></div>自与闻政事以来，遂及期年，未能有所施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176248_comment'></div>而内外交搆，合为沮议，专欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176248", 1176248, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>诬民</span>，以惑圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176248_comment'></div>流俗波荡，一至如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176248_comment'></div>陛下又若不能无惑，恐臣区区终不足以胜，而久妨众邪之路，则或诬罔出于不意，有甚于今日，以累陛下知人任使之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176248_comment'></div>故因疢疾，辄求自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176248_comment'></div>陛下不以臣狂獧，赐之罪戾，而屈至尊之意，反复诲喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176248_comment'></div>臣岂敢尚有固志，以烦督责？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176248_comment'></div>只候开假，即入谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176248_comment'></div>区区所怀，冀得面奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176248_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣激切屏营之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176248_comment'></div>谨具劄子奏知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176248_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月21日</a>　在告中，神宗谕执罢青苗法，而曾公亮、赵抃等连日不决。此日，始出视事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月23日</a>　此日，以李常言青苗法之弊，与曾公亮、陈升之、赵抃辩，以为“理财用者，乃所谓政事”。令李常分析以闻。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月27日</a>　此日，与神宗、陈升之议河北都转运使刘庠擅止给散青苗钱，力主与放罪。是日，司马光移书请罢条例司及常平使者，有书答之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月</a>　是月，以程颢面谏，颇感其诚；与张戬辩于政事堂。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　见傅尧俞，冀其助行新法，而傅辞谢；遂以之同判流内铨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年3月1日</a>　此日，曾公亮、陈升之与争青苗钱不胜，称疾告假。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年3月3日</a>　此日，因司马光再移书，作书答之。作品：《答司马谏议书》<div id='poem_1176315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答司马谏议书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176315")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176315'>某启：昨日蒙教，窃以为与君实游处相好之日久，而议事每不合，所操之术多异故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176315_comment'></div>虽欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>强聒</span>，终必不蒙见察，故略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>上报</span>，不复一一自辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176315_comment'></div>重念蒙君实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>视遇</span>厚，于反覆不宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>卤莽</span>，故今具道所以，冀君实或见恕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176315_comment'></div>盖儒者所争，尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>在于</span>名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176315_comment'></div>名实已明，而天下之理得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176315_comment'></div>今君实所以见教者，以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/18/Comments/3")'>侵官</span>、生事、征利、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/18/Comments/4")'>拒谏</span>，以致天下怨谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176315_comment'></div>某则以谓受命于人主，议法度而修之于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176315_comment'></div>以授之于有司，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>侵官</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176315_comment'></div>举先王之政，以兴利除弊，不为生事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176315_comment'></div>为天下理财，不为征利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176315_comment'></div>辟邪说，难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>壬人</span>，不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>拒谏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176315_comment'></div>至于怨诽之多，则固前知其如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176315_comment'></div>人习于茍且非一日，士大夫多以不恤国事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>同俗</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>自媚</span>于众为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176315_comment'></div>上乃欲变此，而某不量敌之众寡，欲出力助上以抗之，则众何为而不汹汹然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176315_comment'></div>盘庚之迁，胥怨者民也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>非特</span>朝廷士大夫而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176315_comment'></div>盘庚不为怨者故改其度，度义而后动，是而不见可悔故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176315_comment'></div>如君实责我以在位久，未能助上大有为，以膏泽斯民，则某知罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176315_comment'></div>如曰今日当一切不事事，守前所为而已，则非某之所敢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176315_comment'></div>无由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>会晤</span>，不任区区<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176315", 1176315, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>向往</span>之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年4月19日</a>　屡与参知政事赵抃争论新法，议论不协。此日，赵抃知杭州。是日，荐李定召对，以为太子中允、权监察御史里行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年4月21日</a>　此日，以谢景温为工部郎中兼侍御史知杂事。  是日，罢张次山权发遣济河都大辇运司公事。以向宗道代之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年4月22日</a>　以知制诰宋敏求封还李定除监察御史里行词头并乞罢知制诰，遂摭其前过。此日，与神宗、曾公亮议宋敏求罢知制诰制词。是日，以李常上疏抨击新法，出之通判滑州。是日，黜张戬、王子韶为知县。是日，因陈襄累奏乞罢青苗法，罢其侍御史知杂事，欲用为陕西转运使。神宗不从。程颢罢权监察御史里行，恳辞京西提点刑狱。是日，斥程颢党附吕公著，责降签书镇宁节度判官事。<br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年5月15日</a>　此日，制置三司条例司罢归中书，神宗谕以手劄。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年5月17日</a>　此日，常平新法等付司农寺，以吕惠卿同判，胡宗愈兼判；以王直温权江南西路提点刑狱，兼提举常平。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月7日</a>　此日，上劄子。作品：《言尊号劄子》<div id='poem_1176209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>言尊号劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（庚戌六月七日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176209")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176209'>臣伏以陛下缉熙光明，如日之方升；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176209_comment'></div>布利施泽，如川之方至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176209_comment'></div>号名于实，岂能有所增加？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176209_comment'></div>辄复卷卷，妄有陈请，徒以祖宗故事，适在此时，臣子之心，怀不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176209_comment'></div>陛下受而不拒，足以俯顺人心，臣独不能无疑者，陛下以西垂之劳，方以过为在己，遽膺徽册，似或未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176209_comment'></div>臣等以归美为忠，陛下以撝谦为德，布之海内，谁曰不然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176209_comment'></div>伏惟圣心更赐详酌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176209_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月7日</a>　此日，以窦舜卿知秦州，罢李师中。是日，以黄好谦编中书条例。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月11日</a>　此日，除何郯尚书右丞致仕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月18日</a>　此日，贬蔡冠卿等。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月22日</a>　此日，以江、淮等路发运使薛向为天章阁待制。冯京、谢景温论向不可备侍从，遂为神宗具言向在东南措置之方。是日，以崔台符权判大理寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　上劄答神宗问冯京处置事宜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月23日</a>　此日，进呈梁端自劾求罢职状，与神宗、韩绛议。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月25日</a>　此日，呈李师中分析秦州事，力为王韶辩解。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年6月27日</a>　请神宗御批明著知谏院胡宗愈奸状。此日，贬之通判真州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　欧阳修屡辞宣徽南院使、判太原，又移书。此日，不答，而奏从其请。此日，吕公弼数言宜务安静，又与韩绛不协，神宗命其知太原。因请明著其罪，神宗未允。此日，因神宗欲以司马光代吕公弼为枢密副使，沮之，以为异论相搅则治道无由成。此日，与神宗议用冯京，神宗欲除之为枢密使，以为可。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月7日</a>　此日，因权御史台推直官孙弈辞召对，劝神宗当躬亲庶事，察知上下之情。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月8日</a>　此日，进呈蔡挺乞以义恿为五番教阅事，因与神宗论兵事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月9日</a>　此日，议宗室袒免壻转官可并依缌麻法，神宗是之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月11日</a>　此日，与神宗议古渭置市易司之利弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月12日</a>　此日，子雱撰成《老子注》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月15日</a>　此日，与神宗议御西夏事宜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月17日</a>　此日，超用都官员外郎王庭筠同判刑部。是日，于神宗前力辩李定持服事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月18日</a>　此日，有诏中书置薄记内外官功过。答神宗所问诸细目。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月21日</a>　此日，与枢密院进呈庆州得首级官员，神宗差定其赏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月25日</a>　此日，以神宗问及范育，因言及井田之制不可行。是日，议宗室袭封，以礼官所定为非。神宗是之，黜罚礼官。是日，与神宗论兵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月27日</a>　此日，与神宗议厚立购赏，捕捉藩僧结吴叱腊及康藏星罗结，招安余众。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月</a>　是月，见刘邠馆中题诗，改之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年7月</a>　是月，朱寿昌赴阙。以其自请，付审官院，折资通判河中府。又赋诗送之。作品：《送河中通判朱郎中迎母东归》<div id='poem_69524' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69524' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_69524'>嗟我白头生意尽，看君今日更悽然。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69524'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69524_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　与神宗等议判延州郭逵移镇再任，曾公亮欲授逵节度使，非之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月1日</a>　此日，因传尧俞不附己，密启神宗，以资序议之为权发遣监铁副使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月2日</a>　此日，以侯叔献、杨汲并兼水监丞，专提举沿汴淤溉民田。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月5日</a>　此日，以谢景温劾苏轼丁忧归蜀卖私盐等事奏上神宗，有诏体量。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月8日</a>　此日，司马光于神宗前抨击。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月13日</a>　此日，与神宗论王韶于古渭置市易事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月15日</a>　此日，神宗令作书谕王韶。作品：《与王韶书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月15日</a>　此日，独对，论谢景温、吴充及两府除授。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月16日</a>　此日，议权三司使吴充之奏，乞以委发运司每岁于东南六路变易所得轻货二百万缗用于常平新法，神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月17日</a>　此日，遣王广廉相度漳河等水利。是日，与神宗论及撤併河北州县。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月19日</a>　此日，以提举陕西常平苏涓等言陕西缘边粮草可漕运，因白神宗促宁麟等相度。是日，论治东南水土不可缓。是日，以曾公亮欲令礼官定夺李定追服事，以为不妥，乃送御史台定夺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月21日</a>　此日，上刑名未安者五条。是日，与神宗议肉刑，以为行之亦无害，但务斟酌。王安石与曾公亮、韩绛草川、广等路远官就差文字，是日具为令。是日，与神宗论及边事及为君之道，神宗皆以为然。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月22日</a>　答神宗除授李评不须问政事，此日，李评为枢密都承旨。李復圭斩李信，此日，为復圭辩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月23日</a>　此日，以曾布编修中书条例。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月24日</a>　此日，除王广渊直龙图阁、知庆州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月27日</a>　此日，立仓法。以中书事冗，论中书编修条例官具合减省归有司名件进呈，是日，看详编修中书条例所呈上二十二事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　和韩绛《斋居晚兴》。作品：《和东厅韩子华侍郎斋居晚兴》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月1日</a>　此日，置中书检正官。是日，王安石与韩绛并荐李绶为枢密院副都承旨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月2日</a>　此日，驳司马光之攻击，勉神宗力行峻法，刚健有为。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　删润缮写《洪范传》进呈，神宗手诏以答之。作品：《进洪范表》<div id='poem_1176023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1176023'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176023'>臣某言：臣闻天下之物，小大有彝，后先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176023", 1176023, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>有伦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176023_comment'></div>叙者天之道，叙之者人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176023_comment'></div>天命圣人以叙之，而圣人必考古成己，然后以所尝学，措之事业，为天下利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176023_comment'></div>茍非其时，道不虚行<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176023_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下德义之高，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176023", 1176023, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>术智</span>之明，足以黜天下之嵬琐，而兴其豪杰，以图尧禹太平之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176023_comment'></div>而朝廷未化，海内未服，纲纪宪令，尚或纷如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176023_comment'></div>谨取旧所著《洪范传》删润缮写，辄以草芥之微，求裕天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176023_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月6日</a>　因吕惠卿以父丧去，遂以曾布为腹心。此日，以布入侍经筵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月13日</a>　此日，有诗送僧行详主持灵岩寺。作品：《送道光法师主持灵岩》<div id='poem_70109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月24日</a>　此日，读孔文仲制科对策，大恶之，密启神宗御批黜之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　读吕陶制科论对，不悦，以之通判蜀州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　时王安石奉祠，因韩维等争言孔文仲不当黜，神宗以手诏相问，答之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年9月29日</a>　此日，以赵卨检正中书礼房公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年10月6日</a>　宁州通判邓绾与书及颂，见之大喜，使乘驿诣阙。此日，以绾为集贤校理、检正中书孔目房公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　李师中知舒州，为建傅岩厅以谀。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年10月22日</a>　以范镇屡上疏乞致仕并有微词相讽，大怒，命直舍人院蔡延庆、王益柔草其致仕制，又自窜改其辞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年11月17日</a>　此日，立中书吏试补及功过升降法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年11月25日</a>　此日，以邓润甫编修中书条例。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年11月28日</a>　梓州路转运使韩璹首建併纲减役之制。此日，奏乞神宗特加奖谕，并下诸路依次速具合裁定事件闻奏，神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年11月</a>　是月，神宗付以翰林学士承旨王珪所录杜杞所奏交趾事，遂上劄经书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月4日</a>　此日，出赵瞻知邓州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月9日</a>　此日，行畿县保甲法，因与神宗论寓兵于农。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月11日</a>　此日，为礼部侍郎、平章事、兼修国史。是日，百官造门奔贺，书“霜筠雪竹钟山寺，投老归与寄此生”明志。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　上表辞免，神宗批答不允。作品：《辞免平章事监修国史表二》<div id='poem_1176034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除平章事监修国史谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176034")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034'>臣某言：伏奉恩命特授金紫光禄大夫、行尚书礼部侍郎、同中书门下平章事、监修国史、上柱国，进封开国公，加食邑一千户、实封四百户，仍赐推忠协谋佐理功臣，寻具表陈免，蒙批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034_comment'></div>扬于大廷，宠以高位，归之翊戴之重，诿之宰制之平，圣心方慎于旁求，小己知难于上称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176034_comment'></div>臣闻人君代天而理物，人臣资父以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176034_comment'></div>然而君臣之大义有方，非若父子之至恩无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176034_comment'></div>须倡而后和，则诚意每患于难通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176034_comment'></div>不入而后量，则忠力或嫌于自献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176034_comment'></div>唯成汤之听伊尹，与傅说之遇高宗，皆以疏远而相求，何其亲厚之独至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176034_comment'></div>盖所趣非由于二道，故所为若出于一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176034_comment'></div>夫岂干越夷貉之异心，是谓元首股肱之同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176034_comment'></div>二臣既以此获展事君之义，两君亦以此得成理物之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176034_comment'></div>茍非其人，孰与于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176034_comment'></div>臣受材单寡，逢运休明，初涉猎于艺文，稍扳缘于禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176034_comment'></div>曩尘近侍，积愧空餐，悲遽隔于庭闱，分长依于丘垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176034_comment'></div>俄值纂承之庆，继叨收召之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176034_comment'></div>责以论经，尚少知于训诂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176034_comment'></div>使之与政，曾莫助于猷为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176034_comment'></div>矧以拙直而见知，遂为奸回之所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176034_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下纳之以天地之量，照之以日月之明，数加奖励之恩，每辨谗诬之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176034_comment'></div>重遭卜相，申敕备官，终逊避之无繇，更兢惭于非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176034_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下乐古训之获而忘其势，恶邪辞之害而断以心，勿贰于任贤，务本以除恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176034_comment'></div>使万邦有共惟帝臣之志，万姓有一哉王心之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176034_comment'></div>则进无求名之私，退有补过之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176034_comment'></div>臣之愿也，天实临之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176034_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　上谢表。作品：《除平章事监修国史谢表》《谢宰相笏记》<div id='poem_1176034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176034' class='poemTitle
