id='poem_1176168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宰相笏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176168")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176168'>祗荷宠灵，载怀感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176168_comment'></div>窃念臣志虽慕古，才不逮时，误蒙记怜，特赐收用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176168_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下绍膺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176168", 1176168, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>天统</span>，遵养圣功，旁招俊良，横及疏贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176168_comment'></div>誓当罄竭，仰称宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176168_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　上两府大王启。作品：《除宰相上两府大王免启二》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　回王珪启。作品：《回谢王参政启》《回王参政免启》<div id='poem_1176444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回谢王参政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176444")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176444'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176444'>伏审光被上恩，宠参国论，明缗敷告，庶位交忻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176444_comment'></div>历选迓衡之君，畴咨当轴之辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176444_comment'></div>尚尤违之敢弼，则曰汝无后言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176444_comment'></div>欲誉问之能宣，则曰予有疏附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176444_comment'></div>厥怀协济，乃称具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176444_comment'></div>当盛德之日跻，揽众材而时举，懋膺休显，允属耆明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176444_comment'></div>恭惟参政侍郎秉哲在躬，推仁及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176444_comment'></div>告嘉谋于后，学皆会于本原；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176444_comment'></div>扬孚号于庭，辞必稽于典要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176444_comment'></div>以陈善闭邪之赖，应赞元经体之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176444_comment'></div>重念羁单，最称眷旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176444_comment'></div>牵丝一府，久承论议之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176444_comment'></div>持橐三朝，常出践更之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176444_comment'></div>复叨荣于并命，兹窃幸于为僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176444_comment'></div>曲荷至怀，先诒重问，方励同寅之志，敢忘胥顾之勤？</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176444_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回王参政免启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176453")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176453'>伏审升拜帝恩，进陪国论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176453_comment'></div>孚号布宣于朝位，欢言腾溢于士林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176453_comment'></div>早与朋游，实先庆抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176453_comment'></div>恭惟某官元精发秀，冲气钟和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176453_comment'></div>赞密命于三朝，骛隆名于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176453_comment'></div>大忠无拂，常深简于上心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176453_comment'></div>经德不回，非外移于众口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176453_comment'></div>久蓄庇民之施，果膺置辅之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176453_comment'></div>方当上同扶世之猷，庶以自免瘝官之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176453_comment'></div>过烦重问，曲喻至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176453_comment'></div>冀回操以就工，遂协谋而许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176453_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176453_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　有诗题中书壁。作品：《题中书壁》<div id='poem_69688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题中书壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69688")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69688_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69688'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69688'>夜开金钥诏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69688", 69688, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>辞臣</span>，对御抽毫草<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69688", 69688, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>帝纶</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69688'>须信朝家重儒术，一时同榜用三人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69688'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69688_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　陈祥道、熊伯通等上贺启。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月13日</a>　此日，撰文。作品：《提转考课敕词》<div id='poem_1175420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>提转考课敕词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年12月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175420")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175420'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175420'>先王考绩之次序，虽见于经，而其详不传于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175420_comment'></div>朕若稽古，以修众功，而诸路刺举之官，未有以考其贤否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175420_comment'></div>比敕有司，详议厥制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175420_comment'></div>条奏来上，询谋悉同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175420_comment'></div>其使布宣，以励能者，而择左右可信之良使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1175420", 1175420, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>典治</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175420_comment'></div>古人有言，徒善不足以为政，徒法不能以自行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175420_comment'></div>今朕有念功乐善之志焉，而又继之黜陟幽明之法，以待天下之大吏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175420_comment'></div>然非夫任事之臣躬率以正而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1175420", 1175420, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>考慎</span>其实，与士大夫宣力于外者皆安于礼义，而不以便文徼幸为奸，则朕之志，岂能独信于天下，而法亦何恃以行哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175420_comment'></div>咨尔在位，其各悉力一心，务祗新书，以称朕至诚恻怛之意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1175420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月19日</a>　此日，作文与妙应大师。作品：《与妙应大师说》<div id='poem_1176705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与妙应大师说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年12月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176705")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176705'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176705'>妙应大师智缘，诊父之脉，而知子之祸福，翰林王承旨疑其古之无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176705_comment'></div>缘曰：「昔秦医和诊晋侯之脉，而知良臣必死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176705_comment'></div>良臣之死，乃见于晋侯之脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176705_comment'></div>诊父而知子，又何足怪哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176705_comment'></div>熙宁庚戌十二月十九日，某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176705_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月24日</a>　此日，提举编修《三司令式》并《敕》及《诸司库务岁计条例》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年12月</a>　月末，陈舜俞翻悔昔年不行青苗法，冯京欲用之，不可。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　荐元绛为知制诰，神宗召为翰林学士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　是年，进呈朱越乞知建州疏，因与神宗论君臣信任之道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　是年，刘邠来书，论出母继母嫁服。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　是年，有诗寄碧岩寺道光。作品：《寄碧岩道光法师》<div id='poem_69601' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69601' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69601?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄碧岩道光法师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69601")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69601_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69601'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69601'>去马来车扰扰尘，自难长寄水云身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69601'>碧岩后主今为客，何况开山说法人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69601'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69601_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　是年，象山令江朴代还。劳问之，而论事不合。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　见胡及，问州县得失，优待甚至。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　是年，有诗寄知鄂州张颙。作品：《寄鄂州张使君》<div id='poem_70687' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70687' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70687?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄岳<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作鄂）</span>州张使君</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70687")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70687_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70687'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70687'>昔人宁饮建业水，共道不食武昌鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70687'>公来建业每自如，亦复不厌武昌居。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70687'>武昌山川今可想，绿水逶迤烟莽苍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70687'>白鸥晴飞随两桨，岸荠茸茸映鱼网。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70687'>投老留连陌上尘，思公一语何由往。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70687'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_70687_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　咏吐绶鸡。作品：《吐绶鸡》<div id='poem_69254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69254?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吐绶鸡</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69254")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69254_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69254'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69254'>樊笼寄食老低摧，组丽深藏肯自媒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69254_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69254'>天日清明聊一吐，儿童初见互惊猜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69254_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69254'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69254_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　撰文。作品：《老子》《九变而赏罚可言》<span class='inlineComment2'>（第三本书结束。）</span><div id='poem_1176635' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176635' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176635?labeling=true' target='_blank'>老子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176635")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176635_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176635'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176635'>道有本有末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176635_comment'></div>本者，万物之所以生也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176635_comment'></div>末者，万物之所以成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176635_comment'></div>本者，出之自然，故不假乎人之力而万物以生也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176635_comment'></div>末者，涉乎形器，故待人力而后万物以成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176635_comment'></div>夫其不假人之力而万物以生，则是圣人可以无言也、无为也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176635_comment'></div>至乎有待于人力而万物以成，则是圣人之所以不能无言也、无为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176635_comment'></div>故昔圣人之在上而以万物为己任者，必制四术焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176635_comment'></div>四术者，礼、乐、刑、政是也，所以成万物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176635_comment'></div>故圣人唯务修其成万物者，不言其生万物者，盖生者尸之于自然，非人力之所得与矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176635_comment'></div>老子者独不然，以为涉乎形器者皆不足言也，不足为也，故抵去礼、乐、刑、政，而唯道之称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176635_comment'></div>是不察于理而务高之过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176635_comment'></div>夫道之自然者，又何预乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176635_comment'></div>唯其涉乎形器，是以必待于人之言也、人之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176635_comment'></div>其书曰：「三十辐共一毂，当其无，有车之用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176635_comment'></div>夫毂辐之用，固在于车之无用，然工之琢削未尝及于无者，盖无出于自然之力，可以无与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176635_comment'></div>今之治车者知治其毂辐，而未尝及于无也，然而车以成者，盖毂辐具，则无必为用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176635_comment'></div>如其知无为用而不治毂辐，则为车之术固已疏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176635_comment'></div>今知无之为车用，无之为天下用，然不知所以为用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176635_comment'></div>故无之所以为车用者，以有毂辐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176635_comment'></div>无之所以为天下用者，以有礼、乐、刑、政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176635_comment'></div>如其废毂辐于车，废礼、乐、刑、政于天下，而坐求其无之为用也，则亦近于愚矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176635_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176619' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九变而赏罚可言</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176619")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176619'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176619'>万物待是而后存者，天也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176619_comment'></div>莫不由是而之焉者，道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176619_comment'></div>道之在我者，德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176619_comment'></div>以德爱者，仁也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176619_comment'></div>爱而宜者，义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176619_comment'></div>仁有先后，义有上下，谓之分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176619_comment'></div>先不擅后，下不侵上，谓之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176619_comment'></div>形者，物此者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176619_comment'></div>名者，命此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176619_comment'></div>所谓物此者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176619_comment'></div>贵贱亲疏所以表饰之，其物不同者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176619_comment'></div>所谓命此者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176619_comment'></div>贵贱亲疏所以称号之，其命不同者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176619_comment'></div>物此者，贵贱各有容矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176619_comment'></div>命此者，亲疏各有号矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176619_comment'></div>因亲疏贵贱任之以其所宜为，此之谓因任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176619_comment'></div>因任之以其所宜为矣，放而不察乎，则又将大弛，必原其情，必省其事，此之谓原省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176619_comment'></div>原省明而后可以辨是非，是非明而后可以施赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176619_comment'></div>故庄周曰：「先明天而道德次之，道德已明而仁义次之，仁义已明而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>分守</span>次之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>分守</span>已明而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>形名</span>次之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>形名</span>已明而因任次之，因任已明而原省次之，原省已明而是非次之，是非已明而赏罚次之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176619_comment'></div>是说虽微庄周，古之人孰不然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176619_comment'></div>古之言道德所自出而不属之天者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176619_comment'></div>尧者，圣人之盛也，孔子称之曰「惟天为大，惟尧则之」，此之谓明天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176619_comment'></div>「聪明文思安安」，此之谓明道德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176619_comment'></div>「允恭克让」，此之谓明仁义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176619_comment'></div>次九族，列百姓，序万邦，此之谓明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>分守</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176619_comment'></div>修五礼，同律度量衡，以一天下，此之谓明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>形名</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176619_comment'></div>弃后稷，契司徒，皋陶士，垂共工，此之谓明因任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176619_comment'></div>三载考绩，五载一巡狩，此之谓明原省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176619_comment'></div>命舜曰「乃言底可绩」，谓禹曰「万世永赖，时乃功」，「蠢兹有苗，昏迷不恭」，此之谓明是非；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176619_comment'></div>「皋陶方祗厥叙，方施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>象刑</span>，惟明」，此之谓明赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176619_comment'></div>至后世则不然，仰而视之曰：「彼苍苍而大者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176619_comment'></div>其去吾不知其几千万里，是岂能知我何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176619_comment'></div>吾为吾之所为而已，安取彼」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176619_comment'></div>于是遂弃道德，离仁义，略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>分守</span>，慢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>形名</span>，忽因任，而忘原省，直信吾之是非，而加人以其赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176619_comment'></div>于是天下始大乱，而寡弱者号无告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176619_comment'></div>圣人不作，诸子者伺其间而出，于是言道德者至于窈冥而不可考，以至世之有为者皆不足以为，言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>形名</span>者守物诵数，罢苦以至于老而疑道德，彼皆忘其智力之不赡，魁然自以为圣人者此矣，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176619_comment'></div>庄周曰：「五变而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1176619", 1176619, "Clauses/115/Comments/1")'>形名</span>可举，九变而赏罚可言」，「语道而非其序，安取道」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176619_comment'></div>善乎，其言之也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176619_comment'></div>庄周，古之荒唐人也，其于道也荡而不尽善，圣人者与之遇，必有以约之，约之而不能听，殆将摈四海之外而不使之疑中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176619_comment'></div>虽然，其言之若此者，圣人亦不能废。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1176619'></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1176619_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月6日</a>　此日，鬻天下广惠仓田为三路及京东常平仓本。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月9日</a>　此日，以谢景温直史馆兼侍读，以邓绾兼侍御史知杂事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月15日</a>　此日，从驾至集禧观，有诗次韵吴充。作品：《上元从驾至集禧观次沖卿韵》<div id='poem_69824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵冲卿上元从驾至集禧观偶成</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69824")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69824'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69824'>昭陵持橐从游人，更见熙宁第四春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69824'>宝称中开移玉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>座，华灯错出映朱尘<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙舒本作垂绅）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69824'>辇<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作楼）</span>前时看新歌舞，仗外还如旧徼巡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69824'>投老逢时追往事，却含愁思度天津。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69824'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_69824'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_69824_0'>⑴ 原作王，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_69824_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月21日</a>　林旦、薛昌朝因李定追服事，上疏攻击。此日，林旦、薛昌朝知县差遣。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月22日</a>　此日，以邓绾判司农寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月25日</a>　此日，妹婿朱明之为崇文院校书。是日，以程昉为都大提举黄、御等河，同签书外都水监。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　荐王钦臣召对，论新法不合，遣归。爱其诗，题于扇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月28日</a>　因庇护李定，遭范育论奏。此日，罢范育权监察御史里行，授为崇文院校书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月</a>　是月，得萧注之评鑑，目以敢当天下大事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年1月</a>　是月，以萧注代潘夙知桂州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　欧阳修有启贺拜相。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月1日</a>　此日，上劄乞改科条。作品：《乞改科条劄子》<div id='poem_1176218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞改科条制劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年2月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176218")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176218'>伏以古之取士，皆本于学校，故道德一于上，而习俗成于下，其人材皆足以有为于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176218_comment'></div>自先王之泽竭，教养之法无所本，士虽有美材而无学校师友以成就之，议者之所患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176218_comment'></div>今欲追复古制以革其弊，则患于无渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176218_comment'></div>宜先除去声病对偶之文，使学者得以专意经义，以俟朝廷兴建学校，然后讲求三代所以教育选举之法，施于天下，庶几可复古矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176218_comment'></div>所对明经科欲行废罢，并诸科元额内解明经人数添解进士，乃更俟一次科场，不许新应诸科人投下文字，渐令改习进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176218_comment'></div>仍于京东、陕西、河东、河北、京西五路先置学官，使之教导。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176218_comment'></div>于南省所添进士奏名，仍具别作一项，止取上件京东等五路应举人并府监诸路曾应诸科改应进士人数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176218_comment'></div>所贵合格者多，可以诱进诸科向习进士科业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176218_comment'></div>如允所奏，乞降敕命施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176218_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月5日</a>　此日，神宗欲用朱明之检正中书礼房公事。以亲嫌辞，而荐刘挚。是日，老人星见，乞罢故事上贺表。是日，行新致仕法，以王素带职致仕。是日，司马光上章抨击。是日，以舍人院除授制辞繁琐，乞撰定诰词以备检用。神宗从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月6日</a>　以韩绛乞用韩铎权河东转运使，与神宗、文彦博等议之。是日，与神宗论河东转运司故意沮修河东城寨，欲穷究之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月8日</a>　此日，以曾布检正中书五房公事。御史中丞杨绘上章劾擅权。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月11日</a>　此日，妹婿朱明之为太子中允、集贤校理、崇政殿说书兼管国子监。是日，以邓润甫权检正中书户房公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月12日</a>　此日，与神宗、文彦博、吴充等议茶法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月14日</a>　此日，探报契丹阴发兵三十万往西界，与神宗、冯京议之；又与神宗论理财。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月15日</a>　此日，减中书堂后官魏默二年磨勘。是日，请神宗明降庚午诏书处分。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月16日</a>　此日，劝神宗不可减皇弟恩，神宗从之。是日，与神宗、文彦博等议遣使按使啰兀城。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月17日</a>　此日，因神宗欲责降河东转运使，以为宜详审。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月18日</a>　此日，以集贤校理赵彦若管勾画天下州、府、军、监、县、镇地图。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月21日</a>　此日，以文彦博言修漳河空劳民无所利，驳之。是日，与神宗论前秦丞相王猛。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月22日</a>　此日，论韩琦再任判大名府当加恩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月</a>　是月，撰墓志铭。作品：《王补之墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王补之墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176745")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176745'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176745'>君南城人，王氏，讳无咎，字补之，嘉祐二年进士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176745_comment'></div>初补江都县尉，丁父忧，服除，调卫真县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176745_comment'></div>尝弃天台县令，以与予共学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176745_comment'></div>久之，无以衣食其妻子，乃去，补南康县主簿，会予召至京师，因留教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176745_comment'></div>上方兴学校，以经术造士，予言君可教国子，命且下而君死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176745_comment'></div>君所在，学者归焉，贤士大夫皆慕与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176745_comment'></div>然君寡合，常闭门治书，唯与予言莫逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176745_comment'></div>当熙宁初，所谓质直好义，不为利疚于回而学不厌者，予独知君而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176745_comment'></div>君之死，年四十有六，实熙宁二年闰十一月丁巳，至四年二月壬申，妻曾氏，子絪、缊始克葬君南城县礼教乡长义里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176745_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176745'>安时所难，学以为己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176745_comment'></div>于呼鲜哉，可谓君子<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176745_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176745'>于：《文章正宗续集》作「势」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176745'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176745_0'>⑴ 《临川先生文集》卷九一。又见《文章正宗》续集卷八，正德《建昌志》卷一一，《宋元学案补遗》卷九八。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1176745_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月2日</a>　此日，遣章惇出使夔州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月3日</a>　此日，对资政殿。因庆州军乱，文彦博极言更张之不便，驳之；劝神宗宜先修内政，边事姑务静重。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月4日</a>　此日，神宗问啰兀城存弃，答之，因与论制夷狄之道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月5日</a>　韩绛欲弃荒堆寨，吕大防不肯。此日，乞神宗戒大防凡事当申明宣抚司听韩绛指挥，且言民力困弊实可忧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月6日</a>　此日，遣屯田员外郎周之纯察访广南东路均纳丁米并体量奉行新法不职者以闻。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月9日</a>　此日，以神宗御批体量保甲扰人事，论募兵之法当变革。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月10日</a>　此日，乞留王广渊知庆州、赵卨权发遣延州，神宗从之。是日，与神宗论用兵之道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月11日</a>　此日，神宗御批缓修漳河，进呈不行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月13日</a>　此日，以知太原府吕公弼乞解寄任，请手敕抚谕，神宗然之。是日，神宗御批陈留县保甲骚扰，令速止，仅团保觉察贼盗。进呈不行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月14日</a>　此日，请厚赏蕃部都巡检赵余庆、赵余德，神宗然之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月16日</a>　此日，与神宗论财用枯竭之故。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月19日</a>　此日，以韩绛奏请令赵卨安存折继世、种谔等，与神宗议之；又论西夏请和及李靖兵法。以枢密院言因置保甲有截指断腕者，访察之。是日，禀神宗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　与神宗议吕大防等罪，并上表待罪。神宗下诏释之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月22日</a>　此日，论保甲法之利，神宗大悦。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月26日</a>　此日，以发运司举官多非其人，乞特旨罢章俞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年3月27日</a>　此日，与神宗议召人免税充弓箭手事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　擢韩绛之侄韩宗道为成都府路转运判官，兼管勾常平农田水利差役事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月2日</a>　此日，罢章惇相度夔州路差役，为惇开释。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月5日</a>　此日，韩绛乞召蔡挺赴阙。奏寝不报。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月7日</a>　此日，以范育检正中书户房公事，育辞。是日，以神宗令特与环庆都钤辖亓赟公使犒设并支散银楪子，遂与枢密院反覆论之，以为犒设、支散须令本州、诸州军士一体。神宗卒从。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月8日</a>　此日，以蒲宗孟检正中书孔目房公事，邓润甫检正中书户房公事。是日，言士卒极困窘，请稍宽牵拘将帅之法。神宗诏付赵卨体量。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月10日</a>　此日，同天节道场观戏者，赋诗。作品：《相国寺启同天道场行香院观戏者》<div id='poem_70584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70584?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相国寺启同天节道场行香院观戏者</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年4月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70584")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70584'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70584'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70584", 70584, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>侏优</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作儒）</span>戏场中，一贵复一贱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70584'>心知本自同，所以无欣怨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70584'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70584_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月18日</a>　此日，因神宗欲以韩维为御史中丞，沮之，荐杨绘。是日，以两浙路水利、差役事皆不举，责降林英、张峋、王醇等。是日，再责种谔。是日，欲见权知开封府刘庠，使人谕意，庠拒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月19日</a>　此日，与神宗议王庆民、张景宪等赏罚。是日，力荐常秩，命颍州送之入京，除右正言、直集贤院、管勾国子监。是日，勉神宗力行保甲法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月21日</a>　此日，以王广廉权发遣河北路转运副使，钱昌武与堂除知州；以许将检正中书礼房公事，李定检正中书吏房公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月25日</a>　此日，提举修编敕。与神宗论西夏不必深入。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月26日</a>　此日，请以曾公亮镇永兴，除其子曾孝宽为陕西转运副使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年4月27日</a>　此日，定进士考转官条制。是日，留身与神宗论助役事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月7日</a>　此日，以范育为光禄寺丞、知韩城县；乞神宗手敕戒谕王广渊善抚士卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月9日</a>　此日，与神宗论租庸调法及府兵、义勇，欲变募兵宿卫法。是日，请各与诸军钱劝奖习艺，为立条例，使诸路一体。与文彦博辩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月10日</a>　此日，吕诲卒。得司马光所撰墓志铭拓本挂壁间，誉为西汉之文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月11日</a>　此日，以刘挚、杨绘乞罢程昉开修漳河，为昉辩说甚力，皆寝不报；又驳枢密院言府界淤田等事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月14日</a>　此日，阻钱公辅入朝，以马仲甫代之判都水监。是日，因东明县民数百家以科助役钱不当相率遮拦，说谕令退，遂白神宗乞根究。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　神宗以东明县民诉役钱事，连日以手敕相问，遂为反复解释。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月18日</a>　此日，因东明诉役钱事称疾卧家。神宗遣中使趣入见。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月19日</a>　此日，入见。是日，因御史中丞杨绘言司农寺超升东明县等户等第以多出役钱，为神宗指陈绘言不然，神宗诺之。是日，除光禄卿史炤知邢州，以示劝奖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月20日</a>　此日，为神宗论御臣之道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月22日</a>　此日，以孙洙力求补外，从其请。与神宗、文彦博等议降责张玉。是日，降之为陵州团练使。是日，呈役钱文字，因与神宗论抑兼并。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月25日</a>　此日，权陕西都转运使谢景温乞易延州、庆州等四路守帅。以为非便，宜静以待之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年5月26日</a>　此日，既对，留身请去。神宗慰留。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月1日</a>　此日，为明堂大礼使。言御史中丞杨绘沮坏新法，不宜在言职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月4日</a>　此日，神宗批令治贾蕃不奉法之罪，他罪勿劾。辩之，纳御批不行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月5日</a>　此日，因御史刘挚上疏论人材，与神宗论助役事，辩说甚力。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月7日</a>　此日，上表请上尊号，神宗不允。作品：此表不存。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年6月8日</a>　此日，以王克臣兼同知审官西院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　欧阳修数上章乞致仕。诋其坏州事、附流俗，因许之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　李寿朋卒。有文祭之。作品：《祭李省副文》<div id='poem_1176856' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>陨背</span>乎，不能保百年之康宁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176856_comment'></div>惟君别我，往祠太一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176856_comment'></div>笑言后容，愈于平日。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176226'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176226'>臣今日伏奉圣旨，除男雱太子中允、崇政殿说书，臣虽已奏论非宜，尚未蒙恩开允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176226_comment'></div>事有关于国体，岂敢冒昧不言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176226_comment'></div>臣窃观陛下即位已来，慎惜名器，一介之任，必欲因能，讲艺之臣，尤为遴选。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176020'>臣某言：伏蒙圣恩授臣男雱守太子中允，充崇政殿说书，寻具劄子辞免，蒙降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176020_comment'></div>恩骤加于私室，多所超踰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176020_comment'></div>事或累于公朝，诚难昧冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176020_comment'></div>仰烦睿训，曲喻至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176020_comment'></div>永惟眷奖之殊，实重兢惭之至<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176020_comment'></div>伏念臣首叨召节，得侍辞林，随被赞书，使陪经幄，稍更岁月，莫补涓埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176020_comment'></div>窃观上智之日跻，内讼浅闻而知困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176020_comment'></div>况如贱息，厥有童心，尚迷钻仰之方，岂称招延之礼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176020_comment'></div>恕己量主，非敢以私而自嫌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176020_comment'></div>为官择人，顾虽成命而宜改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176020_comment'></div>辄布可辞之义，上干难犯之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176020_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下屈体优容，垂精宠答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176020_comment'></div>谓大人照临之道广，当养以蒙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176020_comment'></div>意小夫诵说之智专，遽忘其贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176020_comment'></div>褒称备厚，训饬加严，揣实未安，寄颜有恧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176020_comment'></div>重念自古君臣之相与，未有如臣父子之所遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176020_comment'></div>盖当用儒之时，尤难讲艺之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176020_comment'></div>典谟方御，实参备于讨论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176020_comment'></div>诰誓未终，已继叨于奖擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176020_comment'></div>获世官于闾巷，嗣家学于朝廷，自非忘躯，何以报国。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除弟安国馆职谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年10月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176019")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176019'>臣某言：伏蒙圣恩以臣弟安国充崇文院校书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176019_comment'></div>书林置职，方储高位之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176019_comment'></div>诏板推恩，遂假私门之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176019_comment'></div>在于疵贱，实以兢惭<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176019_comment'></div>伏念臣初起孤生，非谋膴仕，中参近侍，特荷先朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176019_comment'></div>属忧患之相仍，分湮沦而自弃，敢图收召，俯暨幽潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176019_comment'></div>服在臣邻，骤冠论思之列；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176019_comment'></div>恩加子弟，具膺庆赏之延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176019_comment'></div>有昧冒于殊私，或超踰于常法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176019_comment'></div>惟数奇之同产，尝久困于稠人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176019_comment'></div>第册西垣，比前叨于睿奖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176019_comment'></div>校文东观，更曲被于明扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176019_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下与善无方，使能以类，欲阜成于大治，务博取于众材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176019_comment'></div>遂忘形迹之嫌，以溥龙光之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176019_comment'></div>衰宗既亢，唯知上报之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176019_comment'></div>小己易盈，弥惧先颠之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176019_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年10月26日</a>　此日，以吕嘉问权发遣户部判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年10月29日</a>　此日，擢应舜臣权发遣盐铁判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年11月12日</a>　此日，子雱蒙差押赐生辰礼物。上谢表。作品：《赐生日礼物谢表五道》其四。<div id='poem_1176089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐生日礼物谢表<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年11月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176089")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176089'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官冯宗道传宣抚问，及就府赐臣生日礼物：金花银器一百两、衣著一百匹、衣一对、金镀银鞍辔一副并缨复、马二匹、汤药一银合御封全者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176089_comment'></div>微劳不效，仅逃三典之科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176089_comment'></div>厚礼有加，尚躐九仪之等<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176089_comment'></div>臣外叨寄属，仰误眷怜，已隳考翼之基，重负母慈之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176089_comment'></div>迫劬劳于晚节，方不自胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176089_comment'></div>惟蕃庶之旧恩，终无以称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176089_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下更驰肤使，曲喻至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176089_comment'></div>驵骏灵珍，琛奇组丽，岂下流之敢及，皆前此之所无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176089_comment'></div>金厄淑旂，多锡诚荣于既往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176089_comment'></div>铅刀驽马，强扶难冀于将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176089_comment'></div>虽天地弗责其谢生，顾臣子敢忘于致死！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176089_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年11月15日</a>　此日，以胡宗师为审官西院主簿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年12月25日</a>　章惇荐张商英。此日，以张商英权检正中书礼房公事。是日，以司马光乞别选郭氏子孙奉周祀，驳之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　是年，次韵弟安礼咏雪。作品：《次韵和甫咏雪》<div id='poem_69841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
