ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年11月12日</a>　此日，以神宗赐生日礼物，上谢表。作品：《赐生日礼物谢表五道》其二。<div id='poem_1176089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐生日礼物谢表<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年11月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176089")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176089'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官冯宗道传宣抚问，及就府赐臣生日礼物：金花银器一百两、衣著一百匹、衣一对、金镀银鞍辔一副并缨复、马二匹、汤药一银合御封全者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176089_comment'></div>微劳不效，仅逃三典之科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176089_comment'></div>厚礼有加，尚躐九仪之等<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176089_comment'></div>臣外叨寄属，仰误眷怜，已隳考翼之基，重负母慈之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176089_comment'></div>迫劬劳于晚节，方不自胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176089_comment'></div>惟蕃庶之旧恩，终无以称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176089_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下更驰肤使，曲喻至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176089_comment'></div>驵骏灵珍，琛奇组丽，岂下流之敢及，皆前此之所无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176089_comment'></div>金厄淑旂，多锡诚荣于既往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176089_comment'></div>铅刀驽马，强扶难冀于将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176089_comment'></div>虽天地弗责其谢生，顾臣子敢忘于致死！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176089_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　是年，妹婿张奎卒。作品：《长安县太君王氏墓志》<div id='poem_1176820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_3_1176820_comment'></div>工诗善书，强记博闻，明辨敏达，有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176820_comment'></div>循循恭谨，不自高显。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_69724'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69724'>一径森然四座凉，残阴馀韵去<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作兴）</span>何长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69724'>人怜直节生来瘦，自许高材老更刚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69724'>会与蒿藜同雨露，终随松柏到冰霜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69724'>烦君惜取<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作此）</span>根株在，欲乞<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作乞与）</span>伶伦学凤凰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69724'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　撰文。作品：《性论》<div id='poem_1176659' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176659' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176659?labeling=true' target='_blank'>性论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176659")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176659_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176659'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176659'>古之善言性者，莫如仲尼，仲尼，圣之粹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176659_comment'></div>仲尼而下，莫如子思，子思，学仲尼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176659_comment'></div>其次莫如孟轲，孟轲，学子思者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176659_comment'></div>仲尼之言，载于《论语》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176659_comment'></div>子思、孟轲之说，著于《中庸》而明于七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176659_comment'></div>然而世之学者，见一圣二贤性善之说，终不能一而信之者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176659_comment'></div>岂非惑于《语》所谓「上智下愚」之说与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176659_comment'></div>噫，以一圣二贤之心而求之，则性归于善而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176659_comment'></div>其所谓愚智不移者，才也，非性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176659_comment'></div>性者，五常之谓也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176659_comment'></div>才者，愚智昏明之品也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176659_comment'></div>欲其才品，则孔子所谓「上智与下愚不移」之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176659_comment'></div>欲明其性，则孔子所谓「性相近习相远」、《中庸》所谓「率性之谓道」、孟轲所谓「人无有不善」之说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176659_comment'></div>夫有性有才之分，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176659_comment'></div>曰：性者，生之质也，五常是也，虽上智与下愚，均有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176659_comment'></div>盖上智得之之全，而下愚得之之微也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176659_comment'></div>夫人生之有五常也，犹水之趋乎下，而木之渐乎上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176659_comment'></div>谓上智者有之，而下愚者无之，惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176659_comment'></div>或曰：所谓上智得之之全，而下愚得之之微，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176659_comment'></div>曰：仲尼所谓「生而知之」，子思所谓「自诚而明」，孟子所谓「尧舜先得我心之所同」，此上智也，得之之全者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176659_comment'></div>仲尼所谓「困而学之」，子思所谓「勉强而行之」，孟子所谓「太山之于丘垤，河海之于行潦」，此下愚也，得之之微者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176659_comment'></div>曰：然则圣人谓其不移，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176659_comment'></div>曰：谓其才之有小大，而识之有昏明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176659_comment'></div>至小者不可彊而为大，极昏者不可彊而为明，非谓其性之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176659_comment'></div>夫性犹水也，江河之与畎浍，小大虽异，而其趋于下同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176659_comment'></div>性犹木也，楩楠之与樗栎，长短虽异，而其渐于上同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176659_comment'></div>智而至于极上，愚而至于极下，其昏明虽异，然其于恻隐、羞恶、是非、辞逊之端，则同矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176659_comment'></div>故曰：仲尼、子思、孟轲之言，有才性之异，而荀卿乱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176659_comment'></div>扬雄、韩愈惑乎上智下愚之说，混才与性而言之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176659_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b822a6a6cdf34a478e849d00607f3be7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b822a6a6cdf34a478e849d00607f3be7");'><span id='b822a6a6cdf34a478e849d00607f3be7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　秩满解官，归江宁；韩琦馈酒，上启谢之。作品：《上扬州韩资政启》<div id='poem_1176473' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176473' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176473?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上扬州韩资政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　归江宁，葬父未果。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f226bdc8779649c1b9bc11c081aba185_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>，30岁</div><div id='f226bdc8779649c1b9bc11c081aba185' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>归江宁。姚辟来访，别后作书答之，论章句名数之学不足以尽圣人之术。作品：《答姚辟书》<div id='poem_1176366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答姚辟书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176366")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176366'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176366'>姚君足下：别足下三年于兹，一旦犯大寒，绝不测之江，亲屈来门，出所为文书，与谒并入，若见贵者然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176366_comment'></div>始惊以疑，卒观文书，词盛气豪，于理悖焉者希，间而论众经，有所开发，私独喜故旧之不予遗而朋友之足望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176366_comment'></div>今冠衣而名进士者，用万千计，蹈道者有焉，蹈利者有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176366_comment'></div>蹈利者则否，蹈道者则未免离章绝句，解名释数，遽然自以圣人之术单此者有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176366_comment'></div>夫圣人之术，修其身，治天下国家，在于安危治乱，不在章句名数焉而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176366_comment'></div>而曰圣人之术单此，妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176366_comment'></div>虽然，离章绝句，解名释数，遽然自以圣人之术单此者，皆守经而不茍世者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176366_comment'></div>守经而不茍世，其于道也几，其去蹈利者则缅然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176366_comment'></div>观足下固已几于道，姑汲汲乎其可急，于章句名数乎徐徐之，则古之蹈道者，将无以出足下上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176366_comment'></div>足下以为何如？</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176366_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在江宁作诗与陈正叔。作品：《次韵答陈正叔二首》<div id='poem_69872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答陈正叔二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69872")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69872'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69872'>青衫憔悴北归来，发有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69872", 69872, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>霜根</span>面有埃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69872'>群吠我方憎<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作惊）</span>猘子，一鸣谁更识龙媒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69872'>功名落落求难值，日月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69872", 69872, id='poem_sentence_3_69872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69872'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69872_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69871?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69871'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69871'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_69871", 69871, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>何当</span>水石他年住，更把韦编静处开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69871'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69871_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年4月10日</a>　此日，归江宁，葬父于牛首山。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　曾巩有祭文祭其父。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　受命通判舒州，遂上书相府，乞一就近差遣。作品：《上相府书》<div id='poem_1176330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上相府书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176330")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176330'>某闻古者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>极治</span>之时，君臣施道以业天下之民，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>匹夫匹妇</span>有不与其泽者，为之焦然耻而忧之，瞽聋侏儒亦各得以其材食之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176330_comment'></div>其诚心之所化，至于牛羊之践不忍不仁于草木，今《行苇》之诗是也，况于所得士大夫也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176330_comment'></div>此其所以上下辑睦而称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>极治</span>之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176330_comment'></div>伏惟阁下方以古之道施天下，而某之不肖，幸以此时窃官于朝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>受命</span>佐州，宜竭罢驽之力，毕思虑，治百姓，以副吾君吾相于设官任材、休息元元之意，不宜以私慁上，而自近于不敏之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176330_comment'></div>抑其势有可言，则亦阁下之所宜怜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176330_comment'></div>某少失先人，今大母春秋高，宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>就养</span>于家之日久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176330_comment'></div>徒以内外数十口，无田园以托一日之命，而取食不腆之禄，以至于今不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176330_comment'></div>今去而野处，念自废于茍贱不廉之地，然后有以共裘葛、具鱼菽，而免于事亲之忧，则恐内伤先人之明，而外以累君子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>养完</span>人材之德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176330_comment'></div>濡忍以不去，又义之所不敢出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176330_comment'></div>故辄上书阙下，愿滨先人之丘冢，自托于筦库，以终<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>犬马之养</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176330_comment'></div>伏惟阁下观古之所以材瞽聋侏儒之道，览《行苇》之仁，怜士有好修之意者，不穷之于无所据以伤其操，使老者得养，而养者虽愚无能，无报盛德，于以广仁孝之政，而曲成士大夫为子孙之谊，是亦君子不宜得已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176330_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176330", 1176330, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>黩冒</span>威尊，不任皇恐之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176330_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年5月</a>　五月，以宰臣文彦博之荐，诏赴京试馆职，辞不就。<br /></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　撰谢景回墓志铭。作品：《谢景回墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢景回墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176805")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176805'>君姓谢氏，讳景回，字师复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176805_comment'></div>以泰宁军节度掌书记讳崇礼者为曾大父，以太子宾客陈留公讳涛者为大父，而兵部员外郎、知制诰、阳夏公讳绛者之少子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176805_comment'></div>幼好学，有大志，聪明卓然，不类童子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176805_comment'></div>年十九，所为文辞已可传载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176805_comment'></div>于是得疾不可治，以嘉祐四年十二月丙子，弃世于汉东，人莫不为谢氏哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176805_comment'></div>诸兄以八年十月乙酉，葬君邓州穰县五垄原之兆，而临川王某为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1176805'>攻乎其为良，汰乎其为精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176805_comment'></div>吾见其质，吾闻其声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176805_comment'></div>如或毁之，用不既于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176805_comment'></div>哀以铭诗，亦慰其兄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　丁忧期间，郭祥正致书存问，并寄诗篇。作书答之，赞其诗豪迈惊绝，出于天才。作品：《与郭祥正太博书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　是年，与胡舜元相逢，作诗。作品：《有感》<div id='poem_70387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_70387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70387'>顾常轻千乘，只愿足一丘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　自嘉祐四年入京，居开封五年，名动仕林，负天下之望，而谤亦随之，弟安国、安礼亦声名鹊起。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　《淮南杂说》行世，天下推尊，以比孟子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　《易解》行世。<br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　书《洪范传》后。作品：《书洪范传后》<div id='poem_1176593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176593' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176593?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书洪范传后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176593")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176593'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176593'>王某曰：古之学者，虽问以口，而其传以心，虽听以耳，而其受以意，故为师者不烦，而学者有得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176593_comment'></div>孔子曰：「不愤不启，不悱不发，举一隅不以三隅反，则不复也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176593_comment'></div>夫孔子岂敢爱其道，骜天下之学者，而不使其蚤有知乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176593_comment'></div>以谓其问之不切，则其听之不专，其思之不深，则其取之不固，不专不固，而可以入者，口耳而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176593_comment'></div>吾所以教者，非将善其口耳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176593_comment'></div>孔子没，道日以衰熄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176593", 1176593, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>浸淫</span>至于汉，而传注之家作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176593_comment'></div>为师则有讲而无应，为弟子则有读而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176593", 1176593, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>无问</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176593_comment'></div>非不欲问也，以经之意为尽于此矣，吾可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176593", 1176593, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>无问</span>而得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176593_comment'></div>岂特<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176593", 1176593, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>无问</span>，又将无思，非不欲思也，以经之意为尽于此矣，吾可以无思而得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176593_comment'></div>夫如此，使其传注者皆已善矣，固足以善学者之口耳，不足善其心，况其有不善乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176593_comment'></div>宜其历年以千数，而圣人之经卒于不明，而学者莫能资其言以施于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176593_comment'></div>予悲夫《洪范》者，武王之所以虚心而问，与箕子之所以悉意而言，为传注者汨之，以至于今冥冥也，于是为作传以通其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176593_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176593_comment'></div>学者不知古之所以教，而蔽于传注之学也久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176593_comment'></div>当其时，欲其思之深、问之切而后复焉，则吾将孰待而言邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176593_comment'></div>孔子曰：「予欲无言」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176593_comment'></div>然未尝无言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176593_comment'></div>其言也，盖有不得已焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176593_comment'></div>孟子则天下固以为好辩，盖邪说暴行作，而孔子之道几于熄焉，孟子者不如是，不足与有明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176593_comment'></div>故孟子曰：「予岂好辩哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176593_comment'></div>予不得已也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176593_comment'></div>夫予岂乐反古之所以教，而重为此譊譊哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176593_comment'></div>其亦不得已焉者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176593_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　以王回撰《续烈女传》，谑之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　居丧江宁，哀毁过甚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　弟安国常在母墓侧，出血和墨，书佛经甚众。<br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　读经山中，与赞元游，当问祖师意旨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　与龚原书，论王回之贤如杨雄。作品：《答龚深父书》<div id='poem_1176305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答龚深父书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176305")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176305'>某得手笔，感慰，尤喜侍奉万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176305_comment'></div>所示王深父事甚晓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176305_comment'></div>不为小廉曲谨以投众人耳目，而趣舍必度于仁义，是乃深父所以合于古人，而众人所以不识深父者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176305_comment'></div>言之于深父何病？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176305_comment'></div>扬雄亦用心于内，不求于外，不修廉隅以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176305", 1176305, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>徼名</span>当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176305_comment'></div>故某以谓深父于为雄，几可以无悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176305_comment'></div>扬雄者，自孟轲以来未有及之者，但后世士大夫多不能深考之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176305_comment'></div>孟轲，圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176305_comment'></div>贤人则其行不皆合于圣人，特其智足以知圣人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176305_comment'></div>故某以谓深父其知能知轲，其于为雄几可以无悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176305_comment'></div>扬雄之仕，合于孔子无不可之义，奈何欲非之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176305_comment'></div>若以深父不仕为过于雄，则自雄以来能不仕者多矣，岂皆能过于雄乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176305_comment'></div>若以深父之不仕为与雄异，则孟子称禹、稷、颜回同道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176305_comment'></div>深父之于为雄，其以强学力行之所至，仕不仕特其所遭义命之不同，未可以议于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176305_comment'></div>深父吾友也，言其美，尤不敢略，亦不敢诬，所以致忠信于吾友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176305_comment'></div>然以久废学，恐所论尚不中，不惜更详喻及也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176305_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年6月</a>　六月，撰序，颂美吴中复潭州与学。作品：《潭州新学诗并序》<div id='poem_70803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州新学诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70803")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70803'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70803'>有嘉新学，潭守所作。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70803'>守者谁欤，仲庶氏吴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70803'>振养<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70803", 70803, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>矜寡</span>，衣之褰襦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70803'>黔首鼓歌，吏静不求。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70803'>乃相庙序，生师所庐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70803'>上漏旁穿，燥湿不除。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70803'>曰嘻迁哉，迫阨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_70803", 70803, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>卑污</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70803'>当其坏时，适可以谋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70803'>营地虑工，伐楩楠槠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70803'>撤故就新，为此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_70803", 70803, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>渠渠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70803'>潭人来止，相语而喜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70803'>我知视成，无豫经始。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70803'>公升在堂，从者如水。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70803'>公曰诲汝，潭之士子。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70803'>古之读书，凡以为己。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70803'>躬行孝悌，由义而仕。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70803'>神听汝助，况于闾里。<div id='poem_sentence_16_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_70803'>无实而荂，非圣自是。<div id='poem_sentence_17_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_70803'>虽大得意，吾犹汝耻。<div id='poem_sentence_18_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_70803'>士下其手，公言无尤。<div id='poem_sentence_19_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_70803'>请诗我歌，以远公休。<div id='poem_sentence_20_70803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_70803'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_70803_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　秋，彭汝砺溯江来访，作诗以送。作品：《赠彭器资》<div id='poem_70790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠彭器资</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70790")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70790'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70790'>鄱水滔天竟东注，气泽所钟贤可慕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70790'>文章浩渺足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70790", 70790, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>波澜</span>，行义迢迢有归处。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70790'>中江秋浸两崖间，溯洄与我相往还。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70790'>我挹其清久未竭，复得纵观于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70790", 70790, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>波澜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70790'>放言深入妙云海，示我仙圣本所寰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70790'>楞伽我亦见彷佛，岁晚所悲行路难。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70790'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_70790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年12月</a>　十二月，以知虔州元積中徙建虔州州学，遣使求记，撰记。作品：《虔州学记》<div id='poem_1176677' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176677' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176677?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虔州学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176677")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176677'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176677'>虔于江南地最旷，大山长谷，荒翳险阻，交、广、闽、越铜盐之贩，道所出入，椎埋、盗夺、鼓铸之奸，视天下为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176677_comment'></div>庆历中，尝诏立学州县，虔亦应诏，而卑陋褊迫不足为美观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176677_comment'></div>州人欲合私财迁而大之久矣，然吏常力屈于听狱，而不暇顾此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176677_comment'></div>凡二十一年而后改筑于州所治之东南，以从州人之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176677_comment'></div>盖经始于治平元年二月提点刑狱宋城蔡侯行州事之时，而考之以十月者，知州事钱塘元侯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176677_comment'></div>二侯皆天下所谓才吏，故其就此不劳，而斋祠、讲说、候望、宿息，以至庖湢，莫不有所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176677_comment'></div>又斥馀财市田及书，以待学者，内外完善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176677_comment'></div>于是州人相与乐二侯之适己，而来请文以记其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176677_comment'></div>余闻之也，先王所谓道者，性命之理而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176677_comment'></div>其度数在乎俎豆、钟鼓、管弦之间，而常患乎难知，故为之官师，为之学，以聚天下之士，期命辩说，诵歌弦舞，使之深知其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176677_comment'></div>夫士，牧民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176677_comment'></div>牧知地之所在，则彼不知者驱之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176677_comment'></div>然士学而不知，知而不行，行而不至，则奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176677_comment'></div>先王于是乎有政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176677_comment'></div>夫政，非为劝沮而已也，然亦所以为劝沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176677_comment'></div>故举其学之成者，以为卿大夫，其次虽未成而不害其能至者，以为士，此舜所谓庸之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176677_comment'></div>若夫道隆而德骏者，又不止此，虽天子，北面而问焉，而与之迭为宾主，此舜所谓承之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176677_comment'></div>蔽陷畔逃，不可与有言，则挞之以诲其过，书之以识其恶，待之以岁月之久而终不化，则放弃、杀戮之刑随其后，此舜所谓威之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176677_comment'></div>盖其教法，德则异之以智、仁、圣、义、忠、和，行则同之以孝友、睦姻、任恤，艺则尽之以礼、乐、射、御、书、数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176677_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176677", 1176677, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>淫言诐行</span>诡怪之术，不足以辅世，则无所容乎其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176677_comment'></div>而诸侯之所以教，一皆听于天子，天子命之矣，然后兴学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176677_comment'></div>命之历数，所以时其迟速；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176677_comment'></div>命之权量，所以节其丰杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176677_comment'></div>命不在是，则上之人不以教而为学者不道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176677_comment'></div>士之奔走、揖让、酬酢、笑语、升降，出入乎此，则无非教者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176677_comment'></div>高可以至于命，其下亦不失为人用，其流及乎既衰矣，尚可以鼓舞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1176677", 1176677, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>群众</span>，使有以异于后世之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176677_comment'></div>故当是时，妇人之所能言，童子之所可知，有后世老师宿儒之所惑而不悟者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176677_comment'></div>武夫之所道，鄙人之所守，有后世豪杰名士之所惮而愧之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176677_comment'></div>尧、舜、三代，从容无为，同四海于一堂之上，而流风馀俗咏叹之不息，凡以此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176677_comment'></div>周道微，不幸而有秦，君臣莫知屈己以学，而乐于自用，其所建立悖矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176677_comment'></div>而恶夫非之者，乃烧《诗》、《书》，杀学士，扫除天下之庠序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176677_comment'></div>然后非之者愈多，而终于不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176677_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176677_comment'></div>先王之道德，出于性命之理，而性命之理出于人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176677_comment'></div>《诗》、《书》能循而达之，非能夺其所有而予之以其所无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176677_comment'></div>经虽亡，出于人心者犹在，则亦安能使人舍己之昭昭，而从我于聋昏哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176677_comment'></div>然是心非特秦也，当孔子时，既有欲毁乡校者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176677_comment'></div>盖上失其政，人自为义，不务出至善以胜之，而患乎有为之难，则是心非特秦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176677_comment'></div>墨子区区，不知失者在此，而发尚同之论，彼其为愚，亦独何异于秦！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176677_comment'></div>呜呼，道之不一久矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176677_comment'></div>扬子曰「如将复驾其所说，莫若使诸儒金口而木舌」，盖有意乎辟雍学校之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176677_comment'></div>善乎其言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176677_comment'></div>虽孔子出，必从之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176677_comment'></div>今天子以盛德新即位，庶几能及此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176677_comment'></div>今之守吏，实古之诸侯，其异于古者，不在乎施设之不专，而在乎所受于朝廷未有先王之法度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176677_comment'></div>不在乎无所于教，而在乎所以教未有以成士大夫仁义之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176677_comment'></div>虔虽地旷以远，得所以教，则虽悍昏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1176677", 1176677, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>嚚凶</span>，抵禁触法而不悔者，亦将有以聪明其耳目而善其心，又况乎学问之民？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176677_comment'></div>故余为书二侯之绩，因道古今之变及所望乎上者，使归而刻石焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1176677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176677'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷八二。又见《圣宋文选》卷一一，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷一一六，《东莱集注类编观澜文》丙集卷八，《文章辨体汇选》卷五八九，《古今图书集成》职方典卷九二三、选举典卷二一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176677_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　朱氏妹遽卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　是年，韩求仁问学，作书答之。作品：《答韩求仁书》<div id='poem_1176304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答韩求仁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176304")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176304'>比承手笔，问以所疑，哀荒久不为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176304_comment'></div>勤勤之意，不可以虚辱，故略以所闻致左右，不自知其中否也，唯求仁所择尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176304_comment'></div>盖序《诗》者不知何人，然非达先王之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176304", 1176304, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>法言</span>者，不能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176304_comment'></div>故其言约而明，肆而深，要当精思而熟讲之尔，不当疑其有失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176304_comment'></div>二《南》皆文王之诗，而其所系不同者，《周南》之诗，其志美，其道盛，微至于赳赳武夫、兔罝之人，远至于江汉、汝坟之域，久至于衰世之公子，皆有以成其德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176304_comment'></div>《召南》则不能与于此，此其所以为诸侯之风，而系之召公者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176304_comment'></div>夫事出于一人，而其不同如此者，盖所入有浅深，而所施有久近故尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176304_comment'></div>所谓《小雅》、《大雅》者，《诗》之《序》固曰：「政有小大，故有《小雅》焉，有《大雅》焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176304_comment'></div>然所谓《大雅》者，积众小而为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176304_comment'></div>故《小雅》之末，有疑于《大雅》者，此不可不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176304_comment'></div>又作诗者，其志各有所主，其言及于大而志之所主者小，其言及于小而志之所主者大，此又不可不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176304_comment'></div>司马迁以为《大雅》言王公大人，而德逮黎庶，《小雅》讥小己之得失，而其流及上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176304_comment'></div>此言可用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176304_comment'></div>又宣王之《大雅》，其善疑于小；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176304_comment'></div>而幽王之《小雅》，其恶疑于大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176304_comment'></div>盖宣王之善微矣，其大者如此而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176304_comment'></div>幽王之恶大矣，其小者犹如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176304_comment'></div>凡《序》言刺某者，一人之事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176304_comment'></div>言刺时者，非一人之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176304_comment'></div>刺言其事，疾言其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176304_comment'></div>或言其事，或言其情，其实一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176304_comment'></div>何以知其如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176304_comment'></div>「《墙有茨》，卫人刺其上也」，而卒曰「国人疾之而不可道也」，是以知其如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176304_comment'></div>刺乱，为乱者作也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176304_comment'></div>闵乱，为遭乱者作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176304_comment'></div>何以知其如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176304_comment'></div>平王之《扬之水》，先束薪而后束楚，忽之《扬之水》，先束楚而后束薪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176304_comment'></div>周之乱在上，而郑之乱在下故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176304_comment'></div>乱在上则刺其上，乱在下则闵其上，是以知其如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176304_comment'></div>管、蔡为乱，成王幼冲，周公作《鸱鸮》以遗王，非疾成王而刺之也，特以救乱而已，故不言刺乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176304_comment'></div>言刺乱、刺褊、刺奢、刺荒，序其所刺之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176304_comment'></div>言刺时者，明非一人之事尔，非谓其不乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176304_comment'></div>《关雎》之诗所谓「悠哉悠哉，辗转反侧」者，孔子所谓「哀而不伤」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176304_comment'></div>《何彼襛矣》之诗所谓「平王」者，犹格王、宁王而已，非东周之平王也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176304_comment'></div>所谓「齐侯」者，犹康侯、宁侯而已，非营丘之齐侯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176304_comment'></div>《郑·缁衣》之诗宜也、好也、席也，此其先后之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176304_comment'></div>此诗言武公父子，善善之无已，故《序》曰：「以明有国善善之功焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176304_comment'></div>席，多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176304_comment'></div>宜者，以言其所善之当也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176304_comment'></div>多者，以言其所善之众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176304_comment'></div>缁衣者，君臣同朝之服也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176304_comment'></div>「适子之馆」者，就之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176304_comment'></div>为之改作缁衣而授之以粲者，举而养之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176304_comment'></div>能就之，又能举而养之，此所以为有国者之善善，而异于匹夫之善善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176304_comment'></div>夫有国善善如此，则优于天下矣，其能父子善于其职，而国人美之，不亦宜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176304_comment'></div>《生民》之诗所谓「是任是负，以归肇祀」者，言后稷既开国，任负所种之谷以归而肇祀尔，非以谓兆帝祀于郊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176304_comment'></div>所谓「卬盛于豆，于豆于登，其香始升，上帝居歆」者，言我既为天子得祀郊，则盛于豆登，其香始升，而上帝居歆尔，非以为后稷得郊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176304_comment'></div>其卒曰「胡臭亶时，庶无罪悔，以迄于今」者，言上帝所以居歆，何臭之亶时乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176304_comment'></div>乃以后稷肇祀，则庶无罪悔，以迄于今，得郊祀之时尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176304_comment'></div>盖所谓「文武之功，起于后稷，故推以配天」者此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176304_comment'></div>卫有邶、鄘之诗，而说者以谓卫后世并邶、鄘而取之，理或然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176304_comment'></div>既无所受之，则疑而阙之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176304_comment'></div>意诚而心正，心正则无所为而不正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176304_comment'></div>故孔子曰：「《诗》三百，一言以蔽之，曰思无邪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176304_comment'></div>此《诗》之言，故曰「《诗》三百，一言以蔽之」也，非以它经为有异乎此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176304_comment'></div>吾之所受者为此，则彼者吾之所弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176304_comment'></div>所谓「彼哉彼哉」者，盖孔子之所弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176304_comment'></div>孔子曰「管仲如其仁」，仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176304_comment'></div>扬子谓「屈原如其智」，不智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176304_comment'></div>犹之《诗》以不明为明，又以不明为昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176304_comment'></div>考其辞之终始，则其文虽同，不害其意异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176304_comment'></div>忠足以尽己，恕足以尽物，虽孔子之道，又何以加于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176304_comment'></div>而论者或以谓孔子之道，神明不测，非忠恕之所能尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176304_comment'></div>虽然，此非所以告曾子者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176304_comment'></div>「好勇过我」也者，所谓能勇而不能怯者也，能勇而不能怯，非成材也，故孔子无所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176304_comment'></div>古者凤鸟至，河出图，皆圣人在上之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176304_comment'></div>其言「凤鸟不至，河不出图」者，盖曰无圣人在上而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176304_comment'></div>颜子具圣人之体而微，所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1176304", 1176304, "Clauses/209/Comments/0")'>美人</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176304_comment'></div>其于尊五美、屏四恶，非待教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176304_comment'></div>若夫郑声佞人，则由外铄我者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176304_comment'></div>虽若颜子者，不放而远之，则其于为邦也，不能无败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176304_comment'></div>《书》曰：「能哲而惠，何忧乎驩兜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176304_comment'></div>何畏乎巧言令色孔壬」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176304_comment'></div>由此观之，佞人者，尧舜之所难，而况于颜子者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176304_comment'></div>夫佞人之所以入人者，言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176304_comment'></div>言之入人，不如声之深，则郑声之可畏，固又甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176304_comment'></div>孔子曰：「如有所誉，其有所试矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176304_comment'></div>谓颜子「三月不违仁」者，盖有所试矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176304_comment'></div>虽然，颜子之行，非终于此，其后孔子告之以「克己复礼」，而「请事斯语」矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176304_comment'></div>夫能言动视听以礼，则盖已终身未尝违仁，非特三月而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176304_comment'></div>语道之全，则无不在也，无不为也，学者所不能据也，而不可以不心存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176304_comment'></div>道之在我者为德，德可据也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176304_comment'></div>以德爱者为仁，仁譬则左也，义譬则右也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176304_comment'></div>德以仁为主，故君子在仁义之间，所当依者仁而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176304_comment'></div>孔子之去鲁也，知者以为为无礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176304_comment'></div>乃孔子则欲以微罪行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176304_comment'></div>以微罪行也者，依于仁而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176304_comment'></div>礼，体此者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176304_comment'></div>智，知此者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176304_comment'></div>信，信此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176304_comment'></div>孔子曰「志于道，据于德，依于仁」，而不及乎义礼智信者，其说盖如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176304_comment'></div>扬子曰：「道以道之，德以得之，仁以人之，义以宜之，礼以体之，天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176304_comment'></div>合则浑，离则散，一人而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1176304", 1176304, "Clauses/283/Comments/0")'>兼统</span>四体者，其身全乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176304_comment'></div>老子曰：「失道而后德，失德而后仁，失仁而后义，失义而后礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176304_comment'></div>扬子言其合，老子言其离，此其所以异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176304_comment'></div>韩文公知「道有君子有小人，德有凶有吉」，而不知仁义之无以异于道德，此为不知道德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176304_comment'></div>管仲九合诸侯，一正天下，此孟子所谓天之大任者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176304_comment'></div>不能如大人正己而物正，此孔子所谓小器者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176304_comment'></div>言各有所当，非相违也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176304_comment'></div>昔之论人者，或谓之圣人，或谓之贤人，或谓之君子，或谓之仁人，或谓之善人，或谓之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176304_comment'></div>《微子》一篇，记古之人出处去就，盖略有次序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176304_comment'></div>其终所记八士者，其行特可谓之士而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176304_comment'></div>当记此时，此八人之行，盖犹有所见，今亡矣，其行不可得而考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176304_comment'></div>无君子小人，至于五世则流泽尽，泽尽则服尽，而尊亲之礼息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176304_comment'></div>万世莫不尊亲者，孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176304_comment'></div>故孟子曰：「予未得为孔子徒也，予私淑诸人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176304_comment'></div>孟子所谓「市，廛而不徵，法而不廛」者，先儒以国中之地谓之廛，以《周官》考之，此说是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176304_comment'></div>廛而不徵者，赋其市地之廛，而不徵其货；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176304_comment'></div>法而不廛者，治之以市官之法，而不赋其廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176304_comment'></div>或廛而不徵，或法而不廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176304_comment'></div>盖制商贾者恶其盛，盛则人去本者众，又恶其衰，衰则货不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1176304_comment'></div>故制法以权之，稍盛则廛而不徵，已衰则法而不廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1176304_comment'></div>文王之时，关，讥而不徵，及周公制礼，则凶荒札丧，然后无徵，盖所以权之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1176304_comment'></div>贡者，夏后氏之法，而孟子以为不善者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1176304_comment'></div>不善，非夏后氏之罪也，时而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1176304_comment'></div>责难于君者，吾闻之矣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1176304", 1176304, "Clauses/366/Comments/0")'>责善</span>于友者，吾闻之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1176304_comment'></div>虽然，其于君也，曰「以道事之，不可则止」，其于友也，曰「忠告而善道之，不可则止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1176304_comment'></div>王驩于孟子，非君也，非友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1176304_comment'></div>彼未尝谋于孟子，则孟子未尝与之言，不亦宜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1176304_comment'></div>求仁所问于《易》者，尚非《易》之蕴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1176304_comment'></div>能尽于《诗》《书》《论语》之言，则此皆不问而可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1176304_comment'></div>某尝学《易》矣，读而思之，自以为如此，则书之以待知《易》者质其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1176304_comment'></div>当是时，未可以学《易》也，唯无师友之故，不得其序，以过于进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1176304_comment'></div>乃今而后，知昔之为可悔，而其书往往已为不知者所传，追思之未尝不愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1176304_comment'></div>以某之愧悔，故亦欲求仁慎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1176304_comment'></div>盖以求仁之才能而好问如此，某所以告于左右者，不敢不尽，冀有以亮之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1176304_comment'></div>至于《春秋》三传，既不足信，故于诸经尤为难知，辱问皆不果答，亦冀有以亮之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_126_1176304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　故吏周之道知江宁县。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年12月29日</a>　此日，谢景平卒。为其撰墓志铭。作品：《秘书丞谢师宰墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书丞谢师宰墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年12月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176786")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176786'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176786'>君姓谢氏，讳景平，字师宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176786_comment'></div>尚书兵部员外郎、知制诰、阳夏公、赠礼部尚书讳绛之子，太子宾客、陈留公、赠礼部尚书讳涛之孙，泰宁军掌书记、赠尚书吏部侍郎讳崇礼之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176786_comment'></div>初以祖父荫，试秘书省校书郎，守将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176786_comment'></div>既而中进士第，佥书崇信军节度判官厅公事，监楚州西河转般仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176786_comment'></div>累官至秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176786_comment'></div>年三十三，以治平元年十二月庚申卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176786_comment'></div>妻尹氏，生男女四人，皆前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176786_comment'></div>其兄以某年某月某日，葬君邓州穰县五陇山南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176786_comment'></div>谢氏故家河南缑氏，君六世祖仕吴越，故自陈留公以上三世葬杭之富阳，至君始葬阳夏公于邓，为穰人，而今以君祔葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176786_comment'></div>君于忿不忮，于欲不求，虽学之力，亦其天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176786_comment'></div>故其孝弟忠信，宽柔逊让，庄静谨洁，称于儿童，以至壮长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176786_comment'></div>而成不充其志，施不尽其材，此学士大夫所以哀其死而多为之出涕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176786_comment'></div>然君文学、政事、言语已能自达于一时，其于道德之意，性命之理，则求之而不至，闻矣而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176786_comment'></div>呜呼，可谓贤已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176786_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1176786'>阳夏四子，皆贤而材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176786_comment'></div>季也早死，吾铭其埋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176786_comment'></div>今又铭叔，呜呼可哀！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176786_comment'></div>古之死者，以死为息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176786_comment'></div>嗟叔方刚，何愒之亟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176786_comment'></div>昭昭者逝，嶷嶷者藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176786_comment'></div>为识在斯，铭则不亡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176786_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年2月</a>　二月，为刁湜之子撰墓志铭。作品：《虞部郎中刁君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞部郎中刁君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176758")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176758_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176758'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176758'>刁氏于江南为显姓，当李氏时，君曾祖讳某，甚贵宠，尝节度昭信军，卒，葬昭信城南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176758_comment'></div>皇祖讳某，亦尝仕李氏，归朝廷，以尚书兵部郎中直秘阁，终真宗时，其墓在江宁牛首之北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176758_comment'></div>后秘阁再世不大遂，然多名人，在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176758", 1176758, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>世议</span>中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176758_comment'></div>尚书屯田员外郎讳某者，葬丹徒，于君为皇考，故君为丹徒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176758_comment'></div>君讳某，字某，尝举进士，不中，遂用皇祖荫仕州县，以尚书虞部郎中知广德军，归，卒于京师，年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176758_comment'></div>后卒之若干日，治平二年二月十五日，葬丹徒乐亭村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176758_comment'></div>君敦厚谨饬，治内外皆严以有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176758_comment'></div>所居官，举其治，以此多荐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176758_comment'></div>初娶孙氏，后娶郭氏，封金华县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176758_comment'></div>有六男子：珉，试将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176758_comment'></div>璹，守某县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176758_comment'></div>次玘、瑰、玣、珣，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176758_comment'></div>三女，长嫁尚书屯田员外郎梁昱，馀未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176758_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1176758'>刁氏南祖，奋功以武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176758_comment'></div>诒禄于孙，有蔚有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176758_comment'></div>君以祖芘，厥艰初仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176758_comment'></div>祗载不惰，有荣于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176758_comment'></div>徂相名原，窾此新宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176758_comment'></div>筮云终吉，铭告无穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176758_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　为狄遵之父狄棐撰墓志铭。作品：《尚书工部侍郎枢密直学士狄公神道碑》<div id='poem_1176729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书工部侍郎枢密直学士狄公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平元年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176729")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176729'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176729'>狄氏故并人，唐武后时，有以谅直至宰相者，有功中宗以及社稷，是为梁公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176729_comment'></div>公，梁公之十四世孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176729_comment'></div>讳棐，字辅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176729_comment'></div>曾祖曰崇谦，连州桂阳县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176729_comment'></div>祖曰文蔚，全州清湘县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176729_comment'></div>考曰希颜，徐州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176729_comment'></div>及公贵，赠录事君至兵部尚书，而公母李氏封陇西郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176729_comment'></div>盖梁公之后，有兼谟者，亦有名迹，至大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176729_comment'></div>其后禄仕不终，然寖微弗显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176729_comment'></div>及公，乃以行能为时用，出使入侍，终尚书工部侍郎、直枢密为学士，天下称为善人长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176729_comment'></div>公少孤力学，中咸平三年进士甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176729_comment'></div>其官，自大理评事，历大理寺丞、殿中丞、太常博士、尚书屯田都官、职方员外郎、祠部刑部郎中、太常少卿、右谏议大夫、给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176729_comment'></div>其职，自直昭文馆，历龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176729_comment'></div>其初任知袁州分宜县，后尝知开封府司录，通判邓州、成都府，为开封府判官，使京西、成都府路转运，又使制置江淮荆浙，再判吏部流内铨，知审官院，知壁、广、滑、魏、随、陕、郑、同、扬九州，河中、河南二府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176729_comment'></div>其知陕州河中府，以赵元昊反，择西方守吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176729_comment'></div>其知随州，则坐在魏时军事有骄不逊者不即治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176729_comment'></div>其知扬州，则不及赴，而卒于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176729_comment'></div>庆历三年二月十七日也，享年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176729_comment'></div>公惇厚笃实，未尝妄言笑，虽有喜愠，未尝见色，终身不言人过恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176729_comment'></div>罢南海，所赍无南物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176729_comment'></div>在陕中，贵人有力者言，将援公于上，公为不闻，接以它语，退而叹曰：「吾束发至此，得爵禄皆以义，可以老而自污邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176729_comment'></div>盖其廉如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176729_comment'></div>其治民，出于宽仁不忍，虽以此尝得罪，然自若，弗悔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176729_comment'></div>当时士大夫闻其死，多叹惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176729_comment'></div>累阶至中散大夫，勋至上柱国，爵至山阳郡开国公，食邑二千一百户，食实封四百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176729_comment'></div>夫人武城县君路氏，左司谏、知制诰振之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176729_comment'></div>初，公以布衣见路公，路公即誉公文学行治，妻以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176729_comment'></div>生六男子：遵道、遵度、遵礼、遵悫、遵路、遵彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176729_comment'></div>遵度当天圣初，善为古文，志义甚高，尝为襄州襄阳县主簿，不幸早死，君子莫不伤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176729_comment'></div>遵路为太常寺奉礼郎，与遵道、遵悫、遵彝，亦皆早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176729_comment'></div>遵礼今为尚书虞部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176729_comment'></div>六女子：嫁卫尉卿王罕，卫尉卿魏琰，枢密直学士何中立，尚书驾部郎中王信民，二人早死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176729_comment'></div>狄氏当五代之乱，占潭之湘潭，至公始葬武城君于许州阳翟县张涧里，故以公合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176729_comment'></div>葬以庆历五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176729_comment'></div>既葬二十年，而遵礼来求铭文，刻之墓碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176729_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1176729'>维狄先公，开号于梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176729_comment'></div>扶国举帝，仁柔义刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176729_comment'></div>施垂子孙，禄不旷仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176729_comment'></div>历世十四，公为循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176729_comment'></div>内行振振，恕以与人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176729_comment'></div>无恚无忌，考终厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176729_comment'></div>阳翟古墟，有幽新里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176729_comment'></div>铭诗不磨，彼石之视。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1176729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　江东转运判官范纯仁作诗呈弟安国，与之厚善。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年3月21日</a>　此日，葛良嗣卒。作诗挽之。作品：《葛兴祖挽词》<div id='poem_70220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葛兴祖挽辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年3月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70220")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70220'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70220'>忆随诸彦附<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70220", 70220, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>青云</span>，场屋声名看出群。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70220'>孙宝暮年犹主簿，卜商今日更修文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70220'>山川凛凛平生气，草木萧萧数尺坟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70220'>欲写此哀终不尽，但令千载少知君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年7月28日</a>　此日，王回卒，作文祭之。作品：《祭王回深甫文》<div id='poem_1176873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王回深甫文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年7月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176873")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176873'>嗟嗟深甫，真弃我而先乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176873_comment'></div>孰谓深甫之壮以死，而吾可以长年乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176873_comment'></div>虽吾昔日执子之手，归言子之所为，实受命于吾母，曰：「如此人，乃与为友」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176873_comment'></div>吾母知子，过于予初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176873_comment'></div>终子成德，多吾不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176873_comment'></div>呜呼天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176873_comment'></div>既丧吾母，又夺吾友，虽不即死，吾何能久！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176873_comment'></div>抟胸一恸，心摧志朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176873_comment'></div>泣涕为文，以荐食酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176873_comment'></div>嗟嗟深甫，子尚知否！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年8月</a>　八月，母大祥。又撰王回墓志铭，寄示曾巩。作品：《王深父墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王深父墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176756")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176756'>吾友深父，书足以致其言，言足以遂其志，志欲以圣人之道为己任，盖非至于命弗止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176756_comment'></div>故不为小廉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176756", 1176756, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>曲谨</span>以投众人耳目，而取舍、进退、去就必度于仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176756_comment'></div>世皆称其学问文章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176756", 1176756, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>行治</span>，然真知其人者不多，而多见谓迂阔，不足趣时合变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176756_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176756_comment'></div>是乃所以为深父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176756_comment'></div>令深父而有以合乎彼，则必无以同乎此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176756_comment'></div>尝独以谓天之生夫人也，殆将以寿考成其才，使有待而后显，以施泽于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176756_comment'></div>或者诱其言，以明先王之道，觉后世之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176756_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176756_comment'></div>孰以为道不任于天，德不酬于人，而今死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176756_comment'></div>甚哉，圣人君子之难知也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176756_comment'></div>以孟轲之圣，而弟子所愿，止于管仲、晏婴，况馀人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176756_comment'></div>至于扬雄，尤当世之所贱简，其为门人者，一侯芭而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176756_comment'></div>芭称雄书以为胜《周易》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176756_comment'></div>《易》不可胜也，芭尚不为知雄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176756_comment'></div>而人皆曰：古之人生无所遇合，至其没久而后世莫不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176756_comment'></div>若轲、雄者，其没皆过千岁，读其书、知其意者甚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176756_comment'></div>则后世所谓知者，未必真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176756_comment'></div>夫此两人以老而终，幸能著书，书具在，然尚如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176756_comment'></div>嗟乎深父！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176756_comment'></div>其智虽能知轲，其于为雄，虽几可以无悔，然其志未就，其书未具，而既早死，岂特无所遇于今，又将无所传于后！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176756_comment'></div>天之生夫人也而命之如此，盖非余所能知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176756_comment'></div>深父讳回，本河南王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176756_comment'></div>其后自光州之固始迁福州之侯官，为侯官人者三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176756_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176756_comment'></div>祖讳某，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176756_comment'></div>考讳某，尚书兵部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176756_comment'></div>兵部葬颍州之汝阴，故今为汝阴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176756_comment'></div>深父尝以进士补亳州卫真县主簿，岁馀自免去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176756_comment'></div>有劝之仕者，辄辞以养母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176756_comment'></div>其卒以治平二年七月二十八日，年四十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176756_comment'></div>于是朝廷用荐者以为某军节度推官，知陈州南顿县事，书下而深父死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176756_comment'></div>夫人曾氏，先若干日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176756_comment'></div>子男一人，某，女二人，皆尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176756_comment'></div>诸弟以某年某月某日，葬深父某县某乡某里，以曾氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176756_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1176756'>呜呼深父！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176756_comment'></div>惟德之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1176756", 1176756, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>仔肩</span>，以迪祖武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176756_comment'></div>厥艰荒遐，力必践取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176756_comment'></div>莫吾知庸，亦莫吾侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176756_comment'></div>神则尚反，归形此土。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1176756'></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1176756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年9月</a>　九月，登冶城作诗。作品：《乙巳九月登冶城作》<div id='poem_70278' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70278' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_69942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泛舟青溪入水门登高斋奉呈叔康<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　撰张瑷墓志铭。作品：《尚书祠部员外郎秘阁校理张君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书祠部员外郎秘阁校理张君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176746")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176746'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176746'>滁全椒张君，讳瑗，字君玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176746_comment'></div>其先有司泗州法者，讳煦，于君为曾祖，尝曰：「吾施德于人多矣，后当有显者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176746_comment'></div>尚书刑部侍郎、参知政事讳洎者，于君为祖，有二子，生君者长子，讳安期，官终国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176746_comment'></div>君以进士甲科守秘书省校书郎、签书平江军节度判官听公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176746_comment'></div>故事得献书求试，君无所献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176746_comment'></div>知建昌军南丰县，通判鄂州，又将通判梓州，而有以君为言者，乃召试以为秘阁校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176746_comment'></div>于是自校书五迁为尚书祠部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176746_comment'></div>年五十五，以嘉祐五年四月壬申卒京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176746_comment'></div>夫人蓬莱县君王氏，生三男子，伯孙、仲孙、世孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176746_comment'></div>三女子，其一嫁试将作监主簿苏泌，其次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176746_comment'></div>治平二年九月甲申葬君全椒善政乡脩仁里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176746_comment'></div>于是伯孙主邵武军光泽县簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176746_comment'></div>君与余善，其能贫而不为利，余所畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176746_comment'></div>其于故事、盖无所问而不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176746_comment'></div>其好书，天性也，往往日旰，灶薪不属，而阖门读书自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176746_comment'></div>又能为吏，当官有所守，嶷嶷必得其意，然平居妥言徐视易狎，若无能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176746_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1176746'>有幽滁山、滁水两间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176746_comment'></div>槃礴演迤，乃多君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176746_comment'></div>我仪其蓄，以博厥闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176746_comment'></div>我肖其涤，以清厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176746_comment'></div>书此哀石，永诒崖滨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176746_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　以江南东路转运使王晳赠池纸并诗，作诗诗酬之。作品：《次韵酬微之赠池纸并诗》<div id='poem_70417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70417?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵酬微之赠池纸并诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70417")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70417'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70417'>微之出守秋浦时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70417", 70417, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>椎冰</span>看捣万谷皮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70417'>波工龟手咤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70417", 70417, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>今样</span>，鱼网肯数荆州池。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70417'>霜纨夺色贾不售，虹玉丧气山无辉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70417'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70417", 70417, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>方船</span>稳载献天子，善价徐取供吾私。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70417'>十年零落尚百一，持以赠我随清诗。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70417'>君宁久寄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70417", 70417, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>金谷</span>地，方执赐笔磨坳螭。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70417'>当留此物朝上国，日侍帝侧书新仪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70417'>不然名山副史本，褒拔元凯诛穷奇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70417'>咨予文章非世用，画镂空尔靡冰脂。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70417'>挥毫才足记姓字，窃学又耻从师宜。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70417'>匆匆点污亦何忍，嘉贶但觉难为辞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70417'>篇终有意责赵璧，穷国恐误连城归。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70417'>倾囊倒箧聊一报，安敢坐以秦为雌。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70417'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_70417_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年10月11日</a>　此日，服除，复为工部郎中、知制诰，召赴阙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年10月19日</a>　此日，知江宁府彭思永赴阙，作诗相送。作品：《送江宁彭给事赴阙》<div id='poem_70629' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70629' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70629?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送江宁彭给事赴阙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年10月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70629")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_70629_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70629'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70629'>西江望士众长兼，卓荦传家在一男。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70629'>壮志异时开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70629", 70629, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>史牒</span>，妙龄终日对书龛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70629'>桂堂发策收科选，樱苑颁诗豫宴酣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70629", 70629, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>拜职</span>荣先入，抗疏辞恩耻横覃。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70629'>櫜垂铃栈驼鸣𡇼，节拥棠郊虎视眈。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_70629'>幕中俊乂闲刀笔，帐下骁雄冷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_70629", 70629, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>剑镡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_70629'>楚地怪须留汲黯，萧规疑欲付曹参。<div id='poem_sentence_25_70629_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ，上状辞赴阙，乞一分司官于江宁居住。作品：《辞赴阙状》其一。《辞赴阙状》其二。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　弟安国如通州，作诗寄之。作品：《王安国如通州寄之》<div id='poem_69216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平甫如通州寄之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69216")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69216'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69216'>北山摇落水峥嵘，想见扬帆出广陵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69216'>平世自无忧国事，求田应不忤陈登。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69216'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年11月</a>　十一月，撰葛良嗣墓志铭。作品：《葛兴祖墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葛兴祖墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176753")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176753'>许州长社县主簿葛君，讳良嗣，字兴祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176753_comment'></div>其先处州之丽水人，而兴祖之父，徙居明州之鄞，兴祖葬其父润州之丹徒，故今又为丹徒人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176753_comment'></div>曾大父讳遇，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176753_comment'></div>大父讳旰，赠尚书都官郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176753_comment'></div>父讳源，以尚书度支郎中终仁宗时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176753_comment'></div>度支君三子，当天圣、景祐之间，以文有声赫然进士中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176753_comment'></div>先人尝受其挚，阅之终篇，而屡叹葛氏之多子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176753_comment'></div>既而三子者，伯仲皆早死，独其季在，即兴祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176753_comment'></div>兴祖博知多能，数举进士，角出其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176753_comment'></div>而刻励修洁，笃于亲友，慨然欲有所为，以效于世者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176753_comment'></div>年四十馀，始以进士出仕州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176753_comment'></div>馀十年，而卒穷于无所遇以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176753_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176753_comment'></div>命不可控引而才之难恃以自见盖久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176753_comment'></div>然兴祖于仕未尝茍，闻人疾苦，欲去之如在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176753_comment'></div>其临视，虽细故，人不以属耳目者，必皆致其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176753_comment'></div>论者多怪之曰：「兴祖且老矣，弊于州县，而服勤如此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176753_comment'></div>余曰：「是乃吾所欲于兴祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176753_comment'></div>夫大仕之则奋，小仕之则怠忽以不治，非知德者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176753_comment'></div>兴祖闻之，以余之言为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176753_comment'></div>兴祖娶胡氏，又娶郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176753_comment'></div>其卒年五十三，实治平二年三月辛巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176753_comment'></div>其葬以胡氏祔，在丹徒之长乐乡显扬村，即其年十一月某甲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176753_comment'></div>兴祖三男子，蘩、蕴皆有文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176753_comment'></div>蘩，许州临颍县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176753_comment'></div>蕴，邓州穰县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176753_comment'></div>蘋尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176753_comment'></div>四女子，皆未嫁云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176753_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1176753'>蹇于仕，以为人尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176753_comment'></div>不憖施以年，孰主孰谋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176753_comment'></div>无大憾于德，又将何求？</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1176753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　弟安礼如京师，王晳置酒送行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　高师雄见访，与之同游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年11月</a>　十一月，撰杨公适墓志铭。作品：《朝奉郎守殿中丞前知兴元府成固县杨君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176798' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176798?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎守殿中丞前知兴元府成固县杨君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176798")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176798_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176798'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176798'>杨氏自太尉震守节于汉以死，而将相名臣之族多出于华阴，历八九百年，以至于今不绝，为士大夫家，而尚能谱太尉之昭穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176798_comment'></div>当五代之乱，君曾祖讳某者，在吴越，因相其王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176798_comment'></div>王迁国除于太宗之时，而国相之子孙归仕于天子，又多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176798", 1176798, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>贤显</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176798_comment'></div>尚书刑部郎中讳某者，君皇祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176798_comment'></div>尚书司封郎中讳某者，君皇考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176798_comment'></div>杨氏之为江都人者，自君皇考始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176798_comment'></div>君讳某，字公适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176798_comment'></div>幼详敏，知好文学，故我叔祖兴元府君嫁之以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176798_comment'></div>及长而仕，号为能吏，所在官治多举者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176798_comment'></div>自太庙斋郎更九官，而以殿中丞知兴元府成固县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176798_comment'></div>治平元年归，得疾于楚州，二月二十一日卒，年六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176798_comment'></div>夫人王氏，即兴元府君尚书主客郎中讳某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176798_comment'></div>五男子：湜、洙、治、涤、浡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176798_comment'></div>湜，宿州符离县尉，馀皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176798_comment'></div>洙、治前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176798_comment'></div>四女子，其已嫁者二人，太常少卿吕璹，试将作监主簿孙綖者，君婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176798_comment'></div>其一人未嫁而前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176798_comment'></div>诸子孙以二年十一月四日，葬君江都东兴乡之北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176798_comment'></div>以某尝得侍君，而君知之于少时者也，故属以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176798_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176798'>赫赫太尉，穷于季世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176798_comment'></div>华阴之杨，终煽而昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176798_comment'></div>艰难徂迁，亦相其王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176798_comment'></div>王以家朝，相随内属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176798_comment'></div>有子有姓，尚多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1176798", 1176798, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>显服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176798_comment'></div>君劢厥绍，考终世禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176798_comment'></div>书铭在京，兆实初卜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176798_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　上书富弼，谢其助丧抚恤之德。作品：《上富相公书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　上书宋庠，谢其助丧抚恤之德。作品：《上宋相公书》<div id='poem_1176378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宋相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176378")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176378'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176378'>某愚戆浅薄，动多触罪，初叨一命，则在幕府，当此之时，尤为无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176378_comment'></div>自去吏属之籍，以至今日，虽尝获侍燕语，然不能自同众人之数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176378_comment'></div>阁下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176378", 1176378, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>抚接</span>顾待，久而加亲，及以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176378", 1176378, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>罪逆</span>扶丧归葬，阁下发使吊问，特在诸公之先，而所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176378", 1176378, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>顾恤</span>之尤厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176378_comment'></div>此盖仁人君子，乐于以礼长育成就人材，哀念一日之雅，而忘其终身不肖之丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176378_comment'></div>顾在私心，宜何以报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176378_comment'></div>当阁下以三公归第，四方奔走贺庆之时，而某尚以衰麻之故，不能有一言自献，以赞左右之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176378_comment'></div>岁时不居，奄及丧除，可以有献矣，然所能进于左右，乃不过如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176378_comment'></div>盖心之委曲，有不胜言，冀蒙有以恕之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176378_comment'></div>伏惟阁下以直道相先帝，虽已不在政事之地，然绝德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176378", 1176378, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>至行</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176378", 1176378, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>九州四海</span>所共矜式，朝廷大议，在所谋谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176378_comment'></div>伏惟为时自重，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176378_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　上书张昇，谢母丧时其附循之德。作品：《上张枢密书》<div id='poem_1176380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176380' class='poemTitle
