"Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>褊迫</span>，不知所向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176380_comment'></div>在京师时，自以备数有司，而阁下方断国论，故非公事，未尝敢以先人之故，私请左右，脩子侄之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176380_comment'></div>及以罪逆扶丧归葬，阁下方以医药自辅，哀疚迷谬，阙于赴告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176380_comment'></div>凡此皆宜得疏绝之罪者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176380_comment'></div>然阁下拊循顾待，既久而加亲，追赐手笔，哀怜备厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176380_comment'></div>当是时，某方累然在丧服之中，无以冀于全存，故不能有所献，以谢恩礼之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176380_comment'></div>今既除丧，可以叙感矣，然所能致于左右者，不过如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176380_comment'></div>盖拳拳之心，书不能言，实冀宽大仁明有以容而亮之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176797_comment'></div>尝为韶州乐昌、无为军庐江二县主簿，河中府临晋县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176797_comment'></div>以昭德军节度推官知邢州平乡县，以大理寺丞知苏州吴江、衢州江山二县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176797_comment'></div>又以太子中舍、殿中丞监在京箔场、太平州芜湖县酒税，遂告老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176797_comment'></div>会今上即位，迁博士，至明年而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176797_comment'></div>少贫，几不自存，有姊氏以田宅，弗取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176797_comment'></div>及为吏，所在推诚爱人，人至不忍有所负以累君，去辄遮泣挽留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176797_comment'></div>及老矣，而弥贫，然终不以贫故变节有所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176797_comment'></div>年九十，精悍如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176797_comment'></div>及将卒，尚读书，与家人笑语自若，投其书，若将寐者，遂卒，卒时治平元年十一月十一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176797_comment'></div>李氏故金陵人，其后迁高邮，又迁广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176797_comment'></div>君曾祖讳某，祖讳某，考讳某，以君故，赠殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176797_comment'></div>君娶开封浩氏，有两男子：察，山南东道节度推官，蚤卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176797_comment'></div>定，集庆军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176797_comment'></div>一女，嫁杭州新城县令许仲蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176797_comment'></div>定有文行，从余游，故与为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176797_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1176797'>斩旷平，窾幽密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176797_comment'></div>工相方，史诹日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176797_comment'></div>于惟君，考此室，犹其永宁尚终吉。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　是年，为王无咎之父撰墓表。作品：《建昌王君墓表》<div id='poem_1176735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建昌王君墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176735")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176735'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176735'>君建昌南城人，姓王氏，讳某，字君玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176735_comment'></div>少则贫窭，事亲尽力，未尝佚游慢戏以弃一日，亦未尝屈志变节以辱于一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176735_comment'></div>故虽食蔬水饮而父母有欢愉之心，徒步蓝缕而乡人有畏难之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176735_comment'></div>及其有子，则尽其方以教子，于是乡人之子弟皆归之，君随少长所能以教，又尽其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176735_comment'></div>盖娶邑里周氏女，有贤行，能助君所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176735_comment'></div>生四子，无忌、无咎、无隐、无悔，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176735_comment'></div>无忌早卒，而无咎独中第，为扬州江都县尉，率君之教，博学能文，笃行不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176735_comment'></div>然人以为君能长者，以有是子，而非特其教之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176735_comment'></div>君亦尝举进士，不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176735_comment'></div>某年，年六十五，以某月日卒于江都其子之官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176735_comment'></div>明年三月二十四日，葬所居县里屯之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176735_comment'></div>葬久矣，无咎始求予文，以表君墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176735_comment'></div>当时无咎弃台州天台县令，教授于常州，其学弥勤，其行弥厉，其志盖非有求于兹世而止，能使君显闻于后世，庶其在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176735_comment'></div>以予不肖而言之不美也，安能有所重以称君子孝子耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176735_comment'></div>亦论次之如此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　杨骥至江宁从学。因骥识郑侠，收置门下。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　是年，与王晳、范纯仁作诗咏筹思亭。作品：《筹思亭》<div id='poem_70231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>筹思亭<span class='inlineComment2'>（在江东转运司南厅后园）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70231")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70231'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70231'>昔人何计亦何思，许国忧民适此时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70231'>寓兴中园<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作原）</span>为远趣，托名华榜有新诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70231'>数株碧柳苍苔地，一丈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70231", 70231, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>红蕖</span>渌水池。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70231'>坐听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70231", 70231, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>楚谣</span>知岁美，想衔杯酒问花期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70231'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　和王晳《登高斋》。作品：《和微之登高斋》<div id='poem_70505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王微之登高斋三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70505")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70505'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70505'>寒云沈屯白日埋，河汉荡坼天如筛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70505'>衡门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70505", 70505, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>兼旬</span>限泥潦，卧听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70505", 70505, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>窾木</span>鸣相挨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70505'>萧辰忽扫纤翳尽，北岭初出青嵬<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作崔）</span>嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70505'>微之新诗动我目，烂若火齐金盘堆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70505'>想携诸彦眺平野，高论历诋秦以来。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70505'>觥船淋浪始快意，忽忆归云<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>胡为哉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70505'>念君少壮辍游衍，发挥春秋名玉杯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70505'>书成不得断国论，但此<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作比）</span>空语传<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_70505", 70505, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>八垓</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70505'>登临兴罢因感触，更欲远引追宗雷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70505'>君知富贵亦何有，谄誉未足偿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_70505", 70505, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>讥排</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70505'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_70505", 70505, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>风豪</span>雨横费调燮，坐使发背为黄台。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70505'>留宾往往夜参半，虽有樽俎无由开。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70505'>江南佳丽非一日，况乃故园<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作国）</span>名池台。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70505'>能招过客饮文字，山水又足供<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_70505", 70505, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>欢咍</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70505'>剩留官屋贮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_70505", 70505, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>酒母</span>，取醉不竭当如淮。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70505'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_70505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70505'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_70505_0'>⑴ 张本校：恐是去字</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70505_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_70504' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70504' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70504?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70504_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70504'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70504'>六朝人物随烟埃，金舆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70504", 70504, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>玉几</span>安在哉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70504'>钟山石城已寂寞，祇见江水云端来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70504'>百年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70504", 70504, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>故老</span>有存者，尚忆世宗初伐淮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70504'>魏王兵马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70504", 70504, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>接踵</span>出，旗纛千里相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70504", 70504, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>搪挨</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70504'>当时谋臣非不众，上国拔取多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70504", 70504, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>陪台</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70504'>龙腾<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作飞）</span>九天跨四海，一水欲阻为可<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作真堪）</span>咍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70504'>降王北归楼殿坼，弃屋尚锁残金堆<span id='poem_sentence_7_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70504'>山川清明草木静，天地不复屯云雷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70504'>使君登高访古昔<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作一访古）</span>，伤此陈迹聊持杯。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70504'>因留嘉客坐披写，酃渌笑语倾如筛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70504'>酒酣重惜功业晚，老矣万卷徒兼该。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70504'>攒峰列壑动归兴，忧端落笔何崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70504'>馀年无欢易感激，亦愧庄叟能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_70504", 70504, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>安排</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70504'>青灯明灭照不寐，但把君诗阖且开。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70504'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_70504_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70503?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70503'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70503'>干戈六代战血埋，双阙尚指山崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70503'>当时君臣但儿戏，把酒空劝长星杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70503'>临春美女闭黄壤，玉枝自<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作白）</span>蕊繁如堆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70503'>后庭新声散<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作变）</span>樵牧，兴废倏忽何其哀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70503'>咸阳龙移九州坼，遗种变化呼风雷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70503'>萧条中原砀无水，崛强又此<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作欲）</span>凭江淮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70503'>广陵衣冠扫地去，穿筑<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作凿）</span>陇亩为池台。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70503'>吴侬倾家助经始，尺土不借秦人筛。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70503'>珠犀磊落万艘入，金璧照耀千门开。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70503'>建隆天飞跨两海，南发交广东温台。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70503'>中间嶪嶪地无几，欲久割据诚难哉。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70503'>灵旗指麾尽貔虎，谈笑力可南山排。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70503'>楼船蔽川莫敢动，扶伏但有谋臣来。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70503'>百年沧洲自潮汐，事往不与波争回。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70503'>黄云荒城失苑路，白草废畤空坛垓。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70503'>使君新篇韵险绝，登眺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_70503", 70503, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>感悼</span>随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_70503", 70503, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>嘲咍</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70503'>嗟予愁惫气已竭，对垒每欲相劘挨。<div id='poem_sentence_16_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_70503'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_70503", 70503, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>挥毫</span>更想能一战，数窘乃见诗人才<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《临川先生文集》卷六）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_70503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_70503'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_70503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　撰文论礼乐。作品：《礼乐论》<div id='poem_1176615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼乐论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176615")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176615'>气之所禀命者，心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176615_comment'></div>视之能必见，听之能必闻，行之能必至，思之能必得，是诚之所至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176615_comment'></div>不听而聪，不视而明，不思而得，不行而至，是性之所固有，而神之所自生也，尽心尽诚者之所至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176615_comment'></div>故诚之所以能不测者，性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176615_comment'></div>贤者，尽诚以立性者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176615_comment'></div>圣人，尽性以至诚者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176615_comment'></div>神生于性，性生于诚，诚生于心，心生于气，气生于形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176615_comment'></div>形者，有生之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176615_comment'></div>故养生在于保形，充形在于育气，养气在于宁心，宁心在于致诚，养诚在于尽性，不尽性不足以养生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176615_comment'></div>能尽性者，至诚者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176615_comment'></div>能至诚者，宁心者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176615_comment'></div>能宁心者，养气者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176615_comment'></div>能养气者，保形者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176615_comment'></div>能保形者，养生者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176615_comment'></div>不养生不足以尽性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176615_comment'></div>生与性之相因循，志之与气相为表里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176615_comment'></div>生浑则蔽性，性浑则蔽生，犹志一则动气，气一则动志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176615_comment'></div>先王知其然，是故体天下之性而为之礼，和天下之性而为之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176615_comment'></div>礼者，天下之中经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176615_comment'></div>乐者，天下之中和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176615_comment'></div>礼乐者，先王所以养人之神，正人气而归正性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176615_comment'></div>是故大礼之极，简而无文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176615_comment'></div>大乐之极，易而希声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176615_comment'></div>简易者，先王建礼乐之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176615_comment'></div>世之所重，圣人之所轻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176615_comment'></div>世之所乐，圣人之所悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176615_comment'></div>非圣人之情与世人相反，圣人内求，世人外求，内求者乐得其性，外求者乐得其欲，欲易发而性难知，此情性之所以正反也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176615_comment'></div>衣食所以养人之形气，礼乐所以养人之性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176615_comment'></div>礼反其所自始，乐反其所自生，吾于礼乐见圣人所贵其生者至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176615_comment'></div>世俗之言曰：「养生非君子之事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176615_comment'></div>是未知先王建礼乐之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176615_comment'></div>养生以为仁，保气以为义，去情却欲以尽天下之性，修神致明以趋圣人之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176615_comment'></div>圣人之言，莫大颜渊之问，非礼勿视，非礼勿听，非礼勿言，非礼勿动，则仁之道亦不远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176615_comment'></div>耳非取人而后聪，目非取人而后视，口非取诸人而后言也，身非取诸人而后动也，其守至约，其取至近，有心有形者皆有之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176615_comment'></div>然而颜子且犹病之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176615_comment'></div>盖人之道莫大于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176615_comment'></div>非礼勿听，非谓掩耳而避之，天下之物不足以干吾之聪也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176615_comment'></div>非礼勿视，非谓掩目而避之，天下之物不足以乱吾之明也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176615_comment'></div>非礼勿言，非谓止口而无言也，天下之物不足以易吾之辞也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176615_comment'></div>非礼勿动，非谓止其躬而不动，天下之物不足以干吾之气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176615_comment'></div>天下之物岂特形骸自为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176615_comment'></div>其所由来盖微矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176615_comment'></div>不听之时，有先聪焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176615_comment'></div>不视之时，有先明焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176615_comment'></div>不言之时，有先言焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176615_comment'></div>不动之时，有先动焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176615_comment'></div>圣人之门，惟颜子可以当斯语矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176615_comment'></div>是故非耳以为聪，而不知所以聪者，不足以尽天下之听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176615_comment'></div>非目以为明，而不知所以明者，不足以尽天下之视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176615_comment'></div>聪明者，耳目之所能为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176615_comment'></div>而所以聪明者，非耳目之所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176615_comment'></div>是故待钟鼓而后乐者，非深于乐者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176615_comment'></div>待玉帛而后恭者，非深于礼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176615_comment'></div>蒉桴土鼓，而乐之道备矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176615_comment'></div>燔黍捭豚，污尊抔饮，礼既备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176615_comment'></div>然大裘无文，大辂无饰，圣人独以其事之所贵者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176615_comment'></div>所以明礼乐之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176615_comment'></div>故曰礼之近人情，非其至者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176615_comment'></div>曾子谓孟敬子：「君子之所贵乎道者三：动容貌，斯远暴慢矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176615_comment'></div>正颜色，斯近信矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176615_comment'></div>出辞气，斯远鄙倍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176615_comment'></div>笾豆之事，则有司存」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176615_comment'></div>观此言也，曾子而不知道也则可，使曾子而为知道，则道不违乎言貌辞气之间，何待于外哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176615_comment'></div>是故古之人目击而道已存，不言而意已传，不赏而人自劝，不罚而人自畏，莫不由此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176615_comment'></div>是故先王之道可以传诸言、效诸行者，皆其法度刑政，而非神明之用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176615_comment'></div>《易》曰：「神而明之，存乎其人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176615_comment'></div>默而成之，不言而信，存乎德行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176615_comment'></div>去情却欲而神明生矣，修神致明而物自成矣，是故君子之道鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176615_comment'></div>齐明其心，清明其德，则天地之间所有之物皆自至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176615_comment'></div>君子之守至约，而其至也广；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176615_comment'></div>其取至近，而其应也远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176615_comment'></div>《易》曰：「拟之而后言，议之而后动，拟议以成其变化」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176615_comment'></div>变化之应，天人之极致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176615_comment'></div>是以《书》言天人之道，莫大于《洪范》，《洪范》之言天人之道，莫大于貌、言、视、听、思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176615_comment'></div>大哉，圣人独见之理，传心之言乎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1176615", 1176615, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>储精</span>晦息而通神明！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176615_comment'></div>君子之所不至者三：不失色于人，不失口于人，不失足于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176615_comment'></div>不失色者，容貌精也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176615_comment'></div>不失口者，语默精也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176615_comment'></div>不失足者，行止精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176615_comment'></div>君子之道也，语其大则天地不足容也，语其小则不见秋毫之末，语其强则天下莫能敌也，语其约则不能致传记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176615_comment'></div>圣人之遗言曰：「大礼与天地同节，大乐与天地同和」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176615_comment'></div>盖言性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176615_comment'></div>大礼性之中，大乐性之和，中和之情通乎神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176615_comment'></div>故圣人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1176615", 1176615, "Clauses/230/Comments/0")'>储精</span>九重而仪凤凰，修五事而关阴阳，是天地位而三光明，四时行而万物和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176615_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「鹤鸣于九皋，声闻于天」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176615_comment'></div>故孟子曰：「我善养吾浩然之气，充塞乎天地之间」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176615_comment'></div>扬子曰：「貌、言、视、听、思，性所有，潜天而天，潜地而地也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176615_comment'></div>呜呼，礼乐之意不传久矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176615_comment'></div>天下之言养生修性者，归于浮屠、老子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176615_comment'></div>浮屠、老子之说行，而天下为礼乐者独以顺流俗而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176615_comment'></div>夫使天下之人驱礼乐之文以顺流俗为事，欲成治其国家者，此梁晋之所以取败之祸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176615_comment'></div>然而世非知之也者，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176615_comment'></div>特礼乐之意大而难知，老子之言近而易晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176615_comment'></div>圣人之道得诸己，从容人事之间而不离其类焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176615_comment'></div>浮屠直空虚穷苦，绝山林之间，然后足以善其身而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176615_comment'></div>由是观之，圣人之与释老，其远近难易可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176615_comment'></div>是故赏与古人同而劝不同，罚与古人同而威不同，仁与古人同而爱不同，智与古人同而识不同，言与古人同而信不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1176615_comment'></div>同者道也，不同者心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1176615_comment'></div>《易》曰：「茍非其人，道不虚行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1176615_comment'></div>昔宓子贱为单父宰，而单父之人化焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1176615_comment'></div>今王公大人有尧、舜、伊尹之势而无子贱一邑之功者，得非学术素浅而道未明欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1176615_comment'></div>夫天下之人非不勇为圣人之道，为圣人之道者，时务速售诸人以为进取之阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1176615_comment'></div>今夫进取之道，譬诸钩索物耳，幸而多得其数，则行为王公大人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1176615_comment'></div>若不幸而少得其数，则裂逢掖之衣为商贾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1176615_comment'></div>由是观之，王公大人同商贾之得志者也，此之谓学术浅而道不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1176615_comment'></div>由此观之，得志而居人之上，复治圣人之道而不舍焉，几人矣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1176615_comment'></div>内而好爱之容蛊其欲，外有便嬖之谀骄其志，向之所能者日已忘矣，今之所好者日已至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1176615_comment'></div>孔子曰：「有颜回者，好学，不迁怒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1176615", 1176615, "Clauses/304/Comments/1")'>不贰过</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1176615_comment'></div>又曰：「吾见其进，未见其止也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1176615_comment'></div>夫颜子之所学者，非世人之所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1176615_comment'></div>不迁怒者，求诸己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1176615_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1176615", 1176615, "Clauses/312/Comments/0")'>不贰过</span>者，见不善之端而止之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1176615_comment'></div>世之人所谓退，颜子之所谓进也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1176615_comment'></div>人之所谓益，颜子之所谓损也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1176615_comment'></div>《易》曰：「损，先难而后获」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1176615_comment'></div>颜子之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1176615_comment'></div>耳损于声，目损于色，口损于言，身损于动，非先难欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1176615_comment'></div>及其至也，耳无不闻，目无不见，言无不信，动无不服，非后得欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1176615_comment'></div>是故君子之学，始如愚人焉，如童蒙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1176615_comment'></div>及其至也，天地不足大，人物不足多，鬼神不足为隐，诸子之支离不足惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1176615_comment'></div>是故天至高也，日月星辰阴阳之气可端策而数也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1176615_comment'></div>地至大也，山川丘陵万物之形、人之常产可指籍而定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1176615_comment'></div>是故星历之数、天地之法、人物之所，皆前世致精好学圣人者之所建也，后世之人守其成法，而安能知其始焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1176615_comment'></div>传曰：「百工之事，皆圣人作」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1176615_comment'></div>此之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1176615_comment'></div>故古之人言道者，莫先于天地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1176615_comment'></div>言天地者，莫先乎身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1176615_comment'></div>言身者，莫先乎性；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1176615_comment'></div>言性者，莫先乎精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1176615_comment'></div>精者，天之所以高，地之所以厚，圣人所以配之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1176615_comment'></div>故御，人莫不尽能，而造父独得之，非车马不同，造父精之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1176615_comment'></div>射，人莫不尽能，而羿独得之，非弓矢之不同，羿精之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1176615_comment'></div>今之人与古之人一也，然而用之则二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1176615_comment'></div>造父用之以为御，羿用之以为射，盗蹠用之以为贼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_133_1176615_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　撰文。作品：《致一论》<div id='poem_1176617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>致一论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176617")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176617'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176617'>万物莫不有至理焉，能精其理则圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176617_comment'></div>精其理之道，在乎致其一而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176617_comment'></div>致其一，则天下之物可以不思而得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176617_comment'></div>《易》曰「一致而百虑」，言百虑之归乎一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176617_comment'></div>茍能致一以精天下之理，则可以入神矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176617_comment'></div>既入于神，则道之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176617_comment'></div>夫如是，则无思无为寂然不动之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176617_comment'></div>虽然，天下之事固有可思可为者，则岂可以不通其故哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176617_comment'></div>此圣人之所以又贵乎能致用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176617_comment'></div>致用之效，始见乎安身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176617_comment'></div>盖天下之物，莫亲乎吾之身，能利其用以安吾之身，则无所往而不济也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176617_comment'></div>无所往而不济，则德其有不崇哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176617_comment'></div>故《易》曰「精义入神以致用，利用安身以崇德」，此道之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176617_comment'></div>孔子既已语道之序矣，患乎学者之未明也，于是又取于爻以喻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176617_comment'></div>非其所困而困，非其所据而据，不耻不仁，不畏不义，以小善为无益，以小恶为无伤，凡此皆非所以安身、崇德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176617_comment'></div>茍欲安其身、崇其德，莫若藏器于身，待时而后动也，故君子举是两端以明夫安身、崇德之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176617_comment'></div>盖身之安不安、德之崇不崇，莫不由此两端而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176617_comment'></div>身既安、德既崇，则可以致用于天下之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176617_comment'></div>致用于天下者，莫善乎治不忘乱，安不忘危；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176617_comment'></div>莫不善乎德薄而位尊，智小而谋大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176617_comment'></div>孔子之举此两端，又以明夫致用之道也，盖用有利不利者，亦莫不由此两端而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176617_comment'></div>夫身安德崇而又能致用于天下，则其事业可谓备也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176617_comment'></div>事业备而神有未穷者，则又当学以穷神焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176617_comment'></div>能穷神，则知微知彰，知柔知刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176617_comment'></div>夫于微彰刚柔之际皆有以知之，则道何以复加哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176617_comment'></div>圣人之道，至于是而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176617_comment'></div>且以颜子之贤而未足以及之，则岂非道之至乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176617_comment'></div>圣人之学至于此，则其视天下之理皆致乎一矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176617_comment'></div>天下之理皆致乎一，则莫能以惑其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176617_comment'></div>故孔子取《损》之辞以明致一之道曰：「三人行则损一人，一人行则得其友也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176617_comment'></div>夫危以动、惧以语者，岂有他哉，不能致一以精天下之理故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176617_comment'></div>故孔子举《益》之辞以戒曰：「立心勿恒，凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176617_comment'></div>勿恒者，盖不一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176617_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176617_comment'></div>语道之序，则先精义而后崇德，及喻人以修之之道，则先崇德而后精义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176617_comment'></div>盖道之序则自精而至粗，学之之道则自粗而至精，此不易之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176617_comment'></div>夫不能精天下之义，则不能入神矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176617_comment'></div>不能入神，则天下之义亦不可得而精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176617_comment'></div>犹之人身之于崇德也，身不安则不能崇德矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176617_comment'></div>不能崇德，则身岂能安乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176617_comment'></div>凡此宜若一，而必两言之者，语其序而已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1176617_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　岁初，酬王晳《即事书怀》。作品：《用王微之韵和酬即事书怀》<div id='poem_70351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>用王微之韵和酬即事书怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70351")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70351'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70351'>秦惜逝者耋，晋嘉良士<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70351'>古人皆好乐，哀此岁月遒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70351'>嗟我抱愁毒，残年自羁囚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70351'>但为兔得蹄，非复天上鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70351'>虽知林塘美，欲往辄回辀。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70351'>名园一散策，笑语随觥筹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70351'>探题绕梅花，高咏接应刘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70351'>宿雨洗荒堑，寒蛟沈老湫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70351'>沿洄信画舸，归路子城幽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70351'>冬风不改绿，忽见新阳浮。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70351'>欢事去如梦，嘉时念难留。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70351'>明发得君句，谓将续前游。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70351'>语我饮倡乐，不如诗献酬。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70351'>淮洲奏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>钟鼛，雅刺德不犹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70351'>文墨有真趣，荒淫何足收。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70351'>来篇信时<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作若淑）</span>女，窈窕众所求。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70351_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70351'>兹理傥可谐<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作诣）</span>，华簪为君抽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1176848_comment'></div>貌则侔年，心颓如翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176848_comment'></div>俛仰悲欢，超然一世。<div class='inline' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176848", 1176848, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>涕洟</span>，举屋惊呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176848_comment'></div>行与世乖，惟君缱绻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176848_comment'></div>吊祸问疾，书犹在眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176848_comment'></div>序铭于石，以报德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176848_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176848", 1176848, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>设辞</span>虽褊，义不愧心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176848_comment'></div>君实爱我，祭其知歆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176848_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176848_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书屯田员外郎周君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176790")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176790'>君周姓，讳涛，字几道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176790_comment'></div>中庆历六年进士甲科，历亳州观察推官，抚州军事推官，著作佐郎，秘书丞，太常博士，尚书屯田员外郎，知汝州梁、杭州钱唐二县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176790_comment'></div>内行敏能，为政壹自急饬，视民疾如在己，不肯释事实为名声要利，所在民爱誉甚于士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176790_comment'></div>治平三年六月在京师，授签书梓州判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176790_comment'></div>七月十三日以官卒，年四十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176790_comment'></div>曾祖讳述，故郫人，皇秘书丞，赠工部侍郎，始占海陵以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176790_comment'></div>祖讳嘉正，皇刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176790_comment'></div>父讳彦先，终右侍禁，赠右监门卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176790_comment'></div>妻曰昭德县君钱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176790_comment'></div>子男五人：𥞜、穜、秩、穆、稌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176790_comment'></div>以其年十月十六日，葬君扬州江都县同轨南乡东武里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176790_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176790'>于势与声，蹲循弗争，无忌其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176790_comment'></div>于善与耻，操终如始，有哀其死。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　作诗酬王晳。作品：《酬王微之》<div id='poem_69672' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69672' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_4_70651'>茫然冬更秋，一笑非愿始。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70651'>篮舆杨柳下，明月芙蕖水。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送子思兄参惠州军</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_2_70620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70620'>笙箫震河汉，锦绣烂冠帻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70620'>孤岸镇颓波，俗流未易识。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70620'>我方文葆中，旋逐旌旗迹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70620'>去思今岂忘，耳目熟遗迹。<div id='poem_sentence_24_70620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年10月</a>　十月，刘洙至江宁为父求铭，为撰墓志铭。作品：《荆湖北路转运判官尚书屯田郎中刘君墓志铭并序》<div id='poem_1176795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荆湖北路转运判官尚书屯田郎中刘君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　治平三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176795")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176795'>治平元年五月六日，荆湖北路转运判官、尚书屯田郎中刘君，年五十四，以官卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176795_comment'></div>三年，卜十月某日，葬真州扬子县蜀冈，而子洙以武宁章望之状来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176795_comment'></div>噫，余故人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176795_comment'></div>为序而铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176795_comment'></div>序曰：君讳牧，字先之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176795_comment'></div>其先杭州临安县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176795_comment'></div>君曾大父讳彦琛，为吴越王将，有功，刺衢州，葬西安，于是刘氏又为西安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176795_comment'></div>当太宗时，尝求诸有功于吴越者录其后，而君大父讳仁祚，辞以疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176795_comment'></div>及君父讳知礼，又不仕，而乡人称为君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176795_comment'></div>后以君故，赠官至尚书职方郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176795_comment'></div>君少则明敏，年十六，求举进士，不中，曰：「有司岂枉我哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176795_comment'></div>乃多买书，闭户治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176795_comment'></div>及再举，遂为举首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176795_comment'></div>起家饶州军事推官，与州将争公事，为所挤，几不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176795_comment'></div>及后将范文正公至，君大喜曰：「此吾师也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176795_comment'></div>遂以为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176795_comment'></div>文正公亦数称君，勉以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176795_comment'></div>君论议仁恕，急人之穷，于财物无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176795", 1176795, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>顾计</span>，凡以慕文正公故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176795_comment'></div>弋阳富人为客所诬，将抵死，君得实以告，文正公未甚信，然以君故，使吏杂治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176795_comment'></div>居数日，富人得不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176795_comment'></div>文正公由此愈知君，任以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176795_comment'></div>岁终，将举京官，君以让其同官有亲而老者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176795_comment'></div>文正公为叹息许之，曰：「吾不可以不成君之善」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176795_comment'></div>及文正公安抚河东，乃始举君可治剧，于是君为兖州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176795_comment'></div>又学《春秋》于孙复，与石介为友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176795_comment'></div>州旱蝗，奏便宜十馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176795_comment'></div>其一事，请通登、莱盐商，至今以为赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176795_comment'></div>改大理寺丞，知大名府馆陶县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176795_comment'></div>中贵人随契丹使，往来多扰县，君视遇有理，人吏以无所苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176795_comment'></div>先是多盗，君用其党<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176795", 1176795, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>推逐</span>，有发辄得，后遂无为盗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176795_comment'></div>诏集强壮，刺其手为义勇，多惶怖，不知所为，欲走，君谕以诏意，为言利害，皆就刺，欣然曰：「刘君不吾欺也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176795_comment'></div>留守称其能，虽府事往往咨君计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176795_comment'></div>用举者通判广信军，以亲老不行，通判建州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176795_comment'></div>当是时，今河阳宰相富公以枢密副使使河北，奏君掌机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176795_comment'></div>保州兵士为乱，富公请君抚视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176795_comment'></div>君自长垣乘驿至其城下，以三日，会富公罢出，君乃之建州，方并属县诸里，均其徭役，人大喜，而遭职方君丧以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176795_comment'></div>通判青州，又以母夫人丧罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176795_comment'></div>又通判庐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176795_comment'></div>朝廷弛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1176795", 1176795, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>茶榷</span>，以君使江西，议均其税，盖期年而后反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176795_comment'></div>客曰：「平生闻君敏而敢为，今濡滞若此，何故也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176795_comment'></div>君笑曰：「是固君之所能易也，而我则不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176795_comment'></div>且是役也，朝廷岂以为它，亦曰爱人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176795_comment'></div>今不深知其利害，而茍简以成之，君虽以吾为敏，而人必有不胜其弊者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176795_comment'></div>及奏事，皆听，人果便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176795_comment'></div>除广南西路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176795_comment'></div>于是修险阨，募丁壮，以减戍卒，徙仓便输，考摄官功次，绝其行赇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176795_comment'></div>居二年，凡利害无所不兴废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176795_comment'></div>乃移荆湖北路，至，踰月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176795_comment'></div>家贫无以为丧，自棺椁诸物，皆荆南士人为具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176795_comment'></div>君娶江氏，生五男二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176795_comment'></div>男曰洙、沂、汶，为进士，洙以君故，试将作监主簿，馀尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176795_comment'></div>初，君为范富二公所知，一时士大夫争誉其才，君亦慨然自以当得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176795_comment'></div>已而屯邅流落，抑没于庸人之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176795_comment'></div>几老矣，乃稍出为世用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176795_comment'></div>若将有以为也，而既死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176795_comment'></div>此爱君者所为恨惜，然士之赫赫为世所愿者可睹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176795_comment'></div>以君始终得丧相除，亦何负彼之有哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176795_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_1176795'>嗟乎刘君，宜寿而显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176795_comment'></div>何畜之久，而施之浅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176795_comment'></div>虽或止之，亦或使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176795_comment'></div>唯其有命，故止于斯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1176795_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　王洙诸子为母求铭，为撰墓志铭。作品：《高阳郡君齐氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高阳郡君齐氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176835")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176835'>夫人，故翰林侍读学士、赠开府仪同三司王公讳洙之妻，故光禄寺丞力臣、今太常寺太祝钦臣、秘书省著作佐郎陟臣、秘书省正字曾臣之继母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176835_comment'></div>齐氏好读书，能文章，有高节美行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176835_comment'></div>治平二年，年五十五，以五月初三日终于亳州其子之官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176835_comment'></div>治平三年十月初八日，祔葬于南京虞城县孟诸乡田丘里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176835_comment'></div>初，夫人自哀早孤，誓不嫁以养母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176835_comment'></div>及公失初妻，诸子幼，闻夫人贤行，求之，曰：「是必能母吾子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176835_comment'></div>于是，母兄强嫁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176835_comment'></div>及归，果能母诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176835_comment'></div>聪明而仁，恭俭以有礼，阖门欣欣，无一异言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176835_comment'></div>始封县文安，又封郡高阳，而公卒，即举家政属之子妇，斋居素服，不御酒乐，以至没齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176835_comment'></div>虽时为诗，然未尝以视人，及终，乃得五十四篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176835_comment'></div>其言高洁旷远，非近世妇人女子之所能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176835_comment'></div>又得遗令一篇，令薄葬，其言死生之故，甚有理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176835_comment'></div>齐氏，祁州蒲阴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176835_comment'></div>夫人曾祖讳某，故不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176835_comment'></div>祖讳安，故不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176835_comment'></div>考讳永清，莫州防御推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176835_comment'></div>兄恢弟恽，皆知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176835_comment'></div>公四男一女，女嫁尚书职方员外郎陈安道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176835_comment'></div>夫人既善抚诸子，而诸子亦多贤，能致孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176835_comment'></div>于葬，来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176835_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176835'>在冀中山，有孝季齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176835_comment'></div>少孤恃母，悲不忍离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176835_comment'></div>及以义行，乃终顺慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176835_comment'></div>显显王公，学问文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176835_comment'></div>族为大家，爵禄宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176835_comment'></div>来继来助，其贤则誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176835_comment'></div>铭诗幽宫，以告<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1176835", 1176835, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>齐终</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176835_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1176835", 1176835, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>齐终</span>有始，自其为子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年11月</a>　十一月，撰王逢妻墓志铭。作品：《永嘉县君陈氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176838?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永嘉县君陈氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平三年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176838")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176838_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176838'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176838'>陈氏于苏州为大姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176838_comment'></div>夫人者，太子中允讳之武之子，某官赠太常卿讳郁之孙，左赞善大夫讳质之曾孙，而太常博士王君讳逢之妻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176838_comment'></div>聪明顺善，动有礼法，以不及养舅姑也，故于祭祀尤谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176838_comment'></div>博士禄赐，尽之宗族朋友，不足，则出衣服簪珥助之而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176838_comment'></div>选饰妾御，进之不忌，然博士终无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176838_comment'></div>盖吾闻于博士者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176838_comment'></div>抚博士之兄子如己子，哭博士三年，未尝如陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176838_comment'></div>除丧大贫，显者求以为妻，族人强之，不可，又强之，则涕泣自誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176838_comment'></div>居顷，感疾以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176838_comment'></div>盖吾闻于博士之兄子景元者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176838_comment'></div>然夫人之行，非特出于二人之言，凡习陈氏、王氏者，皆知其为贤，而哀其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176838_comment'></div>其封，曰永嘉县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176838_comment'></div>其卒于苏州，以治平二年十一月九日，年三十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176838_comment'></div>其葬，以三年十一月某日，从博士于阊门之西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176838_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1176838'>谷也从于此，丧也随以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176838_comment'></div>归义与命，奚伤乎无子？</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年12月</a>　十二月，撰沈扶妻墓志铭。作品：《乐安郡君翟氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乐安郡君翟氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　治平三年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176834")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176834'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176834'>尚书主客员外郎钱塘沈君名扶之夫人翟氏者，鄂州节度推官讳希言之子，太子左清道率府率致仕讳守序之孙，利州葭萌县令讳令图之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176834_comment'></div>少则贤孝，父母称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176834_comment'></div>及嫁为妇，则舅姑称之如父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176834_comment'></div>处娣姒，能和以有礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176834_comment'></div>畜妾御，能正以有仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176834_comment'></div>闺门雍雍，上下顺治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176834_comment'></div>自皇舅尚书公以才为时用，继以主客及夫人之子，而沈氏日大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176834_comment'></div>夫人之德善亦日以显，内外亲皆悦服而归之，以谓其必大享爵禄，终于寿考，乃以治平三年九月十日卒于京师，享年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176834_comment'></div>初，主客自河北提点刑狱移知明州，而长子方领开封府事，治有异状，为上所礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176834_comment'></div>以夫人久疾，请于上，留主客京师，诏特听留，以佐三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176834_comment'></div>于是，诸名医治夫人，无所不为，然终不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176834_comment'></div>始封长安县君，进京兆、乐安二郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176834_comment'></div>生五男三女：男曰遘，翰林学士、右谏议大夫、知制诰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176834_comment'></div>曰迥，泰州军事判官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176834_comment'></div>曰辽，将作监主簿，监寿州酒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176834_comment'></div>曰遫，漳州漳浦县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176834_comment'></div>曰逌，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176834_comment'></div>女适秘书省著作佐郎颜处恭，邢州尧山县令王子韶，太常博士、监察御史里行蒋之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176834_comment'></div>翟氏，济州金乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176834_comment'></div>商州团练使守素者，当太祖时亲信任事，族人因多为武吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176834_comment'></div>而皇考独好文学，举进士中第，负材任气，不肯有所屈，以终不得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176834_comment'></div>夫人之兄严，亦知名，又早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176834_comment'></div>夫人伤其家替，每独叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176834_comment'></div>今上即位，翰林守杭州，其季舅惟康以奉献得仕，今为道州宁远县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176834_comment'></div>夫人既卒，诏以主客知苏州，十二月某日，葬夫人杭州钱塘县龙居山舅姑之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176834_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1176834'>沈侯世献，得相惟媛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176834_comment'></div>归嫔于宗，诲子而彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176834_comment'></div>相之斯何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176834_comment'></div>德则有仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176834_comment'></div>诲之斯何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176834_comment'></div>庆则有贻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176834_comment'></div>始周姓姬，后氏为翟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176834_comment'></div>于梁曰璜，实佐其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176834_comment'></div>至汉高陵，又以才称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176834_comment'></div>世降弗嗣，乃隮女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176834_comment'></div>许公之妻，公武之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176834_comment'></div>昭于铭诗，无盛与夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176834_comment'></div>彼暴而兴，亦遄其沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176834_comment'></div>我以吾仁，其昌孰御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176834", 1176834, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>梴梴</span>中丘，万木如茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176834_comment'></div>往从舅姑，协我初龟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1176834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　子雱入京赴省试，于京觅宅。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　岁末，作诗送熊本。作品：《送熊伯通》<div id='poem_70112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送熊伯通</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70112")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70112'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70112'>岁暮欣逢盖共倾，川涂南北岂忘情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70112'>事经官<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作宦）</span>路心应折<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙舒本作达）</span>，地入家山眼更明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70112'>江上月华空自照，梅边春意<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作信）</span>恰相迎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70112'>关河不锁真消息，野客犹能听治声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70112'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　是年，吴瑛致仕，作诗寄之。作品：《寄致政吴虞部》<div id='poem_70178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄致政吴虞部</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70178")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70178'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70178'>白鸥生意在沧波，不为风尘有网罗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70178'>年抵<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作祗）</span>冯唐初未半，才方疏广岂能多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70178'>孤清楚国知谁继，遗爱郴人想共歌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70178'>嗟我欲归真未晚，雪舟乘兴会相过。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70178'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　是年，高师雄卒，作文祭之。作品：《祭高师雄主簿文》<div id='poem_1176857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭高师雄主簿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176857")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176857'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176857'>我始寄此，与君往还，于时康定、庆历之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176857_comment'></div>爱我勤我，急我所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176857_comment'></div>日月一世，疾于跳丸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176857_comment'></div>南北几时，相见悲欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176857_comment'></div>去岁忧除，追寻陈迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176857_comment'></div>淮水之上，冶城之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176857_comment'></div>握手笑语，有如一昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176857_comment'></div>屈指数日，待君归舲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176857_comment'></div>安知弥年，乃见哭庭！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176857_comment'></div>维君家行，可谓修饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176857_comment'></div>如其智能，亦岂多得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176857_comment'></div>垂老一命，终于远域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176857_comment'></div>岂唯故人，所为叹惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176857_comment'></div>抚棺一奠，以告心恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176857_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176857_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　是年，撰李宽墓志铭。作品：《广西转运使李君墓志铭并序》<div id='poem_1176796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176796?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广西转运使李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176796")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176796_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176796'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176796'>君讳宽，字伯强，姓李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176796_comment'></div>其先陇西人，后移光山，至君六世祖又移建安，今为南昌人者，以君大皇考为鼻祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176796_comment'></div>君皇考讳某，以太子洗马致仕，终尚书虞部郎中，其赠官至卫尉卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176796_comment'></div>大皇考讳某，以殿中丞致仕，其赠官至吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176796_comment'></div>曾大皇考讳某，当五代之乱，无爵禄，以尚书故，赠大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176796_comment'></div>君始以世父荫守将作监主簿，监洪州盐院，用岁课倍，得知袁州宜春县，改知福州福清县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176796_comment'></div>当是时，能闻朝廷矣，就除通判桂州，又通判江州，二州皆治，遂知吉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176796_comment'></div>请于天子，立学以教，学者常三百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176796_comment'></div>施方略，捕盗贼，无众寡远近必得，以至米盐酒搉，皆为除弊致利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176796_comment'></div>移衡州，不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176796_comment'></div>改江州，州人曰：「是尝涖我矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176796_comment'></div>不待至而服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176796_comment'></div>未几，移润州，不赴，改信州，又不赴，改太平州，转运使言饶大剧，州将不能治，而太平不足用君，乃换饶州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176796_comment'></div>属县恶吏闻且至，有弃其官而去，至则禁巫医之罔民，案畜蛊者，遂以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176796_comment'></div>安抚使言治行，于江南为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176796_comment'></div>母夫人终，去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176796_comment'></div>三年知虔州，将行，三司请君制置粮草河北，一岁减缗钱八十七万，由此提点江、浙等路铸钱坑冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176796_comment'></div>以卫尉老，奏徙治所南昌，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176796_comment'></div>移提点荆湖北刑狱，辞不往，又请便官以养，乃改江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176796_comment'></div>居一月，遭卫尉丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176796_comment'></div>服除久之，尚不忍去墓所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176796_comment'></div>诏就起君提点江东刑狱，又移京西，除广西转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176796_comment'></div>自侬智高反，宿军邕州，岁漕不足，乃多治船，设赏罚，而邕军食以有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176796_comment'></div>所部摄官以三十四员为额，待摄常数十百人，一员阙，皆争赇吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176796_comment'></div>君第其课为三等，有阙以次补，摄官不赇吏由此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176796_comment'></div>二广使者故不以春夏出，会有诏阅边卒，君即出，道遇瘴，归卒，年六十，治平二年九月二十三日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176796_comment'></div>初，李氏既居江南，尚书未老，致其事归养，其子侍郎以分司归，亦未老，当侍郎之归，卫尉又以从其兄弗仕，仍世德义，为南人所慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176796_comment'></div>君既生有美质，而积习名教，自为儿童侍卫尉侧，不惰终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176796_comment'></div>及壮砥砺，以材能自显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176796_comment'></div>其于吏治精壮果敏，机张键闭，奸不可知，目所指取，必得其情状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176796_comment'></div>故所在豪人猾吏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176796", 1176796, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>重手累足</span>，以终君去，不敢有所触。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176796_comment'></div>君视遇其属士大夫贤者尤谨，所拔举过百人，后多知名云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176796_comment'></div>夫人胡氏，仁和县君，子男五人：长曰承勉，宣州旌德县令，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176796_comment'></div>次曰亚夫，太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176796_comment'></div>曰献夫，试将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176796_comment'></div>曰渭夫，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176796_comment'></div>曰太平奴，方晬而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176796_comment'></div>女二人：长适苏州常熟县主簿余公弼，次适大理寺丞田真卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176796_comment'></div>孙男三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176796_comment'></div>君与弟尚书司门郎中定相友爱尤笃，遗奏以司门之子简夫闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176796_comment'></div>诏除司门知太平州，补简夫郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176796_comment'></div>又诏君丧所过州发卒护送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176796_comment'></div>以明年二月归嫔于洪州，某月某日葬新建县桃花乡曹山，去先墓五里，君所自为寿藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176796_comment'></div>君积散官至朝奉郎，职事官至尚书金部郎中，勋至护军，赐服佩至三品，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1176796'>李姓章浦，自君考祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176796_comment'></div>弃闽徂迁，望此荆楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176796_comment'></div>君于治人，无有党雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176796_comment'></div>部我千里，如农一丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176796_comment'></div>薅奸锄彊，以殖善柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176796_comment'></div>均之利泽，深莳平扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176796_comment'></div>乃登禄实，尚馈春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176796_comment'></div>君能孝祀，君则多子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176796_comment'></div>有来无穷，其视章水。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1176796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　是年，王令《孟子讲义》行世，跋之。作品：《题王逢原讲孟子后》<div id='poem_1176586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题王逢原讲孟子后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176586")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176586'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176586'>逢原在常江阴时，学者有问以《孟子》，而逢原为之论说，是以如是其详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176586_comment'></div>未几而逢原卒，故其书才终于一篇，而考之时不同，盖其志犹未就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176586_comment'></div>虽然，观其说，亦足以概见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176586_comment'></div>若逢原，所谓见其进未见其止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176586_comment'></div>其卒时年二十八，呜呼惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176586_comment'></div>逢原卒于嘉祐己亥六月，后七年讲义方行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1176586_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　居江宁，精研《诗经》，撰《周南诗次解》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　居江宁，精研《诗经》，撰《国风解》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　遗书方惟深，誊其诗精诣警绝。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　以张洞寄诗，以诗酬之。作品：《和张仲通见寄三绝句》《和张仲通忆钟陵二首》<div id='poem_69290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69290' id='poem_sentence_2_69290_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69288?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69288'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69288'>收拾乾坤付一壶，世间无物直锱铢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69288'>醉乡旧业抛来久，更欲因君稍问涂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69288'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69288_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69289?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69289'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69289'>攲枕狂歌击唾壶，直将轩冕等锱铢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69289'>醉乡岐路君知否，不似人间足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69289", 69289, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>畏涂</span>。<div "poem_title_69388")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69388_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69388'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69388'>一梦章江已十年，故人重见想皤然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69388'>祇应两岸当时柳，能到春来尚可怜。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李资深书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176313")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176313'>某启：辱书勤勤，教我以义命之说，此乃足下忠爱于故旧，不忍捐弃，而欲诱之以善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176313_comment'></div>不敢忘，不敢忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176313_comment'></div>虽然，天下之变故多矣，而古之君子，辞受取舍之方不一，彼皆内得于己，有以待物，而非有待乎物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176313_comment'></div>非有待乎物，故其迹时若有疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176313_comment'></div>有以待物，故其心未尝有悔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176313_comment'></div>若是者，岂以夫世之毁誉者概其心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176313_comment'></div>若某者，不足以望此，然私有志焉，顾非与足下久相从而熟讲之，不足以尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176313_comment'></div>多病无聊，未知何时得复晤晤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176313_comment'></div>书不能一一，千万自爱！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　撰《策问》。十一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　时君卿数称道于颍王前。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　有书答徐贤良。作品：《与徐贤良书》<div id='poem_1176413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176413")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176413_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176413", 1176413, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>无状</span>，远赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176413", 1176413, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>手教</span>，先加抚慰，重以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176413", 1176413, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>愧恻</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176413_comment'></div>从是北征，计在旬月，过润去此甚近，以几筵之故，无由一至京口奉候，瞻向之情，可以意知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176413_comment'></div>自别后不复治《礼》，亦时时体中疾病，诸非面见，何可言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176413_comment'></div>千万自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176413_comment'></div>数以书见及，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176413_comment'></div>尊兄支福，不及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176413", 1176413, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>别削</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176413_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年1月8日</a>　此日，英宗崩。作挽词。作品：《英宗皇帝挽词二首》<div id='poem_70012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70012' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_2_70011'>羽卫悲哀送，山陵指顾成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70011'>讴歌归圣子，世孝在持盈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70011'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70011_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　何正臣至江宁为岳父求铭，为撰墓志铭，并有诗送之。作品：《尚书祠部郎中集贤殿修撰萧君墓志铭》《雨未止正臣欲行以诗留之》《送何正臣主簿》<div id='poem_1176763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书祠部郎中集贤殿修撰萧君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176763")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176763'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176763'>区希范诛，广西困于兵，诏以尚书屯田员外郎萧君知桂州，兼广西都巡检、提举兵甲溪峒事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176763_comment'></div>至则因其故俗，治以宽大，广西遂安，而君以材选为荆湖南路提点刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176763_comment'></div>未几，以君之信于南方也，又以君为广西水陆计度转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176763_comment'></div>方是时，侬智高蒐兵，诱聚中国亡命，阴以其众窥边境，而边吏士尚皆不寤，君独忧此，以谓必为南方之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176763_comment'></div>乃选遣才辩吏，说智高内属，上书言状，请因以一官抚之，使抗交趾，且可以纾患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176763_comment'></div>书下枢密，枢密以智高故属交趾，纳之生事，以诏问君，能保交趾不争智高，智高终无为寇，则具以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176763_comment'></div>君曰：「蛮夷视利则动，必保其往，非臣之所能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176763_comment'></div>顾今中国势未可以有事于蛮夷，则如智高者抚之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176763_comment'></div>且智高才武强力，非交趾所能争而畜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176763_comment'></div>就其能事，则蛮夷方自相攻，吾乃所以閒而无事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176763_comment'></div>争议至五六，而枢密遂绌君言不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176763_comment'></div>君又奏请择将吏、缮兵械、修城郭以待变，亦至五六，又皆不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176763_comment'></div>而君以召归，智高果反邕州，杀其守将，出入广东、西十有一州，所至残破，吏士多走死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176763_comment'></div>枢密乃更归责于君，以知吉州，一时士大夫纷纷欲为君讼，君遂绝口无所道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176763_comment'></div>世以此称君长者，又因知君智谋果可以任边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176763_comment'></div>居顷之，遂复以为广东转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176763_comment'></div>又以直昭文馆知桂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176763_comment'></div>当是时，侬宗旦聚兵智高故地，无所属，邕州为之警，诸将皆议兴师，君又独持招降之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176763_comment'></div>朝廷用君议，宗旦遂释兵服，以为西头供奉官，而边无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176763_comment'></div>于是君积官至尚书刑部郎中，以集贤殿修撰再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176763_comment'></div>会蛮申绍泰反，巡检宋士尧战死，仁宗使中贵人出视，君坐士尧死降知江州，而提点刑狱因中贵人言君罪状，朝廷为置狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176763_comment'></div>而君所坐止于赎金，诸提点刑狱所言多无之，然犹夺两官以免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176763_comment'></div>稍除监抚州盐酒，辞不往，以分司南京就第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176763_comment'></div>诸公多欲荐起之者，君遂告老，即以尚书祠部郎中致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176763_comment'></div>君讳固，字干臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176763_comment'></div>初以进士选桂阳监判官、楚州团练推官，用举者二十三人，改大理寺丞，知开封府阳武、永康军青城两县，通判虔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176763_comment'></div>以方略擒盗，赐书奖谕，移知江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176763_comment'></div>所至皆有善状，推贤举善，束缚奸吏，明而不残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176763_comment'></div>于财利尤能开阖歛散，故在广东收铜盐课，皆倍前以十万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176763_comment'></div>治平三年，年六十五，以九月十七日卒于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176763_comment'></div>初娶陇西县君李氏，再娶彭城县君刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176763_comment'></div>子男二人：洵，袁州军事推官，前死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176763_comment'></div>泂，试秘书省校书郎、知鄂州嘉鱼县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176763_comment'></div>女三人，嫁江州湖口县主簿何正臣、龚州司户参军欧阳成，其季尚幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176763_comment'></div>孙男女十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176763_comment'></div>萧氏故长沙人，君曾祖讳处钧，当湖南马氏时为衡州司马，以马氏方乱，弃其官归李氏江南，不愿仕，有赐田百顷袁州之新喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176763_comment'></div>新喻后属临江军，故今为临江新喻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176763_comment'></div>祖讳绍，考讳世则，皆以儒学不仕，而考以君故赠官至光禄卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176763_comment'></div>君之疾革也，出其奏议焚之，其子孙所录传尚二百馀篇，盖其言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1176763", 1176763, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>详密</span>，多世务之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176763_comment'></div>四年九月二十二日，葬君新喻安和乡长宣里佛子冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176763_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1176763'>司马去荆，望此南国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176763_comment'></div>君贲厥趾，萧宗以殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176763_comment'></div>致功蛮方，时告厥犹，朝为弗闻，疆埸用忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176763_comment'></div>受慝不让，退安一州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176763_comment'></div>既穷而通，终以无偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176763_comment'></div>铭诗幽宫，传载永久。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1176763_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69464' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69464' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69464?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雨未止正臣欲行以诗留之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69464'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69464'>纷纷应接使人愁，与子从容喜问酬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
