ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70064")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70064'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70064'>何郎冰雪照青春，应敌皆言笔有神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70064'>鲁国儒人何独少，元君画史故应真。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70064'>百年冠盖风云会，万里山川日月新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70064'>可但诸公能品藻，会须天子擢平津。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70064'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年3月</a>　子雱进士及第，释褐授旌德尉，不赴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　屡召不赴。或以为要君，或以为自慊，或以为韩琦沮抑，不肯入朝。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年闰3月20日</a>　此日，诏知江宁府。韩维等数誉于神宗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年4月4日</a>　此日，丁宝臣卒于常州。发哭吊其孤，有文祭之。作品：《祭丁元珍学士文》<div id='poem_1176861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭丁元珍学士文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年4月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176861")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176861'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176861'>我初闭门，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176861", 1176861, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>屈首</span>书诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176861_comment'></div>一出涉世，茫无所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176861_comment'></div>援挈覆护，免于阽危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176861_comment'></div>雍培浸灌，使有华滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176861_comment'></div>微吾元珍，我始弗殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176861_comment'></div>如何弃我，陨命一昔！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176861_comment'></div>以忠出恕，以信行仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176861_comment'></div>至于白首，困厄穷屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176861_comment'></div>又从跻之，使以踬死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176861_comment'></div>岂伊人尤，天实为此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176861_comment'></div>有槃彼石，可志于丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176861_comment'></div>虽不属我，我其徂求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176861_comment'></div>请著君德，铭之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176861", 1176861, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>九幽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176861_comment'></div>以驰我哀，不在醪羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176861_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176861_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　上状辞知江宁府，乞除留台、宫观差遣。作品：《辞知江宁府状》<div id='poem_1176197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176197?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞知江宁府状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176197")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176197'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176197'>右，臣今月十九日进奏院递到敕牒，蒙恩差知江宁军府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176197_comment'></div>犬马之疢，自隔清光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176197_comment'></div>天地之恩，曲垂眷恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176197_comment'></div>以臣丘墓所在，就付兵民之权，非臣肝胆涂地所能报称万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176197_comment'></div>然臣所抱疾病，迄今无损，若辄冒恩黾勉，典领当路大藩，恐力用无以上副朝廷寄任，伏望陛下察臣如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176197_comment'></div>傥以臣逮侍先帝，未许分司，则乞除臣一留台宫观差遣，冀便将理，终获有瘳，誓当捐躯，少报圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176197_comment'></div>所有敕牒，臣未敢祗受，已送江宁府收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176197_comment'></div>谨具状奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　辞知江宁府不获，遂诣府视事，上谢表。作品：《知制诰知江宁府谢上表》<div id='poem_1176026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知制诰知江宁府谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176026")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176026'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176026'>稽违诏令，经涉岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176026_comment'></div>先帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176026", 1176026, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>登遐</span>，既不获奔驰道路；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176026_comment'></div>陛下即位，又未尝瞻望阙廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176026_comment'></div>所忧后至之刑诛，敢冀就加于官使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176026_comment'></div>虽知黾勉，尚惧颠隮<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176026_comment'></div>盖闻因任以责群材，原省以通众志，厥或抱能而可用，则虽负疾而见容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176026_comment'></div>如臣者，逮侍先朝，叨官外制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176026_comment'></div>惓惓许国，虽有愚忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176026_comment'></div>没没随人，但尸荣禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176026_comment'></div>衔哀去位，婴疢弥年，望绝宠光，分投冗散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176026_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下绍膺尊极，俯烛幽微，延之以三节之严，付之以十城之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176026_comment'></div>比缘禋祀，特有褒封，申命曲加，因邮并赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176026_comment'></div>唯是土风之美，素无犴狱之烦，久寄托于丘坟，粗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176026", 1176026, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>谙知</span>其闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176026_comment'></div>念虽闭閤，殆弗废于承流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176026_comment'></div>以比造朝，或未妨于养疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176026_comment'></div>矧恩勤之已迫，且逊避之不容，敢不少尝体力之所任，祗奉诏条而为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176026_comment'></div>冀逃大戾，仰称殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176026_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176026_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　欲辟彭卫置幕府，卫辞谢。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　陆琮知上元县，颇任之事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　殿中侍御史裹行张唐英上疏神宗，请召回侍从之列。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在南润楼题诗。作品：《南润楼》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年7月</a>　七月，胡宗愈至江宁为岳父丁宝臣求铭文，为撰墓志铭。作品：《司封员外郎秘阁校理丁君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司封员外郎秘阁校理丁君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176742")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176742'>朝奉郎、尚书司封员外郎、充秘阁校理、新差通判永州军州兼管内劝农事、上轻车都尉赐绯鱼袋晋陵丁君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176742_comment'></div>王某曰：「噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176742_comment'></div>吾僚也，方吾少时，辅我以仁义者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176742_comment'></div>乃发哭吊其孤，祭焉而许以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176742_comment'></div>越三月，君婿以状至，乃叙铭赴其葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176742_comment'></div>叙曰：君讳宝臣，字元珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176742_comment'></div>少与其兄宗臣皆以文行称乡里，号为「二丁」，景祐中，皆以进士起家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176742_comment'></div>君为峡州军事判官，与庐陵欧阳公游，相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176742_comment'></div>又为淮南节度掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176742_comment'></div>或诬富人以博，州将，贵人也，猜而专，吏莫敢议，君独力争正其狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176742_comment'></div>又为杭州观察判官，用举者兼州学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176742_comment'></div>又用举者迁太子中允，知越州剡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176742_comment'></div>盖其始至，流大姓一人，而县遂治，卒除弊兴利甚众，人至今言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176742_comment'></div>于是再迁为太常博士，移知端州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176742_comment'></div>侬智高反，攻至其治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176742_comment'></div>君出战，能有所捕斩，然卒不胜，乃与其州人皆去而避之，坐免一官，徙黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176742_comment'></div>会恩除太常丞，监湖州酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176742_comment'></div>又以大臣有解举者，迁博士，就差知越州诸暨县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176742_comment'></div>其治诸暨如剡，越人滋以君为循吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176742_comment'></div>英宗即位，以尚书屯田员外郎，编校秘阁书籍，遂为校理、同知太常礼院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176742_comment'></div>君质直自守，接上下以恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176742_comment'></div>虽贫困，未尝言利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176742_comment'></div>于朋友故旧，无所不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176742_comment'></div>故其不幸废退，则人莫不怜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176742_comment'></div>少进也，则皆为之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176742_comment'></div>居无何，御史论君尝废矣，不当复用，遂出通判永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176742_comment'></div>世皆以咎言者，谓为不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176742_comment'></div>夫驱未尝教之卒，临不可守之城，以战虎狼百倍之贼，议今之法，则独可守死尔，论古之道，则有不去以死，有去之以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176742_comment'></div>吏方操法以责士，则君之流离穷困，几至老死，尚以得罪于言者，亦其理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176742_comment'></div>君以治平三年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176742", 1176742, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>待阙</span>于常州，于是再迁尚书司封员外郎，以四年四月四日卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176742_comment'></div>有文集四十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176742_comment'></div>明年二月二十九日，葬于武进县怀德北乡郭庄之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176742_comment'></div>君曾祖讳辉，祖讳谅，皆弗仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176742_comment'></div>考讳柬之，赠尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176742_comment'></div>夫人饶氏，封晋陵县君，前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176742_comment'></div>子男隅，太庙斋郎，除、隮为进士，其季恩儿尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176742_comment'></div>女嫁秘书省著作佐郎、集贤校理同县胡宗愈，其季未嫁，嫁胡氏者亦又死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176742_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1176742'>文于辞为达，行于德为充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176742_comment'></div>道于古为可，命于今为穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176742_comment'></div>呜呼已矣！<div id='poem_sentence_2_69513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　九月，因李定新建太平州学，为撰记。作品：《太平州兴学记》<div id='poem_1176681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太平州新学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176681")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176681'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176681'>太平新学在子城东南，治平三年，司农少卿建安李侯定仲求所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176681_comment'></div>侯之为州也，宽以有制，静以有谋，故不大罚戮，而州既治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176681_comment'></div>于是大姓相劝出钱，造侯之庭，愿兴学以称侯意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176681_comment'></div>侯为相地迁之，为屋百间，为防环之，以待水患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176681_comment'></div>而为田二十顷，以食学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176681_comment'></div>自门徂堂，闳壮丽密，而所以祭养之器具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176681_comment'></div>盖往来之人，皆莫知其经始，而特见其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176681_comment'></div>既成矣，而侯罢去，州人善侯无穷也，乃来求文以识其时功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176681_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176681_comment'></div>学之不可以已也久矣，世之为吏者或不足以知此，而李侯知以为先，又能不费财伤民，而使其自劝以成之，岂不贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176681_comment'></div>然世之为士者知学矣，而或不知所以学，故余于其求文而因以告焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176681_comment'></div>盖继道莫如善，守善莫如仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176681_comment'></div>仁之施自父子始，积善而充之，以至于圣而不可知之谓神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176681_comment'></div>推仁而上之，以至于圣人之于天道，此学者之所当以为事也，昔之造书者实告之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176681_comment'></div>有闻于上，无闻于下，有见于初，无见于终，此道之所以散，百家之所以成，学者之所以讼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176681_comment'></div>学乎学，将以一天下之学者，至于无讼而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176681_comment'></div>游于斯，餔于斯，而余说之不知，则是美食逸居而已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176681_comment'></div>李侯之为是也，岂为士之美食逸居而已者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176681_comment'></div>治平四年九月四日，临川王某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176681_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月10日</a>　此日，以英宗附庙礼毕，上表慰神宗。作品：《英宗附庙礼毕慰皇帝表》<div id='poem_1176133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176133' class='poemTitle href='/Writing/1176199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举钱公辅自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176199_comment'></div>寘之禁林，必有补助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176199_comment'></div>今举自代。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1176199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　上谢表。作品：《除翰林学士谢表》<div id='poem_1176027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除翰林学士谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176027")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176027'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176027'>臣闻人臣之事主，患在不知学术，而居宠有昧冒之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176027_comment'></div>人主之畜臣，患在不察名实，而听言无恻怛之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176027_comment'></div>此有天下国家者，所以难于任使，而有道德者，亦所以难于进取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176027_comment'></div>学士职亲地要，而以讨论讽讥为官，非夫远足以知先王，近足以见当世，忠厚笃实廉耻之操足以咨诹而不疑，草创润色文章之才足以付托而无负，则在此位为无以称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176027_comment'></div>如臣不肖，涉道未优，初无荦荦过人之才，徒有区区自守之善，以至将顺建明之大体，则或疏阔浅陋而不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176027_comment'></div>加以忧伤疾病，久弃里闾，辞命之习，芜废积年，黾勉一州，已为忝冒，禁林之选，岂所堪任？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176027_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下躬圣德，承圣绪，于群臣贤不肖已知考慎，而于言也又能虚己以听之，故聪明睿知神武之实，已见于行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176027_comment'></div>日月未久，而天下翘首企踵，以望唐、虞、成周之太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176027_comment'></div>臣于此时，实被收召，所以许国，义当如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176027_comment'></div>敢不磨砺淬濯已衰之心，䌷绎温寻久废之学，上以备顾问之所及，下以供职司之所守？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176027_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176027_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月26日</a>　此日，韩琦罢相出判相州。上贺启。作品：《贺韩魏公启》<div id='poem_1176438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺韩魏公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176438")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176438'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176438'>伏审判府司徒侍中宠辞上宰，归荣故乡，兼两镇之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>节麾</span>，备三公之典策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176438_comment'></div>贵极富溢而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>亢满</span>之累，名遂身退而有褒加之崇，在于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>观瞻</span>，孰不庆羡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176438_comment'></div>伏惟某官受天间气，为世元龟，诚节表于当时，德望冠乎近代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176438_comment'></div>典司密命，总揽中权，毁誉几至于万端，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>夷险</span>常持于一意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176438_comment'></div>故四海以公之用舍，一时为国之安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176438_comment'></div>越执鸿枢，遂跻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>元辅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176438_comment'></div>以人才未用为大耻，以国本不建为深忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176438_comment'></div>言众人之所未尝，任大臣之所不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176438_comment'></div>及臻变故，果有成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176438_comment'></div>英宗以哀疚荒迷，慈圣以谦冲退托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176438_comment'></div>内揆百官之众，外当万事之微，国无危疑，人以静一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176438_comment'></div>周勃、霍光之于汉，能定策而终以致疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176438_comment'></div>姚崇、宋璟之于唐，善政理而未尝遭变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176438_comment'></div>记在旧史，号为元功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176438_comment'></div>未有独运庙堂，再安社稷，弼亮三世，敉宁四方，崛然在诸公之先，焕乎如今日之懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176438_comment'></div>若夫进退之当于义，出处之适其时，以彼相方，又为特美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176438_comment'></div>某久叨庇赖，实预甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176438_comment'></div>职在近臣，欲致尽规之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176438_comment'></div>世当大有，更怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>下比</span>之嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176438_comment'></div>用自绝于高闳，非敢忘于旧德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176438_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>逖闻</span>新命，窃仰遐风，瞻望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176438", 1176438, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>门阑</span>，不任乡往之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176438'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷七九。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷一二一，《秘笈新书》卷一，《文章类选》卷二八，《文翰类选大成》卷一四四，《奇赏斋古文汇编》卷一九七，《四续古文奇赏》卷三二，《启隽类函》卷一八，《文编》卷五一，《古俪府》卷六等。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176438_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月28日</a>　此日，宰臣欲以补御史中丞，张方平、赵抃沮之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　沈遘卒。作文祭之。作品：《祭沈文通文》<div id='poem_1176864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭沈文通文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176864")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176864'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176864'>呜呼文通，一世之英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176864_comment'></div>耀矣其光，韡矣其荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176864_comment'></div>有所不为，为无不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176864_comment'></div>有所不学，学无不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176864_comment'></div>故治行简于人主之心，名声溢于时士之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176864_comment'></div>谓且复起，谋谟左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176864_comment'></div>何与之以如此之才，而不副之以须臾之寿？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176864_comment'></div>悲伤叹息，举世皆然，岂特故人，为之流涟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176864_comment'></div>驰哀一酹，以诀终天。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　沈遘卒。为其撰墓志铭。作品：《内翰沈公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>内翰沈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176755")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176755'>公姓沈氏，讳遘，字文通，世为杭州钱塘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176755_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，皇赠兵部尚书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176755_comment'></div>祖讳某，皇赠吏部尚书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176755_comment'></div>父扶，今为尚书金部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176755_comment'></div>公初以祖荫补郊社斋郎，举进士于廷中为第一，大臣疑已仕者例不得为第一，故以为第二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176755_comment'></div>除大理评事，通判江宁府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176755_comment'></div>当是时，公年二十，人吏少公，而公所为卓越已足以动人，然世多未知公果可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176755_comment'></div>祀明堂恩，迁秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176755_comment'></div>岁满召归，除太常丞、集贤校理，判登闻鼓院、吏部南曹，权三司度支判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176755_comment'></div>又判都理欠凭由司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176755_comment'></div>于是校理八年矣，平居闭门，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176755", 1176755, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>执政</span>，非公事不辄见也，故虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176755", 1176755, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>执政</span>初亦莫知其为材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176755_comment'></div>居久之，乃始以同修居注，召试知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176755_comment'></div>及为制诰，遂以文学称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176755_comment'></div>金部君坐免归，求知越州，又移知杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176755_comment'></div>锄治奸蠹，所禁无不改，崇奖贤知，得其欢心，两州人皆画像祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176755_comment'></div>英宗即位，召还，句当三班院，兼提举兵吏司封官告院，兼判集贤院，延见劳问甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176755_comment'></div>居一月，权发遣开封府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176755_comment'></div>公初至，开封指以相告曰：「此杭州沈公也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176755_comment'></div>及摄事，人吏皆屏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176755_comment'></div>既而以知审官院，遂以龙图阁直学士权知开封府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176755_comment'></div>公旦昼视事，日中则廷无留人，出谢诸客，从容笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176755_comment'></div>客皆怪公独有馀日，而畿内翕然称治，人人如公坐视其左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176755_comment'></div>于是名实暴耀振发，贤临一时，自天子大臣皆论以为国之器，而闾巷之士奔走谈说，欢呼鼓舞，以不及为恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176755_comment'></div>会母夫人疾病，请东南一州视疾，英宗曰：「学士岂可以去朝廷也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176755_comment'></div>明日，除翰林学士、知制诰，充群牧使，兼权判吏部流内铨、判尚书礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176755_comment'></div>公虽去开封，然皆以为朝夕且大用矣，而遭母夫人丧以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176755_comment'></div>英宗闻公去，尤悼惜，特遣使者追赐黄金，而以金部君知苏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176755_comment'></div>公居丧致哀，寝食如礼，以某年某月得疾杭州之墓次，某日至苏州，而以某日卒，年四十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176755_comment'></div>三男子，六女，中男恭嗣，后公六日卒，隆嗣、延嗣与六女皆尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176755_comment'></div>夫人陆氏，封安定郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176755_comment'></div>公官右谏议大夫，散官朝散大夫，勋轻车都尉，爵长安县开国伯，食邑八百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176755_comment'></div>有文集十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176755_comment'></div>公平居不常视书，而文辞敏丽可喜，强记精识，长于议论，世所谓老师宿学无所不读、通于世务者，皆莫能屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176755_comment'></div>与人甚简，而察其能否贤不肖尤详，视遇之各尽其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176755_comment'></div>为政号为严明，而时有所纵舍，于善良贫弱抚恤之尤至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176755_comment'></div>在杭州，待使客多所阔略，而州人之贫无以葬及女子失怙恃而无以嫁者，以公使钱葬嫁之，凡数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176755_comment'></div>于其卒，知与不知，皆为之叹惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176755_comment'></div>某年某月某日，葬公杭州某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176755_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1176755'>沈公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1176755", 1176755, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>仪仪</span>，德义孔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176755_comment'></div>升自东方，其明孰夷？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176755_comment'></div>视瞻叹誉，无我敢疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176755_comment'></div>正昼而陨，呜呼可悲！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176755_comment'></div>序传有史，亦在铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1176755_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2540c61a356f49179f11a3b25dceb10a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2540c61a356f49179f11a3b25dceb10a");'><span id='2540c61a356f49179f11a3b25dceb10a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>，48岁</div><div id='2540c61a356f49179f11a3b25dceb10a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　春，将赴京，以王介寄诗相谑，作诗。作品：《松间》<div id='poem_69437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69437")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69437'>偶向松间觅旧题，野人休诵北山移。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69437'>丈夫出处非无意，猿鹤从来不自<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作自不）</span>知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69437'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　再题南涧楼，作诗。作品：《再题南涧楼》<div id='poem_69249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69249' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69249?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再题南涧楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69249")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69249'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69249'>北山云漠漠，南涧水悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69249'>去此非吾愿，临分更上楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69249'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　晁端仁来江宁为父乞铭，为其撰墓志铭。作品：《虞部郎中晁君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞部郎中晁君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176791")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176791'>尚书虞部郎中晁君，讳仲参，字考先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176791_comment'></div>以治平四年五月九日卒于通判舒州事，其子以熙宁二年正月二十九日卜济州任城县谏议乡吕村之原以葬，状君之行来乞铭，掇其语为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176791'>晁望颍川，卫有卿丙，错以术用，作汉家令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176791_comment'></div>魏晋南北，史无传人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176791_comment'></div>良正官唐，仍不大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176791_comment'></div>开封于家，徙钜野县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176791_comment'></div>辟时艰屯，出宋而显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176791_comment'></div>迥奋布衣，太子太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176791_comment'></div>宗悫秉政，父子一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176791_comment'></div>三朝四世，锡荣丘墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176791_comment'></div>佺令中书，为君曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176791_comment'></div>有子迪者，刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176791_comment'></div>乃生宗简，世德孔扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176791_comment'></div>使京东西，郎干刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176791_comment'></div>君实其嗣，少则多誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176791_comment'></div>仲父保任，主簿上虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176791_comment'></div>宰墨隳政，易君仕初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176791_comment'></div>从容调聏，史莫玩法，墨以廉终，弱伸强慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176791_comment'></div>按察扰狱，夙如我谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176791_comment'></div>君不为夺，械囚于州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176791_comment'></div>将范文正，叹爱而谓：「畏宜绳私，公勇勿畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176791_comment'></div>君愿持此，毕身无尤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176791_comment'></div>荐监越酒，旋宅父忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176791_comment'></div>判官于滁，擢丞大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176791_comment'></div>汝州郏城，来知县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176791_comment'></div>富姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176791", 1176791, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>赇吏</span>，寓田势家，役烦且窘，中户愁嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176791_comment'></div>君裒伪券，应手即辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176791_comment'></div>完蠹嘘枯，俗戒以劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176791_comment'></div>秦王诸孙，上冢入郛，卒榜驿隶，君擒而诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176791_comment'></div>将劾中人，匿车夜遁，移内侍省，罪令即讯，迄明年至，徒御无哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176791_comment'></div>能声震越，号称其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176791_comment'></div>易曹济阴，太子赞善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176791_comment'></div>督尉索盗，里闾宴衎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176791_comment'></div>马入罢牧，地租于民，厨传费剧，输之殆贫，君曰闵哉，责岂无豫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176791_comment'></div>操书镌守，多绌其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176791_comment'></div>迁官博士，去领开州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176791_comment'></div>大筑学校，率衣冠游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176791_comment'></div>温汤之盐，实不酬课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176791_comment'></div>岁蠲五万，奏自君可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176791_comment'></div>氓疾不治，谒巫代医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176791_comment'></div>教以饵药，尽投<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1176791", 1176791, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>诡祠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176791_comment'></div>失怙恃者，予其娶嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176791_comment'></div>坐堂朝晡，饮酒閒暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176791_comment'></div>英宗纂极，员外于虞，比驾二部，阅最而除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176791_comment'></div>今天子恩，始正郎位，摄舒期年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176791_comment'></div>条教逾肄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176791_comment'></div>殍来邻邦，赈使无僵，扶携饱去，又遗之种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176791_comment'></div>敦于除害，未始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1176791", 1176791, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>爱力</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176791_comment'></div>取枞阳河，避罗刹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176791_comment'></div>析池口征，合于铜陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176791_comment'></div>官不失算，舟无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1176791", 1176791, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>危行</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176791_comment'></div>人幸是为，旷数十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176791_comment'></div>趋令欢呼，无有稚艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176791_comment'></div>孤山、马当，岁漂百航。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176791_comment'></div>凿秋口浦，直走雷江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176791_comment'></div>脱险风涛，几五百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176791_comment'></div>章随驿闻，就付其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176791_comment'></div>方冬告役，君夏子徂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176791_comment'></div>寿五十五，识者叹吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176791_comment'></div>齐公孙氏，作配甚似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176791_comment'></div>封永康君，诞惟四子：端仁、端义、端礼、端智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176791_comment'></div>仁中进士，常州司理，义郊社郎，馀则未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176791_comment'></div>五女四人，归为士妻：石端、侯彦，侯归而嫠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176791_comment'></div>范、胡二婿，纯粹、僧孺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176791_comment'></div>幼处于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176791_comment'></div>君孙有五：男节、符、篯，其二则女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176791_comment'></div>惟君平生，外晦内明，忤出不意，默无与争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176791_comment'></div>禄赒族姻，恩称疏戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176791_comment'></div>庖无朝炊，笑语如昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176791_comment'></div>晚尤静旷，病不告遗，极谈性命，方绝之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176791_comment'></div>子丐埋辞，衰粗走汴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176791_comment'></div>掇其绪馀，以质幽竁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1176791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1176036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观文殿学士知江宁府谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年6月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176036'>臣某言：伏奉制命授臣观文殿学士、吏部尚书、知江宁军府事，臣已于六月十五日到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176036_comment'></div>久妨贤路，上负圣时，茍逃放殛之刑，更滥褒扬之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176036_comment'></div>逸其犬马将尽之力，宠以丘墓所寄之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176036_comment'></div>仰荷恩私，皆踰分愿<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176036_comment'></div>臣操行不足以悦众，学术不足以趣时，独知义命之安，敢望功名之会？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176036_comment'></div>值遭兴运，总领繁机，惟睿广之日跻，顾卑凡而坐困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176036_comment'></div>秋水方至，因知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176036", 1176036, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>海若</span>之难穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176036_comment'></div>大明既升，岂宜爝火之弗熄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176036_comment'></div>加以精力耗于事为之众，罪戾积于岁月之多，虽恃含垢之宽，终怀覆餗之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176036_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下志存善贷，为在曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176036_comment'></div>记其事国之微诚，闵其吁天之至恳，挠黜幽之常法，示从欲之至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176036_comment'></div>经体赞元，废任莫追于既往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176036_comment'></div>承流宣化，收功尚冀于方来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176036_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_0_1176100_comment'></div>蕞尔馀生，备叨眷抚，苶然贱息，更荷哀怜<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176100_comment'></div>臣初乏将明之材，适遭开泰之运，父子并蒙宠奖，臣邻莫与等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176100_comment'></div>去阙以来，历时未久，问劳狎至，忧轸俯加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176100_comment'></div>以察父之鸿私，施具臣之晚节。<div class='inline' /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年8月4日</a>　此日，婿吴安持罢知开封府兵曹参军。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　晤曾布，诵曾公亮柬，叹爱不已。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　金陵郡斋有作。作品：《金陵郡斋》<div id='poem_69462' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69462' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69462?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金陵郡斋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69462")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69462_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69462'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69462'>谈经投老拚悠悠，为吏文书了即休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69462'>深炷炉烟<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作香）</span>闭斋閤，卧听檐雨泻高秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69462'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69462_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年10月22日</a>　此日，以神宗差冯宗道依在外使相例赐生日礼物，上谢表。作品：《赐生日礼物谢表》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年11月11日</a>　此日，吕惠卿起郑侠狱，弟安国赴对。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年11月25日</a>　此日，南郊礼毕大赦天下。上贺表，自江宁府上进奉。作品：《贺南郊礼毕肆赦表》其一。《南郊进奉表（江宁）》<div id='poem_1176146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南郊进奉表<span class='inlineComment2'>（江宁）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年11月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176146")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176146'>臣某言：伏以郊兆宗祈，臣工显相，庆九畿之藩屏，备万物之贡输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176146_comment'></div>前件物掌于邦财，敛自民职，窃睹燎禋之盛，式修币献之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176146_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1176146_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　以南郊恩加食邑，上谢表。作品：《加食邑谢表二道》其二。<div id='poem_1176034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除平章事监修国史谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176034")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034'>臣某言：伏奉恩命特授金紫光禄大夫、行尚书礼部侍郎、同中书门下平章事、监修国史、上柱国，进封开国公，加食邑一千户、实封四百户，仍赐推忠协谋佐理功臣，寻具表陈免，蒙批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034_comment'></div>扬于大廷，宠以高位，归之翊戴之重，诿之宰制之平，圣心方慎于旁求，小己知难于上称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176034_comment'></div>臣闻人君代天而理物，人臣资父以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176034_comment'></div>然而君臣之大义有方，非若父子之至恩无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176034_comment'></div>须倡而后和，则诚意每患于难通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176034_comment'></div>不入而后量，则忠力或嫌于自献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176034_comment'></div>唯成汤之听伊尹，与傅说之遇高宗，皆以疏远而相求，何其亲厚之独至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176034_comment'></div>盖所趣非由于二道，故所为若出于一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176034_comment'></div>夫岂干越夷貉之异心，是谓元首股肱之同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176034_comment'></div>二臣既以此获展事君之义，两君亦以此得成理物之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176034_comment'></div>茍非其人，孰与于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176034_comment'></div>臣受材单寡，逢运休明，初涉猎于艺文，稍扳缘于禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176034_comment'></div>曩尘近侍，积愧空餐，悲遽隔于庭闱，分长依于丘垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176034_comment'></div>俄值纂承之庆，继叨收召之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176034_comment'></div>责以论经，尚少知于训诂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176034_comment'></div>使之与政，曾莫助于猷为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176034_comment'></div>矧以拙直而见知，遂为奸回之所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176034_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下纳之以天地之量，照之以日月之明，数加奖励之恩，每辨谗诬之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176034_comment'></div>重遭卜相，申敕备官，终逊避之无繇，更兢惭于非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176034_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下乐古训之获而忘其势，恶邪辞之害而断以心，勿贰于任贤，务本以除恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176034_comment'></div>使万邦有共惟帝臣之志，万姓有一哉王心之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176034_comment'></div>则进无求名之私，退有补过之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176034_comment'></div>臣之愿也，天实临之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176034_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　是年，寄诗张谔招张安国。作品：《寄张谔招张安国金陵法曹》<div id='poem_70170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄张谔招张安国金陵法曹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70170")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70170'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70170'>我老愿为臧丈人，君今少壮岂<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作年少未）</span>长贫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70170'>好须自致青冥上，可且相从寂寞滨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70170'>深谷黄鹂娇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>引子，曲埼翠碧巧藏身。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70170'>寻幽触静还成兴，何必区区九陌尘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70170'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_70170'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_70170_0'>⑴ 原作骄，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70170_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　是年，作诗。作品：《经局感言》<div id='poem_69442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>经局感言<span class='inlineComment2'>（罢相出守江宁，仍领经局）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69442")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69442'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69442'>自古能全已不才，岂论骐骥与驽骀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69442'>放归自<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作就）</span>食情虽适，络首犹存亦可哀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69442'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　是年，华峙来江宁相谒。称异之，授以经义。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　董必来江宁相谒。谘质诸经疑义，称许之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　是年，以上元县主簿韩宗厚大兴水利，上其状于庙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　开新河以避栾家矶数十里风水，甚为行舟之利。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　嫁女与蔡卞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年1月7日</a>　此日，弟安国追毁出身以来文字、放归田里。神宗降诏慰谕，对使者泣。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年2月2日</a>　此日，弟安上为右赞善大夫、权发遣度支判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年2月11日</a>　此日，再入相，自观文殿大学士、吏部尚书、知江宁府除依前官平章事、昭文馆大学士。是日，婿吴安持以详定行户免行法成升一任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年2月12日</a>　此日，神宗遣勾当御药院刘有方赍诏至江宁相召。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　两上表辞免，神宗批答不允。作品：《辞免除平章事昭文馆大学士表》其一。《辞免除平章事昭文馆大学士表》其二。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　上谢表。作品：《除平章事昭文馆大学士谢表》<div id='poem_1176039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除平章事昭文馆大学士谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176039")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176039'>臣某言：伏奉制命特授臣同中书门下平章事、昭文馆大学士兼译经润文使，加食邑一千户、食实封四百户，仍改赐推忠协谋同德佐理功臣，寻具表陈免，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176039_comment'></div>承流宣化，方虞失职之诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176039_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176039", 1176039, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>经体赞元</span>，更误选贤之举<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176039_comment'></div>臣窃惟人物之会通常寡，实以君臣之遇合至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176039_comment'></div>自匪同声气之求，孰能偕功名之享？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176039_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下天纵大圣，人与成能，乘百年久安之机，饬千岁积坏之蛊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176039_comment'></div>士诚服矣，而持禄养交之习未殄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176039_comment'></div>民允怀矣，而乐事劝功之志未纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176039_comment'></div>近或长阨，而仁义之泽未流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176039_comment'></div>远或虚憍，而道德之威未立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176039_comment'></div>宜选于众，举格于皇天之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176039_comment'></div>使暨乃僚，缵迪我高后之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176039_comment'></div>冀胜所任，以济斯时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176039_comment'></div>而臣蚤见知于隐约之中，久独立于倾摇之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176039_comment'></div>勋庸弗效，恩礼更加，托备外藩，俯邻期岁，遂叨诏奖，还冠宰司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176039_comment'></div>自视羁单，所怀蹇浅，方古耕筑，则有其陋，为世聘求，则无其贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176039_comment'></div>然以投老之躯，而遭难值之运，茍贪岁月，趣就涓埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176039_comment'></div>且上之施既光，则下之报宜厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176039_comment'></div>与之戮力，仰承睿知之临，罔不同心，俯赖忠良之协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176039_comment'></div>誓殚疏拙，图称休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176039_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年2月29日</a>　此日，弟安礼直集贤院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年3月1日</a>　此日，离江宁赴阙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　至瓜步望扬州，有诗忆旧。作品：《入瓜步望扬州》<div id='poem_69119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69119' class='poemTitle id='poem_title_1176045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176045'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176045'>臣某言：近具表乞以本官充使，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176045_comment'></div>愚诚屡黩，方负忧兢，圣听未移，更加奖励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176045_comment'></div>顾仰关于国体，敢终冒于天威<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176045_comment'></div>伏念臣顷污近司，久虚大受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176045_comment'></div>晚罹疾疢，自当辞禄而里居；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176045_comment'></div>尚恃眷怜，故敢祈恩而家食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176045_comment'></div>将相之为重寄，朝野之所具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176045_comment'></div>若免于事任之劳，而尸此名器之宠，在昔之茂勋明德，尚莫敢居，如臣之绵力薄材，岂宜非据？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176045_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯矜危恳，追寝误恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176045_comment'></div>岂惟私义之所安，是固物情之众允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176045_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176045_comment'></div></div></div><br id='poem_content_1176161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176161'>臣某言：伏睹今月二十七日南郊礼毕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176161_comment'></div>熙事备成，湛恩汪濊，上格三灵之祐，俯臻万物之和<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176161_comment'></div>臣闻致孝以显亲，而其仁极于配天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176161_comment'></div>隆礼以尊上，而其义尽于飨帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176161_comment'></div>迪前王之能事，考有司之盛仪，作民恭先，唯圣时克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176161_comment'></div>伏维皇帝陛下，绍膺丕绪，懋建大中，饬斋戒之诚心，称燎烟之吉礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176161_comment'></div>四表率吁，皆致宁神之欢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176161_comment'></div>多士具来，悉秉在天之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176161_comment'></div>既受釐于元祀，遂均惠于寰区，凡在观瞻，孰不呼舞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176161_comment'></div>臣夙叨睿奖，亲值休辰，虽进趋无预于相仪，而欣幸实同于赖庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176161_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　封舒国公，上谢表。作品：《封舒国公谢表》<div id='poem_1176046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封舒国公谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176046")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176046'>臣某言：伏奉制命特授开府仪同三司，封舒国公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176046_comment'></div>发号端门，外覃庆赐，疏恩列辟，俯逮空餐，舞手均欢，扪心独幸<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176046_comment'></div>伏念臣久孤眷遇，当即谴诃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176046_comment'></div>旷岁吁天，尚辞荣而未获；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176046_comment'></div>新恩赐国，仍席宠以有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176046_comment'></div>唯兹邦土之名，乃昔宦游之壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176046_comment'></div>久陶圣化，非复鲁僖之所惩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176046_comment'></div>积习仁风，乃尝朱邑之见爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176046_comment'></div>鸿私所被，朽质更荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176046_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下道冒群才，弥天之所覆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176046_comment'></div>恩涵庶品，并物之所包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176046_comment'></div>以釐事备于郊宫，而惠泽均于海宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176046_comment'></div>故虽幽屏，弗以遐遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176046_comment'></div>顾冒昧之不赀，岂糜捐之可报！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176046_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　以南郊恩加食四百户、实封一百户，上谢表。作品：《加食邑谢表二道》<div id='poem_1176034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除平章事监修国史谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176034")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034'>臣某言：伏奉恩命特授金紫光禄大夫、行尚书礼部侍郎、同中书门下平章事、监修国史、上柱国，进封开国公，加食邑一千户、实封四百户，仍赐推忠协谋佐理功臣，寻具表陈免，蒙批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176034_comment'></div>扬于大廷，宠以高位，归之翊戴之重，诿之宰制之平，圣心方慎于旁求，小己知难于上称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176034_comment'></div>臣闻人君代天而理物，人臣资父以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176034_comment'></div>然而君臣之大义有方，非若父子之至恩无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176034_comment'></div>须倡而后和，则诚意每患于难通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176034_comment'></div>不入而后量，则忠力或嫌于自献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176034_comment'></div>唯成汤之听伊尹，与傅说之遇高宗，皆以疏远而相求，何其亲厚之独至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176034_comment'></div>盖所趣非由于二道，故所为若出于一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176034_comment'></div>夫岂干越夷貉之异心，是谓元首股肱之同体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176034_comment'></div>二臣既以此获展事君之义，两君亦以此得成理物之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176034_comment'></div>茍非其人，孰与于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176034_comment'></div>臣受材单寡，逢运休明，初涉猎于艺文，稍扳缘于禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176034_comment'></div>曩尘近侍，积愧空餐，悲遽隔于庭闱，分长依于丘垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176034_comment'></div>俄值纂承之庆，继叨收召之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176034_comment'></div>责以论经，尚少知于训诂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176034_comment'></div>使之与政，曾莫助于猷为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176034_comment'></div>矧以拙直而见知，遂为奸回之所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176034_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下纳之以天地之量，照之以日月之明，数加奖励之恩，每辨谗诬之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176034_comment'></div>重遭卜相，申敕备官，终逊避之无繇，更兢惭于非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176034_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下乐古训之获而忘其势，恶邪辞之害而断以心，勿贰于任贤，务本以除恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176034_comment'></div>使万邦有共惟帝臣之志，万姓有一哉王心之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176034_comment'></div>则进无求名之私，退有补过之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176034_comment'></div>臣之愿也，天实临之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176034_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1176034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　有《封舒国公三首》。<div id='poem_69563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69563'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69563'>陈迹难寻天柱源，疏封投老误明恩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69563'>国人欲识公归处，杨柳萧萧白下门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69561'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69561_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年12月12日</a>　此日，为僧善端撰文记万宗泉。作品：《万宗泉记》<div id='poem_1176691' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176691' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_1176691_comment'></div>东为二池，池各有沟，注于南池而东南，其馀水以溉山麓之田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176691_comment'></div>既甃，善端请名，余为名其泉曰「万宗」云。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　移松万宗泉，有诗酬王濬。作品：《酬王濬贤良松泉二诗》<div id='poem_70767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　是年，刁约卒，有文祭之。作品：《祭刁景纯学士文》<div id='poem_1176862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176274_comment'></div>伏维皇帝陛下宿殖圣行，生知妙法，方册所载，象译所传，如天昭旷，靡不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176274", 1176274, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>帱察</span>，岂臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176274", 1176274, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>愚浅</span>，所敢冒闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176274_comment'></div>然方大圣以神道设教，觉悟群生之时，羽毛皮骼之物，尚能助发实相，况臣区区，尝备顾问，又承制旨，安敢蔽匿？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176274_comment'></div>谨缮录上进。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　子旁与妻庞氏不睦，为择壻而嫁之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年1月9日</a>　此日，辞使相，以本官领集禧观使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　上谢表。作品：《除依前左仆射观文殿大学士集禧观使谢表》<div id='poem_1176047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除依前左仆射观文殿大学士集禧观使谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176047'>臣某言：伏奉制命除授依前行尚书左仆射，充观文殿大学士、集禧观使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176047_comment'></div>屡黩天威，坐弥年所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176047_comment'></div>曲从危恳，仰荷至慈<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176047_comment'></div>伏念臣学止求心，行多违俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176047_comment'></div>少随官牒，徒有志于养亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176047_comment'></div>晚误圣知，欲忘身而许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176047_comment'></div>疲曳久瘝于宰事，闵凶适在于私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176047_comment'></div>中解繁机，特上烦于矜恻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176047_comment'></div>外分忧寄，复难强于支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176047_comment'></div>方累鸿私，更尸殊宠，既兢惭于非据，辄冒昧以终辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176047_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下示以优容，屡垂训奖，赦其逋慢，终赐矜全，犹加秘殿之隆名，俯慰穷阎之衰疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176047_comment'></div>地崇禄厚，尚非空食之所宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176047_comment'></div>岁晚力愆，虽欲捐躯而曷报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176047_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年闰1月24日</a>　此日，曾公亮卒。有文祭之。作品：《祭曾鲁公文》<div id='poem_1176846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭曾鲁公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年闰1月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176846")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176846'>肃肃鲁公，为时臣宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176846_comment'></div>小大具宜，济以勤恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176846_comment'></div>寔相累朝，有德有庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176846_comment'></div>帝序之爵，三公是秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176846_comment'></div>神介之祉，乃终有吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176846_comment'></div>显允嗣子，能匹公休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176846_comment'></div>赞我事枢，符帝之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176846_comment'></div>公荣在家，禄养具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176846_comment'></div>既寿且康，顺以卒齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176846_comment'></div>公则无憾，以返其真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176846_comment'></div>天子震悼，逮及国人，况如安石，辱知最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176846_comment'></div>西望涕颐，以荐食酒。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176050'>臣某言：二月二十二日，江东转运使孙圭到府，伏奉圣慈宣谕，以臣诚请甚确，志不可夺，故罢节钺，春时更宜慎爱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176050_comment'></div>囊封屡黩，特荷矜从，使传载驰，重烦慰抚<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176050_comment'></div>伏念臣久尸名宠，莫报恩私，既逃不职之诛，更窃无功之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176050_comment'></div>闭门养疾，曾未慭于朝荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176050_comment'></div>击壤歌时，顾难忘于圣力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176050_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下义惟求旧，仁不弃遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176050_comment'></div>故虽簪屦之遗，尚蒙简记；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176050_comment'></div>曾是筋骸之束，敢爱糜捐！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176050_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176050_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href='/Writing/1176700?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庐山文殊像现瑞记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年11月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176700")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176700_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176700'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176700'>番阳刘定尝登庐山，临文殊金像所没之谷，睹光明云瑞，图示临川王某，求记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176700_comment'></div>某曰：「有有以观空，空亦幻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176700_comment'></div>空空以观有，幻亦实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176700_comment'></div>幻实果有辨乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176700_comment'></div>然则如子所睹，可以记，可以无记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176700_comment'></div>记无记，果亦有辨乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176700_comment'></div>虽然，子既图之矣，余不可以无记也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176700_comment'></div>定以熙宁元年四月十日、十年九月二十七日睹，某以元丰元年十一月二十三日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176700_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70402'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70402'>鱼跳桑柳阴，鸟落蒲苇侧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70402'>已无溪姑祠，何有江令宅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70402'>故人耽田里，老脱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70402", 70402, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>尚方舄</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70402'>开亭捐百金，于此扫尘迹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70402'>地偏人罕至，心远境常寂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70402'>我行西州旋，税驾候颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70402'>相随望南山，水际因一息。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70402'>公时指岸木，谓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>此可寻尺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70402'>伐之营中沚，持用自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_70402", 70402, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>怡怿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70402'>欢言俟其成，邀我堂上食。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70402'>百忧每多违，一诺还自惕。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70402'>春风檐<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>楹新，坐久膝前席。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70402'>翛然忘故约，北郭疑有适。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70402'>长淫舒永怀，伫想对以臆。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70402'>摛辞甚有理，窃比书石鹢。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70402'>知公不欺我<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作我欺）</span>，把玩果心恻。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_70402'>嘉肴既夙设，丽藻仍虚掷。<div id='poem_sentence_16_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_70402'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_70402", 70402, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>左车</span>公自迎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_70402", 70402, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>右券</span>吾敢责。<div id='poem_sentence_17_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_70402'>闻说<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_70402", 70402, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>芼羹</span>臛，芬香出邻壁。<div id='poem_sentence_18_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_70402'>妇休机杼事，儿失刀椠职。<div id='poem_sentence_19_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_70402'>何胶胶扰扰，而纷纷籍籍。<div id='poem_sentence_20_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_70402'>携持欲一往，继此方如织。<div id='poem_sentence_21_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_70402'>元龙但高眠<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作卧）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_70402", 70402, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>司马</span>勿亲涤。<div id='poem_sentence_22_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_70402'>几能孩童旧，握手皆鬓白。<div id='poem_sentence_23_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_70402'>有兴即联𩍶<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作扳联）</span>，东阡与南陌。<div id='poem_sentence_24_70402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_70402'></div><div id='poem_content_69769'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69769'>春风<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作晚）</span>取花去，酬<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙舒本作遗）</span>我以清阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69769'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69769", 69769, id='poem_sentence_4_69769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年5月6日</a>　此日，吕嘉问勒停，过江宁。招之游东岭。作品：《与吕望之上东岭》<div id='poem_70288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕望之上东岭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年5月6日）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70288'>适野无世<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作市）</span>諠，吾今亦如此。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70288'>纷纷旧可厌，俗子今扫轨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70288'>使君气相求，眷顾未云已。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70288'>追随上东岭，俯仰多可喜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70288'>何以况清明，朝阳丽秋水。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70288'>微云会消散，岂久污尘滓。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70288'>所怀在分衿，藉草泪如洗。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年6月16日</a>　此日，陆佃除集贤校理，致谢启。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年7月14日</a>　吕嘉问妄引为证。此日，神宗诏润州制勘院华申甫供词不涉，不得取问。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　以神宗遣李舜举赴江宁赐诏书并药物，上谢表。作品：《李舜举赐诏书药物谢表》<div id='poem_1176092' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176092' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176092?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李舜举赐诏书药物谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176092")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176092_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176092'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176092'>臣某言：辍宫闱亲近之臣，临湖海宽闲之野，授之药物，抚以训辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176092_comment'></div>尸厚禄而无劳，谓当诛绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176092_comment'></div>捐大恩而不报，弥所兢惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176092_comment'></div>臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣本出羁单，自甘沦弃，晚由朴学，上误圣知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176092_comment'></div>智曾昧于保身，忠每怀于许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176092_comment'></div>谗诬甚巧，切忧解免之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176092_comment'></div>危拙更安，特荷眷怜之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176092_comment'></div>况远迹久孤之地，实迩言易间之时，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176092", 1176092, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>离明</span>昭晰于隐微，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176092", 1176092, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>解泽</span>频繁于疏逖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176092_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下以上仁含垢，以大智容愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176092_comment'></div>弗使南箕得侈簸扬之状，更令北户坐蒙临照之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176092_comment'></div>苶然垂尽之病躯，沱若横流之感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176092_comment'></div>惟困穷无俚，犹致命于一餐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176092_comment'></div>顾冒昧不赀，敢忘怀于九死！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176092_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176092_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年7月27日</a>　此日，甥婿龚原、沈铢，侄婿叶涛因虞蕃案追官、勒停、冲替等。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年7月28日</a>　此日，弟安礼兼直舍人院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　苏轼系狱，群议汹汹，遂发言求之。<br onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70004", 70004, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>三甲</span>，收拾文章有六丁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　见苏轼《表忠观碑》，赞之不已。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　多作集句诗词，浑然天成，如出诸己，后世称为“荆公体”。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　作集句，丽缛凄婉，过于创作。诗人称之，后谱入曲。作品：《胡笳十八拍》<div id='poem_70612' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70612' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70612'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70612'>中郎有女能传业，颜色如花命如叶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70612'>命如叶薄将奈何，一生抱恨常咨嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70612'>良人持戟明光里，所慕灵妃媲箫史。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70612'>空房寂寞施繐帷，弃我不待白头时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176866_comment'></div>公先我茁，我后公萎，中间仕宦，有合有离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176866_comment'></div>后我所践，公辄仍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176866_comment'></div>出则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176866", 1176866, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>交辔</span>，处则<span class='link'
