id='poem_sentence_5_1176866_comment'></div>岂愿敢及，天实我贻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176866_comment'></div>公之停蓄，及所设施，有诰有诔，亦有铭诗，又将有史，传所不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176866_comment'></div>我既惫眊，何辞能为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176866_comment'></div>婚姻之故，唯以告悲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年4月27日</a>　撰弟安国墓志。此日，葬弟安国。作品：《王平甫墓志》<div id='poem_1176743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王平甫墓志<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰三年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年4月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176743")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176743_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176743'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176743'>君临川王氏，讳安国，字平甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176743_comment'></div>赠太师、中书令讳明之曾孙，赠太师、中书令兼尚书令讳用之之孙，赠太师、中书令兼尚书令康国公讳益之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176743_comment'></div>自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176743", 1176743, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>丱角</span>未尝从人受学，操笔为戏，文皆成理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176743_comment'></div>年十二，出其所为铭、诗、赋、论数十篇，观者惊焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176743_comment'></div>自是遂以文学为一时贤士大夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176743", 1176743, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>誉叹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176743_comment'></div>盖于书无所不该，于词无所不工，然数举进士不售，举茂材异等，有司考其所献《序言》第一，又以母丧不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176743_comment'></div>君孝友，养母尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176743_comment'></div>丧三年，常在墓侧，出血和墨，书佛经甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176743_comment'></div>州上其行义，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176743_comment'></div>今上即位，近臣共荐君材行卓越，宜特见招选，为缮书其《序言》以献，大臣亦多称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176743_comment'></div>手诏褒异，召试，赐进士及第，除武昌军节度推官，教授西京国子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176743_comment'></div>未几，校书崇文院，特改著作佐郎、秘阁校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176743_comment'></div>士皆以谓君且显矣，然卒不偶，官止于大理寺丞，年止于四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176743_comment'></div>以熙宁七年八月十七日不起，越元丰三年四月二十七日，葬江宁府钟山母楚国太夫人墓左百有十六步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176743_comment'></div>有文集六十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176743_comment'></div>妻曾氏，子旊、斿，女婿叶涛，处者四女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176743_comment'></div>涛有学行，知名，旊、斿亦皆嶷嶷有立，君祉所施，庶在于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年8月16日</a>　此日，应曾巩请，撰记。作品：《重建许旌阳祠记》<div id='poem_1176702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176702' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176702?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重建许旌阳祠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年8月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176702")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176702_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176702'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176702'>自古名德之士，不得行其道以济斯世，则将效其智以泽当时，非所以内交要誉也，亦曰士而独善其身，不得以谓之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176702_comment'></div>后世之士，失其所业，糜烂于章句训传之末而号为颖拔者，不过利其艺以干时射利而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176702_comment'></div>故道日丧而智日卑，于是有不昧其灵者每厌薄焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176702_comment'></div>非士之所谓道者，名不副其实也，亦以所尚者非道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176702_comment'></div>呜呼，其来久矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176702_comment'></div>晋有百里之长曰许氏，尝为旌阳令，有惠及于邑之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176702_comment'></div>其为术也，不免乎后世方技之习，如植竹水中，令疫病者酌水饮焉而病者旋愈，此固其精诚之所致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176702_comment'></div>而藏金于圃，使囚者出力而得之，因偿负，而或免于桎梏，岂尽出方技之所为者，以是德于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176702_comment'></div>既后斩蛟而免豫章之昏垫，大抵皆其所志足以及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176702_comment'></div>志之所至，智亦及焉，是则公之有功于洪，论者固自其道而观之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176702_comment'></div>夫以世降俗末之日，仕于时者得人焉如公，亦可谓晦冥之日月矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176702_comment'></div>公有功于洪，而洪祀之虔且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176702_comment'></div>祥符中，升其观为宫，而公亦进位于侯王之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176702_comment'></div>于是州吏峻其严祀之宫室与王者等，兹固侈其功而答其赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176702_comment'></div>工弗加壮，中焉以圮，今师帅南丰曾君巩慨然新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176702_comment'></div>巩儒生也，殆非好尚老氏教者，亦曰能御大菑、能捍大患则祀之，礼经然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176702_comment'></div>国家既隆其礼于公，则视其陋而加之以丽，所以敬王命而昭令德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176702_comment'></div>书来，使余记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176702_comment'></div>余尝有感于士之不明其道而泽不及物者，得以议吾儒也，故于是举乐为之述焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176702_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年8月26日</a>　此日，上劄乞改《三经义》误字。作品：《乞改<三经义>误字劄子二道》其一。<div id='poem_1176231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞改三经义误字劄子<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年8月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176231")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176231'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176231'>臣顷奉敕提举修撰《经义》，而臣闻识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176231", 1176231, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>不该</span>，思索不精，校视不审，无以称陛下发挥道术、启训天下后世之意，上孤眷属，没有馀责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176231_comment'></div>幸蒙大恩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176231", 1176231, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>休息</span>田里，坐窃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176231", 1176231, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>荣禄</span>，免于事累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176231_comment'></div>因得以疾病之间，考正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176231", 1176231, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>误失</span>，谨录如右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176231_comment'></div>伏望清燕之间，垂赐省观，傥合圣心，谓当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176231", 1176231, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>刊革</span>，即乞付外施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176231_comment'></div>臣干冒天威，无任云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176231_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1176231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　再上劄，乞续改《诗义》中字。作品：《乞改<三经义>误字劄子二道》其二。<div id='poem_1176232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞改三经义误字劄子一<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>尚书义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176232")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176232'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176232'>《皋陶谟》：「按见其恶」，当作「按其见恶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176232_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176232'>《益稷》：「故懋使之化」，当作「则懋使之化」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176232_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1176232'>《微子》：「纯而不杂，故谓之牺」，「牺」当作「牷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176232_comment'></div>「完而无伤，故谓之牺」，「牺」当作「牺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176232_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1176232'>《洪范》：「有器也然后有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176232_comment'></div>此书所以谓之范者，以五行为宗故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176232_comment'></div>五行犹未离于形而器出焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176232_comment'></div>扩而大谓之弘，积而大谓之丕，合而大谓之洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176232_comment'></div>此书合五行以成天下之大法，故谓之《洪范》也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176232_comment'></div>已上七十一字，今欲删去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176232_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1176232'>又云：「陶复陶穴尚矣，后世易之栋宇，而其官犹曰司空，因其故不忘始也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176232_comment'></div>已上二十六字，今亦欲删去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176232_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176232'>《周官》：「唐虞稽古」字上漏「曰」字。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176232_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176233?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>周礼义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176233'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176233'>《小宰》：「其财用上」，「其」字当作「共」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176233'>《大府》：「受藏之府，则若职内掌邦之赋入是也，受用之府，则若职岁掌邦之赋出是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176233_comment'></div>已上三十字，今欲删去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176233'>《党正》：「岁属其民者四」，「四」当作「五」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1176233'>《御仆》：「掌万民之复」，「复」当作「逆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176233'>《大驭》：「有軓也」，「四」当作「轨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176233'>《大行人》：「三公八命，出封加一命，则谓之上公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176233_comment'></div>已上十四字，今欲删去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176233_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　上表神宗辞召赴京明堂陪位。诏允，继上谢表。作品：《辞免明堂陪位表》《诏免明堂陪位谢表》<div class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176080")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176080'>臣某言：伏奉诏书，令发来赴阙明堂陪位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176080_comment'></div>合宫丕享，寰宇骏奔，冒被优诏之加，使陪显相之末<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176080_comment'></div>伏念臣投身荒远，上负眷怜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176080_comment'></div>企踵禁严，久劳监寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176080_comment'></div>况宗祈之盛礼，辱号召之明恩，当即办严，岂容辞疾？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176080_comment'></div>而沉冥浸剧，黾勉实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176080_comment'></div>心若子牟，虽每存于魏阙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176080_comment'></div>身如杨仆，乃自外于汉关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176080_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176080_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诏免明堂陪位谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176082")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176082'>臣某言：近具表为疾病乞免赴阙明堂陪位，伏蒙圣慈特赐臣诏书许免者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176082_comment'></div>骏奔弗获，内怀逋慢之诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176082_comment'></div>宠答曰俞，上荷眷怜之至<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176082_comment'></div>伏念臣久违秘近，遂迫衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176082_comment'></div>长负异恩，固难逃于幽黜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176082_comment'></div>敢图釐事，乃复与于详延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176082_comment'></div>辄冒布陈，重烦矜允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176082_comment'></div>鸿私所被，藏一札以知荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176082_comment'></div>旅力已愆，殒百身而何及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176082_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月4日</a>　此日，有文祭北山觉海赞元。作品：《祭北山元长老文》<div id='poem_1176876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1176876'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176876'>元丰三年九月四日，祭于北山长老觉海大师之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176876_comment'></div>自我壮强，与公周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176876_comment'></div>今皆老矣，公弃而先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176876_comment'></div>逝孰云远？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176876_comment'></div>十方现前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176876_comment'></div>馔陈告违，世礼则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176876_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年9月7日</a>　此日，弟安上因与江南东路转运使孙珪互讼不实，追官勒停。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　故人耿宪惠梨。有诗奉酬，并修答书，言及子旁及弟安上事。作品：《耿天骘惠梨次韵奉酬三首》《与耿天骘书二》<div id='poem_499488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_499488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/499488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>耿天骘惠梨次韵奉酬三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_499488")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_499488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_499488'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_499488'>故人家果独难忘，秋实初成便得尝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_499488_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_499488'>直使紫花形味胜，岂能终日望咸阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1176065_comment'></div>敷施大号，夷夏交欣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176065_comment'></div>盖闻圣以享帝为难，孝以严父为至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176065_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下道包众甫，运会丕平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176065_comment'></div>巍巍成功，尧之所谓大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176065_comment'></div>业业致孝，舜之所由昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176065_comment'></div>涓选休辰，肇称嘉飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176065_comment'></div>百礼既至，而正惟己独；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176065_comment'></div>万寿攸酢，而福与众均。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　答蔡肇书，论同生基。作品：《答蔡天启》<div id='poem_1176326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答蔡天启书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176326")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176326'>某启：近附书，想达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176326_comment'></div>比日安否如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176326_comment'></div>何时南来？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176326_comment'></div>日以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176326", 1176326, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>企伫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176326_comment'></div>得书说同生基，以色立，诚如是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176326_comment'></div>所谓犹如野马，熠熠清扰者，日光入隙，所见是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176326_comment'></div>众生以识精冰合，此而成身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176326_comment'></div>众生为想所阴，不依日光，则不能见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176326_comment'></div>想阴既尽，心光发宣，则不假日光，了了见此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176326_comment'></div>此即所谓见同生基也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176326_comment'></div>未即会晤，为道自爱！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176326_comment'></div>数以书见及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176326_comment'></div>尊教授想比日安佳，未及为书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　是年，有疏请僧法秀入主蒋山太平兴国寺，继赞元法席。作品：《请秀长老疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　有书答曾巩。作品：《答曾子固书》<div id='poem_1176329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答曾子固书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176329")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176329'>某启：久以疾病不为问，岂胜乡往！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176329_comment'></div>前书疑子固于读经有所不暇，故语及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176329_comment'></div>连得书，疑某所谓经者佛经也，而教之以佛经之乱俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176329_comment'></div>某但言读经，则何以别于中国圣人之经？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176329_comment'></div>子固读吾书每如此，亦某所以疑子固于读经有所不暇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176329_comment'></div>然世之不见全经久矣，读经而已，则不足以知经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176329_comment'></div>故某自百家诸子之书，至于《难经》、《素问》、《本草》诸小说无所不读，农夫、女工无所不问，然后于经为能知其大体而无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176329_comment'></div>盖后世学者，与先王之时异矣，不如是，不足以尽圣人故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176329_comment'></div>扬雄虽为不好非圣人之书，然于墨、晏、邹、庄、申、韩，亦何所不读？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176329_comment'></div>彼致其知而后读，以有所去取，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176329", 1176329, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>异学</span>不能乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176329_comment'></div>惟其不能乱，故能有所去取者，所以明吾道而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176329_comment'></div>子固视吾所知为尚可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176329", 1176329, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>异学</span>乱之者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176329_comment'></div>非知我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176329_comment'></div>方今乱俗不在于佛，乃在于学士大夫沉没利欲，以言相尚，不知自治而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176329_comment'></div>子固以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176329_comment'></div>苦寒，比日侍奉万福，自爱！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　昼寝，作长短句。<br /><a href="javascript: /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　与吴豪书议嫁王令遗腹女。作品：《与吴特起书》<div id='poem_1176346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吴特起书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176346'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176346'>某启：适见钟检正世美，言上舍吴师礼，浙人也，有文学节行，欲为逢原婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176346_comment'></div>彼极多人欲婿之，而慕逢原节义，故欲娶其女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176346_comment'></div>钟为人不妄，吴亦有名，故欲作书奉报，乃得来书，更请审择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176346_comment'></div>特起肯远相过，甚慰思渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176346_comment'></div>老年待尽，若复得一相见，岂非幸愿！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176346_comment'></div>今岁暑雨特甚，多逃于北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176346_comment'></div>平生未尝畏暑，年老气衰，复值此非常气候，殊为惫顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176346_comment'></div>书不及悉，千万自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176346_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70014", 70014, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>白鸡年</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70014", 70014, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>宸宇</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（张本校：一作扆）</span>想留连。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70014'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70014_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　再回吕惠卿书。作品：《与吕参政书》<div id='poem_1176546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176546?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕参政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176546")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176546'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176546'>承累幅勤勤，为礼过当，非敢望于故人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176546_comment'></div>不敢视此以为报礼，想蒙恕察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176546_comment'></div>承已祥除，伏惟尚有馀慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176546_comment'></div>知有所谕者，恨未见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176546_comment'></div>虽赖恩爱，得优游疾惫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176546_comment'></div>弃日茫然，未获奉并，惟冀爱重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1176546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176546'><span class='label'>按：</span>《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一○三，清抄一百五十卷本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176546_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　范峋离任江东刑狱，有书答之。作品：《答范峋提刑书》<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_70374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70374'>时时羹藜藿，镬大苦难燮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_70374'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_70374_0'>⑴ 原作知，据张本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_70374_0'>⑵ 原作檀，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_70374_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　上《字说》二十四卷，有诗。作品：《进<字说>表》《进字说二首》<div id='poem_1176022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进字说表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176022")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176022'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176022'>臣某言：窃以书用于世久矣，先王立学以教之，设官以达之，置使以喻之，禁诛乱名，岂茍然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176022_comment'></div>凡以同道德之归，一名法之守而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176022_comment'></div>道衰以隐，官失学废，循而发之，实在圣时，岂臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176022", 1176022, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>愚憧</span>，敢逮斯事<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176022_comment'></div>盖闻物生而有情，情发而为声，声以类合，皆足相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176022_comment'></div>人声为言，述以为字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176022_comment'></div>字虽人之所制，本实出于自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176022_comment'></div>凤鸟有文，《河图》有画，非人为也，人则效此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176022_comment'></div>故上下内外，初终前后，中偏左右，自然之位也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176022_comment'></div>衡邪曲直，耦重交析，反缺倒仄，自然之形也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176022_comment'></div>发歛呼吸，抑扬合散，虚实清浊，自然之声也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176022_comment'></div>可视而知，可听而思，自然之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176022_comment'></div>以义自然，故先圣所宅，虽殊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176022", 1176022, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>方域</span>，言音乖离，点画不同，译而通之，其义一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176022_comment'></div>道有升降，文物随之，时变事异，书名或改，原出要归，亦无二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176022_comment'></div>乃若知之所不能与，思之所不能至，则虽非即此而可證，亦非舍此而能学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176022_comment'></div>盖唯天下之至神为能究此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176022_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下体元用妙，该极象数，稽古创法，绍天觉民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176022_comment'></div>乃惟兹学，陨缺弗嗣，因任众智，微明显隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176022_comment'></div>盖将以祈合乎神旨者，布之海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176022_comment'></div>众妙所寄，穷之实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176022_comment'></div>而臣顷御燕閒，亲承训敕，抱痾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176022", 1176022, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>负忧</span>，久无所成，虽尝有献，大惧冒浼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176022_comment'></div>退复自力，用忘疾惫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176022", 1176022, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>咨诹</span>讨论，博尽所疑，冀或涓尘，有助深崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176022_comment'></div>谨勒成《字说》二十四卷，随表上进以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176022_comment'></div>臣某诚惶诚惧，顿首谨言。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1176022'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176022_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进字说二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69375")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69375_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_69375_0'>① 张本第一首题作进字说，第二首题作成字说后</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69375'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69375'>正名百物自轩辕，野老何知强讨论。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69375'>但可与人漫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69375", 69375, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>酱瓿</span>，岂能令鬼哭黄昏。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年8月</a>　再答吕惠卿书。作品：《再答吕吉甫书》<div id='poem_1176545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1176545'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176545'>承诲示勤勤，岂胜感愧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176545_comment'></div>闻有太原新除，不知果成行否，想遂治装而西也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176545_comment'></div>示及法观文字，辄留玩读，研究义味也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176545_comment'></div>观身与世，如泡梦幻，若不以洗心，而沈于诸妄，不亦悲乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176545_comment'></div>相见无期，惟刮磨世习，共进此道，则虽隔阔，常若交臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176545_comment'></div>虽衰苶瞢耗，敢不勉此，犹冀未死间，或得晤语，以究所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176545_comment'></div>未尔，良食，为时自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176545_comment'></div>令弟想各安裕，必同时西上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176545_comment'></div>惠及海物，愧荷不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176545_comment'></div>村落无物将意，栗二笼驰献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176545_comment'></div>某今年虽无大病，然年弥高矣，衰亦滋极，稍似劳动，便不支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176545_comment'></div>向著《字说》，粗已成就，恨未得致左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176545_comment'></div>观古人意，多寓妙道于此，所惜许慎所传止此，又有伪谬，故于思索难尽耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176545'><span id='poem_sentence_1_1176126_comment'></div>惠心昭假，釐事备成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176126_comment'></div>臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>恭惟仁祖以尧之巍巍，丕冒区夏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176126_comment'></div>皇帝陛下仰稽前宪，俯采庶言，命册使而致严，告匰主而归美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176126_comment'></div>神灵率吁，其启后于无疆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176126_comment'></div>顾久负于沉痾，乃独妨于旅进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长安县太君王氏墓志<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰六年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1176820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176820'>长安县太君临川王氏，尚书都官员外郎、赠太师、中书令兼尚书令、潭国公讳益之女，尚书左丞张公讳若谷之妇，尚书比部郎中讳奎之妻，国子博士䙼、开封府雍丘尉视之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176820_comment'></div>十四而嫁，五十一而老，五十六而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176820_comment'></div>其卒，在颍州子䙼官舍，实元丰三年正月己酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176820_comment'></div>君为妇而妇，为妻而妻，为母而母，为姑而姑，皆可誉叹，莫能间毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176820_comment'></div>工诗善书，强记博闻，明辨敏达，有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176820_comment'></div>循循恭谨，不自高显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176820_comment'></div>晚好佛书，亦信践之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176820_comment'></div>衣不求华，食不厌蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176820_comment'></div>慈哀所使，不治小过，欲归归之，欲嫁嫁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176820_comment'></div>君二女：长不慧，不可以适人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176820_comment'></div>其季，殿中丞龚原妻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176820_comment'></div>卜六年，葬江州德化县。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　答蒋之奇书，论佛性。作品：《答蒋颖叔书》<div id='poem_1176437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176437")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176437'>阻阔未久，岂胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>思渴</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176437_comment'></div>承手笔访以所疑，因得闻动止，良以为慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176437_comment'></div>如某所闻，非神不能变，而变以赴感，特神足耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176437_comment'></div>所谓性者，若四大是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176437_comment'></div>所谓无性者，若如来藏是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176437_comment'></div>虽无性而非断绝，故曰一性所谓无性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176437_comment'></div>曰一性所谓无性，则其实非有非无，此可以意通，难以言了也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176437_comment'></div>惟无性，故能变；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176437_comment'></div>若有性，则火不可以为水，水不可以为地，地不可以为风矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176437_comment'></div>长来短对，动来静对，此但令人勿著尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176437_comment'></div>若了其语意，则虽不著二边而著中边，此亦是著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176437_comment'></div>故经曰：「不此岸，不彼岸，不中流」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176437_comment'></div>长爪梵志一切法不变，而佛告之以受与不受亦不受，皆争论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176437_comment'></div>若知应生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>无所住</span>心，则但有所著，皆在所诃，虽不涉二边，亦未出三句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176437_comment'></div>若无此过，即在所可，三十六对无所施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176437_comment'></div>《妙法莲华经》说实相法，然其所说，亦行而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176437_comment'></div>故导师曰「安立行净行，无边行上行」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176437_comment'></div>其所以名芬陀利华，取义甚多，非但如今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>法师</span>所释也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176437_comment'></div>佛说有性，无非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>第一义谛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176437_comment'></div>若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>第一义谛</span>，有即是无，无即是有，以无有像计度言语起而佛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>不二法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176437_comment'></div>离一切计度言说，谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>不二法</span>，亦是方便说耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176437_comment'></div>此可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176437", 1176437, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>冥会</span>，难以言了也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　移松皆死，以人名入诗咏之。作品：《移松皆死》<div id='poem_69624' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69624' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　神宗赐《元丰敕令格式》，上谢表。作品：《赐元丰敕令格式表》<div id='poem_1176017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1176017_comment'></div>窃以后辟之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176017", 1176017, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>训裁</span>，臣工之所承守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176017_comment'></div>历观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176017", 1176017, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>既往</span>，或仍舛驳之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176017_comment'></div>绪正厥遗，实待缉熙之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176017_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下操天纵之智，御物昌之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176017_comment'></div>创法于群几之先，收功于异论之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176017_comment'></div>虑无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176017", id='poem_sentence_9_1176017_comment'></div>神机俯授于有官，圣制遂摅于无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176017_comment'></div>部居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176017", 1176017, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>彪列</span>，科指<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176017", 1176017, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>昈分</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176017_comment'></div>臣进陪国论，退即里居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176017_comment'></div>在昔讨论，尝负旷瘝之责；<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　神宗遣医诊治。上谢劄。作品：《谢宣医劄子》<div id='poem_1176241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176241' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_6_1176090_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下地容天帱，云荫露濡，呴吹晚出于更生，拊伛申加于濒死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176090_comment'></div>譬如造化，难纪叙于曲成；<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1176121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176121'>臣某言：基迹丛祠，冀鸿延于万寿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176121_comment'></div>锡名扁榜，窃荣遇于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176121_comment'></div>臣生乏寸长，世叨殊奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176121_comment'></div>贱息奄先于犬马，颓龄俯迫于桑榆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176121_comment'></div>独念亲逢，莫有涓埃之补报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176121_comment'></div>永惟宏愿，岂忘香火之因缘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176121_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下俯徇祈诚，特加美称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176121_comment'></div>所惧封人之祝，终以尧辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176121_comment'></div>乃尘长者之园，遽如佛许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176121_comment'></div>仰凭护念，誓毕熏修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176121_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　税城中屋以居，不复造宅。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年7月</a>　苏轼抵江宁。与之游，叹赏不已，示以近作。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　时晤苏轼，诵诗说佛，勉其重修《三国志》。轼则以发言旧弊相劝。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_1176809_comment'></div>以某年月日卒于家，享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176809_comment'></div>君事亲孝，友于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176809_comment'></div>与厌侈父母兄弟，宁穷困身妻子，故老妻长子，人不胜忧也，义不忍赀亲遗产，悉推兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176809_comment'></div>比没世，妻子遵约，乡人贤，以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176809_comment'></div>君尝议狱，上官指教再三，君弗许再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176809_comment'></div>上官顾叹许，举京官，君弗谢，乃终弗举，后他上官率以质直弗举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176809_comment'></div>二男子，伟、豪，长有志行如君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176809_comment'></div>二女子，归晏修睦、王令，季有特操如令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176809_comment'></div>豪养寡姊妹，嫁孤甥，夫妇孳孳，乡人又以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176809_comment'></div>卜以元丰八年某月日，葬于唐州桐柏县淮源乡，妻李祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176809_comment'></div>临川王某志。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1176809'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年10月22日</a>　此日，婿蔡卞罢侍讲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年12月14日</a>　此日，婿蔡卞为礼部侍郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　是年，撰《吴录事墓志》。<div id='poem_1176809' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176809' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176809?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴录事墓志<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> id='poem_title_1176809_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176809'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176809'>君讳蕡，字成之，世为抚州金溪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176809_comment'></div>曾祖某，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176809_comment'></div>祖德筠，尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176809_comment'></div>父敏，尚书都官员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176809_comment'></div>君以荫入官，任吉州太和、袁州萍乡县主簿、尉，蕲州石桥茶场，庐州司理，亳、寿州、江宁府录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176809_comment'></div>以某年月日卒于家，享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176809_comment'></div>君事亲孝，友于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176809_comment'></div>与厌侈父母兄弟，宁穷困身妻子，故老妻长子，人不胜忧也，义不忍赀亲遗产，悉推兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176809_comment'></div>比没世，妻子遵约，乡人贤，以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176809_comment'></div>君尝议狱，上官指教再三，君弗许再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176809_comment'></div>上官顾叹许，举京官，君弗谢，乃终弗举，后他上官率以质直弗举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176809_comment'></div>二男子，伟、豪，长有志行如君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176809_comment'></div>二女子，归晏修睦、王令，季有特操如令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176809_comment'></div>豪养寡姊妹，嫁孤甥，夫妇孳孳，乡人又以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176809_comment'></div>卜以元丰八年某月日，葬于唐州桐柏县淮源乡，妻李祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176809_comment'></div>临川王某志。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1176809'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_4_70008'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70008_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fae068ea21ed478b9b32cefeb594117f_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>，29岁</div><div id='fae068ea21ed478b9b32cefeb594117f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年1月</a>　旋返官，途经杭州，撰庙铭。作品：《伍子胥庙铭》<div id='poem_1176708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176708' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176708?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伍子胥庙铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176708")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176708_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176708'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176708'>予观子胥出死亡逋窜之中，以客寄之一身，卒以说吴，折不测之楚，仇执耻雪，名震天下，岂不壮哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176708_comment'></div>及其危疑之际，能自慷慨不顾万死，毕谏于所事，此其志与夫自恕以偷一时之利者异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176708_comment'></div>孔子论古之士大夫，若管夷吾、臧武仲之属，茍志于善而有补于当世者，咸不废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176708_comment'></div>然则子胥之义又曷可少耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176708_comment'></div>康定二年，予过所谓胥山者，周行庙庭，叹吴亡千有馀年，事之兴坏废革者不可胜数，独子胥之祠不徙不绝，何其盛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176708_comment'></div>岂独神之事吴之所兴，盖亦子胥之节有以动后世，而爱尤在于吴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176708_comment'></div>后九年，乐安蒋公为杭使，其州人力而新之，余与为铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176708_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1176708'>烈烈子胥，发节穷逋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176708_comment'></div>遂为册臣，奋不图躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176708_comment'></div>谏合谋行，隆隆之吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176708_comment'></div>厥废不遂，邑都俄墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176708_comment'></div>以智死昏，忠则有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176708_comment'></div>胥山之颜，殿屋渠渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176708_comment'></div>千载之祠，如祠之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176708_comment'></div>孰作新之，民劝而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176708_comment'></div>维忠肆怀，维孝肆孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176708_comment'></div>我铭祠庭，示后不诬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176708_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在杭州时，韦骧因公过杭，以《借箸赋》来谒。大奇之，为之揄扬。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_70550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70550'>师心以此不挂物，一堂收身自有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　居杭时作文，阐天人之道，释贵贱贤愚之疑，破术士推命之妄。作品：《推命对》<div id='poem_1176653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>推命对</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176653")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176653'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176653'>吴里处士有善推命知贵贱祸福者，或俾予问之，予辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176653_comment'></div>他日复以请，予曰：「夫贵若贱，天所为也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176653_comment'></div>贤不肖，吾所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176653_comment'></div>吾所为者，吾能自知之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176653_comment'></div>天所为者，吾独懵乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176653_comment'></div>吾贤欤，可以位公卿欤，则万钟之禄固有焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176653_comment'></div>不幸而贫且贱，则时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176653_comment'></div>吾不贤欤，不可以位公卿欤，则箪食豆羹无歉焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176653_comment'></div>若幸而富且贵，则咎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176653_comment'></div>此吾知之无疑，奚率于彼者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176653_comment'></div>且祸与福，君子置诸外焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176653_comment'></div>君子居必仁，行必义，反仁义而福，君子不有也，由仁义而祸，君子不屑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176653_comment'></div>是故文王拘羑里，孔子畏于匡，彼圣人之智，岂不能脱祸患哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176653_comment'></div>盖道之存焉耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176653_comment'></div>曰：「子以为贵若贱，天所为也，然世贤而贱，不肖而贵者，亦天所为欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176653_comment'></div>曰：「非也，人不能合于天耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176653_comment'></div>夫天之生斯人也，使贤者治不贤，故贤者宜贵，不贤者宜贱，天之道也，择而行之者，人之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176653_comment'></div>天人之道合，则贤者贵，不肖者贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176653_comment'></div>天人之道悖，则贤者贱，而不肖者贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176653_comment'></div>天人之道悖合相半，则贤不肖或贵或贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176653_comment'></div>尧舜之世，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176653", 1176653, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>元凯</span>用而四凶殛，是天人之道合也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176653_comment'></div>桀纣之世，飞廉进而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1176653", 1176653, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>三仁</span>退，是天人之道悖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176653_comment'></div>汉魏而下，贤不肖或贵或贱，是天人之道悖合相半也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176653_comment'></div>盖天之命一，而人之时不能率合焉，故君子脩身以俟命，守道以任时，贵贱祸福之来，不能沮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176653_comment'></div>子不力于仁义以信其中，而屑屑焉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176653", 1176653, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>甘意</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1176653", 1176653, "Clauses/78/Comments/1")'>诞谩</span>虚怪之说，不已溺哉」？</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176653_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年9月</a>　九月，在杭以明堂恩授殿中丞。<br /></div>

-----title
扬州（江都）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9b449792a48e4054829085187a12e9f6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9b449792a48e4054829085187a12e9f6");'><span id='9b449792a48e4054829085187a12e9f6_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　赴扬州，有启上知州宋庠。作品：《上宋相公启代宋宣献公》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年7月</a>　是月，在扬州为宋庠代作贺吕夷简启。作品：《贺昭文相公启》<div id='poem_1176531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺昭文相公启<span class='inlineComment2'>（代宋宣献公作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176531")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176531'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176531'>恭审肃被宠灵，参司枢要，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176531_comment'></div>窃以安危所系，文武相须，眷注意之殊时，崇仰成之异体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176531_comment'></div>至若万务通于四海，二柄萃于一门，简在休辰，职繇全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176531_comment'></div>恭以某官风华博照，天韵雄成，挟旦、奭之谋谟，袭韦、平之系胄，逢辰鼎盛，序爵弥高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176531_comment'></div>清议被民，卓冠一时之杰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176531_comment'></div>丰规振俗，遄跻三代之隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176531_comment'></div>嗟彼羌豪，警吾边吏，有严天讨，爰整王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176531_comment'></div>上方深拱以倚平，博谋而取重，畀兹全责，钦若壮猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176531_comment'></div>舆诵所同，岩瞻惟允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176531_comment'></div>昔馈通函谷，紧沛邑之宗臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176531_comment'></div>威被匈奴，实汉家之真宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176531_comment'></div>宜今具美，与古兼徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176531_comment'></div>某夙附末光，雅烦善庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176531_comment'></div>仕藩城而待罪，隐若自安，佔宿邸之移文，跫然滋喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176531_comment'></div>依归之素，有过等夷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年7月</a>　是月，在扬州为宋庠代作贺章得象启。作品：《贺集贤相公启》<div id='poem_1176527' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176527' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176527?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺集贤相公启<span class='inlineComment2'>（代人作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176527")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176527_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176527'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176527'>恭以禁座流恩，政堂迁秩，宠兼常伯，守在冬官，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176527_comment'></div>恭以某官袭气堪舆，禀精河岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176527_comment'></div>风华懋美，峣若东南之筠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176527_comment'></div>天韵纯沦，温如西北之璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176527_comment'></div>不阶尺木，遂致青云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176527_comment'></div>世图任于老成，日对扬于休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176527_comment'></div>股肱作相，素同国体之安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176527_comment'></div>喉舌命官，遂致文明之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176527_comment'></div>兹为异数，允答具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176527_comment'></div>某充位外藩，希风上国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176527_comment'></div>观文辩叙，弥高天老之台；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176527_comment'></div>通谒为仪，寖远豆晏之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176527_comment'></div>欢愉无状，震慄兼常。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176527_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年7月</a>　是月，在扬州为宋庠代作贺晏殊启。作品：《贺枢密相公启》<div id='poem_1176528' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176528' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176528?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺枢密相公启<span class='inlineComment2'>（代人作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176528")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176528_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176528'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176528'>恭审迁秩上公，联华冢宰，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176528_comment'></div>窃以某官略非世出，韵自天成，时归英特之材，独禀高明之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176528_comment'></div>光华漫漫，遂适于泰辰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176528_comment'></div>文学彬彬，适阶于膴仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176528_comment'></div>逮浚明之正统，图卫翼之元勋，周历清华之阶，越登机密之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176528_comment'></div>通规亮节，朝矜式以取平；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176528_comment'></div>深策远猷，上咨嗟而倚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176528_comment'></div>懋惟徽数，允合肤公，命布幅员，喜盈观听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176528_comment'></div>某久从外补，逖听上胪，曾驰谒之未遑，第承风而窃抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176528_comment'></div>瞻依之厚，度越于常。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176528_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年闰9月11日</a>　在扬州识孙侔。此日，撰赠序，以孟、韩之道相勉。作品：《送孙正之序》<div id='poem_1176569' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孙正之序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年闰9月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176569")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176569'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176569'>时然而然，众人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176569_comment'></div>己然而然，君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176569_comment'></div>己然而然，非私己也，圣人之道在焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176569_comment'></div>夫君子有穷苦颠跌，不肯一失诎己以从时者，不以时胜道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176569_comment'></div>故其得志于君，则变时而之道，若反手然，彼其术素脩而志素定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176569_comment'></div>时乎杨、墨，己不然者，孟轲氏而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176569_comment'></div>时乎释、老，己不然者，韩愈氏而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176569_comment'></div>如孟、韩者，可谓术素脩而志素定也，不以时胜道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176569_comment'></div>惜也不得志于君，使真儒之效不白于当世，然其于众人也卓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176569_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176569_comment'></div>予观今之世，圆冠峨如，大裙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176569", 1176569, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>襜如</span>，坐而尧言，起而舜趋，不以孟、韩之心为心者，果异众人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176569_comment'></div>予官于扬，得友曰孙正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176569_comment'></div>正之行古之道，又善为古文，予知其能以孟、韩之心为心而不已者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176569_comment'></div>夫越人之望燕，为绝域也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176569_comment'></div>北辕而首之，茍不已，无不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176569_comment'></div>孟、韩之道去吾党，岂若越人之望燕哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176569_comment'></div>以正之之不已，而不至焉，予未之信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176569_comment'></div>一日得志于吾君，而真儒之效不白于当世，予亦未之信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176569_comment'></div>正之之兄官于温，奉其亲以行，将从之，先为言以处予，予欲默安得而默也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176569_comment'></div>庆历二年闰九月十一日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年12月</a>　此月，以宋庠移知郓州，赋诗送别。作品：《送郓州知府宋谏议》<div
