ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　其时，陈洙之父陈商知扬州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　作文祭盛京。作品：《祭盛侍郎文》<div id='poem_1176859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭盛侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176859")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176859'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176859'>某闻之，行义弗高，位与年尊，惭者则己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176859_comment'></div>行义既高，位与年下，憾者则人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176859_comment'></div>在己无惭，在人无憾，有若公然，其又奚言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176859_comment'></div>惟昔先人，捐我诸孤，实在公藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176859_comment'></div>公泫然哀，襚死赙存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176859_comment'></div>托殡得宫，寓处得庐，一出公恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176859_comment'></div>公或我临，不有其尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176859_comment'></div>我奖我矜，均其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176859_comment'></div>戴德莫酬，谁谓我人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176859_comment'></div>去公三年，问不再行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176859_comment'></div>岂曰怠忘，贱不敢烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176859_comment'></div>补官扬州，公得谢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176859_comment'></div>曾几何时，计者来门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176859_comment'></div>哭泣作书，以吊后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176859_comment'></div>欲醊棺前，縻不可奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176859_comment'></div>会有吏役，尽室而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176859_comment'></div>戢恨含惭，转移寒暄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176859_comment'></div>乃今来归，公丧且期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176859_comment'></div>才命使人，薄进蘋蘩，嗟嗟公恩，死其敢谖！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　曾巩请铭，为撰墓志铭。作品：《户部郎中赠谏议大夫曾公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>户部郎中赠谏议大夫曾公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176747")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176747'>公讳致尧，字正臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176747_comment'></div>其先封鄫，鄫亡，去「邑」为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176747_comment'></div>王莽乱，都乡侯据弃侯之豫章，家之，盖豫章之南昌后分为南丰，故今为南丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176747_comment'></div>可徒为宜州刺史，再世生仁旺，赠尚书水部员外郎，公考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176747_comment'></div>李氏有江南，抚州上公进士第一，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176747_comment'></div>太平兴国八年，乃举进士中第，选主符离簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176747_comment'></div>岁馀，授兴元府司录，道迁大理评事，迁光禄寺丞，监越州酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176747_comment'></div>召见，拜著作佐郎，知淮阳军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176747_comment'></div>将行，天子惜留之，直史馆，赐绯鱼袋，使自汴至建安军行漕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176747_comment'></div>诏曰：「凡三司州郡事有不中理者，即验之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176747_comment'></div>最钩得匿货以五百万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176747_comment'></div>除秘书丞、两浙转运副使，改正使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176747_comment'></div>始，谏议大夫知苏州魏庠、侍御史知越州王柄不善于政而喜怒纵入，庠介旧恩以进，柄喜持上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176747_comment'></div>公到，劾之以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176747_comment'></div>上惊曰：「曾某乃敢治魏庠，克畏也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176747_comment'></div>克畏，可畏也，语转而然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176747_comment'></div>庠、柄皆被绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176747_comment'></div>杨允恭督扬子运，数言事，多可，人厌苦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176747_comment'></div>公每得诏，曰：「使在外，便文全己，非吾心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176747_comment'></div>辄不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176747_comment'></div>允恭告上，上使问公，公以所守言，上繇此薄允恭，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176747_comment'></div>言苛税一百三十馀条，罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176747_comment'></div>移知寿州，寿俗挟赀自豪，陈氏、范氏名天下，闻公至，皆迎自戢，公亦尽岁无所罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176747_comment'></div>既代，空一城人遮行，至夜，乃从二卒骑出城去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176747_comment'></div>在郡转太常博士、主客员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176747_comment'></div>章圣嗣位，常亲决细务，公言之，又言民惫甚，宜弛利禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176747_comment'></div>是时羌数犯塞，大臣议弃银、夏以解之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176747_comment'></div>公奏曰：「羌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1176747", 1176747, "Clauses/88/Comments/1")'>虚款</span>属我，我分地王之，非计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176747_comment'></div>令羌席此，劫它种以自助，不过二三年，患必复起矣，宜择人行塞下，先调兵食，待其变而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176747_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176747_comment'></div>二年，羌果反，围灵州，议臣请去灵州勿事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176747_comment'></div>公议曰：「羌所以易拒者，以灵州缀其后也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176747_comment'></div>判三司盐铁句院，天子欲以为知制诰，召试矣，大臣或忌之，迁户部员外郎、京西转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176747_comment'></div>请限公卿大夫子官京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176747_comment'></div>陈彭年议遣使行诸部减吏员，下其事京西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176747_comment'></div>公曰：「彭年议，无贤愚，一切置不用邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176747_comment'></div>抑择愚而废之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176747_comment'></div>择愚而废之，人材其可以蚤暮验邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176747_comment'></div>上令趣追使还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176747_comment'></div>数论事，上感之，还公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176747_comment'></div>既而王均诛，命公抚蜀，所创更百馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176747_comment'></div>李继迁再围清远、灵武，以丞相齐贤为邠宁、环庆、泾原、仪渭经略使，丞相引公为判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176747_comment'></div>公奏记曰：「兵数十万，王超既以都部署为之主，丞相徒领一二朝士往临之，超肯用吾进退乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176747_comment'></div>吾能以谋付与超而有不能自将乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176747_comment'></div>不并将西，无补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176747_comment'></div>超能薄，此重事，愿更审计」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176747_comment'></div>丞相乃以公为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176747_comment'></div>诏陕西即经略使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1176747", 1176747, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>追兵</span>，皆以时赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176747_comment'></div>公曰：「将在空虚无人之处，事薄而后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1176747", 1176747, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>追兵</span>，如后何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176747_comment'></div>遂辞行，上怒，未有所发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176747_comment'></div>会召赐金紫，公曰：「丞相敏中，以非功德进官，臣论其不可，甫尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176747_comment'></div>臣受命，事未有效，不敢以冒赐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176747_comment'></div>固辞，上繇此贬公为黄州团练副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176747_comment'></div>既而超果败，清远、灵武踵亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176747_comment'></div>会南郊恩，复官，知泰州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176747_comment'></div>丁母夫人陈氏忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176747_comment'></div>服除，授吏部员外郡、知泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176747_comment'></div>公常谓选举旧制非是，请得论改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176747_comment'></div>陈省华子尧咨受请殿上为奸，以第畀举人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176747_comment'></div>败，省华、尧咨有邪巧材，朝廷皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1176747", 1176747, "Clauses/177/Comments/0")'>患恶</span>，而方幸，无敢斥之者，公入十馀疏辩之，移知苏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176747_comment'></div>至五日，移知扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176747_comment'></div>扬州守职田，岁常得千斛，然遣吏督贫民耕，民苦之，公不使耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176747_comment'></div>天子方崇符瑞，兴昭应诸宫，且出幸祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176747_comment'></div>公疏言：「昔周成王既卜世三十，卜年七百，然观于《周礼》，其经纬国体，人事微细无不具，则知王者受命，必脩人事，以称天所以命之之意，不举属之天以怠人事也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176747_comment'></div>终曰：「陛下始即位，以爵禄得君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176747_comment'></div>近年以来，以爵禄畜盗贼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176747_comment'></div>大臣愈不怿，移知鄂州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176747_comment'></div>封泰山恩，迁礼部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176747_comment'></div>始解扬州，受添支差多一月，公寻自言，患公者因复绌公监江宁盐酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176747_comment'></div>西祀恩，迁户部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176747_comment'></div>以祥符五年五月丁亥疾不起，年六十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176747_comment'></div>阶至朝请郎，勋至骑都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176747_comment'></div>遗戒曰：「毋陷于俗，媚佛夷鬼以污我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176747_comment'></div>家人行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176747_comment'></div>所著《仙凫羽翼》三十卷、《广中台志》八十卷、《清边前要》五十卷《、西陲要纪》十卷、《为臣要纪》三卷、《直言集》五卷、文集十卷，传于世，尤长于歌诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176747_comment'></div>以其年十一月归葬南丰之东园，水渍墓，天圣元年改葬龙池乡之源头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176747_comment'></div>始，公娶黄氏，生子男三人，易占尝为太常博士，以能文称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176747_comment'></div>公以博士故，赠至右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176747_comment'></div>公殁八年而博士子巩生，生三十五年，巩以博士命次公生平事，使来曰：「为我志而铭之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176747_comment'></div>某视公犹大父也，其少也，则得公之详，如其孙之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176747_comment'></div>始，公自任以当世之重也，虽人望公则亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176747_comment'></div>及遭太宗，自谓志可行，卒之闭于奸邪，彼诚有命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176747_comment'></div>悲夫，亦正之难合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176747_comment'></div>虽其难合，其可少枉乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176747_comment'></div>虽其少枉，合乎未可必也，彼诚有命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176747_comment'></div>虽然，其难合也，祇所以见正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176747_comment'></div>孔子曰：「所谓大臣者，以道事君，不可则止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176747_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176747_comment'></div>公之节，非庶几所谓大臣者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176747_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_1176747'>既墓而圮，乃升宅原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176747_comment'></div>谁来求铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176747_comment'></div>公子与孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1176747_comment'></div>公初洎终，惟义之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1176747_comment'></div>维才之完，而薄于施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1176747_comment'></div>乃其后人，有克厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1176747_comment'></div>天启予公，非在兹邪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1176747_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1176747'>宜州：《琬琰集》作「沂州」，又上有「唐」字。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1176747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176747'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_95_1176747_0'>⑴ 《临川先生文集》卷九二。又见《名臣碑传琬琰集》中集卷二，《文章正宗》续集卷八，《文章类选》卷三一，同治《南丰县志》卷四三，《三曾年谱》卷一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1176747_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　与段缝书，为曾巩辩诬。作品：《答段缝书》<div id='poem_1176365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答段缝书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176365")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176365'>段君足下：某在京师时，尝为足下道曾巩善属文，未尝及其为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176365_comment'></div>还江南，始熟而慕焉友之，又作文粗道其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176365_comment'></div>惠书以所闻诋巩行无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176365", 1176365, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>纤完</span>，其居家，亲友惴畏焉，怪某无文字规巩，见谓有党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176365_comment'></div>果哉，足下之言也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176365_comment'></div>巩固不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176365_comment'></div>巩文学论议，在某交游中，不见可敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176365_comment'></div>其心勇于适道，殆不可以刑祸利禄动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176365_comment'></div>父在困厄中，左右就养无亏行，家事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176365", 1176365, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>铢发</span>以上皆亲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176365_comment'></div>父亦爱之甚，尝曰：「吾宗敝，所赖者此儿耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176365_comment'></div>此某之所见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176365_comment'></div>若足下所闻，非某之所见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176365_comment'></div>巩在京师，避兄而舍，此虽某亦罪之也，宜足下深攻之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176365_comment'></div>于罪之中，有足矜者，顾不可以书传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176365_comment'></div>事固有迹，然而情不至是者，如不循其情而诛焉，则谁不可诛邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176365_comment'></div>巩之迹固然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176365_comment'></div>然巩为人弟，于此不得无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176365_comment'></div>但在京师时，未深接之，还江南，又既往不可咎，未尝以此规之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176365_comment'></div>巩果于从事，少许可，时时出于中道，此则还江南时尝规之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176365_comment'></div>巩闻之，辄瞿然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176365_comment'></div>巩固有以教某也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176365_comment'></div>其作《怀友书》两通，一自藏，一纳某家，皇皇焉求相切劘以免于悔者略见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176365_comment'></div>尝谓友朋过差，未可以绝，固且规之，规之从则已，固且为文字自著见然后已邪，则未尝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176365_comment'></div>凡巩之行，如前之云，其既往之过，亦如前之云而已，岂不得为贤者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176365_comment'></div>天下愚者众而贤者希，愚者固忌贤者，贤者又自守，不与愚者合，愚者加怨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176365_comment'></div>挟忌怨之心，则无之焉而不谤，君子之过于听者，又传而广之，故贤者常多谤，其困于下者尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176365_comment'></div>势不足以动俗，名实未加于民，愚者易以谤，谤易以传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176365_comment'></div>凡道巩之云云者，固忌、固怨、固过于听者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176365_comment'></div>家兄未尝亲巩也，顾亦过于听耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176365_comment'></div>足下乃欲引忌者、怨者、过于听者之言，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1176365", 1176365, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>县断</span>贤者之是非，甚不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176365_comment'></div>孔子曰：「众好之，必察焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176365_comment'></div>众恶之，必察焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176365_comment'></div>孟子曰：「国人皆曰可杀，未可也，见可杀焉，然后杀之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176365_comment'></div>匡章，通国以为不孝，孟子独礼貌之，以为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176365_comment'></div>孔孟所以为孔孟者，为其善自守，不惑于众人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176365_comment'></div>如惑于众人，亦众人耳，乌在其为孔孟也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176365_comment'></div>足下姑自重，毋轻议巩！</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1176365_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176365'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷七五。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷一一六，《崇文古诀》卷二○，《文翰类选大成》卷一二一，《文章辨体汇选》卷二二八，《古今图书集成》交谊典卷八○、一○九、经籍典卷二八八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176365_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　在扬州撰文祭扬州通判刁绎。作品：《祭刁博士繹文》<div id='poem_1176874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭刁博士绎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176874")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176874'>惟君其先，黻冕之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176874_comment'></div>君弱而良，遂世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176874_comment'></div>越天圣初，上始即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176874_comment'></div>开延闻人，间不容伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176874_comment'></div>若古尧、虞，稷、契亲逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176874_comment'></div>君子其时，奋追群龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176874_comment'></div>五两之纶，三钟之粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176874_comment'></div>沈才下吏，间关楚、蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176874_comment'></div>朅来扬州，辅佐元侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176874_comment'></div>朝其或者，明试谟谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176874_comment'></div>最未及论，泯焉之幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176874_comment'></div>龟紫纷如，朱丹其车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176874_comment'></div>昔之同升，泰亦众已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176874_comment'></div>胡宁若人，乃此乎止？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176874_comment'></div>旻天介寿，宜良者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176874_comment'></div>良者弗寿，谓旻天何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176874_comment'></div>亲发堕颠，子发犹羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176874_comment'></div>帷堂一恸，谁者无悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176874_comment'></div>令龟得日，棺还无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176874_comment'></div>铭旌悠悠，羽翣南首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176874_comment'></div>惟君之旧，惟僚及友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176874_comment'></div>徘徊路旁，涕落奠觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176874_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　本年冬，得曾巩寄诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年2月</a>　作诗和王介。作品：《和中甫兄春日有感》<div id='poem_70498' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70498' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70498?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>中甫兄春日有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70498")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70498_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_70498_0'>① 张本和上有次韵二字</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70498'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70498'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70498", 70498, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>雪释</span>沙轻马蹄疾，北城可游今暇日。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70498'>溅溅溪谷水乱流，漠漠郊原草争出。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70498'>娇梅过雨吹烂熳，幽鸟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70498", 70498, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>迎阳</span>语啾唧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70498'>分香欲满锦树园，剪䌽休开宝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70498", 70498, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>刀室</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70498'>胡为我辈坐自苦，不念兹时去如失。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70498'>饱闻高径动车轮，甘卧空堂守经帙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70498'>淮蝗蔽天农久饿，越卒围城盗少逸。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70498'>至尊深拱罢箫韶，元老相看进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_70498", 70498, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>刀笔</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70498'>春<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作盲）</span>风生物尚有意，壮士忧民岂无术。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70498'>不成欢醉但悲歌，回首功名古难必。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70498'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_70498_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年4月</a>　四月，撰赋。作品：《首善自京师赋》<div id='poem_1175416' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1175416' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1175416?labeling=true' target='_blank'>首善自京师赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇劝儒学，为天下始。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1175416")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1175416_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1175416'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1175416'>王化下究，人文内崇，繄京师首善之教，自太学亲民之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1175416_comment'></div>闿承师论道之基，先繇毂下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1175416_comment'></div>广成俗化民之谊，甫暨寰中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1175416_comment'></div>古之圣人，君有天下，治远于近，制众以寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1175416_comment'></div>不用文何以修饰政教，非设校何以崇明儒雅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1175416_comment'></div>乃建左学，率先诸夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1175416_comment'></div>在郊立制，系一人之本焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1175416_comment'></div>养士兴仁，形四方之风也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1175416_comment'></div>本仁祖义，取材歛贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1175416_comment'></div>讲制量于中土，鬯声明于普天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1175416_comment'></div>始于邦家，用广师儒之众；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1175416_comment'></div>行乎乡党，斯为庠序之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1175416_comment'></div>是何拳拳诸生，亹亹先觉，所传者道德仁义，所肄者诗书礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1175416_comment'></div>以言乎功，则万世用乂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1175416_comment'></div>以言乎化，则八纮匪邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1175416_comment'></div>其流及于三代，率以明伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1175416_comment'></div>此理达于诸侯，谁其废学！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1175416_comment'></div>故曰校官者庶俗之原本，京邑者群方之表仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1175416_comment'></div>养原于上，则庶俗流被；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1175416_comment'></div>设表于内，则群方景随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1175416_comment'></div>惟时于变，繄上之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1175416_comment'></div>三王四代惟其师，使人知化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1175416_comment'></div>兆姓黎民辑于下，自我兴基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1175416_comment'></div>向若俗败堤防，朝堕统纪，教化之宫衰落，礼义之官废弛，乡风者无以劝于善，肄业者不能官其始，则抚封之主，毁乡校者有之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1175416_comment'></div>承学之民，在城阙者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1175416_comment'></div>必也启胄子之秘宇，据神邦之奥区，宪先王而讲道，风下国以恢儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1175416_comment'></div>邑翼翼以宅中，契商人之咏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1175416_comment'></div>士彬彬而蒙化，参汉室之谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1175416_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1175416_comment'></div>孝武，逸王也，而有兴置之谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1175416_comment'></div>公孙，具臣也，而有将明之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1175416_comment'></div>矧睿明之主绍起，俊乂之僚并建，宜乎隆儒馆以视方来，使元元之敦劝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1175416_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年5月</a>　五月，曾巩上书蔡襄力荐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　曾巩上书欧阳修相荐，并献所为文一编。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　过扬州浮屠慧礼龙兴佛舍，许之撰院记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　在扬州撰文。作品：《性说》<div id='poem_1176639' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176639' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176639?labeling=true' target='_blank'>性说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176639")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176639_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176639'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176639'>孔子曰：「性相近也，习相远也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176639_comment'></div>吾是以与孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176639_comment'></div>韩子之言性也，吾不有取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176639_comment'></div>然则孔子所谓「中人以上可以语上，中人以下不可以语上，惟上智与下愚不移」，何说也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176639_comment'></div>曰：习于善而已矣，所谓上智者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176639_comment'></div>习于恶而已矣，所谓下愚者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176639_comment'></div>一习于善，一习于恶，所谓中人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176639_comment'></div>上智也、下愚也、中人也，其卒也命之而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176639_comment'></div>有人于此，未始为不善也，谓之上智可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176639_comment'></div>其卒也去而为不善，然后谓之中人可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176639_comment'></div>有人于此，未始为善也，谓之下愚可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176639_comment'></div>其卒也去而为善，然后谓之中人可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176639_comment'></div>惟其不移，然后谓之上智；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176639_comment'></div>惟其不移，然后谓之下愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176639_comment'></div>皆于其卒也命之，夫非生而不可移也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176639_comment'></div>且韩子之言弗顾矣，曰：「性之品三，而其所以为性五」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176639_comment'></div>夫仁、义、礼、智、信，孰而可谓不善也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176639_comment'></div>又曰：「上焉者之于五，主于一而行之四；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176639_comment'></div>下焉者之于五，反于一而悖于四」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176639_comment'></div>是其于性也，不一失焉，而后谓之上焉者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176639_comment'></div>不一得焉，而后谓之下焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176639_comment'></div>是果性善，而不善者，习也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176639_comment'></div>然则尧之朱、舜之均，瞽瞍之舜、鲧之禹，后稷、越椒、叔鱼之事，后所引者，皆不可信邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176639_comment'></div>曰：尧之朱、舜之均，固吾所谓习于恶而已者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176639_comment'></div>瞽瞍之舜、鲧之禹，固吾所谓习于善而已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176639_comment'></div>后稷之诗以异云，而吾之所论者常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176639_comment'></div>《诗》之言，至以为人子而无父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176639_comment'></div>人子而无父，犹可以推其质常乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176639_comment'></div>夫言性，亦常而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176639_comment'></div>无以常乎，则狂者蹈火而入河，亦可以为性也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176639_comment'></div>越椒、叔鱼之事，徒闻之左丘明，丘明固不可信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176639_comment'></div>以言取人，孔子失之宰我；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176639_comment'></div>以貌，失之子羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176639_comment'></div>此两人者，其成人也，孔子朝夕与之居，以言貌取之而失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176639_comment'></div>彼其始生也，妇人者以声与貌定，而卒得之，妇人者独有过孔子者邪？</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1176639_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　再上书田況。作品：《上田正言书二》<div id='poem_1176371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上田正言书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176371")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176371'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176371'>某闻公卿大夫，才名与宠兼盛于世，必有大功以宜之，否则君子撝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176371_comment'></div>执事姿略<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>颖然</span>出常士之表，应进士中甲科，举方正为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176371_comment'></div>将朝车通举刺史事，又陈善策，得玺书召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176371_comment'></div>名与宠不已兼盛于世邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176371_comment'></div>所未较著者功尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176371_comment'></div>本朝太祖武靖天下，真宗以文持之，今上接祖宗之成，兵不释翳者盖数十年，近世无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176371_comment'></div>所当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>设张</span>之具，犹若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>阙然</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176371_comment'></div>重以羌酋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>梗边</span>，主上方览众策以济之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176371_comment'></div>天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>举首戴目</span>，属心执事者难以一二计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176371_comment'></div>为执事议者曰：「朝廷藉不吾以，宜且自赞以植<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>显效</span>，酬天下属己之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176371_comment'></div>矧上惓惓然命之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176371_comment'></div>此固策大功之会也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176371_comment'></div>抑闻之：「峣峣者易缺，皦皦者易污」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176371_comment'></div>执事才名与宠，可谓易污、易缺者，必若策大功，适足宜之而已，可无茂邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176371_comment'></div>恭惟旦暮辅佐天子秉国事，修所当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>设张</span>之具，复边人于安，称主上所以命之之意，使天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>举首戴目</span>者，盈其愿而退，则后世之书，可胜传哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176371_comment'></div>董仲舒有是才名，顾不获此宠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176371_comment'></div>公孙季有此宠，不成此功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176371_comment'></div>有此宠而成此功者，宜在执事，不宜在它。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176371_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>草鄙</span>之人，不达<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>大谊</span>，辱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1176371", 1176371, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>奖训</span>之厚，敢不尽愚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　在扬州作诗送别丁廓归汝阴。作品：《送丁廓秀才归汝阴二首》<div id='poem_69508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69508' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69508?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送丁廓秀才归汝阴<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作阳）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69508")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69508_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69508'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69508'>风驶柳条乾，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_69508", 69508, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>驼裘</span>未胜寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69508'>慇勤陌上日，为客暖征鞍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69508'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69508_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年12月</a>　王逵移知扬州，与之相处颇洽。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　是年，子雱生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在扬州刻苦攻读，通宵达旦。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　数以古义争公事，议论多与韩琦不合。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　是年夏，由校书郎转大理评事，与韩琦、王珪等共赏扬州芍药，蔚为盛事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　遇陈升之，深器之，有序相送。作品：《送陈升之序》<div id='poem_1176568' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176568' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176568?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈升之序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176568")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176568_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176568'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176568'>今世所谓良大夫者有之矣，皆曰是宜任大臣之事者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176568_comment'></div>作而任大臣之事，则上下一失望，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176568_comment'></div>人之材有小大，而志有远近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176568_comment'></div>彼其任者小而责之近，则煦煦然仁，而有馀于仁矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176568_comment'></div>孑孑然义，而有馀于义矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176568_comment'></div>人见其仁义而馀也，则曰是其任者小而责之近，大任将有大此者然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176568_comment'></div>上下俟之云尔，然后作而任大臣之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176568_comment'></div>作而任大臣之事，宜有大此者焉，然则煦煦然而已矣，孑孑然而已矣，故上下一失望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176568_comment'></div>岂惟失望哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176568_comment'></div>后日诚有堪大臣之事，其名实烝然于上，上必惩前日之所俟而逆疑焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176568_comment'></div>暴于下，下必惩前日之所俟而逆疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176568_comment'></div>上下交疑，诚有堪大臣之事者而莫之或任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176568_comment'></div>幸欲任，则左右小人得引前日之所俟惩之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176568_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176568_comment'></div>圣人谓知人难，君子恶名之溢于实，为此则奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176568_comment'></div>亦精之而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176568_comment'></div>恶之则奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176568_comment'></div>亦充之而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176568_comment'></div>知难而不能精之，恶之而不能充之，其亦殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176568_comment'></div>予在扬州，朝之人过焉者，多堪大臣之事，可信而望者，陈升之而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176568_comment'></div>今去官于宿州，予不知复几何时乃一见之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176568_comment'></div>予知升之作而任大臣之事，固有时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176568_comment'></div>煦煦然仁而已矣，孑孑然义而已矣，非予所以望于升之也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1176568_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　是年秋，曾巩寄诗。答之，为其受诬鳴不平，并相约会于扬州。作品：《答曾子固南丰道中所寄》<div id='poem_70744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答曾子固南丰道中所寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70744")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70744'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70744'>吾子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_70744", 70744, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>命世</span>豪，术学穷无閒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70744'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70744", 70744, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>直意</span>慕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>圣人，不问闵与颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70744'>彼昏何为者，诬构来㘖㘖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70744'>应逮犯秋阳，动为人所叹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70744'>不恤我躬瘁，乃嗟天泽悭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70744'>令人念公卿，烨烨趋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70744", 70744, id='poem_sentence_6_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70744'>爱子所守卓，忧予不能攀。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_70744", 70744, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>迎浦</span>疏潺潺。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　过扬州，因韩琦有赐，遂上先状。作品：《先状上韩太尉魏公》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年5月8日</a>　此日，韩琦自扬州徙知郓州。为琦代作谢表。作品：《代郓州韩资政谢表》<div id='poem_1176147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代郓州韩资政谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年5月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176147")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176147'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176147'>臣某言：秘殿升华，名城借重，宠灵溢分，愧惧交怀<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176147_comment'></div>窃念臣世系单平，天姿滞固，亲逢文雅之会，首玷秀廉之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176147_comment'></div>黾勉在公，优游过纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176147_comment'></div>被蒙眷与，度越等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176147_comment'></div>省寺备官，禁庭充卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176147_comment'></div>分无可采，惧抵冒于宪章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176147_comment'></div>寸有所长，使裨参于治政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176147_comment'></div>朴忠自信，智虑罕通，未尽将明之才，已干诃谪之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176147_comment'></div>至宽之度，横贷其愆，褫夫左右之联，寄以东南之屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176147_comment'></div>败财伤锦，宜有众多之讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176147_comment'></div>增秩赐金，本非平素之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176147_comment'></div>敢图上圣，复眷孤臣，就徙通班，改司善部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176147_comment'></div>惟汶阳之奥壤，乃鲁服之大邦，岂繄薄材，称是烦使？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176147_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下遇臣之道，于远不忘，烛物之明，虽微必逮，追惟踦屦之旧，特借丛云之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176147_comment'></div>切自揣循，将安报称？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176147_comment'></div>敢不激昂志尚，陈悉政经，宣布诏条之宽，绥安风俗之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176147_comment'></div>庶几一得，少补万分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176147_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176147_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='adb4676edd134c2892665be21ce3554f_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　至扬州，作文祭亡友束向。作品：《祭束向元道文》<div id='poem_1176871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176871?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭束向元道文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176871")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176871'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176871'>呜呼束君，其信然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176871_comment'></div>奚仇友朋，奚怨室家？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176871_comment'></div>堂堂去之，我始疑嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176871_comment'></div>惟昔见君，田子之自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176871_comment'></div>我欲疾走，哭诸田氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176871_comment'></div>吾縻不赴，田疾不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176871_comment'></div>今乃独哭，谁同我悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176871_comment'></div>始君求仕，士莫敢匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176871_comment'></div>洪洪其声，硕硕其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176871_comment'></div>霜落之林，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176871", 1176871, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>豪鹰</span>俊鹯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176871_comment'></div>万鸟避逃，直摩苍天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176871_comment'></div>踬焉仅仕，后愈以困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176871_comment'></div>洗藏销塞，动辄失分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176871_comment'></div>如羁骏马，以驾柴车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176871_comment'></div>侧身堕首，与蹇同刍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176871_comment'></div>命又不祥，不能中寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176871_comment'></div>百不一出，孰知其有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176871_comment'></div>能知君者，世孰予多？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176871_comment'></div>学则同游，仕则同科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176871_comment'></div>出作扬官，君实其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176871_comment'></div>倾心倒肝，迹斥形忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176871_comment'></div>君于寿食，我饮鄞水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176871_comment'></div>岂无此朋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176871_comment'></div>念不去彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176871_comment'></div>既来自东，乃临君丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176871_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1176871", 1176871, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>閟閟</span>阴宫，梗野榛荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176871_comment'></div>东门之行，不几日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176871_comment'></div>孰云于今，万世之别？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176871_comment'></div>嗟屯怨穷，闵命不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176871_comment'></div>世人皆然，君子则亡，予其何言，君尚有知！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176871_comment'></div>具此酒食，以陈我悲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1176871_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='96c50f647fe34de59b33dd6ff7b34581_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("96c50f647fe34de59b33dd6ff7b34581");'><span id='96c50f647fe34de59b33dd6ff7b34581_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>，37岁</div><div id='96c50f647fe34de59b33dd6ff7b34581' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至扬州，殇群牧判官任上所生子。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与知扬州刘敞相聚，作诗。作品：《平山堂》<div id='poem_69775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平山堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69775")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69775'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69775'>城北横冈走翠虬，一堂高视两三州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69775'>淮岑日对朱栏出，江岫云齐碧瓦浮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69775'>墟落耕桑公恺悌，杯觞谈笑客风流。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69775'>不知岘首登临处，壮观当时有此不。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69775_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69775'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>得欧阳修书，索《平山堂》诗。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='97b2d5cb9c7748068fcbf1888c944a84_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("97b2d5cb9c7748068fcbf1888c944a84");'><span id='97b2d5cb9c7748068fcbf1888c944a84_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>，38岁</div><div id='97b2d5cb9c7748068fcbf1888c944a84' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年4月</a>　四月，抵扬州。上书曾公亮辞提点江东刑狱，不获。作品：《上曾参政》<div id='poem_1176332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上曾参政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176332")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176332'>某闻古之君子立而相天下，必因其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>材力</span>之所宜，形势之所安，而役使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176332_comment'></div>故人得尽其材，而乐出乎其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176332_comment'></div>今也，某材不足以任剧，而又多病，不敢自蔽，而数以闻执事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176332_comment'></div>而阁下必欲使之察一道之吏，而寄之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>刑狱</span>之事，非所谓因其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>材力</span>之所宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176332_comment'></div>某亲老矣，有上气之疾日久，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>比年</span>加之风眩，势不可以去左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176332_comment'></div>阁下必欲使之奔走跋涉，不常乎亲之侧，非所谓因其形势之所安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176332_comment'></div>伏惟阁下由君子之道以相天下，故某得布其私焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176332_comment'></div>论者或以为事君使之左则左，使之右则右，害有至于死而不敢避，劳有至于病而不敢辞者，人臣之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176332_comment'></div>某窃以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176332_comment'></div>上之使人也，既因其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>材力</span>之所宜，形势之所安，则使之左而左，使之右而右，可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176332_comment'></div>上之使人也，不因其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1176332", 1176332, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>材力</span>之所宜，形势之所安，上将无以报吾君，下将无以慰吾亲，然且左右惟所使，则是无义无命，而茍悦之为可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176332_comment'></div>害有至于死而不敢避者，义无所避之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176332_comment'></div>劳有至于病而不敢辞者，义无所辞之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176332_comment'></div>今天下之吏，其材可以备一道之使，而无不可为之势，其志又欲得此以有为者，盖不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176332_comment'></div>则某之事，非所谓不可辞之地，而不可避之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176332_comment'></div>论者又以为人臣之事其君，与人子之事其亲，其势不可得而兼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176332_comment'></div>其材不足以任事，而势不可以去亲之左右，则致为臣而养可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176332_comment'></div>某又窃以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176332_comment'></div>古之民也有常产矣，然而事亲者犹将轻其志，重其禄，所以为养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176332_comment'></div>今也仕则有常禄，而居则无常产，而特将轻去其所以为养，非所谓为人子事亲之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176332_comment'></div>且某之材，固不足以任使矣，然尚有可任者，在吾君与吾相处之而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176332_comment'></div>固不可以去亲之左右矣，然任岂有不便于养者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176332_comment'></div>在吾君与吾相处之而已尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176332_comment'></div>然以某之贱，未尝得比于门墙之侧，而慨然以鄙朴之辞，自通于阁下之前，欲得其所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176332_comment'></div>自常人观之，宜其终龃龉而无所合也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176332_comment'></div>自君子观之，由君子之道以相天下，则宜不为远近易虑，而不以亲疏改施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176332_comment'></div>如天之无不焘，而施之各以其命之所宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176332_comment'></div>如地之无不载，而生之各以其性之所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176332_comment'></div>彼常人之心，区区好忮而自私，不恕己以及物者，岂足以量之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176332_comment'></div>伏惟阁下垂听而念焉，使天下士无复思古之君子，而乐出乎阁下之时，而又使常人之观阁下者不能量也，岂非君子所愿而乐者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176332_comment'></div>冒黩威尊，不任惶恐之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1176332_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
如皋
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e0505637727e423a84d3e909792d8a7b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e0505637727e423a84d3e909792d8a7b");'><span id='e0505637727e423a84d3e909792d8a7b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，23岁</div><div id='e0505637727e423a84d3e909792d8a7b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　以事出泰州如皋，遇陈世昌，兄事之。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
南昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1f1019665b1e4890a165ccba04df9ebb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1f1019665b1e4890a165ccba04df9ebb");'><span id='1f1019665b1e4890a165ccba04df9ebb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，23岁</div><div id='1f1019665b1e4890a165ccba04df9ebb' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>归淮南，曾巩送至洪州，黄庆基随行。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>因曾巩遗以《怀友一首寄介卿》，以诗相和。作品：《同学一首别子固》<div id='poem_1176572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176572' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176572?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同学一首别子固</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176572")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176572_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176572'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176572'>江之南有贤人焉，字子固，非今所谓贤人者，予慕而友之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176572_comment'></div>淮之南有贤人焉，字正之，非今所谓贤人者，予慕而友之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176572_comment'></div>二贤人者，足未尝相过也，口未尝相语也，辞币未尝相接也，其师若友，岂尽同哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176572_comment'></div>予考其言行，其不相似者，何其少也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176572_comment'></div>曰，学圣人而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176572_comment'></div>学圣人，则其师若友，必学圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176572_comment'></div>圣人之言行岂有二哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176572_comment'></div>其相似也适然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176572_comment'></div>予在淮南，为正之道子固，正之不予疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176572_comment'></div>还江南，为子固道正之，子固亦以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176572_comment'></div>予又知所谓贤人者既相似，又相信不疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176572_comment'></div>子固作《怀友》一首遗予，其大略欲相扳以至乎中庸而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176572_comment'></div>正之盖亦常云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176572_comment'></div>夫安驱徐行，轥中庸之庭，而造于其堂，舍二贤人者而谁哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176572_comment'></div>予昔非敢自必其有至也，亦愿从事于左右焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176572_comment'></div>辅而进之其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176572_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176572_comment'></div>官有守，私有系，会合不可以常也，作《同学》一首别子固，以相警且相慰云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176572'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷七一。又见《能改斋漫录》卷一四，《文章辨体汇选》卷七七一，《古今图书集成》文学典卷一二七，康熙《西江志》卷一七七，雍正《江西通志》卷一三六等。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176572_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
东至（东流）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='0f3c0a6d3aaf487092776fc9b10d0209_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0f3c0a6d3aaf487092776fc9b10d0209");'><span id='0f3c0a6d3aaf487092776fc9b10d0209_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，23岁</div><div id='0f3c0a6d3aaf487092776fc9b10d0209' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　还泊东流，遇许程，知李不疑溺死，撰哀辞。作品：《李通叔哀辞（并序）》<div id='poem_1176881' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176881' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176881?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李通叔哀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176881")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176881_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176881'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176881'>通叔李不疑，世为闽民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176881_comment'></div>通叔再从太学进士试，斥不送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176881_comment'></div>自京师归面其亲，道建溪，溪水暴下，反其舟，溺死，年二十八云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176881_comment'></div>初，予既孤，寄金陵，家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176881_comment'></div>从二兄入学为诸生，常感古人汲汲于友，以相镌切，以入于道德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176881_comment'></div>予材性生古人下，学又不能力，又不得友以相镌切以入于道德，予其或者归为涂之人而已邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176881_comment'></div>为此忧惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176881_comment'></div>既而遇通叔于诸生间，望其容，而色睟然类君子，即而与之言，皆君子之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176881_comment'></div>其容色在目，其言在耳，则予放心不求而归，邪气不伐而自遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176881_comment'></div>求其所为文则一本于古，华虚荡肆之学，盖未尝接于其心，诚有以开予者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176881_comment'></div>予得而友之，忧惧释然，作《太阿》诗贻之，道气类之同而合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176881_comment'></div>通叔亦作《双松》诗，道气类之同而期之久也以为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176881_comment'></div>自予之得通叔，然后知圣人户庭可业而入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176881_comment'></div>是不惟喻于其言而已，盖观其行而得焉者为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176881_comment'></div>其再斥于太学而归也，予待礼部试，留京师，别且言曰：「通叔去而归，某也不没而入于愚也其几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176881_comment'></div>明年或斥而归，或得官，皆宜在淮、江之南，某也不可以之闽，通叔来若何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176881_comment'></div>通叔曰：「是亦不疑之言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176881_comment'></div>明年从事淮南，将问且召焉，则未也，或以死状讣，既恸且疑，且幸其不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176881_comment'></div>会有江南之役，遇闽人辄问状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176881_comment'></div>还泊东流，尉许程者，闽人也，乃知讣者信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176881_comment'></div>又知陈安石者，亦溺死，安石字伯起，亦闽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176881_comment'></div>予尝问通叔素友，独言伯起云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176881_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176881_comment'></div>二子岂行殆也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176881_comment'></div>其亦命而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176881_comment'></div>予悲通叔穷以夭也，其道之不及民也，又悲天之不予相也，作哀辞：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1176881'>我思古人兮维友之求，燕处日讲兮行相为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176881_comment'></div>相翼以进兮相持以修，要归于道兮不入于尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176881_comment'></div>卒圣若贤兮其本则然，我无以是兮甚惧以忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176881_comment'></div>猗嗟吾子兮畜德挟材，杰然自如兮不群庸游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176881_comment'></div>考讲六艺兮造穷微深，匪富贵慕兮匪贱穷羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176881_comment'></div>曰予既逢兮朝夕其旁，仁义之光兮忠信之陬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176881_comment'></div>邪志荡夷兮正气独完，吾子赐我兮于安以畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176881_comment'></div>尚曰子兴兮羽仪于世，吾君德泽此兮淳漓固偷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176881_comment'></div>孰神不棐兮陨子于溪，子生适然兮欲谁仇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176881_comment'></div>所嗟存者兮志孤道辽，子之不就兮一朝而休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176881_comment'></div>死不以所兮谁得子尸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176881_comment'></div>谁襚于棺兮谁坎于丘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176881_comment'></div>予欲恸哭兮子岂有闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176881_comment'></div>子不可作兮予生之愁！</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1176881_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_7_70378'>归路借红烛，雨星低马前。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70378'></div><div id='poem_note_70378_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>以定海知县袁穆致启通问，有启答之。作品：《答定海知县启》<div id='poem_1176514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176514?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答定海知县启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176514'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176514'>窃邑海旁，得邻境上，布私书之未暇，辱重问以相先，惟知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176514", 1176514, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>感悰</span>，岂易缕指？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176514_comment'></div>未涯占对，尤积咏思，惟加自颐，良副所望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1176514_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>有启回慈溪令林肇。作品：《谢林中舍启》<div id='poem_1176509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176509' "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>乡风</span>有年，修问无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176509_comment'></div>维家伯氏，得婚高门，顾惟幸会之多，曾是趋承之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176509_comment'></div>比闻州邸，云改县章，治所相望，私诚甚喜，谓宜朝夕，可布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176509", 1176509, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>腹心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176509_comment'></div>敢图高明，见遇勤恪，先赐抚存之教，曲加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176509", 1176509, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>奖引</span>之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176509_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176509", 1176509, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>睦姻</span>之风可以厚俗，而贬损之意有如过中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176509_comment'></div>言观以思，颇恐且愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176509_comment'></div>馀暑谢去，薄寒来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176509_comment'></div>吉士所居，明神实相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176509_comment'></div>茂惟体气，怡有休祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176509_comment'></div>未即承颜，惟祈养福。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176509_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>上书于郎简。作品：《上郎侍郎书》<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>因孙沔致书，作文答之。作品：《答孙元规大资书》<div id='poem_1176396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答孙元规大资书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176396")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176396'>某不学无术，少孤以贱，材行无可道，而名声不闻于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176396_comment'></div>巨公贵人之门无可进之路，而亦不敢辄有意于求通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176396_comment'></div>以故闻阁下之名于天下之日久，而独未尝得望履舄于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176396_comment'></div>比者得邑海上，而闻左右之别业实在敝境，犹不敢因是以求闻名于从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176396_comment'></div>卒然蒙赐教督，读之茫然，不知其为愧且恐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176396_comment'></div>伏惟阁下危言谠论，流风善政，简在天子之心，而讽于士大夫之口，名声之盛，位势之尊，不宜以细故茍自贬损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176396_comment'></div>今咳唾之馀，先加于新进之小生，疑左右者之误，而非阁下之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176396_comment'></div>以是不敢即时报谢，以忤视听，以累左右，而自得不敏之诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176396_comment'></div>顾未尝一日而忘拜赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176396_comment'></div>今兹使来，又拜教之辱，然后知阁下真有意其存之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176396_comment'></div>夫礼之有施报，自敌以下不可废，况王公大人而先加礼新进之小生，而其报谢之礼缺然者久之，其为罪也大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176396_comment'></div>虽聪明宽闳，其有以容而察于此，而独区区之心，不知所以裁焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在鄞县撰文。作品：《抚州招仙观记》<div id='poem_1176693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>抚州招仙观记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176693")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176693'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176693'>招仙观在安仁郭西四十里，始作者与其岁月予不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176693_comment'></div>祥符中尝废，废四五十年，而道士全自明以医游其邑，邑之疾病者赖以治，而皆忧其去，人相与言州，出材力，因废基筑宫而留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176693_comment'></div>全与其从者一人为留，而观复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176693_comment'></div>全识予舅氏，而因舅氏以乞予书其复兴之岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176693_comment'></div>夫宫室、器械、衣服、饮食，凡所以生之具，须人而后具，而人不须吾以足，惟浮屠、道士为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176693_comment'></div>而全之为道士，人须之而不可以去也，其所以养于人也，视其党可以无愧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176693_comment'></div>予为之书，其亦可以无愧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176693_comment'></div>庆历七年七月，复兴之岁月也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176693_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在鄞县修西亭，读书其间。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在鄞县修广德湖堤。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>谒城西吴刺史庙，有诗云：“山色湖光一样清，桑麻穀粟荷君情。至今民祀年年在，莫负当年歃血盟。”<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5b564182ac3d45f987a9e51645f8dfd9_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1048')">1047-1048年</a>，27-28岁</div><div id='5b564182ac3d45f987a9e51645f8dfd9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年8月</a>　八月，所撰古文备受欧阳修青睐，有多篇收入《文林》；欧阳修谕以为文当取其自然，甚欲一见。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年9月</a>　九月，曾易占卒。作文祭之。作品：《祭曾博士易占文》<div id='poem_1176854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭曾博士易占文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176854")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176854'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176854'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176854_comment'></div>公以罪废，实以不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176854_comment'></div>卒困以夭，亦惟其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176854_comment'></div>命与才违，人实知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176854_comment'></div>名之不幸，知者为谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176854_comment'></div>公之闾里，宗亲党友，知公之名，于实无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176854_comment'></div>呜呼公初，公志如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176854_comment'></div>孰云不谐，而厄孔多？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176854_comment'></div>地大天穹，有时而毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176854_comment'></div>星日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176854", 1176854, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>脱败</span>，山倾谷圮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176854_comment'></div>人居其间，万物一偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176854_comment'></div>固有穷通，世数之然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176854_comment'></div>至其寿夭，尚何忧喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176854_comment'></div>要之百年，一蜕以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176854_comment'></div>方其生时，窘若囚拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176854_comment'></div>其死以归，混合空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176854_comment'></div>以生易死，死者不祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176854_comment'></div>唯其不见，生者之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176854_comment'></div>公今有子，能隆公后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176854_comment'></div>惟彼生者，可无甚悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176854_comment'></div>嗟理则然，其情难忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176854_comment'></div>哭泣驰辞，往侑奠觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1176854_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　因曾巩遭诬，撰文辨之。作品：《辨曾子》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　胡舜元至鄞求铭，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：《胡君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176782' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176782' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176782?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176782")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176782_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176782'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176782'>王某之治鄞三月，其故人胡舜元凶服立于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176782_comment'></div>揖入，问吊故，则丧其父五月，留而馆，意独怪其来之早也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176782_comment'></div>居数月，语吾弟曰：「吾释父之殡，跋山浮江，从子之兄于海旁，愿有谒也久矣，不敢以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176782_comment'></div>吾亲之生，我学于四方，不得所欲以养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176782_comment'></div>今已不幸卒也，得子之兄志而铭之，藏之墓中，可以显于今世以传于后，虽吾小人与荣焉，无悔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176782_comment'></div>不知子之兄可不可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176782_comment'></div>吾弟以告，予叹曰：「审如是，可以为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176782_comment'></div>君子固成人之孝，而吾与之又旧，其何顾而辞」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176782_comment'></div>即取吾所素知者为之志而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176782_comment'></div>志曰：君讳某，池之铜陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176782_comment'></div>生于丁丑，兴国之年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176782_comment'></div>卒于丁亥，是为庆历七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176782_comment'></div>子七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176782_comment'></div>某以十月葬君于谷垂山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176782_comment'></div>胡氏世大家，阖门数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176782_comment'></div>君有子舜元，独招里先生教之为士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176782_comment'></div>其卒也，族分而赀衰，舜元为善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176782_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1176782'>寿七十一，不为不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176782_comment'></div>吾与之铭，千古不磨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1176782_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年10月10日</a>　此日，上书转运使杜杞言开河事。作品：《上杜学士言开河事》<div id='poem_1176362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杜学士言开河书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年10月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176362")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176362'>十月十日，谨再拜奉书运使学士阁下：某愚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176362", 1176362, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>不更</span>事物之变，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176362", 1176362, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>备官</span>节下，以身得察于左右，事可施设，不敢因循茍简，以孤大君子推引之意，亦其职宜也，鄞之地邑，跨负江海，水有所去，故人无水忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176362_comment'></div>而深山长谷之水，四面而出，沟渠浍川，十百<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176362", 1176362, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>相通</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176362_comment'></div>长老言钱氏时置营田吏卒，岁浚治之，人无旱忧，恃以丰足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176362_comment'></div>营田之废，六七十年，吏者因循，而民力不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176362", 1176362, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>自并</span>，向之渠川，稍稍浅塞，山谷之水，转以入海而无所潴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176362_comment'></div>幸而雨泽时至，田犹不足于水，方夏历旬不雨，则众川之涸，可立而须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176362_comment'></div>故今之邑民最独畏旱，而旱辄连年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176362_comment'></div>是皆人力不至，而非岁之咎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176362_comment'></div>某为县于此，幸岁大穰，以为宜乘人之有馀，及其暇时，大浚治川渠，使有所潴，可以无不足水之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176362_comment'></div>而无老壮稚少，亦皆惩旱之数，而幸今之有馀力，闻之翕然皆劝趋之，无敢爱力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176362_comment'></div>夫小人可与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176362", 1176362, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>乐成</span>，难与虑始，诚有大利，犹将强之，况其所愿欲哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176362_comment'></div>窃以为此亦执事之所欲闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176362_comment'></div>伏惟执事聪明辨智，天下之事，悉已讲而明之矣，而又导利去害，汲汲若不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176362_comment'></div>夫此最长民之吏当致意者，故辄具以闻州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176362_comment'></div>州既具以闻执事矣，顾其厝事之详，尚不得彻，辄复条件以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176362_comment'></div>唯执事少留聪明，有所未安，教而勿诛，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176362_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月7日</a>　此日，出巡鄞县十四乡，属县民浚渠川，首至万灵乡之左界，宿慈福院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月8日</a>　此日，升鸡山，观砌工凿石。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月8日</a>　此日，又入育王山，宿广利寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月11日</a>　此日，下灵岩，浮石湫之壑，谋作斗门于海滨，宿灵岩之旌教院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月13日</a>　此日，至芦江，宿瑞岩开善院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月14日</a>　此日，游天童山，宿景德寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月16日</a>　此日，与景德寺长老瑞新游，上石望玲珑岩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月16日</a>　此日，又还食景德寺之西堂。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月16日</a>　此日，又行至东吴，具舟以西。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月17日</a>　此日，泊舟堰下，食于大梅山之保福寺庄。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月17日</a>　此日，又过五峰，夜半至小溪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月18日</a>　此日，观新渠及洪水湾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月18日</a>　此日，又还食于普宁院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月18日</a>　此日，又如林村，夜未半，至资寿院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月19日</a>　此日，劝戒桃源、清道二乡之民浚渠川。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月20日</a>　此日，归县衙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　两谒永泰王庙，为县民浚川祈晴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　林肇来访，不遇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年11月</a>　此月，上书乞告归江宁葬父。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　夏希道修繁昌县舍，建县学。应夏之请，为撰学记。作品：《繁昌县学记》<div id='poem_1176682' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176682' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176682?labeling=true' target='_blank'>繁昌县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176682")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176682_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176682'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176682'>奠先师先圣于学而无庙，古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176682_comment'></div>近世之法，庙事孔子而无学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176682_comment'></div>古者自京师至于乡邑皆有学，属其民人相与学道艺其中，而不可使不知其学之所自，于是乎有释菜、奠币之礼，所以著其不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176682_comment'></div>然则事先师先圣者，以有学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176682_comment'></div>今也无有学，而徒庙事孔子，吾不知其说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176682_comment'></div>而或者以谓孔子百世师，通天下州邑为之庙，此其所以报且尊荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176682_comment'></div>夫圣人与天地同其德，天地之大，万物无所称德，故其祀，质而已，无文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176682_comment'></div>通州邑庙事之，而可以称圣人之德乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176682_comment'></div>则古之事先圣，何为而不然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176682_comment'></div>宋因近世之法而无能改，至今天子始诏天下有州者皆得立学，奠孔子其中，如古之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176682_comment'></div>而县之学士满二百人者，亦得为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176682_comment'></div>而繁昌小邑也，其士少，不能中律，旧虽有孔子庙，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176682", 1176682, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>庳下</span>不完，又其门人之像，惟颜子一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176682_comment'></div>今夏君希道太初至，则修而作之，具为子夏、子路十人像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176682_comment'></div>而治其两庑，为生师之居，以待县之学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176682_comment'></div>以书属其故人临川王某，使记其成之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176682_comment'></div>夫离上之法，而茍欲为古之所为者，无法，流于今俗而思古者，不闻教之所以本，又义之所去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176682_comment'></div>太初是无变今之法，而不失古之实，其不可以无传也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176682_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　岁末，上书与杜杞，贺其改使河北。作品：《上杜学士书》<div id='poem_1176375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杜学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176375")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176375'>窃闻受命改使河北，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176375_comment'></div>国家东西南北，地各万里，统而维之，止十八道，道数千里，而转运使独一二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176375_comment'></div>其在部中，吏无崇卑，皆得按举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176375_comment'></div>虽将相大臣，气势烜赫，上所尊宠，文书指麾，势不得恣，一有罪过，纠诘按治，遂行不请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176375_comment'></div>政令有大施舍，常咨而后定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176375_comment'></div>生民有大利害，得以罢而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176375_comment'></div>金钱粟帛、仓庾库府、舟车漕引，凡上之人，皆须我主出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176375_comment'></div>信乎是任之重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176375_comment'></div>而河北又天下之重处，左河右山，强国之与邻，列而为藩者皆将相大臣，所屯无非天下之劲兵悍卒，以惠则恣，以威则摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176375_comment'></div>幸时无事，庙堂之上，犹北顾而不敢忽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176375_comment'></div>有事，虽天子其忧未尝不在河北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176375_comment'></div>今执事按临东南，无几何时，浙河东西十有五州之官吏士民，未尽受察，便宜当行而害之可除去者，犹未毕也，而卒然举河北以付执事，岂主上与一二股肱之臣，不惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176375", 1176375, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>付予</span>必久而后可要以效哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176375_comment'></div>且以为世之士大夫无足寄以重，独执事为能当之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176375_comment'></div>伏惟执事名行于天下，而材信于朝廷，而处之宜，必有补于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176375_comment'></div>故虽某蒙恩德最厚，一日失所依据，而释然于心，不敢恨望，唯公义之存，而忘所私焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176375_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　是年，曾巩屡寄诗篇，并托人奉书。有诗答之。作品：《寄曾子固二首》<div id='poem_70183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄曾子固</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70183")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70183'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70183'>斗粟犹惭报礼轻，敢嗟吾道独难行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70183'>脱身负米将求志，戮力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70183", 70183, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>乘田</span>岂为名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70183'>高论几为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70183", 70183, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>衰俗</span>废，壮怀难值故人倾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70183_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_70690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70690?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_70690'>吾少莫与合，爱我君为最。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70690'>君名高山岳，嵑𡾹嵩与泰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70690'>低心收憃友，似不让尘𡏖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
