id='poem_sentence_4_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70690'>我材特穷空，无用补仓廥。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70690'>谓宜从君久，垢污得洮汰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70690'>人生不可必，所愿每颠沛。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70690'>乖离五年馀，牢落千里外。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70690'>州穷吉士少，谁可婿诸妹。<div id='poem_sentence_14_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_70690'>桐江路尤驶，飞桨下鸣濑。<div id='poem_sentence_37_70690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176494_comment'></div>龙阁之富图书，密承顾问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176494_comment'></div>蜀部之风教化，遂协都俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176494_comment'></div>遽促锋车，入参鬷嘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176494_comment'></div>旋属圜虚耀狼角之色，狂寇毒清河之民，击义节以请行，先堂兵而制胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176494_comment'></div>方将图讲熙事，修举治纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176494_comment'></div>坯冶一陶，辅成于醇化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176494_comment'></div><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　代王周撰明州到任谢表。作品：《代人上明州到任表》<div id='poem_1176152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代人上明州到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176152")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176152'>臣某言：奉敕差知明州，已于某月到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176152_comment'></div>夷越故区，东南穷处，施泽之下，欢然有生，庇身于兹，坐以无事<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176152_comment'></div>臣受材素薄，推数颇奇，居有朴忠之心，进无通显之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176152_comment'></div>晚尘郎位，颇切郡章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176152_comment'></div>归待罪于省中，退得藩于海上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176152_comment'></div>自初受命，以至造官，历年两周，取道万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176152_comment'></div>备更艰阨，职臣之分使然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176152_comment'></div>卒就宴安，赖上之恩抵此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176152_comment'></div>馀年且索，旅力已愆，尚何施为，可以报称？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176152_comment'></div>于茍利国家之事，靡所不思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176152_comment'></div>及未填沟壑之时，庶几无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176152_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176152_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　奉命撰文。作品：《明州新刻漏铭》<div id='poem_1176707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明州新刻漏铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176707")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1176707_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176707'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176707'>戊子王公，始治于明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176707'>丁亥孟冬，刻漏具成。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1176707'>追谓属人，嗟汝予铭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176707'>自古在昔，挈壶有职。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1176707'>匪器则弊，人亡政息。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1176707'>其政谓何，弗棘弗迟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1176707'>君子小人，兴息维时。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1176707'>东方未明，自公召之。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176707'>彼宁不勤，得罪于时。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176707'>厥荒懈废，乃政之疵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1176707'>呜呼有州，谨哉维兹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176707'>兹惟其中，俾我后思。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1176707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1176707'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176707_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　王周会同年赋诗，作诗和之。作品：《和王司封会同年》<div id='poem_69961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69961?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王司封会同年</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69961")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69961_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69961'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69961'>收科天陛顷同时，回首相欢事亦稀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69961'>追讲旧游犀麈脱，交酬新唱彩笺飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69961'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69961", 69961, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>直须</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69961", 69961, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>倾倒</span>樽中酒，休惜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69961", 69961, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>淋浪</span>坐上衣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69961'>日暮主翁留客辖，会稽聊滞买臣归。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69961'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69961_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　因林肇修慈溪县学，贻书与杜醇，召其为诸生师。作品：《请杜醇先生入县学书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　为慈溪县学撰学记。作品：《慈溪县学记》<div id='poem_1176690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176690?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慈溪县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176690")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176690_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176690'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176690'>天下不可一日而无政教，故学不可一日而亡于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176690_comment'></div>古者井天下之田，而党庠、遂序、国学之法立乎其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176690_comment'></div>乡射饮酒、春秋合乐、养老劳农、尊贤使能、考艺选言之政，至于受成、献馘、讯囚之事，无不出于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176690_comment'></div>于此养天下智仁圣义忠和之士，以至一偏一伎、一曲之学，无所不养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176690_comment'></div>而又取士大夫之材行完洁，而其施设已尝试于位而去者，以为之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176690_comment'></div>释奠、释菜，以教不忘其学之所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176690_comment'></div>迁徙偪逐，以勉其怠而除其恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176690_comment'></div>则士朝夕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>所见所闻</span>，无非所以治天下国家之道，其服习必于仁义，而所学必皆尽其材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176690_comment'></div>一日取以备公卿大夫百执事之选，则其材行皆已素定，而士之备选者，其施设亦皆素所见闻而已，不待阅习而后能者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176690_comment'></div>古之在上者，事不虑而尽，功不为而足，其要如此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176690_comment'></div>此二帝、三王所以治天下国家而立学之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176690_comment'></div>后世无井田之法，而学亦或存或废，大抵所以治天下国家者，不复皆出于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176690_comment'></div>而学之士，群居族处，为师弟子之位者，讲章句、课文字而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176690_comment'></div>至其陵夷之久，则四方之学者，废而为庙，以祀孔子于天下，斲木抟土，如浮屠道士法，为王者象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176690_comment'></div>州县吏春秋帅其属，释奠于其堂，而学士者或不预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176690_comment'></div>盖庙之作，出于学废，而近世之法然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176690_comment'></div>今天子即位若干年，颇修法度，而革近世之不然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176690_comment'></div>当此之时，学稍稍立于天下矣，犹曰县之士满二百人，乃得立学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176690_comment'></div>于是慈溪之士不得有学，而为孔子庙如故，庙又坏不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176690_comment'></div>今刘君在中言于州，使民出钱，将修而作之，未及为而去，时庆历某年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176690_comment'></div>后林君肇至，则曰：「古之所以为学者，吾不得而见，而法者，吾不可以毋循也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176690_comment'></div>虽然，吾之人民于此，不可以无教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176690_comment'></div>即因民钱作孔子庙，如今之所云，而治其四旁为学舍，构堂其中，帅县之子弟，起先生杜君醇为之师，而兴于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176690_comment'></div>噫，林君其有道者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176690_comment'></div>夫吏者无变今之法，而不失古之实，此有道者之所能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176690_comment'></div>林君之为，其几于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176690_comment'></div>林君固贤令，而慈溪小邑，无珍产<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>淫货</span>以来四方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/92/Comments/1")'>游贩</span>之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176690_comment'></div>田桑之美，有以自足，无水旱之忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176690_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>游贩</span>之民，故其俗一而不杂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176690_comment'></div>有以自足，故人慎刑而易治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176690_comment'></div>而吾所见其邑之士，亦多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>美茂</span>之材，易成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176690_comment'></div>杜君者，越之隐君子，其学行宜为人师者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176690_comment'></div>夫以小邑得贤令，又得宜为人师者为之师，而以修醇一易治之俗，而进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1176690", 1176690, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>美茂</span>易成之材，虽拘于法、限于势，不得尽如古之所为，吾固信其教化之将行，而风俗之成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176690_comment'></div>夫教化可以美风俗，虽然，必久而后至于善，而今之吏其势不能以久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176690_comment'></div>吾虽喜且幸其将行，而又忧夫来者之不吾继也，于是本其意以告来者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1176690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176690'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷八三。又见《延祐四明志》卷一四，《四明文献考》第九○页，《文章类选》卷四，《文翰类选大成》卷一一二，《文章辨体汇选》卷五八九，天顺《宁波郡志》卷六，《古文渊鉴》卷四七，《古今图书集成》职方典卷九八二、选举典卷二一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176690_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月14日</a>　此日，鄞女夭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月15日</a>　此日，葬鄞女于崇法院西北。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　与崇法院嗣端游，为方外友，有诗题崇法院。作品：《崇法留题》<div id='poem_1101680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1101680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1101680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崇法留题</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1101680")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_1101680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1101680'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1101680'>小亭临水间修篁，郁郁馀华席地香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1101680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1101680'>惟愿时人观此境，尽将烦恼作清凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1101680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1101680'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1101680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年7月</a>　谢景初修筑余姚县海塘，为之撰记。作品：《余姚县海塘记》<div id='poem_1176685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>馀姚县海塘记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176685")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176685'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176685'>自云柯而南，至于某，有堤若千尺，截然令海水之潮汐不得冒其旁田者，知县事谢君为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176685_comment'></div>始堤之成，谢君以书属予记其成之始，曰：「使来者有考焉，得卒任完之以不隳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176685_comment'></div>谢君者，阳夏人也，字师厚，景初其名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176685_comment'></div>其先以文学称天下，而连世为贵人，至君遂以文学世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176685_comment'></div>其为县，不以材自负而忽其民之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176685_comment'></div>方作堤时，岁丁亥十一月也，能亲以身当风霜氛雾之毒，以勉民作而除其灾，又能令其民翕然皆劝趋之，而忘其役之劳，遂不踰时，以有成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176685_comment'></div>其仁民之心，效见于事如此，亦可以已，而犹自以为未也，又思有以告后之人，令嗣续而完之，以永其存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176685_comment'></div>善夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176685_comment'></div>仁人长虑却顾图民之灾，如此其至，其不可以无传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176685_comment'></div>而后之君子考其传，得其所以为，其亦不可以无思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176685_comment'></div>而异时予尝以事至馀姚，而君过予，与予从容言天下之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176685_comment'></div>君曰：「道以闳大隐密，圣人之所独鼓万物以然而皆莫如其所以然者，盖有所难知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176685_comment'></div>其治政教令施为之详，凡与人共，而尤丁宁以急者，其易知较然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176685_comment'></div>通涂川，治田桑，为之堤防沟浍渠川以御水旱之灾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176685_comment'></div>而兴学校，属其民人相与习礼乐其中，以化服之，此其尤丁宁以急，而较然易知者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176685_comment'></div>今世吏者，其愚也固不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176685_comment'></div>而其所谓能者，务出奇为声威，以惊世震俗，至或尽其力以事刀笔簿书之间而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176685_comment'></div>而反以谓古所为尤丁宁以急者，吾不暇以为，吾曾为之，而曾不足以为之，万有一人为之，且不足以名于世而见谓材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176685_comment'></div>嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176685_comment'></div>其可叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176685_comment'></div>夫为天下国家且百年，而胜残去杀之效，则犹未也，其不出于此乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176685_comment'></div>予良以其言为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176685_comment'></div>既而闻君之为其县，至则为桥于江，治学者以教养县人之子弟，既而又有堤之役，于是又信其言之行而不予欺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176685_comment'></div>已为之书其堤事，因并书其言终始而存之以告后之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176685_comment'></div>庆历八年七月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176685_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　重清鄞县东钱湖界。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　有启上知信州杨察。作品：《上信州知郡大谏启》<div id='poem_1176499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上信州知郡大谏启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176499")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176499_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176499'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176499'>怀德名之重，窃伏猷为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176499_comment'></div>仰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176499", 1176499, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>庭角</span>之姿，何尝贽见！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176499_comment'></div>敢谓玉堂之彦，时飞宝刻之音，垂贲尘容，过形<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176499", 1176499, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>谦柄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176499_comment'></div>外惟荣佩，中所铭藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176499_comment'></div>恭惟某官挺不世之资，敦绝俗之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176499_comment'></div>敷扬大业，陟降泰庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176499_comment'></div>演润銮坡，光大训辞之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176499_comment'></div>保釐天邑，具瞻表则之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176499_comment'></div>属邪正之汇连，亦劳逸之均致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176499_comment'></div>银符补郡，聊福于民艰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176499_comment'></div>鸱厅赞谋，即稽于天若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176499_comment'></div>某海滨承乏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176499", 1176499, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>宇荫</span>未趋，伏希上为本朝，精调均履。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176499_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　答韶州张殿丞以书，论历代史传之不足信。作品：《答韶州张殿丞书》<div id='poem_1176314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答韶州张殿丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176314")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176314'>某启：伏蒙再赐书，示及先君韶州之政，为吏民称诵，至今不绝，伤今之士大夫不尽知，又恐史官不能记载，以次前世良吏之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176314_comment'></div>此皆不肖之孤，言行不足信于天下，不能推扬先人之功绪馀烈，使人人得闻知之，所以夙夜愁痛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176314", 1176314, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>疚心疾首</span>而不敢息者以此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176314_comment'></div>先人之存，某尚少，不得备闻为政之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176314_comment'></div>然尝侍左右，尚能记诵教诲之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176314_comment'></div>盖先君所存，尝欲大润泽于天下，一物枯槁，以为身羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176314_comment'></div>大者既不得试，已试乃其小者耳，小者又将泯没而无传，则不肖之孤，罪大衅厚矣，尚何以自立于天地之间耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176314_comment'></div>阁下勤勤恻恻，以不传为念，非夫仁人君子乐道人之善，安能以及此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176314_comment'></div>自三代之时，国各有史，而当时之史，多世其家，往往以身死职，不负其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176314_comment'></div>盖其所传，皆可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176314", 1176314, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>考据</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176314_comment'></div>后既无诸侯之史，而近世非尊爵盛位，虽雄奇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176314", 1176314, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>俊烈</span>，道德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176314", 1176314, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>满衍</span>，不幸不为朝廷所称，辄不得见于史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176314_comment'></div>而执笔者又杂出一时之贵人，观其在廷论议之时，人人得讲其然不，尚或以忠为邪，以异为同，诛当前而不慄，讪在后而不羞，茍以餍其忿好之心而止耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176314_comment'></div>而况阴挟翰墨，以裁前人之善恶，疑可以贷褒，似可以附毁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176314", 1176314, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>往者</span>不能讼当否，生者不得论曲直，赏罚谤誉，又不施其间，以彼其私，独安能无欺于冥味之间邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176314_comment'></div>善既不尽传，而传者又不可尽信如此，唯能言之君子，有大公至正之道，名实足以信后世者，耳目所遇，一以言载之，则遂以不朽于无穷耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176314_comment'></div>伏惟阁下于先人非有一日之雅，馀论所及，无党私之嫌，茍以发潜德为己事，务推所闻，告世之能言而足信者，使得论次以传焉，则先君之不得列于史官，岂有恨哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176314_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　撰文，遣人求铭于曾巩。作品：《先大夫述》<div id='poem_1176715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先大夫述</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176715")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176715'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176715'>王氏，其先出太原，今为抚州临川人，不知始所以徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176715_comment'></div>其后有隐君子某，生某，以子故赠尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176715_comment'></div>职方生卫尉寺丞某，公考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176715_comment'></div>公讳某，始字损之，年十七，以文干张公咏，张公奇之，改字公舜良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176715_comment'></div>祥符八年，得进士第，为建安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176715_comment'></div>时尚少，县人颇易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176715_comment'></div>既数月，皆畏，翕然，令赖以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176715_comment'></div>尝疾病，阖县为祷祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176715_comment'></div>县人不时入税，州咎县，公曰：「孔目吏尚不时入税，贫民何独为邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176715_comment'></div>即与校至府门，取孔目吏以归，杖二十，与之期三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176715_comment'></div>尽期，民之税亦无不入，自将已下皆侧目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176715_comment'></div>为判官临江军，守不法，公遇事辄据争之以故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176715_comment'></div>一政吏为文书谩其上，至公辄阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176715_comment'></div>军有萧滩，号难度，以腐船度辄返，吏呼公为「判官滩」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176715_comment'></div>豪吏大姓，至相与出钱，求转运使下吏出公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176715_comment'></div>领新淦县，县大治，今三十年，吏民称说如公在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176715_comment'></div>改大理寺丞，知庐陵县，又大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176715_comment'></div>移知新繁县，改殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176715_comment'></div>到县，条宿奸数人上府，流恶处，自馀一以恩信治之，尝历岁不笞一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176715_comment'></div>知韶州，改太常博士、尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176715_comment'></div>夷越无男女之别，前守类以为俗然，即其得可已，皆弗究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176715_comment'></div>公曰：「同是人也，不可渎其伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176715_comment'></div>夫所谓因其俗者，岂谓是邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176715_comment'></div>凡有萌檗，一切擿发穷治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176715_comment'></div>时未几，男女之行于市者，不敢一涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176715_comment'></div>胡先生瑗为《政范》，亦掇公此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176715_comment'></div>部县翁源多虎，公教捕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176715_comment'></div>民言虎自毙者五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176715_comment'></div>令断虎头，舆致州，为颂以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176715_comment'></div>公麾舆者出，以颂还令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176715_comment'></div>其不喜怪，不以其道说之不说也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176715_comment'></div>蜀效忠士屯者五百人，代不到，谋叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176715_comment'></div>韶，小州，即有变，无所可枝梧，佐吏始殊恐，公不为动，独捕其首五人，即日断流之，护出之界上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176715_comment'></div>初，佐吏固争请付狱，既而闻其徒谋，若以首赴狱，当夜劫之以叛，众乃愈服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176715_comment'></div>公完营驿仓库，建坊道，随所施设有条理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176715_comment'></div>长老言自岭海服朝廷，为吾置州守未有贤公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176715_comment'></div>丁卫尉府君忧，服除，通判江宁府，阅两将，一以府倚公办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176715_comment'></div>宝元二年二月二十三日，以疾弃诸孤官下，享年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176715_comment'></div>公于忠义孝友，非勉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176715_comment'></div>宦游常奉亲行，独西川以远，又法不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176715_comment'></div>在新繁未尝剧饮酒，岁时思慕，哭殊悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176715_comment'></div>其自奉如甚啬者，异时悉所有以贷于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176715_comment'></div>治酒食，须以娱其亲，无秋毫爱也，人乃或以为奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176715_comment'></div>居未尝怒笞子弟，每置酒，从容为陈孝悌仁义之本、古今存亡治乱之所以然，甚适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176715_comment'></div>其自任以世之重也，虽人望公则亦然，卒之官不充其材以夭，呜呼，其命也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176715_comment'></div>母谢氏，以公故封永安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176715_comment'></div>娶某氏，封长寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176715_comment'></div>子男七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176715_comment'></div>女一人适张氏，处两人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176715_comment'></div>将以某月日葬其处，子某等谨撰次公事如右，以求有道而文者铭焉，以取信于后世。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1176715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　是年，知杭州蒋堂迁左谏议大夫，上启贺之。作品：《贺杭州蒋密学启》<div id='poem_1176560' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176560' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176560?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺杭州蒋密学启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176560")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176560_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176560'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176560'>右某白：近者伏审拜命徽章，升荣北省，伏维庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176560_comment'></div>窃以上大夫为内谏，汉擢忠良；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176560_comment'></div>府学士统要藩，唐称优显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176560_comment'></div>逮宋兼任，非贤不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176560_comment'></div>恭惟某官，天与粹温，岳储灵哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176560_comment'></div>夙抱经济，游天子之彤庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176560_comment'></div>首见推明，为士林之高选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176560_comment'></div>断直躬以自处，伏大节而不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176560_comment'></div>名动一朝，官历两省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176560_comment'></div>望之补外，理固非宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176560_comment'></div>阳城拜官，贺者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176560_comment'></div>上方图任，夕有召书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176560_comment'></div>某展庆未遑，抃心窃倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176560_comment'></div>顾言尘冗，将幸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176560", 1176560, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>坯陶</span>，依戴所深，翰墨难致。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176560_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　知鄞县间，得杜甫遗诗二百余篇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　秋，归江宁葬父。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='42e2c3680b784b3e9cda52ae07569d56_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("42e2c3680b784b3e9cda52ae07569d56");'><span id='42e2c3680b784b3e9cda52ae07569d56_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>，29岁</div><div id='42e2c3680b784b3e9cda52ae07569d56' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年2月28日</a>　此日，刻《善救方》于石，树之鄞县门外，令民自得。作品：《善救方后序》<div id='poem_1176582' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176582' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176582?labeling=true' target='_blank'>善救方后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176582")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176582_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176582'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176582'>孟子曰：「先王有不忍人之心，斯有不忍人之政」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176582_comment'></div>臣某伏读《善救方》而窃叹曰：「此可谓不忍人之政矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176582_comment'></div>夫君者，制命者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176582_comment'></div>推命而致之民者，臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176582_comment'></div>君臣皆不失职，而天下受其治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176582_comment'></div>方今之时，可谓有君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176582_comment'></div>生养之德通乎四海，至于蛮夷荒忽不救之病，皆思有以救而存之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176582_comment'></div>而臣等虽贱，实受命治民，不推陛下之恩泽而致之民，则恐得罪于天下而无所辞诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176582_comment'></div>谨以刻石，树之县门外左，令观赴者自得而不求有司云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176582_comment'></div>皇祐元年二月二十八日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176582_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年3月21日</a>　此日，兄安仁进士及第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　巡行鄞县，贷谷与民，立息以偿，邑人称便。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　于鄞县西亭栽花养竹。作品：《鄞县西亭》<div id='poem_69671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69671' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69671?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鄞县西亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69671")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69671_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69671'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69671'>收功无路去无田，窃食穷城度两年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69671'>更作世间儿女态，乱栽花竹养风烟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69671'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69671_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　作诗寄知剡县丁宝臣。作品：《寄丁中允》<div id='poem_70676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄丁中允<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝臣）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", id='poem_sentence_0_70676'>人生九州閒，泛泛水中木。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70676'>漂浮随风波，邂逅得相触。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70676'>始我与夫子，得官同一州。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70676'>相逢皆偶然，情义乃绸缪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70676'>我于人事疏，而子久矣<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作已）</span>修。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70676'>磨砻以成我，德大不可酬。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70676'>乖离今六年，念子未尝休。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70676'>岂不道相逢，但得顷刻留。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70676'>欢喜不满颜，长年抱离忧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70676'>古人有所思，千里驾车牛。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70676'>如何咫尺间，而不与予<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作子）</span>游。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70676'>顾惜<span "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>拘囚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70676'>念彼磊落者，心颜两惭羞。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70676'>剡山碧榛榛，剡水日夜流。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　上书转运使孙甫，劝止捕盐，作诗。作品：《收盐》<div id='poem_70386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_6_70386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　作诗寄答金山寺僧瑞新（其时，瑞新已由明州景德寺移主润州金山寺）。作品：《答瑞新十远》<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70745'>远水悠然<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　得范仲淹书，作启谢之。作品：《谢范资政启》<div id='poem_1176505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢范资政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176505")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176505'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176505'>窃陶大化，瞻若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176505", 1176505, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>重霄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176505_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176505", 1176505, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>执讯</span>隆堂，近修于常礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176505_comment'></div>占辞记室，屡致于尊光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176505_comment'></div>赐逾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176505", 1176505, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>褒衮</span>之荣，仰极高山之咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176505_comment'></div>恭想镇海都会，宣国福威，御六气之和，荐百嘉之祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176505_comment'></div>伏惟某官道宗当世，名重本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176505_comment'></div>思皇廊庙之材，均逸股肱之郡，即还大政，以泽含生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176505_comment'></div>某<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176505", 1176505, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>容迹</span>海滨，被光台照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176505_comment'></div>童乌署第，夙荷于揄扬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176505_comment'></div>立鲤联荣，复深于契眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176505_comment'></div>幸当栖庇，以处钧成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在鄞撰书答王开祖。作品：《答王景山书》<div id='poem_1176404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答王景山书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176404")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176404'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176404'>某愚不量力，而唯古人之学，求友于天下久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176404_comment'></div>闻世之文章者，辄求而不置，盖取友不敢须臾忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176404_comment'></div>其意岂止于文章耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176404_comment'></div>读其文章，庶几得其志之所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176404_comment'></div>其文是也，则又欲求其质，是则固将取以为友焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176404_comment'></div>故闻足下之名，亦欲得足下之文章以观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176404_comment'></div>不图不遗，而惠赐之，又语以见存之意，幸甚幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176404_comment'></div>书称欧阳永叔、尹师鲁、蔡君谟诸君以见比，此数公，今之所谓贤者，不可以某比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176404_comment'></div>足下又以江南士大夫为能文者，而李泰伯、曾子固豪士，某与纳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176404_comment'></div>江南士大夫良多，度足下不遍识，安知无有道与艺，闭匿不自见于世者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176404_comment'></div>特以二君概之，亦不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176404_comment'></div>况如某者，岂足道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176404_comment'></div>恐伤足下之信，而又重某之无状，不敢当而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176404_comment'></div>孔子曰：「十室之邑，必有忠信如丘者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176404_comment'></div>圣人之言如此，唯足下思之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176404_comment'></div>闻将东游，它语须面尽之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176404_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在鄞撰文。作品：《性情》《伯夷》<div id='poem_1176624' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176624' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176624?labeling=true' target='_blank'>性情</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176624")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176624_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176624'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176624'>性情一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176624_comment'></div>世有论者曰「性善情恶」，是徒识性情之名而不知性情之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176624_comment'></div>喜、怒、哀、乐、好、恶、欲未发于外而存于心，性也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176624_comment'></div>喜、怒、哀、乐、好、恶、欲发于外而见于行，情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176624_comment'></div>性者情之本，情者性之用，故吾曰性情一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176624_comment'></div>彼曰性善，无它，是尝读孟子之书，而未尝求孟子之意耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176624_comment'></div>彼曰情恶，无它，是有见于天下之以此七者而入于恶，而不知七者之出于性耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176624_comment'></div>故此七者，人生而有之，接于物而后动焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176624_comment'></div>动而当于理，则圣也、贤也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176624_comment'></div>不当于理，则小人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176624_comment'></div>彼徒有见于情之发于外者为外物之所累，而遂入于恶也，因曰情恶也，害性者情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176624_comment'></div>是曾不察于情之发于外而为外物之所感，而遂入于善者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176624_comment'></div>盖君子养性之善，故情亦善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176624_comment'></div>小人养性之恶，故情亦恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176624_comment'></div>故君子之所以为君子，莫非情也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176624_comment'></div>小人之所以为小人，莫非情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176624_comment'></div>彼论之失者，以其求性于君子，求情于小人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176624_comment'></div>自其所谓情者，莫非喜、怒、哀、乐、好、恶、欲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176624_comment'></div>舜之圣也，象喜亦喜，使舜当喜而不喜，则岂足以为舜乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176624_comment'></div>文王之圣也，王赫斯怒，使文王当怒而不怒，则岂足以为文王乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176624_comment'></div>举此二者而明之，则其馀可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176624_comment'></div>如其废情，则性虽善，何以自明哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176624_comment'></div>诚如今论者之说，无情者善，则是若木石者尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176624_comment'></div>是以知性情之相须，犹弓矢之相待而用，若夫善恶，则犹中与不中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176624_comment'></div>曰：「然则性有恶乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176624_comment'></div>曰：「孟子曰『养其大体为大人，养其小体为小人』，扬子曰『人之性善恶混』，是知性可以为恶也」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176624_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176603' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176603' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176603?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伯夷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176603")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176603_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176603'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176603'>事有出于千世之前，圣贤辩之甚详而明，然后世不深考之，因以偏见独识，遂以为说，既失其本，而学士大夫共守之不为变者，盖有之矣，伯夷是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176603_comment'></div>夫伯夷，古之论有孔子、孟子焉，以孔、孟之可信而又辩之反复不一，是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176603", 1176603, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>愈益</span>可信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176603_comment'></div>孔子曰：「不念旧恶，求仁而得仁，饿于首阳之下，逸民也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176603_comment'></div>孟子曰：「伯夷非其君不事，不立恶人之朝，避纣居北海之滨，目不视恶色，不事不肖，百世之师也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176603_comment'></div>故孔、孟皆以伯夷遭纣之恶，不念以怨，不忍事之，以求其仁，饿而避，不自降辱，以待天下之清，而号为圣人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176603_comment'></div>然则司马迁以为武王伐纣，伯夷叩马而谏，天下宗周，而耻之，义不食周粟，而为《采薇之歌》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176603_comment'></div>韩子因之，亦为之颂，以为微二子，乱臣贼子接迹于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176603_comment'></div>是大不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176603_comment'></div>夫商衰而纣以不仁残天下，天下孰不病纣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176603_comment'></div>而尤者，伯夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176603_comment'></div>尝与太公闻西伯善养老，则往归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176603_comment'></div>当是之时，欲夷纣者，二人之心岂有异邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176603_comment'></div>及武王一奋，太公相之，遂出元元于涂炭之中，伯夷乃不与，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176603_comment'></div>盖二老所谓天下之大老，行年八十馀，而春秋固已高矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176603_comment'></div>自海滨而趋文王之都，计亦数千里之远，文王之兴以至武王之世，岁亦不下十数，岂伯夷欲归西伯而志不遂，乃死于北海邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176603_comment'></div>抑来而死于道路邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176603_comment'></div>抑其至文王之都而不足以及武王之世而死邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176603_comment'></div>如是而言伯夷，其亦理有不存者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176603_comment'></div>且武王倡大义于天下，太公相而成之，而独以为非，岂伯夷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176603_comment'></div>天下之道二，仁与不仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176603_comment'></div>纣之为君，不仁也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176603_comment'></div>武王之为君，仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176603_comment'></div>伯夷固不事不仁之纣，以待仁而后出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176603_comment'></div>武王之仁焉，又不事之，则伯夷何处乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176603_comment'></div>余故曰，圣贤辩之甚明，而后世偏见独识者之失其本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176603_comment'></div>呜呼，使伯夷之不死，以及武王之时，其烈岂独太公哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176603_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在鄞作书答余京。作品：《答余京书》<div id='poem_1176403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答余京书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176403")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176403'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176403'>某行不足以配古之君子，智不足应今时之变，窃食穷县而无势于天下，非可以道德而谋功名之合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176403_comment'></div>今足下贬损手笔，告之所存，文辞博美，义又宏廓，守而充之，以卒不迁，其至可量邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176403_comment'></div>顾告之非其所，推褒之语，不以实称，类有以不敏欺足下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176403_comment'></div>孔子曰：「不患人之不己知，患己不知人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176403_comment'></div>此亦足伤足下知人之明，独愧而已，不敢当也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1176403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　苏舜元提点两浙路刑狱，与之游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　岁末，在鄞作诗，以为省兵非所先，重在择将。作品：《省兵》<div id='poem_70586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70586")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70586'>有客语省兵，兵省非所先。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70586'>方今将不择，独以兵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70586", 70586, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>乘边</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70586'>前攻已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70586", 70586, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>破散</span>，后距方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70586", 70586, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>完坚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70586'>以众亢彼寡，虽危犹幸全。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70586'>将既非其才，议又不得专。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70586'>兵少败孰继，胡来饮秦川。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70586'>万一虽不尔，省兵当何缘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70586'>不田亦不桑，衣食犹兵然。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>王功</span>所由起，古有七月篇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70586'>百官勤俭慈，劳者已息肩。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70586'>游民慕草野，岁熟不在天。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70586'>择将付以职，省兵果有年。<div id='poem_sentence_13_70586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_70586'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　撰文，谕鄞民行送死之礼。作品：《闵习》<div id='poem_1176651' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176651' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176651?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闵习</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176651")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176651_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176651'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176651'>父母死，则燔而捐之水中，其不可，明也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176651_comment'></div>禁使葬之，其无不可，亦明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176651_comment'></div>然而吏相与非之乎上，民相与怪之乎下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176651_comment'></div>盖其习之久也，则至于戕贼父母而无以为不夕，顾曰禁之不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176651_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176651_comment'></div>吾是以见先王之道难行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176651_comment'></div>先王之道不讲乎天下，而不胜乎小人之说，非一日之积也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176651_comment'></div>而小人之说，其为不可，不皆若戕贼父母之易明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176651_comment'></div>先王之道，不皆若禁使葬之之易行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176651_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176651_comment'></div>吾是以见先王之道难行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176651_comment'></div>贞观之行其庶矣，惜乎其臣有罪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176651_comment'></div>作《闵习》。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176651_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　知鄞时，尝凿岩起斗于海滨以便民，未就而去。后入踵成之，民受其利。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　知鄞时，与楼郁、王致、王该等鄞县地方士人书启往还，讨论县政。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　知鄞时，治绩斐然，获四贤、三贤之目。孙侔为文以纪之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　与陈誴、诜兄弟游，深器之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　见萧汝为题壁，以为知当世利弊，与之游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年3月</a>　三月，秩满，作启答继任张某。作品：《答交代张廷评启》<div id='poem_1176482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176482' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176482")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176482'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176482'>某受才无它，窃邑于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176482_comment'></div>更书始下，已倾自附之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176482_comment'></div>赐问抚临，重荷相存之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176482_comment'></div>维兹地所，邈在海滨，方条教之未孚，得仁贤而复治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176482_comment'></div>恭以某人天材粹美，地势高华，生逢盛时，进取显仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176482_comment'></div>分一雷之土，虽屈远图；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176482_comment'></div>抚千室之弦，坐期美政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176482_comment'></div>趋承在近，企仰居深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　至鄞女墓诀别，作诗。托崇法院灵照守墓。作品：《别鄞女》<div id='poem_69328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69328' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　上书与转运使孙甫，约于润州相见，并荐州吏汪元吉。作品：《上浙漕孙司谏荐人书》<div id='poem_1176384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上浙漕孙司谏荐人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176384'>某今日遂出城以西，度到润州必得复望履舄，故不敢造辞以慁起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176384_comment'></div>明州司法吏汪元吉者，其为吏廉平，州人无贤不肖，皆推信其行，喜近文史，而尤明吏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176384_comment'></div>有《论利害事》一编，今封献左右，伏惟暇日略赐观省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176384_comment'></div>其言有可采者，不以某之言为妄，则傥可以收备从吏役，使有仕进之望乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176384_comment'></div>盖薄恶之俗，士大夫之修行义者少矣，况身处污贱之势，而清议所不及者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176384_comment'></div>劝奖之道，亦当先录小善，务以下流之有善者为始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176384_comment'></div>今世胥史，士大夫之论议常耻及之，惟通古今而明者，当不以世之所耻而废人之为善尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1176384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　离鄞，作诗于会别亭。作品：《书会别亭》<div id='poem_70301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书会别亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70301")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70301'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70301'>西城路，居人送客西归处。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70301'>年年借问去何时，今日扁舟从此去。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
余姚

弋阳

-----title
常州（武进）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ffdf17b20ac546e2b1ccbdaab429ca1e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ffdf17b20ac546e2b1ccbdaab429ca1e");'><span id='ffdf17b20ac546e2b1ccbdaab429ca1e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>，30岁</div><div id='ffdf17b20ac546e2b1ccbdaab429ca1e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　过常州，闻前知州郭维、李余庆事迹。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b1b6741c234e425e8f6af85a8793c0c4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b1b6741c234e425e8f6af85a8793c0c4");'><span id='b1b6741c234e425e8f6af85a8793c0c4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1058')">1057-1058年</a>，37-38岁</div><div id='b1b6741c234e425e8f6af85a8793c0c4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　抵常州，视郡事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　知常州，上谢表。作品：《知常州谢上表》<div id='poem_1176145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知常州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176145")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176145'>臣某言：以贫择利，以病辞劳，此于督责之朝，皆在谴何之域<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176145_comment'></div>伏念臣比在群牧，常求外官，蒙恩朝廷，改职畿县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176145_comment'></div>未识贤劳之力，已缠悸眩之痾，区区本怀，恳恳自诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176145_comment'></div>遂蒙优诏，特与便州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176145_comment'></div>维臣之愚，所学非敏，受禄则辞贫而取富，当官则让剧而求闲，使有以临，知罪其极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176145_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下明照万物，宽惠四方，在宥而不探其可诛，因能而不责其所乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176145_comment'></div>顾虽无用于当世，尝以有闻于先臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176145_comment'></div>思报所蒙，敢忘尽瘁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176145_comment'></div>然而州郡抚循之势，患在数更；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176145_comment'></div>官司考课之方，要诸久任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176145_comment'></div>惟此弊邑，比多凶年，岁行两周，守吏八易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176145_comment'></div>当郡人烦劳之后，以臣身疲病之馀，自非少假以岁时，将必上孤于器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176145_comment'></div>所祈降鉴，姑使息肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176145_comment'></div>则断断一臣，不独免于大戾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176145_comment'></div>元元万室，傥有望于小休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176145_comment'></div>臣瞻天祷圣，无任<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176145_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1176145'>劳：原缺，据龙舒本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176145'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_1176145_0'>⑴ 《临川先生文集》卷六一。又见《王荆文公年谱》卷一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1176145_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　上中书启，乞久任。作品：《知常州上中书启》<div id='poem_1176471' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176471' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176471?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知常州上中书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176471")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176471_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176471'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176471'>将母之求，屡关于听览；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176471_comment'></div>长民之寄，终累于陶镕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176471_comment'></div>势则便安，心焉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176471", 1176471, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>震悸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176471_comment'></div>盖闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176471", 1176471, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>抱关击柝</span>，所以待士之为贫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176471_comment'></div>直镈蒙镠，所以处人之有疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176471_comment'></div>其志卑者其获少，其能薄者其任轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176471_comment'></div>自非审分以取容，则必近刑而速谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176471_comment'></div>如某者，湮沦素业，邀会时恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176471_comment'></div>备官牧人，既以贫而择利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176471_comment'></div>奉使畿县，又以疾而告劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176471_comment'></div>甚矣能薄而志卑，宜乎任轻而获少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176471_comment'></div>尚蒙优诏，猥备方州，自惟缺然，何以称此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176471_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官，上同一德，而以宽裕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176471", 1176471, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>处心</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176471_comment'></div>旁烛万情，而以平均待物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176471_comment'></div>遂令疏贱，亦至叨逾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176471_comment'></div>永惟忧国之所存，独可勤民而上副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176471_comment'></div>顾今州部，已远朝廷，田畴多荒，守将数易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176471_comment'></div>教条之约束，人无适从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176471_comment'></div>簿书之因缘，吏有以肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176471_comment'></div>惟是妄庸之旧，当兹凋瘵之馀，自非上蒙宠灵，少假岁月，则牧羊弗息，彼将何望于少休，画土复墁，此亦无逃于大谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176471_comment'></div>更期<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176471", 1176471, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>元造</span>，终赐曲成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1176471_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　上监司启。作品：《知常州上监司启》<div id='poem_1176472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知常州上监司启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176472")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176472'>蒙恩宽裕，得郡便安，诹日造官，以身受察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176472_comment'></div>窃念某鄙陋之质，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176472", 1176472, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>拙疏</span>于时，闻先子之绪馀，慕古人之名节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176472_comment'></div>黾勉仕宦，聊尽为贫之谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176472_comment'></div>茍简岁时，亦预在庭之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176472_comment'></div>来佐群牧，甫更二年，数求州符，就更畿县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176472_comment'></div>顾神明之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176472", 1176472, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>罢耗</span>，当事役之浩穰，惭非其宜，辞得所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176472_comment'></div>遂以一身之贱，猥分千里之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176472_comment'></div>荷覆露之生成，出隽贤之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176472", 1176472, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>抚按</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176472_comment'></div>窃惟幸会，良用震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176472_comment'></div>惟此陋邦，近更数守，吏卒困将迎之密，里闾苦听断之烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176472_comment'></div>自非函容，少赐优假，缓日月之效，使教条之颁，则何以上称督临，下宽彫瘵！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176472_comment'></div>伏惟某官逢亨嘉之会，奋将明之材，简在清衷，久于烦使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176472_comment'></div>体爱养元元之意，乐扶持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176472", 1176472, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>断断</span>之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176472_comment'></div>庶几始终，得出芘赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176472_comment'></div>未期望履，尤切驰情，愿顺节宣，以需<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176472", 1176472, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>褒宠</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1176472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　有启谢两浙转运使元绛。作品：《知常州谢运使元学士启》<div id='poem_1176488' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176488'>叨恩两观，备任一州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176488_comment'></div>依归之志，已结于东南；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176488_comment'></div>诇问之仪，当尘于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176488_comment'></div>某官为国<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176488", 1176488, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>玮器</span>，有时盛名，久矣践更之劳，此焉寄属之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176488_comment'></div>传节所在，神民具依，膺时维休，介福有裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176488_comment'></div>约赍上路，将前受于指令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176488_comment'></div>请祝下风，唯更加于调护。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70243'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70243'>二年羁旅越人吟，乞得东南病更侵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70243_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70243'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70243", 70243, href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　为抚州知州裴材赋拟岘台。作品：《为裴使君赋拟岘台》<div id='poem_69735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为裴使君赋拟岘台</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69735'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69735'>君作新台拟岘山，羊公千载得追<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作跻）</span>攀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69735'>歌钟殷地登临处，花木移春指顾间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
