ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　上书欧阳修。作品：《上欧阳永叔书》其三。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　有书寄呈梅尧臣，询及梅之《毛诗小传》，欲治《诗经》。梅有《得王介甫常州书》答诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　是年秋，开运河，因久雨而罢。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　再上书欧阳修。作品：《上欧阳永叔书》其四。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年10月</a>　撰苏安世墓志铭。作品：《广西转运使屯田员外郎苏君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广西转运使屯田员外郎苏君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176749")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176749'>庆历五年，河北都转运使、龙图阁直学士信都欧阳修以言事切直，为权贵人所怒，因其孤甥女子有狱，诬以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176749", 1176749, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>奸利</span>事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176749_comment'></div>天子使三司户部判官、太常博士武功苏君与中贵人杂治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176749_comment'></div>当是时，权贵人连内外诸怨恶修者，为恶言欲倾修，锐甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176749_comment'></div>天下汹汹，必修不能自脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176749_comment'></div>苏君卒白上曰：「修无罪，言者诬之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176749_comment'></div>于是权贵人大怒，诬君以不直，绌使为殿中丞、泰州监税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176749_comment'></div>然天子遂寤，言者不得意，而修等皆无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176749_comment'></div>苏君以此名闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176749_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176749_comment'></div>以忠为不忠，而诛不当于有罪，人主之大戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176749_comment'></div>然古之陷此者相随属，以有左右之谗，而无如苏君之救，是以卒至于败亡而不寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176749_comment'></div>然则苏君一动，其功于天下，岂小也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176749_comment'></div>苏君既出逐，权贵人更用事，凡五年之间再赦而君六徙，东西南北，水陆奔走辄万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176749_comment'></div>其心恬然，无有怨悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176749_comment'></div>遇事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176749", 1176749, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>强果</span>，未尝少屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176749_comment'></div>盖孔子所谓刚者，殆苏君乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176749_comment'></div>苏君之仁与智，又有足称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176749_comment'></div>尝通判陕府，当葛怀敏之败，边告急，枢密使使取道路戍还之卒，再戍仪、渭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176749_comment'></div>于是延州还者千人，至陕，闻再戍，大恐，即欢聚谋为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176749_comment'></div>吏白闭城，城中无一人敢出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176749_comment'></div>君徐以一骑出卒间，谕慰止之，而以便宜还使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176749_comment'></div>戍卒喜曰：「微苏君，吾不得生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176749_comment'></div>陕人亦曰：「微苏君，吾其掠死矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176749_comment'></div>有令刺陕西之民以为兵，敢亡者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176749_comment'></div>既而亡者得，有司治之以死，君辄纵去，而言上曰：「令民以死者，为事不集也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176749_comment'></div>事集矣，亡者犹不赦，恐其众相率而为盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176749_comment'></div>惟朝廷幸哀怜愚民，使得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176749", 1176749, "Clauses/79/Comments/1")'>自反</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176749_comment'></div>天子以君言为然，而三十州之亡者皆不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176749_comment'></div>其后知坊州，州税赋之无归者，里正代为之输，岁弊大家数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176749_comment'></div>君悉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1176749", 1176749, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>钩治</span>，使归其主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176749_comment'></div>坊人不忧为里正，自苏君始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176749_comment'></div>苏君讳安世，字梦得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176749_comment'></div>其先武功人，后徙蜀，蜀亡，归家于京师，今开封人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176749_comment'></div>曾大考讳进之，率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176749_comment'></div>大考讳继，殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176749_comment'></div>考讳咸熙，赠都官郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176749_comment'></div>君以进士起家三十二年，其卒年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176749_comment'></div>为广西转运使，而官止于尚书屯田员外郎者，以君十五年不求磨勘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176749_comment'></div>君娶南阳郭氏，又娶清河张氏，为清河县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176749_comment'></div>子台文，永州推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176749_comment'></div>祥文，太庙斋郎，炳文，试将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176749_comment'></div>彦文，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176749_comment'></div>女子五人，适进士会稽江崧、单州鱼台县尉江山赵扬，三人尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176749_comment'></div>君既卒之三年，嘉祐二年十月庚午，其子葬君扬州之江都东兴宁乡马坊村，而太常博士、知常州军州事临川王某为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1176749'>皇有四极，周绥以福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176749_comment'></div>使维苏君，奠我南服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176749_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1176749", 1176749, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>亢亢</span>苏君，不圜其方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176749_comment'></div>不晦其明，君子之刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176749_comment'></div>其枉在人，我得吾直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176749_comment'></div>谁怼谁愠，祗天之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176749_comment'></div>日月有丘，其下冥冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176749_comment'></div>昭君无穷，安石之铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1176749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年11月</a>　十一月，马遵卒。作文祭之，并为撰墓志铭。作品：《祭马龙图文》<div id='poem_1176853' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176853' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176853?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭马龙图文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176853")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176853_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176853'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176853'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176853_comment'></div>余托业于进士，熟君名于垂髫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176853_comment'></div>既备官于淮南，习为县之风谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176853_comment'></div>以幕府而西游，依国门之嶕峣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176853_comment'></div>始逢君之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176853", 1176853, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>执靮</span>，屡顾我而回镳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176853_comment'></div>逮扬子之既见，方皖城之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176853", 1176853, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>穷漂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176853_comment'></div>遂有通家之好，终无挟长之骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176853_comment'></div>君言事以北出，予罢官而南侨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176853_comment'></div>一江亭之邂逅，话宿昔以终宵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176853_comment'></div>以牧官之在列，当御史之还朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176853_comment'></div>又追随于暇日，心所好而忘遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176853_comment'></div>距乖隔之几何，忽水浅而风飘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176853_comment'></div>画半涂于万里，弃馀日于一朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176853_comment'></div>维知君之日久，信智迈而才超。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176853_comment'></div>考前人之治乱，讲后世之昏昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176853_comment'></div>释众言之牴牾，排异学之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176853", 1176853, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>倾摇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176853_comment'></div>众相纷以异绪，君独悟而同条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176853_comment'></div>嗟墁人之已矣，斤欲奋而谁要？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176853_comment'></div>望丹舟而陨涕，具樽酒以来浇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176853_comment'></div>想明灵之犹在，冀薄礼之能招。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1176853_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　十一月，马遵卒。并为撰墓志铭。作品：《兵部员外郎马君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176777' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176777' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176777?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部员外郎马君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176777")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176777'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176777'>马君讳遵，字仲涂，世家饶州之乐平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176777_comment'></div>举进士，自礼部至于廷，书其等皆第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176777_comment'></div>守秘书省校书郎，知洪州之奉新县，移知康州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176777_comment'></div>当是时，天子更置大臣，欲有所为，求才能之士，以察诸路，而君自大理寺丞除太子中允、福建路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176777_comment'></div>以忧不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176777_comment'></div>忧除，知开封县，为江淮荆湖两浙制置发运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176777_comment'></div>于是君为太常博士，朝廷方尊宠其使事，以监六路，乃以君为监察御史，又以为殿中侍御史，遂为副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176777_comment'></div>已而还之台，以为言事御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176777_comment'></div>至则弹宰相之为不法者，宰相用此罢，而君亦以此出知宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176777_comment'></div>至宣州一日，移京东路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176777_comment'></div>又还台为右司谏、知谏院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176777_comment'></div>又为尚书礼部员外郎兼侍御史知杂事、同判流内铨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176777_comment'></div>数言时政，多听用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176777_comment'></div>始君读书，即以文辞辩丽称天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176777_comment'></div>及出仕，所至号为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176777", 1176777, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>辨治</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176777_comment'></div>论议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1176777", 1176777, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>条鬯</span>，人反覆之而不能穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176777_comment'></div>平居颓然，若与人无所谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176777_comment'></div>及遇事有所建，则必得其所守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176777_comment'></div>开封常以权豪请托不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176777_comment'></div>客至，有所请，君辄善遇之，无所拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176777_comment'></div>客退，视其事，一断以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176777_comment'></div>居久之，人知君之不可以私属也，县遂无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176777_comment'></div>及为谏官、御史，又能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176777_comment'></div>于是士大夫叹曰：「马君之智，盖能时其柔刚以有为也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176777_comment'></div>嘉祐二年，君以疾求罢职以出，至五六，乃以为尚书吏部员外郎、直龙图阁，犹不许其出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176777_comment'></div>某月某甲子君卒，年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176777_comment'></div>天子以其子某官某为某官，又官其兄子持国某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176777_comment'></div>夫人某县君郑氏，以某年某月某甲子葬君信州之弋阳县归仁乡里沙之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176777_comment'></div>君故与予善，予常爱其智略，以为今士大夫多不能如，惜其不得尽用，亦其不幸早世，不终于贵富也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176777_comment'></div>然世方惩尚贤任智之弊，而操成法以一天下之士，则君虽寿考且终于贵富，其所畜亦岂能尽用哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176777_comment'></div>呜呼，可悲也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176777_comment'></div>既葬，夫人与其家人谋，而使持国来以请曰：「愿有纪也，使君为死而不朽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176777_comment'></div>乃为之论次，而系之以辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1176777'>归以才能兮，又予以时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176777_comment'></div>投之远涂兮，使骤而驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176777_comment'></div>前无御者兮，后有推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176777_comment'></div>忽税不驾兮，其然奚为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176777_comment'></div>哀哀茕妇兮，孰慰其思？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176777_comment'></div>墓门有石兮，书以余辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1176777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　仲冬，王令至常州修学，有书致舅氏吴蕡，为令求亲。作品：《与吴司录议王逢原姻事书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年12月</a>　十二月，撰沈遵之母墓志铭。作品：《仙居县太君魏氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仙居县太君魏氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176826")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176826_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176826'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176826'>临川王某曰：俗之坏久矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176826_comment'></div>自学士大夫多不能终其节，况女子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176826_comment'></div>当是时，仙居县太君魏氏抱数岁之孤，专屋而闲居，躬为桑麻，以取衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176826_comment'></div>穷苦困阨久矣，而无变志，卒就其子，以能有家，受封于朝，而为里贤母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176826_comment'></div>呜呼，其可铭也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176826_comment'></div>于其葬，为序而铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176826_comment'></div>序曰：魏氏其先江宁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176826_comment'></div>太君之曾祖讳某，光禄寺卿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176826_comment'></div>祖讳某，池州刺史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176826_comment'></div>考讳某，太子谕德，皆江南李氏时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176826_comment'></div>李氏国除，而谕德易名居中，退居于常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176826_comment'></div>以太君为贤，而选所嫁，得江阴沈君讳某，曰：「此可以与吾女矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176826_comment'></div>于是时，太君年十九，归沈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176826_comment'></div>归十年，生两子，而沈君以进士甲科为广德军判官以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176826_comment'></div>太君亲以《诗》、《论语》、《孝经》教两子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176826_comment'></div>两子就外学时数岁耳，则已能诵此三经矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176826_comment'></div>其后，子迥为进士，子遵为殿中丞、知连州军州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176826_comment'></div>而太君年六十有四以终于州之正寝，时皇祐二年六月庚辰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176826_comment'></div>嘉祐二年十二月庚申，两子葬太君江阴申港之西怀仁里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176826_comment'></div>于是遵为太常博士、通判建州军州事，而沈君赠官至太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176826_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1176826'>山朝于跻，其下惟谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176826_comment'></div>缵我博士，夫人之淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176826_comment'></div>其淑维何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176826_comment'></div>博士其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176826_comment'></div>二子翼翼，萼跗其华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176826_comment'></div>诜诜诸孙，其实其葩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176826_comment'></div>孰云其昌，其始萌芽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176826_comment'></div>皇有显报，曰维在后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176826_comment'></div>硕大蕃衍，刲牲以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176826_comment'></div>视铭考施，夫人之效。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1176826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　是年，于常州精研《周易》，草创《易解》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　识张诜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　撰虞肃墓志铭。作品：《屯田员外郎致仕虞君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176844?labeling=true' target='_blank'>屯田员外郎致仕虞君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176844")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176844_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176844'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176844'>祥符八年，真宗笫进士于廷，先人与上饶虞君俱在其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176844_comment'></div>其后庆历二年、皇祐元年，虞君之诸子相继以进士起，而先人之孤亦在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176844_comment'></div>故安石尝与虞君之诸子游，而诸子称君之所为甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176844_comment'></div>君廉于进取，宽厚长者，人可欺以其方，而君未尝辄欺人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176844_comment'></div>自为进士时，能以文学知名于乡里，三为举首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176844_comment'></div>尝献其所为书于天子，天子以为能，欲特召试，而以君方试于有司，乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176844_comment'></div>及君起家为建州司理参军、福州观察推官，转运使奏君监福州之宝积银场，君为创法而银大溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176844_comment'></div>岁终当迁，有司使人喻君求赂，君谢不与，曰：「与其以赂迁，吾宁困以终身也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176844_comment'></div>终以此不得迁，而复为军事判官郴州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176844_comment'></div>州尝失入人罪，吏方被劾，而有赦除其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176844_comment'></div>君初在告，不与断其狱而与奏其按也，刑部遂书君为失入，坐是坎𡒄不得意，以至于老，而君初未尝自讼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176844_comment'></div>自郴州归，而为邵州防御判官，又为杭州节度推官，又为台州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176844_comment'></div>所至辄以治行为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176844", 1176844, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>在势</span>者所称，章交于朝廷，而天子终以其尝失入不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176844_comment'></div>已而右谏议大夫李宥特荐之，召赴京师，又不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176844_comment'></div>流内铨以为言，乃以君知明州之慈溪县，县得君以无事，而君日与处士讲学赋诗饮酒，恬如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176844_comment'></div>淮南转运使吴遵路、两浙转运使段少连、叶清臣皆一时名人，交荐君以为材，而朝廷又以君为台州军事判官，不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176844_comment'></div>及李元昊反，近边皆骚动，有诏举能吏可以为河北、河东、陕西诸县者，于是君始得迁，为太子中允、知河中府猗氏县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176844_comment'></div>今并州故相国庞公经略陕西，欲辟公为其判官，君不肯就而辞以老，庞公贤其意，亦不彊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176844_comment'></div>后迁太常丞、知越州山阴县，太常博士、尚书屯田员外郎、通判滁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176844_comment'></div>间从容语诸子曰：「吾尝游宜兴，甚爱其山水，儿为我筑室荆溪上，吾且休于此矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176844_comment'></div>时皇祐二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176844_comment'></div>明年，遂致仕，诸子为筑室荆溪上，如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176844_comment'></div>以至和三年七月戊戌卒，享年八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176844_comment'></div>君既不急于仕进，亦未尝问家人生产，士友多哀君困厄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176844_comment'></div>及其老，诸子皆孝友，能致其力以养，而多以文学称于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176844_comment'></div>其长子太微为润州司理参军，次太宁为和州防御推官，太熙为苏州吴江县尉，太冲为通州静海县主簿，太蒙为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176844_comment'></div>女子五人，皆嫁为士大夫妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176844_comment'></div>诸孙男女凡十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176844_comment'></div>内外诜诜，人不以公初不得意为可怜，而顾以其后子孙慈良众多为可愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176844_comment'></div>君讳肃，字元卿，其先自会稽遭乱避徙江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176844_comment'></div>曾大父讳瞻，大父讳瞻，当李氏时，为李氏将兵上饶以拒闽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176844_comment'></div>兵罢，因留家之不去，故至今为上饶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176844_comment'></div>父讳戬，博学善属文，尝求进士第不得，遂止不复言仕，以君故，赠殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176844_comment'></div>君子以嘉祐二年某月日葬君常州宜兴县永定乡某山，而以夫人福昌县君周氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176844_comment'></div>夫人有贤行，君所以得毋恤其家，亦以其夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176844_comment'></div>将葬，君子使来告曰：「宜铭吾先人莫如子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176844_comment'></div>于是为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1176844'>蹈污而陵巇，又左右以窥，以侥其私，人趋为之，而公谢不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176844_comment'></div>秀发而豪眉，子孙颀颀，以荣其归，维帝之诒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1176844_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　撰王乙墓志铭。作品：《右领军卫将军致仕王君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右领军卫将军致仕王君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176803")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176803'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176803'>君王氏，讳乙，字次公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176803_comment'></div>其望在太原，而实家大名之元城，不知其始所以徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176803_comment'></div>曾祖讳安，当周世宗时，为閤门通事舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176803_comment'></div>祖讳廷温，开宝中泰宁军节度副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176803_comment'></div>考讳奉諲，右班殿直、赠左武卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176803_comment'></div>君尝举进士不中，因献其所藏书秘阁，而上书言：「先臣某逮许王，于先皇帝有一日之幸，臣实其子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176803_comment'></div>天子下其问验，以为三班借职，累迁至内殿崇班、閤门祗候、淮南东路都巡检使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176803_comment'></div>皇祐二年，年七十三，以右领军卫将军致仕，卒于海州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176803_comment'></div>而以嘉祐二年，葬真州之扬子县某乡某原，以后夫人刘氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176803_comment'></div>于是，先夫人林氏既葬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176803_comment'></div>君强记博闻，刚毅而聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176803_comment'></div>好读书，虽老矣，读书未尝少止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176803_comment'></div>于穷人贱士，茍义所在，乐与之为胶漆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176803_comment'></div>一欲以不直加我，虽严贵人，义终不为受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176803_comment'></div>数上书言事，皆中世病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176803_comment'></div>而用事者多不听，听者两言耳，又事之小者，然当时蒙其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176803_comment'></div>言楚州可去堰为闸，岁省卒二十一万七千人，钱一百三十万，米六万八千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176803_comment'></div>又言河阴可以茶、盐募入谷，而漕之河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176803_comment'></div>为十说以排三司之难，三司不能绌其一，此当时蒙其利者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176803_comment'></div>宋兴百年，大定于太宗，至真宗，内外富矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176803_comment'></div>内外自是遂务以无为养息天下，朝廷所尚贤良进士，而将相大臣之世用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176803_comment'></div>君方慨然怀古人趋赴功业之意，欲起贫贱，不势左右，而以其辩智当人主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176803_comment'></div>众圆独方，用非其时，卒以不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176803_comment'></div>呜呼，甚可悲也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176803_comment'></div>然天下不肖多畏恶君，以其伉直，而幸其龃龉不得意以老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176803_comment'></div>独贤者哀之耳！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176803_comment'></div>君子越石，秦州观察判官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176803_comment'></div>其次子仁杰，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176803_comment'></div>女二人，嫁进士林度、陈州项城主簿宋造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176803_comment'></div>余尝为君僚，而与其子越石同年进士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176803_comment'></div>铭其葬曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1176803'>强能吾羸，吾与之为抗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176803_comment'></div>羸者惴惴，吾与之为让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176803_comment'></div>卒羸于强，以窒于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176803_comment'></div>维其心之享，以实其声也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1176803_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　同年张某卒，为撰墓志铭。作品：《秘书丞张君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书丞张君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176751")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176751'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176751'>君讳某，字某，其先成都之新繁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176751_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176751_comment'></div>祖讳某，太宗时以高赀徙内地，除三班奉职，非其好也，即辞去，不仕，始家真州之扬子而葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176751_comment'></div>皇考讳某，起进士，终登州军事判官，赠太常博士，生三子，而君长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176751_comment'></div>君宽和厚重，友爱诸弟甚笃，待朋友以信，而乐弃财物以宽人之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176751_comment'></div>年七岁，日诵书数百言，操笔为篇章立就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176751_comment'></div>及壮，举进士开封第一，遂以释褐，为宣州宁国县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176751_comment'></div>会南陵无令，州以君行令事，有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176751_comment'></div>用举者令颍州之沈丘县，转著作佐郎，知江宁府上元县事，又皆有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176751_comment'></div>移知英州，迁秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176751_comment'></div>以嘉祐二年十二月某甲子卒于州寝，是时君年四十七，天子官其一子师轲太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176751_comment'></div>君之疾病也，州人相与为君奔走请命，至有欲以身代者，盖其得人心如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176751_comment'></div>夫人河南县君丹阳吴氏，生三男子，长即师轲，次某，次某，皆尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176751_comment'></div>五女，皆未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176751_comment'></div>某年某月某甲子，葬君某州之某县某乡某所之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176751_comment'></div>余与君相好，又同年进士也，故与为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1176751'>呜呼张公兮韡矣其光，其先蜀产兮后葬于扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176751_comment'></div>视瞻先人兮兆此新茔，深泉高壤兮万世之藏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　作诗次韵弟常州官舍应客。作品：《次韵舍弟常州官舍应客》<div id='poem_69849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵舍弟常州官舍应客</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69849")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69849'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69849'>霜雪纷纷上鬓毛，忧时自悔目空蒿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69849_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69849'>桑麻祇欲求三亩，势利谁能算一毫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69849_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69849'>此地旧传公子札，吾心真慕伯成高。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69849_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69849'>飘然更有乘桴兴，万里寒江正复艚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69849_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69849'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　在常州作诗。作品：《少狂喜文章》<div id='poem_70314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>少狂喜文章</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70314")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70314'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70314'>少狂喜文章，颇复好功名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70314'>稍知古人心，始欲老蚕耕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70314'>低徊但志<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作忘）</span>食，邂逅亦专城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70314'>仰惭冥冥士，俯愧扰扰氓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70314'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70314", 70314, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>良夜</span>未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70314", 70314, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>遽央</span>，青灯数寒更。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70314'>拨书置左右，仰屋慨平生。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70314'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_70314_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　作诗送惠思归钱塘。作品：《送僧惠思归钱塘》<div id='poem_69530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧惠思归钱塘</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69530")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69530'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69530'>渌净堂前湖水渌，归时正复有荷花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69530'>花前亦见<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作有）</span>馀杭姥，为道仙人忆酒家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　是年，为释智福撰文。作品：《真州长芦寺经藏记》<div id='poem_1176696' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176696' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176696?labeling=true' target='_blank'>真州长芦寺经藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176696")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176696_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176696'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176696'>西域有人焉，止而无所系，观而无所逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176696_comment'></div>唯其无所系，故有所系者守之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176696_comment'></div>唯其无所逐，故有所逐者从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176696_comment'></div>从而守之者不可为量数，则其言而应之、议而辨之也，亦不可为量数，此其书之行乎中国，所以至于五千四十八卷，而尚未足以为多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176696_comment'></div>真州长芦寺释智福者，为高屋，建大轴两轮，而栖匦于轮间，以藏五千四十八卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176696_comment'></div>其募钱至三千万，其土木丹漆珠玑万金之闳壮靡丽，言者不能称也，唯观者知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176696_comment'></div>夫道之在天下莫非命，而有废兴，时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176696_comment'></div>知出之有命，兴之有时，则彼所以当天下贫窭之时，能独鼓舞得其财以有所建立，每至于此，盖无足以疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176696_comment'></div>智福有才略，善治其徒众，从余求识其成，于是乎书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176696_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　知常州，岁初再致书吴蕡，议王令婚事。作品：《与吴司録议王逢原婚事书》其二。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　邵必示以《复鑑湖记》。作书答之，论近世文弊在于堆积故实，雕绘语句，然乏济世之用。作品：《上邵学士书》<div id='poem_1176369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上邵学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176369")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176369'>仲详足下：数日前辱示乐安公诗石本及足下所撰《复鉴湖记》，启封缓读，心目开涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176369_comment'></div>词简而精，义深而明，不候按图而尽越绝之形胜，不候入国而熟贤牧之爱民，非夫诚发乎文，文贯乎道，仁思义色，表里相济者，其孰能至于此哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176369_comment'></div>因环列书室，且欣且庆，非有厚也，公义之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176369_comment'></div>某尝患近世之文，辞弗顾于理，理弗顾于事，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>襞积</span>故实为有学，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>雕绘</span>语句为精新，譬之撷奇花之英，积而玩之，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>光华</span>馨采，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>鲜缛</span>可爱，求其根柢济用，则蔑如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176369_comment'></div>某幸观乐安、足下之所著，譬由笙磬之音，圭璋之器，有节奏焉，有法度焉，虽庸耳必知雅正之可贵、温润之可宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176369_comment'></div>仲尼曰「有德必有言」，「德不孤，必有邻」，其斯之谓乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176369_comment'></div>昔昌黎为唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>儒宗</span>，得子婿李汉，然后其文益振，其道益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176369_comment'></div>今乐安公懿文茂行，超越朝右，复得足下，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>宏识</span>清议，相须光润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176369_comment'></div>茍力而不已，使后之议者必曰：「乐安公圣宋之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1176369", 1176369, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>儒宗</span>也，犹唐之昌黎而勋业过之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176369_comment'></div>又曰：「邵公，乐安公之婿也，犹昌黎之李汉而器略过之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176369_comment'></div>则韩李、蒋邵之名，各齐驱并骤，与此金石之刻不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176369_comment'></div>所以且欣且庆者，在于兹焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176369_comment'></div>郡庠拘率，偶足下有西笑之谋，未获亲交谈议，聊因手书，以道钦谢之意，且贺乐安公之得人也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1176369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　妹婿张奎甫至剑州，以亲忧罢。作诗寄之。作品：《张剑州至剑一日以亲忧罢》<div id='poem_69932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张剑州至剑一日以亲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>忧罢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69932")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69932_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_69932_0'>① 原作新，据张本改</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69932'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69932'>客舍飞尘尚满鞯，却寻东路想茫然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69932'>白头反哺秦乌侧，流血思归蜀鸟前。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69932'>今日相逢知怅望，几时能到与留连。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69932'>行看万里云西去，倚马春风不忍鞭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69932'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69932_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　为杨蟠母吴氏撰墓志铭。作品：《太常博士杨君夫人金华县吴氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常博士杨君夫人金华县君吴氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　嘉祐三年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176819")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176819'>钱塘杨蟠将合葬其母，缞绖以走晋陵，而问铭于其守临川王某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176819_comment'></div>王某曰：古者诸侯、大夫有德善功烈，其子孙必为器以铭，而国之人必能为之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176819_comment'></div>越国而求铭，予未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176819_comment'></div>今杭大州，以文称于时者盖有，而蟠也释其殡，千里以取铭于予，盖所以严其亲之终，而欲信其善于后世，如此其慎也，予岂敢孤其意，以爱不腆之辞乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176819_comment'></div>于是为之序曰：故太常博士知婺州东阳县事杨君讳翱字翰之之夫人金华县君吴氏，世为婺州之金华人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176819_comment'></div>自其大父文顗始有籍于杭州之钱塘，而杨君亦自其父徵始去处州之丽水而为钱塘人，而葬于钱塘之履泰乡龙井之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176819_comment'></div>杨君之卒也，年六十七，以庆历二年十二月二十一日从其先人以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176819_comment'></div>而夫人后君十六年以卒，卒时嘉祐二年，年七十三，而以明年二月二十日祔于杨君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176819_comment'></div>杨君少以文学中进士甲科，而晚以廉静不茍合穷于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176819_comment'></div>夫人有驯德淑行，协于上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176819_comment'></div>内外无怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176819_comment'></div>杨君有子十一人，其一人则孽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176819_comment'></div>夫人母其孽子犹吴氏之甥，虽乡人之习于杨君者，不知为异母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176819_comment'></div>既杨君卒，教养嫁娶皆各不失其时，而子端、子蟠同时以进士起家为密、和二州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176819_comment'></div>邻里叹慕，以为夫人荣，然夫人不为之喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176819_comment'></div>至杨君之弟子完及进士第，乃喜曰：「吾姒老矣，此亦足以慰其心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176819_comment'></div>盖其仁如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176819_comment'></div>夫人生男女十人，卒时，子辅国、子端与其女子七人皆已卒，而蟠独在，为泗州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176819_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1176819'>博士有家，夫人实绍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176819_comment'></div>博士有子，夫人实教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176819_comment'></div>游其门庭，弦诵之声，御其堂奥，宾祭斋明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176819_comment'></div>皇命淑人，维君郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176819_comment'></div>问名考德，夫人实践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176819_comment'></div>归哉万年，博士之丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176819_comment'></div>铭以昭之，无有春秋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　撰周嘉正墓志铭。作品：《尚书刑部郎中周公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176787' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176787' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176787?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书刑部郎中周公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176787")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176787_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176787'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176787'>周氏其先自华阴入蜀，蜀孟氏时，公之皇考讳敬述，以文章知名，尝至要官任事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176787_comment'></div>孟氏亡，因不复仕，而天子召以为寿州下蔡令，由下蔡以为太子中允、知江州，赐紫衣金鱼，使抚初附之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176787_comment'></div>其后为秘书丞，知泰州以卒，而得州之北原以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176787_comment'></div>有子四人，其卒皆位于朝，而公第二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176787_comment'></div>公讳嘉正，字干之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176787_comment'></div>少与其昆弟俱以进士甲科起家，为通州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176787_comment'></div>其后通判广州，提点福建刑狱，知寿州，为三司盐铁判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176787_comment'></div>故宰相丁谓虑其材，天子以为河北转运使，而公不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176787_comment'></div>已而谓得罪，公坐出知金州，又知海州，又知濠州，而以工部郎中分司南京，归治疾于海陵之第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176787_comment'></div>明道元年，以恩迁刑部，二年，年六十四以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176787_comment'></div>公宽厚而廉清，而其才尤长于政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176787_comment'></div>自为推官时，已能有所建易，为士民所记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176787_comment'></div>及奉使福建，狱有冤，辄辨，有疑若可贷，辄以闻，所活至数十人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176787_comment'></div>而其治，大抵遇奸吏为独急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176787_comment'></div>子男五人：曰象先，今为武康军节度推官，监台州税；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176787_comment'></div>曰彦先，为右侍禁，知循州兴宁县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176787_comment'></div>曰茂先，为泰州司法参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176787_comment'></div>曰行先，为山南东道节度推官，知江州彭泽县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176787_comment'></div>曰嗣先，为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176787_comment'></div>女七人，皆嫁为士大夫妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176787_comment'></div>嘉祐三年三月壬申，公子与孙葬公皇考秘书丞、赠尚书工部侍郎之兆东，以安喜县君钱氏祔，县君实左右公以有家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176787_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176787'>周迁于蜀，爰自先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176787_comment'></div>考有四子，发于海滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176787_comment'></div>公有令闻，贵维次子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176787_comment'></div>归宽民人，施刻在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176787_comment'></div>方飞方骞，方升于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176787_comment'></div>既铩以归，既陨于泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176787_comment'></div>有高其后，有光其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176787_comment'></div>作为铭诗，兆此新阡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176787_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　撰周彦先墓志铭。作品：《右侍禁周君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右侍禁周君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176788")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176788'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176788'>君周氏，讳彦先，字师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176788_comment'></div>曾大父讳瑰，赠大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176788_comment'></div>大父讳述，秘书丞，赠尚书工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176788_comment'></div>考讳嘉正，尚书刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176788_comment'></div>君少以郎中君荫补三班奉职，监泗州浮桥，又监楚州船场，为扬、泰州巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176788_comment'></div>而近臣荐君閤门祗候，大臣曰：「周某可用矣，然吾将试之边」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176788_comment'></div>乃白以为瀛、莫等七州军沿边巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176788_comment'></div>边人两界上为群盗，君得姓名，以白安抚使，移之契丹，契丹悉捕斩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176788_comment'></div>自是久之，边无盗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176788_comment'></div>已而君上书言漕事，又言边将使人耕边以给公使，不即禁止，往往能生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176788_comment'></div>于是边将大怒，而君所部卒有犯法者，因诋君以不诘，坐是监广州清远县盐场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176788_comment'></div>转运使留君以监市舶，它吏方习为奸赇事，而君独不买舶中一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176788_comment'></div>转运使尝数称君以愧它吏，而荐君以知循州之兴宁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176788_comment'></div>至则相县南三十里宁昌驿以为治所，而吏自此得不以瘴死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176788_comment'></div>然君既得疾于兴宁矣，遂卒，卒时年四十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176788_comment'></div>县人以君为能抚我，思之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176788_comment'></div>君先夫人盛氏，尚书工部侍郎讳京之子，后夫人王氏，尚书主客郎中讳贯之之子，皆有贤行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176788_comment'></div>五子：涛、洵、洧、渥、澥，皆为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176788_comment'></div>二女子：嫁如皋史堪、德安郑汾，亦皆为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176788_comment'></div>而涛今为著作佐郎、知汝州梁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176788_comment'></div>以嘉祐三年三月壬申，葬君皇考郎中之兆次，而以先夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176788_comment'></div>临川王某为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176788'>君弟吾嫂，夫人吾姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176788_comment'></div>君能有家，不失疾徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176788_comment'></div>治兵与民，威爱之孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176788_comment'></div>铭昭子孙，以告不诬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1176788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　撰周茂先墓志铭。作品：《泰州司法参军周君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泰州司法参军周君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176789")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176789_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176789'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176789'>君周氏，讳茂先，字去华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176789_comment'></div>其先成都人，至君大父讳述，为秘书丞，知泰州以卒，始葬泰州之北原，而子孙遂为州人不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176789_comment'></div>父讳嘉正，尚书刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176789_comment'></div>君以父荫为楚州司户参军，又为泰州司法参军，皆有能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176789_comment'></div>明道二年五月，刑部君终于第，君思慕哭泣，至其年十月亦卒，于是君年三十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176789_comment'></div>夫人南阳张氏，守其孤不嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176789_comment'></div>其后孤涣以进士起家洪州南昌县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176789_comment'></div>二女子，嫁池州贵池县尉宣城查塾、进士建安吴观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176789_comment'></div>而以嘉祐三年三月壬申，葬君北原之兆，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176789'>绵绵之孤，属于单妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176789_comment'></div>既恃而殖，龟锡告命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176789_comment'></div>曰维孝子，从先人宅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年2月15日</a>　此日，自知常州移提点江南东路刑狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　长妹文淑与张奎自蜀归。作诗寄之。作品：《寄张剑州并示女弟》<div id='poem_70169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄张剑州并示女弟<span class='inlineComment2'>（时张以太夫人丧自剑州归）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70169")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70169'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70169'>剑阁天梯万里寒，春风此日白衣冠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70169'>乌辞反哺颠毛黑，鸟引思归口血丹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70169'>行路想君今眚<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作㾪）</span>瘦，相逢添我老悲酸。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70169'>浮云渺渺吹西去，每到原头勒马看。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70169'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　被命即行，致书王令。欲于扬州宿留，另乞差遣，约令于丹阳相候。作品：《与王逢原书》其四。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年3月</a>　三月，复书刘敞，论知常州时罢河役事。作品：《与刘原父书》<div id='poem_1176338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与刘原父书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176338")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176338'>辱手教勤勤，尤感愧，伏承动止万福，又良慰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176338_comment'></div>河役之罢，以转运赋功本狭，与雨淫不止，督役者以病告，故止耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176338_comment'></div>昔梁王堕马，贾生悲哀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176338_comment'></div>泔鱼伤人，曾子涕泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176338_comment'></div>今劳人费财于前，而利不遂于后，此某所以愧恨无穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176338_comment'></div>若夫事求遂，功求成，而不量天时人力之可否，此某所不能，则论某者之纷纷，岂敢怨哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176338_comment'></div>阁下乃以初不能无意为有憾，此非某之所敢闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176338_comment'></div>方今万事所以难合而易坏，常以诸贤无意耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176338_comment'></div>如鄙宗夷甫辈，稍稍骛于世矣，仁圣在上，故公家元海未敢跋扈耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176338_comment'></div>阁下论为世师，此虽戏言，愿勿广也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176338_comment'></div>前月被使江东，朝夕当走左右，自馀须面请。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176338_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
高邮
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ad5a83057ee041b8bbcd30679582615e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ad5a83057ee041b8bbcd30679582615e");'><span id='ad5a83057ee041b8bbcd30679582615e_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　宜于及时赴阙，二妹婿朱明之又适在高邮，故赴高邮。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　得曾巩书，作诗寄之，述寄居高邮情状颇详。作品：《得子固书因寄》<div id='poem_70702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70702' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70702", 70702, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>舒舒</span>，吾望已汲汲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70702'>故人莫在眼，屡独开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_70702", 70702, id='poem_sentence_14_70702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_70702'>眺听聊自放，日暮城头立。<div id='poem_sentence_15_70702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176752")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176752'>君张氏，讳式，字景则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176752_comment'></div>其先建州浦城人，后徙建安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176752_comment'></div>盖弗仕者三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176752_comment'></div>讳汉夫者，曾祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176752_comment'></div>讳谟者，祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176752_comment'></div>讳希颜者，父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176752_comment'></div>父以君贵，乃赠尚书职方员外郎，有气节，知君可教，乃付家事长子，而纵君游学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176752_comment'></div>及长，文辞、行义为乡里所推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176752_comment'></div>天禧二年，释进士褐，主福州闽县簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176752_comment'></div>又主南剑将乐簿，有银冶，坐岁课不足，系者常数百人，君籍其人，使富贫财力相兼，课遂有羡，无系者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176752_comment'></div>归，以劳除开封府祥符县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176752_comment'></div>赵稹将并州，辟军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176752_comment'></div>稹所为有不可于众，徐启谕弗讦，稹以故听，而君亦以此称长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176752_comment'></div>未几，遭母夫人丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176752_comment'></div>服除，改秘书省作佐郎、知福州古田县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176752_comment'></div>耕籍田恩，迁太常博士、知开封府咸平县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176752_comment'></div>吕许公罢宰相，以许州观察判官辟，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176752_comment'></div>又通判饶州，狱有十数年不决者，君一言而决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176752_comment'></div>会择河北吏，御史中丞举君，得洺州，赐绯鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176752_comment'></div>又以选知虔州，虔于东南州为最剧，君能镇抚之以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176752_comment'></div>三司市䌷绢十馀万，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176752", 1176752, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>经数</span>，君拒弗市，民以君为有赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176752_comment'></div>又知濠、寿二州，人缢其妻而以自杀告，狱既具，诘立服，举州欢以为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176752_comment'></div>居顷，召为开封府推官，坐栲掠囚死，出知岳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176752_comment'></div>皇祐二年九月六日卒，享年六十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176752_comment'></div>官至尚书祠部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176752_comment'></div>君廉静好书，长于政事，所居官举，既去而人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176752_comment'></div>见时事有不便，往往能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1176752", 1176752, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>极言</span>之无所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176752_comment'></div>赵元昊反时，诱人出财助军，诱多得赏，于是吏或劫富人出财，君疏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176752_comment'></div>为开封推官时，宫中以私财为佛寺置田，又疏以为乱法，后遂以君言而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176752_comment'></div>既老矣，终不肯治田宅，所得禄以置书，曰：「吾子业此，足以自活，不然，虽田宅何足」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176752_comment'></div>妻姓徐，濮阳县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176752_comment'></div>子六人：𢘅、志、思、惎、逊、憙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176752_comment'></div>𢘅以君故，得太庙斋郎，与惎同时中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176752_comment'></div>女二人，皆已嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176752_comment'></div>某月某日葬君某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176752_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1176752'>张祖留侯，世穷久幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176752_comment'></div>君始士服，起家以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176752_comment'></div>发于州县，治见称举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176752_comment'></div>有言朝廷，弊事用除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176752_comment'></div>维清厥诲，尚后弗渝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1176752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　丁宝臣知端州，寄诗。次韵诗答之。作品：《次韵答端州丁元珍》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　居高邮，与朱明之游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　居高邮，作启与淮南转运使李仲偃启。作品：《上李仲偃运使启》<div id='poem_1176503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176503_comment'></div>坐蒙高义，曲借善颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176503_comment'></div>载惟恩私，有过分愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176503_comment'></div>去离门守，来造署居，取庇自今，驰情无远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176503_comment'></div>要之蚤莫，唯是旷官之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176503_comment'></div>庶也始终，不为爱己之负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176503_comment'></div>岁时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176503", 1176503, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>回薄</span>，气候冱寒，明贤之姿，休福所向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176503_comment'></div>伏惟顺节自寿，副人所瞻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　有旨召试馆职。以祖母年老，父益未葬，上状乞免就试。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='1204b27685254522a3a1be75f062ed9d_label'><a -----title
潜山（怀宁）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e04e9436c4d34f859bcbfc436ff9ddc1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e04e9436c4d34f859bcbfc436ff9ddc1");'><span id='e04e9436c4d34f859bcbfc436ff9ddc1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>，31岁</div><div id='e04e9436c4d34f859bcbfc436ff9ddc1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　以有旨令赴阙，再上状乞免就试，有诗明志。作品：《乞免就试状》《舒州被召试不赴偶书》<div id='poem_1176177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞免就试状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176177")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176177'>准中书劄子，奉圣旨，依前降指挥发来赴阙就试者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176177_comment'></div>伏念臣祖母年老，先臣未葬，二妹当嫁，家贫口众，难住京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176177_comment'></div>比尝以此自陈，乞不就试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176177_comment'></div>慢废朝命，尚宜有罪，幸蒙宽赦，即赐听许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176177_comment'></div>不图逊事之臣，更以臣为恬退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176177_comment'></div>令臣无葬嫁奉养之急，而逡巡辞避，不敢当清要之选，虽曰恬退可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176177_comment'></div>今特以营私家之急，择利害而行，谓之恬退，非臣本意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176177_comment'></div>兼臣罢县守阙，及今二年有馀，老幼未尝宁宇，方欲就任，即令赴阙，实于私计有妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176177_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣本意止是营私，特寝召试指挥，且令终满外任，一面发赴本任去讫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176177_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69650?labeling=true' "poem_title_69650")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69650'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70496_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70496'>草木犹疑夏郁葱，风云已见秋萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70496_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70282'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70282_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　与孟逸书。作品：《与孟逸秘校手书》其一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　奉诏亲劳乡贤王申。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　州大旱，率僚属祈雨。作品：《祈雨文》<div id='poem_1176982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176982")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176982'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176982'>惟神美名正气，索之前史详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176982_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176982_comment'></div>昔人也，挺王臣之节，忠信我任，德谊我负，故时君倚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176982_comment'></div>今其神也，享庙食之贵，阴阳吾职，祸福吾柄，故州民赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176982_comment'></div>今千里旱暵，及时不雨，农夫悼心，郡将失色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176982_comment'></div>某遂躬率僚属，来请于大庑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176982_comment'></div>惟神全死生之大名，开聪明于一方，霈甘霪以足民食，则前谓人神之灵，于古今无愧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176982_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1176982_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　再与孟逸书，商讨救旱事宜。作品：《与孟逸秘校手书》其二。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　作书与马遵，论理财之道，以为欲富天下，当资之天地。作品：《与马运判书》<div id='poem_1176363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与马运判书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176363")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176363'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>运判</span>阁下：比奉书，即蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>宠答</span>，以感以怍，且承访以所闻，何阁下逮下之周也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176363_comment'></div>尝以谓方今之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>穷空</span>，不独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>费出</span>之无节，又失所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>生财</span>之道故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176363_comment'></div>富其家者资之国，富其国者资之天下，欲富天下则资之天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176363_comment'></div>盖为家者，不为其子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>生财</span>，有父之严而子富焉，则何求而不得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176363_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>阖门</span>而与其子市，而门之外莫入焉，虽尽得子之财，犹不富也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176363_comment'></div>盖近世之言利虽善矣，皆有国者资天下之术耳，直相市于门之内而已，此其所以困与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176363_comment'></div>在阁下之明，宜已尽知，当患不得为耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176363_comment'></div>不得为，则尚何赖于不肖者之言耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176363_comment'></div>今岁东南饥馑如此，汴水又绝，其经画固劳心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176363_comment'></div>私窃度之，京师兵食宜窘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>薪刍</span>百谷之价亦必踊，以谓宜料<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1176363", 1176363, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>畿兵</span>之驽怯者就食诸郡，可以舒漕挽之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176363_comment'></div>古人论天下之兵，以为犹人之血脉，不及则枯，聚则疽，分使就食，亦血脉流通之势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176363_comment'></div>傥可上闻行之否？</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_9_70522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70522'>卧送秋月没，起看朝阳暹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/1176776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠尚书刑部侍郎王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐三年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176776")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176776'>江陵县有合葬龙山之西者，为宋龙川令、赠尚书刑部侍郎王公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176776_comment'></div>公之卒，得年七十一，其葬之岁在辛卯，为皇祐三年十二月甲申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176776_comment'></div>龙川，其所卒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176776_comment'></div>以刑部侍郎赠公者，曰公之子光禄卿周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176776_comment'></div>公讳文亮，字昭远，其先晋丞相导也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176776_comment'></div>丞相十有六世之孙俭，为唐正义大夫，刺明州，始去长安之万年，为明之奉化人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176776_comment'></div>大夫之兄曰潨，潨生绅，绅生韶，韶生公，四世咸为县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176776_comment'></div>方钱氏之王吴越也，公尝试策入等，为其属州之掾，国除，选于京师，复掾密州，尉夔奉节，为邢之任令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176776_comment'></div>举者二十馀人，不用，叹曰：「吾既其衰矣而为是，是不可以已耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176776_comment'></div>即以疾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176776_comment'></div>去之八年，无复言进仕，党故强起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176776_comment'></div>复叹曰：「仕不仕，惟义也，吾敢自必于其间耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176776_comment'></div>起令龙川，遂卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176776_comment'></div>始公尚少，以文称于士友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176776_comment'></div>尝度浙江，有忘白金百斤于舟，公最后独见之，留三日，得忘者归之而后去，而不告以名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176776_comment'></div>他日，从者以为言，于是又称其长者，今两县吏民，皆曰贤令也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176776_comment'></div>既亡，皆哀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176776_comment'></div>合葬于龙山者，天水郡太君权氏，善草隶书，诵数经，能略通其说，实唐贞孝公皋之十七世孙云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176776_comment'></div>子男四人，向、频、高为进士，充其业，其季光禄君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176776_comment'></div>女三人，皆归闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176776_comment'></div>光禄君方洁勤审，下贤好学，人以为君子之子焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176776_comment'></div>自晋之乱，而戎夷盗贼，穴有中国，且乱且治，至于今岁千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176776_comment'></div>士大夫之家，流落颠顿，不常其世，后虽有振起者，多不知其族之所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176776_comment'></div>独光禄君之家为世其家，而能自道尤详，自大夫伯仲至公四世之告命皆具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176776_comment'></div>命其宗人之子某铭公之墓者，光禄君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176776_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1176776'>公先籍秦系相导，大夫相孙维作守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176776_comment'></div>兄潨遂留家海浦，子绅孙韶公祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176776_comment'></div>于东四传弗甚耀，藏仁厥家以赉后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176776_comment'></div>后蕃而昌其必效，今卿追公为之兆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1176776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　撰孙抗墓碑。作品：《广西转运使孙君墓碑》<div id='poem_1176726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广西转运使孙君墓碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐三年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176726")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176726'>君少学问勤苦，寄食浮屠山中，步行借书数百里，升楼诵之而去其阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176726_comment'></div>盖数年而具众经，后遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176726", 1176726, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>博极</span>天下之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176726_comment'></div>属文，操笔布纸，谓为方思，而数百千言已就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176726_comment'></div>以天圣五年，同学究出身，补滁州来安县主簿、洪州右司理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176726_comment'></div>再举进士甲科，迁大理寺丞，知常州晋陵县，移知浔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176726_comment'></div>浔当是时，人未趣学，乃改作庙学，召吏民子弟之秀者，亲为据案讲说，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176726", 1176726, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诱劝</span>以文艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176726_comment'></div>居未几，旁州士皆来学，学者由此遂多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176726_comment'></div>以选，通判耀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176726_comment'></div>兵士有讼财而不直者，安抚使以为直，君争之不得，乃奏决于大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176726_comment'></div>大理以君所争为是，而用君议编于敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176726_comment'></div>庆历二年，擢为监察御史里行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176726_comment'></div>于是弹奏狄武襄公不当沮败刘沪水洛城事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176726_comment'></div>又因日食言阴盛，以后宫为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176726_comment'></div>仁宗大猎于城南，卫士不及整而归以夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176726_comment'></div>明日将复出，有雉陨于殿中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176726_comment'></div>君奏疏，即是夜有诏止猎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176726_comment'></div>蛮唐和寇湖南，以君安抚，奏事有所不合，因自劾，乃知复州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176726_comment'></div>又通判金州，知汉阳军吉州，稍迁至尚书都官员外郎、提点江南西路刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176726_comment'></div>有言常平岁凶当稍贵其粟以利籴本者，诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176726_comment'></div>君言此非常平本意也，诏又从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176726_comment'></div>侬智高反，君即出兵二千于岭，以助英、韶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176726_comment'></div>会除广西转运使，驰至所部，而智高方煽，天子出大臣部诸将兵数万击之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176726_comment'></div>君驱散亡残败之吏民，转刍米于惶扰卒急之间，又以馀力，督守吏治城堑，修器械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176726_comment'></div>属州多完，而师饱以有功，君劳居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176726_comment'></div>以劳迁尚书司封员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176726_comment'></div>初，君请斩大将之北者，发骑军以讨贼，及后，贼所以破灭，皆如君计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176726_comment'></div>军罢而人重困，方恃君绥抚，君乘险阻，冒瘴毒，经理出入，启居无时，以皇祐三年三月初七日卒于治所，年五十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176726_comment'></div>官至尚书工部郎中，散官至朝奉郎，勋至上骑都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176726_comment'></div>君所为州，整齐其大体，阔略其细故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176726_comment'></div>与宾客谈说，弦歌饮酒，往往终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176726_comment'></div>而能听用佐属尽其力，事以不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176726_comment'></div>在御史言事，计曲直利害如何，不顾望大臣，以此无助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176726_comment'></div>所为文，自少及终，以类集之，至百卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176726_comment'></div>天德、地业、人事之治，掇拾贯穿，无所不言，而诗为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176726_comment'></div>君讳抗，字和叔，姓孙氏，得姓于卫，得望于富春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176726_comment'></div>其在黟县，自君之高祖弃广陵以避孙儒之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176726_comment'></div>而至君曾大父讳师睦，善治生以致富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176726_comment'></div>岁饥，贱出米谷，以斗升付籴者，得欢心于乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176726_comment'></div>大父讳旦，始尽弃其产，而能招士以教子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176726_comment'></div>父讳遂良，当终时，君始十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176726_comment'></div>后以君故，赠尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176726_comment'></div>君初娶张氏，又娶吴氏，又娶舒氏，封太康县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176726_comment'></div>五男子：适、邈、迪、适、遘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176726_comment'></div>适尝从予游，年十四，论议著书，足以惊人，终永州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176726_comment'></div>邈今潞州上党县令，亦好学能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176726_comment'></div>状君行以求铭者，邈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176726_comment'></div>君之卒也，天子以适试秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176726_comment'></div>二女子，一嫁太庙斋郎李简夫，一嫁进士郑安平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176726_comment'></div>君以其卒之年十二月二十五日，葬黟县怀远乡上林村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176726_comment'></div>歙之为州，在山岭涧谷崎岖之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176726_comment'></div>自去五代之乱百年，名士大夫亦往往而出，然不能多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176726_comment'></div>黟尤僻陋，中州能人贤士之所罕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176726_comment'></div>君孤童子，徒步<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1176726", 1176726, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>宦学</span>，终以就立，为朝廷显用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176726_comment'></div>论次终始，作为铭诗，岂特以显孙氏而慰其子孙，乃亦以诒其乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176726_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1176726'>在仁宗世，蛮跳不制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176726_comment'></div>馈师牧民，实有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1176726", 1176726, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>肤使</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176726_comment'></div>践艰乘危，条变画奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176726_comment'></div>瘴毒既除，膏熨以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176726_comment'></div>方迁既陨，哀暨山夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176726_comment'></div>维此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1176726", 1176726, "Clauses/179/Comments/0")'>肤使</span>，文优以仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176726_comment'></div>禄则不殖，其书满笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176726_comment'></div>书藏于家，铭在墓前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176726_comment'></div>以告黟人，孙氏之阡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1176726_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　是年，与州司理参军李冕议定刑狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　是年，同年陈襄以“才性贤明，笃于古学”，荐于两浙安抚使陈旭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　以陆经寄诗，作诗次其韵。作品：《次韵子履远寄之作》<div id='poem_69815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵子履远寄之作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69815")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69815'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69815'>飘然逐客出都门，士论应悲玉石焚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69815'>高位纷纷谁得志，穷途往往始能文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69815'>柴桑今日思元亮，天禄何时召子云。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69815'>直使声名传后世，穷通何必较功勋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69815'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69815_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　始撰《淮南杂说》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在舒州，躬尚俭素，僚属皆效之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　巡行属县。作品：《次韵春日即事》<div id='poem_69855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵春日即<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙舒本作感）</span>事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69855")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69855'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69855'>人间尚有薄寒侵，和气先薰草树心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69855'>丹白自分齐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_69855", 69855, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>破蕾</span>，青黄相向欲交阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69855'>潺潺嫩水生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_69855", 69855, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>幽谷</span>，漠漠轻烟动远林。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69855'>病得一官随太守，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_69855", 69855, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>班春</span>无助愧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_69855", 69855, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>周任</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69855'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69855_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　作诗，哀舒民之多艰，自省惭疚。作品：《感事诗》<div id='poem_69829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵吴冲卿召赴资政殿听读诗义感事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69829")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69829_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_69829_0'>① 冲卿诗云：雪销鳷鹊御沟融，燕见殊恩缀上公。昼日乍惊三接宠，正风获听二南终。解颐共仰天颜喜，墙面裁容圣域通。午漏渐长知禹锡，侍臣何术补尧聪。时修撰经义所初进二南，有旨资政殿读云（张本作进读）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69829'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69829'>周南麟趾圣人风，未有驺虞系召公。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69829'>雅颂兼陈为四始，笙歌合奏以三终。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69829'>讨论诏使成书上，休浣恩容著籍通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69829'>墙面岂能知奥义，延陵听赏自为聪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69829'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69829_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='92b69a40beb0425590b9bc51ec2255d6_label'><a href='javascript:
