ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年5月20日</a>　此日，范仲淹卒。作文祭之。作品：《祭范颍州文》<div id='poem_1176847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭范颍州文<span class='inlineComment2'>（仲淹）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年5月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176847")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176847'>呜呼我公，一世之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176847_comment'></div>由初迄终，名节无疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176847_comment'></div>明肃之盛，身危志殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176847_comment'></div>瑶华失位，又随以斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176847_comment'></div>治功亟闻，尹帝之都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176847_comment'></div>闭奸兴良，稚子歌呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176847_comment'></div>赫赫之家，万首俯趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176847_comment'></div>独绳其私，以走江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176847_comment'></div>士争留公，蹈祸不慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176847_comment'></div>有危其辞，谒与俱出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176847_comment'></div>风俗之衰，骇正怡邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176847_comment'></div>蹇蹇我初，人以疑嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176847_comment'></div>力行不回，慕者兴起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176847_comment'></div>儒先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176847", 1176847, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>酋酋</span>，以节相侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176847_comment'></div>公之在贬，愈勇为忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176847_comment'></div>稽前引古，谊不营躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176847_comment'></div>外更三州，施有馀泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176847_comment'></div>如酾河江，以灌寻尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176847_comment'></div>宿赃自解，不以刑加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176847_comment'></div>猾盗涵仁，终老无邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176847_comment'></div>讲艺弦歌，慕来千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176847_comment'></div>沟川障泽，田桑有喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176847_comment'></div>戎孽猘狂，敢齮我疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176847_comment'></div>铸印刻符，公屏一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176847_comment'></div>取将于伍，后常名显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176847_comment'></div>收士至佐，维邦之彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176847_comment'></div>声之所加，虏不敢濒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176847_comment'></div>以其馀威，走敌完邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176847_comment'></div>昔也始至，疮痍满道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176847_comment'></div>药之养之，内外完好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176847_comment'></div>既其无为，饮酒笑歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176847_comment'></div>百城晏眠，吏士委蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176847_comment'></div>上嘉曰材，以副枢密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176847_comment'></div>稽首辞让，至于六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176847_comment'></div>遂参宰相，釐我典常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176847_comment'></div>扶贤赞杰，乱冗除荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176847_comment'></div>官更于朝，士变于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176847_comment'></div>百治具修，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1176847", 1176847, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>偷堕</span>勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176847_comment'></div>彼阏不遂，归侍帝侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176847_comment'></div>卒屏于外，身屯道塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176847_comment'></div>谓宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1176847", 1176847, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>耇老</span>，尚有以为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176847_comment'></div>神乎孰忍，使至于斯！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176847_comment'></div>盖公之才，犹不尽试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176847_comment'></div>肆其经纶，功孰与计？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176847_comment'></div>自公之贵，厩库逾空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176847_comment'></div>和其色辞，傲讦以容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176847_comment'></div>化于妇妾，不靡珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176847_comment'></div>翼翼公子，弊绨恶粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176847_comment'></div>闵死怜穷，惟是之奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176847_comment'></div>孤女以嫁，男成厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176847_comment'></div>孰堙于深？孰锲乎厚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176847_comment'></div>其传其详，以法永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176847_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1176847", 1176847, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>硕人</span>今亡，邦国之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176847_comment'></div>矧鄙不肖，辱公知尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176847_comment'></div>承凶万里，不往而留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176847_comment'></div>涕哭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1176847", 1176847, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>驰辞</span>，以赞醪羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176847_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1176847_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　整理杜甫诗集，撰老杜诗后集序。作品：《老杜诗后集序》<div id='poem_1176578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>老杜诗后集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176578")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176578'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176578'>予考古之诗，尤爱杜甫氏作者，其辞所从出，一莫知穷极，而病未能学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176578_comment'></div>世所传已多，计尚有遗落，思得其完而观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176578_comment'></div>然每一篇出，自然人知非人之所能为，而为之者，惟其甫也，辄能辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176578_comment'></div>予之令鄞，客有授予古之诗世所不传者二百馀篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176578_comment'></div>观之，予知非人之所能为，而为之实甫者，其文与意之著也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176578_comment'></div>然甫之诗其完见于今者，自予得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176578_comment'></div>世之学者，至乎甫而后为诗，不能至，要之不知诗焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176578_comment'></div>呜呼，诗其难惟有甫哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176578_comment'></div>自《洗兵马》下，序而次之，以示知甫者，且用自发焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176578_comment'></div>皇祐壬辰五月日，临川王某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176578_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　舒州大饥，遂襄助州府日開常平仓赈饥民。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　作文与孟逸，督促其发富室之藏，以救饥民。作品：《与孟逸秘校手书》其四。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年10月</a>　沈披兄弟来求铭，为撰其父沈周墓志铭。作品：《太常少卿分司南京沈公周墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常少卿分司南京沈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐四年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176808")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176808'>皇祐三年十一月庚申，太常少卿分司南京钱塘沈公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176808_comment'></div>明年，子披、子括葬公钱塘龙居里先公尚书之兆，卜十月甲戌吉，与其宗谋铭，则书公官寿行世来以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176808_comment'></div>予论次其书曰：沈氏自沈子逞以身属社稷，书于《春秋》，文学、贤劳、功名，不旷于史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176808_comment'></div>而武康之族，尤独显于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176808_comment'></div>至公高祖始徙去，自为钱塘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176808_comment'></div>大王父某，当钱氏时匿不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176808_comment'></div>王父某，官咸平、端拱间，至大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176808_comment'></div>父某，学行显闻，早世，无爵位，由长子同及公赠兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176808_comment'></div>公讳周，字望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176808_comment'></div>少孤，与其兄相踵为进士，起家掾汉阳，从事高邮，用举者入大理为丞，监苏州酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176808_comment'></div>知简之平泉县，县人铭其政于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176808_comment'></div>遂自封州守佐苏州，由苏州为侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176808_comment'></div>有以丞相指谒公者，不为听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176808_comment'></div>居顷之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1176808", 1176808, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>出刺</span>润州，又刺泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176808_comment'></div>其为治取简易，讼有可已者，辄谕以义，使归思之，狱以故少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176808_comment'></div>泉州旧多盗，日暮市门尽闭，禁民勿往来，公至除其禁，而盗亦以止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176808_comment'></div>佐开封，讼数年不遣者以百数，公断治立尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176808_comment'></div>尝代其尹争狱于上，大臣为公自绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176808_comment'></div>三司使请铸大钱，下其书议，议者无敢忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176808_comment'></div>公为其判官，独曰：「坏四钱为之可以当十，民盗变旧钱且尽，铸之为诱民死耳，不如无铸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176808_comment'></div>议上，如公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176808_comment'></div>于是，天子以江东之按察为已悉，闻公宽厚，即以为使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176808_comment'></div>尽岁无所劾，而部亦以治称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176808_comment'></div>然公已老，不乐事权，自请得明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176808_comment'></div>明年，遂以分司归第，三月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176808_comment'></div>夫人许氏，六安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176808_comment'></div>两男世其家，一女子已嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176808_comment'></div>公廉静宽慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176808_comment'></div>貌和而内有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176808_comment'></div>春秋七十四，更十三官而不一挂于法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176808_comment'></div>乡党故旧闻其归则喜，丧，哭之多哀，而无一人恨望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176808_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1176808'>公生四方，卒于故里，先君之从，祭则孙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176808_comment'></div>有槚有松，有郁其冈，不陀不鶱，万世之藏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1176808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　作诗寄胡瑗，推崇备至。作品：《寄赠胡先生》<div id='poem_70701' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在舒州，作诗。作品：《阴漫漫行》《发廪》《兼并》<div id='poem_70440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_70440'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70440'>愁云怒风相追逐，青山灭没沧江覆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/70337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发廪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_70337'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70337'>先王有经制，颁赍上所行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70337'>后世不复古，贫穷主兼并。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70337'>非民独如此，为国赖以成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70337'>筑台尊寡妇，入粟至公卿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70337'>我尝不忍此，愿见井地平。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70337'>大意苦未就，小官苟营营。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70337'>驾言发富藏，云以救鳏茕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70337'>崎岖山谷间，百室无一盈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70337'>乡豪已云然，罢弱安可生。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70337'>兹地昔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_70337", 70337, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>丰实</span>，土沃人良耕。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70337'>他州或呰窳，贫富不难评。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70337_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70660'>人主擅操柄，如天持斗魁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70660'>奸回法有诛，势亦无自来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1054')">1053-1054年</a>，33-34岁</div><div id='71bdf7fcf7d3478b8c927083e3bf2ff9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年10月</a>　又乞曾巩撰祖母墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年11月</a>　十一月，祖母谢氏葬于抚州金鸡县。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　是年，周蕴、周咏请铭，为撰墓志铭。作品：《都官郎中致仕周公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>都官郎中致仕周公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176799")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176799_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176799'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176799'>尚书都官郎中南康周公卒之明年，皇祐五年，葬某所，子蕴、咏使请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176799_comment'></div>次其语曰：公讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176799_comment'></div>其先占蔡之汝阳，唐末遇乱于光、蕲，迁江州之星子镇，太平兴国中，以镇为县，又以为南康军，故今为南康人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176799_comment'></div>曾大父某，大父某，当李氏时，皆以学行为处士家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176799_comment'></div>皇考某，累赠尚书职方郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176799_comment'></div>始以进士起，至尚书屯田郎中，求监池之永丰监，遂致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176799_comment'></div>已而今天子大享明堂恩，除都官于家以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176799_comment'></div>尝令岳之沅江、寿之霍丘、池之建德、邛之依政、河南之洛阳，凡五县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176799_comment'></div>通判池州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176799_comment'></div>守二州，曰蓬曰安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176799_comment'></div>其治之宽严，视事剧易，尤惠于池、蓬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176799_comment'></div>蓬人爱思，至为公画像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176799_comment'></div>在洛阳，明肃太后使中贵人用事者来，留守倾身媚附之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176799_comment'></div>中人讽公请己，独拒之不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176799_comment'></div>故相张士逊荐公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1176799", 1176799, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>说书</span>国学，且谕公见执政，公固谢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176799_comment'></div>其笃学果行、盖有世士夫所难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176799_comment'></div>卒时春秋七十七，戒丧葬无用浮屠说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176799_comment'></div>有文十卷，世传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176799_comment'></div>先夫人王氏，封仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176799_comment'></div>二子：蕴，保信军节度推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176799_comment'></div>咏，太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176799_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1176799'>余闻异时宦官之幸，虽隆名尊爵，有纪于时者，往往为之诎焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176799_comment'></div>又观古之士，能无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1176799", 1176799, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>折身</span>以市于贵势，盖亦少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176799_comment'></div>信公之所守，则其贤远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176799_comment'></div>我铭公藏，不刻其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176799_comment'></div>惟兹之存，以劝毋邪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1176799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　欲凿秋口浦枞阳渠，以避马当山罗刹石之险，未果。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　与胡舜元同砚席读书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　为许元撰文。作品：《许氏世谱序》<div id='poem_1176716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许氏世谱</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176716")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176716'>伯夷，神农之后也，佐尧、舜有大功，赐姓曰姜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176716_comment'></div>其后见经者四国：曰申，《诗》所谓申伯者是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176716_comment'></div>曰吕，《书》所谓吕侯者是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176716_comment'></div>曰齐，曰许，《春秋》内书齐侯、许男是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176716_comment'></div>周衰，许男尝从大侯侵伐会盟，竟于春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176716_comment'></div>及后世无复国，而子孙以其封姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176716_comment'></div>然世传有许由者，尧以天下让由，由不受，逃之箕山，箕山上盖有许由冢焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176716_comment'></div>其事不见于经，学者疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176716_comment'></div>或曰：「由亡求于世者耳，虽与之天下，盖不受也，故好事者以云」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176716_comment'></div>而由与伯夷，其生后先，所祖同不同，莫能知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176716_comment'></div>汉兴，许氏侯者六人，柏至侯盎，宋子侯瘛，严侯猜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176716_comment'></div>此三侯者，其始以将封，而史不书其州里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176716_comment'></div>平恩侯广汉、博望侯舜、乐成侯延寿，此三侯者，同产昆弟也，以外戚起于宣、元之世，昌邑人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176716_comment'></div>盎孙昌尝为丞相，延寿及广汉弟子嘉，尝为大司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176716_comment'></div>至王莽败，许氏始皆失其封云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176716_comment'></div>后汉会稽有许荆者，循吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176716_comment'></div>许慎者，以经术显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176716_comment'></div>许峻者，为《易林》传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176716_comment'></div>许杨者，治鸿隙陂，有德于汝南，汝南之民报祭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176716_comment'></div>许靖者，避地交州，后入蜀，先主以为太傅，与从弟劭俱善论人物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176716_comment'></div>劭兄虔，亦知名，世称平舆渊有二龙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176716_comment'></div>慎、峻、杨、靖皆汝南人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176716_comment'></div>许褚者，家于谯，以忠力事魏，封侯牟乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176716_comment'></div>许慈者，家南阳，入蜀，父子为博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176716_comment'></div>司马晋时有许孜者，东阳人也，德行高，察孝廉不起，老于家，其子曰生，亦有至性焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176716_comment'></div>初，许氏爵邑于周，子孙播散四方，有纪者犹不乏焉，至昌邑始大者，间兴于汝南，其后祖高阳者为最盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176716_comment'></div>然高阳之族，不见其所始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176716_comment'></div>有据者，仕魏，历校尉、郡守，生允，为镇北将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1176716_comment'></div>允三子，皆仕司马晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1176716_comment'></div>奇，司隶校尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1176716_comment'></div>猛，幽州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1176716_comment'></div>奇子遐，侍中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1176716_comment'></div>猛子式，平原太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1176716_comment'></div>自允至式皆知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1176716_comment'></div>允后五世询，司马晋尝召官之，不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1176716_comment'></div>询孙圭，为旌阳太守于齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1176716_comment'></div>圭生勇慧，齐太子家令、冗从仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1176716_comment'></div>勇慧生懋，笃学，以孝闻，卒于梁，为中庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1176716_comment'></div>懋生亨，为陈卫尉卿，尝领史官，次齐、梁时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1176716_comment'></div>有子善心，为之卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1176716_comment'></div>是时，有许绍者，善心族父也，通守夷陵，治有恩，流户自归数十万，卒有劳于唐，爵安陆郡公，圉师、钦寂、钦明其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1176716_comment'></div>圉师，绍少子，宽博有器干，别自封平恩男，与敬宗俱龙朔中宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1176716_comment'></div>钦寂谓绍曾大父也，万岁中，帅师当契丹，为所败，执以如安东，使说守者降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1176716_comment'></div>至安东，曰：「贼今且破灭，公勉守，无忘忠也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1176716_comment'></div>契丹即杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1176716_comment'></div>是岁，弟钦明亦遇杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1176716_comment'></div>钦明为凉州都督，案行，卒与突厥遇，亦执使降，至灵州，顾为廋言告守者所以破贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1176716_comment'></div>兄弟将兵，一旦同以身徇边鄙，贤者荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1176716_comment'></div>敬宗者，善心子也，始以公开郡于高阳，与其孙令伯以文称当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1176716_comment'></div>天宝之乱，敬宗有孙曰远，与张巡以睢阳抗贼，自以不及巡，推巡为将，而亲为之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1176716_comment'></div>久之，食已尽，煮茶、纸以食，犹坚守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1176716_comment'></div>贼所以不得南向，以睢阳弊其锋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1176716_comment'></div>卒与俱死者，皆天下豪杰义士云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1176716_comment'></div>唐亡，远孙儒，不义朱梁，自雍州入于江南，终身不出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1176716_comment'></div>儒生稠，沈毅有信，仕江南李氏，参德化王军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1176716_comment'></div>稠生规，好道家言，不以事自慁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1176716_comment'></div>尝羁宣、歙间，闻旁舍呻呼，就之，曰：「我某郡人也，察君长者，且死，愿以骸骨属君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1176716_comment'></div>因指橐中黄金十斤，曰：「以是交长者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1176716_comment'></div>规许诺，敬负其骨千里，并黄金置死者家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1176716_comment'></div>家大惊愧之，因请献金如儿言以为许君寿，规不顾竟去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1176716_comment'></div>于是闻者滋以规为长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1176716_comment'></div>卒，葬池州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1176716_comment'></div>后以子故赠大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1176716_comment'></div>生遂、逖、迥三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1176716_comment'></div>遂善事母，里母劢其子，辄曰：「汝独不惭许伯通乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1176716_comment'></div>祥符中，天子有事于泰山，加恩群臣，逖当迁，让其兄遂，天子以遂试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1176716_comment'></div>遂子俞，字尧言，名能文章，大臣屡荐之，有与不合者，官以故不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1176716_comment'></div>尝知兴国军大冶县，县人至今称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1176716_comment'></div>俞两子，均为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1176716_comment'></div>逖字景山，尝上书江南李氏，李氏叹奇之，以为崇文馆校书郎，岁终，拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1176716_comment'></div>后复上书太宗论边事，宰相赵普奇其意，以为与己合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1176716_comment'></div>知兴元府，起酂侯废堰以利民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1176716_comment'></div>治澧、荆、扬三州，为盗者逃而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1176716_comment'></div>其事兄如事父，使妻事其长姒如事母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1176716_comment'></div>故人无后，为嫁其女如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1176716_comment'></div>有子五人：恂，黄州录事参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1176716_comment'></div>恢，尚书虞部员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1176716_comment'></div>怡，今为太子中舍，签书淮南节度判官厅公事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1176716_comment'></div>元，今为江淮荆湖两浙制置发运使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1176716_comment'></div>平，泰州海陵主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1176716_comment'></div>五人者咸孝友如其先人，故士大夫论孝友者归许氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1176716_comment'></div>元以国子博士、发运判官，七年遂为其使，待制天章阁，自天子大臣莫不以为材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1176716_comment'></div>其劳烈方在史氏记，余故不论而著其家行云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1176716_comment'></div>迥字光远，其事母如伯通之孝，事其兄如景山之为弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1176716_comment'></div>慷慨有大意，少尝仕李氏，后不复仕，与其兄俱葬颜村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1176716_comment'></div>有子会，为进士，方壮时，亦慨然好议天下事，今为太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1176716_comment'></div>临川王某曰：余谱许氏，自据以下，其绪传始显焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1176716_comment'></div>然自许男见于周，其后数封，而有纪之子孙多焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1176716_comment'></div>考是论之，夫伯夷之所以佐其君治民，余读《书》未尝不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1176716", 1176716, "Clauses/295/Comments/2")'>喟然</span>叹思之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1176716_comment'></div>《传》曰：「盛德者必百世祀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1176716_comment'></div>若伯夷者，盖庶几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1176716_comment'></div>彼其后世忠孝之良，亦使之遭时，沐浴舜、禹之间以尽其材，而与夫夔、皋、罴虎之徒俱出而驰焉，其孰能概之耶？</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_91_1176716'></div><div id='poem_sentence_91_1176716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在舒州任通判。舅父吴蕃葬，为撰墓志铭。作品：《金鸡吴君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1176807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金溪吴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176807")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176807'>君和易罕言，外如其中，言未尝及人过失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176807_comment'></div>至论前世善恶，其国家存亡治乱成败所繇，甚可听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176807_comment'></div>尝所读书甚众，尤好古而学其辞，其辞又能尽其议论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176807_comment'></div>年四十三，四以进士试于有司，而卒困于无所就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176807_comment'></div>其葬也，以皇祐六年某月日，抚州之金溪县归德乡石廪之原，在其舍南五里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176807_comment'></div>当是时，君母夫人既老，而子世隆、世范皆尚幼，三女子，其一卒，其二未嫁云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176807_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176807_comment'></div>以君之有，与夫世之贵富而名闻天下者计焉，其独歉彼耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176807_comment'></div>然而不得禄以行其意，以祭以养，以遗其子孙以卒，此其士友之所以悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176807_comment'></div>夫学者将以尽其性，尽性而命可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176807_comment'></div>知命矣，于君之不得意，其又何悲耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176807_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176807'>蕃君名，字彦弼，氏吴其先自姬出，以儒起家世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1176807", 1176807, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>冕黻</span>，独成之难幽以折，厥铭维甥订君实。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1176807'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1176807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　舒州任满，赋诗离别。作品：《别灊皖二山》《别灊阁》<div id='poem_70449' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70449' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70449?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别灊皖二山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70449")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_70449_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70449'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70449'>乡垒新恩借旧朱，欲辞灊皖更踌蹰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70449'>攒峰列岫应讥我，饱食穷<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作频）</span>年报<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙舒本作执）</span>礼虚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70449'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_70449_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_69329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别灊阁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69329")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_69329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69329'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69329'>一溪清泻百山重，风物能留邴曼容。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　过皖口，作诗。作品：《过皖口》《别皖口》<div id='poem_69319' -----title
昆山（吴县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='43c7ceee43e94fcfa4b5ecd99f49de8e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("43c7ceee43e94fcfa4b5ecd99f49de8e");'><span id='43c7ceee43e94fcfa4b5ecd99f49de8e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>，33岁</div><div id='43c7ceee43e94fcfa4b5ecd99f49de8e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在苏州游昆山慧聚寺，次韵孟郊诗。作品：《昆山慧聚寺次孟郊韵》<div id='poem_70546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70546?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昆山慧聚寺次孟郊韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70546")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70546'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70546'>僧蹊蟠青苍，莓苔上秋床。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70546'>露翰饥更清，风蘤远亦香。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70546'>扫石出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70546", 70546, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>古色</span>，洗松纳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_70546", 70546, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>空光</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70546'>久游不忍还，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70546", 70546, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>迫迮</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70546", 70546, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>冠盖场</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70546'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70546_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; -----title
含山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3981f8ddfc3346bcbe9d6e38f2169128_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3981f8ddfc3346bcbe9d6e38f2169128");'><span id='3981f8ddfc3346bcbe9d6e38f2169128_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>，34岁</div><div id='3981f8ddfc3346bcbe9d6e38f2169128' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年7月</a>　七月，与弟安国、安上，友人王回等游褒禅山，撰文。作品：《游褒禅山记》<div id='poem_1176688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游褒禅山记</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176688")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176688_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176688'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176688'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>褒禅</span>山亦谓之华山，唐浮图慧褒始舍于其址，而卒葬之，以故其后名之曰「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/3/Comments/2")'>褒禅</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176688_comment'></div>今所谓慧空禅院者，褒之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>庐冢</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176688_comment'></div>距其院东五里，所谓华山洞者，以其乃华山之阳名之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176688_comment'></div>距洞百馀步有碑仆道，其文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>漫灭</span>，独其为文犹可识，曰「花山」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176688_comment'></div>今言「华」如「华实」之「华」者，盖音谬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176688_comment'></div>其下平旷，有泉侧出，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>记游</span>者甚众，所谓前洞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176688_comment'></div>由山以上五六里，有穴窈然，入之甚寒，问其深，则其好游者不能穷也，谓之后洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176688_comment'></div>余与四人拥火以入，入之愈深，其进愈难，而其见愈奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176688_comment'></div>有怠而欲出者，曰：「不出，火且尽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176688_comment'></div>遂与之俱出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176688_comment'></div>盖予所至，比好游者尚不能十一，然视其左右，来而记之者已少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176688_comment'></div>盖其又深，则其至又加少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176688_comment'></div>方是时，予之力尚足以入，火尚足以明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176688_comment'></div>既其出，则或咎其欲出者，而予亦悔其随之，而不得极夫游之乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176688_comment'></div>于是予有叹焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176688_comment'></div>古人之观于天地、山川、草木、虫鱼、鸟兽，往往有得，以其求思之深而无不在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176688_comment'></div>夫夷以近，则游者众；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176688_comment'></div>险以远，则至者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1176688_comment'></div>而世之奇伟瑰怪非常之观，常在于险远，而人之所罕至焉，故非有志者，不能至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1176688_comment'></div>有志矣，不随以止也，然力不足者，亦不能至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1176688_comment'></div>有志与力而又不随以怠，至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1176688", 1176688, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>幽暗</span>昏惑，而无物以相之，亦不能至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1176688_comment'></div>然力足以至焉，于人为可讥，而在己为有悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1176688_comment'></div>尽吾志也而不能至者，可以无悔矣，其孰能讥之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1176688_comment'></div>此予之所得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1176688_comment'></div>余于仆碑，又以悲夫古书之不存，后世之谬其传而莫能名者，何可胜道也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1176688_comment'></div>此所以学者不可以不深思而慎取之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1176688_comment'></div>四人者，庐陵萧君圭君玉、长乐王回深父、余弟安国平父、安上纯父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1176688_comment'></div>至和元年七月某日，临川王某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1176688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1176688'><span class='label'>按：</span>《临川先生文集》卷八三。又见《文章辨体汇选》卷五七四，《古文奇赏》卷二一，《古今游名山记》卷一一，《名山胜概记》卷二三，《古今图书集成》职方典卷八七二、山川典卷七○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1176688_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
和县（乌江）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='928d3c9e0ec84303bffff8ba64229707_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("928d3c9e0ec84303bffff8ba64229707");'><span id='928d3c9e0ec84303bffff8ba64229707_link' id='poem_sentence_0_69153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69153'>江东子弟今虽在，肯与<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作为）</span>君王卷土来。<div color: gray;'>▪</span>在和州延张康医母。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在和州作诗咏杜甫。作品：《杜甫画像》<div id='poem_70484' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70484' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70484?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杜甫画像</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_70484'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70484'>吾观少陵诗，为与元气侔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70484'>浩荡八极中，生物岂不稠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70484'>丑妍巨细千万殊，竟莫见以何雕锼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70484'>惜哉命之穷，颠倒不见收。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70484'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_70484", 70484, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>青衫</span>老更斥，饿走半九州。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70484'>瘦妻僵前子仆后，攘攘盗贼森戈矛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_70484'>吟哦当此时，不废朝廷忧。<div id='poem_sentence_7_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_70484'>常愿天子圣，大臣各伊周。<div id='poem_sentence_8_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_70484'>宁令吾庐独破受冻死，不忍四海寒飕飕<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本句作不忍四海赤子寒飕飗）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_70484'>伤屯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_70484", 70484, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>悼屈</span>止一身，嗟时之人死<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作我）</span>所羞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_70484'>所以见公像<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作画，据张本改）</span>，再拜涕泗流。<div id='poem_sentence_11_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_70484'>惟<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作推）</span>公之心古亦少，愿起公死从之游。<div id='poem_sentence_12_70484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_70484'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_70484_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
庐山（星子）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2c8d877434c94004b40a85c415d8e178_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2c8d877434c94004b40a85c415d8e178");'><span id='2c8d877434c94004b40a85c415d8e178_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>，38岁</div><div id='2c8d877434c94004b40a85c415d8e178' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游落星寺，作诗。作品：《落星寺》<div id='poem_70219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>落星寺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70219")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70219_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_70219_0'>① 在南康军江中（按：《苕溪渔隐丛话》前集卷三四引《王直方诗话》谓此诗乃章儒道所作，而胡仔不以为然。）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70219'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70219'>崒云台殿起崔嵬，万里长江一酒杯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70219'>坐见山川吞日月，杳无车马送尘埃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70219'>雁飞云路声低过，客近天门梦易回。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70219'>胜概唯诗可收拾，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_70219", 70219, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>不才</span>羞作等闲来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70219'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70219_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>泝九江，上庐山，识王韶。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
鄱阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d8f3525c5b8f4a019d43f4b9eb92fdc5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d8f3525c5b8f4a019d43f4b9eb92fdc5");'><span id='d8f3525c5b8f4a019d43f4b9eb92fdc5_link' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70172'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70172'>离家当日尚炎风，叱驭归时九月穷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　与王令书，询配兵事，并约冬末至金陵聚。作品：《与王逢原书》其六。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　作书寄丁元珍，约冬末重会于广德。作品：《与丁元珍书》<div id='poem_1176361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与丁元珍书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176361")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176361_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176361'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176361'>某顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176361_comment'></div>过广曾欲作书，遣人奉诇动止，以有故亟归，是以虽作书而不果遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176361_comment'></div>辱教，承知屡赐问，然不得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176361_comment'></div>亦尝附状，何为皆不至乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176361_comment'></div>曹振佳士，已为发令状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176361_comment'></div>如此人虽微元珍之教，固不敢失，况重以元珍之见喻乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176361_comment'></div>前书已报左右，恐不到，故复以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176361_comment'></div>求郡固且止，甚荷见教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176361_comment'></div>然某之所请，不为无辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176361_comment'></div>若执政不察，直以为罪，则某何敢解免？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176361_comment'></div>如欲尽其辞，而然后加之罪，则某事固有本末，非今日茍然欲避烦劳而求佚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176361_comment'></div>古者一道德以同俗，故士有揆古人之所为以自守，则人无异论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176361_comment'></div>今家异道，人殊德，士之欲自守者，又牵于末俗之势，不得事事如古，则人之异论，可悉弭乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176361_comment'></div>要当择其近于礼义而无大谴者取之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176361_comment'></div>不审足下终将何以为仆谋哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176361_comment'></div>秋冷，自爱重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176361_comment'></div>望冬间复到广州，冀或一邀从者，为境上之会，不审可求檄来否耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176361_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176361_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　弟安礼自鄱阳取道随州入京应试。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年10月</a>　十月，王令至真州，来书论及请郡及配兵上纲等事。作书回之，约来年春会于江宁。作品：《与王逢原书》其七。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　王令归江阴致书。答之，再约会于江宁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　王靖奉使江东访茶法利害，有诗相寄。作诗酬之，述东南茶法之害。作品：《酬王詹叔奉使江东访茶法利害见寄（嘉祐三年九月）》<div id='poem_70769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70769' -----title
当涂

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69477'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69477'>将母邗沟上，留家白纻阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
安徽（绩溪县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f0a0dfdadc8c41489d014eeff2f80450_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f0a0dfdadc8c41489d014eeff2f80450");'><span id='f0a0dfdadc8c41489d014eeff2f80450_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>，38岁</div><div id='f0a0dfdadc8c41489d014eeff2f80450' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>度麾岭，作诗寄孙觉，并致书请孙疏示监秤子搔扰时。作品：《度麾岭寄莘老》《与孙莘老书》<div id='poem_70032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>度麾岭寄莘老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70032")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_70032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70032'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70032'>区区随传换冬春，夜半悬崖托此身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70032'>岂慕王尊能许国，直缘毛义欲私亲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70032'>施为已坏生平学，梦想犹归寂寞滨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70032'>风月一歌劳者事，能明吾意可无人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70032'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_70032_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1176376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与孙莘老书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176376")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176376'>某昨日相见，殊匆匆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176376_comment'></div>所示及信狱事，深思如此难处，足下试思其方，因书示及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176376_comment'></div>今世人相识，未见有切瑳琢磨如古之朋友者，盖能受善言者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176376_comment'></div>幸而其人有善人之意，而与游者犹以为阳，不信也，此风甚可患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176376_comment'></div>如某之不肖，虽不为有道，计足下犹当以善言处我，而未尝有善言见赐，岂以为不足语乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176376_comment'></div>足下尚如此，复何望于今世人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176376_comment'></div>是为事，某亦虽多复辨论，非敢自强蔽以所识，直以为不如是，则亦有所未悟，彼此之理不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176376_comment'></div>在他人，恐以不能敬受其说，而欲是者因而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176376_comment'></div>在足下聪明，想宜知鄙心，要当往复穷究道理耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176376_comment'></div>古之人，未有不须友以成者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176376_comment'></div>盖无朋友，则不闻其过，最患之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176376_comment'></div>况某之不肖，所学者非世之所可用，而所任者非身之所能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176376_comment'></div>忍心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1176376", 1176376, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>拂性</span>，茍取衣食，而冒人之寄属，其大过宜日日有，方理稽求可以自脱，冀足下时见谕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176376_comment'></div>盐秤子搔扰事，幸疏示其详，不敢作足下文字施行，要约束今后耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176376_comment'></div>足下既受人民社稷于上官，势亦不得有所避，避太过，则其事将不直，而职事亦何由理也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176376_comment'></div>如盐秤子事，悉望疏示，自足下职事，然某不敢漏露也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176376_comment'></div>至麾岭乡诗，奉寄一览也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1176376_comment'></div>秋冷，自爱！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1176376_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
大名（元城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e7071d35d0e14d29a7a8c324839b6797_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e7071d35d0e14d29a7a8c324839b6797");'><span id='e7071d35d0e14d29a7a8c324839b6797_link' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至大名府王村，作诗。作品：《王村》<div id='poem_69755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69755?labeling=true' "poem_title_69755")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69755'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69755'>晻霭王村路，春风北使旗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69755'>尘催轻骑走，寒咽短箫吹。<div -----end

-----title
荥阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c35f9725885548bd95f68bf3cf817839_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c35f9725885548bd95f68bf3cf817839");'><span id='c35f9725885548bd95f68bf3cf817839_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>，48岁</div><div id='c35f9725885548bd95f68bf3cf817839' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>宿荥阳驿。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过汜水关，作诗寄弟安礼，题诗汜水关寺壁。作品：《汜水寄和父》<div id='poem_69899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69899?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汜水寄和甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69899")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69899'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69899'>虎牢关下水逶迤，想汝飘然过此时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69899'>洒血祇添波浪起，脱身难借羽翰追。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69899'>留连厚禄非朝隐，乖隔残年更土思。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69899'>已卜冶城三亩地，寄声知我有归期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69899'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69899_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title

color: gray;'>▪</span>有诗书巩县任村马铺。作品：《书任村马铺》<div id='poem_70300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书任村马铺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70300")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70300'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70300'>儿童系马黄河曲，近岸河流如可掬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70300'>任村<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_70300", 70300, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>炊米</span>朝食鱼，日暮荥阳驿中宿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70300'>投老经过身独在，当时洲渚今平陆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70300'>秫黍冥冥十数家，仰视荒蹊但乔木。<div id='poem_sentence_3_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_70300'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_70300", 70300, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>冰盘</span>鲙<span class='inlineComment2'>（原缺，据张本补）</span>美客自知，起看白水还东驰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_70300'>尔来百口皆年少，归与何人共此悲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_70300_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_70300'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_70300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>出巩县，至永昭陵。作诗。作品：《出巩县》<div id='poem_70333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_70333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/70333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出巩县</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_70333")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_70333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_70333'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_70333'>昭陵落月烟雾昏，篝火度谷行山根。<div id='poem_sentence_0_70333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_70333'>投鞭委辔涉数村，寤出巩县城东门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_70333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_70333'>向来宫阙不可见，但有洛水流浑浑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_70333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_70333'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_70333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; -----end

商丘（上元）

</span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176166")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176166'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈，特差臣女婿前守常州江阴县主簿蔡卞，沿路押赐生日礼物：衣一对、衣著一百匹、金花银器一百两、马二匹、金镀银鞍辔一副者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176166_comment'></div>宽假之恩，幸从于私欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176166_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1176166", 1176166, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>匪颁</span>之宠，尚玷于常科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176166_comment'></div>知报称之良难，积惊惭而实厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176166_comment'></div>伏念臣见收末路，承乏近司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176166_comment'></div>犬马之力已殚，讫无补报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176166_comment'></div>蝼蚁之诚自列，宠幸退藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176166_comment'></div>尚兼将相之崇，且受藩维之托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176166_comment'></div>叨逾已极，赐与更蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176166_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下仁冒海隅，礼优臣庶，宥众尤之积累，示全度之并包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176166_comment'></div>爰及微生，具膺殊奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176166_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1176166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_69596'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_69596_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年1月1日</a>　此日，修《相鹤经》。<div id='poem_1176585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相鹤经</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176585")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176585'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176585'>鹤者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1176585", 1176585, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>阳鸟</span>也，而游于阴，因金气依火精以自养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176585_comment'></div>金数九，火数七，六十三年小变，百六十年大变，千六百年形定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176585_comment'></div>生三年顶赤，七年飞薄云汉，又七年夜十二时鸣，六十年大毛落，茸毛生，乃洁白如雪，泥水不能污，百六年雌雄相视而孕，一千六百年饮而不食，胎化产，为仙人之骐骥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176585_comment'></div>夫声闻于天故顶赤，食于水故喙长，轻于前故毛丰而肉疏，脩颈以纳新故天寿不可量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176585_comment'></div>所以体无青黄二色，土木之气内养，故不表于外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176585_comment'></div>是以行必依洲渚，止不集林木，盖羽族之清崇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176585_comment'></div>其相曰：「隆鼻短喙则少瞑，露睛赤白则视远，长颈竦身则能鸣，凤翼雀尾则善飞，龟背鳖腹会舞，高胫促节足力」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176585_comment'></div>其文，李浮丘伯授王子晋，又崔文子学道于子晋，得其文，藏嵩山石室，淮南公采药得之，遂传于近代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176585_comment'></div>熙宁十年正月一日，临川王某笔。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176585'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1176585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年1月13日</a>　此日，皇七子生，上贺表。作品：《贺生皇子表》其一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　上表、劄，乞罢使相，求宫观。作品：《乞宫观表》其一。《乞宫观劄子》其一。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　神宗遣中使冯宗道赍敕宣谕不允。遂在上表、劄，乞以本官除宫观差遣。作品：《乞宫观表》其二。《乞宫观劄子》其二。<div id='poem_1176233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176233?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞改三经义误字劄子一<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>周礼义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176233")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176233'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176233'>《小宰》：「其财用上」，「其」字当作「共」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1176233'>《大府》：「受藏之府，则若职内掌邦之赋入是也，受用之府，则若职岁掌邦之赋出是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176233_comment'></div>已上三十字，今欲删去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1176233'>《党正》：「岁属其民者四」，「四」当作「五」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1176233'>《诵训》：「以诏王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1176233", 1176233, "Clauses/14/Comments/2")'>观事</span>」，当去「王」字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1176233'>《典瑞》：「手足腹背」，「手」当作「首」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1176233'>《冢人》：「山林之尸则以山虞」，已上八字，今欲删去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1176233'>《御仆》：「掌万民之复」，「复」当作「逆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1176233'>《大驭》：「有軓也」，「四」当作「轨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176233_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1176233'>《大行人》：「三公八命，出封加一命，则谓之上公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176233_comment'></div>已上十四字，今欲删去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176233_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年2月28日</a>　此日，常秩卒。为撰墓表。作品：《宝文阁待制常公墓表》<div id='poem_1176732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝文阁待制常公墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176732")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176732'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176732'>右正言、宝文阁待制、特赠右谏议大夫汝阴常公，以熙宁十年二月己酉卒，以五月壬申葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176732_comment'></div>临川王某志其墓曰：公学不期言也，正其行而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176732_comment'></div>行不期闻也，信其义而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176732_comment'></div>所不取也，可使贪者矜焉，而非彫斲以为廉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176732_comment'></div>所不为也，可使弱者立焉，而非矫抗以为勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176732_comment'></div>官之而不事，召之而不赴，或曰：「必退者也，终此而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176732_comment'></div>及为今天子所礼，则出而应焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176732_comment'></div>于是天子悦其至，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1176732", 1176732, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>虚己</span>而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176732_comment'></div>使莅谏职，以观其迪己也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176732_comment'></div>使董学政，以观其造士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176732_comment'></div>公所言乎上者无传，然皆知其忠而不阿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1176732_comment'></div>所施乎下者无助，然皆见其正而不茍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1176732_comment'></div>《诗》曰「胡不万年」，惜乎既病而归死也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1176732_comment'></div>自周道隐，观学者所取舍，大抵时所好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1176732_comment'></div>违俗而适己，独行而特起，呜呼，公贤远矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1176732_comment'></div>传载公久，莫如以石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1176732_comment'></div>石可磨也，亦可泐也，谓公且朽，不可得也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1176732_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　以神宗遣李友询扶护棺柩至府，并抚问赐药，上谢表。作品：《李友询传宣抚问及赐汤药谢表》<div id='poem_1176097' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176097' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176097?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李友询传宣抚问及赐汤药谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176097")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176097_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176097'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176097'>臣某言：伏奉圣慈特差李友询扶护亡男雱棺柩到府并抚问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176097_comment'></div>孤臣特荷慈怜，未获捐躯报德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176097_comment'></div>贱息比叨宠奖，复以遗骨累恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176097_comment'></div>臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣衅积自躬，凶流及嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176097_comment'></div>因仍积岁，藏厝不时，敢谓私忧，上贻圣虑！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176097_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下饬遣亲使，护致旅棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176097_comment'></div>使亡子之魂即安于窀穸，天性之爱得尽于暮年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176097_comment'></div>申之训辞，抚以药物，眷被终始，施兼存亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176097_comment'></div>铭骨不足以叙欲报之心，沥肝不足以继感泣之血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176097_comment'></div>独恨既愆之力，莫知自效之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1176097_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1176097_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年3月2日</a>　此日，以提举江南路常平朱炎传圣旨令便视府事，上谢表。作品：《朱炎传圣旨令视府事谢表》<div id='poem_1176048' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1176048' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1176048?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱炎传圣旨令视府事谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年3月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_1176048")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1176048_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1176048'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1176048'>臣某言：三月二日提举江南路、太常丞朱炎传圣旨，令臣便视府事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1176048_comment'></div>使指遄臻，训词俯逮，敢图衰疾，尚误眷存<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1176048_comment'></div>伏念臣曲荷搜扬，久孤付属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1176048_comment'></div>有能必献，未尝择事而辞难，无力可陈，乃始吁天而求佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1176048_comment'></div>然方焦思有为之日，以此怀恩未报之身，茍营燕安，岂免惭悸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1176048_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下人惟求旧，义不忘遐，乃因乘轺将命之臣，更喻推毂授方之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1176048_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1176048", 1176048, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>踦履</span>无用，诚弗忍于弃捐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1176048_comment'></div>朽株匪材，尚奚胜于器使？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1176048_comment'></div>永惟奖励，徒誓糜捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1176048_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1176048_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　再上表、劄，乞宫观。作品：《乞宫观表》其三。《乞宫观劄子》其三。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　以神宗遣梁从政斋诏留金陵累月敦谕视事，恳请宫观不已。作品：《乞宫观劄子》其四。《乞宫观表》其四。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　神宗特降诏书不允所乞，仍断来章。再上劄。作品：《乞宫观劄子》其五。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　是年春，故人宋玘自抚州来访，与之唱酬。作品：《次韵酬宋玘六首》<div id='poem_69894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_69890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69890'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69890'>无能私愿祇求田，时<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作财）</span>物安能学计然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69890'>凿井未成歌击壤，射熊犹得梦钧天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69890'>遥思故国归来日，留滞新恩已去年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69890'>携手与君游最乐，春风波<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>上水溅溅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69890'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_69890'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_69890_0'>⑴ 原作陂，据张本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_69890_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_69889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69889?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69889_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69889'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69889'>山陂畴昔从吾亲，诸父先生各佩纷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69889'>零落长年谁语此，迟<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本作迁）</span>回故地却逢君。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69889'>衣冠偶坐论经术，襁褓当时刺绣文。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69889'>更怪高材终未遇，有司何日选方闻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69889'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　有诗寄行详。作品：《自府中归寄西庵行详》<div id='poem_69907' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_69907' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/69907?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自府中归寄西庵行详</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29874, "北宋", "王安石", "poem_title_69907")'>王安石</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_69907_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_69907'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_69907'>意衰难自力，扶路便思还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_69907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_69907'>强逐萧骚水，遥看惨淡山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_69907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_69907'>行寻香草遍，归漾晚云间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_69907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_69907'>西崦分明见，幽人不可攀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_69907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_69907'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_69907_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
